verse_text: Jesu Krist lagŋɛl Abraham ɛm, lele David ɛm ab e mew.
Abraham ec’alaw Isak e l’ew ab ɛm ec’en ec’es ɔsŋm: Jakɔb,
Juda lele lisijimɛl ab; Perɛs lele Zera ab (Tamar el ɛl lis), Ɛsrɔm, Aram,
Aminadab, Nasɔn, Salmɔ,
Boas (Rahab el lis), Obɛd (Rut el lis)
Jese, lele jim ɛb ebu David ab. Salomɔ (lis el Uri e yɔw a);
Roboam, Abia, Asaf,
Josafat, Joram, Osias,
Joatam, Akas, Esekias,
Manase, Amɔ, Josias,
Yekonia lele lisijimɛl ab. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm anake wɛl ot Israɛl ec’ey im madu ɔkr ɛm Babilɔn wus af a.
Ca eke wɛl ot Israɛl ec’ey im Babilɔn a, ow e jam a, ow el Salatiɛl, Sorobabɛl,
Abiud, Eliakim, Asɔr,
Sadɔk, Akim, Eliud,
Eleasar, Matan, Jakɔb,
ɛtŋ Jakɔb ew Josɛf, Mari ɛc; Mari anake ew Jesu eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mesi a.

Sica k’igŋ Abraham toŋ David a, ow ij alaw sakp lɛw yar; David toŋ ke k’ok lɛgŋ ab ɛm a eke wɛl ot Israɛl ec’ey im Babilɔn wus af a, ow ij alaw sakp lɛw yar; sica aŋa toŋ ke ok Mesi e mew e lɛgŋ a, ow ij ɛmɛny alaw sakp lɛw yar.
Kin Jesu Krist eci mew owi ec’elel eke ɛcr. Josɛf ɛsu Jesu lis Mari; gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke -l’uwarir any a, Abŋ Lala ec’abusu ɛm, Mari anŋ nimamn.
Ɛc Josɛf el ɛgŋ eke b’ɛlum Nyam ɛtŋ l’erurm eke li k’ɛlu ow ɔkm dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af; ow sosiɛm l’ɛgŋ l’eb eke ew ew ɛm, li k’ɛlu ow es.

Sica eke n’am tutr low na a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow mɛmn ɛm ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Josɛf, David eci lilaw, ɛrmij k’ók’ŋ eke k’oc Mari ɛsɛ ŋ e yɔw af, aŋke Abŋ Lala ec’abusu ɛm anake n’anŋ nimamn a.
Li b’ow l’ew iy, ŋ b’ow ɛsŋ iy a Jesu, aŋke in anake li b’ow l’eb in ec’agŋ a nimum l’ɛlu es ɛl e sikpl ɛm a."
Low na ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke odad a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad kokoba ɔb ɛs ab ɛm a íy nɛny.
Kin odad a: Dedyɔwli a eke anm igŋ ab a b’ow anŋ lokab ɛtŋ b’ow ew iy igŋ eke wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ Emanuɛl. (Nin a e nyandrɛ el: 'Nyam anŋ ɛy ab.')
Eke Josɛf ufŋm es a, li kok ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ɛrm ɛs a dad’r ab af, ɛtŋ l’oc Mari ɛsɛ in e yɔw af.
Gbɛkɔ n’anm ow ab toŋ batŋ Mari ew iy igŋ eke Josɛf ɛw nin Jesu.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke Erɔd el ɛb ebu a anake wɛl ew Jesu Bɛtlehɛm baŋn, Jude wus af a. Sica eke wɛl ew Jesu a, nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ek’el mílɛ́l ɛm ɛkn ec’a, anŋ yogŋ a eke ligbn b’igb a ow toŋ ok Jerusalɛm.
-L’ibrm ninɛ: "Bogŋ iy a eke wɛl ew ke el Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu ab a ee? S’ɛkn in eci lɛ́l a yogŋ a eke ligbn b’anŋ igb a, ow sosiɛm anake s’ow eke si k’usr’r sos a."
Eke ɛb ebu Erɔd amani na ok ɔru ɛm a, ɛrmni ɛdŋ’n es, Jerusalɛm nimum ec’agŋ a yɛji.
Erɔd as egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a fɛŋ lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab fɛŋ luku ɛtŋ am ibrm ɛl yogŋ eke wɛl k’ew Mesi a.
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Bɛtlehɛm baŋn, Jude wus af, aŋke kin low yec’eke Nyam dad ke kokoba ɔb ɛs a nɔn:
Ɛtŋ ŋ, Bɛtlehɛm, elm Jude wus af ec’ɛb ewi a fɛŋ eci jam ɛs. Kɔ ŋ ɛm ɛb ebu a b’ow anŋ ɛy ɔkm, ke nyímn ɛm ec’agŋ Israɛl."
Ow sosiɛm ew ew ɛm Erɔd ɛsŋ nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl a ek’ɛl ɛm, li k’uw lɛgŋ tasi yec’af eke lɛ́l a k’ɛy ɔkm ab any.
Ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl Bɛtlehɛm. Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn otarir iy a e lís e low akr sɛnyn sɛnyn toŋ ɛ́ŋan in; eke b’ɛŋan in a òwr dadr’m yec’ɛtŋ k’ɛm yɛji m’ím m’usr’r sos."

Eke -l’irir ɛb ebu a e sodad a, -l’ɛlu lakr -n’im. Eke -n’aam a, kin lɛ́l a eke -l’ikŋn anym -l’ɛkan yogŋ a eke ligbn b’anŋ igb a, ek’ikŋ ɛl anym. Ɛtŋ wanci ab af a eke lɛ́l a im ok yogŋ a eke iy a anŋ a, n’inym es.
Eke -l’ɛkan lɛ́l a inym es a, -n’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm.
-L’ok akŋ a ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn iy a lele lis Mari ab. -L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ -n’am usr iy a sos. -Li kpakpab ɛl eci sekpr ab es ɛtŋ -l’ap ow sika, ogŋ lele kpey ab.
Ow e jam a, Nyam ɛwar ɛl mɛmn ɛm, eke -li k’ɛwlmn mɛny -n’iimn Erɔd ogŋ a ij; ɛtŋ -l’eb ejagb ɛjeci -n’im ɛl eci wus ab af.

Sica eke nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl a im a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow ɛŋn Josɛf mɛmn ɛm ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc iy a lele lis ab urur es imn Ejipt toŋ bake Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dád ɔny e mɛny ɛwl ow ec’odad, aŋke Erɔd b’ow ɔl iy a eci ibi es."
Kpɛkŋ Josɛf igb ncok ɛm, oc iy a lele Mari ab ɛtŋ -n’im Ejipt.
-N’anŋ yogŋ toŋ Erɔd uw. Low na ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad na eke dad kokoba ɔb ɛs ab ɛm a, íy nɛny: Ejipt wus af ɛtŋ m’ɛsŋ ɛm ec’iy a.

Eke Erɔd b’uw any eke nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl a ɛju’r a, ɛrm ebl’l afŋn in es. Na sosiɛm n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ibi Bɛtlehɛm lele in e saw saw ab ec’ey mɛny nɛnym, toŋ k’igŋ akpo yony ɛsɛl a fɛŋ. Nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ec’amani a ek’ɔŋ’n lɛgŋ ab af eke lɛ́l a ɛy ɔkm a, af yogŋ anake li kok low na a.
Ɛbɛn eke kokoba ɔb ɛs Jeremi ec’odad na eke dad a iy nɛny ana:
Rama ɛb ɛm, wɛl iri lebl ek’ikŋ, ɔŋn ikŋ lele luw eci likekr ab. Rashɛl anake am ikŋ in ec’ey a ec’ɔŋn a. L’ibram ŋɔŋn aŋke in ec’ey a anm ij.
Eke Erɔd uw a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam mɛmn ɛm ow ɛŋn Josɛf Ejipt wus af
ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc iy a lele lis ab ke ɛ́wal mɛny imn Israɛl wus af, aŋke agŋ a eke am ɔl iy ab es eke k’ibi a -l’uw."
Ow ɔŋ Josɛf igb oc iy a lele lis ab ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl -n’im Israɛl wus af.
Gbɛkɔ Josɛf iri eke Arkelaɔs usr ɛs Erɔd usu ɛsɛ Jude eci es ɛw ɛs af; na sosiɛm erŋn ow’r sos eke li k’im l’ir Jude. Eke wɛl yɛgm’n ow ec’ów mɛmn ɛm a, n’im Galile wus af,
ɛtŋ n’im l’ir Nasarɛt baŋn. Ow el ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad na eke dad a íy nɛny: Wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ’n Nasarɛt iy.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ɛy ɔkm Jude eci loj a ɛtŋ am dad Nyam odad ɛsɛ:
"Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm aŋke Afr ec’ es ɛw a ow titm."
Jan el ɛgŋ a eke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi dad in e ec’odad, ow a eke n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ loj am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: "Kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ejagb a, kòkr in e sebr a ínym nyim nyim!"
Jan sus mob eke wɛl kok gbaŋkɔ kedebnam e suw ɛm ɛtŋ l’ɛgŋ ndey lɛl e meb er ɛm; li b’ij tɛtɛ gbaŋgban lele mow mun ab.
Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ, Jude wus af ec’agŋ fɛŋ, lele mij ewl mij Jurdɛn wus ab af ec’agŋ a am ow Jan ogŋ.
-N’am ɛgŋ ɛl e sikpl a -l’eb agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ Jan am ok ɛl mij nuŋ Jurdɛn erŋ.

Eke Jan am ɛkn eke Farisiɛl nɔnɔ lele Sadusiɛl ab am ow in ogŋ mij ok nuŋ ec’a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny morŋn amua! Kɔ bwo dad ɔny eke, ek’okr mij nuŋ ke ɔtur eke k’ŋgbroŋn Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ek’am ow ab ɛm ee?
Sica yɛ̀gmn ɔny ec’es an ab ɛm eke itŋnin ɛrm ɛm!
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny kì tutar ɔny ɛm ki dadr k’ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛy lagŋ el Abraham.' Kɔ m’am dad ɔny eke Nyam ɔtu eke ki kok mebn amua él Abraham ec’alaw!
Sica ɔs anŋ eke b’ow bubr ekŋ es min ɛm. Likŋ fɛŋ ek’ɔ́sum ey amamn a, wɛl b’ow ubr’r es oc ɔwl’l alm.

Ɛm ec’a, m’am m’ok ɔny mij nuŋ mij ɛm ɛsɛ ɛrm ɛm itŋn eci mɛny ɛwr af, gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ ek’anŋ’m jam am ow a b’ow ok ɔny mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala lele al ɛm ab. N’ɔny abusu nɔnɔ l’akm im. M’itm bɔbɔ yɛji eke mi k’ɔny in e cɔkrukpɔ meb a m’ot’r es.
N’ɔnym waw ab ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ egb a lɛf, l’éb ey a, ke l’ígŋ suw a l’ok es. Li b’ow l’eb egb a l’ok egbel ɛm, ke l’ófŋ suw a al ek’iram es ab ɛm."
Sica Jesu anŋ Galile ow Jurdɛn eke Jan k’ok’r mij nuŋ;
kɔ Jan ɛgŋm, ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm anake k’ok’m mij nuŋ a, ɛtŋ ow el ŋ eke am ow ɛm ogŋ!"
Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Caca ɛm a, ɛ̀gŋ ke ow él ɛbɛn, aŋke ɛbɛn eke si b’ow si kok ów fɛŋ eke Nyam am ibrm ɛy ab ana." Ow sosiɛm Jan ɛgŋ eb ok’r mij nuŋ.
Eke Jesu ok mij nuŋ ke am ɛy ɔkm erŋ a, kpɛkŋ afr agbr ɛm. L’ɛkn Nyam ec’Abŋ ek’am us’r es nuŋ af ɛsɛ kel af.
Ɛtŋ lebl nyam anŋ afr am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na el ɛm ec’Iy eke m’erur tasi; m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ m’ɛlu’l ɛm."
Sica Nyam ec’Abŋ oc Jesu im loj eke agn k’ɛju’r.
Eke n’ɛnŋ nɛny sɛgŋ ekŋ yony, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab a, ca namn ow’r sos.
Agn ek’el ɛju ɛs a, ɛri ow titm’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ek’el Nyam ec’Iy, ke dàd mebn amua ítŋn el ob ij."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: Ow elm ob ij sɔny cɛ ɔ́ɔm ɛgŋ sel, kɔ Nyam ec’odad ebl fɛŋ eke b’anŋ’n nɛnym ɛy ɔkm a."
Ɛmɛny agn oc’r im uyum’n Jerusalɛm ɛb lala ab ɛm e Nyamel gbɛl a e luw af ec’usu gege a,

ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Eke el Nyam ec’Iy, ke ànŋ aŋa igb us es wus; aŋke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: Nyam b’ow ɔŋ in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow ŋ sosiɛm, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’oc’ŋ abu ɛm abu ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke lebn kaka kí kokm’ŋ ob lakr."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Nyam Lɛl yɛji dad eke: K’ɛ́bam Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam."
Ɛmɛny agn oc’r im lafɛny gege nyam af, yɛgm’n wus na ec’es ɛw es ɛw a fɛŋ lele ɛl eci sakpl ab ab,
ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Mob amua fɛŋ m’ow m’ɔŋ eke ok ɔwrɔkp wus igŋ’m nuŋ."
Ca Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ Satan, kpab’m es lís! Aŋke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: B’ow igŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam sɔny nuŋ, ke kók in sɔny coco e juma."
Sica agn ɛgb’r es; ɛtŋ kin afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ow’r saw am kok in e lís e low.
Eke Jesu iri eke wɛl ɛlu Jan sobel ɛm a, n’im Galile wus af.
L’irm Nasarɛt ij, ɛtŋ n’im n’anŋ Kapɛrnayum, ɛb eke anŋ Galile eci mij lekpl a saw, Zabulɔn lele Nɛftali ab eci wus ab af.
Ow el ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi eci sodad amua eke dad a íy nɛny:
Zabulɔn eci wus a, Nɛftali eci wus a ek’anŋ okij saw ec’ejagb ab af, Jurdɛn jam a, Galile ek’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ir af!
Agŋ a ek’ir ncebn ɛm a ɛkn usuayl ligbɛl! Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’anŋ luw eci lɔw ew a, usuayl ɛjn ok ɛl af.
Lɛgŋ na af anake Jesu ɔb nuŋ am dad Nyam odad ɛsɛ: "Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm aŋke Afr ec’ es ɛw a ow titm."
Jesu am ɛcr Galile eci mij lekpl a e saw saw ɛtŋ l’ɛkn agŋ lisijimɛl yony ek’el ɔcn ibi ɛsɛl: Simɔ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Piɛr lele lisijim Andre ab. -N’am ok muw mij lekpl ab ɛm.
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Usr’m jam, m’ow mi kok ɔny eel agŋ eb ɛsɛl."
Kpɛkŋ -li digŋ ɛl eci muw a -l’ok es ɛtŋ -l’us ow jam.
Eke li b’im akpoj tɛl a, l’ɛkn agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjeci yony Jak lele Jan ab, Sebede ec’ey. Ɛl ɛs ab -n’anŋ ɛl eci mijɛtŋ ab ɛm -n’am kok ɛl eci muw a ɛtŋ Jesu ɛsŋ ɛl.
Kpɛkŋ -li digŋ ɛl ɛs lele mijɛtŋ ab ab -l’ɛlu es, ɛtŋ -l’us ow jam.

Jesu am ɛc Galile eci wus ab af; wus ab af yogŋ, n’am yɛgm agŋ low Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a ɛtŋ n’am ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba. N’am ewlm ɔ́lu a ɛl ec’ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛl eci dudu fɛŋ ab.

Siri wus af nimum, Jesu e lís ec’odad eke wɛl am dad a ec’amani am ok agŋ ɔru ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl am is’r agŋ fɛŋ ek’am ij ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ e gbre ɛsɛ agŋ ek’ɔny abŋ eŋuŋ, krokro ɛsɛl lele sos ɛ́yru ab; ɛtŋ Jesu am ewlm ɛl.
Agŋ nɔnɔ ek’anŋ Galile ow, Ɛb Lɛw a eci wus ab af ec’agŋ, Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ, Jude wus af ec’agŋ lele Jurdɛn ogog eci wus ab af ec’agŋ ab, am us Jesu jam.
Eke Jesu ɛkn bieku a, l’uyu lafɛny af ɛtŋ li sig es. In e jam ɛsɛl a ow titm’n
ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm wɛl low li dad l’ɛsɛ:
"Agŋ ek’ij abŋ ɛm e gbɔr, ehe él ɛl eci aŋke Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, ɛl eci!
Agŋ a ek’anŋ sɔrŋ ɛm a, ehe él ɛl eci aŋke Nyam b’ow ɛyr ɛl ɛrm es!
Agŋ ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛsɛl, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke -li b’ow -l’ij wus eke Nyam ɛwar a ec’aja.
Agŋ eke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’amn am ɔny a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke Nyam b’ow iyr ɛl lok.
Agŋ a eke b’ikŋ agŋ sɔrŋ a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke Nyam b’ow ikŋ ɛl sɔrŋ!
Agŋ ek’ɛrm ɛm ayl a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke -li b’ow -l’ɛkn Nyam.
Agŋ a eke b’is ɛrm es ɛy a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ ɛl Nyam ec’ey.
Agŋ a eke b’an es ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam b’erur ab af, ke ow sosiɛm wɛl b’ijr gbre a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, ɛl eci.
Ànŋn ehe ɛm eke ɛm sosiɛm agŋ bi wɛwr ɔny, b’ijr ɔny gbre, bi dad ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ ok ɔny af yadŋ ɛm.
Kòkr yaya, ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, aŋke afr ob ap ligbɛl nyam am eku ɔny. Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ek’ikŋ anym ow a yɛji, ɛbɛn eke wɛl ijr ɛl gbre ana."
"Ɔny anake eel wus na e mok a. Kɔ eke mok irmn in e ded a, ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke ki kokr’r ke l’ɛwl li ded ee? L’akplm ij, gbeŋ cɛ l’it eke wɛl k’oc ɔwl’l ke agŋ uyu’r af.
Ɔny anake eel wus na ec’usuayl a. Baŋn ek’anŋ lafɛny af a ɔnym es lɔl.
Wɛl ígŋm kɛniɛ ɛwm es ob ew; kɔ wɛl b’itm’n es ob gege af, ke l’áyal agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ akŋ a.
Ɛbɛn ek’ɔny ec’usuayl a ki jɛjn agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af ana, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɛkn ɔny ec’ów amamn a eke bi kokr a, ke -li kɔklm ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a."
"Kì tutar eke m’ow e mi k’ɔny Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e low yɛgm ab ab m’ot es. M’owm eke mi k’ɔny m’ot ɛl es, kɔ eke mi k’ɛlu liy ɛm.
M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm eke afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛc, kɔ ol a eke wɛl nɔn a e mɔni kaka, ow e logli kaka k’ow tɛtŋm es toŋ ke fɛŋ íy nɛny.

Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ eke b’ow igŋ sol amua ɛm e likekli nyam ɛlu es, ke b’ow yɛgm agŋ kok ɛbɛn a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, li b’ow l’el likekli; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɔsu ol a, ke b’ow yɛgm agŋ kok ɛbɛn a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, li b’ow l’el ligbɛl.
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny: eke kokmn low yec’a eke Nyam am ibrm ɔny a akamn ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab a, k’ow ɛymn Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a."
"Irir eke wɛl dad ɛy lagŋɛl: 'K’íbim ɛgŋ, ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’ibi ɛgŋ a, wɛl b’ow oc’r im jɛj ok ec’any af.'

Kɔ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny m’ɛsɛ: ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ebl ɛrm ok lisijim af a, wɛl b’ow oc’r im jɛj ok ec’any af; ɛgŋ eke b’ow wɛwr lisijim ɛsɛ: 'Ŋ nyamb ɛgŋ a,' wɛl b’ow oc’r im Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ow dad lisijim ɛsɛ 'Nuŋ ɛm akplm ŋ a,' it eke wɛl k’oc’r im gbre ij usu ec’al ab ɛm.
Eke am oc ob ap im egb waw usu ɔŋ Nyam, ɛtŋ yogŋ ɔkn ek’esŋ jim ɛw low ŋ ab a,
egb waw usu yogŋ, ɛ̀w ŋ ec’ob ap ab es, ke íkŋ anym im okar ɛm esŋ jim ab ke sica ɛ́wl ow ke áp Nyam ob a.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɛw low ŋ ab, ɛtŋ usr ejagb aamn jɛj ok ɛm a, ògŋ es fafa okar ɛm eke anŋn ejagb af a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ócm’ŋ n’ɔɔm jɛj ok ɛs, jɛj ok ɛs a ocm’ŋ ɔɔm usu ɔsu ɛs ɛlum’ŋ sobel ɛm.
M’am dad’ŋ nawrɛ ɛm: k’ow ɛym ɔkm yogŋ eke sɔgm ŋ e labm a fɛŋ ek’ɔny a uwarm."
"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ab ee? K’íjm nfaci.
Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bi lɛr lawl e yɔw ke b’ɔny erur in ec’ɛrm ɛm a, ow ab l’ij nfaci ŋ̂.

Eke batŋ ow el ŋ e lidr e nyamn a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ɔ̀kr ɔny oc’r es ɔwl’l usu kpekpe: ow akpl ŋ eci eke k’irmn ŋ e sos ikpr nyam cɛ, ow a eke ŋ e sos a fɛŋ k’anŋ ke wɛl ɔny ɔwl’ŋ gbre ij usu a.
Eke batŋ ow el ŋ e lidr abu a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ùbr’r es oc ɔwl’l kpekpe: ow akpl ŋ eci eke k’irmn sos ogog nyam, ow a eke k’im gbre ij usu ab ɛm ŋ e sos a fɛŋ ab a."
"Wɛl dad yɛji: 'Eke am ogŋ ŋ e yɔw eke ɔl mar ɛbi a, ɔ́ŋ’n igŋnin e lɛl.'
Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’ɛlu in e yɔw e l’ɔl mar l’ɛbi es, ke ow elm egŋ ot owi ɛm a, n’ɔŋ yɔw a b’ow ɛy nfaci ij owi ɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’ɛbi yɔw eke wɛl ɔwr a, in yɛji l’ij nfaci."
"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ɛy lagŋɛl ab ee? K’ítŋnm ŋ e nɛny ij a, kɔ ke kók Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af, yec’a eke dad nɛny ij ɛm a.
Kɔ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny eke k’íjmn nɛny kaka: k’íjmn nɛny afr e nin ɛm aŋke ow el Nyam eci es sig usu;
k’íjmn nɛny wus e nin ɛm aŋke ow el in ec’akr es ok usu, k’íjmn nɛny Jerusalɛm e nin ɛm, aŋke ow el Ɛb Ebu gbɛl a ec’ɛb.
K’íjm nɛny okm ŋ e nuŋ ab af aŋke k’ɔtum kokm ŋ e sin nuŋ nyam ibrm oglog ufum.
Dàdr cɛ ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛɛ' oglog 'Njaŋ.' Yec’a eke wɛl bi dad igŋ af a, low ŋuŋn ɛs eci."
"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ab ee? Nyamn lele nyamn ab ɛtŋ nɛn lele nɛn ab.
Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny eke k’átarmn ɔny ec’ifnu ab. Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɛdŋ’ŋ any af lidr ogog e láwl a, ɔ̀kŋ’n nɛmn ogog ec’a yɛji l’ɛ́dŋ’ŋ.
Eke ɛgŋ oc im’ŋ jɛj ok ec’any af eke k’eb ŋ eci mob sus ɛm a, yɛ̀b’r l’éb ŋ e mob af ɛw a yɛji.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny’ŋ lɛc ɛm eke k’an es in ab sɔfu kaka fɛŋ a, àn ow eci sakp yony.
Ɛgŋ ek’am ibrm’ŋ ob a, ɔ̀ŋ’n; k’ùŋan ɛgŋ ɛrm suŋ."
"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ab ee? B’ow erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ke ífn ŋ ec’ifnu.
Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny: èrurir ɔny ec’efnu, ke ŋɔ́ŋan Nyam ɔŋn agŋ a eke b’ijr ɔny gbre a;
ow ɛm a b’ow eel ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a ec’ey, aŋke in e ligbn a b’afŋn ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl lele ów amamn kok ɛsɛl ab, ɛtŋ in ec’afr e mij a b’aan ów amamn kok ɛsɛl lele ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl ab.
Eke batŋ ow el agŋ a cɛ eke b’erur ɔny a b’erurir, ke bla k’ɔŋ ekur Nyam ogŋ ec’ob ap ee? Wus labm eb ɛsɛl yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ -li bi kok.
Ek’ow el ɔny lisijimɛl cɛ b’ɛsŋnin, ke low ligbɛl kokr ab ee? Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl yɛji, ɛbɛn cɛ -li bi kok.
Éel sɔbɔ ɛsɛ elel ek’ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a yɛji el sɔbɔ ab af."
"Ɛ̀wr ɛrm, kì kokr Nyam e lís e low fɛŋ agŋ ec’any af any ij sosiɛm eci. Eke b’ow kokr ɛbɛn, k’ow ɛŋnmn ɔny Ɛs Nyam ek’anŋ afr ec’ob ap a.

Ow sosiɛm, eke am ɔŋ ɔgbɔru os, k’ɛ̀w fuw ɛm agŋ k’ɛ́kn’ŋ; Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu lele ɛbɛrŋ ɛm ab, ɛbɛn eke ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl bi kok ana. -Li bi kok ɛbɛn ek’agŋ k’usr ɛl sos. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny ek’ɛl ec’ob ap a -n’ɛŋn ŋ̂.
Kɔ ŋ ec’a, ek’am ap ɔgbɔru ob ŋ e lidr abu ab ɛm, ŋ e nɛmn abu a k’ɛ́kn,
yec’ɛtŋ ke ob ap a él es lɔl ɛm, ke asŋ Nyam eke b’ɛkn es lɔl ɛm e low a, b’ow ap’ŋ ob.

Ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, kì kokr ɛsɛ ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl af; -li b’erur eke -li k’inym es Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a lele ɛbɛrŋ saw saw ab -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ fɛŋ ɛ́kn ɛl. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny, ɛl ec’ob ap a, -n’ɛŋn ŋ̂.
Kɔ ŋ, eke am erur e ki ŋɔŋn Nyam, ɛ̀y ŋ ec’akŋ abl êl ke yogŋ, ŋɔ́ŋn asŋ Nyam es lɔl ɛm, ke Asŋ Nyam eke b’ɛkn es lɔl ɛm e low a, b’ow ɔŋ’ŋ ŋ ec’ob ap a.
Eke bi ŋɔŋan Nyam, odad ebl nyam coco a cɛ k’ánŋ ɔny nɛnym k’ibn ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ec’ab af; -li bi tutr eke odad a b’ɔfu ɛl nɛnym a ke Nyam b’ow iri ɛl e ŋɔŋn e lebl a.
K’èbr ɛl e lakr a, aŋke ɔny Ɛs Nyam, gbuŋ ke íbrmn in low a, li b’ikŋ anym l’uw low yec’a ek’am erurir ab any.
Ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, dàdr ɛsrɛ: Ɛy Ɛs ek’anŋ afr, ke ŋ e nin lala a ɔ́ny ɛlum;
ke ŋ ec’ es ɛw a ów; ke wɛl kók ŋ ec’erur wus aŋa ɛsɛ afr ec’ab af.
Ɔ̀ŋ ɛy yɛfɛnyna ec’ob ij a ek’it a.
Àp ɛy low ŋuŋ a eke si kok a, ɛsɛ elel eke si b’ap agŋ a eke kok ɛy low ŋuŋ ab af.
Kì yɛb ɛy si k’ɛy ɛbm owi ɛm, kɔ ɔ̀ny oc ɛy es low ŋuŋ ec’abu ɛm; [aŋke akpo akpo fɛŋ, es ɛw, abusu ɔny lele anygbɛl ab él ŋ eci. Amɛn.]
Tasi ɛm a, ek’ocr low ŋuŋ ek’agŋ kok ɔny a apr, ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a yɛji b’ow oc ap ɔny.
Kɔ eke ocmn low ŋuŋ ek’ɛgŋ kok ɔny a apmn, ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a yɛji, k’ow ocm ɔny e low ŋuŋ e kokr a apm ɔny.

Ɛtŋ kin, eke am ɛnŋn nɛny, k’ɛ̀wr sɔrŋ e sos ɛsɛ elel eke ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl bi kok ab af; -li b’ɛw any ek’agŋ fɛŋ k’uw any eke -n’am ɛnŋ nɛny. M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm ek’ɛl e labm sɔg a -n’ɛŋn ŋ̂.
Kɔ ŋ ec’a, ek’am ɛnŋ nɛny, yɔ̀g any, ɛ̀fŋ sin,
yec’ɛtŋ k’agŋ k’úwm any ek’anŋ nɛny ɛnŋ ɛm. Asŋ sɔny coco ek’ɛgŋ ɛknm a cɛ b’ow ɛkn, ɛtŋ in eke li b’ɛkn low yec’a ek’am kok es lɔl ɛm a, li b’ow li sɔg’ŋ ow e labm."
"K’àsr ɔny ec’ob ɔny luku wus af aŋa eke sisŋ lele adagra ab bi ŋuŋn, ke elu yɛji b’ok akŋ iy mil a.
Kɔ àsr ɔny ec’ob ɔny luku afr. Yogŋ, ke ow el sisŋ, ke ow el adagra, -li k’ɔtumn -ni ŋuŋnmn; ɛtŋ yogŋ, elu k’ɔtum okm akŋ iym mil.
Tasi ɛm a, yogŋ eke ŋ ec’ob ɔny a anŋ a, yogŋ cɛ ŋ ec’ɛrm a yɛji b’ow anŋ."
"Anyamn el sos megl e kɛniɛ. Eke anyamn akpl’ŋ a, ŋ e sos megl a fɛŋ anŋ usuayl ɛm;
kɔ eke anyamn akplm’ŋ a, ke ŋ e sos megl a fɛŋ yɛji anŋ ncebn ɛm ŋ̂. Eke batŋ usuayl ek’anŋ’ŋ ɛm a el ncebn, ke ncebn ligbɛl marɛm ow b’ow el a!"

"Aduigŋ kaka k’ɔtum kokm es ɛw ɛsɛl yony e juma; oglog li b’ow l’ifn krɛkrɛ ec’a, ke l’érur yony ɛm ec’a; oglog li b’ow l’ij nɛny nyam nyam e lís, ke li k’ɛ́wm nyam e low any. Ɔtumn eke ki kokr Nyam e juma ke kokr jɛtɛ yɛji e juma.
Ow amua fɛŋ sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny: k’èbar ob ek’ijr [mij ek’ɛgŋn] ɛsŋn sel, oglog ɔny ec’ob sos ɛw e low ɛrmij. Kɔ sel ɛŋn akplm akam ob ij ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ sos megl apklm akam ob sos ɛw ee?
Lɛ̀ɛr ɔr: -l’ewlmn egb, -l’ubmn egb, -l’asmn egb luku egbel ɛm, gbɛkɔ ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a bi gbagbl ɛl! Kɔ ilmn an akamn ɔr amua ee?
Ɔny ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke in ec’ɛrmij ebr ɛm k’obn in ec’owr anŋ e sɛgŋ a tɛl ee?
Ɛtŋ kɔ bla ɛtŋ ob sos ɛw e low b’okr ɔny ɛrmij ee? Lɛ̀ɛr ɔgm e suw ɔdɔdɔ ec’elel eke b’ɛlil: -li kokmn juma, -l’olmn gbad.
Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny eke Salomɔ ek’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a yɛji, ɔnym ob sos ɛw ek’akpl akm ɔgm suw ɔdɔdɔ amua ɛm e nyam.
Nyam b’ɛw ɔgm e suw ek’anŋ yɛfɛnyna, ke efi wɛl b’ow oc ɔwl alm a ob sos. Sakp abi ɔny yɛji li k’ow l’ɛwm ɔny ob sos ɛbɛn ee? Ɔmn ufum ɔny es gbɛ!
K’èbar ɛrmij ki dadr k’ɛsrɛ: 'Bla obi si b’ow s’ij ee? Bla mij iy si b’ow s’ɛgŋ ee? Bla obi si b’ow s’ɛw sos ee?'
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl anake sakp sakp fɛŋ b’ɔl ów amua fɛŋ es a. Kɔ, ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a uw any eke ɔnyn ow ec’es abur.
Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a eci low íkŋ anym okr ɔny ɛrmij, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke n’am ibrm a yɛji, ke ow e likpr a fɛŋ Nyam b’ow igŋ af ɔŋ ɔny.
Ca k’èbar efi e low ɛrmij, efi b’ow ism in e low ab. Lɛgŋ lɛgŋ e gbre a bi bɛbmn lɛgŋ ab ab."
"Kì jɛjr agŋ e lís ec’ów k’okr, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny yɛji, Nyam kí jɛjm ɔny e lís ec’ów okm;
aŋke Nyam b’ow jɛj ɔny e lís e low ok ɛsɛ elel eke bi jɛjr agŋ ɛjeci e lís e low okr ab af, ɛtŋ akunda yec’ɛm eke b’ocr ɛbmnin ob ɔŋn agŋ ɛjec’a, ow ɛm cɛ Nyam yɛji b’ow oc ɛbmn ɔŋ ɔny.
Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am lɛr suwli ek’anŋ esŋ jim e nyamn ɛm a, ɛtŋ ɛ́wm likŋ ikpr ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm a e low ɛrm ee?
Oglog ayaf likŋ ikpr ɔtu ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm ke dad esŋ jim ɛsɛ: 'Yɛ̀b’m m’ɔny suwli na m’óc’ŋ es nyamn ɛm ee?'
Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs, ìkŋ anym ɔny likŋ ikpr ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm a oc es, ke sica b’ow ɛkn es sɛnyn sɛnyn ɔny esŋ jim e suwli ek’anŋ nyamn ɛm a oc es.
K’òcr Nyam ec’ob k’ɔŋn mɔwr bake -l’ɛwl -li gugŋ ɔny; k’òcr an gbɛl e miyob k’okr es sigbroko ec’any af bake -l’uyu af."
"Ìbrmn ob eke erurir a, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny. Ɔ̀ɔl ob eke erurir a es, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɛŋn’n. Ìcmn lisany abu, Nyam b’ow fig ɔny.
Kɔ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ibrm ob eke l’erur a, Nyam b’ɔŋ’n; ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɔl ob eke l’erur a es a, Nyam b’ɔŋ n’ɛŋn; ɛtŋ Nyam bi fig ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’icm’n lisany abu a.
Kɔ ɔny ɛm aŋa, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ek’in ec’iy b’ibrm’n futufutu ke l’óc lebn n’ɔŋ ow ee?
Oglog ow b’ibrm’n ɔcn, ke l’óc lorŋn n’ɔŋ ow ee?
Ɔny nana ek’eel agŋ eŋuŋ a, b’uwr ob amamn any ɔŋn ɔny ec’ey; ɛtŋ Nyam ek’anŋ afr a anake k’ow uwm any ɔɔm agŋ ek’am ibrm’n ów amamn ab ee?
Low fɛŋ ek’am erurir eke agŋ ki kok ɔŋ ɔny a, ɔny yɛji, kòkr ɛbɛn kpɛŋ ɔŋn agŋ ɛjec’a. Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl a e low yɛgm ek’ɛy ɔkm ana."
"Èbar lisany likekli eci! Aŋke lisany gbada lele ejagb gbada ab b’irmn ɛgŋ, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ b’ɛcr yogŋ eci.
Kɔ lisany eke b’ɛwl ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a ɛw likekli afŋn es, ɛtŋ ejagb eke b’ɛwl ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a ɛw kɔli nɔnɔ. Agŋ tɛl cɛ b’ɛcr yogŋ eci."
"Ɔ̀sur sos kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu e lís, -li b’itŋn -l’ɛw mɛcɛb e sos -l’ow ɔny ɛm, kɔ ɛl obi ɛm a, botimbo.
B’ow uwr ɛl any ɛl e low kok ɛm. Kɔ kati ɛm wɛl b’ɔw kɔkɔbri, ɛtŋ kɔ librebr ɛm, wɛl b’ɔw babm ee?
Likŋ mamn, ey amamn li b’ɔsu, ɛtŋ likŋ ŋuŋ ey eŋuŋ li b’ɔsu.
Likŋ mamn k’ɔtum ɔsum ey eŋuŋ, ɛtŋ likŋ ŋuŋ k’ɔtum ɔsum ey amamn.
Likŋ fɛŋ ek’ɔ́sum ey amamn a, wɛl b’ow ubr’r es oc ɔwl’l alm.
Ɛbɛn eke b’ow uwr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu any ɛl ec’ów kok ɛm ana."
"Ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛsŋ’m: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ' a, k’ow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, kɔ agŋ a cɛ eke b’ow kok ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr e ec’erur a.
Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow dad’m ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ ow elm ŋ e nin ɛm s’elm kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, ŋ e nin ɛm s’ogŋm abŋ eŋuŋ, ŋ e nin ɛm si kokm sakrowa nɔnɔ ee?'
Ɛtŋ m’ow mi dad ɛl any af m’ɛsɛ: 'Ìmn yogŋ a, ɔny ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl, lɛgŋ kaka m’uwm ɔny any!'
Na sosiɛm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’iri sodad amua eke mi dad, ke kok ɛsɛ elel eke l’irir ab af a, n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛwru nyam eke us in ec’êl lob af af.
Mij an ok wus, mij ewl mij fɛŋ iy igŋ êl a, lɛf ɛlul êl a lɛc ɛm, kɔ l’ɛym aŋke wɛl us’r lob af.
Kɔ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’iri sodad amua eke mi dad, ke kokm ɛsɛ elel eke l’irir ab af a, n’anŋ ɛsɛ nyamb ɛgŋ nyam ek’us in ec’êl a mrici af af.
Mij an ok wus, mij ewl mij fɛŋ iy igŋ êl a, lɛf ɛlul êl a ɛtŋ ow ɛy wus kikn es nimum."
Eke Jesu dad ów ɔm e sodad amua bake ow uwr a, agŋ a ek’am iri in e low yɛgm a, low am iti any in ec’elel eke n’am yɛgmn agŋ low a sosiɛm,
aŋke n’anm ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab af, kɔ n’am yɛgm wɛl low abusu ɔny ɛm.
Jesu anŋ lafɛny ab af us es, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam.
Kpɛkŋ kokobe ɛs nyam ow titm’n, ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke ŋ erur, ɔtu eke k’ ayal’m."
Jesu ɛgŋm abu es itŋn in ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "M’erur, àyl!" Kpɛkŋ kokobe a oc’r es lís ɛtŋ l’ayl.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìri sɛnyn sɛnyn: kì dad low na k’ok ɛgŋ kaka. Gbɛkɔ ìm yɛgm egb waw ɛs a sos, ke wáw egb a ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ol a ibrm ab af ɛsɛ daŋku ij af."
Wanci ab af eke Jesu am ɛy Kapɛrnayum a, Rom e srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen eci anym ɛs nyam ow titm’n ɛtŋ am ŋɔŋn’n
dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛm e juma kok ɛs a bubm es ɛru es akŋ, n’am ij gbre nɔnɔ."
Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "M’ím m’ewlm’n ee?"
Gbɛkɔ anym ɛs a dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’itm eke k’ɛy ɛm e gbugŋ a. Kɔ dàd odad ebl nyam cɛ ke kpɛkŋ ɛm e juma kok ɛs a éwl.

Ɛm obi yɛji, m’anŋ abusu ɛsɛl ekpekp ec’ew, ɛtŋ m’ɔny srɔda eyŋ eke m’ɛw es. Eke mi bi dad nyam m’ɛsɛ: 'Ìm!', kpɛkŋ li b’im; ɛtŋ eke mi bi dad ɛjeci nyam m’ɛsɛ: 'Òw!', kpɛkŋ li b’ow; ɛtŋ eke mi bi dad ɛm ec’aduigŋ a m’ɛsɛ: 'Kòk low na!', kpɛkŋ li bi kok."
Eke Jesu iri sodad amua a, l’erur anym ɛs a e low ɛtŋ n’am dad agŋ a ek’am us’r jam a l’ɛsɛ: "M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm, m’ɛŋnm ɔmn ɛs nɛnɛ kaka Israɛl eyŋ ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow anŋ yogŋ eke ligbn b’anŋ igb lele yogŋ eke ligbn b’ɛru es ab ow Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a, -l’ok es Abraham, Isak, lele Jakɔb ab ob ij usu a.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’it eke blel ɛŋn Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, wɛl b’ow ogŋ ok ɛl gbeŋ ncebn ab ɛm, yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad anym ɛs a ninɛ: "Ìm gbugŋ, yec’a ek’ŋ ec’ɔmn a am erur a, b’ow ɛŋn." Ɛtŋ anym ɛs a e juma kok ɛs a ewl wanci ab af cɛ.
Ca Jesu im Piɛr ec’akŋ a, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn Piɛr ɛy lis eke sos am ɛtu es ɛru es.
Jesu itŋn yɔw a ec’abu a abu ɛtŋ lɛfr ɔl a oc’r es lís; l’igb ɛtŋ n’am kok Jesu e lís e low.
Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, wɛl ot agŋ nɔnɔ eke abŋ eŋuŋ am ijr gbre a is Jesu. In ec’odad ebl ɛm cɛ l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a ɛtŋ l’ewlm ɔ́lu a fɛŋ.
Li kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi ec’odad na eke dad a íy nɛny: L’eb ɛy e sos dudu a ɛtŋ l’okm ɛy sel es ɛy ec’ɔl ɛm.
Eke Jesu b’ɛkn bieku a eke did ɛlul il ɛm a, l’ibrm eke in e jam ɛsɛl a k’ubr mij lekpl a e jam in ab.
Ol e low yɛgm ɛs nyam ɛri ow ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ow m’us’ŋ jam usu fɛŋ eke b’ow im a."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛkrɛ ɔny ɛl ec’ɔmu wus ɛm eke b’ɛru ɛm, ɔr yɛji ɔny ɛl e mel; kɔ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔnym usu nuŋ nyam ek’ɔtu ek’ɛru es eb sel."
Ɛgŋ ɛjeci, in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ŋ’m abusu m’ím m’oc ɛm ɛs es gbuŋ ke m’ów."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam ke yɛ́b agŋ a ek’uw abŋ ɛm a, ót ɛl ec’agŋ a ek’uw ab es."
Sica Jesu ɛy mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm ɛtŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a igŋ’n ab im.
Kpru ɛm, lidgbegb ligbɛl am ɛlu mij lekpl ab af, toŋ batŋ mra am ɔl eke k’ubur mijɛtŋ ab es; kɔ Jesu gbɛ, n’am ɛru mɛmn.
Jam ɛsɛl a ɛri ow titm’n ɛtŋ am uwr’r dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, èb ɛy, kɔ s’am uw!"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ erŋn am ɔny ɔny ee? Ɔmn ufum ɔny es tasi!" L’igb, ɛtŋ lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm, li dad lidgbegb a lele mra ab ab eke k’irm es, ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ irm es tiŋ.
Agŋ a fɛŋ low iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ ikŋ na eke lidgbegb lele mra ab b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ab ee?"
Eke Jesu ubr mij lekpl a e jam, Gadareni eyŋ eci wus ab af a, agŋ yony anŋ suwɔmu ec’araŋn ok ɔkm ɛtŋ am ow ɔbr’r. Abŋ eŋuŋ anŋ agŋ amua ɛm, ɛtŋ -li b’ɔr abr nɔnɔ. Ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɔ́tum ɛcrm ebr ab af eci.
Kpɛkŋ abŋ eŋuŋ ɛsɛl a am ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Nyam ec’Iy, kɔ bla lowi anŋ ɛy araŋn ee? Kɔ ɛy e gbre ijr ec’ow gbuŋ ke lɛgŋ a ów ee?"
Akpoj ɛm a, gbroko nɔnɔ anŋ ek’am ɔl ɛl ec’ob ij es ɛc.
Abŋ eŋuŋ a am ŋɔŋn Jesu ɛsɛ: "Ek’erur eke k’ogŋ ɛy a, ógŋ ɛy s’ok sigbroko amua ɛm."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn." -L’ok ɔkm wɛl ɛm -n’im -l’ir sigbroko ab ɛm. Kpɛkŋ gbroko a fɛŋ anŋ lafɛny ab af uru es ok mij lekpl ab ɛm uw.
Sigbroko ɔsu ɛsɛl a uru es im baŋn ɔb low a ek’ɛy a ec’amani; -li dad abŋ eŋuŋ ɛsɛl yony a yɛji ec’odad.
Ow sosiɛm, baŋn a ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ok ɔkm im am ɛkn Jesu; eke -l’ɛkan ow a, -ni ŋɔŋn ow ek’ow k’ŋgboŋ ɛl eci wus ab af.
Jesu ɛy mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛwl ubr mij lekpl a im baŋn.
Agŋ oc sos es wɛw ɛs nyam ek’anŋ faja ɛm is’r. Eke Jesu b’ɛkn agŋ a ec’ɔmn a, li dad sos es wɛw ɛs a ninɛ: "Ɛm jim, ɛrmij k’ók’ŋ! M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ!"
Ow sosiɛm, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb am dad ɛl obi ɛm ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na am ocr in sosi Nyam! N’am ɔbr Nyam any!"
Eke Jesu uw ɛl e tutr ab any a, li dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɔnyn sow tutr eŋuŋ amua ee?
Kɔ bogŋ ec’anake ɛw fuɛfuɛ eke wɛl ki dad sos es wɛw ɛs ab ee? 'M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ,' oglog wɛl dád’r ɛsɛ: 'Ìgb ke án es ee'?
Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke k’uwr low na any: wus af aŋa, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔny abusu eke k’oc sikpl ap." Ɛtŋ sica li dad sos es wɛw ɛs a ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc ŋ e eci faja a eb ejagb im gbugŋ!"
Ɛtŋ sos es wɛw ɛs a igb aam gbugŋ.
Eke bieku a b’ɛkn low na a, ow am ɔny ɛl erŋn ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Nyam, abusu ikŋ na eke n’ɔŋ agŋ a sosiɛm.
Eke Jesu igb yogŋ aam a, in ec’ɛc ɛm a, l’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Matie eke sig es wus labm eb usu. Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam." Ɛtŋ l’igb l’us ow jam.
Sica eke Jesu am ij ob Matie ec’akŋ a, wus labm eb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ lele sikpl ɛsɛl ɛjec’ab ow ɛŋn Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ɛtŋ -l’okr af -n’am ij ob.
Farisiɛl ɛkn low na ɛtŋ am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ɔny eci low yɛgm ɛs a am ij ob agŋ amua ab ee?"
Jesu iri ɛl lebl ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ a eke anŋ sos tuɔtuɔ ɛm a, ibram sos kok ɛs, kɔ ɔ́lu a anake ibrm sos kok ɛs a.
Ìmn ke wéwar Nyam e sodad amua eke dad a: Mi b’erur ɛrm mamn owi m’akm ndey ɛm e segb waw. Tasi ɛm a, m’owm eke mi k’ɛsŋ agŋ eke b’ubr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl a, kɔ m’ow eke mi k’ɛsŋ sikpl ɛsɛl."
Ow e jam a, Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs eci jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ sakp nɔnɔ ɛy lele Farisiɛl ab si b’ ɛnŋ nɛny ɛtŋ ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a ɛ́nŋm ee?"

Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Am tutar ek’agŋ lawlɛl eke wɛl ɛsŋ mɛbi ec’es gbɛgbl ɛm a ɔtu eke k’anŋ sos es ɔw ɛm eke yɔw ɛ́c a anŋ ɛl ab ee? Njaŋ! Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ am ow eke wɛl b’ow ɔny yɔw ɛ́c a oc es ɛl ec’araŋn, ke sica -n’ɛnŋ nɛny gɔŋ.
Ɛgŋ ócm gbad owr lele gbad sig ab ɔbarm gigŋm; aŋke gbad owr a b’ɔny gbad sig a agbr ɛm, ɛtŋ gbad a ec’ɛm agbr a b’ow agb nɔnɔ.

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ócm mar owr okm marel sig ɛm; eke kok ɛbɛn a, mar owr a b’ow ɔny marel sig a ɔb es; mar a b’ow ok es ɛtŋ marel a b’ow uŋ. Tasi ɛm a, mar owr, marel owr ɛm wɛl b’ok’r ɛtŋ mar a lele marel ab ab b’anŋ."
Eke Jesu am dad ɛl sodad amua a, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam ow. L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm jɔw uw wanci na af cɛ; gbɛkɔ òw itŋn in abu, li b’ow l’igb."
Jesu lele in eci jam ɛsɛl ab ab igb us’r jam.
Kpɛkŋ kin yɔw nyam eke b’ub abu ke mebl a ɛ́dŋm es toŋ ow ij akpo lɛw yony. L’ɛcr jam jam eci l’ow li titm Jesu ɛtŋ l’itŋn ow e mob sus ɛm a ec’ɛnyɛmbri a abu,
aŋke n’am dadr in sosi l’ɛsɛ: "Blel mi k’itŋn in e mob sus ɛm a abu cɛ, ke m’ewl ŋ̂."
Jesu ɛwl mɛny lɛr’r ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm jɔw, ɛrmij k’òk’ŋ, ŋ ec’ɔmn a ewlm’ŋ!" Ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ yɔw a ewl.
Sica Jesu im es ɛw ɛs a ec’akŋ a. Eke li b’ok yogŋ a, l’ɛkn kete afl ɛsɛl eke bɛbm sos ɛgŋ es oc eci lele dedeku a ek’am ɔg ab ab,
ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Òkr ɔkm aŋa, dedyɔwli a, l’uwm, kɔ mɛmn n’am ɛru." Dedeku a am kokr Jesu miyɛr.
Eke wɛl ogŋ agŋ a ok gbeŋ a, Jesu ɛy ojli ɛm a, n’ɔny dedyɔwli a abu ɛtŋ ow igb.
Amani a eb es wus ab af nimum.
Sica eke Jesu igb yogŋ aam a, ány eflu yony am us’r jam. -N’am ɔgr ow -l’ɛsɛ: "David e lilaw, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
Eke Jesu im ɛy gbugŋ a, ány eflu a im titm’n ɛtŋ n’am ibrm wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɔnyn ɔmn eke m’ɔtu eke mi k’ewlm ɔny ee?" -Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔtu eke k’ewlm ɛy."
Ɛtŋ Jesu itŋn ɛl anyamn abu ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Nyam ɔ́ŋ ɔny low a ek’am ekur ɔmn ɛm a!"
Ɛtŋ -n’am ɛkn es. Jesu dad ɛl lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Kì kokr ɛgŋ kaka k’úw any."
Gbɛkɔ ány eflu a im, ɛtŋ wus a nimum af -n’am dad Jesu ec’odad.
Eke ány eflu a b’im a, kpɛkŋ wɛl oc ɛbrm nyam ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ anŋ ɛm is Jesu.
Sica eke Jesu ogŋ abŋ ikŋ na a, ɛbrm a am dad odad. Bieku a low iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Israɛl wus af aŋa, s’ɛknm low nɛnɛ lɛgŋ kaka."
Gbɛkɔ Farisiɛl a gbɛ am dad ɛsɛ: " Abŋ eŋuŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a anake b’ɔŋ’n abusu l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ amua a."

Jesu am ɛc baŋn ɛgbɛl ɛm lele baŋn ekekey ɛm ab. N’am yɛgm agŋ low ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, n’am ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba ɛtŋ n’am ewlm ɔ́lu a ɛl ec’ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛl e dudu fɛŋ ab.
Agŋ dedeku a eke n’am ɛkn a e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ afŋn in es, aŋke agŋ amua sos kikn es, sos ɔw es ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ek’ɔnym ɔsu ɛs af.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Egb ub a ufu es nɔnɔ, kɔ juma kok ɛsɛl ɛnym.
Ìbrmn egb ɔgm ɛs a ke l’ɛ́rm juma kok ɛsɛl nɔnɔ im in ec’egb ub ab ɛm."
Jesu ɛsŋ in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu eke wɛl k’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ, ewlm ɔ́lu lele ɛl eci ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛl eci dudu fɛŋ ab.
Kin ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ec’en: krɛkrɛ ɛm a, Simɔ eke wɛl igŋ nin af Piɛr, lele lisijim Andre ab; Jak lele lisijim Jan ab, agŋ a yony mum Sebede ec’ey;
Filip, Bartelemi, Toma lele Matie ek’el wus labm eb ɛs; Tade lele Alfe jim Jak ab;
Simɔ ɛb dogŋn ɛs lele Judas Iskariɔt ek’ɔl Jesu ij ab ab.
Sica Jesu ɛrm agŋ lɛw yony amua ɛtŋ am ijl ɛl nɛny dad ɛsɛ: "K’ìmn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci wus af, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny k’ɛ̀yr Samari eci baŋn fɛŋ ɛm yɛji.
Kɔ ìmn Israɛl ec’agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ek’irm af ogŋ.
Ejagb us ɛm a, ɔ̀br Amani a dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Afr eci es ɛw a ow titm!'
Èwlmn ɔ́lu, ìgbmn agŋ luw ɛm, èwlmn kokobe ɛsɛl ayl, ògŋn abŋ eŋuŋ. Ɔfr ɛm ɛŋan, ɛl yɛji ɔ̀ŋn ɛl ɔfr ɛm.
K’òcr sika, os, deŋ kaka fɛŋ k’ánŋ ɔny ekpr ɛm.
K’òcr usu im ec’ekpr, k’òcr kotu yony, cɔkrukpɔ lele kpama ab. Tasi ɛm a, ob kok ɛs it ob ij ɔŋ.
Eke okr ɛb nyam ɛm, ìbrmn ɛŋan ɛgŋ ek’erur eke k’eb ɔny a, ke ánŋn ɛgŋ ikŋ na ogŋ toŋ ke ókr ɔkm yogŋ.
Eke b’okr akŋ nyam, ɛ̀sŋnin ɛl ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛrm es ɛy ánŋ ɔny ab.'
Eke akŋ a ec’agŋ a eb ɔny a, ɔny ec’ɛrm es ɛy a b’ow anŋ ɛl ab; kɔ eke -l’ebm ɔny a, ke ɔny ec’ɛrm es ɛy a ɛ́wl ow ɔny ab.
Ek’akŋ nyam oglog ɛb nyam ɛm wɛl ɛgŋm ebm ɔny oglog irim ɔny ec’odad a, òkr ɔkm yogŋ ke cícr ɔny ec’akr sɛc a okr ɛl es.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Sodɔm lele Gomɔr ab e low ŋuŋ e wɛl ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ tɛl akm ɛb na ec’agŋ ec’a."
"Kin m’am m’ɛrm ɔny ɛsɛ mɛcɛb af sibotimbo ec’araŋn. Ɛ̀war ɛsɛ morŋn af, ke ánŋn frɔrɔ ɛsɛ kel af.
Ɔ̀sur sos kɔ agŋ b’ow ot im ɔny jɛj ok ec’any af ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɔr ɔny say ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu.
Ɛm sosiɛm, wɛl b’ow ot im ɔny es ɛw ɛsɛl lele ɛ́b ebu ab ec’any af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl lele Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ab ec’any af íjr daŋku.
Lɛgŋ eke wɛl b’ow ot im ɔny jɛj ok ec’any af a, odad yec’a eke ki dadr a, lele elel eke ki dadr ab ab ec’ɛrmij k’ók ɔny; wanci ab af cɛ Nyam b’ow dad ɔny sodad a eke ki dadr a.
Sodad a k’ow anm ɔny ɛm owm, kɔ ɔny Ɛs Nyam ec’Abŋ a b’ow dad odad ɔŋ ɔny.
Agŋ lisijimɛl b’ow ot ɛl lisijimɛl lokm ow ibi eci; ey ɛsɛl yɛji b’ow kok ɛbɛn ɛl ec’ey e lís, ey yɛji b’ow ɔbr ɛl ɛsɛl any, ɔŋ wɛl ibi ɛl.
Ɛm sosiɛm agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow ifn ɔny; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow inym es kikri toŋ ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn sel.
Eke wɛl am ijr ɔny gbre ɛb nyam ɛm a, òkr ɔkm imn ɛb ɛjec’ɛm. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: k’ow ɛcmn Israɛl ec’ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm uwrm ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow.
Low wewr ɛs kaka ágbm akam in e low yɛgm ɛs; ɛtŋ juma kok ɛs kaka ágbm akam in ec’es ɛw.
Ow it eke low wewr ɛs k’anŋ ɛsɛ in e low yɛgm ɛs ab af, ke juma kok ɛs yɛji ánŋ ɛsɛ in ec’es ɛw ɛs ab af. Eke wɛl ɛsŋ akŋ ɛs a Bɛlsebul, ke sakp abi wɛl k’ow wɛwrm akŋ a ec’agŋ ab ee?
Ow sosiɛm k’ùrur agŋ amua. Kɔ low fɛŋ eke lɔl es a b’ow ɛy ɔkm; ɛtŋ low fɛŋ ek’el asre ɛm ec’a, wɛl b’ow uw any.
Low yec’eke mi dad ɔny saw ɛm a, dàdr agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af; ke ow eke irir asre ut ɛm a, úyur êl luw af ɛlul lebl agŋ iri.
K’ùrur agŋ a eke b’ibi sos megl ke ɔ́tum ibim ɛgŋ e liy a; kɔ ùrur Nyam ek’ɔny abusu ek’ibi sos megl lele liy ab gbre ij usu a.
Kɔ wɛl ɔ́lm yay yony ijm lɛl nyam ee? Ɛbɛn yɛji, yony ab ɛm e nyam ɛ́ym wus ek’ow elm Nyam ec’erur.
Ɔny ec’a, ɔny e sin nuŋ bɔbɔ yɛji Nyam awl uw any.
K’ùrur erŋn: ɔny, iil an nɔnɔ akmn siyay nɔnɔ!"
"Eke ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af ek’in el ɛm eci, ɛm yɛji, ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr ec’any af, m’ow mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'L’el ɛm eci.'
Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af ek’in uwm im any, ɛbɛn ɛm yɛji, ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr ec’any af a m’ow mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm’n any.' "
"K’ɔ̀nyn ɔmn eke m’is ɛrm es ɛy wus af aŋa. M’owm eke mi k’is ɛrm es ɛy, kɔ ar owi.
Tasi ɛm a, m’ow eke mi k’ɔbar ɛgŋ lele ɛs ab nuŋ, yɔwli lele lis ab, yɔw eke wɛl ɛbi ow lele ɛc lis ab.
Ifanin b’ow anŋ akŋ nyam coco ec’agŋ ec’araŋn.
Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur ɛs oglog lis akm’m a, itm eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs; ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur jim oglog jɔw akm’m a, in yɛji itm eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs.
Ɛgŋ ek’abum in obi ec’olikŋ usm im jam a, itm eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɔsu in e sel a, li b’ow l’irmn; kɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow irmn in e sel a ɛm sosiɛm a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn."
"Ɛgŋ ek’eb ɔny a, eb’m; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’eb’m a, eb Nyam ek’ɛrm’m a.

Ɛgŋ ek’eb kokoba ɔb ɛs, Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs ek’ow el a sosiɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn ob ap ek’el Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’eb low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs ek’ɛgŋ na el Nyam ec’any af a sosiɛm a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn ob ap a ek’el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl ec’a.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow aw mij dra kpɔk nyam cɛ ɔŋ ɛm e jam ɛsɛl ey amua ɛm e nyam, ɛm e jam us ɛs eke iy a el a sosiɛm a, ɛgŋ ikŋ na b’ow ɛŋn in ec’ob ap."
Eke sica Jesu dad ów ɔm e sodad amua ok in jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a bake ow uwr a, l’igb yogŋ, n’im eke li ki yɛgm agŋ low ke li dád Nyam ec’odad wus ab af e sɛb ab ɛm.
Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ek’anŋ sobel ɛm a, iri wɛl dad Krist ec’ów eke am kok. L’ɛrm in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm e bɛb Jesu ogŋ
eke -li k’ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, Mesi a eke in k’ow ab ana, oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci ɛl k’eku ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn dadr Jan low yec’a ek’am irir ke am ɛkan a:
ány eflu am ɛkn es, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl am an es, kokobe ɛsɛl yɛji am ewl, ɔru ablu yɛji am iri ów, agŋ ek’uw a yɛji am igb ɛtŋ wɛl am ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba ok ɔgbɔru.
Ehe él ɛgŋ a eke k’ow irmnm in ec’ɔmn eke n’ɔny ɛm ɛm a eci."
Kpɛkŋ eke Jan eci jam ɛsɛl a im a, Jesu oc Jan e lís e low am ibrm dedeku a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ loj yogŋ bla imn eke k’ɛkan ee? Kɔ ɛgŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ anany eke lɛf am ɔny mumu af ee? Njaŋ!
Ca eke ow elm ɛbɛn a, ke bla im ɛkan ee? Ɛgŋ eke sus mob sɛnyn ee? Njaŋ, agŋ eke bi sus mob sɛnyn sɛnyn a, ɛ́b ebu e gbugŋ -li b’anŋ.
Ɛtŋ ca bla tasi im ɛkan ee? Kɔ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ee? Ɛɛ, m’am dad ɔny ek’ɛgŋ a ek’ɛkan a agb akm kokoba ɔb ɛs;
aŋke Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad Jan e lís e low ninɛ: Kin, m’am ɔŋ ɛm ec’ɛrm ɛs ikŋ’ŋ anym kók ŋ ec’ejagb a.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ a eke wɛl ew ab ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka anm agbm akam Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs; gbɛkɔ Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ a ek’anŋ a e likekli a agb akm Jan.
Lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke Jan am ɔb Amani a toŋ ke k’it yɛfɛnyna a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a e low am ɛy lɛc, ɛtŋ ów gaŋgaŋ ɛsɛl a am ɔl ek’oc lɛc ɛm.
Toŋ k’igŋ Jan e lɛgŋ ɛm a, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ lele Mois ec’ ol ab ab ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a ec’amani.
Ɛtŋ ek’erurir ek’ubr’m nawrɛ, ke Jan anake el Eli a eke k’ɛwl ow a.
Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, k’írir sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ m’ɔtu eke mi k’oc mi bɛbmn yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ab ab ee? -L’ot etuey ek’anŋ an ɔl usu es, ke bɛb am dad ɛjeci lebl gege ɛm ɛsɛ:
'S’afl kete ɛj ub eci s’ok ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn eke k’ubr ɛj! S’ɛgŋ sɔrŋ ɛj s’ok ɔny ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn okmn sabu ɛrmni ikŋmn ɔŋn!'
Kin, Jan ek’ow a, li b’ɛnŋ nɛny, l’ɛ́gŋm mar, ɛtŋ agŋ bi dad ek’ow’n ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ.

Sica ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ek’ow a, li b’ij ob, li b’ɛgŋ mar, ɛtŋ agŋ bi dad ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na in el ob iju, mar ɛgŋu, wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab e lawl. Gbɛkɔ Nyam eci sɛwr a b’ulm es in ec’ów a ec’ɔkm ok ɛm."
Ɛmɛny Jesu am ɛnym sɛb a eke wɛl ɛm li kok in e sakrowa ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ a abr, aŋke ɛb eyŋ a itŋnm ɛrm ɛm. Li dad ninɛ:

"Korasin ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Bɛtsayida ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke sakrowa a eke wɛl kok ɔny ogŋ a, blel ow el Tir lele Sidɔn ab wɛl kok ana, ke blel -l’ɛw sɔrŋ e sos, -li kpakp milakŋ, -l’ok fandi, ɛrm ɛm itŋn eci.
Na sosiɛm m’am dad ɔny jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Tir lele Sidɔn ab e low ŋuŋ eke Nyam ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ akm ɔny ec’a.
Ɛtŋ ŋ Kapɛrnayum, am tutr eke any ij ɛm b’ow agb toŋ bake ím titm afr ee? Njaŋ, b’ow is es toŋ bake igŋ ɔŋnes baŋn; aŋke sakrowa a eke wɛl kok ŋ ogŋ a, blel Sodɔm ana, ke ɛb ikŋ na ánŋ yɛfɛnyna yɛji.
Na sosiɛm m’am dad’ŋ, jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Sodɔm e low ŋuŋ eke wɛl ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ tɛl akm ŋ ec’a."
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, ŋ ek’el afr lele wus ab ec’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a, m’am ɛlu’ŋ bia, ów a ek’ot lɔl es, ɛsɛwru lele nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ab ec’any af, ke yɛgm etuey uw any a eci.
Ɛɛ! Ɛm Ɛs erur eke ow k’el ɛbɛn.
Ɛm Ɛs ocr in sosi nimum ɛlul’m abu ɛm. Ɛgŋ kaka uwm Iy ab any eke ow elm Ɛs sɔny coco cɛ, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka uwm Ɛs any eke ow elm Iy a sɔny coco lele agŋ a eke Iy a erur eke k’ɛlu ɔkm yɛgm ab ab.
Ɔny fɛŋ ek’ɛrɛkp am leg leg ɔny a òwr ɛm ogŋ, m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
Ɛ̀gŋn ɛm e low ɛbr, ke yɛ́br mi yɛgm ɔny low aŋke m’el ɛrm frɔrɔ, ɛrm nini ɛs; ow ɛm b’ow ɛŋan ɔny obi ec’ɛrm es ɛy.
Ɛm e low a eke m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny a ec’ɔsu a, ɛw fuɛfuɛ, ɛtŋ ɛrɛkp eke m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny a ɛwm leg leg."
Eke sɛgŋ bɛb ɛc a, nɛnɛgŋ nyam, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab am ɛcr segb ɔgm eci. Jam ɛsɛl a namn am ɔny ɛtŋ am bubm egbey a ij.
Eke Farisiɛl b’ɛkn a, -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ìs any ɛkn, ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a am kok low eke ɛy ec’ol a ɔɔm abusu eke wɛl ki kok nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ!"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Awlmn low a eke ɛb ebu David in obi in obi lele in ec’agŋ ab ab kok lɛgŋ nyam eke namn am ɔny ɛl ab ee?
L’ɛy Nyamel ɛm, ɛtŋ in ec’agŋ ab ab -l’ij egb waw e futufutu a; ke -n’ɔnym ow ec’ij ec’abusu kaka. Ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke egb waw ɛsɛl sɔny coco k’ij.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny awlmn Mois ec’ ol ab ɛm eke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ, egb waw ɛsɛl ek’ɔny juma Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a, ɔ́sum nɛnɛgŋ ec’ol a, ke ow élm ɛl ec’ów ɔbr ab ee?
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny ek’aŋa low nyam anŋ ek’ɔny any akm Nyamel gbɛl a!
Blel uwr Nyam Lɛl a e sodad amua ek’am dad ɛsɛ: mi b’erur ɛrm mamn owi m’akm ndey ɛm e segb waw e nyandrɛ any tasi ana, ke agŋ amua ek’ɛknm low a, blel ɔbmn ɛl low.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy anake el nɛnɛgŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a."
Eke Jesu ŋgboŋ yogŋ im ɛy ɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a,
ɛgŋ nyam ek’abu wɛw es anŋ yogŋ. Agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a erur eke k’ok Jesu ów af; ow sosiɛm -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ewlm ɛgŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny licɛb nyam coco ɛtŋ licɛb a ɛy nɔmu croŋ ɛm nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, li k’ow n’iim n’ɔnym l’ocm ow es ee?
Ɛgŋ il an akm licɛb! Ow sosiɛm ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl ki kok low mamn ɔŋ ɛgŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ."
Jesu dad ɛgŋ a ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋm abu es." L’ɛgŋm abu a es ɛtŋ ow ɛwl akpl ɛsɛ yec’ab af.
Ow ɔŋ Farisiɛl a ok ɔkm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, -n’im -n’am as luku -l’ɔl elel eke -li k’ɔnyn Jesu bake -l’ibi ow.
Eke Jesu iri in e luw ec’amani a, n’ŋgboŋ yogŋ ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam. N’am ewlm ɔ́lu a fɛŋ,
ɛtŋ n’am ijl wɛl nɛny l’ɛwar eke wɛl k’ulam’n es.
Li kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi eci sodad amua eke dad a íy nɛny:
Nyam dad ninɛ: "Kin ɛm e libɔwi eke mi sɔsum m’oc ke m’ɔny in ec’erur ɛtŋ m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn m’ɛlu’l ɛm. M’ow m’ɛlu’l ɛm ec’Abŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ɛwar ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ɛm e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a.
Li k’ow l’atarm ów es ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab ɛtŋ li k’ow l’ɛlum lebl, wɛl k’ow irim’n lebl ɛbɛrŋ ɛm.
Anany ek’ibn es a, li k’ow n’ɔnym l’ubm es. Kɛniɛ ek’in ec’al a am irm es a, li k’ow n’ɔnym l’irmnm es. Li b’ow li kok ɛbɛn toŋ ke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam éb es usu a fɛŋ;
Ɛtŋ wus na e ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ b’ow oc ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɛlu’l ɛm."
Sica ɛmɛny wɛl oc any eflu nyam eke el ɛbrm yɛji, abŋ eŋuŋ ek’anŋ’n ɛm a sosiɛm is Jesu. Jesu ewlm ɛgŋ a; ow ɔŋ n’am dad ów ɛtŋ n’am ɛkn es yɛji.
Agŋ a fɛŋ low iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ sɔŋ Jesu na David eci lilaw li k’el ee?"
Eke Farisiɛl iri odad na a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ aŋke ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs Bɛlsebul anake am ɔŋ’n abusu a."
Jesu uw ɛl e sow tutr ab any ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Es ɛw fɛŋ eke in ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm a b’uŋ. Ɛb fɛŋ, oglog akŋ fɛŋ ek’in ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm a, b’uŋ.
Eke sica Satan am ogŋ abŋ ek’el Satan eci, ke in sosi n’am ogŋn ar a; kɔ in ec’es ɛw a ɔtu eke k’anŋ ee?
Am ubr eke m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ Bɛlsebul ec’abusu ɛm; ɛtŋ ɔny agŋiyɛl ec’a eke b’ogŋ a, kɔ bwo b’ɔŋ ɛl abusu ee? Ɛl obi ɛl obi -n’am yɛgm eke ɔnymn low ij!
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ec’Abŋ ɛm anake m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a; ow am yɛgm eke Nyam ec’ es ɛw a ow ɔny ec’araŋn ŋ̂.
Eke wɛl erur eke k’im ɛy lɛc ɛs nyam ec’akŋ iy’r mil a, ow it ke wɛl íkŋ anym ɔny awŋ’n gbuŋ ke wɛl ɔ́tu ɛy in ec’akŋ ot in eci mob a fɛŋ.
Ɛgŋ ek’anm ɛm ab a, el ɛm ec’ifnu, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke ɛ́luam im abu s’asm Nyam ec’ey luku a, am ɔmun ɛl es.
Na sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny: wɛl ɔtu eke k’oc agŋ e sikpl owi lele wɛwr owi eke dad ab ab a ap ɛl; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok Abŋ Lala af a, Nyam k’ow ocm apm’n.
Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok ɛgŋ ec’ Iy af a, Nyam b’ow oc ap’r; kɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok Abŋ Lala af a, ke ow él yɛfɛnyna, ke ow él efi, Nyam k’ow ocm apm’n."
"Kòkr likŋ akpl, in ec’ey a yɛji b’ow akpl; kòkr likŋ él likŋ ŋuŋ, in ec’ey a yɛji k’ow akplm, aŋke wɛl b’uw likŋ fɛŋ any in ec’ey ɔsu ab ɛm.
Ɔny morŋn, ayaf ɔtur eke ki dadr ów amamn, ɔny ek’eel agŋ eŋuŋ ab ee? Low yec’a ek’iy ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ a anake nɛny bi dad ɛlu ɔkm a.
Ɛgŋ mamn, in ɛm ec’ów amamn eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ŋuŋ, in ɛm ec’ów eŋuŋ eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a.
M’am dad ɔny eke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, sodad eke agŋ dad ɛsɛ odad ɔfr ɔfr af a, -li b’ow -l’awl;
aŋke ŋ ec’odad ebl ɛm wɛl b’ow jɛj ŋ e low ok ɛgŋ’ŋ low oglog ɔb’ŋ low."
Ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb lele Farisiɛl bɛb ab am dad Jesu ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, s’am erur eke k’ɛlu mɛny ɛwr nyam ɔkm yɛgm ɛy."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ amua ek’ijm nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af a, am ibrm mɛny ɛwr, kɔ wɛl k’ow kokm mɛny ɛwr kaka ɔɔm ɛl ek’ow elm kokoba ɔb ɛs Jonas ec’a cɛ.
Tasi ɛm a ɛsɛ elel eke Jonas anŋ ɔcn gbɛl a lokm ij sɛgŋ nyahan ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab a, ɛbɛn nyam coco ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji b’ow anŋ wus ɛm ij sɛgŋ nyahan ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab.
Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Ninif eyŋ b’ow igb yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke ɛl, eke -l’irir Jonas eci Nyam odad a, -l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm. Ɛtŋ kin ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Jonas!

Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Seba ec’es ɛw lis a b’ow igb inym es yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke n’anŋ usu kpekpe l’ow yec’ɛtŋ ke l’íri eke li k’iri Salomɔ eci sɛwr e sodad a. Ɛtŋ kin, ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Salomɔ!"
"Ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ nyam anŋ ɛgŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, li b’anŋ usu wɛwɛ n’am rereb usu a, n’ám ɔl usu eke li k’ir. Eke sica n’ɛ́ŋnm a,
ke n’ám dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'M’ow m’ɛwl m’im m’ɛy ɛm ec’akŋ a eke m’anŋ m’ɛy ɔkm a.' Eke li b’ɛwl mɛny l’ow a, li b’ɛkn eke wɛl apl akŋ ab es ayl, wɛl nyinyimn ow akpl ɛtŋ ɛgŋ irm ɛm.
Sica li b’ɛwl n’im l’ɛsŋ lawlɛl abŋ eŋuŋ lɔbŋ ek’uŋ akm’n, -li b’okr af -l’ir yogŋ. Ow e jam a, abŋ amua b’ijr ɛgŋ na gbre akm krɛkrɛ ec’a. Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ ec’a yɛji, ɛbɛn ow b’ow el."
Eke Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym am dad agŋ a, kpɛkŋ lis lele lisijimɛl ab ow inym es gbeŋ eke ki dad’r odad.
Ɛgŋ nyam dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kin esŋ lele esŋ jimɛl ab ek’ow inym es gbeŋ. -N’am erur eke -li ki dad’ŋ odad."
Jesu dad ɛgŋ a ninɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛm lis ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bwo ɛl el ɛm lisijimɛl ee?"
Ɛtŋ n’am ɔkŋ jam ɛsɛl a abu li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Kin ɛm lis lel ɛm lisijimɛl ab ek’anŋ aŋa,
aŋke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke bi kok Ɛs ek’anŋ afr ec’erur a, el ɛm lisijim, ɛm lisijɔw lel ɛm lis ab."
Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Jesu anŋ akŋ a ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ im sig es mij saw eke ki yɛgm agŋ low.
Agŋ nɔnɔ ar ɛlul il ɛm; na sosiɛm l’ɛy mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm li sig es. Kɔ bieku a gbɛ inym es mij nɛny a.
N’am dad wɛl ów nɔnɔ nyandrɛ ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ nyam, ɛgb ewl ɛs nyam im ɔgm am ewl egb.
Eke n’am ufŋ egb ey ab es a, bɛb ok ebr af ɛtŋ ɔr ow sus ij.
Bɛb ok mebn wus af, usu eke sɛc ɛnym. Kpɛkŋ -l’ɛli, sɛc a ek’ɛnym a sosiɛm.
Kɔ eke ligbn ow afr a, l’ebal egb a eke ɛli ok ɔkm a ɛtŋ li wɛwr wɛl es aŋke min ɔnym ɛl wus tasi.
Bɛb ɛjeci ok usu eke mirŋ anŋ. Mirŋ a ɛli ɔny awŋ ɛl es.
Gbɛkɔ egb ey a e bɛb ok wus mamn af ɛtŋ il ewŋ: bɛb ɔny likŋ lele lɛw ab, bɛb ɔny ekŋ nyahan, ɛtŋ ow e bɛb a, ekŋ yen."
Ɛtŋ Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Eke ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn."
Jam ɛsɛl a ow titm Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ bi dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ee?"
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny, ɛŋan Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ów a eke lɔl es a ec’any uw, kɔ ɛl -n’ɛŋnm.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn any uw a, wɛl b’ow obn’n ɛtŋ ow b’ow ufur es; kɔ ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋnm a, tɛl a eke ɔtu eke k’anŋ’n a, wɛl b’ow eb.
Ow sosiɛm mi b’oc nyandrɛ ɛm mi dad ɛl odad, aŋke -li bi lɛr kɔ -l’ɛknmn, ɛtŋ ow b’ok ɛl ɔru ɛm yɛji kɔ -l’irimn, ɛtŋ ow ókm ɛl es sos ɛm.
Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ec’odad eke dad ɛl Esayi eci kokoba ɔb ɛm a, ɛy ɔkm sodad amua ɛm ana: Ow b’ow ok ɔny ɔru ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow irimn; b’ow lɛɛr sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow ɛknmn.

Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua na itŋn ɛw tuɔtuɔ; -li babl ɔru es, -li bubur anyamn yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl ec’anyamn k’ɛ́knm, ke ɛl ec’ɔru a k’írim ów, ɛl eci nuŋ ɛm ɔny a k’ánm es, -l’ɛwlmn -l’owmn ɛm ogŋ bake m’éwlm ɛl.
Ɔny ec’a, sos ɛm ɔtu eke k’iŋn ɔny aŋke ɔny ec’anyamn am ɛkn es ɛtŋ ɔny ec’ɔru am iri ów!
M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm: kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ lele agŋ ek’ij nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af ab a erur eke k’ɛkn low na eke am ɛkan a, kɔ -l’ɛknm, iri low na ek’am irir a, kɔ -l’irim."
"Ìrir egb ewl ɛs ec’odad a e nyandrɛ.
Ebr ab af a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri wɛl am dad gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad ke ɛ́wm ɛrm af a, agn low ŋuŋ ɛs b’ow oc yec’a eke wɛl ewl ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm a.
Mebn wus a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam ec’odad ke kpɛkŋ b’eb’r sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a.
Gbɛkɔ -li yɛbmn odad a okm min ɛl ɛm, -li b’ɛw ɛrm af tɛl cɛ. Eke sica sos es ɔw owi oglog gbre ij owi b’ow Nyam odad a sosiɛm a, -li b’ɛgbr ɔmn a fafa.

Wus a eke mirŋ nɔnɔ anŋ af ke egb a ok af a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam ec’odad, ke ɛmɛny b’ebr wus na ec’ów a e low ɛrmij a. -Li b’ɔl ob ɔny es. Ɛrmij owi amua b’ɛju ɛl, b’awŋ odad ab es, ɛtŋ ow ɔ́sum ey kaka.
Wus mamn a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam ec’odad ke b’ɛw ɛrm af a. -Li b’ɔsu ey: bɛb ec’a likŋ lele lɛw ab oglog ekŋ nyahan ɛtŋ bɛb ec’a ekŋ yen."
Jesu am dad ɛl nyandrɛ ɛm odad ɛjeci ɛsɛ: "Kin Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a eci elel eke anŋn: ɛgŋ nyam ewl egb amamn in ec’ɔgm a.
Ncok nyam, eke agŋ a fɛŋ am ɛru mɛmn a, in ec’ifnu nyam ow ewl suw eŋuŋ egb ab ɛm ɛtŋ im.
Eke egb a ɛli bake il ewŋ a, suw eŋuŋ a yɛji ɛli ok ɔkm.
Ɔgm ɛs a eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ow am dad’r ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ow elm egb amamn ewlm ŋ ec’ɔgm a ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bogŋ suw eŋuŋ amua anŋ ow ee?'
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ifnu nyam e low eke kok ana.' Juma kok ɛsɛl a ibrm’n ninɛ: 'Erur eke si k’im s’iri suw eŋuŋ ab es ee?'
Li dad ninɛ: 'Njaŋ, aŋke ow eci es iri ɛm a, ɔtur eke k’irir egb amamn ab es.
Yɛ̀br ɛl -l’okr af -l’agb toŋ ke ow ít egb ub e lɛgŋ a, ke sica yogŋ, m’ow mi dad egb ub ɛsɛl a m’ɛsɛ: Ìkŋn anym irir suw eŋuŋ ab es awŋ es eku eku ofŋn, ke sica ókr egb a, ɛm ec’egbel ab ɛm.' "
Jesu am dad ɛl nyandrɛ ɛm odad ɛjeci: "Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ likŋ e liy nyam ek’igŋ nyam oc ewl in ec’ɔgm af.
L’el egb ey a fɛŋ ɛm eci likekli tasi; kɔ eke l’ɛli a, l’el egb ewlu ab ɛm e likŋ ligbɛl tasi. L’el likŋ toŋ batŋ ɔr b’ow us mel in ec’ál ab ɛm."
Jesu am dad ɛl nyandrɛ ɛm odad ɛjeci: "Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ lijru eke yɔw nyam oc wuwlm ma toy likŋ lele yen ab toŋ bake ma a nimum inŋ eb es ab af."
Jesu am dad dedeku a ów amua fɛŋ nyandrɛ ɛm; li dádm wɛl low ek’ow elm nyandrɛ ɛm.
Li bi kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs ec’odad a íy nɛny: M’ow mi dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm, m’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl ów eke lɔl es wus eci nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ a ec’amani.
Sica Jesu ɛlu bieku ab es ɛtŋ im akŋ. In e jam ɛsɛl a im titm’n ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Òtar nyandrɛ ɛm odad a ek’el suw eŋuŋ ek’anŋ ɔgm a e low akr ok ɛy."
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ec’ Iy anake ewl egb amamn a;
ɔgm a, ke wus na nimum ana; egb amamn a el agŋ a eke b’ɛlum gbreŋgbi usu a eci low; suw eŋuŋ a, el agŋ a eke b’ɛlum agn low ŋuŋ ɛs e low a;
ifnu a eke am ewl suw eŋuŋ a, ke agn ana; egb ub a, ke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ ana; ɛtŋ egb ub ɛsɛl a ke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ana.
Ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl am iri suw eŋuŋ es eke wɛl k’ɔwl al ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke ow b’ow el jɛj ok e lɛgŋ ec’ab ana:
ɛgŋ ec’Iy b’ow ɛrm in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a, -li b’ow -n’ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’irmn ɛl lawlɛl ec’ɔmn a lele ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl ab ab -l’ot es gbreŋgbi usu a,
ke -l’ot -l’ɔwl wɛl al gbɛl ab ɛm; yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a.
Kɔ sica agŋ a eke ij nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af a, b’ow jɛjn ɛsɛ ligbn af ɛl Ɛs eci gbreŋgbi usu a. Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn."

"Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ ob ɔny eke lɔl es ɔgm nyam af. Ɛgŋ nyam iwr ob ɔny na es ɛtŋ ɛmɛny oc lɔl’l es ɔgm a. Sos ɛm iŋn’n toŋ batŋ n’im l’ɔl ob fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ij, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl l’ow l’ɔl ɔgm a."
"Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ an ɔlu nyam ek’am ɔl miyob amamn es af.
Eke n’ɛŋn an gbɛl e miyob nyam a, n’im l’ɔl ob fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ij, ɛtŋ l’ɔl miyob a."
"Ɛmɛny Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ muw eke wɛl ok ke ɔny ɔcn ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ af.
Eke ow b’iy a, mij juma kok ɛsɛl a b’ɔdu ow’r ákpaf ke ok es am jɛj ɔcn ab es: -li b’ok amamn a mulu ɛm, ke -l’ɔwl yec’eke akplm a.
Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, ɛbɛn ek’ow b’ow el ana: afr ɛrm ɛsɛl b’ow ow kpab agŋ eŋuŋ a es, amamn a e lís,
ke ɔ́wl ɛl al gbɛl ab ɛm. Yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a."
Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ irir ów a fɛŋ ee?" -L’ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ɛɛ."

Ɛtŋ ca li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn eke ol eci low yɛgm ɛs fɛŋ ek’am el Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛgŋ a, anŋ ana. N’anŋ ɛsɛ akŋ ɛs nyam eke b’ɛlu in ec’ob ɔny ɔkm low yɛgm owr ɛm lele low yɛgm esig ɛm ab af."
Eke Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm odad amua bake ow uwr a, l’igb yogŋ

n’im ɛb ab ɛm eke n’anŋ l’agb a. N’am yɛgm agŋ low yogŋ eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a toŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ yogŋ a low iti any afŋn es. -N’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ nuŋ ɛm ɔny na anŋ ow’r ee? Ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki kok sakrowa amua ee?
Kɔ ow elm ɔgɔg es ɔdu ɛs a ec’iy ab ee? Kɔ ow elm Mari elm lis ee? Kɔ Jak, Josɛf, Simɔ lele Jud ab elm lisijimɛl ee?
Kɔ lisijɔwɛl fɛŋ irm ɛy ab ee? Kɔ abusu ikŋ na bogŋ n’ɛŋn ee?"
Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ ɔ́ɔm abusu eke -li k’ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm. Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Usu a fɛŋ wɛl b’ɔny kokoba ɔb ɛs ec’ɛlum, ek’ow elm in ec’ɛb ab ɛm lele in ec’akŋ ab cɛ wɛl ɔ́nym in ec’ɛlum."
Yogŋ eci sakrowa a eke Jesu kok a tɛl cɛ, ɛl eci ɔmn a eke -n’ɔnym a sosiɛm.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Galile eci es ɛw ɛs Erɔd Antipas am iri Jesu eci nin ek’am il e low.
Li dad in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs! L’igb luw ɛm, na sosiɛm anake n’am ɔny abusu li kok sakrowa a."

Kin elel eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs a e luw owi a ɛcr: Erɔd Antipas oc lisijim Filip e yɔw Erodiad, ɛtŋ Jan im dad Erɔd ninɛ: "Ow itm eke k’oc esŋ jim e yɔw." Ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm Erɔd ɔŋ abusu wɛl ɔny Jan ok ŋgbraka ɛlu sobel ɛm.
Erɔd am erur eke k’ibi Jan, kɔ n’am uru Jwifɛl a, aŋke -li b’oc Jan ɛsɛ kokoba ɔb ɛs af.
Gbɛkɔ sica Erɔd e mew ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Erodiad jɔw ub ɛj etu a eke wɛl ɛsŋ a ec’any af. In e low iŋn Erɔd sos ɛm
toŋ l’ɛgŋ l’eb eke li k’ɔŋ ow ob fɛŋ eke ow b’ow ibrm a.
Erodiad ec’ów ɔm ebl ɛm, jɔw dad Erɔd ninɛ: "Òc Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs eci nuŋ a wayas ɛm is’m aŋa!"
Ɛb ebu a sos ɔw es; gbɛkɔ eke l’ij nɛny etu a ec’any af a, l’ɛlu abusu es eke li k’ɔŋ ow.
N’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im sobel ɛm ubr Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs nuŋ.
Wɛl oc nuŋ a wayas ɛm ow ɔŋ dedyɔwli a ɛtŋ l’eb n’ɔŋ lis.
Ek’ów a ɛc ɛbɛn a, Jan eci jam ɛsɛl a ow oc in e sos megl a im oc es, ɛtŋ im ɛwl Jesu amani low na ek’ɛy a eci.
Eke Jesu iri Jan e low na a, l’igb yogŋ mijɛtŋ ɛm eke li k’im in sɔny usu saw ɛm, kɔ agŋ a uw any; -l’ok ɔkm sɛb a ek’anŋ yogŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ mij nɛny a -n’am us Jesu jam lakr ɛm.
Mijɛtŋ a b’itr es eke Jesu b’us es a, l’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ; wɛl e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’am ewlm ɛl ec’ɔ́lu a.
Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, in e jam ɛsɛl a ow titm’n ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ ɛc, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny usu na yɛji ɛw usu saw ɛm. Òk agŋ ab es ím baŋn baŋn ek’anŋ saw saw aŋa a yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔl ob ij."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ow itm eke -li k’im; ɔny obi, ɔ̀ŋn ɛl ob -l’ij!"
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Futufutu yen lele ɔcn yony ab cɛ anake s’ɔnym ab aŋa a."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Òtr isr’m aŋa."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li dad agŋ a eke k’ok es suw ab af; sica l’oc futufutu yen a lele ɔcn yony ab ab, l’igbl any ogŋ afr ɛtŋ l’ɛlu Nyam bia. Li bubr ɛm n’ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ -li cɛc -n’ɔŋ agŋ a.
Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ij ob lok iy ɛl ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ow wal es. Jam ɛsɛl a ot ekpr a eke wal es a as luku, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu lɛw yony.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ij ob a ɔtu eke k’ij agŋ fandi yen; wɛl awlm ɔyɔw lel ey ab.
Kpɛkŋ eke ow b’uwr a, Jesu ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm eke k’ikŋ anym im mij lekpl a e jam a, ke n’ánŋ in obi l’afl agŋ ab es.
Eke l’afl wɛl es a, l’uyu lafɛny ab af eke li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam. Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, n’anŋ yogŋ in sɔny.
Mijɛtŋ a gbɛ, wus ab a, n’im kpekpe, mra am ɛlul il aŋke lɛf am ɛlu ɔbr’r.
Eke lɛgŋ am ɛny ow a, Jesu am an es mij ab af im ɛŋn in e jam ɛsɛl a.
Eke -l’ɛkan Jesu am an es mij af a, -li kpikprm es ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Na ɔŋnabŋ!" Ɛtŋ -n’am ɔg erŋn ebl ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ kpɛkŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛrm úsu ɔny lokm! Erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny! Kɔ ɛm!"
Piɛr ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke ow el ŋ tasi, ke ɔ̀ŋ abusu m’an es mij ab af m’ow m’ɛŋn’ŋ."
Jesu ɛgŋ dad ninɛ: "Òw!" Piɛr ɛy ɔkm mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ am an es mij ab af im ɛŋn’n.
Gbɛkɔ eke l’ɛkn lɛf a e lɛc ek’am ɛlu ɔkm a, erŋn ow’r sos ɛtŋ n’am ɛmn. L’ɛlu lebl li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, èb ɛlu’m es!"
Kpɛkŋ Jesu ɛgŋm abu es ɔny’n, ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɔmn ɛw’ŋ fuɛfuɛ tasi! Kɔ bla ɛtŋ bɛbar ee?"
Ɛl yony mum -l’ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ lɛf a irm es.
Ow ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a, ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ŋ gbɛ Nyam ec’Iy tasi!"
Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ubr mij lekpl a e jam a ke -l’itar es Genesarɛt wus af a,
yogŋ ec’agŋ a uw Jesu any ɛtŋ ɛwl susu a fɛŋ in ec’ow ec’amani. Ɛtŋ wɛl ot ɔ́lu fɛŋ is’r.
-N’am ŋɔŋn ow eke ow ki yɛb wɛl itŋn in e mob sus ɛm a ec’ɛnyɛmbri a cɛ abu, ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am itŋn in e mob sus ɛm a abu a, am ewl.
Sica Farisiɛl lele ol eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab anŋ Jerusalɛm ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ:
"Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a ɛ́luam ɛy lagŋɛl ec’ɛb ir owi a ek’ɔŋ ɛy a ee? Tasi ɛm a, low yɛgm a am ibrm eke wɛl ki yɔg sabu gbuŋ ke ij ob, kɔ -li kokmn."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ kɔ ɔny, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ɔny ec’ɛb ir ec’ów a sosiɛm ɛ́luamn Nyam ec’ol ab ee?
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛ̀lum asŋ lele esŋ ab, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny: ɛgŋ eke bi yayr ɛs lele lis ab a, l’it eke wɛl k’ibi’r.
Kɔ ɔny, ɔny e low yɛgm ab ɛm bi dadr ɛsrɛ: ek’ɛgŋ nyam in dad ow ɛs oglog ow lis in ɛsɛ: 'Ob a eke mi k’ɔŋ’ŋ ŋ ec’abu ɛlum ec’a, m’oc m’ɛw es Nyam ec’egb wawr eci,'
ke ɛgŋ ikŋ na, ɔny ec’a, yec’eke li k’ɔŋ ɛs a, n’ŋgboŋ ow e low ɛm ŋ̂. Ɛbɛn eke b’isr Nyam ec’odad ab es ɔŋn ɔny ec’agŋ ɛm ec’ów a usu ana!
Ɔny, agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl! Nawrɛ tasi, Esayi dad ɔny e lís e low na in e kokoba ɔb ab ɛm:
Nyam dad eke: 'Agŋ amua na nɛny ɛm ɔfr ɔfr -n’am kɔklm im, kɔ ɛl ec’ɛrm a kpab es ɛm e lís.
Nuŋ ɔfr ɔfr agŋ amua am igŋ’m, aŋke agŋ ɛm ec’ów anake -li b’oc -li yɛgmn agŋ low a.' "
Sica Jesu ɛsŋ dedeku a ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ìgŋn lɔru es irir low na sɛnyn sɛnyn:
ow elm ob eke b’ɛy ɛgŋ nɛnym a, ɔɔm ɛgŋ uwm anŋ, kɔ low eke b’anŋ ɛgŋ nɛnym ɛy ɔkm a, low na anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ úwm anŋ a."
Low na af jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Odad na eke dad Farisiɛl iri a, kɔ uw any ek’ow ɛy ɛl sos ɛm ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "Likŋ fɛŋ ek’elm ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr eci likŋ ek’ewl a, li b’ow l’iri ow es.
Ɛ̀gbr ɛl es, -l’el ány eflu ek’am nyimn ány eflu! Ek’any eflu nyam am nyimn any eflu ɛjeci nyam, ɛl yony mum -li b’ow -l’ok nɔmu nyam ɛm."
Piɛr ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Òtar nyandrɛ ɛm odad na e low akr ok ɛy."
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny bɔbɔ yɛji, k’irimn low na eci nyandrɛ ab ee?
Kɔ uwmn any eke ob fɛŋ eke b’ɛy ɛgŋ nɛnym a, b’im ɛy lokm, ke sica n’anŋ lokm a l’ɛy ɔkm ee?
Low eke b’anŋ nɛnym ɛy ɔkm a, ɛrm ɛm ow b’anŋ ow; ɛtŋ low na anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ uwm anŋ a.
Tasi ɛm a, sow tutr eŋuŋ eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ibi ɛgŋ, ɛrum yɔw ɛjec’ab, ij nfaci, iy mil, ij daŋku yadŋ ke dád sodad eŋuŋ ok agŋ af a, ɛrm ɛm -li b’anŋ -l’ow.
Ów amua anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ uwm anŋ a! Ij ob ke kí yɔgm abu a ɔ́ɔm ɛgŋ uwm anŋ."
Ɛtŋ Jesu igb yogŋ im Tir lele Sidɔn ab eci wus ab af.
Kpɛkŋ kin Kana wus af e yɔw nyam ek’ir wus ikpr ab af a, ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, David e lilaw, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ! Kɔ abŋ ŋuŋ am ijr ɛm jɔw gbre, ow k’akplm kaka!"
Gbɛkɔ Jesu cicm sar okm’n es. In e jam ɛsɛl a ow titm’n ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ògŋ’n kɔ n’am us ɛy jam l’ɔgr ɛy nɔnɔ."
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nyam ɛrm’m Israɛl ec’agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ek’irm af a eci cɛ."
Kɔ yɔw a ow ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ!"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ow itm eke wɛl k’oc etuey ec’ob ij ɔŋ mɔwr."
Yɔw a dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, tasi, gbɛkɔ mɔwr yɛji, ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl eci ob ij a ec’ekpr a eke b’anŋ tabl af ok wus a, -li b’ij."
Ow ɔŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Oy! Ɔmn agb’ŋ gbɛ! B’ow ɛŋn low a ek’am erur a." Ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ, yɔw a ec’iy a ewl.
Sica Jesu igb yogŋ im ɛy Galile eci mij lekpl a ogŋ. L’uyu ligigl nyam af li sig es.
Agŋ nɔnɔ ow ɛŋn’n. -L’ism akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl, ány eflu, sos ɛ́yru, ɛbrmɛl, lele ɔ́lu ɛjeci nɔnɔ ab. -L’ok wɛl es Jesu ec’any af ɛtŋ l’ewlm wɛl.
Eke -l’ɛkan ɛbrmɛl dad ów, sos ɛ́yru ewl, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl an es lele ány eflu ek’ɛkn es ab ab a, agŋ a low iti any afŋn es ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Israɛl e Nyam a.

Ɛmɛny Jesu ɛsŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ amua e low am ɔny’m sɔrŋ, aŋke kin sɛgŋ emum nyahan eke -n’anŋn ɛm ab ke -n’ɔnym ob kaka eke -li k’ij. M’erurm eke mi k’ɔŋ ɛl -n’im namn; ejagb -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛŋn es abur."
Jam ɛsɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ usu saw ɛm aŋa, bogŋ s’ɔtu eke si k’ɛŋn ob ij s’ɔŋ agŋ amua ij lok iy ee?"
Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ futufutu abi ɔnymn ab ee?" Ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Futufutu lɔbŋ lele ɔcn ekekey abi ka ab."
Ca li dad agŋ a eke k’ok es wus.
Ɛtŋ l’ot futufutu lɔbŋ a lele ɔcn ab ab, l’ɛlu Nyam bia, li bubr ɛm n’ɔŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ -li cɛc agŋ a fɛŋ.
Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ij lok iy ɛl. Jam ɛsɛl a ot ekpr a eke wal es a as luku, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu ɛgbɛl lɔbŋ.
Agŋ a ek’ij ob a ij agŋ fandi yar, wɛl awlm ɔyɔw lele etuey ab.
Eke sica Jesu ɔŋ bieku a im a, l’ɛy mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ n’im Magadan eci wus ab af.
Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab ow ɛŋn Jesu eke k’ɛbm’n. -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛ̀lu mɛny ɛwr nyam ɔkm yɛgm ɛy ek’ow el Nyam ɛrm’ŋ."
Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: ["Lɛgŋ es ew ɛm bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Efi e lɛgŋ a b’ow akpl, aŋke afr ebl es.'
Ɛtŋ ibribr fafa, eke afr b’ibr es a, bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Yɛfɛnyna nyam b’ow an.' Lɛgŋ eci elel eke b’anŋn a b’uwr any, kɔ sɛgŋ amua eci mɛny ɛwr a, ɔ́tumn uwmn any!]
Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ amua eke íjm nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af a am ibrm mɛny ɛwr; kɔ wɛl k’ow kokm mɛny ɛwr kaka ɔɔm ɛl ek’ow elm Jonas ec’a cɛ." Ɛtŋ l’ɛlu wɛl es n’im.
Eke jam ɛsɛl a im ok mij lekpl a e jam a, -l’ijl es eke -li k’oc futufutu.
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ɔ̀sur sos Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab eci lijru a e lís."
Jam ɛsɛl a am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛsɛ: "Eke s’ocm futufutu a sosiɛm anake n’am dad ów amua a."
Jesu uw odad a eke -n’am dad ab any ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am dadr ɔny ɔfr ɛm ɛsrɛ: 'Eke s’ebm futufutu a sosiɛm ee?' Kɔ k’irimn cɛ ee!
Ow k’okm ɔny es sos ɛm cɛ ee? Futufutu yen a eke mi bubr ɛm, m’ɔŋ agŋ fandi yen lele ekpr a eke wal es eci mulu abi a eke otr imn a, kɔ k’ɔknmn ow e low ee?
Ɛtŋ kɔ futufutu lɔbŋ a eke mi bubr ɛm m’ɔŋ agŋ fandi yar a, lele ekpr a eke wal es a eci mulu ɛgbɛl abi a eke otr imn a, k’ɔknmn ow e low ee?
Ɔ̀sur sos Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab e lijru a e lís. Kɔ ayaf ɔtur eke k’uwmn any ek’ow elm futufutu ec’odad mi dadm ɔny ee?"
Ca jam ɛsɛl a iri ek’ow elm lijru a eke wɛl b’oc kokr futufutu a ec’odad Jesu dadm ɛl, kɔ Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab e low yɛgm a e low.
Jesu im ɛy Sesare Filip ec’ɛb ɛm. N’am ibrm in e jam ɛsɛl a l’ɛsɛ: "Ayaf agŋ bi dadr ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e lís ee?"
-Li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ ŋ Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs, bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ ŋ Eli, ɛtŋ agŋ likpr ec’a, -li b’oc’ŋ ɛsɛ Jeremi oglog kokoba ɔb ɛs ɛjeci nyam af."
Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny obi ɔny obi a, ayaf b’ocar’m ee?"
Simɔ Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Ŋ Mesi a, Nyam a ek’anŋ owr ec’Iy."
Ca Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Simɔ Jonas jim, ehe él ŋ eci, aŋke nawrɛ ikŋ na, ow elm ɛgŋ ɛlum ɔkm dadm’ŋ, kɔ ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a.
Sica ɛm, m’am dad’ŋ m’ɛsɛ: ŋ Lob, ɛtŋ lob ikŋ na af, m’ow m’us ɛm e Nyamel a. Luw ec’abusu a k’ɔtum ɔnym lɛc in af.
M’ow m’ɔŋ’ŋ Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a eci sisafuɛ a: low fɛŋ eke b’ow igŋ wus af aŋa a, Afr b’ow igŋ; low fɛŋ eke b’ow eb wus af aŋa a, Afr yɛji b’ow eb."
Jesu ijl in e jam ɛsɛl a nɛny dad ninɛ: "Kì dadr ɛgŋ kaka eke m’el Mesi a."

Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Jesu ɔb nuŋ am dad ulm in e jam ɛsɛl a es ɛsɛ: "Ow it eke mi k’im Jerusalɛm ke yogŋ m’íj gbre nɔnɔ, agŋ ekpekp, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl, lel ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab ec’abu ɛm. Wɛl b’ow ibi’m ɛtŋ sɛgŋ nyahan m’ow m’igb luw ɛm."
Ɛbɛn a, Piɛr oc’r ab im saw ɛm ɛtŋ am ɛnym’n abr dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl! Nyam ɔ́ny oc’ŋ es ɛm! Low na k’ow ɛŋnm’ŋ lɛgŋ kaka!"
Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɛwl sos mɛny ɛtŋ am dad Piɛr ɛsɛ: " Satan, kpàb’m es lís! Ŋ el ɛm ec’ejagb us e lirikp, aŋke ŋ e tutr a elm Nyam e tutr, kɔ agŋ ɛm eci."
Ɛmɛny Jesu am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛsɛ: "Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am erur eke k’us’m jam a, ow it ke li kí tutrm in e lís owi, l’ábu in obi ec’olikŋ a, ke l’ús’m jam.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow erur eke ki dogŋn in e sel a, b’ow irmn. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow irmn in e sel a ɛm sosiɛm a b’ow ɛŋn.
Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɔny wus ec’ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’irmn in e sel a, ke bla ow b’ow eel il ab ee? Kɔ bla ob iy ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’oc sɔgr in e sel ab ee?
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow Ɛs ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm lele in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ in eci es an ab ɛm, li b’ow li sɔg ow labm.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ amua ek’anŋ aŋa a e bɛb b’ow ɛkn ɛgŋ ec’Iy ow ɛsɛ ɛb ebu af gbuŋ ke -l’uw."
Eke sɛgŋ nɔhɔn ɛc a, Jesu ɛsŋ Piɛr, Jak lele Jan ek’el Jak lisijim ab ɛtŋ -li kpab es -n’im saw ɛm ɛl sɔny lafɛny gege nyam af.
Jesu itŋn sos ɛl ec’any af: any am jɛjn’n ɛsɛ ligbn af ɛtŋ in e mob sus ɛm a ufu pum pum pum anŋ ɛsɛ usuayl af.
Ɛtŋ kin, jam ɛsɛl nyahan a ɛkn Mois lele Eli ab ek’ilm any am dad ów Jesu ab.
Ɛtŋ Piɛr dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ow akpl eke si k’anŋ aŋa! Ek’erur, aŋa m’ɔtu eke mi k’us nuŋ igŋ usu nyahan: ŋ e nyam, Mois e nyam lele Eli e nyam ab."

Odad anŋ Piɛr nɛnym am dad ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ kin jru ek’am jɛjn ow ubur ɛl es. Lebl nyam anŋ jru ab ɛm am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na el ɛm ec’Iy eke m’erur tasi; m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ m’ɛlu’l ɛm. Ìrir in e low!"
Eke jam ɛsɛl a iri lebl ikŋ na a, erŋn ɔny ɛl afŋn es ɛtŋ -li bubu any es wus.
Jesu im titm ɛl, itŋn ɛl abu ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìgbr, k’ùrur erŋn."
-Li gbigbl any ogŋ ɛtŋ -l’ɛknm ɛgŋ kaka ek’ow elm Jesu sɔny cɛ.
Eke -n’anŋn lafɛny ab af -n’am us es a, Jesu am ijl ɛl nɛny dad ɛsɛ: "Low na ek’ɛkan a, kì dadr kokr ɛgŋ kaka toŋ bake ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ígb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm."
Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Dàd ɛy, kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a bi dad ek’Eli in k’ow gbuŋ ke Mesi in ow ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Tasi ɛm a, Eli eke li k’ow ke ni nyímn ów a fɛŋ.
Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny ek’Eli ow lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ, agŋ ɛgŋm ebm’n ɛtŋ kok’r low yec’eke -l’erurir a. Ɛbɛn eke -li b’ow -li kok ɛgŋ ec’Iy sos keskes ana."
Sica jam ɛsɛl a iri eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ec’odad anake Jesu am dad ɛl a.
Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ok yogŋ a eke bieku a anŋ a, ɛgŋ nyam ow titm Jesu, ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af
ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ny ɛm ec’iy a eci sɔrŋ ikŋ. L’el krokro ɛs ɛtŋ ɔl a b’ijr’r gbre toŋ sakp nɔnɔ ec’a li b’ɛy alm, oglog mij ɛm.
M’oc’r m’is ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a kɔ -l’ɔtum -l’ewlam ow."
Jesu igbl lebl ogŋ dad ninɛ: "Wew! Ɔny eel agŋ eŋuŋ eke ɔmn anm ɛm tasi! Ɛmɛny sɛgŋ abi m’it eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab ee? Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sakp abi ow it eke mi k’ɛgŋ low na m’eb ee? Òcr iy a isr’m aŋa."
Jesu ɔɔr abŋ ŋuŋ a abr ɛy ɔkm iy ab ɛm ɛtŋ l’ewl wanci ab af cɛ.
Jam ɛsɛl a im titm Jesu saw ɛm ɛtŋ ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ɛy s’ɔtum s’ɔnym abusu s’ogŋm abŋ na ee?"

Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny ec’ɔmn a ufum es. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: blel ɔnyn ɔmn ɛw likekli ɛsɛ likŋ e liy af, ɔtur eke ki dadr ligigl na ɛsrɛ: 'Ìgb aŋa im yogŋ a', li b’ow n’im. Low kaka k’ow ɔtum akam ɔny. [
Abŋ akpasu na, Nyam ŋɔŋn lele nɛny ɛnŋ ɛm ab cɛ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ogŋ’n.]"
Lɛgŋ nyam, jam ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ɛŋanin Galile, ɛtŋ Jesu am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Wɛl b’ow ɔny ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɛlu agŋ abu ɛm,
ke -l’ibi ow; gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ nyahan, li b’ow l’igb luw ɛm." Ow sosiɛm jam ɛsɛl a sos ɔw es nɔnɔ.
Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ok Kapɛrnayum a, Nyamel gbɛl a eci wus labm eb ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Piɛr ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɔny eci low yɛgm ɛs a, n’am sɔgm Nyamel gbɛl a eci wus labm ee?"

Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Njaŋ, li bi sɔg." Wanci ab af a eke Piɛr am ɛy akŋ a, Jesu ikŋ anym eb odad ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Simɔ, kɔ ayaf am tutar ee? Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a, kɔ bwo ki sɔg wus labm ɔŋ ɛl ee? Ɛl ec’ɛb eyŋ a, kɔ etu agŋ ab ee?"
Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Etu agŋ a cɛ." Af yogŋ Jesu dad Piɛr ninɛ: "Ɛb eyŋ a ɔnym labm sɔg ij.

Gbɛkɔ s’erurm eke si k’ebal agŋ amua ɛrm es. Na sosiɛm ìm mij lekpl ab ɛm ɔwl ew; ɔcn krɛkrɛ a eke b’ow ɔny a, fìg in e nɛny a, b’ow ɛŋn os eke b’ow ɛbm ŋ lele ɛm ab eci wus labm a eci sɔg. Òc os a ow sɔg ɛl ɛy ec’a."
Wanci ab af a, jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu yogŋ, kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ el ligbɛl ee?"
Jesu ɛsŋ iyli nyam ow, n’inymn ow es ɛl ec’araŋn
ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: eke itŋnmn ɔnymn ɛrm ɛsɛ etuey af, k’ow ɔtumn ɛymn Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a.
Gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a, in l’el ɛgŋ a eke b’is es ke b’ɛwl anŋ ɛsɛ iy na af a."
"Eke ɛgŋ eb ey amua ɛm e nyam ɛm sosiɛm a, ke ɛm anake l’eb’m a.

Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɔny ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm ɛsɛ iy na af ɛlu wus a, low ŋuŋ a eke li k’ɛŋn a agb nɔnɔ. Eke wɛl oc meb ucur lob ligbɛl ucu’r ɛmn, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛman in okij a, ow akpl akm low ŋuŋ a eke wɛl ki kok’r a.
Bogŋ e gbre ana! Wus na af, ów nɔnɔ anŋ low ŋuŋ kok eci! Tasi ów amua b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, gbɛkɔ gbre b’ow el ɛgŋ a eke b’ow kok ów amua a eci!

Eke batŋ ow el ŋ ec’abu a oglog ŋ e lakr a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ke ùbr’r es oc ɔwl’l kpekpe; ow akpl ŋ eci eke k’ɛy sel ɛŋn tasi ab ɛm abu nyam coco ab oglog lakr nyam coco ab, ow a eke k’ɛli sabu yony lele akr yony ab, ke wɛl óc ɔwl’ŋ al a ek’iram es ab ɛm a.

Ɛtŋ ek’ow el ŋ e nyamn a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ɔ̀kr ɔny oc es oc’r ɔwl’l kpekpe; ow akpl ŋ ec’eke k’ɛy sel ɛŋn tasi ab ɛm nyamn nyam coco ab, ow a eke k’ɛli anyamn yony, ke wɛl óc ɔwl’ŋ gbre ij usu ec’al ab ɛm a."
"Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ɛm e jam ɛsɛl ey amua ɛm e nyam ec’ifn owi ɛm; tasi ɛm a, m’am dad ɔny eke ɛl ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a ec’any af. [
Kin low nyam, ɔny e tutr el bogŋ ec’ee? Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny mɛcɛb ekŋ yen, ɛtŋ ɛl ɛm eci nyam irm a, kɔ li k’ow l’igŋm ekŋ yar lɛw libarm a l’ɛlum es lafɛny af yogŋ, n’iim l’ɔlm yec’a ek’irm a l’ocm ee?
M’am dad ɔny, eke n’ɛŋn ow, li b’ow n’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn licɛb na e nuŋ af l’akm ekŋ yar lɛw libarm a ek’iram a.
Ɛbɛn ek’ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a erurm eke ɛm e jam ɛsɛl ey amua ɛm e nyam k’irm ana."
"Eke esŋ jim nyam kok low ŋuŋ [ŋ e lís], ke ìm ɛŋn’n ŋ sɔny, ke dád’r in e low ŋuŋ a eke li kok a. Eke l’iri ŋ ec’odad a, ke esŋ jim a l’el ŋ ec’ŋ̂.
Kɔ eke l’ɛgŋm l’irim ŋ ec’odad a, òc ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam oglog agŋ yony ab im, yec’ɛtŋ ke, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl a am dadr ab af a: odad fɛŋ eci nyinyimn ɛm, adaŋku yony oglog nyahan ánŋ ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ eke l’ɛgŋm l’irim wɛl ec’odad a, dàd ok Nyamel; ɛtŋ eke l’ɛgŋm l’irim Nyamel ec’odad a, òc’r ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛs af oglog wus labm eb ɛs af.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: low fɛŋ eke b’ow igŋn wus af aŋa a, Afr b’ow igŋ; low fɛŋ eke b’ow ebr wus af aŋa a, Afr yɛji b’ow eb.
Ɛmɛny m’am dad ɔny, eke wus af aŋa, ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ yony okr af eke k’ibrm low kaka fɛŋ jɛj ok owi ec’a, ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a b’ow ɔŋ ɛl.
Tasi ɛm a, yogŋ ek’agŋ yony nyahan as luku ɛm e nin ɛm a, m’anŋ ɛl ec’araŋn."
Ɛtŋ Piɛr ow titm Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ek’ɛm lisijim bi kok’m low ŋuŋ, ke sakp abi mi k’oc m’ap’r ee? Kɔ sakp lɔbŋ ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Njaŋ, mi dadm’ŋ m’ɛsmɛ toŋ sakp lɔbŋ, kɔ toŋ sakp ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw ab toŋ sakp lɔbŋ.
Na sosiɛm, kin Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’elel ek’anŋn: ɛb ebu nyam erur eke k’ub in ec’ob a ek’in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ɔnym’n ab a.
Eke l’ɔb nuŋ n’am kok ow e low a, wɛl oc juma kok ɛs nyam ek’ɔnym’n os bubutɛ gbɛl ab is’r.

Ɛgŋ a ɔnym ob kaka eke k’oc sɔgr in e labm a; ow sosiɛm ɛb ebu a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɔl’l ij’r ɛsɛ aduigŋ af, ke wɛl ɔ́l in e yɔw, in ec’ey lele ob fɛŋ eke n’ɔny ab ab ij yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɔ́tu li sɔg labm a.
Juma kok ɛs a ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛb ebu a ec’any af ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: 'Ɛrm ɛ́y’ŋ es, èku bɛb, m’ow mi sɔg’ŋ fɛŋ!'
Ɛb ebu a sɔrŋ ɔny nɔnɔ: l’oc labm a l’ap ow ɛtŋ l’ɛlu ow es ow im.
Juma kok ɛs a ec’im ɛm a, l’ɔbr lawl juma kok ɛs nyam ek’ɔnym’n os tɛl ab. N’ɔny ow ɛmn ɛmn n’am bɔbrm ow l’atr ow sel li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Sɔ̀g ɛm ec’os a ek’ɔnym ab a!'
Lawl a ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af ɛtŋ am ŋɔŋn’n ɛsɛ: 'Ɛrm ɛ́y’ŋ es, èku bɛb, m’ow mi sɔg’ŋ!'
Gbɛkɔ l’ɛgŋm; n’ɔny l’ɛlu ow sobel ɛm ek’ow k’anŋ ɛm toŋ ke ow sɔ́g’r labm a.
Eke juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjec’a ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a, sos ɔw ɛl es sɛnyn sɛnyn ɛtŋ -n’im -l’awl ów a fɛŋ -l’ok ɛb ebu a.
Af yogŋ, ɛb ebu a ɔŋ wɛl ɛsŋ juma kok ɛs a ow ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: 'Juma kok ɛs ŋuŋ! M’oc ŋ e labm a fɛŋ m’ap’ŋ eke ŋɔŋn’m a sosiɛm.
Ŋ yɛji, blel ɔ́ny awl’ŋ a eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɔny ŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ ab af.'
Ɛb ebu a ɛrm ebl afŋn es ɛtŋ n’ɔny juma kok ɛs a l’ɛlu sobel ɛm milɔlu kokr eci toŋ ke li sɔ́g labm a fɛŋ."
Ɛtŋ Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn eke ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a b’ow kok ɔny ana, ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam ocm low ŋuŋ eke lisijim kok’r a apm’n ɛrm nyam ɛm."
Eke sica Jesu dad ów ɔm odad bake ow uwr a, l’igb Galile ɛtŋ n’im Jude wus af e mij jam ek’el Jurdɛn a.
Agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam ɛtŋ l’ewlm ɛl ɛm ec’ɔ́lu a.
Farisiɛl bɛb ow titm Jesu eke k’uk’r meb odad ebl ɛm. -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ low kaka fɛŋ ɛm, ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke ɛgŋ k’ogŋ in e yɔw ee?"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ awlmn low yec’a eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab ee? Nuŋ ɔb ɛm a, Nyam kok igŋ lele yɔw ab,
ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: Na sosiɛm anake igŋ b’ow ŋgboŋ ɛs lele lis ab ec’akŋ, ke l’ókr af in e yɔw ab ab -l’el sos megl nyam a.
Ca -l’elm agŋ yony ij, kɔ sos megl nyam. Ke ɛgŋ k’ɔ́nym yec’eke Nyam ɔny okr af a kpabm es."
Ɛmɛny Farisiɛl am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛgŋ am ow ogŋ in e yɔw a, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ Mois b’ibrm eke wɛl k’ɔŋ ow igŋnin e lɛl ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "Ɔny ec’ɛrm tuɔtuɔ a sosiɛm anake Mois ɔŋ ɔny abusu eke k’ogŋn ɔny ec’ɔyɔw a. Kɔ nuŋ ɔb ɛm a, ow elm ɛbɛn ow ɛcrm.
M’am dad ɔny: igŋ fɛŋ eke ɛlu in e yɔw es, ke ow elm egŋ ot owi ɛm, ke im ɛbi yɔw ɛjec’a, l’ij nfaci ŋ̂."
In e jam ɛsɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Ek’ow el ɛbɛn tasi ɛgŋ k’anŋ in e yɔw ab a, ke ow akplm ek’ɛgŋ k’ɛbi yɔw."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ a fɛŋ k’ɔtum ɛgŋm odad na ebm ek’ow elm agŋ a cɛ eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ow ec’abusu a.

Ów nɔnɔ anŋ eke b’ɛdŋn agŋ yɔw ec’ɛbi: bɛb ec’a, mew ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ijm ow e lɛc; bɛb ec’a egŋ agbru, agŋ ɔŋ -n’ɔnym ow ec’abusu; sica bɛb ec’a, Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu e juma kok sosiɛm -l’erurmn eke -li k’ɛbi yɔw. Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke k’ɛgŋ low yɛgm na eb a, l’ɛ́gŋ l’eb!"
Sica agŋ ot etuey am is Jesu eke li k’at wɛl abu nuŋ ni ŋɔŋn Nyam n’ɔŋ wɛl, kɔ jam ɛsɛl a am ɛnym agŋ a abr.
Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Yɛ̀br etuey ow ɛm ogŋ! Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́dŋn ɛl, aŋke tasi ɛm a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a el agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛl af a eci."
L’at wɛl abu nuŋ l’ɛdŋ wɛl ɔwrɔ ɛtŋ l’igb yogŋ n’im.
Ɛtŋ kin ɛgŋ nyam ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ bla low mamn iy m’ɔtu eke mi ki kok ke m’ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ibrm im low yec’a eke k’akpl ab af ee? Nyam sɔny coco cɛ akpl. Eke batŋ am erur eke k’ɛy sel ek’ɔnym uwr ɛm a, ɛ̀lum sol a."
L’ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ eci sol ee?" Jesu dad ninɛ: "K’íbim ɛgŋ, k’íjm nfaci, k’íym mil, k’íjm daŋku yadŋ ɛm ɛgŋ e nuŋ af;
ɛ̀lum asŋ lele esŋ ab, ke érur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af."
Ŋgbafrɛli a dad’r ninɛ: "Mi b’ɛlum sol amua fɛŋ. Ɛmɛny bogŋ ec’anake anŋ ab ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ek’am erur eke k’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam am erur ab af a, ke ìm ɔl ŋ ec’ob a eke ɔny a ij, òc ow ec’os a ɔŋ ɔgbɔru, ke b’ow ɛŋn ob ɔny afr, ca ɛ́wl mɛny ow ke ús’m jam."
Ŋgbafrɛli a b’iri low na a, n’aam sos es ɔw ɛm aŋke tasi ɛm a, n’ɔny ob nɔnɔ.
Ɛtŋ sica Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ eke gbreŋgbi k’ɛy Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, kin low nyam eke m’am dad ɔny: gbaŋkɔ kedebnam eci fɛfn ɔmu ɛm eke k’ɛcr a ɛw fuɛfuɛ akm gbreŋgbi eci Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛm ɛy a."
Eke jam ɛsɛl a iri ów amua a, low iti ɛl any ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke sica bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ɛŋn sel ee?"
Jesu lɛr ɛl ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ ec’any af a ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ, kɔ ow elm Nyam ec’any af gbɛ, aŋke Nyam ec’a, fɛŋ ɛw fuɛfuɛ!"
Ca kin Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi yɛji ɛ̀kn! Ɛy, s’igŋ fɛŋ s’ok es ɛtŋ s’us’ŋ jam. Kɔ ɛy ec’a, ayaf ow b’ow ɛcr ab ee?"

Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: lɛgŋ a eke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow sig es in ec’anygbɛl ec’atufu lɛkpn af, ɛb owr ab ɛm yogŋ a, ɔny lɛw yony a ek’usr’m jam a, ɔny yɛji b’ow sigr es atufu mɛkpn af, ke jɛ́jr Israɛl ec’eb lɛw yony a ec’ów okr.

Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’igŋ ɛl ec’akŋ oglog ɛl lisijimɛl oglog ɛl lisijɔwɛl, ɛl ɛsɛl, ɛl lisɛl, ɛl ec’ey, ɛl e sɔgm ok es, ɛm e nin a sosiɛm a, -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn sakp ekŋ yen ok af ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
Kɔ agŋ nɔnɔ a eke caca ɛm el ánymu a, b’ow el ajamu ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ a eke caca ɛm el ajamu a, b’ow el ánymu."
"Tasi ɛm a, kin elel eke Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋn: gbreŋgbi nyam ɛy ɔkm ibribr fafa eke k’eb juma kok ɛsɛl in e viny ɔgm a eci, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋn.
Nɛny okr ɛl af juma kok ɛsɛl ab ab os nyam, ek’el lɛgŋ nyam e labm sɔg eci, ɛtŋ l’ot wɛl n’im in ec’ɔgm a.
Wanci libarm ɛm a, l’ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ l’ɛkn bɛb ek’anŋ ɛbɛrŋ ɛm ke ɔnym low kaka eke ki kok.
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ɔny yɛji ìmn ɛm ec’ɔgm a kokr juma, m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny labm sɔg ek’it a,'
ɛtŋ -n’im ɔgm a. Lɛgŋ b’uyu nuŋ, ɛmɛny ɔgm ɛs a ɛy ɔkm ot agŋ ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ncebles eci wanci nyahan ɛm yɛji, l’ɛy ɔkm li kok ɛbɛn.
Sica ncebles eci wanci yen ɛm a, l’ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’ɛkn agŋ ɛjeci ek’anŋ ɛbɛrŋ ɛm yogŋ. L’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: 'Kɔ bla ɛtŋ lɛgŋ mum a b’anŋn ɔfr ɔfr nɛnɛ ee?'
-Li dad ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ kaka ebm ɛy juma.' Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ek’ow el ɛbɛn, ke ɔny yɛji, ìmn ɛm eci viny ɔgm a kokr juma.'
Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, ɔgm ɛs a dad in ec’ob awl ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛ̀sŋ juma kok ɛsɛl a ke sɔ́g ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e labm a. B’ow ɔb nuŋ ajamu ab ɛm toŋ ke úwar ánymu ab ɛm.'
Agŋ a ek’ɔb juma nuŋ ncebles eci wanci yen ɛm a ow, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛŋn in ec’os nyam a.
Eke sica ow igŋ agŋ a eke wɛl ikŋ anym eb a ogŋ a, -li tutr eke -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn ow afŋ es; gbɛkɔ ɛl yɛji, wɛl ɔŋ ɛl ɛgŋ ɛgŋ os nyam.
Os a ec’eb ɛm a, -n’am ɛny abr -l’ok ɔgm ɛs ab af
-li dad -l’ɛsɛ: 'Juma kok ɛsɛl amua eke wɛl anŋ jam eb a, wanci nyam eci juma cɛ -li kok ɛtŋ sɔg ɛl labm ɛsɛ ɛy eke lɛgŋ mum a s’ij gbre ligbn kpaŋ kpaŋ na ɛm ab af!'
Gbɛkɔ ɔgm ɛs a dad ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ninɛ: 'Lawl, mi kokm ɛnyɛmbri yony owi ŋ e lís. Nɛny okr ɛy af os nyam ek’el lɛgŋ nyam juma eci, kɔ yadŋ ee?
Èb ŋ e labm sɔg a ke ím. M’erur eke ɛgŋ na eke wɛl anŋ jam eb a, m’ɔ́ŋ’n os a ɛsɛ ŋ ec’ab af.
Kɔ m’ɔnym abusu eke ɛm ec’os a, mi ki kokr low yec’eke m’erur ab ee? Kɔ ɛm ec’ɛrm mamn a e low a, nyamn ɛyr ow am ɔny’ŋ ee?' "
Ɛtŋ sica Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Agŋ ek’el ajamu a b’ow el ánymu, ɛtŋ agŋ ek’el ánymu a, b’ow el ajamu."
Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab am uyu im Jerusalɛm. Es an im ɛm a, l’ot jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ab n’im saw ɛm, ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ:
"Ìsr any ɛkan, kin Jerusalɛm anake s’am uyu s’im a; yogŋ, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ɛy egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lel ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab ec’abu ɛm. -Li b’ow -l’ɔb ow low luw eci,
ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’oc ow -n’ɔŋ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke ki kokr’r miyɛr, ɔr’r say ɛm, ɛw’r olikŋ af luw eci. Eke ow b’ow kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, li b’ow l’igb luw ɛm."
Sica Sebede ec’ey yony a ec’ɛl lis a ow titm Jesu, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ow ec’any af ɛtŋ n’am ibrm ow ob.
Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ bla low iy am erur ee?" Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋ eb eke ɛm ec’ey yony amua b’ow ok es susu amamn lɛgŋ eke b’ow eb ŋ ec’ɛb eb e lɛkpn a; nyam ánŋ lidr ogog ke nyam ánŋ nɛmn ogog."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low yec’a ek’am ibrmn a, k’uwmn any. Kɔ ɔtur eke k’ɛgŋn gbre eci mij kpɔk a eke m’ow m’ɛgŋ ab ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, s’ɔtu."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Tasi ɛm a, b’ow ɛgŋn ɛm e mij kpɔk a. Gbɛkɔ ɛm e lidr abu af ec’es sig a, lele nɛmn abu af ec’ab ab a, ow elm ɛm m’ɔɔm ɛgŋ; susu amua, ɛm Ɛs kok agŋ a eke li bɛbm sos a eci."
Eke jam ɛsɛl agŋ lɛw a iri low na a, -l’ebl ɛrm -l’ok agŋ lisijimɛl yony ab af.
Ow sosiɛm Jesu ɛsŋ ɛl fɛŋ ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛkan ɛb ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a, -li b’ɛw ɛb ab es abusu ɔny ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ any ɛsɛl ek’anŋ a b’ɛlu ɛl ec’abusu ɔny a ɔkm dedeku a e nuŋ af.
Gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’araŋn ec’a, ow k’ɛ́cr ɛbɛn. Eke batŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am erur e k’el ɔny ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ke l’él ɔny a fɛŋ ec’ob oc ɔŋ ɛs;
ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am erur eke k’el ɔny ec’anymu a, ke l’él ɔny a fɛŋ ec’adu.
Ɛbɛn nyam coco ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji owm ek’agŋ ki kok in e lís e low, kɔ l’ow eke li ki kok agŋ e lís e low, ke l’óc in e sel a l’ɛw awoba li sɔgr agŋ nɔnɔ."
Eke -l’okr ɔkm Jeriko a, agŋ nɔnɔ am us Jesu jam.
Kpɛkŋ kin, ány eflu yony eke sig es ejagb saw, -l’iri eke Jesu am ɛc. -N’am ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, David e lilaw, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
Dedeku a am ɛnym ɛl abr eke -li ki yewal, gbɛkɔ ca -n’am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, David e lilaw, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
Jesu inym es ɛtŋ ɛsŋ ɛl am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla low iy am erurir eke mi ki kok m’ɔŋ ɔny ee?"
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kòk ke ɛy ec’anyamn a ɛ́kn es."
Ɛl e low ɔny Jesu sɔrŋ ɛtŋ l’itŋn wɛl ec’anyamn a abu; kpɛkŋ agŋ a yony mum am ɛkn es, ɛtŋ -n’am us Jesu jam.
Sica Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab im titm Jerusalɛm. Eke -li titmn Bɛtfaje baŋn, Olivie lafɛny af a, Jesu ɛrm jam ɛsɛl yony.
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn baŋn a ek’anŋ ɔny any af ab ɛm; kpɛkŋ yogŋ b’ow ɛŋan gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋ yɔw nyam eke wɛl ucur es ke in e liy a anŋ in ab. Mɔ̀mun in es otr ɛl isr’m.
Eke batŋ ɛgŋ b’ibrm ɔny low, dàdr ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl a ɔny ow ec’es abur.' Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl b’ow ɛlu ɛl es ɔŋ ɔny."
Low na ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs eci sodad amua eke dad a íy nɛny:
Dàdr Siɔn ec’agŋ a: kin ɔny ec’ɛb ebu a am ow ɔny ogŋ a frɔrɔ ɛm, l’uyu gbaŋkɔ yɔw lele in e liy ab af.
