Ɛgŋ mamn, in ɛm ec’ów amamn eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nuŋ, in ɛm ec’ów eŋuŋ eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a. Low yec’a ek’iy ɛgŋ ec’ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ a anake nɛny bi dad ɛlu ɔkm a."
"Kɔ bla ɛtŋ b’ɛsŋn’m 'Ɛgŋ Gbɛl, Ɛgŋ Gbɛl' ɛtŋ am kokmn yec’a eke mi bi dad ɔny ab ee?
Ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛm ogŋ iri ɛm ec’odad, ke b’ucu ɔny es kok a, m’am ow mi yɛgm ɔny ob eke li b’ot es a:
n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyam ek’am us êl af, l’agbr nɔmu im wus ɛm kpekpe ɛtŋ li sigm in ec’êl ab es lebn af. Eke mij iy am ewl igŋ êl a, êl a ɛym wus aŋke ɛgŋ na us’r l’akpl.

Kɔ ɛgŋ eke am iri ɛm ec’odad a ke úcum ɔnym es kokm ɛsɛ elel eke n’am iri ab af a, anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyam ek’am us êl sɛc af ke agbrm nɔmu yɛji af. Eke mij iy am ewl igŋ êl a, kpɛkŋ êl a ɛy wus gbruu bubm es nimum!"
Eke Jesu dad agŋ a odad bake ow uwr a, n’im Kapɛrnayum.
Yogŋ, Rom eci srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs nyam ɔny in e juma kok ɛs nyam eke l’erur nɔnɔ; ɛtŋ juma kok ɛs a ɔl am ɔny toŋ batŋ am ow uw.
Eke l’iri wɛl dad’r Jesu e low a, l’ɛrm Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp bɛb im am ɛsŋ’n eke li k’ow l’ewlm in e juma kok ɛs a.
-N’im -n’ɛŋn ow ɛtŋ -n’am ŋɔŋn ow atrm ɛm -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na ek’ɛrm ɛy a it eke k’ɛŋn in ec’abu ɛlum.
L’erur ɛy ec’ɛb na ɛtŋ in anake n’ɔŋ ke wɛl us ɛy e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a."

Eke Jwifɛl a dad ów amua ok Jesu a, l’ɛgŋ ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’aam wɛl ab. Ow anŋ tɛl ke -l’ok gbugŋ, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny anym ɛs a ɛrm lawlɛl eke k’im dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛs ow ɛs dad’ŋ eke ŋ k’ìjr sos gbre ŋ k’ow yɛji, kɔ in itm eke ŋ k’ɛy in e gbugŋ a;
na sosiɛm anake in igbm in obi in owm toŋ bake in ɛŋn’ŋ a. Kɔ ŋ dád odad ebl nyam cɛ, ke kpɛkŋ in e juma kok ɛs a in b’ow in ewl.

In obi yɛji in anŋ abusu ɛsɛl ekpekp ec’ew, ɛtŋ in ɔny srɔda eyŋ eke in ɛw es. Eke in bi dad nyam in ɛsɛ: 'Ìm!', kpɛkŋ ow’n b’im; in bi dad ɛjeci in ɛsɛ: 'Òw!', kpɛkŋ ow’n b’ow; ɛtŋ eke in bi dad in e juma kok ɛs in ɛsɛ: 'Kòk low na!', kpɛkŋ ow’n bi kok low a."
Eke Jesu iri sodad amua eke wɛl ow dad’r a, l’erur anym ɛs a e low. Sica l’ɛwl mɛny n’am dad agŋ a ek’am us’r jam a l’ɛsɛ: "M’am dad ɔny, m’ɛŋnm ɔmn ɛs nɛnɛ kaka Israɛl eyŋ ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji."
Agŋ a eke wɛl ɛrm a ɛwl mɛny im anym ɛs a e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn eke juma kok ɛs a ewl.
Eke low na ɛc a, Jesu aam baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Nayin; ɛtŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a lele agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ab am us’r jam.
Eke n’am titm baŋn ec’ɛm ɛy usu a, wɛl oc ɛgŋ nyam ek’uw a aam oc es ɛtŋ baŋn a ec’agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl yɛji aam ɛl ab. Ow el iŋnyɔw nyam ec’iy ekpɔbi.
Eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛkn yɔw a, ow e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "K’ìkŋ ɔŋn!"
Kpɛkŋ li tat n’im l’itŋn lɛblakp a abu, ɛtŋ agŋ a inym es. Li dad ninɛ: "Ŋgbafrɛli, m’am dad’ŋ, ìgb!"
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’uw a igb inym es ɛtŋ am dad odad. Ɛtŋ Jesu dad lis ninɛ: "Kin ŋ ec’iy a."
Agŋ a fɛŋ erŋn am ɔny ɛtŋ am kɔklm Nyam dad ɛsɛ: " Kokoba ɔb ɛs ligbɛl nyam ɛy ɔkm ɛy ɛm! Nyam ow am ɛlum in ec’agŋ abu!"
Ɛtŋ Jude wus ab af lele baŋn a fɛŋ eke ɛlulil ɛm ab ab iri low a eke Jesu kok a.
Jan e jam ɛsɛl a im dad ów a fɛŋ eke Jesu kok a ok Jan. L’ɛsŋ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ yony,
ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ eke -li k’ibrm ow eke ow el Mesi a eke ow a, oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci -li k’eku.
Eke jam ɛsɛl yony a im ok yogŋ a, -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ɛrm ɛy s’ow eke si k’ibrm’ŋ: 'Kɔ ŋ, ŋ el ɛgŋ a eke ɛl uw any eke in b’ow in ow a, oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci ɛl k’eku ee?' "
Wanci ab af a, Jesu am ewlm agŋ nɔnɔ ek’ɔl akpasu akpasu am ɔny, n’am ogŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ec’ abŋ eŋuŋ; ɛtŋ n’am ɔŋ ány eflu nɔnɔ ɛkn es.

Ɛtŋ li dad agŋ a eke Jan ɛrm a ninɛ: "Ìmn ke dádr Jan low a eke ɛkan ke irir a: ány eflu am ɛkn es, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl am an es, kokobe ɛsɛl yɛji am ewl, ɔ́ru ablu yɛji am iri ów, agŋ ek’uw a yɛji am igb, ɛtŋ wɛl am ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba ok ɔgbɔru.
Ehe él ɛgŋ a eke k’ow irmnm in ec’ɔmn eke n’ɔny ɛm ɛm a eci!"
Eke Jan ec’agŋ a ek’ɛrm a ɛwl mɛny im a, Jesu oc Jan e lís e low am ibrm agŋ a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ loj yogŋ bla imn eke k’ɛkan ee? Kɔ ɛgŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ anany eke lɛf am ɔny mumu af ee? Njaŋ!
Ca eke ow elm ɛbɛn a, ke bla imn ɛkan ee? Ɛgŋ eke sus mob sɛnyn ee? Njaŋ! Agŋ eke bi sus mob sɛnyn sɛnyn íj ɛb a, ɛ́b ebu e gbugŋ -li b’anŋ.
Ɛtŋ ca bla tasi imn ɛkan ee? Kɔ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ee? Ɛɛ, m’am dad ɔny eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɛkan a agb akm kokoba ɔb ɛs.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad Jan e lís e low ninɛ: Kin, m’am ɔŋ ɛm ec’ɛrm ɛs íkŋ’ŋ anym kok ŋ ec’ejagb a."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’am dad ɔny eke agŋ eke wɛl ew ab ɛm, ɛgŋ kaka anm ek’agb akm Jan; kɔ Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ ek’anŋ a e likekli a agb akm’n."
Agŋ nɔnɔ toŋ wus labm eb ɛsɛl bɔbɔ yɛji ek’iri Jesu ec’odad a, uw any eke Nyam e low a nawrɛ, aŋke -l’ɛgŋ Jan ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
Kɔ Farisiɛl lele ol e low any uw ɛsɛl ab ab ɛgŋm Nyam e low eke ki kok ɔŋ ɛl a ebm, aŋke -l’ɛgŋm eke Jan k’ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ m’ɔtu eke mi k’oc mi bɛbmn yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ab ab ee? Bogŋ ec’agŋ -l’ot es ee?
-L’ot etuey ek’anŋ an ɔl usu es ke am dad lebl gege ɛm ɛsɛ: 'S’afl kete ɛj ub eci s’ok ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn eke k’ubr ɛj! S’ɛgŋ sɔrŋ ɛj s’ok ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn okmn sabu ɛrmni ikŋmn ɔŋn!'
Kin Jan ek’ow a, li b’ɛnŋ nɛny, l’ɛ́gŋm mar, ɛtŋ ɔny bi dadr ek’ow’n ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ!
Sica ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ek’ow a, li b’ij ob, li b’ɛgŋ mar, ɛtŋ ɔny cɛ bi dadr eke ɛgŋ ikŋ na, in el ob iju, mar ɛgŋu, wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab e lawl!
Agŋ a eke ɛgŋ Nyam e sɛwr a eb a uw any eke sɛwr a el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam."
Lɛgŋ nyam, Farisi nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ ɛsŋ Jesu eke k’ow ij ob in ab. Jesu ɛgŋ ɛtŋ im ɛy in e gbugŋ a sig es ob ij usu.
Baŋn yogŋ yɔw nyam eke nin uŋ a anŋ. Eke l’iri eke Jesu anŋ ob ij usu Farisi a e gbugŋ a, l’ow yogŋ. N’ɔnym mijey kɔk nyam eke wɛl kok lebn eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ albatr ɛm ab, ke mijey sŋɔsŋɔ iy ɛm gbɔŋ.
L’is es Jesu ec’akr esr n’am ikŋ ɔŋn l’ɔpar ow akr es in e mikŋ ab ɛm, l’oc in e sin nuŋ a n’am tɛtŋ ow es; n’am ɛy ow akr af li joj ow akr, ɛtŋ n’am ok ow mijey a.
Eke Farisi a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, n’am dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Blel igŋ na el kokoba ɔb ɛs tasi ana, ke blel l’úw any eke yɔw na ek’am titŋn in sabu a el yɔw eke nin uŋ."
Kɔ Jesu dad Farisi a ninɛ: "Simɔ, m’ɔny low eke mi ki dad’ŋ." Ɛtŋ Simɔ ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, dàd gɔŋ."
Ɛtŋ l’ub ow nyandrɛ nyam li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ yony abmn os ɛgŋ nyam ogŋ: nyam ij os ekŋ yen yen sakp yen e labm, ɛtŋ nyam a ij os ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab e labm.
Ɛl yony mum -l’ɔtum -li sɔgm labm a, ɛtŋ igŋ a oc ap ɛl. Kɔ ɛl yony na ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ anake b’ow erur igŋ a akm lawl ab ee?"
Ɛtŋ Simɔ ninɛ: "M’am tutr ke ɛgŋ eke wɛl oc in e labm nɔnɔ a ap a." Jesu ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ow tasi anake dad a."

Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ l’ɛwl mɛny l’ɔkŋ yɔw ab any ɛtŋ li dad Simɔ ninɛ: "Kɔ am ɛkn yɔw na! M’ow m’ɛy’ŋ gbugŋ ɛtŋ ɔɔm im mij akr es yɔg eci. Kɔ in, li yɔg’m akr es in e mikŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ li tɛtŋ es in e sin nuŋ ab ɛm.
Eke m’ow a, ɛym im af. Kɔ in, anym ɛtŋ n’am ɛy’m akr af li jój’m akr.
Okm im mun nuŋ, kɔ in l’ok’m mijey akr.
Na sosiɛm m’am dad’ŋ: erur ligbɛl na eke l’ɛlu ɔkm a am yɛgm eke in e sikpl nɔnɔ gbɛl a yɛji wɛl oc ap’r. Kɔ ɛgŋ eke wɛl ap sikpl tɛl a, erur tɛl cɛ li b’ɛlu ɔkm."
Ɛtŋ li dad yɔw a ninɛ: "M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ."
Agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ am ij ob ɛl ab a am dad ɛl ɔfr ɛm ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ na ɛtŋ li k’ap ɛgŋ sikpl ee?"
Kɔ Jesu dad yɔw a ninɛ: "Ŋ ec’ɔmn a eb ɛlu’ŋ es; ìm ɛrm es ɛy ɛm gɔŋ."

Eke na b’ɛc a, Jesu am ɛc baŋn ɛgbɛl ɛm lel ekekey ɛm ab dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn ec’odad. In e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a lel ɔyɔw bɛb eke l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ wɛl e lís ke l’ewlm wɛl ɔl ɛm ab yɛji am us’r jam: Mari Magdala yɔwi a eke ow ɛm l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ lɔbŋ a;
Jana, Erɔd e gbugŋ a ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kusa e yɔw; Susan lele ɔyɔw nɔnɔ gbɛl eke b’is Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab abu ɛlum.
Eke agŋ nɔnɔ anŋ baŋn baŋn am ow Jesu ogŋ, ke sica ɛl fɛŋ -l’asr luku a, li dad wɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ninɛ:
"Lɛgŋ nyam, egb ewl ɛs nyam im ɔgm am ewl egb. Eke n’am ufŋ egb ey ab es a, bɛb ok ebr af: agŋ uyu af ɛtŋ ɔr ow sus ij.
Bɛb ok mebn wus af. Eke egb a ɛli a, -li wɛw es aŋke -n’ɛŋnm sɛc prɔprɔ eke -li k’akpl.
Bɛb ok mirŋ wus af. Kpɛkŋ mirŋ a ɛli ok ɔkm egb amamn ab ab, ɛtŋ ɔny egb amamn a awŋ es.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny bɛb ok wus mamn af. Egb a ɛli ɛtŋ ɔsu ey: nyam ɔsu ey ekŋ yen." Ɛtŋ Jesu igbl lebl ogŋ dad ninɛ: "Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn!"
Eke li dad nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na bake ow uwr a, in e jam ɛsɛl a am ibrm’n odad a e nyandrɛ.

Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny, ɛŋan Nyam eci gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ów a eke lɔl es a ec’any uw. Kɔ agŋ ɛjec’a, ɛl -l’uwmn any. Nyandrɛ ɛm wɛl ki dad yec’ɛtŋ ke -li bi lɛr yɛji -li k’ɛknmn; -li b’iri yɛji -li k’uwmn any."
"Kin odad a e nyandrɛ: egb a el Nyam ec’odad.
Ebr ab af a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam odad, ke agn b’ɔny odad a oc es ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ubmn nawrɛ bake -n’ɛŋn sel.
Mebn wus a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri odad a ke b’eb’r sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a, kɔ ow ókm min ɛl ɛm. -L’ubmn nawrɛ ow ibnm, ɛtŋ eke -li b’ɔbr gbre a -li bi digŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a -l’ɛlu es.
Wus a eke mirŋ nɔnɔ anŋ af ke egb a ok af a, el agŋ a eke b’iri odad a ke b’ebr wus na ec’owr anŋ ec’ɛrmij a, b’ɔl ob ɔny lel ɛb ij owi ab es a. Ów amua na b’ɔny awŋ ɛl es, ɛtŋ -li kokmn ów amamn.
Wus mamn a el agŋ eke b’iri odad a ke b’eb ɛw es ɛl ec’ɛrm tasi ab ɛm a; -li b’ij nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛtŋ -li bi kok ów amamn."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ígŋm kɛniɛ uburm es lɔfu ew, oglog kofa ew. Kɔ b’igŋ kɛniɛ a, ke ítm es ob es itm ob af, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ eke b’ok akŋ a ám ɛkn usuayl a.
Low eke lɔl es agŋ ɛ́knm a, -li b’ow -l’ɛkn; ɛtŋ low eke agŋ úwm any a, -li b’ow -l’uw any ke -l’iri yɛji.
Na sosiɛm, ɛ̀wr ɛrm elel eke am iririr ab ɛm! Aŋke ɛgŋ ek’iri odad a ke ucu ɔny es a, Nyam b’ow obn’n; kɔ ɛgŋ ek’irim kaka a, tɛl a eke n’am tutr eke l’iri a yɛji, wɛl b’ow ɔny oc’r es ɛrm af."
Jesu lis lele lisijimɛl ab ow ok yogŋ a eke Jesu anŋ a, kɔ -l’ɔtum eke -li k’im bake -li titm ow bieku a sosiɛm.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a am dad Jesu ɛsɛ: "Kin esŋ lele esŋ jimɛl ab ek’ow inym es gbeŋ. -N’am erur eke -li k’ɛkn’ŋ."
Kɔ Jesu dad agŋ a fɛŋ ninɛ: "Ɛm lis lele ɛm lisijimɛl ab a el agŋ a eke am iri Nyam ec’odad ke am ɛlum a."
Lɛgŋ nyam Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ok mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "S’úbr mij lekpl na e jam a!" Ɛtŋ -l’ok lɛtŋ ab ɛm -n’aam.
Eke -n’am ɔr mij -n’im a, Jesu am ɛru mɛmn. Kpru ɛm lidgbegb ligbɛl nyam igb mij lekpl ab af, ɛtŋ mij am ok ɛl lɛtŋ ɛm toŋ batŋ ow am iy, ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a anŋ ɛrmij ɛm.
-N’im -n’am uwr Jesu ɛtŋ -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛgŋ gbɛl, s’am uw!" Jesu ufŋm es ɛtŋ dad lidgbegb a lele mra ab ab odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛtŋ -l’adr. Ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ irm es tiŋ.

Sica l’ibrm in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Bogŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn ab a ee?" Kɔ erŋn am ɔny ɛl, low iti ɛl any ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ el ɛgŋ na ee? Li bi dad lɛf lele mij ab odad, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ɛlum’n!"
Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ubr mij lekpl a jam. Ca -n’im -l’ok Geraseni wus af ek’anŋ Galile any af a.
Eke Jesu anŋ lɛtŋ ɛm us es wus a, baŋn a ec’ɛgŋ nyam am ow ɔbr’r. Ɛgŋ a abŋ eŋuŋ b’ijr’r gbre. Lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ li b’anŋ sos ɔfr; n’ánm akŋ kɔ suwɔmu ɛm ɔfr li b’anŋ.
Eke li b’ɛkn Jesu a, li barm ɛtŋ l’ɛy l’ubu es ow ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am dad odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu, Nyam ek’anŋ afr kpekpe ec’Iy, kɔ bla lowi anŋ ɛy araŋn ee? M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, k’ìjr’m gbre!"

N’am dad ɛbɛn aŋke Jesu am ogŋ abŋ ŋuŋ a eke k’ɛy ɔkm in ɛm. Sakp nɔnɔ, eke abŋ akpasu na b’ɛy’r af a, wɛl b’awŋ’n akr lele sabu ab ŋgbraka ɛm am ɔsu’r. Kɔ li bi dɛdŋ ŋgbraka ab es, ɛtŋ abŋ a b’oc ɛlu’l loj n’am adŋ es.
Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ ayaf wɛl b’ɛsŋn’ŋ ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm e nin el 'Bubutɛ' " (eke abŋ eŋuŋ nɔnɔ anŋ’n ɛm a sosiɛm).
Ɛtŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a am ŋɔŋn Jesu dad ɛsɛ: "K’ògŋ ɛy si k’im si k’ok nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm."
Lafɛny nyam anŋ yogŋ eke gbroko nɔnɔ anŋ af am ij ob. Abŋ eŋuŋ a am ŋɔŋn Jesu eke ow k’ɔ́ŋ ɛl abusu -n’im -l’ok sigbroko ab ɛm, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu.
Abŋ eŋuŋ a ok ɔkm igŋ ab ɛm im ok sigbroko ab ɛm, ɛtŋ gbroko a fɛŋ anŋ lafɛny ab af uru es im ok mij lekpl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -n’ɛmn.
Eke agŋ a ek’am ɔsu sigbroko a b’ɛkn low na ek’ɛy a, -l’uru es -n’im -l’ɔb amani -l’ok baŋn a lele sikpukpu ɛm ab ab ec’agŋ a.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’iri low na ek’ɛy a ok ɔkm aam ɛkn. -L’ow -n’ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn igŋ a eke abŋ eŋuŋ anŋ ɛm ok ɔkm a eke sus mob sig es Jesu saw, ke nuŋ ɛm ayal. Ɛtŋ agŋ a erŋn am ɔny.
Agŋ ek’ɛkn low na a am dad ɛl elel eke abŋ eŋuŋ ɛs a ewl a.
Ɛtŋ Geraseni eyŋ a ow nɔnɔ am dad Jesu eke k’ŋgboŋ ɛl e wus ab af, eke erŋn am ɔny ɛl a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛy lɛtŋ ɛm eke k’im.
Sica igŋ a eke l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ ok ɔkm in ɛm a am ŋɔŋn’n eke li k’anŋ ow ab. Kɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ:
"Ɛ̀wl mɛny im gbugŋ ke ɔ́b low a eke Nyam kok’ŋ a ec’amani ok agŋ." Igŋ a ɛwl im ɛtŋ am dad baŋn a nimum ec’agŋ a, low a eke Jesu kok ɔŋ’n a e low.
Eke Jesu anŋ mij jam a ow a, agŋ a ek’im am eku’r a eb’r.
Igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jayirus ow ɛŋn’n; l’el Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam. L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn ow eke ow k’ow in ogŋ a,
aŋke n’ɔny iy yɔwli ekpɔbi ek’ij akpo lɛw yony ke am uw. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Jesu igb aam yogŋ. Eke n’aam a, agŋ nɔnɔ iwr ɛlul il ɛm am atr’r sel.
Yogŋ, yɔw nyam eke b’ub abu ke mebl a ɛ́dŋm es toŋ ow ij akpo lɛw yony a anŋ. Ni ŋuŋn in ec’ob eke n’ɔny a sos kok ɛsɛl ogŋ, kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum ewlam’n.
L’ɛcr jam jam eci l’ow li titm Jesu ɛtŋ l’itŋn ow e mob sus ɛm a eci ɛnyɛmbri a abu, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ mebl a ek’am ok’r a ɛdŋ es.
Jesu ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ bwo itŋn’m abu ee?" Ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -n’am dad eke ɛl ɛknm. Kɔ Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ ɛ́knm bieku na ek’iwr did ɛlul’ŋ ɛm am atr’ŋ sel ab ee?"
Kɔ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, ɛgŋ ɛkn piy ɛtŋ itŋn’m abu, aŋke m’ɛkn eke lɛc nyam ɛy ɔkm ɛm ɛm."
Yɔw a b’ɛkn eke low a lɔlm es a, sos ufŋ ɛm l’ow l’ɛy Jesu ec’akr af a, ɛtŋ li dad agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af low a sosiɛm eke l’itŋn ow abu, ke kpɛkŋ l’ewl a.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad yɔw a ninɛ: "Ɛm jɔw, ŋ ec’ɔmn a ewlm’ŋ! Ìm ɛrm es ɛy ɛm."
Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym am dad, ɛtŋ wɛl ɛrm ɛgŋ nyam anŋ Jayirus ogŋ a ow. N’am dad ow l’ɛsɛ: "Ejɔŋ uw! K’ìjr low yɛgm agŋ ɛs gbre ɔfr ɔfr."
Eke Jesu b’iri ɛbɛn a, li dad Jayirus ninɛ: "K’ùru erŋn, kɔ ɔ̀ny ɔmn sɔny coco cɛ; li b’ow l’igb."
Eke n’im l’ɛy gbugŋ a, n’ɔɔm ɛgŋ kaka abusu eke k’ɛy akŋ a in ab, ek’ow elm Piɛr, Jan, Jak, lele iy ɛs a lele iy lis ab cɛ.
Agŋ a fɛŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn ok sabu ɛrmni iy a sosiɛm. Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "K’ìkŋn ɔŋn! Dedyɔwli a l’uwm kɔ mɛmn n’am ɛru."
Kɔ eke Jesu dad ɛbɛn a, -n’am kokr ow miyɛr aŋke -l’uw any eke dedyɔwli a uw.
Kɔ Jesu im ucu iy a abu ɔny ɛtŋ dad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Dedyɔwli, ìgb wus!"
Dedyɔwli a ɛwl anŋ owr ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ igb wus. Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔ̀ŋn in ob l’íj."
Iy ɛs a lele iy lis ab ab low iti any, kɔ Jesu ɛdŋn ɛl eke -li ki dadmn low a ek’ɛy a -l’okmn ɛgŋ kaka.
Lɛgŋ nyam Jesu as in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a luku, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu lele lɛc ab eke -li k’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ fɛŋ ke -l’ewlm ɔl ɛsɛl.
Ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl eke -li k’im -li dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad, ke -l’ewlm ɔ́lu.
N’ɔm wɛl ów ninɛ: "K’òcr usu im ec’ob kaka k’ɔnymn ab: kpama, ekpr, ob ij, os yɛji. Ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ócm mob sus ɛm ɛjeci akrm af.
Usu fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ow eb ɔny a, ànŋn gbugŋ a cɛ toŋ bake ŋ́gbroŋn yogŋ a.
Usu fɛŋ eke agŋ k’ow ɛgŋm ebm ɔny a, ̀ŋ̀gbroŋn ɛl ec’ɛb ab ɛm, ke cícr ɔny ec’akr sɛc a okr ɛl es. Na b’ow ij ɛl e nuŋ af e daŋku Nyam ec’any af."
Jam ɛsɛl a im ɛtŋ am ɛc baŋn baŋn fɛŋ dad Amani Mamn a ec’odad, ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ -n’am ewlm ɔ́lu.

Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Erɔd Antipas ek’el Galile wus af ec’es ɛw ɛs a iri wɛl am dad ów a ek’am ɛy a ec’amani. Ɛtŋ l’úwm elel eke li ki dadr any, aŋke agŋ bɛb am dad ɛsɛ Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ek’in uw a, in igb luw ɛm.
Agŋ oglog am dad eke ow’n b’ow in el kokoba ɔb ɛs Eli anake in ɛwl in ow a. Ɛtŋ bɛb am dad eke ow’n b’ow in el godo godo e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a e nyam anake in igb luw ɛm a.
Kɔ Erɔd am tutr ów dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ m’ubr Jan nuŋ es; ɛtŋ bogŋ ec’ɛgŋ anake m’am iri in e lís ec’ów ab ee?" Ɛtŋ n’am ɔl eke li k’ɛkn Jesu.
Eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a ɛwl mɛny ow a, -n’am dad Jesu ów a fɛŋ eke -li kokr a e low. Ɛtŋ Jesu ot ɛl ab im baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Bɛtsayida e saw eke -li k’anŋ ɛl sɔny.
Kɔ eke -l’okr yogŋ a, agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl uw any ɛtŋ am us’r jam im. Jesu eb ɛl ɛtŋ am dad ɛl Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a e low ɛtŋ n’am ewlm ɔ́lu a ek’am ibrm eke k’ewl a.

Eke lɛgŋ am ew es a, jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òk bieku ab es ím baŋn baŋn lele sikpukpu ɛm ab yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɛŋn ob ij lele es ɛru usu ab, aŋke aŋa eke s’anŋ a el usu saw ɛm."
Kɔ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny obi, ɔ̀ŋn ɛl ob -l’ij!" Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a ɔdu eb ninɛ: "Futufutu yen lele ɔcn yony ab cɛ s’ɔnym ab. Kɔ erur eke si k’im s’ɔl ob ij ɛbm agŋ nɔnɔ na ee?"
(Agŋ egŋ ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm yogŋ a ɔtu ek’ij agŋ fandi yen). Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl ninɛ: "Dàdr ɛl -l’ok es eku eku ɛm ek’ɔtu eke k’ij agŋ ekŋ yony lele lɛw lɛw ab."
Jam ɛsɛl a ɛlum ɛtŋ ɔŋ ɛl -l’ok es ɛbɛn.
Jesu oc futufutu yen a lele ɔcn yony ab ab igbl any ogŋ afr, ɛtŋ ɛlu Nyam bia. Li bubr ɛm n’ɔŋ in jam ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ -li cɛc -n’ɔŋ bieku a.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ij ob a lok iy, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ow wal es. Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a ot ekpr a eke wal es a as luku, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu lɛw yony.
Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu ocr sos es im Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm; jam ɛsɛl a yɛji im in ab. N’am ibrm wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf agŋ a bi dadr ɛm e lís ee?"
-L’ɔdu -l’eb -li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ bɛb bi dad eke ŋ Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs. Agŋ oglog b’ɛsɛ ŋ Eli. Ɛtŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ ŋ godo godo e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam eke in igb luw ɛm."
Eke -li dadr ɛbɛn a, Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ kɔ ɔny obi ɔny obi a ayaf b’ocar’m ee?" Ɛtŋ Piɛr ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ŋ el Nyam e Mesi!"
Eke Piɛr dad ɛbɛn a, Jesu ijl ɛl nɛny kpoŋ kpoŋ kpoŋ ninɛ: "Kì dadr low na k’okr ɛgŋ kaka."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li dad ninɛ: "Ow it ek’ɛgŋ ec’ Iy k’ij gbre nɔnɔ, ke agŋ ekpekp, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl, lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ígŋ ɛlu’l es, ɔ́ŋ wɛl ibi’r ke sɛgŋ nyahan l’ígb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm."
Ɛtŋ li dad agŋ a fɛŋ ninɛ: "Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am erur eke k’us’m jam a, ow it ke li kí tutrm in e lís owi, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ l’ábu in obi ec’olikŋ a, ke l’ús’m jam.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow erur eke ki dogŋn in e sel a b’ow irmn. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow irmn in e sel a b’ow ɛŋn.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny wus ec’ob a fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’irmn in e sel a, ke bla ow b’ow eel il ab ee?
Ek’ɛgŋ ɛ́s b’ɔny ɛm sosiɛm lele ɛm ec’odad ab ec’a, ɛbɛn ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji ɛ́s b’ow ɔny in e lís, lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ow in ec’anygbɛl ɛm a, anygbɛl ek’el Ɛs lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala ab eci.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ a eke anŋ aŋa a e bɛb b’ow ɛkn Nyam ec’ es ɛw a gbuŋ ke -l’uw."
Eke ow ij sɛgŋ niwn eke li dad odad na a, Jesu uyu lafɛny nyam af, in lele Piɛr, Jan lele Jak ab eke li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam.
Eke n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam a, in ec’any a itŋn ɛtŋ in e mob sus ɛm a yɛji ufu toŋ am jɛjn.
Kpɛkŋ agŋ yony ok ɔkm am dad ów Jesu ab: ow el Mois lele Eli ab eke anŋ Nyam ec’usuayl ek’am jɛjn ab ɛm okm sos ɔkm. -N’am dad elel eke Jesu b’ow uw Jerusalɛm, ke ow ɛm in e juma b’ow iy nɛny a.
Low na ek’am ɛy a, Piɛr lele lawlɛl ab ab mɛmn ibi. Eke any b’ok ɛl es a, -l’ɛkn Jesu ek’anŋ Nyam ec’usuayl ab ɛm lele agŋ yony eke inym es ab.
Eke agŋ a k’ɛlu Jesu es im a, Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ow akpl eke si k’anŋ aŋa! S’ús nuŋ igŋ usu nyahan: ŋ e nyam, Mois e nyam lele Eli e nyam ab." (Odad cɛ ek’ɛy’r nɛnym ke li dad.)
Eke n’am dad odad ɛbɛn a, kpɛkŋ jru ɛy ɛtŋ ubur ɛl fɛŋ es. Eke -l’ɛkan jru na ow am ubur ɛl es a, jam ɛsɛl a erŋn am ɔny.
Ɛtŋ lebl nyam anŋ jru ab ɛm am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na el ɛm ec’Iy eke mi sɔsum m’oc. Ìrir in e low!"
Eke lebl a ikŋ dad odad na bake ok es a, jam ɛsɛl a ɛkn Jesu sɔny coco eke inym es. Low na eke jam ɛsɛl a iri ke ɛkn a, lɛgŋ ab ɛm a -li dadm -l’okm ɛgŋ kaka.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab anŋ lafɛny ab af us es ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ow am ɔbr’r.
Bieku ab ɛm yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam am ɛlu lebl ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, ìs any lɛr ɛm ec’iy na, l’el ɛm ec’iy igŋ ekpɔbi!
Abŋ ŋuŋ a b’ɛy’r ɛm a ke n’am ɔg, ow ám ɔny ufŋ’n lɛc ɛm ke sar ám ifl’l nɛny. Ow b’ijr’r gbre toŋ bake sos kikn’n es gbuŋ ke ow ɛ́lu’l es.
Mi dad ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a ow ek’ogŋ abŋ ikŋ na, kɔ -l’ɔtum."

Eke igŋ a dad ɛbɛn a, Jesu igbl lebl ogŋ dad agŋ a fɛŋ ninɛ: "Wew! Ɔny eel agŋ eŋuŋ eke ɔmn anm ɛm tasi! Ɛmɛny sɛgŋ abi m’it eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab ee? Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sakp abi ow it eke mi k’ɛgŋ low na m’eb ee?" Ɛtŋ ca li dad iy ɛs a ninɛ: "Òc ŋ ec’iy a ow aŋa!"
Eke iy a am ow titm’n a, abŋ a ɔny ɛlu’l wus ɛtŋ am ɔny ufŋ’n lɛc ɛm. Kɔ Jesu dad odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ogŋ abŋ ŋuŋ a, ewlm iy a, ɛtŋ l’oc n’ɔŋ ow ɛs.
Low na ek’ɛy ɛbɛn a, ow iti agŋ a fɛŋ any, Nyam ec’abusu ligbɛl na ek’ɛy ɔkm a sosiɛm. Ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ low am iti any Jesu e low na eke kok a sosiɛm a, li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ:
"Low na eke ca m’am ow mi dad ɔny a, ùcur ɔnyn es: wɛl b’ow ɔny ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɛlu agŋ abu ɛm."
Kɔ -l’irim odad a okm ɛl es sos ɛm, aŋke Nyam lɔl odad na e nyandrɛ ab es yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’uwmn any; ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -n’am uru eke -li k’ibrm Jesu low na ec’akr otar a.
Sica jam ɛsɛl a am atar ów es eke k’uw ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ eke k’el ɛl ec’anymu ab any.
Kɔ Jesu uw ɛl e tutr ab any. L’ɛsŋ iyli nyam ow inym’n es saw,

ɛtŋ li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ek’eb iyli na ɛm sosiɛm a, ke ɛm anake l’eb’m a; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’eb’m a, eb ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm im a yɛji. Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’el ɔny ɛm e likekli a, in ana l’agb l’akm ɔny a."
Eke Jesu dad ɛbɛn a, Jan ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, s’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam eke oc ŋ e nin a am kokr juma ogŋn abŋ eŋuŋ. S’ɛdŋn in, eke l’elm ɛy ec’ɛgŋ a sosiɛm."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́dŋn in, aŋke ɛgŋ eke ifnm ɔny a el ɔny eci."
Eke sɛgŋ a eke Jesu k’uyu afr a ow titm a, ca li bɛbm tasi eke li k’im Jerusalɛm.
L’ɛrm agŋ ikŋ’n anym. Eke ɛ́rmu a us ejagb a, -n’im -l’ok Samari eyŋ e baŋn nyam eke -li ki bɛbm ow e lís e low.
Kɔ ɛb eyŋ a erurm eke k’eb’r aŋke -l’erurmn eke Jwifɛl k’ɛcr ɛl ogŋ a eci im Jerusalɛm.
Eke jam ɛsɛl Jak lele Jan ab b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ erur eke si k’ɔŋ al anŋ afr ow ɛtul ɛl ee?"
Jesu ɛwl mɛny lɛr ɛl ɛtŋ ɛnym ɛl abr lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm.
Ɛtŋ -n’im baŋn ɛjeci.
Eke -n’anŋn ejagb -n’aam a, ɛgŋ nyam dad Jesu ninɛ: "M’ow m’us’ŋ jam usu fɛŋ eke b’ow im a."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛkrɛ b’ɔny ɛl ec’ɔmu wus ɛm eke b’ɛru ɛm, ɔr yɛji b’ɔny ɛl e mel; kɔ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔnym usu nuŋ nyam ek’ɔtu eke k’ɛru es eb sel."
Ɛmɛny li dad ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam." Kɔ ɛgŋ a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ŋ’m abusu m’ím m’oc ɛm ɛs es gbuŋ ke m’ów."
Kɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɛ̀b agŋ ek’uw abŋ ɛm a ót ɛl ec’agŋ ek’uw ab es; kɔ ŋ, ìm dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad."
Ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ow m’us’ŋ jam; gbɛkɔ yɛ̀b m’ím m’ibrm ɛm e gbugŋ ec’agŋ a abusu gbuŋ ke m’ów."
Kɔ in yɛji Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ eke b’agbr wus, ke b’ɛdŋ mɛny a, akplm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a eci."
Eke na b’ɛc a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu sɔsum jam ɛsɛl ɛjeci ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw yony ab ot. L’ɛrm wɛl yony yony wɛl ikŋ anym im ɛb ɛb ɛm lele susu susu ek’in obi yɛji li b’ow n’im a.
Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Egb ub a ufu es nɔnɔ, kɔ juma kok ɛsɛl ɛnym. Ow sosiɛm, ìbrmn egb ɔgm ɛs a, ke l’ɛ́rm juma kok ɛsɛl nɔnɔ im in ec’egb ub ab ɛm.
Ìmn gɔŋ! M’am ɛrm ɔny ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ey af sibotimbo ec’araŋn.
K’òcr os, ekpr, lele cɔkrukpɔ ab. Eke aamn a, k’ìrmnin lɛgŋ ejagb af k’ɛ̀sŋnin ɛgŋ.
Gbugŋ nyam eke b’ow im okr a, ìkŋn anym dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ke Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a ánŋ gbugŋ na ec’agŋ ab ab!'
Eke yogŋ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ek’erur Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a, ke ɔny ec’ɛrm es ɛy a b’ow anŋ in ab. Eke ɛgŋ nɛnɛ anm a, ɛrm es ɛy a b’ow ɛwl anŋ ɔny ab.
Ànŋn gbugŋ yogŋ ijr ob, ke ɛ́gŋn yec’eke wɛl b’ow ɔŋ ɔny a, aŋke juma kok ɛs it eke k’ɔny in e labm sɔg. K’ɛ̀cr gbugŋ gbugŋ.
Eke b’ɛyr ɛb nyam ɛm ɛtŋ -l’eb ɔny a, ìjr ob yec’eke -li b’ow -n’ɔŋ ɔny a.
Èwlmn ɔ́lu ek’anŋ ɛb ab ɛm a, ke dádr ɛb eyŋ a ɛsrɛ: 'Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ow titm ɔny.'
Kɔ eke b’ɛyr ɛb nyam ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ɛgŋm -l’ebm ɔny a, ɛ̀cr ɛb ab ɛm, ke dádr ɛsrɛ:
'S’am cic ɔny ec’ɛb ab ɛm ec’akr sɛc a s’ók ɔny es. Gbɛkɔ ùwr low na any: Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ow titm ɔny.'
M’am dad ɔny: jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Sodɔm e low ŋuŋ a eke Nyam ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ tɛl akm ɛb na ec’a."

"Korasin ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Bɛtsayida ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke sakrowa a eke wɛl kok ɔny ogŋ a, blel ow el Tir lele Sidɔn ab wɛl kok ana, ke blel -l’ɛw sɔrŋ e sos, -li kpakp milakŋ, -l’ok fandi ɛrm ɛm itŋn eci ow yɛ́gm eke -l’erur eke -li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm.
Na sosiɛm jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Tir lele Sidɔn ab e low ŋuŋ eke Nyam ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ akm ɔny ec’a.
Ɛtŋ ŋ Kapɛrnayum, am tutr eke any ij ɛm b’ow agb toŋ bake ím titm afr ee? Njaŋ, b’ow is es toŋ bake ígŋ ɔŋnes baŋn."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li dad jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ eke b’iri ɔny e low a, iri ɛm e low. Ɛgŋ eke ebm ɔny a, ebm im; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke ebm im a, ebm ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm im a."
Agŋ ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw yony ab ab eke wɛl ɛrm a ɛwl mɛny ow sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke s’im a, abŋ eŋuŋ yɛji ɛlum ɛy ŋ e nin ɛm!"
Jesu ɔdu eb dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’ɛkn Satan ek’anŋ afr ɛy wus ɛsɛ nyam eke b’ɛŋn af.
Kin, m’ɔŋ ɔny abusu eke k’aan es morŋn lele sibɔban ab af, ke ákmn ifnu ec’abusu fɛŋ es; ɛtŋ ob kaka k’ow kokm ɔny.
Ɛbɛn yɛji sos ɛm k’íŋn ɔny eke abŋ eŋuŋ ɛlum ɔny a sosiɛm. Kɔ sos ɛm íŋn ɔny eke afr wɛl nɔn ɔny ec’en a sosiɛm."

Wanci ab af cɛ, Abŋ Lala ɔŋ Jesu sos ɛm am iŋn toŋ batŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, ŋ ek’el afr lele wus ab ec’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a, m’am ɛlu’ŋ bia, ów a ek’ot lɔl es, ɛsɛwru lele nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ab ec’any af, ke yɛgm etuey uw any a eci. Ɛɛ! Ɛm Ɛs, erur ek’ow k’el ɛbɛn.
Ɛm Ɛs ocr in sosi ɛlul’m abu ɛm. Ɛgŋ kaka uwm Iy ab any eke ow elm Ɛs sɔny coco cɛ, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka uwm Ɛs any eke ow elm Iy a sɔny coco cɛ lele agŋ eke Iy a erur eke k’ɛlu ɔkm yɛgm’n ab ab."
Ca Jesu ɛwl sos mɛny ɛtŋ am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a sɔny cɛ ɛsɛ: "Na eke ɛkan a, ehe el ɔny ec’ŋ̂!
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, godo godo e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ lele ɛ́b ebu nɔnɔ ab erur eke k’ɛkn low na ek’am ɛkan a, kɔ -l’ɛknm, iri low na ek’am irir a, kɔ -l’irim."
Ca ol e low any uw ɛs nyam ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ ibrm Jesu ɛbm ɛkn ɛm ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ke m’ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi wɛl nɔn ol ab ɛm ee? Ɛtŋ eke b’awl a, ayaf b’irir ee?"
Li dad ow ninɛ: "B’ow erur Asŋ Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam ŋ eci ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ŋ ec’abŋ fɛŋ ɛm, ŋ e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm, lele ŋ e tutr pupukpaŋ ab; ke érur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af."
Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ow anake dad a. Kòk ɛbɛn cɛ ke b’ow ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr."
Kɔ eke ol e low any uw ɛs a erur eke in e low k’ij low a, li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ ɛjec’ab ee?"
Jesu ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ nyam igb Jerusalɛm am us nuŋ es im Jeriko baŋn ɛtŋ l’ɛy elu abu ɛm. Wɛl ɔr’r, eb’r mob ɛtŋ wɛl digŋ ɛlu’l es im. Ɛtŋ n’anŋ luw lele owr anŋ ab ec’araŋn.
Egb waw ɛs nyam eb ejagb a aam. Eke li b’uyum ow ab a, l’aru l’ɛgb ow es n’im.
Leviɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’eb ejagb a am ow a, ɛkn’n, ɛtŋ in yɛji l’aru l’ɛgb ow es n’im.
Kɔ Samari iy nyam ek’aam usu a, im ok yogŋ. Eke li b’ɛkn ow a, ow e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ.
L’ɛri n’im li titm ow, l’oc mar li yɔyɔg ow abi ab es, l’ok mun ɛm ɛtŋ n’awŋ ow abi ab es. L’oc ow in e gbaŋkɔ ab af, l’oc n’im ow etu eb usu.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, l’oc os yony n’ɔŋ etu eb usu a ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: 'Kòk ɛgŋ na sɛkp sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ek’os a obn a, ɛm e mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm a, m’ow mi sɔg’ŋ fɛŋ.' "
Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ agŋ nyahan amua ɛm a, bwo el ɛgŋ eke elu a ɔr eb mob a e lawl ee?"
Ɛtŋ ol e low any uw ɛs a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a ek’ikŋ’n sɔrŋ a anake el lawl a." Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìm ke ŋ yɛji kók ɛbɛn."
Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab us ejagb aam a, -n’im -l’ok baŋn nyam. Yogŋ yɔw nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mart eb Jesu in e gbugŋ a.
N’ɔny lisijɔw nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mari, ke ow sig es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e saw am iri ow ec’odad a.
Mart eke akŋ e juma kok afŋn es a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ow ám kokm’ŋ low kaka sos ɛm eke ɛm lisijɔw ɛlu’m es ɛm sɔny m’am kok akŋ e juma na ab ee? Dàd’r ke l’ów l’ɛlum im abu."
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: "Mart, Mart, am ebr ɛrmij lul es ów nɔnɔ eci,
kɔ low nyam sɔny coco cɛ akpl: Mari sɔsum yec’a eke akpl a oc, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔtum ebm’n abu ɛm."

Lɛgŋ nyam Jesu im usu nyam am ŋɔŋn Nyam. Eke ni ŋɔŋn Nyam bake ow uwr a, in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, yɛ̀gm ɛy elel eke si ki ŋɔŋan Nyam, ɛsɛ elel eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs yɛgmn in e jam ɛsɛl ab af."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke b’ow ŋɔŋan Nyam a, ke dàdr ɛsrɛ: Ɛs, ke ŋ e nin lala a ɔ́ny ɛlum, ke ŋ ec’es ɛw a ów.
Ɔ̀ŋ ɛy lɛgŋ lɛgŋ ec’ob ij ek’it a.
Àp ɛy e sikpl, eke ɛy yɛji si b’ap agŋ eke bi kok ɛy low ŋuŋ a. Kì yɛb ɛy si k’ɛ̀y ɛbm owi ɛm."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "S’óc low nyam s’ɛbmn: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam im njijm ɛm ɛŋn lawl nyam ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm lawl, àbmn’m futufutu nyahan.
Ɛm lawl nyam ek’ɛc aam usu a ow ɛm ogŋ a, ɛtŋ m’ɔnym ob kaka eke mi k’ɔŋ’n l’ij.'
Ɛtŋ lawl a ek’anŋ akŋ a dad’r ninɛ: 'K’ìjr’m gbre! M’abl êl ŋ̂. Ɛm lele ɛm ec’ey ab s’ɛru es ŋ̂. Mi k’ɔtum m’igbm m’ɔɔm’ŋ futufutu!'
Eke ow el lawl yɛji, li k’ow l’igbm n’ɔɔm ow futufutu a eke ow ibrm a. Kɔ eke n’am at l’ibrm ow a, li b’ow l’igb n’ɔŋ ow ob fɛŋ a eke ow am ibrm’n a, ɛ́s eke k’ɔnym’n a sosiɛm.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, m’am dad ɔny: ìbrmn ob eke erurir a, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny. Ɔ̀ɔl es, ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛŋn’n. Ìcmn lisany abu, ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow fig ɔny.
Kɔ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ibrm ob eke l’erur a, Nyam b’ɔŋ’n; ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɔl ob eke l’erur a es a, Nyam b’ɔŋ n’ɛŋn; ɛtŋ Nyam bi fig ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’icm’n lisany abu a.
Ɔny ɛm aŋa, bwo ec’ɛgŋ el iy ɛs eke jim b’ibrm’n futufutu, ke l’óc lebn n’ɔŋ ow ee? Oglog jim b’ibrm’n ɔcn, ke l’óc lorŋn n’ɔŋ ow ee?
Ɛmɛny ow b’ibrm’n ŋgɔs mbue, ke l’óc bɔban n’ɔŋ ow ee?
Ɔny nana ek’eel agŋ eŋuŋ a b’uwr ob amamn any ɔŋn ɔny ec’ey; ayaf Nyam ek’anŋ afr a k’ow kokm ow afŋm es ee? Agŋ eke am ibrm’n Abŋ Lala a, li b’ow n’ɔŋ wɛl."
Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu am ogŋ abŋ ŋuŋ ek’anŋ igŋ nyam ɛm, ke ow ɔŋ’n l’el ɛbrm. Eke abŋ ŋuŋ a ɛy ɔkm a, ɛbrm a am dad odad ɛtŋ agŋ a low am iti any.
Kɔ agŋ oglog am dad ɛsɛ: " Bɛlsebul ek’el abŋ eŋuŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a anake b’ɔŋ’n abusu l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ amua a!"
Agŋ oglog erur eke k’ɛbm’n odad ebl ɛm. -N’am ibrm eke ow ki kok mɛny ɛwr yɛgm eke ow ec’abusu b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow.
Kɔ Jesu uw ɛl ec’ów tutr ab any, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Es ɛw fɛŋ eke in ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm a b’uŋ; ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam akŋ ek’ubr ɛm a yɛji b’uŋ.
Eke Satan ubr ɛm sakp yony, ke in ec’es ɛw a ɔtu eke k’anŋ ee? Ɔny bi dadr eke Bɛlsebul ec’abusu ɛm m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke ɔny agŋiyɛl ec’a eke b’ogŋ a, kɔ bwo b’ɔŋ ɛl abusu ee? Ɛl obi -n’am yɛgm eke ɔnymn low ij!
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ec’abusu ɛm anake m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a; ow am yɛgm eke Nyam ec’ es ɛw a ow ɔny ec’araŋn ŋ̂.
Eke lɛc ɛs nyam ok ar mob sos am ɔsu in e gbugŋ a, in ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ b’anŋ tiŋ.
Kɔ eke lɛc ɛs ɛjeci nyam ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ akm’n es a, ow b’eb’r ar mob a eke n’am ɔmn a, ke ow eci mob eke l’eb a, li cɛ́c n’ɔŋ agŋ.
Ɛgŋ ek’anm ɛm ab a, el ɛm ec’ifnu; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke ɛ́luam im abu s’asm Nyam ec’ey luku a, am ɔmun ɛl es."

Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ nyam anŋ ɛgŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, li b’anŋ usu wɛwɛ n’am rereb usu a, n’ám ɔl usu eke li k’ir. Eke sica n’ɛ́ŋnm a, ke n’ám dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'Mi b’ow m’ɛwl m’im m’ɛy ɛm ec’akŋ a eke m’anŋ m’ɛy ɔkm a.'
Eke li b’ɛwl mɛny l’ow a, li b’ɛkn eke wɛl apl akŋ ab es ayl, wɛl nyinyimn ow akpl.
Sica li b’ɛwl n’im l’ɛsŋ lawlɛl abŋ eŋuŋ lɔbŋ ek’uŋ akm’n, -li b’okr af -l’ir yogŋ. Ow e jam a, abŋ amua b’ijr ɛgŋ na gbre akm krɛkrɛ ec’a."
Eke Jesu dad odad na ɛbɛn ok es a, yɔw nyam anŋ bieku ab ɛm ɔdu odad eb dad ninɛ: "Ehe el yɔw na eke ew’ŋ ke ɔŋ’ŋ mɛny a eci!"
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ, kɔ ehe tasi el agŋ a ek’am iri Nyam ec’odad ke am ɛlum a eci!"
Eke agŋ a am ow Jesu ogŋ egbekl ɛm a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ amua am ibrm mɛny ɛwr, kɔ wɛl k’ow kokm mɛny ɛwr kaka ɔɔm ɛl, eke ow elm Jonas ec’a cɛ.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛsɛ elel eke Jonas el Ninif baŋn eyŋ e mɛny ɛwr ab af a, ɛbɛn cɛ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji b’ow el yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a e mɛny ɛwr.

Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Seba ec’es ɛw lis a b’ow igb inym es yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke n’anŋ usu kpekpe l’ow yec’ɛtŋ ke l’íri Salomɔ e sɛwr e sodad a. Ɛtŋ kin, ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Salomɔ!
Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Ninif baŋn eyŋ b’ow igb yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a ec’any af ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke eke -l’irir Jonas eci Nyam odad a, -l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm. Ɛtŋ kin, ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Jonas!"
"Ɛgŋ ígŋm kɛniɛ itam es ob ew, kɔ wɛl b’igŋ kɛniɛ a, ob gege af wɛl b’itm es yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ eke b’ok akŋ a ɛ́kn usuayl.
Ŋ ec’anyamn a el ŋ e sos megl a e kɛniɛ: ek’anyamn akpl’ŋ a, ŋ e sos megl a fɛŋ anŋ usuayl ɛm; kɔ ek’anyamn akplm’ŋ a, ke ŋ e sos megl a yɛji anŋ ncebn ɛm ŋ̂.
Na sosiɛm a, ɛ̀w ɛrm ke usuayl ek’anŋ’ŋ ɛm a k’élm ncebn.
Eke ŋ e sos megl ikpr kaka anm ncebn ɛm, ɛtŋ fɛŋ anŋ usuayl ɛm a, sos a nimum b’ow anŋ usuayl ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke kɛniɛ bi jɛjn in ec’usuayl mamn ok’ŋ af ab af."
Eke Jesu dad odad bake ow uwr a, Farisi nyam ɛsŋ’n ob ij. Jesu ɛgŋ ɛtŋ im ɛy akŋ a sig es ob ij usu a in ab.
Gbuŋ ke -l’ij ob a, Jesu yɔgm sabu ɛsɛ elel eke ɛl ec’ol a dad ab af; low na iti Farisi a any.

Kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ uw in ec’ów tutr ab any ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Kin elel eke ɔny Farisiɛl anŋnin: ɔny, b’ɛtŋn mij kpɔk lele nagbeŋ ab eci jam jam ab es; kɔ ɔny e lokm a, ów eŋuŋ b’iy ɛm: b’erurir ob ɔny toŋ él ɔny mil, ɛtŋ bi kokr lokm suŋ owi.
Anyamb agŋ! Kɔ ow elm Nyam a eke kok sos af a kokm lokm a yɛj’ee?
Gbuŋ ke ɔny e low a áyl akpl tasi a, ɔ̀ŋn ɔgbɔru ɔny e magbeŋ ɛm ec’ob a lele kpɔk ɛm ec’ab ab.

Farisiɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’ɔŋn Nyam ɔny ec’ob fɛŋ eke b’ewal a eci sakp lɛw ɛm toŋ alaf mob yɛji, gbɛkɔ ɛ́wmn Nyam ec’erur a eke k’ɔnyn a lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e kok ab e low any. Ke tasi ɛm a, low na anake wɛl ki kok a, ke ow e likpr a yɛji wɛl k’igŋm ɛlum es.
Farisiɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’erurir Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu e mɛkpn anym e sisigr, ɛtŋ dedeku ɛm b’erurir eke wɛl k’ɛsŋn ɔny ɛlum ɛm.
Gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke anŋn ɛsɛ uwɔmu eke wɛl ɛwrm mɛny, ke any uwm ɛm, wɛl b’uyu af af!"
Ol e low any uw ɛsɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam dad’r ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, eke am dad ɛbɛn, ke ɛy anake am wɛwr ɛy a!"
Jesu ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ol e low any uw ɛsɛl, ɔny yɛji gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’uyulil agŋ ɛrɛkp legleg ɛtŋ érurmn eke k’ɛlumn ɛl abu -l’uyu ɛrɛkp a.
Gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke bi kokr suwɔmu amamn ɔŋ’n Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ek’ɔny ɛsɛl ibi a!
Na bi yɛgm eke ɔny ɛsɛl ec’ów eke kok a ɔny yɛji erurir, aŋke -l’ibi kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji bi kokr ɛl eci suwɔmu!
Na sosiɛm Nyam, in e sɛwr ab ɛm dad ninɛ: 'M’ow m’awŋ ɛl kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lele ɛrm ɛsɛl ab; -li b’ow -l’ibi wɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ijr bɛb gbre.'
Na sosiɛm, Nyam b’ow kok yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a low ŋuŋ, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eke ɛl lagŋɛl ibi wus na eci kok ɛm ɛtŋ sosiɛm.

Ow ɔb nuŋ Abɛl ec’ibi ɛm toŋ im igŋ Zakari eke wɛl ibi egb waw usu a lele usu lala ab ab ec’araŋn a. Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: Nyam b’ow kok yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a low ŋuŋ, agŋ na fɛŋ eke wɛl ibi a sosiɛm.
Ol e low any uw ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke ocr low any uw e safuɛ a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ abusu uw low any a; ɔny obi a yɛji ókmn ɛm, ɛtŋ b’ɛdŋnin agŋ eke am erur eke k’ok ɛm a yɛji."
Eke Jesu ŋgboŋ yogŋ a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab ɛrm ebl ligbɛl ɛtŋ -n’am bibrm ow ów nɔnɔ.
-N’am uk ow meb eke -li k’ɔny ow eke batŋ yadŋ ɛm ec’odad ka anŋ’n nɛnym ɛy ɔkm.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, agŋ fandi fandi as luku toŋ batŋ am yuyurir af. Ɛtŋ Jesu ikŋ anym am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a odad ɛsɛ: "M’am dad ɔny, ɔ̀sur sos Farisiɛl e lijru a ek’el ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi a e lís.
Low fɛŋ eke lɔl es a b’ow ɛy ɔkm, ɛtŋ low fɛŋ ek’el asre ɛm ec’a, wɛl b’ow uw any.
Low fɛŋ eke b’ow dadr saw ɛm a, wɛl b’ow dad ok ɔkm agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af; ɛtŋ yec’eke b’ow abal êl anŋn akŋ dadr ów sɛsl ɛm, okr ɔny lawlɛl ɔru ɛm a, wɛl b’ow oc uyu luw af ɛlul lebl agŋ iri."
"Ɛm lawlɛl, m’am dad ɔny, k’ùrur agŋ a eke b’ibi sos megl, ke ow e jam a k’ɔtum kokm low kaka fɛŋ ij a.
M’am ow mi yɛgm ɔny ɛgŋ eke k’urur a: ùrur Nyam eke luw e jam a, ɔny abusu ek’oc ɔwl ɔny gbre ij usu a. Ɛɛ, m’am dad ɔny, in anake ɔtur eke k’urur ir a!
Kɔ wɛl ɔ́lm yay yen íjm lɛl yony ee? Ɛbɛn yɛji Nyam íjlm ɛl ɛm e nyam es.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɔny ec’a, ɔny e sin nuŋ bɔbɔ yɛji Nyam awl uw any. K’ùrur erŋn: ɔny, iil an akmn siyay!"
"M’am dad ɔny, ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku ec’any af eke in el ɛm eci, afr, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji b’ow dad Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af ɛsɛ: 'L’el ɛm eci.'
Kɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku ec’any af ek’in uwm im any, ɛbɛn afr, ɛgŋ ec’Iy yɛji b’ow dad Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm’n any.'
Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bi dad odad ŋuŋ ok ɛgŋ ec’Iy af a, Nyam b’ow oc ap’r; kɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok Abŋ Lala af a, Nyam k’ow ocm apm’n.
Eke wɛl b’ot im ɔny jɛj ok ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu, ow k’ɔdm es ɛw ɛsɛl ec’any af, ke ɛrmij k’ók ɔny low yec’eke ki dadr ɛdŋnin ɔny sosi abu any a eci,
aŋke wanci ab af cɛ Abŋ Lala b’ow yɛgm ɔny low yec’eke ki dadr a."
Bieku ab ɛm, ɛgŋ nyam dad Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, dàd ɛm lisijim cɛc in lel ɛm ab ec’ob ɔny a eke ɛy ɛs ɛw ɛy es a."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm lawl, wɛl ɛwm im eke mi ki jɛj ɔny ec’ów m’ók, ke mi cɛ́c ɔny yony a ec’ob ɔny a m’ɔŋ ɔny."
Ɛmɛny li dad wɛl fɛŋ ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ke ɔ́sur sos ob ɔny ec’erur fɛŋ e lís. Kɔ ɛgŋ ec’owr anŋ tasi a anm in ec’ob ɔny ab ɛm eke l’el gbreŋgbi yɛji."
Na sosiɛm li dad wɛl nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ninɛ: "Gbreŋgbi nyam ɔny wus eke egb ɔsu af nɔnɔ.
Ɛtŋ in ɛm n’am tutr ów li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ee? M’ɔnym usu eke mi k’ub ɛm ec’egb na fɛŋ m’ok.'
Tutr nyam ow’r ɛrm ɛm ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: 'Kin ow eke mi ki kok: mi b’ow m’ufŋ ɛm ec’egbel amua fɛŋ es, ke m’us mel ɛgbɛl ɛjeci, ke m’ás ɛm ec’egb a fɛŋ lele ob ɔny a fɛŋ ab luku ɛm yogŋ.
Ke mi dádr ɛm sosi m’ɛsɛ: M’ɔny nuŋ mamn gbɛ! M’ɔny ob nɔnɔ m’ɛw es akpo nɔnɔ eci. Ow it cɛ ke mi síg es m’am ij, ke m’ám ɛgŋ, ke m’ám kok sos ɛm iŋn!'
Kɔ Nyam dad’r ninɛ: 'Nyamb ɛgŋ! Ncok a cɛ ŋ ec’owr anŋ a b’ow uwr. Ɛtŋ sica ob na fɛŋ eke ot ok es a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ eci ow b’ow el ab ee?' "
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam ow b’ow el ɛgŋ eke b’as ob ɔny luku in obi eci, ke ɔ́lm Nyam ogŋ ec’ob ɔny es a."
Ɛmɛny li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Na sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny: k’èbar ob eke k’ijr ɛsŋn sel oglog ob sos ɛw e low ɛrmij,
aŋke owr anŋ akpl akm ob ij, ɛtŋ sos megl akpl akm ob sos ɛw.
Ɛkan ebl kpɔm yɛji: -l’ewlmn egb, -l’ubmn egb. -N’ɔnymn oj, -n’ɔnymn egbel -l’okmn egb ɛm, gbɛkɔ Nyam bi gbagbl ɛl. Ɔny iil an nɔnɔ akmn ɔr amua!
Ɔny ɛm, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke in ec’ɛrmij ebr ɛm k’obn in ec’owr anŋ e sɛgŋ a tɛl ee?
Eke low tɛɛli ɛm ɔtumn eke ki kokr low kaka, ke bla ɛtŋ b’ebar low ɛjeci ek’anŋ a ec’ɛrmij ee?
Lɛ̀ɛr ɔgm e suw ɔdɔdɔ ec’elel eke b’ɛlil: -li kokmn juma, -l’olmn gbad. Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny eke Salomɔ ek’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a yɛji, ɔnym ob sos ɛw ek’akpl akm suw ɔdɔdɔ amua ɛm e nyam.
Nyam b’ɛw ɔgm e suw ek’anŋ yɛfɛnyna, ke efi wɛl b’ow oc ɔwl alm a ob sos. Sakp abi ɔny yɛji li k’ow l’ɛwm ɔny ob sos ɛbɛn ee? Ɔmn ufum ɔny es gbɛ!
Kì lulil es k’ɔɔl ob yec’eke k’ijr ke ɛ́gŋn a es.
Tasi ɛm a, wus na eci Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl anake sakp sakp fɛŋ b’ɔl ów amua es a. Ɔny ec’a, ɔny Ɛs uw any eke ɔnyn ow ec’es abur.
Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a e low ókr ɔny ɛrmij, ke ow e likpr a fɛŋ Nyam b’ow igŋ af ɔŋ ɔny."
"Ɔny agŋ lukuli na ek’am usr’m jam a, k’ùrur erŋn, aŋke ɔny Ɛs erur eke k’ɔŋ ɔny in ec’ es ɛw ab ɛm ec’ɔwrɔ.
Ɔ̀ɔl ɔny ec’ob ɔny a ijr, òcr ow ec’os ek’ɛŋan a apr ɔgbɔru. Ɔ̀ɔl ob eke ugŋm es a es. Àsr ɔny ec’ob ɔny a luku afr, yogŋ ow k’ɔtum iram, elu yɛji k’ɔtum itŋnm abu, ɛtŋ sisŋ yɛji k’ɔtum ŋuŋnm.
Tasi ɛm a, yogŋ eke ɔny ec’ob ɔny b’anŋ a, yogŋ cɛ ɔny ec’ɛrm a yɛji b’anŋ."
"Ɛ̀wr ob sos, gìgŋn al ám iri, ke ínymn es juma kok eci.
Ànŋn ɛsɛ juma kok ɛsɛl ek’am eku ɛl ec’akŋ ɛs eke b’ow anŋ mɛbi ec’ɛs gbɛgbl ɛm ow af, yec’ɛtŋ ke li b’ow eke li b’icm lisany abu a, ke -li fig ow.
Ehe él juma kok ɛsɛl amua eke gbugŋ ɛs a b’ow ɛŋan any owr a eci! Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: li b’ow l’ɛw ob sos, n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl ok es, ke n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl ob ij.
Eke l’ow lɛgŋ usu ɛm, oglog ow afŋ es yɛji, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋan wɛl any owr, ke ehe el ɛl eci!
Ìrir low na ow ók ɔny es sos ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn: blel akŋ ɛs b’uw wanci eke ulu k’ow ab any ana, ke blel li kí yɛbm ow ɛpirm ɛym’n akŋ.
Ɔny yɛji bɛ̀bmn sos aŋke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow wanci af eke k’ow ɔmnmn a."
Na sosiɛm Piɛr ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ɛy sɔny cɛ ec’odad am dad nyandrɛ ɛm, kɔ agŋ a fɛŋ ec’ee?"
Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ el juma kok ɛs mamn, nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs ee? L’el ɛgŋ eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs a ɔŋ abusu eke k’ɛkn juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjec’a e lís e low, ke n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl ob ij wanci a ek’ow b’it a.
Ehe él juma kok ɛs ikŋ na eci, eke in eci es ɛw ɛs a eci mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm, b’ow ɛŋan am kok juma a!
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: es ɛw ɛs a b’ow afl in ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ es ɛlul il abu ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ eke sica juma kok ɛs ikŋ na bi dadr in sosi eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs a in k’ow in owm caca, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ɔb nuŋ n’am ɔr juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjec’a, egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab, n’ám ij ob ke n’ám ɛgŋ mar ow ám ɔny’n,
es ɛw ɛs a b’ow ɛwl ow lɛgŋ eke li k’ow n’ɔmnm, wanci af eke li k’ow l’uwm any. Li b’ow l’ogŋ juma kok ɛs a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ow Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eci gbre ij a.
Juma kok ɛs yec’ek’uw low yec’eke in e es ɛw ɛs a b’erur any ke am kokm a, wɛl b’ow ɔr’r ŋgbre ɛm sakp nɔnɔ.

Gbɛkɔ juma kok ɛs yec’ek’uwm low yec’eke in e es ɛw ɛs erur ab any ke kok low ek’it eke wɛl k’ɔr’r a, wɛl b’ow ɔr’r ŋgbre abi ka ɛm cɛ. Ɛgŋ a eke wɛl ɔŋ nɔnɔ a, wɛl b’ow ibrm’n nɔnɔ; ɛgŋ yec’eke wɛl abul nɔnɔ a, wɛl b’ow ibrm’n ow ok af."
"M’ism Nyam e jɛj ok ec’al ab wus na, ɛtŋ m’am erur eke jɛj ok a k’el caca.
M’ow m’ɛy gbre ij ligbɛl ɛm ek’el mij ok nuŋ mum nyam, ɛtŋ ow am ijr’m gbre ɛrm ɛm toŋ lɛgŋ a eke low na b’ow iy nɛny a.
Kɔ am tutar ek’ɛrm es ɛy m’is wus ee? Njaŋ, m’am dad ɔny eke na ɛm bubr!
Sica jam aŋa, bosu nyam ɛm ec’agŋ yen ek’anŋ a b’ow ubr ɛm: nyahan b’ow inym es, ɛtŋ yony yɛji b’ow inym es ke -n’am ifanin.
Iy ɛs b’ow ifn jim ɛtŋ jim yɛji b’ow ifn’n. Iy lis b’ow ifn jɔw ɛtŋ jɔw yɛji b’ow ifn’n. Jim ɛy b’ow ifn ɛc lis ɛtŋ ɛc lis yɛji b’ow ifn’n."
Sica Jesu dad bieku a yɛji ninɛ: "Eke b’ɛkan afr ibr es ligbn es ɛru usu a, kpɛkŋ bi dadr eke Nyam b’ow an, ɛtŋ ow b’el ɛbɛn.
Ɛtŋ eke b’ɛkan eke lɛf gbagba igb ɛb esr a, bi dadr eke elubu b’ow ow, ɛtŋ ow b’el ɛbɛn.
Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl! Eke bi lɛɛr afr lele wus ab a, b’uwr lɛgŋ ec’elel eke ow b’ow anŋn ab any: bla ɛtŋ úwmn lɛgŋ na ek’anŋ ɔny any af a e nyandrɛ ab any ee?"
"Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ɔny obi ɛm am jɛjmn okmn kokmn yec’eke akpl ab ee?

Eke batŋ ɛgŋ ɔŋ’ŋ dedeku ɛtŋ aamn jɛj ok usu ɔny yony mum a, ke ejagb ek’aamn a, dàdr low a okar ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ócm n’iim’ŋ jɛj ok ɛs ogŋ; ke jɛj ok ɛs yɛji k’ócm ɛlum’ŋ usu ɔsu ɛsɛl abu ɛm ɛlum’ŋ sobel ɛm.
M’am dad’ŋ eke k’ow ɛym ɔkm yogŋ eke sɔgm ŋ e labm a fɛŋ ek’ɔny a uwarm."
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm, agŋ bɛb ow am dad Jesu: "Es ɛw ɛs Pilat ɔŋ wɛl ibi Galile ec’agŋ ek’im am kok egb waw ɔŋ Nyam a."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ am tutar eke Galile ec’agŋ amua eke wɛl ibi a, -l’el sikpl ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl -l’akm Galile ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ee?
Njaŋ! M’am dad ɔny; eke itŋnmn ɛrm ɛm, ɔny fɛŋ b’ow uwr ɛsɛ ɛl af.
Ɛtŋ kɔ agŋ lɛw niwn a eke Silowe yogŋ, êl gege a bubm ok af ibi a, kɔ ɛl -l’el agŋ eŋuŋ -l’akm Jerusalɛm ec’ɛb eyŋ a fɛŋ ee?
Njaŋ! M’am dad ɔny: eke itŋnmn ɛrm ɛm, ɔny yɛji b’ow uwr ɛsɛ ɛl af."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ninɛ: "Igŋ nyam ewl babm e likŋ in ec’egb ɔgm a. Li b’ow ɔgm a eke li k’ɔw babm a, n’ɛŋnm.
Ɛtŋ li dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛ̀kn: akpo nyahan ɛtŋ eke mi b’ow e mi k’ɔw babm na, kɔ m’ɛ́ŋnm. Ùbr’r es! Kɔ bla ɛtŋ li k’eb wus n’ɔnym ab ɔfr ɔfr nɛnɛ!'
Kɔ juma ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, yɛ̀b’r n’ánŋ lakpo na yɛji; m’ow m’agbr wus mi díd’r, m’ók’r suw egŋun.
Ow k’ɔdm lakpo ek’am ow a, li b’ow l’ɔsu ey. Ek’ow elm ɛbɛn a, ke ɔ́ŋ wɛl ubr’r es.' "
Nɛnɛgŋ nyam, Jesu am yɛgm agŋ low Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu.
Yogŋ a ɔl lis nyam anŋ. Ow ij akpo lɛw niwn, eke abŋ ŋuŋ nyam ɔny ibn’n es ɛtŋ l’ɔ́tum eke li k’inym es.
Eke Jesu b’ɛkn’n a, l’ɛsŋ ow ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Wɛl eb ɛlu’ŋ es ŋ ec’ɔl na ɛm ŋ̂!"
Jesu at’r abu nuŋ, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’inym es ceŋ ɛtŋ n’am kɔklm Nyam.

Ɛbɛn a, Nyamel a ec’es ɛw ɛs a ebl ɛrm ewlm owi na eke Jesu kok nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a sosiɛm. Li dad dedeku a ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ nɔhɔn anŋ eke wɛl ki kok juma; blel ówr lɛgŋ ab ɛm wɛl éwlm ɔny, ke ow k’elm nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ!"

Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eb odad ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl! Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam bi mɔmu in ec’id ek’anŋ ob ij usu a es ɛy ɔkm, ow k’ɔdm ni mɔmu in e gbaŋkɔ es n’im n’ɔŋ ow mij ow ɛ́gŋ. Kɔ yadŋ ee?
Ɛtŋ yɔw na ek’el Abraham e lilaw, ke Satan ɔny ibn es ij akpo lɛw niwn a, ke ow akplm eke wɛl ki mɔmu’n es éb ɛlu’l es nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ee?"
Jesu ec’odad ebl na eke dad a, ɔŋ in ec’efnu a fɛŋ ɛ́s. Kɔ dedeku a fɛŋ gbɛ sos ɛm am iŋn sijuma ɛgbɛl amamn amua eke n’am kok a sosiɛm.
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ot es ee? Bla lowi wɛl k’oc ɛbmn ab ee?
N’anŋ ɛsɛ likŋ e liy nyam eke ɛgŋ nyam oc ewl in ec’ɔgm af. L’ɛli l’agb l’el likŋ ligbɛl ɛtŋ ɔr ow us mel in ec’ál ab ɛm."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi mi k’oc m’ɛbmn Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu ab ab ee?
Ow anŋ ɛsɛ lijru eke yɔw nyam oc wuwlm ma toy likŋ lele yen ab toŋ bake ma a nimum inŋ eb es ab af."
Jesu am ɛc baŋn ekekey lele ɛgbɛl ɛm ab yɛgm agŋ low ejagb a ek’aamn Jerusalɛm ogŋ ogŋ a.
Ɛgŋ nyam ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ agŋ tɛl cɛ b’ow ɛŋn sel ee?" Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ:
"Àtar sos es okr akŋ lisany likekli ɛm ogŋ. Kɔ low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ɛbm eke k’ok akŋ, kɔ -li k’ow -l’ɔtumn.
Eke gbugŋ ɛs a b’ow igb abl lisany a safuɛ ɛm a, ɔny b’ow anŋn gbeŋ icmn lisany abu ke dádr ɛsrɛ: 'Gbugŋ ɛs, fìg ɛy lisany!' Li b’ow li dad ɔny l’ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm yogŋ ek’anŋn am owr ab any!'
Ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow dadr ir ɛsrɛ: 'S’ij ob, s’ɛgŋ ŋ ab; yɛgm agŋ low ɛy ec’ɛb ab ɛm.'
Ɛmɛny li b’ow li dad ɔny l’ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm yogŋ ek’anŋn am owr any. Ŋ̀gbroŋn ɛm e lís, ɔny eke bi kokr ów eŋuŋ a!'
Lɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛkan Abraham, Isak, Jakɔb lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ab Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, ke wɛl b’ow ogŋ ok ɔny gbeŋ a, yogŋ anake ca b’ow ikŋn ɔŋn sasagar an ɛm a!
Agŋ b’ow anŋ susu susu fɛŋ ow ok es Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu ec’ob ij usu a.
Ɛtŋ agŋ bɛb a ek’el ajamu a, sica b’ow el ánymu. Ɛtŋ ánymu a b’ow el ajamu."
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Farisiɛl ec’agŋ bɛb ow titm Jesu ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ̀gboŋ aŋa ìm usu ɛjeci, kɔ Erɔd Antipas am erur eke k’ibi’ŋ."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn dadr kprakpru na ɛsrɛ: 'M’ow m’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ, m’ewlm ɔ́lu yɛfɛnyna lele efi ab, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ nyahan m’ow m’uwar ɛm e juma.'
Ow akpl eke mi k’imn anym eci ɛm ec’ejagb us ab ɛm, yɛfɛnyna, efi lele lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ab. Tasi ɛm a, ow akplm eke Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs k’uw usu ɛjeci, ke ow k’elm Jerusalɛm."

Ɛmɛny Jesu low am ɛy sos ɛm toŋ batŋ n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: "Jerusalɛm, Jerusalɛm, ŋ eke b’ibi kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ke b’ɔr agŋ eke Nyam b’ɛrm ow ŋ ogŋ a mebn ɛm a! Sakp abi m’erur eke mi k’as ŋ ec’ey luku ɛm e lís, ɛsɛ elel eke ŋgɔs ey lis b’as in ec’ey luku ɔw éw ab af, ɛtŋ ɛ́gŋmn!
Ow sosiɛm kin, Nyam b’ow digŋ ɔny ec’akŋ a ɛlu es foŋ. M’am dad ɔny: k’ow ɛknmn’m toŋ bake lɛgŋ a ow; yogŋ anake b’ow dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ ɛgŋ a ek’am ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ɔwrɔ a!' "
Nɛnɛgŋ nyam, Jesu im Farisiɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam ogŋ ob ij ɛm. Agŋ ek’anŋ yogŋ a am ɛw’r nyamn.
Ɛtŋ igŋ nyam ek’ɔl ɔny bake ir ɛw fɔŋ a ow inym’n es any af.
Jesu ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ ibrm ol e low any uw ɛsɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ wɛl k’éwlm ɛgŋ ee?"
Kɔ -l’erurm eke -li ki dad odad. Ɛtŋ Jesu itŋn ɔlu a abu, ewlm’n ɛtŋ ɛlu’l es n’im.
Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ eke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny in ec’iy, ow k’ɔdm in ec’id ek’ɛy mijɔmu ɛm, kɔ li k’ow n’iim kpɛkŋ n’ɔnym l’ocm ow es eke ow el nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ yɛji ee?"
Low na ɛm a, -l’ɔtum -li dadm ow odad kaka ij.
Jesu ɛbmn nyamn ɛkn eke agŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ ob ij a, b’erur eke ki sig es susu amamn. Na sosiɛm li dad agŋ a fɛŋ nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na:
"Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ mɛbi ec’ob ij ɛm, ke k’ìm ki sig es usu mamn a. Ow k’ɔdm ke wɛl ɛ́sŋ ɛgŋ nyam ek’ɔny any akm’ŋ a yɛji ob ij ab ɛm;
ɛgŋ a ek’ɛsŋ ɔny, ɔny yony mum a, b’ow ow dad’ŋ ɛsɛ: 'Ìgb aŋa im sig es jam a!', kpɛkŋ ɛ́s ɛm b’ow igb im sig es jam a.

Kɔ eke wɛl ɛsŋ’ŋ ob ij ɛtŋ im a, sìg es jam. Eke ow e wanci a b’ow ow a, ɛgŋ a ek’ɛsŋ’ŋ ob ij a b’ow dad’ŋ ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òw anym aŋa sig es any ɛsɛl ec’usu na.' Ow ɛm a, ow b’ow el ŋ ec’anygbeŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ob ij usu a ec’any af.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke am igbl’l in sosi ogŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɔny is’r es, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’am is es a Nyam b’ow ɔny igbl’l ogŋ."

Ɛtŋ sica Jesu dad ɛgŋ a ek’ɛsŋ’n ob ij a ninɛ: "Eke b’ow ɛsŋ agŋ ob ij ɛm a, ke k’ɛ́sŋ awlŋɛl, esŋ jimɛl, ŋ ec’akŋ ec’agŋ lele awlŋɛl egbreŋgbi ab; ɛl yɛji -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛsŋ’ŋ ob ij, ke yec’a eke kok a e labm -n’am sɔg’ŋ a.
Kɔ ek’am kok low ɛtŋ k’ɛsŋ agŋ ob ij a, ke ɛ̀sŋ ɔgbɔru, sos ɛ́yru, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl lele ány eflu ab.
Ehe b’ow el ŋ eci aŋke agŋ amua k’ow ɔtum ɔwrm ɔɔm’ŋ. Kɔ Nyam b’ow sɔg’ŋ ow e labm lɛgŋ eke agŋ eke kok ów amamn a b’ow igb luw ɛm anŋ owr a."
Agŋ ek’anŋ ob ij usu a ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’iri odad na a, dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ehe él ɛgŋ eke b’ow ij ob Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a eci!"
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ninɛ: "Igŋ nyam ɛsŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ob ij.
Ek’ow sig ob ij e wanci a, l’ɛrm in e juma kok ɛs a im am ɛsŋ agŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ ob ij a eke k’ow, aŋke sica fɛŋ iy nɛny ŋ̂.
Kɔ ɛl fɛŋ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ am dad in ec’es abur owi. Krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛs a dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Dàd ɛgŋ gbɛl a, m’ɔl ɔgm nyam, ow it eke mi k’im m’ɛkn. M’am ŋɔŋn’n, m’ɔny es abur; mi k’ow m’ɔtum m’owm.'
Yony ɛm ɛs a dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Dàd ɛgŋ gbɛl a, m’ɔl sed lɛw eke mi k’im m’ɛbm m’ɛkn ɛl, m’am ŋɔŋn’n, m’ɔny es abur; mi k’ow m’ɔtum m’owm.'
Nyahan ɛm ɛs a yɛji dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Dàd ɛgŋ gbɛl a, catŋ m’ɛbi yɔw m’oc m’ow m’ɛlu akŋ. Na sosiɛm mi k’ow m’ɔtum m’owm.'

Juma kok ɛs a ɛwl mɛny im ɛŋn in ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɛtŋ dad’r agŋ a ec’odad eke dad a. Kɔ es ɛw ɛs a ebl ɛrm ɛtŋ dad in e juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ìm fafa sɛbɛrŋ ɛm, sejagb af lele susu fɛŋ ab ɛsŋ ɔgbɔru, sos ɛ́yru, ány eflu lele akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl ab!'
Eke ow b’ibn tɛl a juma kok ɛs a ow ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm ec’es ɛw ɛs, ow eke dad a, wɛl kok ɛtŋ ɛmɛny usu anŋ.'
Es ɛw ɛs a dad in e juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ìm sakp ɛm ejagb lele sebr af ab, ke átrm agŋ ów ok akŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm ec’êl a íy gbɔŋ.'
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, agŋ amua eke m’ɛsŋ ob ij ke ɛgŋm owm a, ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ijm ɛm ec’ob na!"
Agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl am us Jesu jam ejagb af. L’ɛwl mɛny l’ɔkŋ wɛl any ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ:
"Ɛgŋ ek’erur eke k’us’m jam a, l’érur’m l’akm ɛs, lis, in e yɔw, in ec’ey, lisijimɛl, lisijɔwɛl, lele in obi in obi ec’owr anŋ ab. Ek’ow elm ɛbɛn a, li k’ɔtum l’elm ɛm e jam ɛs.
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’ocm in obi ec’olikŋ abum usm im jam a, ɔtum eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs.
Ɔny ɛm a, ek’ɛgŋ erur eke k’us êl ligbɛl nyam, li b’ow li sig es l’ub os abi eke li k’ɔny ke l’úwar êl a.
Eke ow elm ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ l’ɛlu lebn nɔmu ɛm, ɛtŋ ca l’ɔtum l’usm êl a l’uwarm a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛkn êl a, b’ow kokr’r miyɛr,
dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ na am us êl ɛtŋ ca ow akm’n!'

Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ek’es ɛw ɛs nyam erur eke k’ogŋ ar lawl es ɛw ɛs ɛjec’ab a, li b’ow sig es li bɛbm l’ɛkn, eke l’ɔtu eke agŋ fandi lɛw ab li b’ow l’ogŋ lawl a ek’am an es ɔbr’r agŋ fandi likŋ ab a ar.
Eke l’ɔtum ij a, ke l’ɛ́rm agŋ im ibrm es ɛw ɛs yec’a ek’anŋ akpoj am ow a ɛrm es ɛy."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad uwar ninɛ: "Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum elm ɛm e jam us ɛs, eke l’igŋm ów fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ɛlum es."
"Mok el ob mamn. Kɔ eke l’irmn in e ded a, ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke ki kokr’r ke l’ɛwl li ded ee?
Ɛgŋ k’ɔtum ocm kokrm wus e juma kaka; kɔ lirŋ af cɛ ow it eke wɛl k’oc ɔwl’l. Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn!"
Wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab ow ɛŋn Jesu eke k’iri in ec’odad.
Kɔ Farisiɛl lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab am ebl ɛrm ɛl ɔfr ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Igŋ na b’eb sikpl ɛsɛl ɛtŋ b’ij ob ɛl ab!"
Na ɛm a, Jesu dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ninɛ:
"Ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny mɛcɛb ekŋ yen ɛtŋ nyam irm a, kɔ li k’ow l’okm ekŋ yar lele lɛw libarm ab ab es egb ij usu yogŋ, n’iim l’ɔlm yec’a ek’irm a toŋ bake n’ɛ́ŋnm ow ee?
Eke n’ɛŋn ow a, n’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. L’oc l’ɛw ow ɔbɔw af,
ɛtŋ l’ow l’ɛy gbugŋ. L’ɛsŋ lawlɛl lele agŋ ek’ir titm’n ab ab, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Kòkr sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab, kɔ ɛm e licɛbli a ek’irm a, m’ɛŋn’n ŋ̂!'
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam m’am dad ɔny, eke sikpl ɛs nyam itŋn ɛrm ɛm a, afr yogŋ wɛl b’ow kok sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl akm agŋ ekŋ yar lɛw libarm eke b’ocr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl ke ibram ɛrm ɛm itŋn a."
"Eke yɔw nyam ɔny os lɛw, ɛtŋ nyam irm a, kɔ li k’ow l’igŋm kɛniɛ, li paplm akŋ ab es, l’ɔlm ɛrm ɛw ɛm toŋ bake n’ɛ́ŋnm l’ocm ee?
Eke n’ɛŋn l’oc a, li b’ow l’ɛsŋ lawlɛl lele agŋ a ek’ir in ab ab, ke li dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: 'Kòkr sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab, aŋke ɛm ec’os a ek’irm a, m’ɛkn m’oc ŋ̂!'
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam m’am dad ɔny, eke sikpl ɛs nyam cɛ itŋn ɛrm ɛm a, Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl sos ɛm b’ow iŋn!"
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Igŋ nyam ɔny in ec’ey yony.
Lɛgŋ nyam, jam ɛs a dad ɛs ninɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs, ɔ̀ŋ’m ɛm ec’ob ɔny ek’ɔtu eke k’ɛbm im a.' Ɛtŋ ɛs cɛc ɛl in ec’ob ɔny a.
Eke sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a, jam ɛs a oc in ec’aja ɔl ij oc ow ec’os a fɛŋ ab im usu kpekpe, ɛb ɛjec’ɛm. Yogŋ ni ŋuŋn in ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ nfaci ij ɛm.
Eke ni ŋuŋn in ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ bake ow uwr a, lek ligbɛl ɛy ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ sica n’am ɔny low fɛŋ ec’es abur.
N’im ɛb ab ɛm ec’igŋ nyam ogŋ, ɛtŋ ow ɛrm’n ɔgm eke li k’im l’ɔsu gbroko.
Namn ɔny’n toŋ batŋ n’am erur eke li k’ij gbroko a ec’ob eke b’ij a, kɔ yeci yɛji wɛl ɔɔm’n.

Eke li b’ɛkn eke low a e li kok a akplm a, ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ n’am tutr in ec’ɛrm ɛm li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Juma kok ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ɛs ogŋ a b’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ij sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ɛtŋ ɛm, m’anŋ aŋa namn am ɔny’m toŋ afŋn es!
M’ow m’igb m’im ɛm ɛs ogŋ a, ke mi dád’r m’ɛsɛ: Ɛm ɛs, mi kok sikpl Nyam ec’any af lele ŋ e lís ab.
M’itm eke k’ɛsŋ’m ŋ ec’iy ij, kɔ èb’m ɛsɛ ŋ e juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam af.'
Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ l’igb n’aam ɛs ogŋ a. Eke n’im toŋ bake n’am ok yogŋ a, n’anŋ akpoj ɛtŋ ɛs ɛkn’n. Ow e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ, ɛtŋ l’uru es n’im l’ɛy ow af.
Iy a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs, mi kok sikpl Nyam ec’any af lele ŋ e lís ab. M’itm eke k’ɛsŋ’m ŋ ec’iy ij.'
Kpɛkŋ ɛs dad in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: 'Òcr mob sus ɛm mamn a owr susr ir, ɛ̀lul il kpatrowa abuli, ke ókr ir cɔkrukpɔ!
Ɔ̀nyn id igŋ mamn a owr ibir; s’íjr ob si kokr sos ɛm iŋn!
Kɔ ɛm ec’iy na ek’ɛm gbɛ m’ɛsɛ l’uw a, njɛ n’anŋ owr. L’irm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛŋn’n.' Ɛtŋ n’am kok es gbɛgbl a sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Ke lɛgŋ a, igŋ a ec’iy kpekp a im akp ɛm. Eke n’am ow bake n’am titm gbugŋ a, n’am iri ɛj ub e likekr.
L’ɛsŋ juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow ninɛ: 'Kɔ bla lowi am ɛy ee?'
Juma kok ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Esŋ jim ɛwl ow. Eke ɛs ɛkn’n eke n’anŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn a, l’ibi id igŋ mamn a.'
Eke iy kpekp a iri ɛbɛn a, l’ebl ɛrm ɛtŋ l’erurm eke li k’ɛy gbugŋ a. Ɛs ɛy ɔkm ow am ŋɔŋn’n eke li k’ɛy gbugŋ,
kɔ li dad ɛs ninɛ: 'Kin akpo akpo eke m’anŋ ŋ ab, ke lɛgŋ fɛŋ mi bi kok yec’a eke bi dad’m a. Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka ɔɔm im cani mi kokrm sos ɛm iŋn ɛm lawlɛl ab yɛji.
Eke sica ejimŋ ow a, in eke ni ŋuŋn ŋ ec’ob afacyɔw ab a, in sosiɛm ibi id igŋ mamn a.'
Ɛs dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛm jim, anŋ ɛm ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛtŋ fɛŋ a eke m’ɔny a, ŋ eci.
Ow akpl ke si kók sos ɛm iŋn, aŋke esŋ jim na eke s’ɛsɛ l’uw a, njɛ n’anŋ owr. L’irm, ɛtŋ sica wɛl ɛŋn’n!' "
Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Gbreŋgbi nyam ɔny in ec’ob ɔsu ɛs nyam. Ɛtŋ wɛl ow dad’r eke ob ɔsu ɛs a in am ŋuŋn ŋ ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ.
Gbreŋgbi a ɛsŋ’n ɛtŋ ibrm’n ninɛ: 'Kɔ bla lowi anake m’am iri ŋ e lís ab ee? B’ow awl ob a eke m’abul’ŋ a ec’elel eke kokr a ok’m. Kɔ k’ɔtum elm ɛm ec’ob ɔsu ɛs ij.'
Eke ow ɛwar ir ɛbɛn a, ob ɔsu ɛs a am dad in ɛm ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm ɛgŋ gbɛliy am ow ogŋ’m juma ɛm; ke sica ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee? M’ijm lɛc wus ob kok owi ɛm, ɛtŋ ob sasm owi ɛm yɛji ɛ́s b’ɔny’m.
M’uw yec’eke m’ow mi kok ab any ba eke l’ogŋ’m juma ɛm a, ke agŋ éb’m ɛl ogŋ a!'
Ɛtŋ n’am ɛsŋ agŋ a fɛŋ a ek’ij in ɛgŋ gbɛliy eci labm a nyam nyam ɛm. Li dad krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛs a ninɛ: 'Kɔ os abi e labm ij ɛm ɛgŋ gbɛliy ogŋ ee?'
Ow dad’r ninɛ: 'Mun baro ekŋ yen e labm.' Ɛtŋ ob ɔsu ɛs dad’r ninɛ: 'Eke ŋ e labm a el na, ke sìg es fafa, ke nɔ́n ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab.'
Ɛmɛny li dad yony ɛm ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛtŋ kɔ ŋ, os abi e labm ij ee?' Ɛtŋ ow dad ninɛ: 'Egb ey eke wɛl ok fandi ɛm toŋ ij ekŋ yen.' Ɛtŋ ob ɔsu ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ek’ow el na, ke nɔ̀n ekŋ yar.'
Eke -l’awal mob a, gbreŋgbi a am aw in e juma kok ɛs a eke kok juma kprakpr ɛm a. Tasi ɛm a, wus na ec’agŋ bi kok ów kprakpr ɛm ɔŋanin akm usuayl ec’agŋ a."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad igŋ af ninɛ: "Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, òcr wus na ec’ob ɔny a eke b’ɛju ɛgŋ a, ke ow ɛm ɛ́ŋan alawl. Sica lɛgŋ eke k’ow ɔnym os ij a, ke Afr éb ok ɔny ɛb ir usu a ek’ɔnym uwr ab ɛm.
Ɛgŋ ek’ij nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ekekey ɛm a, b’ow ij nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ɛgbɛl ɛm yɛji. Ɛgŋ ek’ijm nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ekekey ɛm a, k’ow ijm nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ɛgbɛl ɛm yɛji.
Eke ijmn nɛny nyam wus na ec’ob ɔny e lís, ke b’ow ec’ɛgŋ anake b’ow abul ɔny ob ɔny tasi ab ee?
Ek’ijmn nɛny nyam ob ek’el ɛgŋ ec’a ec’ɔsu ɛm, ke bwo ec’ɛgŋ anake b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ob él ɔny ec’ab ee?

Aduigŋ kaka k’ɔtum kokm es ɛw ɛsɛl yony e juma; oglog li b’ow l’ifn krɛkrɛ ec’a ke l’érur yony ɛm ec’a; oglog li b’ow l’ij nɛny nyam, nyam e lís, ke li k’ɛwm nyam e low any. Ɔtumn eke ki kokr Nyam e juma ke kokr jɛtɛ yɛji eci juma."
Farisiɛl ek’am iri Jesu e sodad amua a am kokr’r miyɛr, aŋke -li b’erur os owi.
Jesu am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Agŋ ec’any af a b’ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl af, kɔ Nyam uw ɔny ec’ɛrm ab any. Yec’eke agŋ b’oc ɛw low ligbɛl a, el low eke Nyam ifn.
Mois ec’ ol a e lɛgŋ a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a ec’odad ab ab anŋ toŋ ok Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs e lɛgŋ a. Lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ wɛl am ɔb Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ am atr sos es eke k’ɛy ɛm.
Afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛc gbuŋ ke ol a e mɔni nyam oc es.
Igŋ fɛŋ eke ɛlu in e yɔw es, ke im ɛbi ɛjec’a, ij nfaci ŋ̂; ɛtŋ igŋ eke ɛbi yɔw ek’ɛc ogŋ a yɛji ij nfaci."
Ɛmɛny Jesu oc nyandrɛ ɛm odad am dad ɛsɛ: "Gbreŋgbi nyam anŋ eke bi sus mob amamn eke b’il an, ɛw dandany ebl af. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ li bi kok sos, n’ám ij, n’ám ɛgŋ, n’ám kok sos ɛm iŋn.
Gbɔru nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Lasar ke abi ok a, b’anŋ’n lisany.
Li b’erur eke li k’ij gbreŋgbi a ec’ob eke b’ij ec’ekprey a eke b’ok es wus a. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mɔwr b’ow ám irm’n abi a.
Ɛbɛn ɛbɛn toŋ batŋ gbɔru a uw, ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ow oc in ec’abŋ a im sigm es Abraham e lís. Eke ow b’ibn tɛl a, gbreŋgbi a yɛji uw, ɛtŋ wɛl oc’r es.
Kɔ ɔŋnes baŋn yogŋ, gbreŋgbi a am ij gbre nɔnɔ gbɛl. Eke li b’igbl any ogŋ a, l’ɛkn Lasar akpoj ɛm eke sig es Abraham e lís.
Ɛtŋ n’am ɛlu lebl li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs Abraham ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ, ke ɛ́rm Lasar usm abuli mij ɛm ow tat’m anm adar’m ɛrm, aŋke m’am ij gbre nɔnɔ al na ɛm.'
Kɔ Abraham dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛm jim, ɔ̀kn eke ŋ ec’owr anŋ ɛm anŋ ehe ɛm ɛtŋ Lasar anŋ gbre ɛm. Ca kin eke aŋa n’anŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm ke ŋ am ij gbre.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛy lele ɔny ab ec’araŋn a, nɔmu ligbɛl nyam anŋ. Ek’ɛgŋ erur eke k’ow ɔny ogŋ a, oglog ow ɛy yogŋ a yɛji, li k’ɔtum.'
Ɛtŋ gbreŋgbi a dad ninɛ: 'Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ: ɛ̀rm Lasar im ɛm ɛs e gbugŋ a,
aŋke m’ɔny ɛm lisijimɛl yen. N’ím l’ɛwar wɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl yɛji -li k’owmn gbre ij usu na.'
Abraham ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: 'Esŋ jimɛl ec’a, -n’ɔny Mois lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab eke am ɛwar ɛl. Ow akpl ke -l’iri wɛl ec’a!'
Kɔ gbreŋgbi a dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs Abraham, ow elm ow. Kɔ eke agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ b’im dad ɛl a, -li b’ow -l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm.'
Ɛtŋ Abraham dad’r ninɛ: 'Eke -l’erurm eke -li k’iri Mois lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ec’a, ɛbɛn cɛ -li k’ow -l’irimn ɛgŋ ek’uw ke b’ow igb im dad ɛl a ec’a yɛji.' "
Sica ɛmɛny Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ów eke b’ɔŋ agŋ kok sikpl a, b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Gbɛkɔ gbre él ɛgŋ a eke sikpl b’ɛcr in ɛm ow ɛŋn ɛgŋ a eci!

Ɛgŋ eke b’ɔny ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm ɛsɛ iy af ɛlu wus a, low ŋuŋ a eke li k’ɛŋn a agb nɔnɔ. Eke wɛl oc meb ucur lob ligbɛl ucu’r ɛmn ɛtŋ wɛl ɔny ɛman in okij a, ow akpl akm low ŋuŋ a eke wɛl ki kok’r a.
Ɔny obi a, ɛ̀wr ɛrm sɛnyn sɛnyn! Eke esŋ jim kok low ɔbr ŋ e lís, ke ɔ̀m’n ów mɛwl ɛm. Eke l’iri ɛtŋ l’uw in ec’ów ɔbr ab any a, òc ap’r.
Eke lɛgŋ nyam af li kok low ɔbr sakp lɔbŋ ŋ e lís ɛtŋ l’ow sakp lɔbŋ mum n’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ a, ke òc ap’r."
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òbn ɛy ec’ɔmn a."
Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Blel ɔnyn ɔmn ɛw likekli ɛsɛ likŋ e liy af ana, ɔtur eke ki dadr likŋ gbɛl na ɛsrɛ: 'Ìil es im inym es okij ɛm!', li b’ow l’ɛlum ɔny."

Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kin low nyam: ɔny ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ɔny juma kok ɛs eke bi kok ɔgm juma oglog b’ɔsu mindey. Eke li b’anŋ juma kok ɛm ba li b’ow a, kɔ in ec’akŋ ɛs a b’ow dad’r eke li k’ow fafa li sig es l’ij ob ee?
Kɔ li k’ow li dadm ow kpɛkŋ l’ɛsmɛ: 'Kòk ɛm ec’ob ij a! Ɛ̀w ob sos, ke ɔ́ŋ’m ob m’ij m’ɛgŋ gbuŋ ke ŋ yɛji íj ob ɛgŋ ee?'
Ɛkan eke n’ɔɔm in e juma kok ɛs a bia, ów a eke li dad ow, ke ow kok ɔŋ’n a ec’ab ee?
Ɛbɛn ɔny yɛji, eke kokr low fɛŋ eke Nyam ɔŋ ɔny eke ki kokr a yɛji, dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛy juma kok ɛsɛl cɛ s’el; ow ek’it eke si ki kok a, ow ana.' "
Sica Jesu eb ejagb aam Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ n’am ɛcr Samari lele Galile ab e ligber a ogŋ ogŋ.
Eke n’im bake n’am titm baŋn nyam a, kokobe ɛsɛl agŋ lɛw anŋ akpoj am ow ɔbr’r,
ɛtŋ -n’am ɛlu ow lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl Jesu, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
Jesu ɛkn ɛl ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn yɛgmn egb waw ɛsɛl sos!" Ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl mɛny -n’aam. Eke -n’aam a, ɛl fɛŋ -l’ewl.
Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’ɛkn eke l’ewl a, l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow yogŋ, ɛtŋ n’am kɔklm Nyam lebl gege.
L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus, l’ubu any es Jesu ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am ɔŋ ow bia. Igŋ na elm Jwif kɔ Samari ec’ɛgŋ.
Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ɔny lɛw mum ewlmn ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bogŋ libarm ab a ee?
Kɔ ŋ sɔny cɛ ek’el utu ɛgŋ a anake ow am ɛlu Nyam bia ab ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ ɛl a gbɛ, ɛgŋ kaka tutrm eke k’ow ɛlu Nyam bia ee?"
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb ke ím, kɔ ŋ ec’ɔmn a eb ɛlu’ŋ es."
Lɛgŋ nyam Farisiɛl ow am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ lɛgŋ iy Nyam ec’ es ɛw a b’ow ow bake agŋ ɛkn ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Nyam ec’es ɛw a k’ow owm ɛsɛ ob eke wɛl b’ɛkn af.
Wɛl k’ow dadm ɛsmɛ: 'Kin n’anŋ aŋa, ow k’ɔdm n’anŋ yogŋ a!' Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ec’es ɛw a anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny n’am dad jam ɛsɛl a l’ɛsɛ: "Sɛgŋ am ow eke b’ow erurir eke k’ɛkan ɛgŋ ec’ Iy lɛgŋ nyam cɛ, gbɛkɔ k’ow ɛknmn in.
Wɛl b’ow dad ɔny ɛsɛ: 'N’anŋ aŋa!', ow k’ɔdm 'N’anŋ yogŋ a!', kɔ k’ùrur es k’usr jam k’ìmn!
Ɛsɛ elel eke nyam b’ɛŋn ke b’ayal afr nimum fɛŋ a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam ow b’ow ɛcr ɛgŋ ec’Iy e mowrer e lɛgŋ a yɛji.
Gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke low na ɛ́y a, ow it ke l’íj gbre nɔnɔ, ke yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ígŋ ɛlu’l es.
Low a eke ɛy Noe e lɛgŋ a, ɛbɛn cɛ ow b’ow ɛy ɛgŋ ec’Iy e mowrer e lɛgŋ a yɛji.
Lɛgŋ a, agŋ a fɛŋ am ij ob, ɛtŋ am ɛgŋ. Egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab am ɛbirir toŋ batŋ ow it lɛgŋ a eke Noe ɛy mijɛtŋ gbɛl ab ɛm a, ɛtŋ mij gbɛl a iy ow bubur ɛl es ibi ɛl.
Ɛmɛny ow b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ Lɔt e lɛgŋ a ec’ab af: yogŋ yɛji agŋ am ij ob, am ɛgŋ, am ɔl án, am ewl egb, am us mel.
Ɛtŋ eke Lɔt anŋ Sodɔm baŋn ɛy ɔkm a, Nyam ɔŋ al lele mebn eke ler ab am an ok wus ɛsɛ mij af, toŋ ibi agŋ a fɛŋ.
Ɛbɛn cɛ ow b’ow ɛy ɛgŋ ec’Iy e mowrer e lɛgŋ a yɛji.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ɛgŋ eke b’ow anŋ in ec’êl af e lɛf eb usu a, ke b’ow ɔny in e mob anŋ akŋ a, k’úsm es ɛym akŋ ocm ob. Ɛbɛn ɛgŋ eke b’ow anŋ ɔgm a yɛji, k’ɛ́wlm ij.
Ɔ̀kan Lɔt e yɔw a eke lɛr jam a e low a yɛji.
Ɛgŋ eke b’erur eke ki dogŋn in e sel a, b’ow irmn; kɔ ɛgŋ a eke b’ow irmn in e sel a, b’ow anŋ owr.
M’am dad ɔny, lɛgŋ a eci ncok a, agŋ yony eke b’ow ɛru es ob ɛrur ob nyam af a, wɛl b’ow oc nyam, ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.
Ek’ɔyɔw yony am bɛbm sos ob iny eci, wɛl b’ow oc nyam, ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.
[Eke agŋ yony anŋ ɔgm, wɛl b’ow oc nyam, ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.]"
Sica in e jam ɛsɛl a ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ low na bogŋ ow b’ow ɛy ee?" Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Yogŋ eke sos megl ugŋn b’ow anŋ a, yogŋ anake sikaka b’ow as luku a."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a nyandrɛ ɛm odad yɛgm ɛl ek’ow akpl ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam, sos k’ɔ́wm ɛl es.
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛb nyam ɛm a, jɛj ok ɛs nyam anŋ eke ɛ́luam Nyam ke ám tutrm ɛgŋ yɛji.
Ɛb nyam ab ɛm cɛ, iŋnyɔw nyam yɛji anŋ eke sakp nɔnɔ b’ow ɛŋn’n ke ám ibrm’n eke ow ki jɛj in lele in ec’ifnu ab e low ok nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ɔ́ŋ’n.
Lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛm ɛtŋ, jɛj ok ɛs a ɛ́gŋm jɛjm in e low a okm, ɛtŋ n’am dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'Nawrɛ tasi m’ɛluam Nyam, ɛtŋ m’am tutrm ɛgŋ yɛji,
gbɛkɔ iŋnyɔw na am ijr’m gbre nɔnɔ. Mi b’ow mi jɛj in e low a m’ok, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ówm l’ijrm im gbre ij.' "
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Kɔ irir jɛj ok ɛs ŋuŋ na ec’odad eke dad ab ee?
Ɛtŋ Nyam ek’ɔny in ec’agŋ eke b’ɛlu’l lebl ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab a, li b’ow l’ɛw wɛl eci jɛj ok owi a es ow ibn ee?
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: li b’ow l’ogŋ es li jɛj wɛl e low l’ok. Kɔ lɛgŋ eke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn ɔmn ɛsɛl wus na af ee?"
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm odad ok agŋ a eke b’ubr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl ke b’ifn agŋ ɛjec’a ninɛ:
"Agŋ yony im ok Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a Nyam ŋɔŋn eci; nyam el Farisi ɛtŋ nyam el wus labm eb ɛs.
Farisi a igb inym es am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛrm ɛm dad ɛsɛ: 'O Nyam, m’am ɛlu’ŋ bia eke m’anm ɛsɛ agŋ amua na ek’el elu, ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl, afacu, oglog ɛsɛ wus labm eb ɛs na af a.
Nɛnɛgŋ gber nyam af, mi b’ ɛnŋ nɛny sakp yony. Ɛtŋ mi b’oc ɛm ec’ob fɛŋ eke mi kok a eci lɛw ɛm m’ap’ŋ.'
Kɔ wus labm eb ɛs a gbɛ kpab es agŋ a e lís inym es saw ɛm, ɔ́tum eke k’igbl any ogŋ lɛr afr yɛji, ɛtŋ am ok sabu ɛrmni dad ɛsɛ: 'O Nyam, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ aŋke m’el sikpl ɛs.'

Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: wus labm eb ɛs a, eke l’ɛwl mɛny n’aam akŋ a, Nyam oc in e sikpl a ap’r; kɔ ow elm Farisi a gbɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’igbl’l in sosi ogŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɔny is’r es; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’isr in sosi es a, Nyam b’ow ɔny igbl’l ogŋ."
Ca agŋ ot ey mɛny nɛnym yɛji ow eke Jesu k’at ɛl abu nuŋ. Eke jam ɛsɛl a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, -n’am ɛnym agŋ a abr.
Kɔ Jesu ɔŋ wɛl ot etuey a ow’r lís ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Yɛ̀br etuey ow ɛm ogŋ! Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́dŋn ɛl, aŋke tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛl af a eci.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’ɛgŋm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ebm ɛsɛ iyli af a, ɛgŋ ikŋ na, lɛgŋ kaka li k’ow l’ɔtum l’ɛym ɛm."
Jwifɛl ec’any ɛs nyam ibrm Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs mamn, kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ke m’íj sel ek’ɔnym uwr ec’aja ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɛsŋ’m ɛgŋ mamn ee? Ɛgŋ kaka elm ɛgŋ mamn, ek’ow elm Nyam sɔny coco cɛ.
Kɔ uw sol ab any ee? K’íjm nfaci, k’íbim ɛgŋ, k’íym mil, k’íjm daŋku yadŋ ɛm ɛgŋ e nuŋ af, ɛ́lum asŋ lele esŋ ab."
Any ɛs a dad ninɛ: "Likekli ɛm ɛtŋ mi b’ɛlum sol amua fɛŋ."
Eke Jesu b’iri odad na a, li dad ow ninɛ: "Eke kok ɛbɛn ke ow akpl, gbɛkɔ ow anŋ’ŋ low nyam: ɔ̀l ŋ ec’ob fɛŋ ek’ɔny a ij, òc ow ec’os a cɛc ɔgbɔru, ke b’ow ɛŋn ob ɔny afr, ca ɛ́wl mɛny ow us’m jam."
Eke any ɛs a iri odad na a, sos ɔw’r es aŋke n’ɔny ob nɔnɔ.
Jesu is any lɛr’r ɛtŋ ɛkn eke sos ɔw’r es; li dad ninɛ: "Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛm ɛy a ɛw tuɔtuɔ agŋ a ek’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a eci gbɛ!
Gbaŋkɔ kedebnam eci fɛfn ɔmu ɛm eke k’ɛcr a ɛw fuɛfuɛ akm gbreŋgbi eci Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛm ɛy a."
Agŋ a eke iri odad na a am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ sica bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu ek’ɛŋn sel ee?"
Jesu ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Yec’eke ɛw tuɔtuɔ agŋ ec’a, Nyam ogŋ a ow ɛw fuɛfuɛ."
Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Ŋ obi yɛji ɛkn, s’igŋ ɛy ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ s’ɛlu es s’am us’ŋ jam!"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ek’ɛgŋ igŋ in ec’akŋ, in e yɔw, lisijimɛl, in ec’agŋ oglog in ec’ey ab ɛlu es Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a sosiɛm,
li b’ow n’ɛŋn amua na fɛŋ bubu af lɛgŋ na ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ɛm a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr."
Jesu ɛsŋ in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ow ɛŋn’n saw ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ìsr any ɛkan, kin Jerusalɛm anake s’am uyu s’im a. Yogŋ anake low a fɛŋ eke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl nɔn ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e lís a b’ow iy nɛny a.
Wɛl b’ow oc ɛlu’l Nyam e low any uwm ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm. -Li b’ow -li kokr ow miyɛr, -li wɛwr ow, -l’afl ow sar any.
-Li b’ow -l’ɔr ow ŋgbre ɛm, ke ca -l’ibi ow. Ɛtŋ sɛgŋ nyahan li b’ow l’igb luw ɛm."
Kɔ jam ɛsɛl a irim odad eke n’am dad wɛl a okm ɛl es sos ɛm; odad a eci liy a k’ɛym ɔkm, ɛtŋ -l’uwm low yec’a eke Jesu am dad a e nyandrɛ ab any.
Eke -n’imn toŋ bake -n’am titm Jeriko a, any eflu nyam sig es ejagb saw am sasm ob.
N’am iri dedeku a ek’am ow a e lebl, ɛtŋ n’am ibrm l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi ee?"
Wɛl dad’r ek’ow el Nasarɛt e Jesu anake am ɛc a.
Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’am ɔg li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu, David eci lilaw, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ!"
Agŋ ek’anŋ anym am an es im a, am ɛnym’n abr eke li ki yewal, gbɛkɔ n’am at lebl es l’ɔg li dad l’ɛsɛ: "David e lilaw, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ!"
Eke n’am ɔg ɛbɛn a, Jesu inym es ɛtŋ ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛsŋ’n. Eke any eflu a ow titm’n a, Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ:
"Kɔ bla lowi am erur eke mi ki kok m’ɔŋ’ŋ ee?" Any eflu a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’am erur eke mi k’ɛkn es."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ ec’ɔmn a ewlm’ŋ; ɛ̀kn es gɔŋ!"
Kpɛkŋ any eflu a am ɛkn es, ɛtŋ n’am us Jesu jam li kɔklm Nyam. Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛkn low na a yɛji am kɔklm Nyam.
Eke Jesu ɛy Jeriko baŋn am ubr im a,
gbreŋgbi nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Zashe, ke el wus labm eb ɛsɛl ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a anŋ yogŋ.
N’am ɔl eke li k’ɛkn ɛgŋ a eke el Jesu a, kɔ bieku a sosiɛm, l’ɔ́tum eke li k’ɛkn ow aŋke l’el ɛgŋ kpɛtɛŋni.
Ɛtŋ l’uru es n’im l’uyu sikomor ikŋ nyam l’ɛy ɛm eke li k’ɛkn Jesu, eke ow b’ow ɛcr yogŋ ec’a sosiɛm.
Eke Jesu ow ba b’igŋ yogŋ a, l’igbl any ogŋ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Zashe, ògŋ es fafa us es; ow it eke yɛfɛnyna mi k’ɛy ŋ e gbugŋ a."
Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Zashe ogŋ es us es, oc Jesu ab im gbugŋ ɛtŋ eb’r sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɛkn low na a am sɛsl ów dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na gbɛ, sikpl ɛs ogŋ anake n’im n’am ij etu a!"
Kɔ Zashe igb inym es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ow m’oc ɛm ec’ob e m’ɔny a e likpr m’ap ɔgbɔru. Ɛtŋ eke m’eb ɛgŋ nyam ec’ob dufre ɛm, mil ɛm, ke m’ɔ́wr sakp yar m’ɔŋ’n."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna sel ɛŋn ɛy akŋ aŋa, aŋke ɛgŋ na yɛji el Abraham e lilaw.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ow am ɔl eke k’eb agŋ ek’irm a ɛlu es."
Eke -n’am iri sodad amua a, ɛmɛny Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad nyam aŋke n’am titm Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ a am tutr eke Nyam ec’ es ɛw a am ow ɛy ɔkm kpɛkŋ.
Ɛtŋ kin odad eke l’oc n’am dad: "Akŋ nyam ec’any ɛs nyam aam usu kpekpe ɛb nyam ɛm eke k’eb es ɛw ec’abusu, ke ɛ́wl mɛny ow.
Gbuŋ eke li k’im a, l’ɛsŋ in eci juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e lɛw, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ os ekŋ yen, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Òcr kokar juma ɛŋan mij toŋ ke m’ɛ́wl mɛny m’ow.'
Kɔ in ec’ɛb eyŋ a ifn’n, ɛtŋ -l’ɛrm agŋ us’r jam im dad eke ɛl erurm eke ɛgŋ ikŋ na in k’ɛw ɛl es.
Eke n’im l’eb es ɛw ec’abusu a bake l’ɛwl l’ow a, l’ɛsŋ in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a eke li cɛc os n’ɔŋ a eke li k’uw ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e juma e kok a e mij ek’ɛŋn ab any.
Krɛkrɛ ɛs a ow ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ŋ e os ekŋ yen ab ɛm, m’ɛŋn os fandi.'
Es ɛw ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Juma kok ɛs mamn, ow akpl gbɛ! Eke ij nɛny nyam low likekli na ɛm a, ow sosiɛm m’am ɔŋ’ŋ abusu ek’ɛw ɛb lɛw es.'
Yony ɛm ec’a yɛji ow ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ŋ e os ekŋ yen ab ɛm, m’ɛŋn os ekŋ yen yen sakp yen.'
Li dad ow ninɛ: 'M’am ɔŋ’ŋ abusu ek’ɛw ɛb yen es.'
Nyahan ɛm e juma kok ɛs a ow ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kin ŋ e os a eke m’ucu es ɔhɔny ɛm m’ɛw’ŋ es.
M’uru’ŋ aŋke m’uw any eke ŋ el ɛgŋ tuɔtuɔ. Ɛtŋ b’oc ob yec’eke ŋ ɛwm es a, b’ub egb yec’eke ewlm a.'
Eke li dad ɛbɛn a, es ɛw ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ŋ el juma kok ɛs ŋuŋ; m’ow m’oc ŋ ec’odad ebl a m’ɔbr’ŋ low. Uw any eke m’el ɛgŋ tuɔtuɔ, ke mi b’oc ob yec’eke m’ɛwm es, ke mi b’ub egb yec’eke m’ewlm a;
ɛtŋ kɔ bla ɛtŋ ocm ɛm e os a iim ɛwm es os es ɛw usu, ow kokm juma bake, ɛsɛ elel eke m’ow ab af a, ke m’óc os a lele ow e mij ab ab ee?'
Kpɛkŋ es ɛw ɛs a ɛwl mɛny ɛtŋ dad agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ninɛ: 'Èbr ir os a abu ɛm ɔ̀ŋn ɛgŋ a ek’ɔny fandi a.'
Kɔ -li dad ow ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, in n’ɔny os fandi ɛtŋ, ke ɛmɛny wɛl ɔŋ’n ee?'
L’ɔdu l’eb li dad ninɛ: 'Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke ɔnym ob ab a, wɛl b’ow obn’n; kɔ ɛgŋ eke ɔnym ob kaka a, tɛl a eke n’ɔny a yɛji, wɛl b’ow ɔdu eb’r abu ɛm.
Kɔ sica ɛm ec’efnu a ek’erurm eke mi k’el ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɔ̀nyn owr ɛl aŋa, ke íbir ɛl ɛm ec’any af!' "
Eke li dad ɛbɛn a, Jesu ikŋ bieku a anym am uyu im Jerusalɛm.
Eke n’im bake n’am titm Bɛtfaje lele Betani ab ek’el Olivie lafɛny a ec’ogog a, Jesu ɛrm in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ yony,
ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn baŋn a ek’anŋ anym a. Eke b’ow okr ɛm a, b’ow ɛkan gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋni nyam eke wɛl ucur es, ke ɛgŋ kaka k’uyum af. Ɔ̀nyn mɔmun in es ocr owr ir.
Ek’ɛgŋ b’ibrm ɔny low a sosiɛm eke am mɔmun gbaŋkɔli ab es a, dàdr ir ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl a ɔny ow ec’es abur.' "
Agŋ a eke l’ɛrm a im ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn low a ɛsɛ elel eke Jesu dad ɛl ab af.
Eke -n’am mɔmu gbaŋkɔli a es a, ow ec’ɛsɛl a am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am mɔmun gbaŋkɔli ab es ee?"
Ɛtŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl yony a dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl a ɔny ow ec’esabur."
Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -l’oc gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋni a -l’is Jesu. -L’oc ɛl eci sigbad -li faf ow af, ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ Jesu uyu af.
Eke -n’am an es -n’imn anym ec’a, agŋ am ot ɛl e sigbad faf ejagb.
Eke n’am titm Jerusalɛm, ejagb a ek’am us nuŋ es imn Olivie lafɛny af ec’a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am us’r jam a sos ɛm iŋn ɛm am kɔklm Nyam lebl gege, sakrowa a fɛŋ eke -l’ɛkan a sosiɛm eci.
-N’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ Ɛb Ebu ek’am ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ɔwrɔ! S’am kɔklm Nyam, ɛrm es ɛy lele anygbɛl ab ek’anŋ afr a sosiɛm eci!"
Farisiɛl bɛb ek’anŋ agŋ ab ɛm a, dad Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, ɛ̀dŋn ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a yéwal."
Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke -li yewal yɛji, mebn amua b’ow ɔg kɔklm im!"
Eke Jesu im titm Jerusalɛm ke b’ɛkn ɛb a, n’am ikŋ ow ec’ɔŋn li dad l’ɛsɛ: "O Jerusalɛm, blel ŋ yɛji uw lɛgŋ na ɛm ec’elel eke k’ɛŋn ɛrm es ɛy any ana! Kɔ sica ow lɔl’ŋ es any af.
Kɔ lɛgŋ am ow eke ŋ ec’efnu b’ow awŋ lakp iwr did ɛlul’ŋ ɛm, eb’ŋ susu fɛŋ, abur’ŋ es atr’ŋ sel.
-Li b’ow -ni ŋuŋn’ŋ nimum, ŋ lele ŋ ec’ɛb eyŋ ab ab. Ɛtŋ lebn kaka k’ow anm lawl lebn af ij, aŋke ŋ uwm lɛgŋ eke Nyam ow eke k’ɛlum’ŋ abu ab any!"
Sica Jesu im l’ɛy Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, l’ogŋ án ɔlu a l’ok ɔkm,
ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛm ec’êl a b’ow el Nyam ŋɔŋn ec’êl. Ɛtŋ ɔny, am ocr kokr elu eci ɛŋanin usu!"
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ Jesu b’im yɛgm agŋ low Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a, lele Jwifɛl ɛm ec’any ɛsɛl ab ab, am ɔl eke k’ibi’r.
Kɔ -l’uwmn elel eke -li k’ɛŋan ow any, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ b’iri in e low sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu am yɛgm agŋ low Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ n’am dad Amani Mamn ec’odad. Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab ow
ɛtŋ am ibrm ɛsɛ: "Dàd ɛy ɔ! Kɔ bogŋ ec’abusu ɛm am kok ów amua ee? Kɔ bwo ɔŋ’ŋ na eci kok ec’abusu ee?"
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm yɛji m’am ow m’ibrm ɔny low nyam cɛ. Dàdr’m,
kɔ bwo ɔŋ Jan abusu ow ok agŋ mij nuŋ ee? Kɔ Nyam oglog agŋ ee?"
Ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Eke si dad eke Nyam ɔŋ’n l’ow, li b’ow l’ibrm ɛy l’ɛsɛ: 'Kɔ bla sosiɛm ubmn in nawrɛ ee?'
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke si dad eke agŋ ɔŋ’n abusu l’ow, ow b’ow ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ot mebn eke k’ibi ɛy, aŋke -l’uw any eke Jan el Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs tasi."
Ɛtŋ sica -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "S’uwm ɛgŋ ek’ɔŋ’n abusu l’ow l’ok agŋ mij nuŋ ab any."
Ɛtŋ in yɛji li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ɛm yɛji mi k’ow mi dadm ɔny abusu yec’ɛm eke mi bi kok ów amua fɛŋ a."
Ɛmɛny Jesu am dad agŋ a nyandrɛ odad na ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ nyam ɔgm ɛs nyam ewl viny in ec’ɔgm a, l’oc l’abul ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ n’im usu lɛgŋ kpekpe eci.
Eke egb ub e lɛgŋ ow a, l’ɛrm in ec’abu ɛlum ɛs nyam im ɛŋn juma ɛsɛl a eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n egb a, in ec’eke k’ɛbm’n a. Eke abu ɛlum ɛs a im a, juma ɛsɛl a ɔr’r, ɛtŋ -l’ogŋ ow ow ɛwl abu ɔfr.
Ɛmɛny ɔgm ɛs a ɛrm abu ɛlum ɛs ɛjeci nyam. Kɔ in yɛji juma ɛsɛl a ɔr’r, wɛwr’r, ɛtŋ -l’ogŋ ow; ow ɛwl eke -n’ɔɔm ow ob kaka.
Ɛmɛny sakp nyahan ɛm, l’ɛrm abu ɛlum ɛs nyam im. Na ec’a gbɛ, -l’ɔr ow -li kok ow mob, ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ɔwl ow lakp jam a.
Eke egb ɔgm ɛs a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, li dad ninɛ: 'Oho! Kɔ sica ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee? Mi b’ow m’ɛrm ɛm ec’iy eke m’erur tasi a; ow k’ɔdm ke -n’ɔny ow ec’ɛlum.' Ɛtŋ l’ɛrm jim im.
Gbɛkɔ eke -l’ɛkan ow a, -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: 'Kin ɛgŋ a eke godo godo b’ow el aja ij ɛs a! S’íbi’r ke ɔgm a él ɛy eci.'
Ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ɔwl ow ɔgm a e lakp jam a, ɛtŋ -l’ibi ow." Sica Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ na, bla lowi ɔgm ɛs a b’ow kok ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl ab ee?
Li b’ow l’ow, l’ibi juma kok ɛsɛl a, ke l’óc ɔgm a n’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjeci." Eke agŋ a iri sodad amua a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ow k’ow ɛym ɛbɛn!"
Kɔ Jesu lɛr ɛl ɛtŋ ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ Nyam odad na e nyandrɛ el ayaf ee? Lebn a eke êl us ɛsɛl a oc ɔwl a, ɛwl el êl lɔy ɛm e lebn tasi.
Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛy lebn na af a, b’ow kikn es, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke lebn a b’ow ɛy af a, b’ow piplm ɛm el siflefl."
Eke ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ab ab uw any eke ɛl sosiɛm anake Jesu ub nyandrɛ na a, -n’am ɔl eke li k’ɔny ow ke -l’ɛdŋn ow e juma a, gbɛkɔ -n’am uru agŋ a.
Ow sosiɛm -n’am ɔsu Jesu kprakpr ɛm. -Li b’ɛrm agŋ ow ɛsɛ nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl af, eke k’ɔny Jesu in ec’odad ebl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’oc -l’ɛlu ow Jude ec’es ɛw ɛs a abu ɛm.

-N’am ibrm Jesu low ikŋ na -l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, s’uw any eke ŋ e Nyam e low eke bi dad ke bi yɛgm agŋ a el nawrɛ ɛtŋ úrum ɛgŋ any ɛ́s; Nyam ec’elel eke am ibrm eke si k’iir ɛb a, bi yɛgm ow ec’ejagb a kpɛŋ.
Kɔ dàd ɛy ɔ! Ɛy ec’ol ɔŋ abusu eke si ki sɔg wus labm s’ɔŋ Sesar ee?"
Eke -li dadr ɛbɛn a, Jesu uw ɛl e kprakpr ab any, ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ:
"Yɛ̀gmn’m os nyam." Ɛtŋ -l’oc ɛl ec’os a e nyam -n’am yɛgm ow. Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Mɛny ɛwr na lele nin na eke wɛl nɔn os na af a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ec’ow el ee?" Ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Sesare eci."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ke ɔ̀ŋn Sesar yec’ek’el in ec’a, ke ɔ́ŋn Nyam yɛji yec’ek’el in ec’a."
Na ɛm yɛji -l’ɔtum -n’ɔnym ow odad ebl ɛm agŋ a ec’any af. Kɔ odad eke li dad wɛl a iti ɛl any, ɛtŋ -li bubur ɛnyɛmbri.
Ow e jam a, Sadusiɛl ec’agŋ bɛb ow ɛŋn Jesu. (Ke Sadusiɛl anake bi dad ɛsɛ luw ɛm anŋ igb in anm a.) -N’am ibrm Jesu low na l’ɛsɛ:
"Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, Mois nɔn ol na ɔŋ ɛy dad ninɛ: Eke igŋ nyam ɛbi yɔw ɛtŋ l’ewm iy kaka toŋ l’uw, ow akpl ke lisijim éb iŋnyɔw a ɛbi, ke éw ey in ab ɛw lisijim nin es.
Kin agŋ lisijimɛl lɔbŋ e low ek’ɛŋn: likpekp a ɛbi yɔw, l’ewm iy kaka ow ab ɛtŋ l’uw.
Li b’uw a, yony ɛm ec’a eb iŋnyɔw a ɛbi. In yɛji l’ewm iy toŋ batŋ l’uw.
Eke in yɛji li b’uw a, nyahan ɛm ec’a yɛji eb iŋnyɔw a ɛbi. Ɛbɛn ɛbɛn toŋ ɛl lɔbŋ mum -l’ɛbi iŋnyɔw a ɛtŋ -l’uw eke -l’ewm ey kaka.
Ɛtŋ ow ec’uwr ɛm a, yɔw a yɛji uw.
Kɔ sica lɛgŋ eke agŋ ek’uw a b’ow igb luw ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ e yɔw tasi li b’ow l’el ab ee? Aŋke ɛl a fɛŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛbi’r ow el in e yɔw."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Wus na ec’egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab b’ɛbirir;
kɔ egŋ a lele ɔyɔw ab ab ek’it eke k’anŋ luw ɛm igb, ke ir ɛb afr a k’ow ɛbirm ij.
-Li k’ow -l’ɔtumn -l’uwmn ij aŋke -n’anŋ ɛsɛ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl af. Sica -l’el Nyam ec’ey, aŋke -n’anŋ luw ɛm -l’igb.
Mois dad ayal eke agŋ ek’uw a b’ow anŋ owr, aŋke kati a ek’am iri al ab ɛm a, l’ɛsŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Abraham e Nyam, Isak e Nyam, Jakɔb e Nyam.
Kɔ agŋ eke uw a e Nyam li k’el ee? Njaŋ, l’el agŋ ek’uw ke anŋ owr a e Nyam, aŋke in ec’a agŋ amua fɛŋ anŋ owr."
Ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, uw dad."
Low na eke li dad wɛl ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ kaka úsm af ibram’n low ij.
Sica Jesu ibrm ol e low any uw ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad eke Mesi el David eci lilaw ee?
Aŋke Selu e lɛl ab ɛm a, David in obi am dad ɛsɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam dad ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ ninɛ: 'Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af
toŋ bake m’ót ŋ ec’efnu a m’ok’ŋ akr ew.'
Ɛkan, eke sica David b’ɛsŋ’n 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ', ke ayaf Mesi a ɔtu eke k’el David e lilaw ab ee?"
Eke agŋ dedeku a am iri in ec’odad a, Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ:

"Ɔ̀sur sos ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl e lís, ɛl eke -li b’erur eke -li ki sus mob akpakp -n’am ɛcm ab, ke -li b’erur eke dedeku ɛm wɛl k’ɛsŋn ɛl ɛlum ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a -li bi dogŋn mɛkpn anym es. Es gbɛgbl ec’ob ij owi ɛm yɛji -li b’erur susu amamn.
-Li b’ufŋ eŋnyɔw ɛb es, ɛtŋ -li bi kok nyandrɛ -l’ɔfur Nyam ŋɔŋn yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ót ɛl agŋ amamn. Na sosiɛm anake ɛl e jɛj ok a b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ a."
Ow e jam a, Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm yogŋ cɛ, eke Jesu b’is any a, l’ɛkn egbreŋgbi ek’am ɛlu Nyam bia ok ɛl ec’ob ap a kɔprɔ ebr mob ab ɛm.
Ɛmɛny l’ɛkn iŋnyɔw gbɔr yɔw nyam yɛji ek’am ɛlu os ekekey yony kɔprɔ ebr ob ab ɛm;
ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: iŋnyɔw gbɔr yɔw na ap ob akm agŋ a fɛŋ ec’a,
aŋke ɛl ec’a -n’ɔŋ ɛl ec’ob eke -n’ɔnyn a ec’ow ek’igŋ af a, kɔ iŋnyɔw a ec’a, n’ɔŋ in e gbɔr ɛm ec’a eke n’ɔny a, ow kpra kpra a eke li k’iir ɛb af a."
Sica agŋ bɛb am dad Nyamel gbɛl a e sakpl owi, mebn amamn lele mob amamn ab eke wɛl ap Nyam a e low. Eke Jesu b’iri a, li dad ninɛ:
"Lɛgŋ am ow eke mebn amua ek’am ɛkan a, kaka k’ow usrm lawl lebn af anm, aŋke fɛŋ b’ow ɛr ok wus."
Odad na eke Jesu dad ab ɛm -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ bogŋ lɛgŋ iy low na b’ow ɛy ee? Ɛtŋ bogŋ e mɛny ɛwr ɛm, wɛl b’ow uw wanci a eke ów amua b’ow ɛy ab any ee?"
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Kì yɛbr ɛgŋ k’irmn ɔny! Tasi ɛm a, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ow ɛm e nin ɛm dad eke ɛl el Mesi a, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li dad eke lɛgŋ es abal el a in ow ŋ̂! Kɔ k’ùsr ɛl jam.
Eke batŋ am irir wɛl am dad ɔny ar owi lele ɛb e bɔbɔr owi ab a, ke erŋn k’ɔ̀ny ɔny. Ow it eke ów amua k’ɛy, kɔ ow elm wus na e nuŋ ɛdŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛbr nyam ec’agŋ b’ow im ɛŋn ɛbr ɛjeci nyam ogŋ ar; es ɛw nyam b’ow im ɛŋn es ɛw ɛjeci nyam ar ogŋ eci;
wus b’ow umu tuɔtuɔ, ɛtŋ susu nɔnɔ gbɛl af lek b’ow ɛy, ɔl eŋuŋ b’ow ɔny agŋ nɔnɔ; ów erŋn erŋn b’ow ɛy ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl b’ow anŋ afr ok ɔkm.

Gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke ów amua ɛ́y a, wɛl b’ow ɔny ɔny ke wɛl ijr ɔny gbre, wɛl b’ow ot im ɔny jɛj ok ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ok ɔny sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ot ok ɔny ɛ́b ebu lele es ɛw ɛsɛl ab abu ɛm, ek’eel ɛm e jam ɛsɛl a sosiɛm.
Na anake b’ow ɔŋ ijr ɛm e daŋku.
Ow sosiɛm a èbr ɛwr es nuŋ ɛm ke ɛrmij k’íkŋm anym okm ɔny low eke b’ow dadr dogŋnin ɔny sosi a eci.
