Ɛm obi m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny sodad ebl lele sɛwr ab eke b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ec’efnu a ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɔtum dadm odad akam ɔny es.
Ɔny ɛsɛl bɔbɔ yɛji, ɔny lisɛl, ɔny lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’agŋ lele ɔny lawlɛl ab b’ow ɔny ɔny ot im ɔny abusu ɛsɛl ec’any af; wɛl b’ow ɔb ɔny low, ibi ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ.
Ɛm sosiɛm agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow ifn ɔny,
kɔ ɔny e sin nuŋ bɔbɔ yɛji, kaka k’ow iram.
Ìnymn es kikri ɛbɛn cɛ; na ɛm anake b’ow ɛŋan sel a."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Eke b’ɛkan áru ek’iwr did ɛlul Jerusalɛm ɛm a, ke lɛgŋ ab anake b’ow uwr any eke wɛl b’ow ŋuŋn’n a.
Kpɛkŋ agŋ a eke b’ow anŋ Jude a, ow akpl ke -l’uru es -n’im mafɛny ɛm; agŋ eke b’ow anŋ Jerusalɛm baŋn a -n’im akpoj, ke agŋ eke b’ow anŋ sikpukpu ɛm a k’ɛ́ym baŋn a ij,
aŋke ow b’ow el jɛj ok e sɛgŋ. Yogŋ anake ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam Lɛl dad a b’ow iy nɛny a.
Sɛgŋ amua b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ molok ab lisɛl lele ɛl ek’am ɔŋ ey mɛny ab ab eci, aŋke sɛgŋ a ow b’ow el sɔrŋ ligbɛl eke b’ow ɛy ɛb ab ɛm. Ɛɛ, Nyam b’ow ɛlu in ec’ɛrm bebl ɔkm agŋ a e lís!
Wɛl b’ow ibi ɛl ar ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ot im ɛl madu ɔkr ɛm ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ɛm; ɛtŋ Nyam e low any uwm ɛsɛl b’ow eb Jerusalɛm ɔnym ab toŋ bake ɛl e lɛgŋ yɛji úwr."

Eke li dad na a, ɛmɛny Jesu ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ am ow eke mɛny ɛwr b’ow anŋ ligbn ɛm, awl ɛm lele mílɛ́l ɛm ab ok ɔkm. Eke wus na af ec’ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ b’ow iri okij lele mra ab e likekr a, -li b’ow -n’ɔny ɛrmij.
Agŋ erŋn b’ow ɔny toŋ úw, eke -li b’ow -li tutr ów a eke b’ow ɛy wus na af e low, aŋke nyam afr ec’abusu a b’ow ufŋ.
Yogŋ anake wɛl b’ow ɛkn ɛgŋ ec’ Iy eke b’ow anŋ jru ɛm ow, abusu ligbɛl lele anygbɛl ɛm ab a.
Eke ów amua b’ow ɔb nuŋ am ow a, ke átar sos es inymn es lɛɛr afr, aŋke ɔny ec’es eb ɛlu e lɛgŋ a ow titm ŋ̂."
Ɛmɛny Jesu oc nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀kan babm e likŋ lele ekŋ ɛjec’ab ab;
eke -n’am gigŋ ɔdɔdɔ a, kpɛkŋ b’uwr any eke mewij ow titm.
Ɛbɛn nyam coco, eke b’ow ɛkan ów amua ow a, ke kpɛkŋ úwr any eke Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ow titm.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a fɛŋ k’ow uwm ow uwrm, ɛtŋ ów amua b’ow ɛy.
Afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛc, kɔ ɛm ec’odad ebl a k’ow ɛcm."
"Ow sosiɛm, ɛ̀wr ɛrm! K’òcar ɔny sosi k’ɛlulil es gbɛgbl owi, mar ɔny owi, lele owr anŋ ec’ɛrmij ebr owi ab ɛm, bake íjal sos es lɛgŋ a ów okr ɔny es kpru,
ɛsɛ asawa eke b’ok ob af ɔny af; tasi ɛm a, ow b’ow okr wus na ec’agŋ a fɛŋ es.
K’ɛ̀rur mɛmn, kɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́nyn lɛc akmn ów amua eke b’ow ɛy ab es, ke ɔ́tur inymn es ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ec’any af."
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ Jesu b’im yɛgm agŋ low Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ lɛgŋ uk ɛm, li b’im l’ɛru Olivie lafɛny af.
Ɛtŋ ibribr fafa agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a eke k’iri in ec’odad.
Sica Futufutu eke ejru ánm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl ek’el Pak a e lɛgŋ a ow titm.
Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab am ɔl ew ew ɛm elel eke -li ki kokr bake -l’ibi Jesu, gbɛkɔ erŋn am ɔny ɛl agŋ a sosiɛm.
Ɛbɛn a, kpɛkŋ Satan ɛy Judas eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Iskariɔt, jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɛm.
Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ n’im n’ɛŋn Jwifɛl ec’ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Nyamel gbɛl a ec’ɔsu ɛsɛl ekpekp ab ab, ɛtŋ -l’iririr elel eke li k’oc Jesu l’ɛlu wɛl abu ɛm a.
Low na eke Judas dad ɛl a iŋn ɛl sos ɛm toŋ afŋn es, ɛtŋ -l’ɛwar ow eke -li b’ow -li sɔg ow labm.
Judas ɛgŋ eb, ɛtŋ sica n’am ɔl akunda sɛnyn yec’ɛm eke li k’ɔny Jesu n’ɔŋ wɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke dedeku a k’úwm any.
Lɛgŋ a ek’el Futufutu ek’ejru ánm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ eke wɛl k’ibi mɛcɛb kok Pak ec’ob ij a ow.
Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛrm Piɛr lele Jan ab dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn bɛbmn ɛy e Pak ec’ob ij a ec’usu."
Odad na eke ow dad ab ɛm, -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ erur eke si k’im si bɛbm ow e sos ee?"
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kin, eke b’imn ba b’ɛyr baŋn a, b’ow ɛŋan igŋ nyam ek’uyu mijel. Ùsr ir jam toŋ ɔny yɛji ókr gbugŋ a eke li b’ow l’ɛy a.
Eke b’okr gbugŋ a, dàdr gbugŋ ɛs a ɛsrɛ: 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs am ibrm akŋ yec’eke in k’ij Pak ec’es gbɛgbl ec’ob in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab.'
Ɛtŋ li b’ow li yɛgm ɔny êl afr a ec’akŋ gbɛl nyam ek’akŋ eci mob fɛŋ iy nɛny ɛm. Yogŋ anake b’ow bɛbmn ɛy ec’ob ij a e sos a."
Eke -n’imn a, -l’ɛkn low a fɛŋ eke Jesu dad ɛl a, ɛtŋ -li bɛbm Pak ec’ob ij a e sos -l’ɛw es.
Eke wanci ow bɛbmn ab a, Jesu lele in ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ow ok es ob ij usu a.
Eke -n’am ij ob a, Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’erur tasi eke mi k’ij Pak ec’ob na ɔny ab gbuŋ ke m’íj gbre.
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny eke mi k’ow m’ijm ob na ij, toŋ bake es gbɛgbl ikŋ na e liy a ɛ́y ɔkm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a."
Eke li dad odad na a, kpɛkŋ l’oc mij kpɔk, l’ɛlu Nyam bia ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Èbr mij kpɔk na ke ɛ́gŋn ɔny fɛŋ.
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny eke ɛmɛny mi k’ow m’ɛgŋm mar na ij toŋ bake Nyam ec’es ɛw a ów."
Ɛmɛny l’oc futufutu. L’ɛlu Nyam bia ɛtŋ n’ɔny l’ubr ɛm, n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Na el ɛm e sos megl [eke m’am ɔŋ ɔny. Kòkr low na ɛm ec’ɔkn eci."
Eke -l’ijr ob bake ow uwr a yɛji, l’oc mij kpɔk eke mar anŋ ɛm n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Mij kpɔk na el sinm owr eke Nyam kok ɛm e mebl eke ok es ɔny sosiɛm a eci.]
Gbɛkɔ kin: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’am ɔl ij’m a anŋ ob ij usu na ɛm ab!
Nawrɛ ɛm, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow uw ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw es ab af, kɔ gbre él ɛgŋ a ek’ɔl ij’r a eci!"
Low na eke -l’irir a ɔŋ ɛtŋ -n’am bibrmn ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ anake ki kok low na ɛy ɛm ab ee?"
Eke low na ɛc a, jam ɛsɛl a am atar ów es tuɔtuɔ eke k’uw ɛgŋ eke ɛl ɛm a k’el anymu ab any.
Ow sosiɛm Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛb ɛb ɛm eci ɛ́b ebu b’ɛw agŋ es, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’abusu ab ɛm -li bi dad wɛl eke wɛl k’ɛsŋ ɛl ów amamn kok ɛsɛl.
Kɔ ɔny ec’a, ow k’ow elm ɛbɛn. Ɛgŋ eke k’el ɔny ec’anymu a, n’ánŋ ɛsɛ iyli af; ke ɛgŋ eke k’el es ɛw ɛs a, ánŋ ɛsɛ ob oc ɔŋ ɛs af.

Tasi ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ el anymu ee? Kɔ ɛgŋ eke bi sig es am ij ob a, oglog ɛgŋ eke b’oc ob ɔŋ agŋ ab ee? Nawrɛ ɛm, ɛgŋ eke sig es am ij ob a el anymu, kɔ yadŋ ee? Ɛtŋ kin, ɛm m’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn ɛsɛ ob oc ɔŋ ɛs af.
Ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji anŋn ɛm ab, ɛm e gbre ijr fɛŋ ɛm.
Ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’ɛw agŋ es a, ɛbɛn ɛm yɛji m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny abusu nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ.
Ɛm ec’ es ɛw ab ɛm a, b’ow ijr ob, ɛgŋn, ɛtŋ b’ow ɛcr okr es mɛkpn af ɛ́wr Israɛl ec’eb lɛw yony a es."
Eke li dad low na bake ow uwr a, Jesu am lɛr Piɛr ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Simɔ, ìgŋ lɔru es iri! Satan ibrm abusu eke b’ow ɔny ufŋ ɔny ɛsɛ egbey eke wɛl bi cic suw es ɛm af.
Kɔ mi ŋɔŋn Nyam m’ɔŋ’ŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ŋ ec’ɔmn a k’ɔ́bm mɛny. Kɔ ŋ yɛji, lɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛwl ow el ɛm ec’a, àtr esŋ jimɛl a sos es."
Low na eke li dad a, Piɛr ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, mi bɛbm sos eke mi k’ɛy sobel ɛm ŋ ab, ke m’úw ŋ ab."
Kɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Piɛr m’am dad’ŋ, ncok a cɛ, ŋgɔs k’ow ikŋm ɛtŋ b’ow ɛgbr sakp nyahan dad eke uwm im any."
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ a eke m’ɛrm ɔny ke ocmn os, ekpr lele cɔkrukpɔ ab ke imn a, kɔ ɔnyn low nyam ec’es abur ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "S’ɔnym low kaka ec’es abur!"
Ɛtŋ ninɛ: "Kɔ sica, ɔny ec’ɛgŋ ek’ɔny os a, l’óc gɔŋ. Ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ekpr a yɛji l’óc; ke ɛgŋ ek’ɔnym lab a, l’ɔ́l in e mob sus ɛm a l’ij ke l’ɔ́l lab.
Kɔ m’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm, ow akpl ke Nyam Lɛl ɛm ec’odad na eke wɛl nɔn ɛm e lís a íy nɛny: Wɛl awl’l low ŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl ɛm a. Ɛɛ, ɛm e lís e low a eke wɛl nɔn a b’ow iy nɛny!"
Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kin s’ɔnym mab ler ɛm yony ab!" Ɛtŋ Jesu ubr odad a es ninɛ: "Na cɛ ow ɛny ŋ̂!"
Sica Jesu ɛy ɔkm im Olivie lafɛny af ɛsɛ elel eke li bi kok god’ɛtŋ ab af. In e jam ɛsɛl a yɛji us’r jam ab im.
Eke -n’imn ba -li b’ok yogŋ a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɛ́ymn ɛbm ɛkn owi ɛm."
L’ɛlu wɛl es n’im anym kpekpe tɛl, ɛtŋ yogŋ l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam li dad l’ɛsɛ:
"Ɛs, eke erur, ke ɔ̀ny gbre ij e mij kpɔk na kpab’m es lís. Ke fɛŋ ɛm a, ow k’él yec’a eke m’am erur a, kɔ yec’a eke am erur a."
[Kpɛkŋ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ am atr’r sos es.
Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, Jesu am ij ɛrm ɛm e gbre ɛtŋ am ŋɔŋn Nyam lɛc ɛm toŋ law am ok’r. Ɛtŋ in e law a am sus ok wus ɛsɛ mebl ekuey af.]
Eke ni ŋɔŋn Nyam bake ow uwr a, l’igb wus ɛtŋ l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow n’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl a, kɔ sos ɔw ɛl es toŋ ow el ɛl mɛmn.
Eke n’ɛŋan wɛl mɛmn ɛru ɛm a, l’uwr wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɛrur mɛmn ee? Ìgbr wus ke ŋɔ́ŋan yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɛ́ymn ɛbm ɛkn owi ɛm."
Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym am dad, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ilm any. Ɛtŋ Judas ek’el jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ɛm e nyam a anake am nyimn ɛl a. Eke -l’owr -l’okr yogŋ a, Judas im titm Jesu eke k’ɛy’raf.
Kɔ Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Judas, kɔ af ɛy ɛm am ɔl ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ij ee?"
Eke jam ɛsɛl a am ɛkn low a eke am ow ɛy a, -l’ibrm Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ s’ógŋ ɛl mum ɛy e mab ler ɛm ab ab ee?"
Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam iyr egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ec’abu ɛlum ɛs a lab, ɛtŋ l’ubr ow lidr e lɔru ab es.
Kɔ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ow ínym es gɔŋ!" Ɛtŋ l’itŋn igŋ a e lɔru a abu, ɛtŋ l’ewlm ow.

Sica li dad egb waw ɛsɛl a, Nyamel gbɛl a ec’ɔsu ɛsɛl ec’agŋ ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp a eke ow ɛl ab in ec’ɔny ec’a ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛm ec’ɔny a ibrm eke k’otr ekŋ ekpr lele mab ler ɛm ab owr ɛsɛ low ŋuŋ kok ɛs ɛm el af ee?
Sɛgŋ eke m’anŋ ɔny ab Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a ɔnymn’m. Kɔ sica ɔny e wanci eke k’ɔnyn’m a ow ŋ̂; catŋ ncebn ec’abusu a ow a."
Sica -n’ɔny Jesu ɛtŋ -l’oc ow ab -n’im egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a e gbugŋ a. Piɛr anŋ akpoj ɛm am us ɛl jam.
Wɛl fuf al lakp a ec’araŋn, agŋ ok es did al ɛlul ɛm a, ɛtŋ Piɛr yɛji im sig es ɛl ab.
Ob oc ɔŋ lis nyam ɛkn’n eke li sig es al saw a, l’ok ow anyamn af n’am lɛr ow gbiy, ɛtŋ ninɛ: "Igŋ na yɛji, n’anŋ Jesu ab!"
Kɔ Piɛr ɛgbr Jesu ɛtŋ dad ob oc ɔŋ lis a ninɛ: "Yɔw, m’uwm’n any."
Eke ow ibn tɛl a, ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam yɛji ɛkn’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ yɛji, el ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam." Kɔ li dad igŋ a ninɛ: "Njaŋ, m’anm ɛl ɛm!"
Ow ibn toŋ k’ij wanci nyam ka, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam at dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi ɛgŋ na yɛji el in ec’agŋ ab ɛm e nyam, aŋke l’el Galile iy."
Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "M’uwm ŋ e low yeci eke am erur eke ki dad ab any!" Odad na anŋ’n nɛnym n’am dad ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ŋgɔs ikŋ.
Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛwl mɛny ɔkŋ’n any am lɛr’r gbiy. Ow ɔŋ Piɛr ɔkn odad a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r a: "Gbuŋ ke yɛfɛnyna ŋgɔs íkŋ a, b’ow dad sakp nyahan eke uwm im any."
Ɛtŋ Piɛr ɛy ɔkm im gbeŋ am ikŋ low dudu ec’ɔŋn.
Agŋ ek’am ɔsu Jesu a am kokr’r miyɛr ɛtŋ am ɔr’r.
-N’awŋ ow any es, -n’am ɔr ow kukuta ɛm, -n’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Ek’el Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs, ke dád ɛy ɛgŋ ek’iyr’ŋ ob a!"
Ɛtŋ -n’am dad ów eŋuŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl -l’ok ow af miyɛr kokr ɛm.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Jwifɛl ɛm ec’agŋ ekpekp a ek’el egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab as luku. -N’ɔŋ wɛl oc Jesu ow Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af,
ɛtŋ -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Dàd ɛy s’íri gɔŋ! Kɔ ŋ el Mesi ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke mi dad ɔny yɛji, k’ow ubmn nawrɛ;
ɛtŋ eke m’ibrm ɔny low yɛji, k’ow ɛgŋmn dadmn’m.
Kɔ jam aŋa ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow sig es Nyam Abusu Ɛs e lidr abu af."
Ɛl fɛŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Ke Nyam ec’Iy el a!" Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ow kpɛŋ anake ɔny obi dadr a."
Ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Ow akplm eke si k’ibrm adaŋku ij! Sica ɛy obi yɛji s’iri’r nɛnym ŋ̂!"
Eke -li jɛjr Jesu ec’ów -l’okr bake ow uwr a, dedeku a nimum igb wus ɛtŋ oc Jesu ab im Pilat ec’any af.
Yogŋ, kpɛkŋ -n’am cicr ow -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "S’ɛbmn nyamn s’ɛkn eke ɛgŋ na am irmn ɛy ec’agŋ a; li bi dad wɛl eke wɛl kí sɔgm wus labm ɛtŋ li b’ocr in sosi Mesi, ɛb ebu nyam."
Ɛtŋ Pilat ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ nawrɛ, ŋ Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu ee?" Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi dad."
Ɛbɛn a, Pilat dad egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele bieku ab ab ninɛ: "M’ɛŋnm low ɔbr kaka igŋ na ɛm."
Gbɛkɔ -n’am at lebl es -li dad lɛc ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na bi dad agŋ eke k’ɔbr ɛb any. L’ɔb ow e low yɛgm nuŋ Galile ɛtŋ, toŋ l’ow l’ok Jude wus af, ɛtŋ sica l’ow aŋa yɛji."
Eke Pilat iri odad na a, l’ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛgŋ na Galile ec’ɛgŋ ee?"
Eke wɛl dad’r eke Jesu el Galile ec’ɛgŋ, ke l’uw any eke yogŋ anŋ Erɔd ec’es ɛw ɛm a, n’ɔŋ wɛl oc Jesu im ow ec’any af, aŋke Erɔd in obi yɛji lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, n’anŋ Jerusalɛm.
Eke l’ɛkn ow a, sos ɛm am iŋn’n aŋke l’iri wɛl dad’r ow e lís e low, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ n’am erur eke li k’ɛŋn ow bake ow kok mɛny ɛwr nyam l’ɛ́kn.
Li bibrm ow ów nɔnɔ, kɔ Jesu ɔbm kpu kaka ɔɔm’n.
Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab yɛji ek’anŋ yogŋ a am cicr Jesu lɛc ɛm.
Ɛtŋ Erɔd lele in eci srɔda eyŋ ab ab am kokr Jesu miyɛr, ɛtŋ am oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ keskes af. -L’ɛw ow mob sus ɛm mamn sos, ɛtŋ l’ɛwlm ow mɛny ow im Pilat ogŋ a.
Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Erɔd lele Pilat ab eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm ijarm a, ɛwl el agŋ lawlɛl.
Eke Pilat am ɛkn eke low ɔbr kaka anm Jesu ɛm a, l’as egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a, es ɛw ɛsɛl a lele dedeku a fɛŋ ab luku,
ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ocr ɛgŋ na isr’m ɛtŋ am dadr eke ow’n am irmn agŋ. Na sosiɛm m’ibrm’n low ɔny ec’any af. Kɔ kin, m’ɛŋnm low ŋuŋ kaka eke li kok ke ow sosiɛm am ɔŋn in dedeku a.
Ɛbɛn nyam coco, Erɔd yɛji ɛŋnm low ɔbr kaka in ɛm, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm l’ɛwlm ow mɛny. M’am ɛkn ke ɛgŋ na kokm low ɔbr kaka ek’it eke wɛl k’ibi’r.
Gbɛkɔ m’ow m’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr’r ŋgbre ɛm, ke m’ɛ́lu’l es."
[ Pak ec’es gbɛgbl fɛŋ e lɛgŋ a, ow akpl ke Pilat ɛ́lu sobel ɛm ɛs nyam eke dedeku a b’erur a es.]
Eke Pilat dad ɛl ɛbɛn a, kpɛkŋ -n’am ɔg ɛl fɛŋ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ìbi ɛgŋ na, ke ɛ́lu Barabas es ɔŋ ɛy!"
(Ke Barabas na, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke bɔbar ɛy Jerusalɛm baŋn a, in anake wɛl ɛlu’l sobel ɛm a, aŋke l’ɔbr ɛb any, ɛtŋ l’ibi ɛgŋ yɛji.)
Gbɛkɔ eke Pilat am erur eke k’ɛlu Jesu es a, ɛmɛny l’ibrm eke li k’iri dedeku a nɛnym.
Kɔ -n’am ɛlu Pilat lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af! Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af!"
Ɛmɛny Pilat eb odad sakp nyahan ɛm ɛtŋ ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Bla low ɔbr iy li kok ee? Ɛm gbɛ m’ɛknm low ɔbr kaka in ɛm ek’it eke wɛl k’ibi’r; gbɛkɔ m’ow m’ɔŋ wɛl ɔ́r’r ŋgbre ɛm, ke m’ɛ́lu’l es."
Kɔ dedeku a nɛny anŋ ɛm cɛ am ibrm sɔ́g ɛm eke wɛl k’ɛw Jesu olikŋ af. Ɛtŋ ɛl e sɔ́g e lebl a akm Pilat es.
Ɛtŋ Pilat ɛgŋ dedeku a ec’a ek’am ibrm a eb.
L’ɛlu Barabas ek’ɔbr ɛb any, ibi ɛgŋ ke ow sosiɛm wɛl ɛlu sobel ɛm a es. Ɛtŋ l’oc Jesu n’ɔŋ dedeku a yec’ɛtŋ -li kok ow ɛl e low eke -n’am erur a.
Eke -l’ocr ow ab -n’aam a, -l’ɔbr Sirɛn baŋn iy nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ ek’anŋ akp ɛm am ow. Eke srɔda eyŋ a b’ɛkn’n a, -n’ɔny ow lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ -l’oc Jesu ec’olikŋ a -n’ɔŋ ow eke ow k’abu us ow jam.
Agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl am us’r jam, ɛtŋ ɔyɔw nɔnɔ ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm a am ikŋ ɔŋn ok sabu ɛrmni in sosiɛm.
Eke Jesu b’ɛwl mɛny a, n’am lɛr wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Jerusalɛm ec’ɔyɔw, k’ìkŋn ɔŋn ɛm sosiɛm; kɔ ìkŋn ɔny lele ɔny ec’ey ab eci!
Kɔ lɛgŋ am ow eke agŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: 'Ehe él etr yɔw eke ewm ey, ke ɔɔm ey mɛny lɛgŋ kaka a eci!'
Lɛgŋ ab anake agŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: 'Mafɛny, bùbmn okr ɛy af! Egigl, bùburir ɛy es a!'
Tasi ɛm a, eke wɛl am kok likŋ ek’anŋ owr a nɛnɛ, ke likŋ wɛwɛ ec’a ayaf wɛl b’ow kokr’r ab ee?"
Srɔda eyŋ a oc agŋ ɛjeci yony ek’el ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl yɛji ow eke wɛl k’ibi ɛl Jesu ab.
Eke -n’imn usu a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Nuŋ kpɔk ec’usu a', -l’ɛw Jesu lele ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl yony ab ab olikŋ af; Jesu anŋ araŋn, nyam anŋ’n lidr abu af, ɛtŋ nyam anŋ’n nɛmn abu af.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, òc ap ɛl aŋke -l’uwm yec’eke -n’am kok ab any." Srɔda eyŋ a cɛc in e mob sus ɛm sɔsum oc kok ɛm.
Agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a am lɛr’r. Ɛtŋ Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a am kokr’r miyɛr dad ɛsɛ: "L’eb agŋ ɛjeci l’ɛlu es; eke l’el Mesi eke Nyam sɔsum oc a, ke l’ébr in sosi s’ɛkn!"
Srɔda eyŋ a yɛji am kokr’r miyɛr. -Li b’im -li titm ow, -l’oc ɛl e mar a -n’am ɔkŋ ow ke -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ:
"Ek’el Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu, ke ébr ŋ sosi ɛlu es gɔŋ!"
In ec’olikŋ a e nuŋ af a, -ni nɔn odad na -l’aru: 'Ɛgŋ na el Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu.'
Ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl a eke wɛl ok olikŋ af ab ɛm a yɛji, nyam am wɛwr Jesu dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ŋ elm Mesi ee? Ek’el Mesi, ke èbr ŋ sosi ɛlu es, bake ɛy yɛji éb ɛlu ɛy es ɔ!"
Odad na eke li dad a, lawl a am ɛym’n abr dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛ́luam Nyam ee? Ŋ yɛji am ij gbre ɛsɛ in af.
Ɛy ec’a, ow it eke si k’ij gbre, aŋke ɛy ec’ów eŋuŋ e si kok a e labm sɔg anake s’ɛŋn a. Kɔ in, li kokm low ŋuŋ kaka!"
Eke li dad odad na a, ɛmɛny li dad ninɛ: "Jesu, k’ìjl’m es lɛgŋ eke b’ow ow ŋ ec’es ɛw ab ɛm a."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "M’am dad’ŋ nawrɛ ɛm, yɛfɛnyna cɛ b’ow anŋ ɛm ab Nyam ec’ usu mamn a."
Sica ow anŋ tɛl ke lɛgŋ úyu nuŋ, ɛtŋ ligbn a ek’am afŋ a irm es; ncebn ɛy wus na nimum af toŋ ncebles eci wanci nyahan ɛm.
Ɛtŋ Nyamel ab ɛm eci gbad gbɛl gbada a eke wɛl ɛw ɛdŋn usu lala ab any a, igŋ afr ɛm a ɛtŋ agbr ɛm araŋn didi toŋ ok esr ɛm a.
Ɛtŋ Jesu barm lebl tuɔtuɔ dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, m’oc ɛm ec’abŋ a m’ɛlu’ŋ abu ɛm." Li dad odad na ba li b’ok es, ɛtŋ l’uw.
Eke Rom eci srɔda eyŋ a ec’anym ɛs a ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a, n’am kɔklm Nyam li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, ɛgŋ na el nɛny nyam ɛs!"
Agŋ a ek’ow yogŋ a yɛji ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a. Ɛl e mɛny ɛwl ɛm a, -n’am ok sabu ɛrmni low dudu ɛm -n’im.
Ɛtŋ Jesu lawlɛl lele ɔyɔw a ek’us’r jam Galile ɛtŋ a, inym es akpoj, ɛtŋ am ɛkn low na ek’am ɛy a.

Ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Josɛf, Jwifɛl eci baŋn eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Arimate ec’ɛgŋ, erur eke k’oc Jesu im oc es. L’el ɛgŋ mamn, nɛny nyam ɛs, ek’ɔmn ɛm am eku Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a e mowrer. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’el Jwifɛl e Sanedrɛn ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam, kɔ l’erurm low a eke lawlɛl a bɛbm Jesu ec’ibi ec’a.
Na sosiɛm, n’im n’ɛŋn Pilat ɛtŋ l’ibrm eke ow k’oc Jesu eci sos megl a ɔŋ’n.
Eke Pilat ɛlu abusu es a, Josɛf ɔny sos megl a usm es olikŋ ab af, l’oc gbad ufu nyam li wiwrm ow ab, ɛtŋ l’oc n’im l’oc ow es uwɔmu lob eke n’ɔŋ wɛl ur ab ɛm, ke lɛgŋ kaka wɛl ocm ɛgŋ es ɛm.
Lɛgŋ a el nɛnɛgŋ e sos bɛbm e lɛgŋ, ɛtŋ nɛnɛgŋ a yɛji ow titm.
Eke Josɛf aam oc Jesu es a, ɔyɔw a eke am us Jesu jam Galile ɛtŋ a, ow yogŋ ɛtŋ ɛkn uwɔmu a lele elel eke wɛl ɛrum’n es ab ab.

-L’ɛwl mɛny -n’im ɛl ogŋ a, ɛtŋ -li kok mun sŋɔsŋɔ lele simijey ab eke -li ki kpakp Jesu e sos megl a. Gbɛkɔ eke lɛgŋ a el nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, ow sosiɛm -n’am eb sel ɛsɛ elel eke Jwifɛl ec’ol a dad ab af.
Sica lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ a ec’ibribr fafa a, ɔyɔw a ot mun sŋɔsŋɔ eke -li kokr ab ab aam Jesu ec’ uwɔmu ab af.
Eke -li b’ok yogŋ a, -l’ɛkn eke lob a eke abl uwɔmu a ec’ɛm ɛy usu ab es a wuwl oc es,
ɛtŋ -l’ok uwɔmu ab ɛm. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛknm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e sos megl a,
ɛtŋ ca -l’uwmn elel eke -li ki dadr any. Kpɛkŋ Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yony eke sus mob ek’am jɛjn a ok ɔkm ɛl ec’any af.
Eke ɔyɔw a b’ɛkn ɛl a, erŋn am ɔny ɛl -li sis any es, ɛtŋ ow ɔdm eke -li ki lɛr wɛl. Ɛtŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɔɔl agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, ɛgŋ ek’anŋ owr ab ee?
N’anm aŋa; l’igb luw ɛm. Ɔ̀kan ow a eke li dad ɔny lɛgŋ a eke n’anŋ Galile a:
'Ow akpl ke wɛl óc ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɛ́lu sikpl ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm, ke wɛl bábl’l ecigbrɔ olikŋ af, ke sɛgŋ nyahan n’ánŋ luw ɛm l’igb.' "
Ɛtŋ ɔyɔw a ɔkn odad a eke Jesu dad ɛl a.
-N’ŋgboŋ uwɔmu ab af, ɛtŋ -n’im -n’am dad ów a fɛŋ ek’ɛy a -l’ok jam ɛsɛl lɛw nyam a lele agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab.
Ɔyɔw a el: Mari, Magdala yɔwi a, Jana, lele Mari, Jak lis ab. Ɛtŋ ɔyɔw bɛb a ek’anŋ ɛl ab yɛji, dad odad nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ ok ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
Kɔ ɛrm ɛsɛl a am tutr eke ow el yadŋ owi, ɛtŋ -n’ɔnym ɔmn odad a eke ɔyɔw a dad ɛl ab ɛm.
Ɛbɛn a Piɛr uru es im uwɔmu ab af, l’is any li lɛr uwɔmu ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn gbad a eke wɛl oc wiwrm sos megl ab ab a cɛ ek’ɛru es. Low na eke l’ɛkn a iti’r any, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl mɛny n’im.
Lɛgŋ a cɛ, jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ yony aam baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Emayus, ke Jerusalɛm ab a, án es wanci yony gbuŋ ke ók yogŋ.
Ejagb ab af eke -n’aam a, -n’am dad low a ek’ɛy a ec’odad.
Eke -n’am dad odad -l’atar ów es a, Jesu in obi ow ɛŋn ɛl, ɛtŋ us ejagb ɛl ab aam.
-N’am ɛkn ow gɔŋ, kɔ -l’uwmn ow any.
Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Bla ów iy am atarir es ee?" Sos ɔw ɛl es, ɛtŋ -l’uk -n’inym es.
Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kleopas dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ sɔny cɛ el ɛgŋ ek’ir Jerusalɛm aŋa, ke uwm low na ek’ɛy sɛgŋ amua ɛm ab any ee?"

Jesu ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi ɛy?" Ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Nasarɛt iy Jesu e lís e low. Ɛgŋ na el kokoba ɔb ɛs abusu ɛs; ɛtŋ l’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm in e juma kok ɛm lele in ec’odad ebl ɛm ab, Nyam ec’any af lele agŋ ec’any af ab.
Kɔ ɛy ec’ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele ɛy e Nyamel ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab oc im’n wɛl ɔb’r low, ɛw’r olikŋ af wɛl ibi’r.
Ɛy s’ɔmn eke in anake li b’ow li sɔg Israɛl a. Ɛtŋ kin, yɛfɛnyna ab ow ij sɛgŋ nyahan eke l’uw wɛl oc’r es.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy ɛm ec’ɔyɔw bɛb dad ɛy low any iti owi tasi. Ibribr a -l’igb fafa -n’im uwɔmu ab af,
ɛtŋ -l’ɛknm ow e sos megl a. -L’ɛwl mɛny -l’ow -li dad ɛy eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yony in ok ɔkm in dad ɛl eke Jesu in anŋ owr.
Ɛy ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb yɛji im uwɔmu ab af ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn low a ɛsɛ elel eke ɔyɔw a dad ɛy ab af. Gbɛkɔ ow gbɛ, -l’ɛknm ow."
-Li dad odad na ba -li b’ok es, ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Oy! Anyamb agŋ, úbmn kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad eke dad a nawrɛ!
Kɔ uwmn any eke Mesi a k’ij gbre ɛbɛn gbuŋ ke l’ɛ́y in ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm ee?"
Ɛtŋ n’am otar ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam Lɛl dad in e lís a e low akr l’ok wɛl. L’ɔb nuŋ Mois ec’ol ab ɛm toŋ l’igŋ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’ów a e dad ab ɛm.
Eke -n’imn bake -n’am titm baŋn a, Jesu kok ɛsɛ anym eci ow’n k’imn af.
Kɔ agŋ yony a dad’r ninɛ: "K’ìm; ànŋ ɛy ab eke lɛgŋ am uk, ke ncebn am ow a sosiɛm." Ɛtŋ n’im n’ɛŋn wɛl -n’anŋ.
Eke ow sig wanci eke -li k’ij ob a, Jesu oc futufutu a, l’ɛlu Nyam bia, l’ubr ɛm n’ɔŋ wɛl.
Kpɛkŋ jam ɛsɛl yony a anyamn ɛm ayl, ɛtŋ -l’uw ow any; kpɛkŋ l’irm wɛl ec’any af.
Ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir -l’ɛsɛ: "Eke s’us ejagb s’am ow, ke n’am otar Nyam Lɛl ɛm ec’ów akr l’ok ɛy a, lɛfr mɛnŋ am itr ɛy sos!"
Kpɛkŋ -l’ɛwl mɛny -n’im Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl lɛw nyam a eke as luku lele ɛl lawlɛl ab ab,
ke ok es am dad ɛsɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ igb luw ɛm batŋ Simɔ ɛkn’n!"
Ɛtŋ ɛl yɛji -n’am dad low a eke -l’ɛkan ejagb af a, lele elel eke -l’uwr Jesu any, futufutu a eke n’am ubr ɛm ab ɛm.
Eke odad anŋ ɛl nɛnym -n’am dad a, Jesu in obi ɛy ɔkm ɛl ec’araŋn ɛtŋ ɛsŋn ɛl: "Ɛrm es ɛy ánŋ ɔny ab!"
Kpɛkŋ erŋn ligbɛl am ɔny ɛl aŋke -n’am tutr eke ɔŋn abŋ anake -l’ɛkan a.
Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ erŋn am ɔny ɔny ufŋn ee? Bla ɛtŋ úbmn nawrɛ ee?
Ɛ̀kan ɛm e sabu araŋn a lele ɛm ec’akr ab ab; ɛm obi ana! Ìtŋnin’m abu ke ɛ́kan. Ɔŋnabŋ ɛ́lim sos megl lele ew ab ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɛli am ɛkan ab af!"
Eke li dad wɛl odad na a, li yɛgm wɛl in e sabu araŋn a lele in ec’akr ab ab.
Sos ɛm am iŋn ɛl, gbɛkɔ ow am iti ɛl any ɛtŋ -li k’ubm nawrɛ tasi. Ow ɔŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔnyamn ob ij tɛl ab aŋa ee?"
Ɛtŋ -l’oc ɔcn ikpr eke wɛl ɔw a -n’ɔŋ ow.
Jesu eb ɔcn a ij ɛl ec’any af.

Sica li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛ̀kan ów amua, mi dad ɔny ow e low lɛgŋ a eke m’anŋ ɔny ab a. Mi dad ɔny eke ów a fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔn ɛm e lís ke anŋ Mois ec’ ol ab ɛm, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e lɛl ɛm, toŋ igŋ Selu e lɛl ɛm a b’ow iy nɛny."
Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu eke wɛl k’iri Nyam Lɛl ɛm ec’odad a ók ɛl es sos ɛm.
Ca l’ɔkn wɛl ów a li dad ninɛ: "Kin ow eke wɛl nɔn: ow akpl ke Mesi úw, ke sɛgŋ nyahan n’ánŋ luw ɛm l’igb,
ke wɛl yɛ́gm ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ low in e nin ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ítŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke -n’ɛŋn ɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap. Ow ɔ́b nuŋ Jerusalɛm,
ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow eel ów amua ec’adaŋku.
Ɛtŋ m’ow m’awŋ ɔny Abŋ Lala a eke ɛm Ɛs ɛwar ow e low a. Gbɛkɔ ànŋn baŋn toŋ bake afr ec’abusu a ów ɛŋn ɔny."
Eke li dad wɛl ów amua bake ow uwr a, ca Jesu ot ok ɛl ɔkm, ɛtŋ ɛl ab -n’im -li titm Betani, ɛtŋ yogŋ li gbigbl sabu ogŋ l’ɛdŋ wɛl ɔwrɔ.
Eke n’am ɛdŋ wɛl ɔwrɔ a, l’ɛlu wɛl es ɛtŋ n’im afr.
Jam ɛsɛl a igŋ’n nuŋ, ɛtŋ ɛwl mɛny ow Jerusalɛm sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ -li b’anŋ Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm -li kɔklm Nyam.
Nuŋ ɔb ɛm e low fɛŋ e kok ɛm a, ke Odad anŋ ŋ̂. Ɛgŋ a eke el odad a okr af Nyam ab, ɛtŋ Odad a el Nyam.
Nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ Odad okr af Nyam ab.
Nyam oc’r kokr’r ob fɛŋ; ob kaka anm eke wɛl kok ke n’anm ɛm;
fɛŋ a eke wɛl kok a ɛŋn sel in ɛm. Sel ikŋ na el agŋ eci usuayl.
Usuayl am afŋ ncebn ɛm ɛtŋ ncebn ebm’n.
Nyam ɛrm ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jan ow.
N’am ow ɛsɛ daŋku af, ke l’íj usuayl e daŋku yec’ɛtŋ ke in ɛm agŋ a fɛŋ úb nawrɛ.
In obi a l’elm usuayl, kɔ usuayl eci daŋku cɛ l’ij.
Usuayl ikŋ na el usuayl tasi a ek’am ow wus af aŋa ayal agŋ fɛŋ a.
Odad a anŋ wus af aŋa. Nyam oc’r kokr’r wus, kɔ wus uwm’n any.
L’ow in ec’agŋ ɛm, kɔ in ec’agŋ ɛgŋm ebm’n.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ bɛb eb’r ɛtŋ ɔny ɔmn in ɛm; n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu eke wɛl k’el Nyam ec’ey.
Ow elm sos megl af e mew ab ɛm, oglog ɛgŋ ec’erur ɛm -l’elm Nyam ec’ey, kɔ Nyam ec’erur ɛm -l’el Nyam ec’ey.
Odad a ɛwl el ɛgŋ ɛtŋ ir ɛb ɛy ab; Nyam ec’erur eke ítŋnm lele nɛny nyam ij ab iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ. S’ɛkn in ec’anygbɛl a, anygbɛl eke Iy b’ɛŋn Ɛs ɛm.
Jan ij in e daŋku. L’ɛlu lebl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ a eke m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ’m jam am ow, kɔ n’ɔny any l’akm’m aŋke l’ikŋ anym n’anŋ gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’anŋ a,' ke in ec’odad anake m’am dad a."
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ s’ɛŋn in eci aja ab ɛm eci ɔwrɔ a, tasi li yibr ɛy ow bobn.
S’ɛŋn ol Mois ɛm, kɔ Nyam ec’erur ek’ítŋnm a lele nɛny nyam ij ab a, anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow.
Lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ɛknm Nyam, kɔ Iy ekpɔbi a sɔny coco eke el Nyam ke anŋ Ɛs ab a cɛ ɛlu’l ɔkm.
Jwifɛl e nuŋ af ɛsɛl ek’el Jerusalɛm ec’a ɛrm egb waw ɛsɛl lele Leviɛl ab Jan ogŋ a eke -li k’ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ bwo el ŋ ee?" Kin Jan eci daŋku ek’ij.
Jan ɔnynm sos es odad a e dad ɛm ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eci any af li dad l’ɛrum mar ninɛ: "Ɛm, m’elm Mesi a."
-L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ ŋ bwo ee? Kɔ ŋ Eli ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "Njaŋ, m’elm Eli." -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ Kokoba ɔb ɛs ab ee?" Ninɛ: "Njaŋ."
Ɛmɛny -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ke sica ŋ bwo el ŋ ee? Agŋ a ek’ɛrm ɛy a, odad si k’ɔny si dad ɛl. Kɔ ŋ ayaf am ocr ŋ sosi ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm, m’el ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ loj am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: Kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ejagb a ínym sɛnyn sɛnyn a!" (Kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi ec’odad eke dad ab ana.)
Ke ɛ́rmu ab ɛm Farisiɛl anŋ eke ɛmɛny am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Eke batŋ elm Mesi a, elm Eli, elm Kokoba ɔb ɛs a, ke bla k’ɔŋ k’am ok agŋ mij nuŋ ee?"
Jan dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm, m’am ok ɔny mij nuŋ mij ɛm; gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke uwmn any.
N’anŋ’m jam n’am ow, ɛtŋ m’itm bɔbɔ yɛji eke mi ki mɔmu in e cɔkrukpɔ meb ab es."
Ów amua fɛŋ am ɛy Betani ɛb ɛm Jurdɛn jam, yogŋ a eke Jan am ok agŋ mij nuŋ a.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, Jan ɛkn Jesu ek’am ow in ogŋ ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Kin Nyam e licɛbli a eke b’ow ɔny wus na e sikpl oc es a.
Lɛgŋ a eke m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ’m jam am ow, n’ɔny any l’akm’m, aŋke l’ikŋ anym n’anŋ gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’anŋ a,' ke in ec’odad anake m’am dad a.
M’uwm ɛgŋ a ek’ow k’el ab any, gbɛkɔ m’ow eke mi k’ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɔ́ŋ Israɛl ec’agŋ a uw’r any."
Ɛmɛny l’ij daŋku li dad ninɛ: "M’ɛkn Abŋ Lala ek’anŋ afr us es ɛsɛ kel af ke sig’r es af.

Ke mi k’uwm ɛgŋ eke l’el ab any, gbɛkɔ Nyam eke ɛrm’m m’ow eke mi k’ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm a dad’m ninɛ: 'B’ow ɛkn Abŋ eke b’ow us es ke sig es ɛgŋ nyam af, in anake li b’ow l’ok agŋ mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm a.'
M’ɛkn low na ɛtŋ m’am ij daŋku eke ɛgŋ na el Nyam ec’Iy."
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, ɛmɛny Jan lele in e jam ɛsɛl yony ab anŋ yogŋ.
Eke l’ɛkn Jesu ek’am ɛc a, li dad ninɛ: "Kin Nyam eci licɛbli a ɔ!"
Eke Jan eci jam ɛsɛl yony a iri odad na a, -l’us ow jam.
Jesu ɛwl sos mɛny, l’ɛkn eke agŋ yony am us’r jam, ɛtŋ l’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny, bla am ɔɔl ee?" -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Rabi, kɔ ŋ bogŋ ir ee?" (Rabi e nyandrɛ el 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs.')
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Òwr, b’ow ɛkan." Ke ow am titm ncebles eci wanci yar. -N’im -l’ɛkn yogŋ a eke l’ir a, ɛtŋ -n’anŋ ow ab lɛgŋ ikpr a.
Agŋ a ek’iri Jan eci sodad a ke us Jesu jam a e nyam el Andre, Simɔ Piɛr lisijim.
L’ikŋ anym n’im l’ɛkn lisijim Simɔ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "S’ɛŋn Mesi a." (Mesi a e nyandrɛ el 'Krist'.)
Andre ɛwl Simɔ Jesu ogŋ a. Jesu lɛr’r seŋ ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ Simɔ, Jan jim; wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ’ŋ Kefas." (Ow e nyandrɛ el 'Lob'.)
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, Jesu ɛw eke k’im Galile ɛtŋ l’ɔbr Filip. Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam!"
(Filip a Bɛtsayida ɛb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ; ɛb na anake Andre lele Piɛr ab yɛji el ow ec’agŋ a.)
Filip ɔbr Natanaɛl ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Natanaɛl, ɛgŋ a eke Mois dad in ec’odad ol e lɛl ab ɛm, ke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad ow ec’odad a, s’ɛŋn’n. Ɛgŋ a, Nasarɛt e Jesu, Josɛf jim."
Natanaɛl dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ Nasarɛt yɛji, low mamn ɔtu eke k’anŋ ow ee?" Filip dad’r ninɛ: "Òw, ke ɛ́kn."
Eke Jesu ɛkn Natanaɛl ek’am ow titm’n a, n’am dad ow e lís e low l’ɛsɛ: "Kin Israɛl iy tasi; in ɛm mɛju owi kaka anm."
Natanaɛl ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ ayaf uwr’m any ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "Eke anŋ babm e likŋ a ec’ew a, gbuŋ ke Filip ɛ́sŋ’ŋ a, ke m’ɛkn’ŋ."
Af yogŋ Natanaɛl dad’r ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, ŋ Nyam ec’Iy tasi, ŋ Israɛl ec’ɛb ebu tasi!"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Mi bi dad m’ɛsɛ, m’ɛkn’ŋ babm e likŋ a ec’ew a ek’anŋ a, ke kpɛkŋ úb’m nawrɛ ee? B’ow ɛkn ów ek’agb akm na!"
Ɛtŋ l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: b’ow ɛkan afr eke b’ow fig ke Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ám uyu, ke ám us es ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e nuŋ af."
Eke sɛgŋ yony ɛc a, mɛbi ec’es gbɛgbl nyam ɛy Kana ɛb ɛm, Galile wus af; Jesu lis yɛji anŋ ɛm.
Wɛl ɛw Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab yɛji abu.
Eke ow b’inŋn ebr a, mar uwr. Jesu lis am dad Jesu ɛsɛ: "Mar uwr ɛl."
Kɔ li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛm lis, bla ɛtŋ am ɛlu’m low na ɛm ee? Ɛm e wanci a k’owm."
Ɛbɛn yɛji lis dad juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Kòkr low yec’a eke li b’ow l’ibrm ɔny a."
Ke yogŋ mijel nɔhɔn eke wɛl kok lebn ɛm anŋ. Mijel amua eke nyam ɔtu eke k’ij litr ekŋ yen a anake Jwifɛl b’oc kokr ɛl eci sayl owi Nyam ec’any af a.
Jesu dad juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Òkr mij mijel amua ɛm ow íy." -L’ok ɛm ow iy ok ɛnyɛmbri a.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Sica àwr mij a tɛl ke ócr imn ɔŋn es gbɛgbl a e nyimn ɛs a." Juma kok ɛsɛl a kok ɛbɛn.
Li tat mij a ek’itŋn el mar a anm, l’uwm yogŋ eke mar a anŋ ow ab any, gbɛkɔ juma kok ɛsɛl a ek’aw mij a gbɛ uw any. L’ɛsŋ mɛbi ɛs a,

l’igbl ow abu ogŋ ɛtŋ sica ninɛ: "Agŋ a fɛŋ mar mamn -li b’ɔb nuŋ -n’ɔŋ agŋ ɛgŋ; eke agŋ a e wɛl ɛw abu a ɛgŋ mar nɔnɔ a, ke sica -n’ɔŋ wɛl mar mij mij a gɔŋ. Gbɛkɔ ŋ ec’a, ɛw mar mamn a es toŋ it wanci na!"
Kin elel eke Kana ɛb ɛm Galile wus af, Jesu ɛlul in eci mɛny ɛwr krɛkrɛ a ɔkm. L’ɛlu in ec’any gbɛl ɔkm ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a ub’r nawrɛ.
Eke low na ɛy oc es a, in obi in obi, lis, lisijimɛl lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab -l’us nuŋ es -n’im Kapɛrnayum. -N’anŋ yogŋ -li kok sɛgŋ waa cɛ.
Jwifɛl eci Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a titm, ɛtŋ Jesu uyu im Jerusalɛm.
Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, l’ɛkn agŋ ek’am ɔl sed, mɛcɛb lele prɛndrɛ ab ij; n’ɛŋn jɛtɛ titŋn ɛsɛl yɛji eke ok es ɛl eci an ɔl usu a.
Li kok say ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ eke -n’anŋn Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, l’ogŋ l’ok wɛl ɔkm, ɛl e mɛcɛb lele ɛl e sed ab ab; n’ɔny jɛtɛ titŋn ɛsɛl ec’os a lele ɛl eci sitabl ab ab l’ok wus;
ɛtŋ l’ɛwar prɛndrɛ ɔl ij ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "K’òcr ɛm Ɛs ec’êl a ɛsɛ an ɔl êl af! Ɔ̀nyn mob amua fɛŋ otr es aŋa!"
In eci jam ɛsɛl a ɔkn Nyam Lɛl ab ɛm e sodad amua: O Admaga, ŋ ec’êl a ec’erur eke m’ɔny a, b’ow ɛtul’m ɛsɛ al eke b’ɛtul ob af.
Af yogŋ, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ e mɛny ɛwr ɔtu eke ki kok, ke ow yɛgm ɛy eke low na eke kok a, ɔny ow ec’abusu eke ki kok ɛbɛn ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke ŋuŋan Nyamel na, ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan m’ow m’usr ɛm."
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Wɛl ɛw akpo ekŋ yony miy nɔhɔn us Nyamel gbɛl na, ɛtŋ ŋ am dad eke b’ow usr ɛm sɛgŋ nyahan ee?"
Ke Nyamel a eke Jesu am dad ow ec’odad a, in e sos megl ab ana.
Ow ɔŋ, lɛgŋ a eke Jesu igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, in e jam ɛsɛl a ɔkn eke l’ikŋ anym li dad odad na; ɛtŋ ow ɛm -l’ub Nyam Lɛl lele Jesu eci sodad eke dad ab ab a nawrɛ.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a eke Jesu anŋ Jerusalɛm, Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a ec’a, agŋ nɔnɔ ub’r nawrɛ simɛny ɛwr eke n’am kok ab ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɔnym ɔmn ɛl ɛm aŋke ɛl fɛŋ l’uw wɛl any sɛnyn sɛnyn.
L’ibram eke wɛl k’otar ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ e lís e low akr ok’r, aŋke in obi ɛm li b’uw ɛgŋ e low eke b’anŋ ɛrm ɛm ab any.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Farisiɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Nikodɛm, l’el Jwifɛl ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam.

Ncok nyam, l’ow n’ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ n’am ibrm ow l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, s’uw any eke Nyam ɛrm’ŋ ow eke ki yɛgm ɛy low, aŋke ow it ke Nyam ánŋ ɛgŋ ab ab gbuŋ ke l’ɔ́tu li kok mɛny ɛwr amua ɛsɛ elel eke am kok ab af."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ: ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛknm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, eke ow elm afr ec’abusu ɛm wɛl ewrm’n ɛm."
Nikodɛm ibrm Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ek’usu a, ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke k’ewar ɛm ee? Kɔ l’ɔtu eke li k’im l’ɛy lis e lokm wɛl ewar ɛm ee?"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛym Nyam eci gbreŋgbi usu a eke wɛl ewm’n mij ɛm lele abŋ ab ɛm.
L’ow yec’eke b’anŋ agŋ ɛm ow a, b’el sos megl eci; ɛtŋ low yec’eke b’anŋ Nyam ec’Abŋ ɛm ow a, b’el Abŋ eci.
Eke mi dad’ŋ eke ɔny fɛŋ wɛl k’ewr ɔny ɛm afr ec’abusu ɛm, ke ow k’íti’ŋ any.
Yogŋ eke lɛf b’erur a, li b’ɛlu n’imn; b’iri in ec’ɛlu a, gbɛkɔ úwm yogŋ eke li b’anŋ l’ow lele yogŋ eke li b’im ab any. Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke wɛl ew Nyam ec’Abŋ ɛm a, ɛbɛn ek’ow b’ɛcr ana."
Af yogŋ, Nikodɛm dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ ayaf ow ɔtu eke k’ɛcr ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ k’el Israɛl wus af eci low yɛgm ɛs ligbɛl nyam, ke k’úwm ów amua any ee?
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ: low yec’a eke s’uw any a, ow ec’odad s’am dad, ɛtŋ low yec’a eke s’ɛkn a, s’am ij ow eci daŋku; gbɛkɔ ɛy eci daŋku ij a, ɛ́gŋmn ebmn.
Eke mi bi dad ɔny wus ec’ów a, úbmn’m nawrɛ; eke sica m’am dad ɔny Afr ec’ów, ke ayaf b’ow ubr’m nawrɛ ab ee?
Ɛgŋ kaka uyum afr ek’ow elm ɛgŋ ec’ Iy sɔny cɛ ek’anŋ afr us es a!
Ɛsɛ elel eke Mois oc lowi ɛm lorŋn ucu likŋ k’igbl ogŋ loj a, ɛbɛn ow it eke wɛl k’igbl ɛgŋ ec’Iy yɛji ogŋ,
yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ow ub’r nawrɛ a, ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam erur wus ec’agŋ a afŋn es toŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl in ec’Iy ekpɔbi a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a k’úwm, kɔ ke n’ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɔɔm in ec’Iy owm wus ec’agŋ ogŋ eke li k’ɔb wɛl low, kɔ ke Jim ɛm a, li sɔ́g wɛl.
Ɛgŋ ek’ub Iy a nawrɛ a, Nyam k’ow ɔbm’n low; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ ek’ubm nawrɛ a, ke Nyam ɔb’r low ŋ̂, aŋke l’ubm Nyam ec’Iy ekpɔbi a nawrɛ.
Sica kin elel eke low ɔb a b’ɛcr: usuayl ow wus ec’agŋ ogŋ, ɛtŋ agŋ erur ncebn akm usuayl aŋke -li bi kok ów eŋuŋ.
Ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’am kok low ŋuŋ a, ɔny usuayl eci sifn ɛtŋ am kpab’r es lís, aŋke n’am uru eke in ec’ów eŋuŋ a k’ok ɔkm usuayl ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke bi kok Nyam ec’erur a, b’im titm usuayl, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ɛ́kn sɛnyn sɛnyn eke ɛl ec’ów a e kok a ɛcr Nyam ɛm."
Sica eke ów amua ɛc a, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab im Jude ec’ogog a. N’anŋ yogŋ wɛl ab l’ok agŋ mij nuŋ sɛgŋ bɛb.
Jan yɛji, Ayinɔn a eke titm Salim a, n’am ok agŋ mij nuŋ aŋke yogŋ mij nɔnɔ anŋ. Agŋ am ow in ogŋ ok mij nuŋ.
Ke wɛl k’ɛlum Jan sobel ɛm.
Sica ów es atar ɛy Jan eci jam ɛsɛl bɛb lele Jwif nyam ab ec’araŋn, ów eke wɛl bi kok Nyam ec’any af sos ayal ec’a sosiɛm.

-N’im -n’ɛŋn Jan ɛtŋ -n’am dad ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, Jurdɛn jam a ec’ɛgŋ a eke anŋ ŋ ab, ke ij in e daŋku a, kɔ am ɔkn in e low ee? Aŋ! Sicaca ɛm a, n’am ok agŋ mij nuŋ ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ b’im am ɛkn’n!"
Jan dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛŋnm low ec’abusu eke Afr ɔɔm’n.
Ɔtur eke ɔny obi yɛji k’ijr daŋku; mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'M’elm Mesi a, kɔ eke wɛl ikŋ anym ɛrm’m cɛ.'

Mɛbi ɛs anake mɛbi lis b’el in ec’a; kɔ mɛbi ɛs e lawl a, mɛbi ɛs a e saw li b’anŋ ke n’ám iri ow e low; ɛtŋ eke li b’iri mɛbi ɛs a e lebl a, li b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn ab ana, ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, ow iy nɛny fɛŋ.
Ow it eke in ec’any gbɛl a ám agb, ke ɛm ec’a ís es.
Ɛgŋ ek’el Afr ec’a, anŋ fɛŋ eci nuŋ af; ɛgŋ ek’el wus ec’a el wus eci, ɛtŋ bi dad wus ec’ów. Ɛgŋ ek’ow Afr eci nin ɛm a, [anŋ fɛŋ eci nuŋ af;]
li b’ij low eke l’ɛkn ke l’iri a eci daŋku, kɔ ɛgŋ ɛ́gŋm in e daŋku ij a ebm.
Ɛgŋ eke b’ɛgŋ in e daŋku ij a eb a, am ɛgŋ eb eke Nyam el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam.
Ɛgŋ eke Nyam ɛrm a bi dad Nyam ec’odad, aŋke Nyam b’ɛlu ɛgŋ a in ec’Abŋ a nimum fɛŋ ɛm.
Nyam erur Iy a ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ow abusu a fɛŋ.
Ɛgŋ yec’eke ɔny ɔmn Iy ab ɛm a, ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr; ɛgŋ eke bi yayr Iy a k’ow ɛŋnm sel ikŋ na, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’anŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ec’any af."

Farisiɛl iri wɛl am dad eke Jesu am ɔŋ wɛl am ok agŋ mij nuŋ nɔnɔ akm Jan, ɛtŋ n’am ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl yɛji l’akm ow. (Tasi ɛm a, Jesu in obi l’okm ɛgŋ kaka mij nuŋ, kɔ in e jam ɛsɛl anake am ok agŋ mij nuŋ a.) Eke Jesu iri ów amua eke wɛl am dad a, n’ŋgboŋ Jude ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’im Galile.
Ke n’ím a, ow it eke li k’ɛcr Samari wus af eci.
L’ow li titm Samari eci baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Sikar. Baŋn a titm Jakɔb ec’ɔgm a ek’ɔŋ jim Josɛf a.
Yogŋ anake Jakɔb eci mijɔmu a anŋ a. Eke Jesu sos kikn es usu im ab ɛm a, li sig es mijɔmu a e saw. Ow ɔtu eke ki bɛbmn lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ab.
Samari yɔwi nyam ow am aw mij, ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɔw na ee! Ɔ̀ŋ’m mij tɛl m’ɛ́gŋ."
(Ke in e jam ɛsɛl a im baŋn a eke k’ɔl ob ij.)
Samari yɔwi a dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, eke el Jwif a, ayaf tasi ɛm eke m’el Samari yɔwi a, am sus tasi ibrm im mij eke k’ɛgŋ ee?" (Tasi ɛm a, Samari eyŋ lele Jwifɛl ab nɛny ókrm af.)
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Blel uw Nyam ec’ob ap a, lele ɛgŋ a ek’am ibrm’ŋ mij eke k’ɛgŋ ab any ana, ke ŋ anake blel ɛ́wl ibrm’n mij eke k’ɛgŋ, ke blel n’ɔ́ŋ mij ewl mij a."
Yɔw a ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, mijɔmu a im ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sonu yɛji ɔnyam ab; bogŋ b’ow ɛŋn mij ewl mij ikŋ na ee?
Mijɔmu na, ɛy lagŋ Jakɔb ɔŋ ɛy, in obi l’ɛgŋ mij a, in ec’ey lele in e mɛbob ab yɛji ɛgŋ mij na. Kɔ am tutr eke agb akm Jakɔb ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛgŋ mij na a, ɛmɛny mijamn b’ow ɔny’n;
gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛgŋ mij a eke m’ow m’ɔŋ’n a, mijamn k’ow ɔnym’n lɛgŋ kaka. Mij a eke m’ow m’ɔŋ’n a b’ow ɛwl el mij ewl mij ek’ow ɛm sel ek’ɔnym uwr b’ow jɛjn ok ɔkm."
Yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ŋ’m mij ikŋ na yec’ɛtŋ ke mijamn k’ɔ́nym im m’owm aŋa m’awm mij ij."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìm ɛsŋ acŋ ke ɛ́wl mɛny ow aŋa."
Yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "M’ɔnym igŋ." Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ e low ij eke dad ek’ɔnym igŋ a,
aŋke ikŋ anym ɔny egŋ yen, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ na ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a ek’in ab ir a yɛji elm ŋ ec’igŋ. Dad low nɛnyɛmbri nyam."
Ɛtŋ yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’am uw any eke ŋ kokoba ɔb ɛs.
Ɛy lagŋɛl Samari eyŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ lafɛny na af, ɛtŋ ɔny Jwifɛl bi dadr eke yogŋ eke wɛl k’igŋ Nyam nuŋ a el Jerusalɛm."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɔw, ùb’m nawrɛ: lɛgŋ am ow ɛtŋ yogŋ eke b’ow igŋn Ɛs Nyam nuŋ a, ow k’ow elm lafɛny na af, ow k’ow elm Jerusalɛm yɛji.
Ɔny, Samari eyŋ, ɔny e Nyam eke b’igŋn nuŋ a, uwmn in any; ɛy Jwifɛl, ɛy ec’a eke si b’igŋ nuŋ a, s’uw’r any, aŋke Jwifɛl ɛm es eb ɛlu anŋ ow.
Lɛgŋ am ow, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a ow yɛj’ŋ̂, yogŋ, Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl tasi a b’ow igŋ Ɛs nuŋ abŋ ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Jim ɛlu’l ɔkm ab af; tasi ɛm a, Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl amua anake Ɛs am ɔl es a.
Nyam el abŋ, ow sosiɛm agŋ a eke k’igŋ’n nuŋ a, -l’it eke -li k’igŋ ow nuŋ abŋ ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke Jim ɛlu’l ɔkm ab af."
Yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "M’uw any eke Mesi a b’ow ow. (Mesi a ow e nyandrɛ el Krist.) Lɛgŋ a eke li b’ow l’ow a, li b’ow l’otar ów a fɛŋ akr l’ok ɛy."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm eke m’am dad’ŋ odad a, ɛm ana."

Ɛtŋ wanci ab af, Jesu eci jam ɛsɛl a ɛwl ow, ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋan ow eke ow am dad odad yɔw ab; eke -l’ɛkan ow a, ow e low iti ɛl any. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum ibram’n low ɛsmɛ: "Kɔ bla am ɔl ee? Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am dad ów in ab ee?"
Yɔw a ɛw in e mijel a es yogŋ, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’im baŋn a, n’am dad agŋ l’ɛsɛ:
"Òwr ɛkan ɛgŋ eke dad’m ɛm e low fɛŋ eke mi kok a. Kɔ ow k’elm Mesi ab ee?"
Agŋ a ok ɔkm baŋn a ɛtŋ aam yogŋ a eke Jesu anŋ a.
Ke ow eci wanci ab af, jam ɛsɛl a am ŋɔŋn Jesu ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ìj ob tɛl ɔ!"
Kɔ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "M’ɔny ob ij eke uwmn any."
Jam ɛsɛl a am bibrmn in ɛl ɔfr ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛgŋ ka k’is’r ob ij ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke mi kok ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a ec’erur, ɛtŋ m’uwar juma a eke l’abul’m a, ke ɛm ec’ob ij ab ana.
Ɔny, b’ewal egb a, bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛmɛny ow anŋ awl yar gbuŋ ke egb ub e lɛgŋ bɛ́bmn ab.' Gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny eke ki lɛɛr sɔgm a sɛnyn sɛnyn: egb a ebl, ow bɛbmn ub ab!
Ɛgŋ ek’am ub egb a, kpɛkŋ b’ɛŋn in e labm sɔg a, ɛtŋ li b’as egb a luku sel ek’ɔnym uwr eci; ow ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’am ewl lele ɛgŋ ek’am ub ab ab b’okr af kok sos ɛm iŋn.
Ɛɛ, nyandrɛ odad na ek’am dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ nyam b’ewl, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam b’ub a,' el low nawrɛ.
Ɔgm nyam ɛm eke kokmn juma a, m’ɛrm ɔny imn ubr egb yogŋ; agŋ ɛjeci ikŋ anym kok juma yogŋ, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛŋan gbre eke -l’ijr a e liy."
Yɔw a dad Samari eyŋ a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na dad’m low fɛŋ eke mi kok a." Ow ɛm a, agŋ a ub nawrɛ aŋke yɔw a dad ɛl.
Ow sosiɛm, eke Samari eyŋ a im ɛŋn Jesu a, -ni ŋɔŋn ow ek’ow k’ɛgŋ anŋ ɛl ab; ɛtŋ Jesu anŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ yony.
Ɛtŋ sica Jesu, in obi ec’odad eke n’am dad a sosiɛm, agŋ a ek’am ub’r nawrɛ a am ɛny afŋn es;
ɛtŋ -n’am dad yɔw a -l’ɛsɛ: "Sica ow elm ŋ ec’odad a eke dad a sosiɛm cɛ s’ubm nawrɛ ij, kɔ ɛy obi s’iri’r nɛnym, ɛtŋ s’uw any eke l’el wus na ec’Es Eb Ɛlu Ɛs tasi."
Eke sica Jesu kok sɛgŋ yony usu a, l’igb yogŋ n’im Galile.
Tasi ɛm a, in obi l’ikŋ anym li dad ninɛ: "Kokoba ɔb ɛs ɔ́nym any in ec’ɛb tasi ab ɛm."
Gbɛkɔ sica eke n’im l’ɛy Galile wus af a, yogŋ ec’agŋ a eb’r sɛnyn sɛnyn, aŋke agŋ amua yɛji im Jerusalɛm Pak ec’es gbɛgbl ab ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn ów a fɛŋ eke Jesu kok es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ a.
Sica ɛmɛny l’ɛwl l’ow Galile Kana baŋn, yogŋ a eke l’oc mij li kokr mar a. Ɛb ebu a eci juma idr ɛs ligbɛl a anŋ yogŋ. In ec’iy ek’anŋ Kapɛrnayum a ɔl am ɔny.
Eke juma idr ɛs a iri eke Jesu anŋ Jude ow Galile a, n’im n’ɛŋn ow ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn ow ek’ow k’ow Kapɛrnayum ewlm jim ek’am uw a.
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɔny gbɛ sɛgŋ fɛŋ, eke ɛknmn mɛny ɛwr lele ów any iti owi ab a, k’ɔtumn ubmn nawrɛ."
Juma idr ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òw ɛm ogŋ a gbuŋ ke ɛm ec’iy a úw."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wl im ŋ ogŋ a, kɔ ejimŋ sos ok es." L’ub odad a eke Jesu dad’r a nawrɛ ɛtŋ n’im gbugŋ.
Eke kpɛkŋ l’us ejagb n’aam a, in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ek’am us’r jam ow a ɔbr’r ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ejimŋ sos ok es!"
Kpɛkŋ n’am ibrm wɛl wanci ab af eke in ec’iy a sos ok es a, ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Efi ncebles eci wanci nyam ɛm, lɛgŋ na af anake lɛfr a oc’r es lís a."
Odad a ok iy ɛs a es sos ɛm ek’ow el wanci ab af a cɛ eke Jesu dad’r eke ejimŋ sos ok es a, ɛtŋ in lele in ec’akŋ ab ab a fɛŋ -n’ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm.
Sakp yony ɛm e mɛny ɛwr eke Jesu kok, Jude eke n’anŋ n’im Galile ab ana.
Eke ów amua ɛc a, Jwifɛl am kok Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl nyam Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ Jesu im yogŋ.
Baŋn a e lakp a e lisany nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mɛcɛb e lisany a, ow e saw a usu nyam anŋ eke wɛl kok ok mij ɛm, ke ɔny lɛf eb usu yen, usu a Ebre ɛm wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Betɛsda.
Yogŋ, ɔ́lu nɔnɔ gbɛl ɛsɛ ány eflu, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl, lele sos es wɛw ɛsɛl ab lɛru es. [
Ɔlu nyam ek’anŋ ɔl ɛm akpo likŋ lele lɛw lele niwn ab anŋ yogŋ.
Eke Jesu ɛkn ɔlu a eke ɛgŋm es wus yogŋ, ke l’iri eke ow’n anŋ ɔl ɛm lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ a, l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ erur eke k’ewl ee?"
Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛm ec’a mij a b’umu a, m’ɔnym ɛgŋ eke k’ɔny ɛlu’m ɛm. Eke mi b’ɔl eke mi k’im m’ɛy mij ab ɛm a, ɛgŋ ɛjeci b’ɛc afŋ’m es ɛy ɛm."
Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc ŋ eci ajraŋka a ke án es."
Kpɛkŋ ɔlu a ewl, l’oc in ec’ajraŋka a ɛtŋ n’am an es. Ke low na, nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ow am ɛy.
Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a am ibrm ɛgŋ a eke wɛl ewlm a ɛsɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ, abusu ɛrum’ŋ es eke k’oc ŋ ec’ajraŋka ɔnym ab."
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a eke ewlm im a dad’m eke mi k’oc ɛm ec’ajraŋka a ke m’án es."
Ɛtŋ -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ dad’ŋ eke k’oc ŋ ec’ajraŋka a ke án es ee?"
Kɔ ɛgŋ a uwm ɛgŋ a ek’ewlm’n ab any, aŋke Jesu irm agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ ab ɛm.
Eke ow b’inŋn ebr a, Jesu ɛŋn’n Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Sica kin eke ewl. Kì kok sikpl ij bake ɛ́ŋn low eke agb akm na."
Ɔlu a im ɛtŋ dad Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a ek’ow el Jesu anake ewlm’n a.
Ow sosiɛm Jwifɛl a at ɛŋn Jesu, low na eke li kok nɛnɛgŋ a eci.
Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛm Ɛs abu anŋ juma kok ɛm ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji abu anŋ’m juma kok ɛm."
Odad na sosiɛm, sica ɛmɛny Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a am at tasi eke k’ibi Jesu aŋke ow elm nɛnɛgŋ ec’ol a eke l’ɔb es a cɛ, kɔ ɛmɛny n’am dad eke Nyam in el Ɛs tasi. Na ɛm a, n’am ocr in sosi ɛsɛ Nyam af.

Ow ɛm a, Jesu ɛwl eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: Iy k’ɔtum kokm low kaka in obi ɛm; yec’eke li b’ɛkn Ɛs kok a, ow li bi kok. Tasi ɛm a, low fɛŋ eke Ɛs a bi kok a, low nyam coco a cɛ Iy a yɛji bi kok,
aŋke Iy Ɛs a b’erur Iy a ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm ow in obi e low eke li bi kok a. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li b’ow li yɛgm ow ów eke b’ow agb akm amua, ɛtŋ ow b’ow iti ɔny any.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛsɛ elel eke Iy Ɛs a b’igbm agŋ ek’uw a ke b’ɔŋ ɛl sel a, ɛbɛn nyam coco Iy a yɛji b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ eke li b’erur a sel.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ fɛŋ e lís e jɛj ok owi a, Iy Ɛs a ɛ́knm ow e low, kɔ n’ɔŋ Iy a jɛj ok owi ec’abusu a fɛŋ,
yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ɔ́ny Iy a eci sos usr ɛsɛ elel eke -li b’ɔny Iy Ɛs a eci sos usr ab af. Ɛgŋ yec’eke usrm Iy a sos a, usrm Iy Ɛs a ek’ɛrm’n a yɛji sos.
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’iri ɛm e sodad a, ke b’ub ɛgŋ a eke ɛrm’m a nawrɛ a, n’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr ŋ̂. N’ɔnym jɛj ok ij, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ l’ubr luw ɛm l’ɛy owr anŋ ɛm.
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: lɛgŋ am ow, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a l’ow yɛj’ŋ̂; lɛgŋ na ɛm agŋ ek’uw a b’ow iri Nyam ec’Iy e lebl, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke b’ow iri lebl a, b’ow anŋ owr.
Ɛsɛ elel eke tasi ɛm a Iy Ɛs a el sel e nuŋ a, ɛbɛn nyam coco n’ɔŋ Iy a yɛji abusu eke k’el sel e nuŋ.
Ɛtŋ eke Iy a el ɛgŋ ec’ Iy a sosiɛm a, n’ɔŋ ow jɛj ok owi ec’abusu.
Ow k’íti ɔny any. Lɛgŋ am ow, ɛtŋ ow ɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’uw wɛl ot es a b’ow iri in e lebl,
ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ b’ow anŋ uwɔmu ɛm ɛy ɔkm. Agŋ a eke kok ów amamn a b’ow igb ke ɛ́ŋn sel, gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke kok ów eŋuŋ a, b’ow igb jɛj ok eci.

Ɛm obi ɛm, mi k’ɔtum mi kokm low kaka fɛŋ. Nyam e low eke bi dad’m ab af mi bi jɛj ɛgŋ e low m’ok, ɛtŋ ɛm e jɛj ok a el nawrɛ, aŋke m’ɔlm ɛm e low eke m’am erur ab es, kɔ ɛgŋ a eke ɛrm’m a ec’a eke b’erur a, m’am ɔl es."
"Eke ɛm, m’am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku, liy k’ow anm ɛm e daŋku ij ab ɛm.
Kɔ ɛgŋ ɛjeci anake am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku a, ɛtŋ m’uw any eke daŋku ij na el nawrɛ.
Ɔny, ɛrmn agŋ Jan ogŋ, ɛtŋ l’ij low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e daŋku.
Ɛm, m’ibram eke ɛgŋ k’ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku, kɔ m’am dad ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam sɔ́g ɔny.
Jan ɛw ɛsɛ kɛniɛ eke wɛl igŋ k’am iri ayal usu af, ɛtŋ ɛgŋn ebr kokr sos ɛm iŋn in ec’usuayl ab ab wanci tɛl eci cɛ.
Kɔ ɛm e daŋku ij a eke m’ɔny a, agb akm Jan ec’a: ów amua eke m’am kok a, amua tasi eke ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m eke mi ki kok a, am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku, ɛtŋ am yɛgm eke ɛm Ɛs ɛrm’m.
Ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs eke ɛrm’m a yɛji am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku. Gbɛkɔ tasi lɛgŋ kaka irimn in e lebl ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lɛgŋ kaka ɛknmn in ec’elel eke n’anŋn a.
In eci sodad a írm ɔny ɛm, aŋke úbmn ɛgŋ a eke l’ɛrm a nawrɛ.
Bi wewar Nyam e Silɛl a mɛwl ɛm eke k’uwr any, aŋke bi tutar eke k’ɛŋan sel ek’ɔnym uwr ɛl ɛm. Ke tasi ɛm a, sodad amua anake am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku a!
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, érurmn eke k’owr ɛm ogŋ ɛŋan sel tasi a ek’ɔnym uwr a.
Ɛm, m’ɔlm agŋ ec’es susm ab es.
Kɔ ɔny ec’a, m’uw ɔny any: m’uw any eke ɔnymn Nyam ec’erur.
M’ow ɛm Ɛs e nin ɛm ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn ebmn’m. Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ow in obi e nin ɛm b’ow ebr ir!
B’erurir ɔny ɔfr ɛm ec’es susmnin owi, ɛtŋ ɔ́lmn Nyam sɔny coco ogŋ ec’es susm owi ab es; ke ayaf ɔtur eke k’ubr’m nawrɛ ab ee?
Ɛm Ɛs ec’any af a, kì tutar eke m’ow m’ok ɔny ów af; kɔ Mois anake b’ow ok ɔny ów af a, in ɛm eke ocr ɔny ec’ɔmn a ɛlul a.
Tasi ɛm a, eke ubr Mois nawrɛ ke ɛm yɛji b’ow ubr’m nawrɛ, aŋke ɛm e lís e low anake Mois nɔn a.
Kɔ eke sica yec’a eke Mois nɔn ɛm e lís a ubmn nawrɛ, ke ayaf ɔtur eke k’ubr ɛm e sodad a nawrɛ ee?"
Eke low na ɛc a, Jesu imn Galile ogog a e mij lekpl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Tiberiad yɛj’a e jam.
Agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam aŋke -n’am ɛkn mɛny ɛwr eke n’am kok ɔ́lu a ec’ewlm ɛm.
Ow ɔŋ Jesu uyu ligigl nyam af ɛtŋ sig es yogŋ jam ɛsɛl ab ab.
Pak ek’el Jwifɛl ec’es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ titm.
Eke Jesu b’igbl any ogŋ a, l’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ ek’am ow in ogŋ, ɛtŋ l’ibrm Filip ninɛ: "Bogŋ s’ɔtu eke si k’ɔl futufutu s’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ij ee?"
Tasi ɛm a, low a eke Jesu am ow kok a, in obi l’uw any, kɔ l’ibrm Filip low na eke li k’ɛbm ow a sosiɛm.
Filip dad’r ninɛ: "Eke ow el os ekŋ lɛw yɛji, si k’ɔtum s’ɛŋnm futufutu ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɛŋn likpr liy nyam bɔbɔ yɛji."
Andre, Simɔ Piɛr lisijim ek’el in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam a dad’r ninɛ:
"Aŋa, iyli nyam ɔnym futufutu yen lele ɔcn yony ab. Gbɛkɔ na yɛji ow elm low kaka agŋ bubutɛ na ec’any af."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɔ̀ŋn agŋ a fɛŋ ok es." (Ke usu a, suw owr anŋ nɔnɔ.) Sica ɛl fɛŋ -l’ok es; -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ij egŋ fandi yen.
Jesu ot futufutu a, l’ɛlu Nyam bia, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl cɛc ɔŋ agŋ a ek’ok es yogŋ a. Li kok ɛbɛn ɔcn ab ab yɛji, n’ɔŋ wɛl ow a fɛŋ eke -n’am ibrm a.
Eke sica agŋ a fɛŋ ij ob lok iy a, Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Kɔ̀kŋn ekpr a eke wawal es a yec’ɛtŋ ke kaka k’íram."
-Li kɔkŋ futufutu yen a eke -l’ijr a ec’ekpr eke wawal es a, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu ɛgbɛl lɛw yony.
Eke agŋ a ɛkn mɛny ɛwr na eke Jesu kok a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na, Kokoba ɔb ɛs tasi a eke k’ow wus af aŋa ab ana."
Jesu uw any ek’agŋ a b’ow ɔny’n lɛc ɛm ɛw’r ɛb ebu. Ow sosiɛm ɛmɛny l’ɛwl mɛny n’im ligigl ab af in sɔny.
Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, Jesu e jam ɛsɛl a us nuŋ es mij nɛny a,
ɛtŋ ok mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm am ubr mij lekpl a imn Kapɛrnayum eci. Lɛgŋ yɛji am ukm ab, ɛtŋ Jesu yɛji k’iim k’ɛŋnm ɛl.
Lɛf am ɛlu lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ mra am ɛlu mij lekpl ab af.
-L’ɔr mij ba ow k’ij kilo yen oglog nɔhɔn ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -l’ɛkn Jesu ek’am an es mij ab af ow titm mijɛtŋ a, ɛtŋ erŋn am ɔny ɛl.
Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny, kɔ ɛm!"
Jam ɛsɛl a erur eke k’ɔny ɛlu’l mijɛtŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ mijɛtŋ a itr es yogŋ a eke -n’aam a e nanu a.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, agŋ a ek’anŋ mij lekpl a e jam a, ɛkn ek’ow el mijɛtŋ nyam cɛ anake anŋ yogŋ ncebles ɛm a; -l’uw any eke jam ɛsɛl a im ɛl sɔny, eke Jesu ɛym ɛl e mijɛtŋ ab ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ simijɛtŋ ɛjeci ek’anŋ Tiberiad am ow a, ow itr es usu a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ oc futufutu ɛlu Nyam bia ke -l’ijr a.
Eke agŋ a ɛkn eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab anm yogŋ a, -l’ok simijɛtŋ ab ɛm -n’im Kapɛrnayum -n’am ɔl Jesu.
Ɛtŋ eke -n’ɛŋan Jesu mij lekpl a e jam a, -n’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ bogŋ eci wanci af ɛtŋ ow aŋa ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: am ɔɔl’m ek’ijr futufutu molok iy ɔny a sosiɛm, kɔ ow elm ɛm e mɛny ɛwr a e nyandrɛ a eke irir a eci.
Kì kokr ob eke b’ugŋ es a e juma, kɔ kòkr yec’a eke b’ibn ke el sel ek’ɔnym uwr a e juma. Ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ob ij ikŋ na, aŋke tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Nyam in obi oc in ec’abusu a e mɛny ɛwr a ɛw’r af."
Ɛtŋ sica -n’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ juma a eke Nyam am erur a, ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Juma a eke Nyam am ibrm ɔny a el: ke ɔ́nyn ɔmn ɛgŋ a eke l’ɛrm ab ɛm."
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Bogŋ eci mɛny ɛwr ɔtu eke ki kok yɛgm ɛy ke ow af, s’úb’ŋ nawrɛ ee? Ŋ eci juma ek’am kok a el bogŋ ec’ee?
Loj yogŋ, ɛy lagŋɛl ij futufutu ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: n’ɔŋ wɛl futufutu ek’anŋ afr ow a -l’ij."
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ, m’am dad ɔny: afr eci futufutu a, ow elm Mois ɔɔm ɔny, kɔ ɛm Ɛs anake ɔŋ ɔny afr eci futufutu tasi a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam eci futufutu a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ a, el ɛgŋ a eke b’anŋ afr ow, ke b’ɔŋ wus na nimum ec’agŋ a fɛŋ sel a."
Ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ̀ŋ ɛy futufutu ikŋ na."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’el sel e futufutu. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ow ɛm ogŋ a, lɛgŋ kaka namn k’ow ɔnym’n, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka mijamn k’ow ɔnym’n.
Gbɛkɔ m’ikŋ anym mi dad ɔny: ɛkan’m ɛtŋ ubmn nawrɛ.
Ɛgŋ liy nyam nyam fɛŋ eke ɛm Ɛs b’ow ɔŋ’m a, b’ow ow ɛm ogŋ, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka mi k’ow m’ogŋm ɛgŋ eke b’ow ow ɛm ogŋ a,
aŋke m’anŋ afr m’ow wus af aŋa, ow elm ɛm ec’erur kok eci, kɔ ɛgŋ ek’ɛrm’m a ec’erur mi ki kok.
Ɛtŋ kin ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a e low ek’am erur: ke mi k’írmnm agŋ a fɛŋ a eke l’abul’m a e nyam, kɔ ke lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, m’ígbm ɛl luw ɛm.
Ɛɛ, tasi ɛm a, kin low ek’ɛm Ɛs am erur: ke agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɛkn Iy a ke ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a, ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr, ke lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, m’ígbm ɛl luw ɛm."
Jwifɛl a am ɛny abr ok Jesu af aŋke li dad ninɛ: "M’el futufutu ek’anŋ afr us es."
Ow sosiɛm -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm Josɛf jim Jesu ee? Ɛs lele lis ab a, s’uw ɛl any sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ke sica ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki dad l’ɛsɛ: 'M’anŋ afr m’us es' ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "K’ɛ̀nyn abr ɔny ɔfr ɛm ɔ!
Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum owm ɛm ogŋ eke ɛm Ɛs ek’ɛrm’m a nyimnm’n; ke sica ɛm, lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, m’ígbm’n luw ɛm.
Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ɛm e nyam ɛm wɛl nɔn: Nyam b’ow yɛgm ɛl fɛŋ low any uw. Ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’iri ɛm Ɛs ec’odad ke ɛgŋ in e low yɛgm a e low eb a, ke ɛm ogŋ n’am ow a.
Ow elm ke ɛgŋ ɛkn ɛm Ɛs nyamn ɛm; ɛgŋ a cɛ eke Nyam ɛrm a cɛ ɛkn Ɛs.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, ɔny sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
Ɛm anake m’el futufutu a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a.
Ke loj yogŋ ɔny lagŋɛl ij futufutu cɛ ɛtŋ -l’uw.
Gbɛkɔ futufutu a ek’anŋ afr us es a, el futufutu ek’ɛgŋ b’ij ke úwm.

Ɛm, m’el owr anŋ eci futufutu ek’anŋ afr us es. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ij futufutu ikŋ na a, b’ow ɛŋn sel sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Futufutu a eke m’am ɔŋ ɔny a, ke ɛm eci sos megl ana; m’am oc m’ɔŋ ɔny yec’ɛtŋ ke wus nimum ɛ́ŋn sel."
Ow sosiɛm, Jwifɛl a ɛl ɔfr ɛm am atar ów es lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf ɛgŋ na k’ɔŋn ɛy in eci sos megl a s’ij ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: eke ijmn ɛgŋ ec’Iy eci sos megl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn in eci mebl a, sel ɛŋn k’ow anm ɔny ɛm.
Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ij ɛm eci sos megl ke b’ow ɛgŋ ɛm eci mebl a ɔny sel ek’ɔnym uwr, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm, m’ow m’igbm’n luw ɛm;
aŋke ɛm eci sos megl a el ob ij tasi, ɛtŋ ɛm eci mebl a el mar tasi eke wɛl b’ɛgŋ.
Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ij ɛm eci sos megl a, ke b’ɛgŋ ɛm eci mebl a okr af ɛm ab, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji in yɔny s’okr af.
Ɛm Ɛs ek’ɛrm’m a anŋ owr ɛtŋ in ɛm, ɛm yɛji m’anŋ owr; ɛbɛn nyam coco, ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow oc’m gbagbal in sosi a, b’ow anŋ owr ɛm ɛm.
Futufutu a ek’anŋ afr us es a, in ec’elel eke n’anŋn ana. N’anm ɛsɛ yec’a ek’ɔny lagŋɛl ikŋ anym ij ke uw ab af. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow ij futufutu na a, b’ow anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ."
Ke Kapɛrnayum eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a eke n’anŋ n’am yɛgm agŋ low a anake n’am dad sodad amua a.
Eke -l’irir Jesu ec’odad a bake ow uwr a, jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ am dad ɛsɛ: "Sica aŋa ow am ɛw low agbr ɛm! Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ɛgŋ odad tuɔtuɔ na e low eb ee?"
Jesu uw any eke jam ɛsɛl a am cacak’r odad na af. Na sosiɛm anake n’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ low na gbre ow am ijr ɔny ee?
Kɔ sica lɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛkan ɛgŋ ec’ Iy uyu im yogŋ a eke l’ikŋ anym n’anŋ l’ow a, ke ayaf ow b’ow kokr ɔny ab ee?
Nyam ec’Abŋ a anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a; sos megl sɔny ɔnym low kaka ec’abusu. Sodad a eke mi dad ɔny a el abŋ lele sel ab.
Gbɛkɔ ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam ubm nawrɛ." (Ke tasi ɛm a, nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ, Jesu uw agŋ a ek’ubm nawrɛ ab any, ɛtŋ l’uw ɛgŋ a eke b’ow ɔl ij’r ab any.)
L’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Na sosiɛm anake mi dad ɔny, eke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum owm ɛm ogŋ eke Nyam ɔɔm’n ow ec’abusu."
Ow eci wanci ab af, jam ɛsɛl nɔnɔ ocr sos es ɛtŋ ɛgŋm usm’n jam ij.
Jesu am dad jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ɛsɛ: "Ɔny yɛji erurir eke k’imn ee?"
Simɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ ogŋ si k’im ee? Ŋ ɔny sodad eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel ek’ɔnym uwr a.
S’uw any ɛtŋ s’ub nawrɛ: ŋ el Ɛgŋ Lala eke Nyam ɛrm ow."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ɔny lɛw yony mum mi sɔsuam m’otm ɔny ee? Gbɛkɔ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam el agn!"
Ke Judas, Simɔ Iskariɔt iy a ec’iy ec’odad Jesu am dad, aŋke Judas, eke l’el jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ yɛji, li b’ow l’ɔl Jesu l’ij.
Ów amua e jam a, Jesu am ɛc ɛlul Galile ɛm; l’erurm eke li k’im Jude aŋke Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a am ɔl eke k’ɔŋ wɛl ibi’r.
Jwifɛl eci Mɛf ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ow titm,
ɛtŋ Jesu lisijimɛl am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ìgb im Jude yec’ɛtŋ ke ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a yɛji ɛ́kn ów a eke am kok a.
Ɛgŋ ek’am erur eke k’il nin a, ɔ́tum kokm low es lɔl ɛm. Ɛsɛ elel eke am kok ów amua ab af a, ɛ̀lu sos ɔkm yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ɛ́kn’ŋ."
Tasi ɛm a, lisijimɛl bɔbɔ yɛji ɔ́nym ɔmn in ɛm.
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl ɛm a eke mi k’im a e lɛgŋ tasi ki bɛbmnm ab. Ɔny ec’a, sɛgŋ a fɛŋ akpl.
Ɔny, wus ec’agŋ k’ɔtum ɔnym ɔny e sifn; gbɛkɔ ɛm, -n’ɔny ɛm e sifn aŋke mi bi dad ɛl eci ów eŋuŋ a eke -li bi kok a ec’odad.
Ɔny, ìmn es gbɛgbl ab ɛm. Ɛm mi k’owm yɛ aŋke ɛm ec’a, ow ki bɛbmnm ab."
Eke li dad odad na bake ow uwr a, in gbɛ n’anŋ Galile.
Eke lisijimɛl a im es gbɛgbl ab ɛm a, Jesu yɛji im, gbɛkɔ l’ɛlum sos ɔkm ek’agŋ k’ɛkn’n: ow ɛw es lɔl ɛm.
Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a am ɔl’l es gbɛgbl ab ɛm ɛtŋ am ibrm agŋ ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ n’anŋ ee?"
Bieku ab ɛm, wɛl am sɛsl ów nɔnɔ in e nuŋ af. Bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: "L’el nimamn kok ɛs." Ɛtŋ likpr am dad ɛsɛ: "Njaŋ, li b’irmn agŋ."
Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ kaka ɛ́lum sos ɔkm dadm in ec’odad aŋke ɛl fɛŋ -n’am uru Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a.
Es gbɛgbl a ok araŋn, ɛtŋ ca Jesu ow ɛy Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ low.
Jwifɛl a low iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na eke wewrm low yɛj’a, ayaf li b’ɔtu l’uw ów amua any ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low a eke mi bi yɛgm agŋ a ánm ɛm ɛm owm, kɔ Nyam ek’ɛrm’m a ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow.
Eke ɛgŋ am erur eke ki kok Nyam ec’erur a, li b’ow l’uw any eke ɛm e low yɛgm a b’anŋ Nyam ɛm ow, oglog ɛm obi ɛm.
Ɛgŋ eke bi dad in obi e nin ɛm ec’odad a, b’ɔl in obi ec’any gbɛl es. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke am kok juma ɔl ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’n a ec’any gbɛl es a am dad low nɛnyɛmbri nyam; yadŋ owi kaka anm in ɛm.
Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɔɔl eke k’ibir’m ee? Mois ɔɔm ɔny ol a ee? Gbɛkɔ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ánm es ol ab af."
Agŋ a dad’r ninɛ: " Abŋ ŋuŋ anŋ’ŋ ɛm tasi, kɔ bwo am ɔl eke k’ibi’ŋ ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Mɛny ɛwr nyam cɛ mi kok, ɛtŋ kin eke ɔny fɛŋ low a am iti ɔny any!
Mois ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ ubr agŋ likr es, ɛtŋ ɛgŋn ow e kok e low ebr nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ yɛji. (Ke tasi ɛm a, low na anm Mois ɛm owm, kɔ lagŋɛl krɛkrɛ ab ɛm ow anŋ ow.)
Eke wɛl b’ubr ɛgŋ likr es nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ɛtŋ ow ɔ́nym Mois ec’ol a ocm es, ke sica bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ebal ɛrm okr’m af, ɛgŋ nimum eke m’ewlm nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ab ee?
Ɛ̀wr ɔny e sos af e jɛj ok ab es, kɔ jɛ̀jr okr low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm."
Agŋ a ek’ir Jerusalɛm a eci bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ɛgŋ a eke wɛl am ɔl eke k’ibi ab ana ee?
Ɛ̀kan, n’am dad odad dedeku ec’any af ɛtŋ wɛl ɔbm kpu yɛji ɔɔm’n! Kɔ ɛy ec’es ɛwɛl a k’uw any ɛgŋ eb tasi eke l’el Mesi ab ee?
Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ a eke Mesi a b’ow ow a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ow uwm yogŋ eke li b’ow n’anŋ l’ow ab any, kɔ ɛgŋ na ec’a, s’uw yogŋ eke n’anŋ l’ow ab any."

Jesu ek’anŋ Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a am yɛgm agŋ low a, igbl lebl ogŋ dad ninɛ: "Uwr ɛgŋ a tasi eke m’el ab any, ɛtŋ uwr yogŋ eke m’anŋ m’ow ab any ee? Ow elm ɛm obi ɛm m’owm, kɔ ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs, kɔ uwmn in any.
Ɛm, m’uw’r any aŋke in ogŋ m’anŋ m’ow ɛtŋ in l’ɛrm’m yɛji."
Ow sosiɛm, -n’am ɔl eke -li k’ɔny Jesu, kɔ ɛgŋ ɔtum ɔnym’n, aŋke in e wanci a ki bɛbmnm ab.
Gbɛkɔ dedeku ab ɛm, agŋ nɔnɔ ub’r nawrɛ ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ a eke Mesi a b’ow ow a, kɔ li b’ow li kok mɛny ɛwr l’akm ɛgŋ na ec’ab ee?"
Farisiɛl a iri Jesu e lís ec’ów eke bieku ab ɛm wɛl am dad ów sɛsl ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab ɛrm usu ɔsu ɛsɛl eke k’im ɔny’n.
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛmɛny m’anŋ ɔny ab lɛgŋ tɛl eci gbuŋ ke m’ɛ́wl m’im ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a ogŋ.
B’ow ɔɔl’m ɛtŋ k’ow ɛŋnmn’m, aŋke k’ow ɔtumn iimn yogŋ a eke m’ow m’anŋ a."

Jwifɛl a am ibrmn ɛl sosi ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ li b’ow n’im ɛtŋ si k’ow s’ɔtum s’ɛŋnm’n ee? Kɔ tutr n’ɔny eke li k’im Jwifɛl a eke mɔmun es agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a ogŋ ee? L’erur eke li k’im li yɛgm agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a low ee?
Sodad amua eke li dad: 'B’ow ɔɔl’m ɛtŋ k’ow ɛŋnmn’m, k’ow ɔtumn iimn yogŋ a eke m’ow m’anŋ a' e nyandrɛ el bogŋ ec’ee?"
Es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ es abal el a, el es gbɛgbl a eci lɛgŋ ligbɛl. Ow e lɛgŋ a, Jesu igb inym es ɛtŋ igbl lebl ogŋ dad ninɛ: "Eke ɛgŋ mij amn am ɔny, l’ów ɛm ogŋ ke l’ɛ́gŋ mij.
Ɛgŋ eke b’ow ub’m nawrɛ a, mij ewl mij b’ow ewl’l ɛrm ɛm ok ɔkm ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af."
Jesu am dad ɛbɛn yɛgm Abŋ Lala a eke agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a k’ɛŋn a ec’odad. Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ ab ɛm, wɛl k’ɛ́ŋnm Abŋ Lala aŋke Jesu k’ɛym anygbɛl ɛm.
Sica eke dedeku ab ɛm ec’agŋ iri sodad amua a, nyam nyam am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na Kokoba ɔb ɛs a tasi ana!"
Bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: " Mesi ab ana!" Ɛtŋ likpr am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ Mesi a gbɛ ɔtu eke k’anŋ Galile ow ee?
Kɔ Nyam Lɛl dadm eke Mesi a b’ow el David e bosu ɛm ec’ɛgŋ eke b’ow anŋ Bɛtlehɛm, David e baŋn a ow ee?"
Jesu sosiɛm dedeku a ubr ɛm.
Agŋ nyam nyam erur eke wɛl k’ɔny’n, gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ kaka ɛwm’n abu af.
Usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a ɛwl mɛny im egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab ogŋ, ɛtŋ wɛl am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ocmn Jesu ab owmn ee?"
Usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a dad ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ dadm odad ɛsɛ in ec’ab af!"
Farisiɛl a am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ɔny yɛji, yɛbr l’ɛju ɔny ee?
Kɔ es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam oglog Farisiɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ub’r nawrɛ ee?
Dedeku a ek’ub’r nawrɛ a uwm ol ab any, -l’el agŋ eke wɛl ofn!"
Nikodɛm eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm im ɛkn Jesu a, el Farisiɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ek’anŋ low ab ɛm. N’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ:
"Kɔ ɛy ec’ol a b’ɔb ɛgŋ low eke wɛl irim’n nɛnym oglog wɛl uwm low a eke li kok ab any ee?"
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ŋ yɛji, kɔ Galile iy el ee? Àpl Nyam e Silɛl ab ɛm b’ow ɛkn eke lɛgŋ kaka kokoba ɔb ɛs ánm Galile owm." [
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ eb ejagb im gbugŋ.]
[Kɔ Jesu gbɛ im Olivie lafɛny af.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, ibribr fafa ɛm a, l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ow ɛŋn’n. Li sig es ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm wɛl low.
Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab oc yɔw nyam eke wɛl okr es nfaci ɔkr ɛm a is’r. -N’ɔny -n’inymn ow es dedeku a fɛŋ ec’any af
ɛtŋ -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, wɛl okr yɔw na es nfaci ɔkr ɛm.
Mois dad ɛy ol ab ɛm eke ɔyɔw nɛnɛ a, wɛl k’ɔr ɛl mebn ɛm ibi ɛl. Kɔ ŋ b’ɛsɛ ayaf ee?"
-N’am dad ɛbɛn -l’uk ow meb yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -l’ok ow ów af. Gbɛkɔ Jesu is any es ɛtŋ am nɔn wus abuli ɛm.
Eke -n’am at -l’ibrm ow l’ow a, Jesu igbl sos ogŋ ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam eke lɛgŋ kaka kokm sikpl a, íkŋ anym ɔwl’l lebn krɛkrɛ."
Ɛmɛny l’ɛwl l’is any es ɛtŋ n’am nɔn wus.
Eke -l’irir ów amua a, -n’im nyam nyam, ow ɔb nuŋ agŋ ɛgbɛl ab ɛm toŋ batŋ Jesu anŋ in sɔny, yɔw a eke inym’n es any af ab ab.
Jesu ɛwl igbl sos ogŋ ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Sica yɔw, bogŋ agŋ a im ee? Kɔ ɛgŋ kaka dadm ŋ ec’ibi e low ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, ɛgŋ kaka dadm ɛm ec’ibi e low." Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm yɛji mi dadm ŋ ec’ibi owi. Ɔtu eke k’im, gbɛkɔ jam kì kok sikpl ij."]
Ɛmɛny Jesu am dad dedeku a ɛsɛ: "M’el wus nimum ec’usuayl. Ɛgŋ eke b’ow us’m jam a, b’ow ɛŋn owr anŋ eci usuayl ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka li k’ow n’anm es ncebn ɛm."
Farisiɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ, am ij ŋ obi e daŋku; ŋ e daŋku ij na ɔnym any."

Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke m’am ij ɛm obi e daŋku yɛji, ɛm e daŋku ij a el nawrɛ, aŋke m’uw yogŋ eke m’anŋ m’ow ab any ɛtŋ m’uw yogŋ eke m’aam ab any; kɔ ɔny, uwmn yogŋ eke m’anŋ m’ow ab any, ɛtŋ yogŋ eke m’aam a yɛji uwmn any.
Ɔny, bi jɛjr okr agŋ ɛm eci; ɛm, mi jɛ́jm ɛgŋ e low m’okm ɛbɛn.
Ɛtŋ eke batŋ mi jɛj low m’ok, ke ɛm e jɛj ok a b’el nɛny nyam ɛm eci, aŋke mi jɛ́jm m’okm ɛm sɔny, kɔ ɛm Ɛs eke ɛrm’m a b’anŋ ɛm ab.
Ɔny ec’ ol ab ɛm wɛl nɔn: ek’agŋ yony nɛny okr af daŋku ij nyam ɛm, ke daŋku ij ek’el nawrɛ ana.
M’am ij ɛm obi e daŋku ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs ek’ɛrm’m a yɛji am ij ɛm e daŋku."
-N’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ asŋ a ee?" Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Uwmn’m any, uwmn ɛm Ɛs yɛj’any. Blel uwr’m any, ke blel úwr ɛm Ɛs yɛj’any."
N’am dad sodad amua Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, eke n’anŋ n’am yɛgm agŋ low a, yogŋ a eke kɔprɔ ebr mob anŋ a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka ɛdŋnm’n aŋke in e wanci a k’owm.
Ɛmɛny Jesu am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "M’ow m’im; b’ow ɔɔl’m gbɛkɔ b’ow uwr ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm. K’ɔtumn iimn yogŋ a eke m’aam a."
Jwifɛl a am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛsɛ: "Eke n’am dad l’ɛsɛ ɛs k’ɔtum ɛs iim yogŋ a eke in aam a, kɔ ɛmn n’am ow n’im l’ɛdŋn ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny wus ec’agŋ, kɔ ɛm afr m’anŋ m’ow. Ɔny eel wus na eci, kɔ ɛm m’elm wus na eci.
Na sosiɛm anake mi dad ɔny eke b’ow uwr ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm a. Tasi ɛm a, eke ubmn nawrɛ eke 'Ɛm, anŋ anŋ' b’ow uwr ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm."
-N’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke ŋ bwo el ŋ ee?" Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "In a eke mi dad ɔny in e low nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ a.
Ɔny e lís a, m’ɔny ów nɔnɔ eke mi ki dad ke mi jɛ́j m’ok yɛji. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m m’ow a el nɛny nyam ɛs, yec’a eke mi wewr in e lís a, m’am ɔb ow ec’amani m’ok ɔny ek’eel wus ec’agŋ a."
-L’irim eke ow el Ɛs ec’odad eke n’am dad wɛl a.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ a eke b’ow igbal ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ogŋ a, b’ow uwr any eke 'Ɛm, anŋ anŋ'; b’ow uwr any yɛj’eke mi kókm low kaka ɛm obi ɛm: yec’a cɛ eke ɛm Ɛs yɛgm’m a e low cɛ mi bi dad.
Ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a anŋ ɛm ab; l’ɛ́lum im es ɛm sɔny aŋke sɛgŋ fɛŋ mi bi kok low yec’a eke li b’erur a."
Eke Jesu am dad ɛbɛn a, agŋ nɔnɔ ub’r nawrɛ.
Jesu am dad Jwifɛl a ek’ub’r nawrɛ a ɛsɛ: "Eke b’inymn es ɛm e sodad ab af a, b’ow eel ɛm e jam ɛsɛl tasi;
af yogŋ b’ow uwr low nɛnyɛmbri nyam any ɛtŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a b’ow ɔŋ ɔny eel ewi."
-L’ɔdu -l’eb -li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛy, Abraham ec’alaw; lɛgŋ kaka s’elm ɛgŋ kaka e madu. Ayaf ɔtu eke ki dad ɛy ɛsɛ si b’ow s’el ewi ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’am kok sikpl a, el sikpl ec’adu.
Adu élm akŋ a ec’ɛgŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci; kɔ iy ec’a, sɛgŋ a fɛŋ li b’el akŋ a ec’ɛgŋ.
Eke Iy a bi sɔg ɔny, b’ow eel ewi tasi.
M’uw any eke eel Abraham ec’alaw; gbɛkɔ am ɔɔl eke k’ibir’m, aŋke ɛm e sodad a anm ɔny ɛrm ɛm.
Ɛm, m’am dad low yec’a eke m’ɛkn ɛm Ɛs ogŋ a, kɔ ɔny, am kokr low yec’a eke ɔny ɛs dad ɔny a."
-L’eb ow odad nɛnym ninɛ: "Ɛy ɛs a, Abraham." Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Blel eel Abraham ec’ey tasi ana, ke blel kókr ów eke li kok a.
Mi dad ɔny low nawrɛ a eke m’uw any Nyam e lís a, ɛtŋ am ɔɔl eke k’ibir’m. Lɛgŋ kaka Abraham kokm low nɛnɛ!
Ɔny, bi kokr ów nyam a cɛ ɛsɛ ɔny ɛs af." -L’ɔdu -l’eb li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛy s’elm egŋ ot iy. S’ɔny ɛy ɛs nyam coco, in l’el Nyam."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Blel Nyam el ɔny ɛs ana, ke blel érurir’m, aŋke Nyam ogŋ m’anŋ m’ow, ɛtŋ m’anŋ aŋa in e nin ɛm. Ow elm ɛm obi ɛm m’owm, kɔ in l’ɛrm’m.
Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ɔ́tumn irimn odad a eke mi bi dad ab ee? Aŋke ijmn ɛm e sodad a ec’iri e lɛc.

Ɔny ɛs a el agn, ɛtŋ b’erurir eke ki kokr low yec’a eke ɔny ɛs b’erur a. Nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ l’el ɛgŋ ibiu. Lɛgŋ kaka n’anm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam owi ɛm, aŋke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam anm in ɛm. Eke li b’ɔny yadŋ, ke in ec’elel eke n’anŋn ke ɛcm’n ab a ana, aŋke l’el yadŋu ɛtŋ l’el yadŋ ec’ɛs.
Gbɛkɔ ɛm ec’a, low nawrɛ eke mi bi dad a sosiɛm anake úbmn’m nawrɛ a.
Ɔny ɛm aŋa, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke ki dad ɛlu ɔkm eke mi kok sikpl ee? Ɛtŋ sica eke m’am dad ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ úbmn’m nawrɛ ee?
Ɛgŋ ek’el Nyam ec’a, b’iri Nyam e sodad a. Gbɛkɔ ɔny, elmn Nyam eci, na sosiɛm anake írimn a."
Jwifɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "S’am dad eke ŋ Samari iy ɛtŋ ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ yɛji. Kɔ yadŋ s’ɔny ee?"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "M’ɔnym abŋ ŋuŋ, kɔ ɛm Ɛs mi b’ɛlum ɛtŋ ɔny, ɛ́gŋmn eke k’ɛlumn’m.
M’ɔlm ɛm obi ec’anygbɛl es; ɛgŋ anŋ ek’am kok ow e low ke am jɛj ok.
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ eke b’ɛlum ɛm e sodad a, lɛgŋ kaka li k’ow l’uwm."
Jwifɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Sica s’uw any eke ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ tasi! Abraham uw, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a yɛji uw, ɛtŋ ŋ, am dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ eke b’ɛlum ɛm e sodad a, lɛgŋ kaka li k’ow l’uwm.'
Ɛy ɛs Abraham uw. Kɔ am tutr eke ɔny any akm’n ee? Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a yɛji uw. Kɔ ayaf b’ocr ŋ sosi ee?"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Blel m’am ɔŋn ɛm sosi any ana, ke blel ow elm low kaka. Ɛgŋ a eke am ɔŋ’m any a, ɛm Ɛs. In e lís e low eke bi dadr a el: 'L’el ɛy e Nyam',
ke uwmn in any. Kɔ ɛm, m’uw’r any. Blel mi dad eke m’uwm’n any, blel m’él yadŋu ɛsɛ ɔny af. Gbɛkɔ m’uw’r any ɛtŋ mi b’ɛlum in e sodad a.
Ɔny ɛs Abraham in e tutr ɛm ɛlu sos ɛm iŋn ɔkm ɛm e mowrer a ec’ɛkn eci; l’ɛkn ɛtŋ n’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn."
Ow ɔŋ Jwifɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, k’ɔnym akpo ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab yɛji ke kpɛkŋ ɛ́kn Abraham ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: gbuŋ ke wɛl éw Abraham a, 'Ɛm, anŋ anŋ.' "
Ow sosiɛm -l’ot mebn eke -li k’ɔɔr ow. Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɛy ɔkm Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a es lɔl ɛm.
Eke Jesu am ɛc a, l’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam ek’any efl mew ɛm ɛtŋ.
In e jam ɛsɛl a am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ɛgŋ na any efl in e mew ɛm ɛtŋ ee? Kɔ in obi ɛm e sikpl, oglog ɛs lele lis ab e sikpl sosiɛm ee?"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ow elm in obi ɛm e sikpl, oglog ɛs lele lis ab e sikpl sosiɛm. Kɔ any efl’l yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam e juma kok a e low ɛ́y ɔkm in ɛm.
Eke lɛgŋ anŋ owr a, ow akpl eke si ki kokr ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a e juma. Lɛgŋ uk am ow, ek’ɛgŋ k’ow ɔtum kokm juma.
Eke m’anŋ wus af aŋa a, m’ow m’el wus na ec’usuayl."
Eke li dad sodad amua bake uwr a, l’ifi sar l’ok wus ɛtŋ li kok kɔdɔg sar ab ab, l’oc l’udu any eflu a ec’anyamn a,
ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ìm yɔg any Silowe e mij ab ɛm." (Silowe e nyandrɛ el 'ɛrmu'.) Any eflu a im yɔg any, ɛtŋ eke l’ɛwl l’ow a, n’am ɛkn es!
In e saw saw ec’agŋ lele agŋ ɛjec’eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm ɛkn’n n’am sasm ob a am ibrm ɛsɛ: "We! Kɔ ow elm ɛgŋ a eke bi sig es am sasm ob ab ee?"
Agŋ nyam nyam am dad eke ow in ana. Bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: Njaŋ, ow’n elm ow, kɔ es cɛ ow’n b’ot ow. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a dad ninɛ: "Tasi, ɛm ana."
-N’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf kokr ɛtŋ ŋ ec’anyamn a ayl ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jesu a kok kɔdɔg udu’m anyamn ɛtŋ li dad’m eke mi k’im Silowe e mij ab ɛm mi yɔg any. M’im yogŋ, ɛtŋ eke mi yɔg any uwr a, m’am ɛkn es."
-L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a, bogŋ in a!" Li dad ninɛ: "M’ɛknm’n."
Sica wɛl ɛwl ɛgŋ a eke wɛl ewlm a Farisiɛl ogŋ.
Ke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ anake Jesu oc kɔdɔg kok ewlm’n anyamn a.
Na sosiɛm Farisiɛl a yɛji am ibrm ɛgŋ a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf kokr ɛtŋ am ɛkn es ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "L’udu’m kɔdɔg tɛl anyamn, mi yɔg any ɛtŋ m’am ɛkn es."

Farisiɛl bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ ikŋ na eke kok low na a k’ɔtum anm Nyam ogŋ owm, aŋke l’ɛluam nɛnɛgŋ e ec’ol a." Gbɛkɔ agŋ likpr a ɔdu eb ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf sikpl ɛs nyam ɔtu eke ki kok mɛny ɛwr amua ee?" Ɛtŋ ɛl ɔfr a -li bubr ɛm.
Ɛmɛny Farisiɛl a am ibrm any eflu a ek’ewl a ɛsɛ: "Ɛtŋ kɔ ŋ eke l’ewlm’ŋ anyamn a, ayaf am dadr ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "L’el kokoba ɔb ɛs."

Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a k’ubm nawrɛ eke li k’el any eflu ke sica l’éwl n’am ɛkn es. Ow sosiɛm -l’ɛsŋ ɛs lele lis ab low ibrm eci, ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm wɛl -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ iy na ɔny ec’iy ee? Am ɛgŋn ebr eke l’el any eflu mew ɛm ɛtŋ ee? Ayaf ɛtŋ sica n’am ɛkn es ee?"
In ec’agŋ a dad ninɛ: "S’uw any cɛ eke l’el ɛy jim ɛtŋ wɛl ew’r any eflu.
Gbɛkɔ elel eke ow ɛcr ke sica n’am ɛkn es a s’uwm any, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke k’ewlm’n anyamn a yɛji s’uwm’n any. Any at’r es, ìbrmn in, in obi l’ɔtu eke li ki dad!"
-N’am dad ɛbɛn aŋke -n’am uru Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a. Tasi ɛm a, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a ikŋ anym iririr eke ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛgŋ eb eke Jesu el Mesi a, -l’ogŋ ow ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a.
Low na sosiɛm anake iy ɛs a lele iy lis ab ab dad ninɛ: "Any at’r es, ìbrmn in, in obi l’ɔtu eke li ki dad a."
Ɛmɛny Farisiɛl ɛsŋ ɛgŋ a eke wɛl ewlm a sakp yony ɛm ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ɛy s’uw any eke ɛgŋ na sikpl ɛs! Dàd low nɛnyɛmbri nyam Nyam ec’any af."
Li dad ninɛ: "Ke l’él sikpl ɛs oglog li k’elm sikpl ɛs yɛji, m’uwm any. Gbɛkɔ low nyam cɛ m’uw any: m’el any eflu, ɛtŋ sica m’am ɛkn es."
-N’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf li kokr’ŋ ee? Ayaf l’ewlm’ŋ anyamn ab ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "M’ikŋ anym mi dad ɛtŋ erurmn eke k’irir. Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am erurir eke ɛmɛny mi ki dadr ɛm ee? Kɔ ɔny yɛji in e jam ɛsɛl am erurir eke k’eel ee?"
-N’am wɛwr ow -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ŋ el ɛgŋ nɛnɛ na e jam us ɛs! Ɛy Mois e jam us ɛsɛl s’el.
Mois ec’a Nyam dad’r odad; kɔ ɛgŋ ikŋ na ec’a, yogŋ eke n’anŋ l’ow bɔbɔ yɛji s’uwm any!"
Ɛgŋ a eke wɛl ewlm a dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kin low ek’ɛw any iti owi: uwmn yogŋ eke n’anŋ l’ow ab any, gbɛkɔ l’ewlm im!
S’uw any eke Nyam írim sikpl ɛsɛl e lebl; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɛlum Nyam ke bi kok in ec’erur a, Nyam b’iri’r lebl.
Lɛgŋ kaka wɛl dadm ɛy s’irim eke ɛgŋ nyam ewlm ɛgŋ eke mew ɛm ɛtŋ el any eflu.
Blel ɛgŋ na anm Nyam ogŋ owm, blel l’ɔtum li kokm low kaka."
-L’ɔdu -l’eb -li dad ow ninɛ: "Ŋ e mew ɛm ɛtŋ, ŋ nimum a anŋ sikpl ɛm ɛtŋ am erur eke ki yɛgm ɛy low ee?" Ɛtŋ -l’ogŋ ow Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a.
Eke Jesu iri eke wɛl ogŋ any eflu a, n’im n’ɛŋn ow ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny ɔmn ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɛm ee?"
Ɛgŋ a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, dàd’m ɛgŋ a yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɔ́ny ɔmn in ɛm ɔ!"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Aah! Am ɛkn’n; caca ɛm a, in anake n’am dad’ŋ odad a!"
Ɛgŋ a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ɔny ɔmn." Ɛtŋ l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "M’ow wus af aŋa jɛj ok eci: ke ány eflu ɛ́kn es, ke agŋ ek’am ɛkn es a any éfl."
Farisiɛl bɛb a eke anŋ in ab a iri sodad amua, ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛy yɛji ány eflu si k’el ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Blel eel ány eflu, blel elmn sikpl ɛsɛl; gbɛkɔ eke am dadr eke am ɛkan es a, eel sikpl ɛsɛl."
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ eke ɛ́crm lisany a eci ɛym mɛcɛb lakp ab ɛm, ke b’uyu usu ɛjeci ɛy ɛm a, ɛgŋ a ulu, ów gaŋgaŋ ɛs.
Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ɛcr lisany a ec’a, el mɛcɛb a ec’ɔsu ɛs.
Ɛgŋ a, usu ɔsu ɛs a bi fig’r lisany ɛtŋ mɛcɛb a b’iri’r lebl. Li b’ɛsŋ in e mɛcɛb a ec’en nyam nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ li b’ok wɛl ɔkm.
Eke li b’ok wɛl ɔkm fɛŋ a, li b’ikŋ wɛl anym ke wɛl ám us’r jam, aŋke mɛcɛb a uw’r lebl any.
Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke -l’uwm any a, -l’usmn ow jam. Eke -l’ɛkn ow, -li b’uru -n’ɔmu es aŋke -l’uwm ow lebl any."
Jesu oc nyandrɛ ɛm odad na am dad ɛl, kɔ low yec’a eke n’am erur eke li k’ɛlu ɔkm a k’okm agŋ a es sos ɛm.
Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: m’el mɛcɛb lakp a e lisany.
Agŋ a fɛŋ eke ikŋ anym ow a, elu, ów gaŋgaŋ ɛsɛl; kɔ mɛcɛb a ɛgŋm irim ɛl ec’odad a.
Ɛm, m’el lisany. Ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛcr ɛm ɛm ɛy ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn sel; l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛy ɛm l’ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɛŋn in ec’ob ij.
Ulu ec’a, li b’ow cɛ eke li k’iy, l’ibi ke ni ŋúŋn. Ɛm, m’ow eke agŋ k’ɛŋn sel, ke -n’ɛŋn sel a nɔnɔ ɛm.
Ɛm, m’el mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs mamn. Mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs mamn b’oc in e sel a ɔŋ in e mɛcɛb a.

Ɛgŋ ek’am kok juma ke ow el os sosiɛm cɛ ec’a, elm mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs tasi; mɛcɛb a elm in eci. Eke li b’ɛkn botimbo ek’am ow a, li b’igŋ l’ok wɛl es, ke l’úru es n’im. Ke sica botimbo a ɔ́ny mɛcɛb a bɛb ke ɔ́mun ɛl es.
Ɛgŋ a ek’am kok juma ke ow el os sosiɛm cɛ ec’a, ɛbɛn eke ow b’ɛcr ana. L’útrm mɛcɛb a e low.
Ɛm, m’el mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs mamn a. Ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm Ɛs uw’m any ke ɛm yɛji m’uw’r any ab af a, ɛbɛn nyam coco m’uw ɛm e mɛcɛb ab any, ɛtŋ ɛl yɛji -l’uw’m any. Ɛm e sel a m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke mi k’oc m’ɔŋ ɛl.
Ɛmɛny m’ɔny mɛcɛb ɛjeci eke anm lakp na ɛm. Ɛl yɛji ow it ke mi nyímn ɛl; -li b’ow -l’iri’m lebl ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el mɛbob nyam eke b’ow ɔny ɔsu ɛs nyam coco.
Ɛm Ɛs b’erur’m aŋke m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke mi k’oc ɛm e sel a m’ɔŋ ɛl, ke ɛmɛny m’ɛ́wl m’oc.
Ɛgŋ kaka ébm im sel a abu ɛm, kɔ ɛm obi mi b’oc sel a m’ɔŋ ɛl; m’ɔny abusu eke mi k’oc sel a m’ɔŋ ɛl, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɔny abusu eke mi k’eb. Ɛm Ɛs ec’ol a eke ɔŋ’m ab ana."
Sodad amua sosiɛm, ɛmɛny Jwifɛl a ubr ɛm.
Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ am dad ɛsɛ: "N’ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ! Nuŋ ɛm uŋ’n! Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am irir in ec’odad ab ee?"
Bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ eke ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ a k’ɔtum dadm odad nɛnɛ. Abŋ ŋuŋ ɛs ɔtu eke k’ewlm ány eflu ee?"
Sica Nyamel gbɛl a e fig ec’es gbɛgbl ɛy Jerusalɛm ɛtŋ ow el lɛfr lɛgŋ iy.
Jesu am nyinymn es Nyamel gbugŋ a, lɛf eb usu a eke ij Salomɔ e nin a.
Jwifɛl a iwr did ɛlul il ɛm ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ b’ow ɔny ɛy es bɛbar na ɛm cɛ ee? Dàd ɛy nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke ow el ŋ el Mesi a."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’ikŋ anym mi dad ɔny, kɔ ubmn’m nawrɛ. Ów a eke m’am kok ɛm Ɛs e nin ɛm a am ij ɛm e daŋku.
Ɛtŋ ɔny, úbmn nawrɛ aŋke elmn mɛcɛb a ek’el ɛm ec’a.
Ɛm e mɛcɛb a b’iri’m lebl, m’uw ɛl any ɛtŋ -li b’us’m jam.
Mi b’ɔŋ ɛl sel eke ɔnym uwr; lɛgŋ kaka -li k’ow -l’uwmn ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ k’ɔtum dɔgrm ebm ɛl ɛm ec’abu ɛm.
Ɛm Ɛs a eke ot ɛl ɔŋ’m a, l’agb l’akm ob ob fɛŋ, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka ɔnym abusu eke ki dɔgr ob eke anŋ ɛm Ɛs abu ɛm a eb.
Ɛm lele ɛm Ɛs ab a, s’el nyam coco."
Ɛmɛny Jwifɛl a ot mebn as luku eke ki wɔwl’l.
Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs ɛm, mi kok ów amamn nɔnɔ mi yɛgm ɔny. Ów amua, bogŋ ec’anake ow af am ɔɔl eke k’ibir’m mebn ɛm ab ee?"
Jwifɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Ow elm ke bi kok low nimamn ke s’íbi’ŋ mebn ɛm, kɔ Nyam eke am wɛwr a sosiɛm. Ɛgŋ cɛ el’ŋ, ɛtŋ am ocr ŋ sosi Nyam!"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nyam dad wɛl nɔn ɔny ec’ ol ab ɛm ninɛ: Ɔny eel 'sinyam'.
Agŋ a eke Nyam odad a ot es a, Nyam ɛsŋ ɛl 'sinyam'. Ke s’uw any eke Nyam Lɛl ec’odad eke dad a, wɛl k’ɔtum ɔnym ocm es.
Ɛtŋ ɛm, ɛm Ɛs usm’m abu es ɛtŋ ɛrm’m wus na af; ayaf ɔtur eke ki dadr ɛsrɛ m’am wɛwr Nyam aŋke mi dad eke m’el Nyam ec’Iy ee?
Eke mi kokm ɛm Ɛs ec’ów a, k’ùbr’m nawrɛ.
Gbɛkɔ eke mi bi kok a, eke ubmn ɛm e sodad a nawrɛ yɛji, ùbr ów amua nawrɛ yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ók ɔny es sos ɛm kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ eke ɛm Ɛs ir ɛm ɛm ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji m’anŋ ɛm Ɛs ɛm."
-N’am ɔl ek’ɛmɛny -li k’ɛw ow abu af, kɔ l’akm wɛl.
Ɛmɛny Jesu ɛwl im mij ewl mij a ek’el Jurdɛn a e jam a, yogŋ a eke Jan ikŋ anym ok agŋ mij nuŋ a, ɛtŋ n’anŋ yogŋ.
Agŋ nɔnɔ am ow in ogŋ ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Jan kokm mɛny ɛwr kaka, gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ a e low a eke li dad a el nawrɛ."
Ɛtŋ sica agŋ nɔnɔ ub’r nawrɛ.
Ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Lasar ɔny lisijɔwɛl yony, Mart lele Mari ab; -l’ir Betani baŋn. Mari a, ke yɔw a eke ok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ mijey akr ke oc in e sin nuŋ tɛtŋ es ab ana. Lisijim Lasar ɛy ɔl tuɔtuɔ.
Agŋ lisijɔwɛl yony a ɛrm ɛgŋ eke k’im dad Jesu eke in ec’ɛgŋ a eke li b’erur a ɔl am ɔny.
Eke Jesu iri amani na a, li dad ninɛ: "Ɔl ikŋ na k’ow ibim’n, ow el Nyam ec’anygbɛl a eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ec’Iy ec’anygbɛl a ɛ́y ɔkm."
Ke Jesu b’erur Mart, ow lisijɔw lele Lasar ab sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Ow sosiɛm Lasar ec’ɔl owi a eke l’iri a, n’anŋ usu a eke n’anŋ a li kok sɛgŋ yony l’ok af.
Ɛtŋ ca li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "S’ɛ́wal s’imn Jude."
Jam ɛsɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, yogŋ anake wɛl ɔl eke k’ibi’ŋ mebn ɛm a, ɔrɔfn k’ɛtum es yɛji ɛtŋ ɛmɛny am erur eke k’ɛwl im ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ mum ɛm a wanci lɛw yony b’anŋ, kɔ yadŋ ee? Eke lɛgŋ owr ɛgŋ am an es, l’uyuam ob ab aŋke n’am ɛkn wus na ec’usuayl a.
Kɔ eke ɛgŋ am an es ncok ɛm, li b’uyum ob ab aŋke usuayl anm in ɛm."
Eke li dad ów amua bake ow uwr a, l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Ɛy lawl a mɛmn n’am ɛru, kɔ m’ow m’im m’uwr’r."
Jam ɛsɛl a dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke ow el mɛmn n’am ɛru tasi, li b’ow l’ewl."
Tasi ɛm a, Lasar e luw a ec’odad anake Jesu am dad a, ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a e tutr ɛm a, ow el mɛmn cɛ.
Ow ɔŋ Jesu dad ulm ɛl es ninɛ: "Lasar uw.
Eke m’iim yogŋ a, sos ɛm am iŋn’m ɔny eci yec’ɛtŋ ke úbr’m nawrɛ. Gbɛkɔ ɛy fɛŋ s’ímn in ogŋ a."
Ɛtŋ Toma, eke wɛl igŋ nin af Oli a, dad jam ɛsɛl ɛjec’a ninɛ: "Ɛy yɛji, s’ímn yogŋ ke s’úwr in ab."
Eke Jesu im ok yogŋ a, l’iri eke Lasar anŋ uwɔmu ɛm ij sɛgŋ yar.
Eke Betani titm Jerusalɛm ke ow ijm kilo nyahan yɛj’a,
Jwifɛl nɔnɔ ow Mart lele Mari ab ogŋ eke k’atr ɛl sos es ɛl lisijim e luw na sosiɛm.
Eke Mart iri eke Jesu am ow a, n’im ow ec’ɔbr ɛm, kɔ Mari gbɛ sig es gbugŋ.
Mart dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, blel anŋ aŋa, ɛm lisijim blel uwm.
Gbɛkɔ m’uw any, eke caca ɛm yɛji, low fɛŋ eke b’ow ibrm Nyam a, li b’ow n’ɔŋ’ŋ."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Esŋ jim b’ow igb luw ɛm."
Mart dad ninɛ: "M’uw any eke lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a eke agŋ ek’uw a b’ow igb luw ɛm a, in yɛji li b’ow l’igb."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "M’el luw ɛm anŋ igb lele sel ab. Ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, eke l’uw yɛji, li b’ow n’anŋ owr abŋ ɛm;
ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’anŋ owr ke ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, li k’ow l’uwm lɛgŋ kaka. Kɔ ɔny ɔmn low na ɛm ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ub nawrɛ eke el Mesi a, Nyam ec’Iy eke k’ow wus na af a."
Eke l’ɛw nɛny es a, n’im l’ɛsŋ lisijɔw Mari ɛtŋ n’am dad ow lebl es is ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs a ow anŋ aŋa, ɛtŋ n’am ɛsŋ’ŋ."
Eke Mari b’iri sodad amua a, kpɛkŋ l’igb es ogŋ ɛm n’im n’ɛŋn Jesu.
Ke Jesu k’ɛym baŋn a yɛji, kɔ n’anŋ usu a cɛ eke Mart ɔbr’r a.
Eke Jwifɛl a anŋ akŋ am atr Mari sos es, ke l’igb es ogŋ ɛm l’ɛy ɔkm a, -l’us ow jam. -Li tutr ek’ow aam uwɔmu af ikŋ ɔŋn.
Mari im ok yogŋ a eke Jesu anŋ a. Kpɛkŋ eke li b’ɛkn ow a, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ow ec’any af ɛtŋ n’am dad ow l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, blel anŋ aŋa, ɛm lisijim blel uwm."
Jesu ɛkn eke n’am ikŋ ɔŋn agŋ a ek’igŋ’n ab ow ab ab. Ow e low a ɔwr’r sos es afŋn es,
ɛtŋ n’am ibrm wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ ɛwr ir ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òw cɛ b’ow ɛkn."
Jesu ikŋ ɔŋn.
Jwifɛl a dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀kan, l’erur ow tasi!"
Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam am dad ɛsɛ: "In eke l’ewlm any eflu a, kɔ li k’ɔtum l’ɛdŋnm Lasar eke k’úwm ee?"
Ɛmɛny Jesu low ɛy sos ɛm toŋ ow afŋn es, ɛtŋ im uwɔmu ab af. Ow el nɔmu ek’anŋ mób ɛm, ke wɛl oc lob abl ow ec’ɛm ɛy usu ab es.
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɔ̀nyn lob a ocr es." Lɛgŋuw a e lisijɔw Mart dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, sɛgŋ emum yar ɛtŋ anake n’anŋ aŋa a, l’it eke li k’ewŋ."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ mi dadm’ŋ m’ɛsmɛ, eke ɔny ɔmn, b’ow ɛkn Nyam ec’anygbɛl ab ee?"
Sica wɛl ɔny lob a oc es, ɛtŋ Jesu igbl any ogŋ afr ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, m’ɛlu’ŋ bia eke iri ɛm e lebl.
M’uw any eke sɛgŋ a fɛŋ b’iri’m lebl, gbɛkɔ m’am dad’ŋ agŋ amua ek’ɛlul’m ɛm a eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ub nawrɛ eke ɛrm’m."
Li b’uwar odad a ɛtŋ li barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Lasar, ɛ̀y ɔkm!"
Lɛgŋuw a ɛy ɔkm, gbad og wiwrm’n sabu lele akr ab ɛtŋ gbad wiwrm’n nuŋ ab. Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Mɔ̀mun in es, ke ɛ́gbar ir es n’im."
Jwifɛl a ek’ow Mari ogŋ a ɛkn ów a eke Jesu kok a ɛtŋ ɛl ɛm e nɔnɔ ub nawrɛ.
Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb gbɛ im ɛŋn Farisiɛl a ɛtŋ otar ów a eke Jesu kok a e low akr ok ɛl.
Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele Farisiɛl ab ɛsŋ Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a luku as ɛm, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na am kok mɛny ɛwr owi nɔnɔ! Kɔ ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?
Eke s’am yɛb’r li kok ɛbɛn, agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow ub’r nawrɛ; ow b’ow ɔŋ Rom ec’es ɛwɛl a ow ok low na ɛm ŋuŋn ɛy e Nyamel gbɛl na lele ɛy ec’ɛb na nimum ab!"
Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kayif, ke lakpo ab af el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Low na k’okm ɔny es sos ɛm kaka!
K’uwmn any eke ow akpl ɔny eci ek’ɛgŋ nyam k’uw dedeku a fɛŋ eci, ke ow ɛm a ɛb a nimum k’uŋm ee?"
Ke ow elm in ɛm li dadm odad na, gbɛkɔ eke lakpo ab af l’el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a, n’am ɛwar li dad eke ow’n it eke Jesu in k’uw Jwifɛl fɛŋ eci,
ke ow’n k’elm wɛl sɔny cɛ eci, kɔ ke in ás Nyam ec’ey a eke in mɔmun es a luku sos megl nyam ɛm.
Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a bɛbm eke k’ibi Jesu.
Ow sosiɛm Jesu ɛ́cm Jwifɛl a ec’any af ij. N’im wus ikpr nyam eke titm loj a, baŋn a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Efrayim ab ɛm; n’anŋ yogŋ in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab.
Pak ec’es gbɛgbl ek’el Jwifɛl ec’a e lɛgŋ titm, ɛtŋ wus ab af ec’agŋ nɔnɔ im Jerusalɛm eke k’ ayal sos gbuŋ ke es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ ów.
-N’am ɔl Jesu, ɛtŋ eke -n’anŋn Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a, -n’am ibrmnin ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf am ɛkanin ee? Li b’ow l’ow, kɔ li k’ow l’owm es gbɛgbl na ɛm ee?"
Ke egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab dad ek’ɛgŋ in uw yogŋ eke Jesu in anŋ any, ow’n yɛ́gm ɛl yec’ɛtŋ k’ɛl ɔ́ny ow.
