Sica ow anŋ sɛgŋ nɔhɔn ke Pak ɛ́y, ɛtŋ Jesu im Betani, yogŋ a eke Lasar eke l’igbm luw ɛm a anŋ a.
Yogŋ, Mart kok ob ij ɔŋ’n. Agŋ a ek’anŋ ob ij lɔfu lís Jesu ab a, Lasar yɛji anŋ ɛm.
Mari oc mijey litr ikpr ek’il an ke wɛl kok nar tasi ɛm ok Jesu akr; ɛtŋ l’oc in e sin nuŋ a li tɛtŋ ow akr es. Akŋ a nimum el mijey sɔsŋ ɔfr.
Ɛtŋ Judas Iskariɔt, Jesu e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam, in a tasi eke b’ow ɔl ij’r a dad ninɛ:
"Wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔl mijey na ij os ekŋ yen yen sakp nyahan, óc ow ec’os a ɔŋ ɔgbɔru."
N’am dad odad na ow elm ɔgbɔru e sɔrŋ ikŋ eke li k’ɔny eci, kɔ eke l’el ulu a sosiɛm eci, aŋke os ekpr a eke li b’ɔnym ab a, li b’ot os a eke wɛl b’ok ɛm a.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gb’r es tiŋ! Li kok low na lɛgŋ a eke wɛl b’ow ɛlu’m uwɔmu ɛm a eci.
Ɔgbɔru anŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kɔ ɛm ec’a, mi k’ow m’anm ɔny ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ."
Jwifɛl a ec’agŋ nɔnɔ iri eke Jesu anŋ Betani. -N’im yogŋ ow elm Jesu sosiɛm eci cɛ, kɔ Lasar yɛji eke Jesu igbm luw ɛm a sosiɛm eci.
Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ɛgŋ eb eke k’ibi Lasar yɛji,
aŋke Jwifɛl nɔnɔ am ŋgboŋ ɛl ɛm Lasar sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ub Jesu nawrɛ.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, agŋ nɔnɔ a eke ow Pak ec’es gbɛgbl ab ɛm a iri eke Jesu am ow Jerusalɛm.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ot sarikŋ ay ɛtŋ ok ɔkm baŋn a aam ɔbr’r, -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Hosana! Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ ɛgŋ a ek’am ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ɔwrɔ! Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ Israɛl ec’ɛb ebu a ɔwrɔ!"
Jesu ɛŋn gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋni nyam ɛtŋ sig es af ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dadr ab af:
Siɔn eci dedyɔwli, erŋn k’ɔ́ny’ŋ! Ìs any lɛr, ŋ ec’ɛb ebu a am ow, li sig gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋni e liy af.
Ke ów amua k’okm in e jam ɛsɛl a es sos ɛm; gbɛkɔ eke Jesu ɛy in ec’anygbɛl ɛm bake ow uwr a, -l’ɔkn eke Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad in e lís e low na, ɛtŋ ow anake ow ɛy a.
Bieku ab ɛm ec’agŋ a eke ɛkn Jesu igbm Lasar luw ɛm a, am dad low a eke -l’ɛkan a ec’odad.
Bieku a iri mɛny ɛwr a e li kok a ec’odad: na sosiɛm anake -l’owr -n’am ɔbr ow a.
Ca Farisiɛl a am dad ɛl ɔfr ɛm ɛsɛ: "Am ɛkan, si k’ɔtumn low kaka fɛŋ ec’ij! Agŋ a fɛŋ am us’r jam!"
Es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ a, agŋ a ek’uyu im Jerusalɛm eke k’igŋ Nyam nuŋ a, Grɛkɛl a e bɛb anŋ ɛl ɛm.
Ɛl, -n’im -n’ɛŋn Filip ek’el Bɛtsayida baŋn Galile wus af ec’ɛgŋ a, ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, s’am erur eke si k’ɛkn Jesu."
Filip im dad ok Andre ɛtŋ ɛl yony mum -n’im -li dad -l’ok ow.
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Wanci ow eke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ɛy in ec’ anygbɛl ɛm.
Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: likŋ e liy nyam eke wɛl ɛlu nɔmu ɛm ke anŋ tiŋ ugŋm es a b’anŋ in ec’elel a cɛ. Gbɛkɔ eke sel a ugŋ es, li b’ɔsu ey nɔnɔ.
Ɛgŋ eke b’erur in e sel a, li b’ow l’irmn ow; kɔ ɛgŋ eke wus af aŋa k’ow ebrm in e sel a e low ɛrm mij a, b’ow ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
Ɛgŋ eke am erur e ki kok ɛm e lís e low a, ow it ke l’ús’m jam; ow ɛm a, li b’ow n’anŋ yogŋ a eke m’ow m’anŋ a. Ɛgŋ a eke b’ow kok ɛm e lís e low a, ɛm Ɛs b’ow usr’r sos.
Wanci na af ɛrmni ɛdŋ’m es. Ɛtŋ ayaf mi ki dadr ee? Mi dád m’ɛsɛ: ɛm Ɛs, ɔ̀ny oc’m es gbre e wanci na af ee? Ke tasi ɛm a, wanci na ec’anake m’ow a.
Ɛm Ɛs, ɔ̀ŋ ŋ e nin a anygbɛl!" Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ lebl nyam anŋ afr dad ninɛ: "M’ɔŋ’n anygbɛl lɛgŋ ɛtŋ, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ow m’ɔŋ’n anygbɛl sakp yony ɛm."
Bieku a eke anŋ yogŋ ke iri lebl a am dad ɛsɛ: "Na nyamgbrany!" Ɛtŋ agŋ bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: " Afr ɛrm ɛs nyam dad’r odad!"
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lebl na ikŋm ɛm sosiɛm, kɔ ɔny sosiɛm.
Catŋ anake wus na e jɛj ok e wanci a ow a; sicaca ɛm a, wɛl b’ow ogŋ wus na ec’es ɛw ɛs a.
Ɛtŋ ɛm ec’a, lɛgŋ eke wɛl b’ow igbl’m ogŋ afr a, m’ow m’ɔdu agŋ a fɛŋ m’eb."
Sodad amua ɛm, Jesu am yɛgm in e luw a ec’elel eke b’ow ɛcr.
Agŋ a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛy e sol a e silɛl ab ɛm s’iri eke Mesi a b’ow anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Ayaf ɔtu eke ki dad eke ow it eke wɛl k’igbl ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ogŋ afr ee? Ɛgŋ ec’ Iy a, ke bwo ec’ɛgŋ ana ee?"
Jesu am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ɛmɛny usuayl anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn lɛgŋ tɛl eci cɛ. Eke ɔnyn usuayl a, àan es usuayl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ncebn k’ókrm ɔny es. Ɛgŋ eke am an es ncebn ɛm a úwm usu eke n’aam ab any.
Eke ɔnyn ɛgŋ a eke el usuayl a, ɔ̀nyn ɔmn in ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke éel usuayl ec’ey." Eke li dad sodad amua uwr a, Jesu ocr sos es agŋ a sosiɛm im kpekpe lɔl es.
Mɛny ɛwr nɔnɔ na eke li kok bieku a ec’any af a yɛji ɔɔm ɛl -l’ubm ow nawrɛ.
Ow ɛm kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi ec’odad eke dad a iy nɛny: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ iri ɛy eci odad ab ee? Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ okm sos ɔkm yɛgm ee?
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Esayi in cɛ li dad low a sosiɛm eke agŋ amua k’ɔtum ubm nawrɛ a:
Nyam efal ɛl any, l’irmn wɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl eci anyamn a k’ɛ́knm es, ke -li k’uwmn low any. Ɛtŋ kin low a sosiɛm eke -li k’ɛwlmn -l’owmn Nyam ogŋ bake l’éwlm wɛl a.
Esayi dad odad na aŋke l’ɛkn Jesu ec’anygbɛl a, ɛtŋ ow el ow ec’odad anake n’am dad a.
Gbɛkɔ, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a, ɛl ɛm a yɛji agŋ nɔnɔ ub Jesu nawrɛ. Gbɛkɔ Farisiɛl a sosiɛm, -l’okamn sos ɔkm bake wɛl ogŋ ɛl Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a.
-Li b’erur sos usr a eke b’anŋ agŋ ɛm ow a -l’akm Nyam ɛm ec’a.
Jesu igbl lebl ogŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ eke ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, ow elm ɛm ɛm sɔny cɛ n’ɔnym ɔmn, kɔ ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m ab ɛm yɛji.
Ɛgŋ eke am ɛkn’m a, am ɛkn ɛgŋ a eke ɛrm’m a.
Ɛm, m’el usuayl, m’ow wus af aŋa yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, k’ánm ncebn ɛm.
Eke batŋ ɛgŋ am iri ɛm e sodad a, ɛtŋ l’ɔ́sum a, ke ow elm ɛm m’ɔbm’n low ij, aŋke tasi ɛm a, m’ow eke mi ki sɔg wus ec’agŋ a, kɔ ow elm ɛl e low ɔb eci.
Ɛgŋ eke am igŋ’m, ke ébm ɛm e sodad a, b’ɛŋn in e low ɔb a ow ɛm; lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, ɛm e low yɛgm a anake b’ow ɔb’r low a.
Tasi ɛm a, ow elm ɛm obi ɛm mi dadm, kɔ ɛm Ɛs eke ɛrm’m a in obi, n’ɔŋ’m yec’a eke mi ki dad ke mi yɛgm agŋ a ec’abusu.
Ɛtŋ m’uw any eke yec’a eke li bi dad a b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel ek’ɔnym uwr. Yec’a eke m’am dad a, m’am dad ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m ow ec’abusu ab af."

Gbuŋ ke Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ ɛ́y a, Jesu uw any eke lɛgŋ ow’r eke li k’ŋgboŋ wus af aŋa n’im Ɛs ogŋ. L’erur in ec’agŋ a eke anŋ wus af aŋa a, ɛtŋ sica li b’ow li yɛgm wɛl eke n’ɔny wɛl ec’erur kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ.
Jesu lele in eci jam ɛsɛl ab ab am ij ncebles ec’ob; ke Judas, Simɔ Iskariɔt jim gbɛ, agn eb’r eke li k’ɔl Jesu l’ij.
Jesu in obi l’uw any eke n’anŋ Nyam ogŋ l’ow eke li b’ow l’ɛwl n’im ow ogŋ, ɛtŋ Ɛs ɔŋ’n low fɛŋ ec’abusu.
L’igb ob ij lɔfu lís yogŋ, n’ɔny in e mob af ɛw a l’oc es, ɛtŋ l’oc gbad l’ucu er.
Ow e jam a, l’oc mij l’ok kpokpo ɛm ɛtŋ n’am yɔyɔg jam ɛsɛl a akr es; li b’oc gbad a eke l’ucu er a li tɛtŋn wɛl akr es.
Li b’ok Simɔ Piɛr ogŋ a, ow dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ŋ ki yɔyɔg’m akr es ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Caca ɛm e low eke m’am kok a k’irim, gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ ek’am ow ab ɛm b’ow iri."
Piɛr ninɛ: "K’ow yɔyɔgm im akr es lɛgŋ kaka!" Jesu ninɛ: "Eke mi yɔyɔgm’ŋ es, k’ow elm ɛm eci."
Simɔ Piɛr ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ow k’él akr sɔny ij, kɔ nuŋ lele sabu ab yɛji!"
Jesu ninɛ: "Ow itm eke ɛgŋ eke ok mij a k’ok mij ij, ek’ow elm akr cɛ, aŋke l’ayl fɛŋ. Ɔny, ayal, gbɛkɔ ow elm ɔny fɛŋ gbɛ."
Jesu uw ɛgŋ a eke b’ow ɔl ij’r ab any sɛnyn sɛnyn; na sosiɛm anake li dad eke ow’n elm wɛl fɛŋ wɛ’n aylm a.
Eke li yɔyɔg wɛl akr es bake ow uwr a, l’us in e mob sus ɛm a, l’ɛwl n’im ob ij lɔfu lís a li sig es ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ low a eke mi kok ɔny a, uwr ow e nyandrɛ ab any ee?
B’ɛsŋn’m 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs' lele 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl' ab ɛtŋ ɔny e low yɛji ij aŋke m’el.
Eke batŋ ɛm eke m’el Ɛgŋ gbɛl lele Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs ab a mi yɔyɔg ɔny akr es, ke ɔny yɛji, ɔny ɔfr a, ow it eke ki yɔyɔgr ir akr es.
M’ɔŋ ɔny sɛwl eke ki kokr ɛsɛ elel eke mi kok ab af.
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: adu ágbm akam in ec’es ɛw, ɛtŋ ɛrmu yɛji ágbm akam ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’n a.
Sica eke uwr ów amua any a, eke kokr ow e low, ehe b’ow el ɔny eci.
Ow elm ɔny fɛŋ ec’odad mi dadm; agŋ a eke mi sɔsum m’ot a, m’uw ɛl any. Gbɛkɔ ow it ke Nyam Lɛl ec’odad a íy nɛny: Ɛgŋ a eke in yɔny s’ij ob a ɛwl ow’m ar.
Sicaca ɛm a, m’am dad ɔny kpɛkŋ gbuŋ ke low a ów, yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ a eke low a b’ow ɛy a, úbr nawrɛ eke ɛm, anŋ anŋ.
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’eb ɛgŋ eke m’ɛrm a, ɛm yɛji l’eb’m; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke eb’m a, eb ɛgŋ a eke ɛrm’m a."
Eke Jesu dad ów amua bake ɛw nɛny es a, low ɛy’r sos ɛm afŋn es. Li dad l’ɛrum mar ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam b’ow ɔl ij’m."
Jam ɛsɛl a am lɛrir ɛl ɔfr ɛtŋ -l’uwmn ɛgŋ yec’a eke odad a ot es ab any.
Jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam a eke Jesu b’erur a akŋm’n ab.
Simɔ Piɛr ɛw sos nyam yɛgm’n eke li k’ibrm Jesu ɛgŋ yec’a ek’ow am dad ow ec’odad a.
Jam ɛs a igŋ Jesu lɔru ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ ee?"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "M’ow m’ubr futufutu m’usm mredi ɛm; ɛgŋ a eke m’ow m’oc m’ɔŋ a, ke in ana." L’ubr futufutu l’usm mredi ɛm ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ Simɔ Iskariɔt jim Judas.
Eke kpɛkŋ Judas eb futufutu ikpr a, Satan ɛy’r ɛm. Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Low yec’a eke ki kok a, kòk fafa."
Low a sosiɛm eke li dad ow odad na a, agŋ a eke ok es ob ij lɔfu lís a, ɛgŋ kaka uwm any.
Eke ow el Judas anake b’ɔnym os ab ab a, agŋ nɔnɔ am tutr eke Jesu am ɛrm’n eke li k’im l’ɔl ob ek’it es gbɛgbl a eci, oglog n’ím l’ap ɔgbɔru ob.
Judas eb futufutu a ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ l’ɛy ɔkm. Ke lɛgŋ am uk.
Eke sica Judas ɛy ɔkm a, Jesu dad ninɛ: "Sica ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ec’anygbɛl a e lisany a fig ɛtŋ Nyam ec’anygbɛl a b’ow ɛy ɔkm in ɛm.
[Ɛtŋ eke Nyam ec’anygbɛl a ɛy ɔkm in ɛm,] Nyam yɛji in obi b’ow ɛlu Iy a ec’anygbɛl ɔkm, ɛtŋ ow k’ow ibnm.
Ɛm ec’ey, m’anŋ ɔny ab lɛgŋ tɛl cɛ eci. B’ow ɔɔl’m, kɔ m’am m’ow mi dad ɔny low a eke mi dad m’ok Jwifɛl ɛjec’a: 'K’ow ɔtumn iimn yogŋ a eke m’aam a.'
M’am ɔŋ ɔny ol owr: èrurir ɔny ɔfr. Tasi ow it eke k’erurir ɔny ɔfr ɛsɛ elel eke m’erur ɔny ab af.
Eke erur anŋ ɔny ɔfr ɛm tasi, ke agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow uw any eke eel ɛm e jam us ɛsɛl."
Simɔ Piɛr am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bogŋ aam ee?" Li dad ow ninɛ: "Sicaca ɛm k’ɔtum usm im jam owm yogŋ a eke m’aam a; gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ ɛjec’ɛm b’ow us’m jam ow."
Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ caca ɛm mi k’ɔtum m’usm’ŋ jam m’owm ee? Ɛm, m’uw es inym eke mi k’irmn ɛm e sel a ŋ eci!"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ tasi uw es inym eke k’irmn ŋ e sel a ɔŋ’m ee? Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ: gbuŋ ke ŋgɔs íkŋ a, b’ow dad sakp nyahan eke uwm’m any."
Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ɛrm mij k’ók ɔny. Ɔ̀nyn ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ke ɛm yɛji ɔ́nyn ɔmn ɛm ɛm.
Ɛb ir usu nɔnɔ anŋ ɛm Ɛs e gbugŋ a; kɔ blel ow anm tasi, ke mi dad m’ɛsɛ m’aam mi kok ɔny usu eke k’iir ee?
Eke m’ow m’im mi kok ɔny usu a, m’ow m’ɛwl mɛny m’ow ke m’ót ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny yɛji ánŋn yogŋ a eke m’anŋ a.
Yogŋ a eke m’aam a ec’ejagb a uwr any."
Toma dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, yogŋ a eke aam a, s’uwm any, ke sica ayaf s’ɔtu eke si k’uw ejagb ab any ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "M’el ejagb, m’el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam, m’el sel. Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum iim Ɛs ogŋ eke l’ɛcrm ɛm ɛm.
Eke uwr’m any, b’ow uwr ɛm Ɛs yɛj’any. Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, uwr ir any ɛtŋ ɛkan in yɛji."
Filip dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, yɛ̀gm ɛy Ɛs cɛ ke ow b’ow ɛyr ɛy ɛrm es."
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Filip, m’anŋ ɔny ab lɛgŋ ibn ɛtŋ uwm im any ee? Ɛgŋ eke ɛkn’m a, ɛkn ɛm Ɛs. Ɛtŋ kɔ bla sosiɛm am dad eke mi ki yɛgm’ŋ ɛm Ɛs ee?
M’anŋ ɛm Ɛs ɛm ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs yɛji anŋ ɛm ɛm; kɔ ub nawrɛ ee? Sodad a eke m’am dad ɔny a, ow elm ɛm ɛm ow ánm owm. Ɛm Ɛs eke ir ɛm ɛm a anake bi kok in ec’ów fɛŋ a.
Eke mi bi dad m’ɛsɛ m’anŋ ɛm Ɛs ɛm ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs yɛji anŋ ɛm ɛm, ke ùbr’m nawrɛ. Eke ɛgŋmn, ke ów amua sosiɛm gbɛ ùbr nawrɛ.
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny. Ów a eke m’am kok a, ɛgŋ yec’eke ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, in yɛji li b’ow li kok. Ɛtŋ li b’ow li kok ow agb afŋn es aŋke m’aam ɛm Ɛs ogŋ.
Low fɛŋ eke b’ow ibrmn ɛm e nin ɛm a, m’ow mi kok, yec’ɛtŋ ke Iy ɛ́lu Ɛs ec’anygbɛl a ɔkm.
Eke batŋ am ibrmn’m low ɛm e nin ɛm a, m’ow mi kok."
"Eke b’erurir’m, b’ow ɔsur ɛm e sol a.
Ɛtŋ m’ow m’ibrm ɛm Ɛs eke k’ɔŋ ɔny Abu Ɛlum Ɛs ɛjeci eke k’anŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
In l’el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’Abŋ. Wus k’ɔtum ebm’n, aŋke li k’ɔtum l’ɛknm ow, li k’ɔtum l’uwm ow any. Gbɛkɔ ɔny, uwr ir any aŋke n’anŋ ɔny ab ɛtŋ li b’ow n’anŋ ɔny ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Mi k’ow m’ɛlum ɔny es ɔny sɔny ɛsɛ uwiyŋɛl af, kɔ m’ow m’ɛwl m’ow ɔny ogŋ.
Ow anŋ lɛgŋ tɛl eke wus k’ow ɛknm im ij; kɔ ɔny, b’ow ɛkan’m, aŋke m’ow m’ɛwl m’anŋ owr ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji b’ow anŋn owr.
Ow e lɛgŋ a, ow b’ow ok ɔny es sos ɛm eke m’anŋ ɛm Ɛs ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji anŋn’m ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji m’anŋ ɔny ɛm.
Ɛgŋ a eke b’eb ɛm e sol a, ke b’ɔsu a, ke ɛgŋ a eke b’erur’m ab ana. Ɛgŋ eke b’erur’m a, ɛm Ɛs b’ow erur ir; ɛm yɛji m’ow m’erur ir ɛtŋ m’ow m’okm sos ɔkm in ec’any af."
Jud (ow elm Judas Iskariɔt) dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bla sosiɛm dad eke k’okm sos ɔkm yɛgm ɛy ke ow k’elm wus ec’agŋ ab ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Low fɛŋ eke m’am dad a, ɛgŋ eke b’erur’m a b’ow ɔsu. Ɛm Ɛs b’ow erur ir, ɛtŋ ɛm lele ɛm Ɛs ab si b’ow s’im in ogŋ, ɛtŋ si b’ow s’ir in ɛm.
Ɛgŋ eke érurm im a, ɔ́sum ɛm e sodad a. Low na eke m’am dad irir a, ow elm ɛm eci, kɔ ɛm Ɛs eke ɛrm’m a ogŋ ow anŋ ow.
Eke m’anŋ ɔny ab a, m’am dad ɔny low na.
Abu Ɛlum Ɛs a, Abŋ Lala a eke ɛm Ɛs b’ow ɔŋ ow ɛm e nin ɛm a, b’ow yɛgm ɔny low a fɛŋ ɛtŋ b’ow ɔkn ɔny ów fɛŋ eke mi dad ɔny a.
M’am ɛw ɔny ɛrm es ɛy es, m’am ɔŋ ɔny ɛm eci ɛrm es ɛy a. M’ɔɔm ɔny ɛsɛ elel eke wus b’ɔŋn ɛgŋ ab af. Ɛrm mij k’ók ɔny, erŋn yɛji k’ɔ́ny ɔny.
Irir mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'M’aam kɔ m’ow m’ɛwl mɛny m’ow.' Blel b’erurir’m tasi ana, ow íŋn ɔny sos ɛm uwr any eke m’aam ɛm Ɛs ogŋ, aŋke ɛm Ɛs agb akm’m.
M’am dad ɔny caca ɛm gbuŋ ke ów amua ów, yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ a eke ów amua b’ow a, úbr nawrɛ.
Mi k’ow mi dadm ów nɔnɔ ɔny ab ij, aŋke wus na ec’es ɛw ɛs a am ow. Ow elm ke n’ɔ́ny abusu ɛm e nuŋ af,
kɔ ow it eke wus k’uw any eke m’ɔny ɛm Ɛs ec’erur. Ow sosiɛm low yec’a eke ɛm Ɛs b’ibrm a, mi bi kok. Ìgbr, s’ŋ́gbroŋn aŋa!"
"M’el viny e likŋ lis tasi a, ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs el ɔgm a e juma kok ɛs.
Likŋ lal fɛŋ eke b’ucu’m ke ɔ́sum ey a, li b’ubr ow es, gbɛkɔ lal fɛŋ eke b’ɔsu ey a, li b’ot ow ɛm es, l’ayal ow, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny l’ɔ́su ey nɔnɔ l’obn.
Low yɛgm a eke m’ɔŋ ɔny a, ayal ɔny lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ.
Ùcur’m ɛsɛ elel eke m’ucu ɔny ab af. Likŋ lal k’ɔtum ɔsum ey in obi ɛm, eke l’ucum likŋ lis a; ɛbɛn nyam coco ɔny yɛji, k’ɔtumn ɔsumn ey eke ucumn’m.
M’el viny e likŋ a eci lis, ɛtŋ ɔny eel likŋ a ec’ál a. Ɛgŋ eke ucu’m ke ɛm yɛji m’ucu’r a b’ɔsu ey nɔnɔ. Tasi ɛm a, k’ɔtumn kokmn low kaka fɛŋ eke m’anm ɛm.
Ɛgŋ eke ucum im a, wɛl b’oc ɔwl’l gbeŋ ɛsɛ likŋ lal eke ɔ́sum ey af; li bi wɛw es, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ot ekŋ ál wɛwɛ a wɔwl alm iri ok es.
Eke b’anŋn ɛm ɛm ɛtŋ ɛm e sodad a yɛji b’anŋ ɔny ɛm a, ìbrmn ɛm Ɛs low yec’a eke erurir a, li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny.
Eke b’ɔsur ey nɔnɔ a, b’ow yɛgmn eke eel ɛm e jam us ɛsɛl; ow ɛm anake ɛm Ɛs ec’anygbɛl a b’ow ɛy ɔkm a.
Ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm Ɛs b’erur’m ab af a, ɛm yɛji mi b’erur ɔny ɛbɛn. Ànŋn ɛm ec’erur ab ɛm.
B’ow anŋn ɛm ec’erur ab ɛm eke b’ɔsur ɛm e sol a, ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɔsu ɛm Ɛs e sol a ke m’anŋ in ec’erur ab ɛm ab af.
Mi dad ɔny low na yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn a ánŋ ɔny ɛm, ke ow ɔ́ŋ ɔny e sos ɛm iŋn a iy nɛny.
Kin ɛm ec’ol a eke m’am ɔŋ ɔny a: èruririr ɔny ɔfr ɛsɛ elel eke m’erur ɔny ab af.
Erur ligbɛl a eke ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ɛlu ɔkm a cɛ el ke l’írmn in e sel a lawlɛl e nuŋ af.
Eke bi kokr low yec’a eke m’am ibrm ɔny a, ke eel ɛm lawlɛl ŋ̂.
Mi k’ow m’ɛsŋ’m ɔny madu ij, aŋke adu úwm in ec’es ɛw ɛs e low eke bi kok ab any. M’am ɛsŋ ɔny ɛm lawlɛl aŋke ɛm Ɛs ɛm e low fɛŋ eke mi wewr a, mi yɛgm ɔny.
Ow elm ɔny sɔsuamn ocmn’m, kɔ ɛm mi sɔsum m’ot ɔny; m’ɛw ɔny eke k’imn ɔsur ey, ɔ́sur ey eke b’anŋ ibn. Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ ɔny low fɛŋ eke am ibrmn ɛm e nin ɛm a.
Low a eke m’am ibrm ɔny a el: èruririr ɔny ɔfr."
"Eke wus ɔny ɔny e sifn, ɔ̀kan eke ɛm l’ikŋ anym l’ifn’m.
Blel eel wus ec’ana, wus ɔ́ny ɔny ec’erur eke eel in ec’a sosiɛm. Kɔ mi sɔsum m’ot m’ok ɔny saw, elmn wus ec’ij: na sosiɛm anake wus b’ifn ɔny a.
Ɔ̀kan low a eke mi dad ɔny a: 'Adu ágbm akam in ec’es ɛw a.' Eke agŋ ijr’m gbre, ɔny yɛji -li b’ow -l’ijr ɔny gbre; eke -l’ɛlum ɛm e low yɛgm a, -li b’ow -n’ɔny ɔny ec’a yɛji ec’ɛlum.
Ɛtŋ ɛm sosiɛm -li b’ow -li kok ɔny ów amua fɛŋ, aŋke ɛgŋ a eke ɛrm’m a, -l’uwm ow any.
Blel m’owm, ɛtŋ blel mi dadm ɛl odad ana, ke blel ow elm ɛl sikpl. Kɔ caca ɛm a, -n’ɔnym low eke -li ki dad -li dogŋn sos ij.
Ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɛm e sifn a, ɔny ɛm Ɛs yɛji eci sifn.
Blel ɛl ec’araŋn a mi kokm ów eke ɛgŋ ɛjeci k’ɔtum kokm ana, ke blel ow elm ɛl sikpl. Kin, ca -l’ɛkn ɛm ec’ów a ɛtŋ ɛm lele ɛm Ɛs ab -n’am ifn ɛy.
Gbɛkɔ ów amua am ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke odad na eke wɛl nɔn ɛl ec’ ol ab ɛm a íy nɛny: -N’ɔny ɛm e sifn ów ɔbr ɛm.
Abu Ɛlum Ɛs a b’ow ow: in l’el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’Abŋ eke anŋ ɛm Ɛs ogŋ am ow. Ɛm Ɛs b’ow oc’r ɔŋ’m m’ɔŋ ɔny, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ij ɛm e daŋku.
Ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji, b’ow ijr ɛm e daŋku aŋke anŋn ɛm ab nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ."
"M’am dad ɔny ów amua yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɔ́wrmn ɔny ec’ɔmn a.
Wɛl b’ow ogŋ ɔny Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lɛgŋ anŋ anym am ow eke agŋ a eke b’ow ibi ɔny a b’ow tutr eke ow el Nyam juma anake -n’am kok a.
-Li b’ow -li kok ɛbɛn aŋke -l’uwm ɛm Ɛs any, ɛtŋ ɛm obi ɛm obi yɛji -l’uwm’m any.
Gbɛkɔ mi dad ɔny low na yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ a eke ow b’ow ow a, ɔ́kan eke m’ikŋ anym mi dad ɔny." "Mi dadm ɔny low na nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ aŋke m’anŋ ɔny ab.
Sica m’aam ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a ogŋ, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka íbram im yogŋ a eke m’aam a.
Nɛnɛ eke mi dad a, sos ɔw ɔny es nimum.
Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny tasi eke ow akpl ɔny eci eke mi k’im; tasi ɛm a, eke m’iim, Abu Ɛlum Ɛs a k’ow owm. Kɔ eke m’im a, m’ow m’ɔŋ’n l’ow.
Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ow a, li b’ow li yɛgm wus ec’agŋ a ɛl eci wus ɛy sikpl owi ab ɛm, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam owi ab ɛm, lele Nyam e jɛj ok owi ab ɛm ab.
-L’ok wus sikpl owi ɛm aŋke -l’ubmn’m nawrɛ;
-l’ok wus low nɛnyɛmbri nyam owi ɛm aŋke m’aam ɛm Ɛs ogŋ ɛtŋ -li k’ow -l’ɛknmn’m ij;
-l’ok wus jɛj ok owi ɛm aŋke wus ec’abusu ɛs a, wɛl ɔb’r low ŋ̂.
Sicaca ɛm a, m’ɔny ów nɔnɔ eke mi ki dad ɔny, kɔ k’ow ɔtumn irimn ij.

Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ a eke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’Abŋ a b’ow ow a, li b’ow ni nyimn ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam fɛŋ ɛm. Li k’ow li dadm in obi e nin ɛm ec’odad, kɔ li b’ow li dad yec’a eke l’iri a, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ɛwar ɔny low yec’eke b’ow ɛy a.
Li b’ow l’ɛlu ɛm ec’anygbɛl a ɔkm, aŋke li b’ow l’ot yec’a ek’el ɛm ec’a, ɛtŋ li b’ow li dad ɔny ow e low.
Ɛm Ɛs ec’ob fɛŋ eke ɔny a, el ɛm eci; ow sosiɛm anake mi dad m’ɛsɛ: Abŋ b’ow eb yec’ek’el ɛm ec’a ɛtŋ li b’ow li dad ɔny ow e low."
"Ow k’ow ibnm eke k’ow ɛknmn’m ij, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke ow b’ow kok sɛgŋ waa a, b’ow ɛwal ɛkan’m."

Ɛtŋ in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm e bɛb am dad ɛl ɔfr ɛm ɛsɛ: "Ke na in e nyandrɛ el ayaf ee? Li dad ɛy eke ow’n k’ow in ibnm eke ɛs k’ow ɛs ɛknm’n ij; ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ow’n b’ow in kok sɛgŋ waa, ɛs b’ow ɛs ɛwl ɛs ɛkn’n. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li dad eke in aam Ɛs ogŋ.
Sɛgŋ waa a eke n’am dad ow ec’odad a e nyandrɛ el bogŋ ec’ee? Low yec’a eke n’am erur eke li ki dad a, si k’irim!"

Jesu am uw any eke jam ɛsɛl a am ɔl eke k’ibrm’n low. Ow ɔŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Mi dad ɔny eke ow k’ow ibnm eke k’ow ɛknmn’m ij, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke ow b’ow kok sɛgŋ waa a, b’ow ɛwal ɛkan’m. Kɔ na ec’anake ɔny ɔfr ɛm a am ɔɔl ow e nyandrɛ ab ee?
Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: b’ow ikŋn ɔŋn kokr sɔrŋ, kɔ wus gbɛ b’ow anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm; b’ow anŋn sos es ɔw ɛm, kɔ ɔny eci sos es ɔw a b’ow itŋn el sos ɛm iŋn.
Yɔw ám ew iy a, li b’anŋ gbre ij ɛm, aŋke in e gbre ij e lɛgŋ a ow ŋ̂. Kɔ li b’ew iy a, li b’ijl gbre ij ab es, iy a eke l’ew a eci sos ɛm eke am iŋn’n a sosiɛm.
Ɛbɛn eke sicaca ɛm a, anŋn gbre ij ɛm ana, gbɛkɔ ɛmɛny m’ow m’ɛwl m’ɛkn ɔny ɛtŋ b’ow anŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm; sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ebm ɔny abu ɛm.
Eke lɛgŋ ikŋ na b’ow a, k’ow ibramn’m low kaka fɛŋ ij. Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ob fɛŋ eke b’ow ibrmn ɛm Ɛs ɛm e nin ɛm a, li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny.
Toŋ ke it yɛfɛnyna a, ibramn low kaka ɛm e nin ɛm. Ke ɔny e sos ɛm iŋn a ágb a, ìbrmn, b’ow ɛŋan."
"M’oc nyandrɛ ɛm odad mi dad ɔny ów amua fɛŋ. Lɛgŋ am ow eke mi k’ow mi dadm ɔny ɛbɛn ij, kɔ yogŋ anake m’ow mi dad ɔny ɛm Ɛs e lís e low a lala ɛm a.
Ow e lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, b’ow ibrmn ɛm Ɛs low ɛm e nin ɛm; mi dadm ɔny eke m’ow mi ŋɔŋn’n m’ɔŋ ɔny,
aŋke ɛm Ɛs in obi li b’erur ɔny. Li b’erur ɔny aŋke b’erurir’m ɛtŋ b’ubr nawrɛ eke m’anŋ Nyam ogŋ m’ow.
M’anŋ ɛm Ɛs ogŋ m’ow m’ɛy wus af aŋa. Sica m’am ɛlu wus es ke m’ɛ́wl m’im ɛm Ɛs ogŋ a."
In e jam ɛsɛl a am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Sica am dad ów a ɛrum mar, ócm odad nyandrɛ ɛm dadrm odad ij.
Sica s’uw any eke uw low low fɛŋ any, ɛtŋ b’ikŋ anym uw low yec’a eke wɛl k’ibrm ŋ ab any. Ɛm aŋa anake s’ub nawrɛ eke anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Catŋ ubr nawrɛ ee?
Ɛɛ, wanci am ow, ɛtŋ wanci a ow yɛji ŋ̂; yogŋ ɔny fɛŋ b’ow ɔmun es, ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ím in ogŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ igŋn ɛlul’m es ɛm sɔny. Njaŋ, tasi ɛm a, m’anm ɛm sɔny aŋke ɛm Ɛs anŋ ɛm ab.
Mi dad ɔny ów amua fɛŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm ɛm a, ɛ́ŋan ɛrm es ɛy. B’ow ijr gbre wus af aŋa, kɔ ɛrm úsu ɔny lokm aŋke m’akm wus es."
Sica eke Jesu dad sodad amua bake ow uwr a, l’igbl any ogŋ afr ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, wanci a ow ŋ̂; ɛ̀lu Ejimŋ ec’anygbɛl a ɔkm yec’ɛtŋ ke Ejimŋ yɛji ɛ́lu ŋ ec’a ɔkm,
ke n’ɔ́ŋ agŋ a eke ot abul il a sel ek’ɔnym uwr, abusu a eke ɔŋ’n agŋ e nuŋ af ab ɛm.
Sel ek’ɔnym uwr a el: ke wɛl úw’ŋ any, ŋ eke el Nyam nawrɛ nyam coco a, ke wɛl úw Jesu Krist eke ɛrm a yɛj’any.
M’ɛlu ŋ ec’anygbɛl a ɔkm wus af aŋa, juma a eke ɔŋ’m eke mi ki kok ab ɛm.
Sica ɛm Ɛs, anygbɛl a eke m’ɛŋn ŋ e lís gbuŋ ke wus anŋ a, ɛ̀lu’m anygbɛl ikŋ na ɔkm ŋ ec’any af."
"Wus ec’agŋ a eke ot abul’m a, m’oc’ŋ mi yɛgm ɛl. -L’el ŋ eci ɛtŋ ot abul’m ɛtŋ -l’ɔsu ŋ ec’odad ebl a.
Sica -l’uw any eke ob fɛŋ eke m’ɔny a, ŋ ogŋ ow anŋ ow,
aŋke m’ɔŋ ɛl odad a eke ɔŋ’m a, ɛtŋ -l’eb. Tasi -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb eke m’anŋ ŋ ogŋ a m’ow, ɛtŋ -l’ub nawrɛ eke ɛrm’m.
M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ ɛl eci; ow elm wus eci mi ŋɔŋnm, kɔ agŋ a eke abul’m a sosiɛm aŋke -l’el ŋ eci.
Ob fɛŋ eke m’ɔny a ŋ eci, ɛtŋ ŋ ec’eke ɔny a yɛji el ɛm eci, ɛtŋ ɛm ec’anygbɛl a b’ɛy ɔkm ɛl ɛm.
Mi k’ow m’anm wus ij, kɔ ɛl gbɛ -n’anŋ; ɛm, m’am ow ŋ ogŋ. Ɛm Ɛs lala, ɔ̀su ɛl ŋ e nin a ek’ɔŋ’m ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’el nyam, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm lele ŋ ab s’el nyam ab af.
Eke m’anŋ ɛl ab a, m’ɔsu ɛl ŋ e nin ɛm, nin a eke ɔŋ’m ab ɛm. Mi b’ɛw ɛl nyamn af, ɛtŋ ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka iram, ek’ow elm in a cɛ ek’it eke k’irm, ke Nyam Lɛl a íy nɛny a.
Sica m’am ow ŋ ogŋ, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke m’anŋ wus a, m’am dad ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl ɛm a, -n’ɛŋn ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn a, sos ɛm iŋn a nimum.
M’ɔŋ ɛl ŋ ec’odad a ɛtŋ wus ɔny ɛl e sifn, aŋke -l’elm wus eci ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm yɛji m’elm wus ec’ab af.
Mi ŋɔŋnm eke k’ɔny ot ɛl es wus af aŋa, kɔ eke k’ɔsu ɛl Low Ŋuŋ Ɛs e lís.
-L’elm wus eci ɛsɛ elel eke m’elm wus ec’ab af.
Ŋ ec’odad a el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam. Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab ɛm, kòk ɛl -l’el ŋ eci kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ.
M’am ɛrm ɛl wus ec’agŋ ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm yɛji ɛrm’m wus ec’agŋ ɛm ab af.
M’am ocr ɛm sosi nimum m’ɔŋ’ŋ ɛl eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl yɛji -l’el ŋ eci kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ."
"Ow elm ɛl sɔny cɛ eci Nyam mi ŋɔŋnm kɔ agŋ a eke ɛl yɛji b’ow ub’m nawrɛ jam ɛsɛl a eci daŋku ij ab ɛm a.
M’am ŋɔŋn eke ɛl fɛŋ -li k’el nyam. Ɛm Ɛs, ow it eke -li k’okr af ɛy ab ɛsɛ elel eke m’anŋ ŋ ɛm ke ŋ yɛji anŋ ɛm ɛm ab af, yec’ɛtŋ ke wus ec’agŋ a úb nawrɛ eke ow el ŋ ɛrm’m.
Ɛtŋ m’ɔŋ ɛl anygbɛl a eke ɔŋ’m a yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’el nyam ɛsɛ elel eke ŋ lele ɛm ab s’el nyam ab af.
M’anŋ ɛl ɛm ɛtŋ ŋ yɛji anŋ ɛm ɛm; ow ɛm anake -li b’ow -l’ɔtu -l’el nyam tasi a, yec’ɛtŋ ke wus úw any eke ɛrm’m ɛtŋ b’erur ɛl ɛsɛ elel eke b’erur’m ab af.
Ɛm Ɛs, ot ɛl ɔŋ’m, ɛtŋ m’erur eke yogŋ a eke m’anŋ a, ɛl yɛji -n’anŋ ɛm ab yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɛkn ɛm ec’anygbɛl a, anygbɛl a ek’ɔŋ’m a, aŋke erur’m gbuŋ eke wɛl ki kok wus a.
Ɛm Ɛs, Low Nyim Nyim Ɛs, wus uwm’ŋ any, kɔ ɛm m’uw’ŋ any ɛtŋ agŋ amua uw any eke ow el ŋ ɛrm’m.
M’oc’ŋ mi yɛgm ɛl ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ow m’oc’ŋ mi yɛgm ɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm ec’erur a eke ɔny a ánŋ ɛl ɛm, ke ɛm obi yɛji m’ánŋ ɛl ɛm."
Eke Jesu dad ów amua bake ow uwr a, in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab, -n’im Sedrɔn eci mij ewl mij a e jam a. Yogŋ, egb lakp nyam anŋ eke in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab -n’imn -l’okr ɛm.
Judas eke am ɔl Jesu ij a yɛji uw usu ab any, aŋke sakp nɔnɔ Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab b’as luku yogŋ.

Egb waw ɛsɛl ec’agŋ ɛgbɛl a lele Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ ab ab ot srɔda eyŋ lele usu ɔsu ɛsɛl ab ɔŋ Judas, ɛtŋ l’ot wɛl ab n’im egb lakp ab ɛm. Ar mob anŋ ɛl abu ɛm ɛtŋ -n’ɔnym es ɛkan mob lele mrabri ab.
Ɛtŋ eke Jesu uw low a fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛŋn’n ab any a, n’im li titm wɛl ɛtŋ n’am ibrm wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo am ɔɔl ee?"
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Nasarɛt e Jesu." Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm ana." Ke Judas eke am ɔny Jesu ɔŋ ɛl a anŋ ɛl ab.
Kpɛkŋ eke Jesu bi dad ɛl ek’ow el in a, -li kpukŋ -n’im jam ɛtŋ -l’ok wus.
Ɛmɛny Jesu am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo am ɔɔl ee?" -Li dad ninɛ: "Nasarɛt e Jesu."
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’ikŋ anym mi dad ɔny eke ɛm ana. Eke ow el ɛm am ɔɔl’m, ke ɛ̀gbr agŋ likpr a es im."
Elel eke odad a eke li dad a k’iyr nɛny ana: "Ɛm Ɛs, m’irmnm ŋ ec’agŋ a eke abul’m a e nyam yɛji."
Sica Simɔ Piɛr ɔny lab ler ɛm eke n’ɔnym ab a l’ɔsm es, ɛtŋ l’iyr egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a ec’abu ɛlum ɛs a, ɛtŋ l’ubr ow lidr e lɔru ab es. (Abu ɛlum ɛs a e nin a el Malkus.)
Kɔ Jesu dad Piɛr ninɛ: "Òc ŋ e lab ler ɛm a ɛlu ow ec’ekpr ab ɛm. Kɔ am tutr eke mi k’ow m’ɛgŋm gbre e mij kpɔk a eke ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m ab ee?"
Srɔda eyŋ a lele ɛl eci nyimn ɛs ab ab, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛl a eci usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a okr af ɔny Jesu ɛtŋ -n’awŋ ow.
-L’ikŋ anym -l’oc ow -n’im An ogŋ a. An el Kayif eke lakpo ab af el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a eci anu.
Ke Kayif anake ɔm Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛl a ów dad eke: ow’n akpl ɔny eci eke ɛgŋ nyam in k’uw dedeku a fɛŋ ec’a.
Simɔ Piɛr lele jam ɛs ɛjeci nyam ab am us Jesu jam. Eke jam ɛs na el ɛgŋ eke egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a uw any a, ow ɔŋ l’ɛy ow e gbugŋ a Jesu ab.
Kɔ Piɛr gbɛ anŋ gbeŋ lisany a. Ɛtŋ jam ɛs a eke egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a uw any a ɛy ɔkm ow dad yɔw a eke am ɔsu lisany a odad ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ Piɛr yɛji ɛy gbugŋ a.
Yɔw a dad Piɛr ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ yɛji, elm ɛgŋ na e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ee?" Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "M’elm in e jam ɛs."
Ow el lɛfr lɛgŋ iy, ow sosiɛm anake madu a lele usu ɔsu ɛsɛl ab ab fuf al ke ok es am ɔgbu a. Piɛr yɛji anŋ ɛl ɛm ɛtŋ am ɔgbu al a.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a am ibrm Jesu low eke ɔn in e jam ɛsɛl a lele in e low yɛgm ab ab es.
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Mi dad agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af; sɛgŋ a fɛŋ mi bi yɛgm agŋ low Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a lele Nyamel gbɛl ɛm ab, yogŋ eke Jwifɛl fɛŋ b’as luku a ɛtŋ mi dádm low kaka es lɔl ɛm.
Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ibrm im low ee? Ìbrm agŋ a eke iri yec’a eke mi dad ɛl a; ɛl, -l’uw yec’a eke mi dad ɛl ab any sɛnyn sɛnyn."
Eke Jesu dad nɛnɛ a, usu ɔsu ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam ek’anŋ yogŋ a ɛdŋ Jesu any af ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛbɛn eke am dad egb waw ɛs ligbɛl odad ana ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Eke mi dad low eke akplm, ɛ̀lu ɔkm; sica eke low a eke mi dad a akpl, ke bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ɔr’m ee?"
Ɛtŋ An ɔŋ wɛl oc Jesu eke anŋ meb ɛm a im egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Kayif ogŋ a.
Wanci ab af cɛ, Simɔ Piɛr gbɛ anŋ yogŋ a cɛ am ɔgbu al. Wɛl am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ yɛji elm ɛgŋ na e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ee?" Kɔ Piɛr ɛgbr dad ninɛ: "M’elm in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ."
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a e madu ab ɛm e nyam, eke el ɛgŋ a eke Piɛr akpr lɔru es a ec’ɛgŋ a, dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ m’ɛknm’ŋ in ab egb lakp ab ɛm ee?"
Kɔ ɛmɛny Piɛr ɛgbr. Ɛtŋ ow e wanci ab af cɛ ŋgɔs ikŋ.
Ibribr fafa ɛm a, wɛl igŋ Kayif ogŋ a ɛtŋ oc Jesu im Pilat eke Rom ɛw Jude ec’es ɛw ɛs a eci gbugŋ a. Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a okm gbugŋ a bake -li k’ uwmn anŋ, Pak ec’ob eke -li k’ɔtu -l’ij a sosiɛm.
Ow sosiɛm Pilat ow ɛŋn ɛl gbeŋ ɛtŋ am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi af am cicar ɛgŋ na ee?"
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Blel l’elm low ŋuŋ kok ɛs, blel s’ocm’n s’ism’ŋ."
Pilat dad ɛl ninɛ: "Òcr ir ɔny obi ke ɔny ec’ol ab ɛm, jɛ́jr in e low okr." -Li dad ninɛ: "S’ɔnym abusu eke si k’ɔb ɛgŋ low luw eci."
Jesu eci luw owi a eke dad ow ec’odad a ec’elel eke k’iyr nɛny ana.
Ɛtŋ Pilat ɛwl ɛy gbugŋ; n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛsŋ Jesu ow ɛtŋ n’am ibrm ow l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu ab ana ee?"
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ eke tutr ŋ obi ɛtŋ am dad, oglog agŋ dad’ŋ ɛm e lís e low ee?"
Pilat dad ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛm Jwif m’el ee? Ŋ ec’ɛbr ec’agŋ lele egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ab oc’ŋ is’m; kɔ bla kok ee?"

Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛm ec’es ɛw a elm wus na eci; blel ɛm ec’es ɛw a el wus na eci, ke blel ɛm eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ógŋ mum. -Li k’ɛgŋmn wɛl ocm im ɔɔm Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a. Njaŋ, ɛm ec’es ɛw a elm wus na eci."

Ɛtŋ Pilat dad’r ninɛ: "Njɛ ŋ, ɛb ebu ee?" Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ŋ dad eke m’el ɛb ebu. Ɛm, wɛl ew’m m’ow wus af aŋa eke mi k’ij low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e daŋku. Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’a b’iri ɛm ec’odad."
Pilat dad ninɛ: "Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ke bla?" Eke Pilat dad ów amua bake ow uwr a, ɛmɛny l’ɛwl n’im gbeŋ n’ɛŋn Jwifɛl a, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Mi k’ɛknm low sosiɛm eke mi k’ɔb ɛgŋ na low a.
Gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’ol a eke ɔnyn ab ɛm, sakp sakp fɛŋ Pak ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ a, mi b’ɛlu ɔny sobel ɛm ɛs nyam es. Kɔ am erurir eke mi k’ɛlu Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu ab es m’ɔŋ ɔny ee?"
-Li dad ow sɔg ɛm ninɛ: "Njaŋ, ow elm in! Ɛy, Barabas s’am erur!" Ke Barabas a ɛgŋ ŋuŋ.
Ɛtŋ Pilat ɔŋ abusu wɛl oc Jesu ow eke wɛl k’ɔr’r ŋgbre ɛm.
Srɔda eyŋ a ol mirŋ tufɛ ɛtŋ us’r; -l’us ow mob sus ɛm ebl yɛji.
-L’ow -li titm ow ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu, s’am ibrm’ŋ!" Ɛtŋ -n’am dɛdŋ ow any af.
Ɛmɛny Pilat ɛwl ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ am dad dedeku a ɛsɛ: "M’ow m’oc’r m’is ɔny gbeŋ aŋa yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr any eke m’ɛŋnm low eke mi k’ɔbr ɛgŋ na low."
Ca Jesu ɛy ɔkm; l’us mirŋ tufɛ a lele mob sus ɛm ebl ab ab. Pilat dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kin ɛgŋ a!"

Gbɛkɔ kpɛkŋ eke egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a lele usu ɔsu ɛsɛl ab ab ɛkn’n a, -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af! Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af!" Pilat dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn ɔny obi ɛwr ir olikŋ af, kɔ ɛm ɛm tasi a, m’ɛŋnm low kaka eke mi k’oc m’ɔbr’r low."
Jwifɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛy s’ɔny ol, ɛtŋ ol ab ɛm l’it eke li k’uw, aŋke l’urum ɛtŋ li dad ek’in Nyam ec’Iy."
Eke Pilat iri sodad amua a, in eci erŋn a obn.
L’ɛwl l’ɛy gbugŋ ɛtŋ n’am ibrm Jesu l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, bogŋ iy ee?" Kɔ Jesu cicm sar okm’n es.
Ɛtŋ Pilat dad’r ninɛ: "Erurm eke ki dad’m odad ee? Kɔ uwm any eke m’ɔny abusu eke mi k’ɛlu’ŋ es, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɔny abusu yɛji eke mi k’ɔŋ wɛl ɛw’ŋ olikŋ af ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi ɛm a, ɔnym abusu kaka ɛm af eke ow elm yec’a eke Nyam ɔŋ’ŋ a. Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ a eke oc ow’m ŋ ogŋ a kok sikpl akm ŋ a."
Wanci ab af cɛ Pilat am ɔl elel eke k’ɛlul Jesu es. Gbɛkɔ Jwifɛl a am ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Eke ɛlu ɛgŋ na es, k’ow elm Sesar e lawl ij! Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke urum ke am ocr in sosi ɛb ebu a, el Sesar ec’ifnu!"
Eke Pilat iri sodad amua a, n’ɔŋ wɛl oc Jesu ow gbeŋ; n’ɔŋ ow ow sig es jɛj ok usu a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Usu eke wɛl kok mebn ɛm' (ke Ebre ɛm wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Gabata').
Ow el Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a e nɛnɛgŋ krɛkrɛ a e sos bɛbm e lɛgŋ. Eke lɛgŋ am uyu nuŋ a, Pilat dad Jwifɛl a ninɛ: "Kin ɔny eci ɛb ebu a!"

Gbɛkɔ -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Wɛl íbi’r! Wɛl íbi’r! Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af!" Pilat dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ow it eke mi k’ɛw ɔny ec’ɛb ebu a olikŋ af ee?" Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a dad ninɛ: "S’ɔnym ɛb ebu ɛjeci eke ow elm Sesar cɛ."
Ɛtŋ sica Pilat ɛlu Jesu es ɔŋ ɛl eke -li k’ɛw ow olikŋ af. Ɛtŋ -n’ɔny Jesu -l’oc ab -n’im.
L’abu in ec’olikŋ a in obi ɛtŋ l’ɛy ɔkm baŋn a n’im usu nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Nuŋ kpɔk ec’usu' (ke Ebre ɛm wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Gɔlgota').
Yogŋ anake srɔda eyŋ a ɛw Jesu olikŋ af a. -L’ɛw agŋ ɛjeci yony yɛji olikŋ af, ɛtŋ Jesu anŋ ɛl araŋn.
Pilat ɔŋ wɛl nɔn lɛl aru olikŋ a; kin ow eke wɛl nɔn: 'Nasarɛt e Jesu, Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu'.
Jwifɛl nɔnɔ awl lɛl a aŋke yogŋ a eke wɛl ɛw Jesu olikŋ af a titm baŋn a, ɛtŋ lɛl a eke wɛl nɔn a el Ebre ɛm, Latɛn ɛm lele Grɛk ɛm ab.
Ow ɔŋ Jwifɛl ec’ egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a im am dad Pilat ɛsɛ: " 'Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu a' eke wɛl nɔn a, k’ɛ̀w es, kɔ nɔ̀n dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ na ninɛ: m’el Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu'."
Pilat dad ninɛ: "Ow a eke mi ki nɔn a ow mi nɔn a."
Eke srɔda eyŋ a ɛw Jesu olikŋ af a, -l’oc ow eci mob sos ɛw a, ɛtŋ -li cɛc sakp yar; ɛgŋ ɛgŋ akp nyam ɛbm. -L’oc ow eci mob sus ɛm gbɛl a ek’el mrumru, ke ow el ol ɛm wɛl ol a.

Srɔda eyŋ a am dadarir ɛsɛ: "Si k’ɔnyn mob sus ɛm gbɛl na si ki gbagbrmn ɛm, kɔ si kókr sɔsum oc, s’uwr ɛgŋ eke ow k’el in ec’ab any." Ow ɔŋ Nyam Lɛl a íy nɛny: -Li cɛc ɛm ec’ob sos ɛw a ɛl ɔfr ɛtŋ -li kok ɛm e mob sus ɛm gbɛl a eci sɔsum oc. Srɔda eyŋ a e low a eke kok ab ana.
Jesu lis ena, lis lisijɔw, Klopas ɛy Mari lele Mari Magdala baŋn yɔwi ab ab anŋ olikŋ a e saw.
Jesu ɛkn lis ɛtŋ l’ɛkn jam ɛs a eke li b’erur a ek’anŋ lis saw. Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛm lis, kin ejimŋ."
Ɛtŋ li dad jam ɛs a ninɛ: "Kin esŋ." Ow e lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ anake jam ɛs a eb ɛw’r es in ogŋ a.
Eke low na b’ɛc a, Jesu uw any eke low fɛŋ uwr ŋ̂. Ke sica Nyam Lɛl ec’odad a íy nɛny a, li dad ninɛ: "Mij amn am ɔny’m."
Mijel nyam anŋ yogŋ eke srɔda eyŋ a eci mar anŋ ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’oc mbra -l’usm mar ab ɛm, -l’oc -l’ucur likŋ ɛtŋ -l’igŋ Jesu nɛny.
Eke l’ɛgŋ mar a, li dad ninɛ: "Fɛŋ iy nɛny ŋ̂." Li b’is any es, ɛtŋ l’ok sel es.

Lɛgŋ a el nɛnɛgŋ e sos bɛbm e lɛgŋ; Jwifɛl érurm eke lɛgŋuw k’anŋ olikŋ af nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ na yɛji el nɛnɛgŋ ligbɛl; ow sosiɛm, -l’ibrm eke Pilat k’ɔŋ wɛl bubm agŋ a eke anŋ olikŋ af a akr ke wɛl ɔ́ny ot ɛl es.
Srɔda eyŋ a im ɛtŋ bubm agŋ a eke wɛl ɛw olikŋ af Jesu ab a akr.
Eke -li b’ok Jesu ogŋ a, -l’ɛkn eke ow uw ŋ̂; ow sosiɛm anake -li bubam ow akr a.
Gbɛkɔ srɔda eyŋ ab ɛm e nyam oc in eci mpragb a igŋ Jesu mɛnɛgb ɛm ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ mebl lele mij ab am ok es.
Ɛgŋ a ek’am ij ów amua e daŋku a ɛkn ów a ɛtŋ in e daŋku ij a el nawrɛ; in, l’uw any eke low nawrɛ n’am dad. N’am ij ow e daŋku yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny yɛji úbr nawrɛ.
Tasi ɛm a, ów amua ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam Lɛl ec’odad a íy nɛny: Wɛl k’ow ubm’n luw kaka es.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Nyam Lɛl ɛjec’am dad ɛsɛ: -Li b’ow -li lɛr ɛgŋ a eke -l’upar mɛnɛgb ɛm a.

Ów amua b’ɛc a, Josɛf, Arimate baŋn iy a ow ibrm Pilat abusu eke k’oc Jesu eci sos megl a. Ke Josɛf a, Jesu eci jam ɛs kɔ es lɔl ɛm, aŋke li b’uru Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a. Pilat ɔŋ’n abusu l’oc Jesu eci sos megl ab ab n’im.
Nikodɛm a eke ncok nyam im ɛŋn Jesu a yɛji ow. L’ism kpey eke wɛl wuwlm mijey ɛjec’ab ke ow eci leg a ɔtu eke k’ij kilo likŋ lele lɛw ab.
Agŋ a yony mum oc Jesu eci sos megl a, ok sɛkp sŋɔsŋɔ sigbad og ab af ɛtŋ oc wiwrm’n sos ab ɛsɛ elel eke Jwifɛl bi kok ɛgŋ es oc ɛm ab af.
Usu a eke wɛl ɛw Jesu olikŋ af a, egb lakp nyam anŋ; ɛm yogŋ, uwɔmu owr nyam anŋ eke wɛl ocm ɛgŋ es ɛm.
Eke ow el Jwifɛl a eci nɛnɛgŋ eci sos bɛbm e lɛgŋ, ke uwɔmu a yɛji titm a, -l’oc ow es ɛm yogŋ.
Dimas ibribr fafa a, ek’usu k’otm es a, Mari, Magdala yɔwi a im uwɔmu ab af. L’ɛkn uwɔmu nɛny a eci lob a ek’oc es anŋ saw.
Ow ɔŋ l’uru es n’im n’ɛŋn Simɔ Piɛr lele jam ɛs a eke Jesu b’erur ab ab, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Wɛl ɔny Ɛgŋ gbɛl a oc es uwɔmu ab ɛm, ɛtŋ s’uwm yogŋ eke wɛl oc ɛw’r ab any."
Ɛtŋ Piɛr lele jam ɛs yec’ab ab im yogŋ a eke uwɔmu a anŋ a.
Agŋ a yony mum okr af am uru es im, gbɛkɔ jam ɛs yec’a uru es fafa akm Piɛr ɛtŋ ikŋ anym im ok uwɔmu ab af.
L’is es li lɛr uwɔmu ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn sigbad og eke ok es wus, kɔ l’ɛym uwɔmu ab ɛm gbɛ.
Simɔ Piɛr eke am us’r jam a yɛji im ok yogŋ ɛtŋ ɛy uwɔmu ab ɛm. L’ɛkn sigbad og eke ok es wus yogŋ,
lele gbad a eke wiwrm Jesu nuŋ ab a; gbad na anm sigbad og ab ab, kɔ wɛl ar es ɛw es usu ɛjeci.
Ɛtŋ jam ɛs ɛjec’a, in a eke ikŋ anym im uwɔmu ab af a yɛji ɛy uwɔmu ab ɛm. L’ɛkn ɛtŋ l’ub nawrɛ.
(Ke tasi ɛm a, toŋ wanci ab af a, jam ɛsɛl a k’irim Nyam Lɛl ec’odad ek’am dad eke Jesu in b’ow in igb agŋ ek’in uw ab ɛm a e low.)
Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl yony a ɛwl im ɛl ogŋ a.
Mari anŋ gbeŋ uwɔmu a saw, ɛtŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn. Ɔŋn ikŋ ab ab, l’is any es eke li k’ɛkn uwɔmu ab ɛm;
l’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yony eke sus mob efu ok es usu a eke wɛl ɛw Jesu eci sos megl a: nyam anŋ nuŋ af ɛtŋ nyam anŋ akr esr a.
Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Yɔw, kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn ee?" Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Wɛl ɔny ɛm Ɛgŋ gbɛliy oc es ɛtŋ m’uwm yogŋ eke wɛl ɛw’r es ab any."
Eke n’am dad ɛbɛn a, l’ɛwl sos mɛny ɛtŋ l’ɛkn Jesu ek’anŋ yogŋ, kɔ l’uwm any eke ow el ow.

Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Yɔw, kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn ee? Kɔ bwo am ɔl ee?" N’am tutr eke ow el egb lakp a eci juma kok ɛs a, na sosiɛm li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke ow el ŋ oc’r ab im, ke yɛ̀gm’m usu eke ɛw’r a, ke m’ím m’oc’r."
Jesu ɛsŋ’n: "Mari!" L’ɛwl sos mɛny ɛtŋ li dad ow Ebre ɛm ninɛ: "Rabuni!" (ek’el nyandrɛ ɛm 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs').
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Njaŋ, k’ùcu k’ɔny’m es! Mi k’iim ɛm Ɛs ogŋ a, kɔ ìm dad ɛm lisijimɛl a eke m’aam ɛm Ɛs a eke ɔny yɛji el ɔny Ɛs a ogŋ, m’aam ɛm e Nyam a eke ɔny yɛji el ɔny e Nyam a ogŋ."
Ɛtŋ Mari, Magdala yɔwi a im ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ am ɔb ɛl amani dad ɛsɛ: "M’ɛkn Ɛgŋ gbɛl a!" Ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl low yec’a eke ow dad’r a.
Dimas a cɛ eci ncebles a, jam ɛsɛl a as luku êl nyam ɛm. -Li babl masany a fɛŋ safuɛ ɛm aŋke -n’am uru Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a. Jesu ɛy ɔkm ɛl ec’araŋn inym es ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ɛrm ɛs ɛy ánŋ ɔny ab!"
Li b’ok odad ab es a, n’am yɛgm wɛl in e sabu a lele in eci mɛnɛgb ɛm ab ab. Jam ɛsɛl a sos ɛm am iŋn, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke -l’ɛkan a sosiɛm eci.
Ɛmɛny Jesu am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ɛrm es ɛy ánŋ ɔny ab! Ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm Ɛs ɛrm’m ab af a, ɛm yɛji m’am ɛrm ɔny."
Sodad amua b’uwr a, li fuf wɛl sel ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛ̀ŋan Abŋ Lala!
Agŋ a eke b’ow ocr sikpl apr a, b’ow ɛŋn oc ap; agŋ a eke k’ow ocmn sikpl apmn a, k’ow ɛŋnm oc ap."
Lɛgŋ a eke Jesu ow ɛl ec’araŋn a, jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam, Toma (eke wɛl igŋ nin af Oli a) anm ɛl ab.

Jam ɛsɛl ɛjec’a am dad’r ɛsɛ: "S’ɛkn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ!" Kɔ Toma dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke m’ɛknm ecigbrɔ ɛnyɛmbri in e sabu araŋn a, eke m’ocm ɛm ec’abuli a m’ɛlum ecigbrɔ a ec’ɔmu a eke kok ab ɛm, ɛtŋ m’ocm ɛm ec’abu a m’ujrm’n mɛnɛgb ɛm, mi k’ow m’ubm nawrɛ."

Dimas gber mum b’ɛc a, ɛmɛny Jesu eci jam ɛsɛl a as luku êl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ na ec’a, Toma yɛji anŋ ɛl ɛm. Wɛl babl mel a safuɛ ɛm, kɔ Jesu ɛy ɔkm inym es ɛl ec’araŋn ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛrm es ɛy ánŋ ɔny ab!"
Ɛtŋ li dad Toma ninɛ: "Ɛ̀w ŋ ec’abuli a aŋa ke lɛ́r ɛm e sabu a; ɛ̀gŋm ŋ ec’abu ab es ujr’m mɛnɛgb ɛm. Kì bɛbar, kɔ ùb nawrɛ."
Toma dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm e Nyam!"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Eke ɛkn’m a anake ub nawrɛ ab ee? Ehe b’ow el agŋ a eke k’ow ɛknm im ke b’ow ub’m nawrɛ a eci!"
Jesu kok mɛny ɛwr nɔnɔ jam ɛsɛl a ec’any af eke wɛl dadm ow ec’odad lɛl na ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ yec’a eke anŋ lɛl na ɛm a, wɛl nɔn yec’ɛtŋ ke úbr nawrɛ eke Jesu el Mesi, Nyam ec’Iy. Ɛtŋ eke b’ɔnyn ɔmn in ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋan sel in ɛm.
Eke sɛgŋ bɛb ɛc a, ɛmɛny Jesu okm sos ɔkm yɛgm in e jam ɛsɛl a, Tiberiad eci mij lekpl a e nanu a. Kin elel eke Jesu okm sos ɔkm a:
Simɔ Piɛr, Toma (eke wɛl igŋ nin af Oli a), Natanaɛl (Kana baŋn Galile wus af ec’a), Sebede ec’ey a, lele Jesu eci jam ɛsɛl ɛjeci yony ab anake anŋ usu nyam a.
Simɔ Piɛr dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’aam mij af." -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛy yɛji s’am ow ŋ ab." -N’im -l’ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ -n’im mij af. Gbɛkɔ ncok a gbɛ, -n’ɔnym ɔcn kaka.
Eke lɛgŋ am ɛny ow a, Jesu inym es nanu yogŋ, kɔ jam ɛsɛl a uwm any eke ow el in.
Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm jimɛl, kɔ ɔnyn ɔcn tɛl ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Njaŋ o."
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Òkr muw a mijɛtŋ a eci lidr ogog a, b’ow ɔnyn ɔcn." -L’ok muw a, ɛtŋ -l’ɔtumn -n’ɔnymn -l’ɛlumn ɔkm mij ab ɛm aŋke ɔcn nɔnɔ iy ɛm.
Jam ɛs a eke Jesu b’erur a dad Piɛr ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ!" Eke Simɔ Piɛr iri eke ɛgŋ a Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a, l’us in e mob sus ɛm a eke n’ɔny l’oc es a, ɛtŋ l’ɛy mij ab ɛm.
Jam ɛsɛl likpr a am ɔdu muw a eke ɔcn iy ɛm a, ɛtŋ -n’am owr nanu eci mijɛtŋ ab ɛm. -L’ibnm nanu ab; ow ɔtu eke k’ij abu ekŋ yen.
Eke -li b’us es wus a, yogŋ -l’ɛkn malel eke wɛl ok ɔcn lele futufutu ab es af.
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Òtr ɔcn a eke caca ɔnyn a eci bɛb owr."
Simɔ Piɛr ɛwl ɛy mijɛtŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ usm muw a eke ɔcn ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ anŋ ɛm ab es. Ɔcn a ij ekŋ lɔbŋ lele lɛw lele nyahan ab. Ɔcn a ek’iy ɛm a bɔbɔ yɛji, ɔɔm muw a gbagbram es.
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Òwr ijr ob." Jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ócm any tuɔtuɔ ɛm dadm ɛsmɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, bwo el’ŋ ee?" Tasi ɛm a, -l’uw any sɛnyn sɛnyn eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ana.
Jesu kpukŋ im ɛŋn ɛl, oc futufutu a ɛtŋ cɛc ɛl; n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔcn a yɛji.
Luw ɛm a eke Jesu igb a ɛtŋ a, sakp nyahan ɛm eke n’am yɛgm in e jam ɛsɛl a sos ana.

Eke -l’ijr ob ow uwr a, Jesu ibrm Simɔ Piɛr ninɛ: "Jan jim Simɔ, kɔ ɛm eci erur a eke ɔny a agb akm agŋ amua ec’a ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, mi b’erur’ŋ, uw any." Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɔ̀su ɛm e mɛcɛb ey a."
Ɛmɛny l’ibrm ow sakp yony ɛm ninɛ: "Jan jim Simɔ, kɔ erur’m ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, mi b’erur’ŋ, uw any." Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɔ̀su ɛm e mɛcɛb a."

Ɛmɛny l’ibrm ow sakp nyahan ɛm ninɛ: "Jan jim Simɔ, kɔ erur’m ee?" Piɛr sos ɔw es eke Jesu k’ibrm’n odad nyam a cɛ sakp nyahan. Ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ŋ uw low fɛŋ any; uw any eke mi b’erur’ŋ!" Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɔ̀su ɛm e mɛcɛb a.

Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: eke anŋ ŋgbafrɛ a, ŋ obi bi sus ŋ e mob, ɛtŋ b’im yogŋ eke b’erur a; gbɛkɔ susu b’ow’ŋ sos a b’ow gɛgŋm sabu es, ɛgŋ ɛjeci b’ow sus’ŋ mob ɛtŋ b’ow oc im ŋ yogŋ eke k’ow erurm eke k’im a."
Sodad amua ɛm, Jesu am yɛgm Piɛr ec’elel eke b’ow uwr ke ow ɛm n’ɔ́ŋ Nyam anygbɛl a. Sica Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam!"
Piɛr b’ɛdŋ sos mɛny a, l’ɛkn jam ɛs a eke Jesu b’erur a ek’anŋ ɛl jam. (Ke ɛgŋ a eke ub nuŋ ɛw Jesu af, ob ij lɔfu lís a eke -n’anŋn, ke am ibrm’n ɛgŋ a eke b’ow ɔl’l ij’r a e low a, in ana.)
Piɛr ɛkn’n ɛtŋ dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛtŋ kɔ in, bla lowi b’ow ɛŋn’n ee?"
Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ eke m’erur eke li k’anŋ owr toŋ ke m’ɛ́wl m’ow, ke ŋ e low ee? Ŋ ec’a, ùs’m jam cɛ!"

Amani a eb es agŋ lisijimɛl ab ɛm eke jam ɛs na in k’ow in uwm ij. Ke tasi ɛm a, Jesu dadm Piɛr eke ow’n k’ow in uwm, kɔ li dad: ɛtŋ eke in erur eke ow’n k’anŋ owr toŋ ke in ɛ́wl in ow, ke ow e low ee?
Jam ɛs nyam na cɛ anake am ij ów amua e daŋku ke nɔn yɛj’a, ɛtŋ s’uw any eke in e daŋku ij a el nawrɛ.
Ɛmɛny Jesu kok ów ɛjeci nɔnɔ. Blel wɛl am nɔn ów amua nyam nyam, ke ɛm e tutr ɛm a, blel yec’a eke wɛl nɔn a íy wus na nimum wal es.
Ɛgŋ gbɛl Teofil, ɛm eci lɛl krɛkrɛ ab ɛm, mi dad ów a fɛŋ eke Jesu kok, ke yɛgm nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ
toŋ igŋ lɛgŋ a eke Nyam oc im’n afr a. Gbuŋ ke l’úyu afr a, agŋ a eke li sɔsum l’ot ɛsɛ ɛrm ɛsɛl af a, n’ɔŋ wɛl sol Abŋ Lala ec’abusu ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, in e luw a e jam a, l’ɛlu sos ɔkm li yɛgm in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl a sakp ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm eke n’anŋ owr. Sɛgŋ ekŋ yony ɛtŋ eke l’ɛlu sos ɔkm li yɛgm wɛl, ke li dad wɛl Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad.
Lɛgŋ nyam, eke n’am ij ob wɛl ab a, l’ijl wɛl nɛny ninɛ: "Kì kpabr es Jerusalɛm e lís, kɔ ànŋn low a ek’ɛm Ɛs ɛwar ɔny a, ob ap a eke mi dad ɔny ow e low a ec’eku ɛm:
Jan ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm, kɔ ɔny, lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm, wɛl b’ow ok ɔny mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm."
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a ek’ɛlul Jesu ɛm a ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ lɛgŋ na ɛm anake b’ow ɛwl sigm Israɛl ec’es ɛw ab es ab ee?"
Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ow elm ɔny itmn eke k’uwr sɛgŋ a lele wanci ab ab e low any, kɔ ɛm Ɛs bɛbm ɛw es in obi ec’abusu ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ ɔny b’ow ɛŋan lɛc nyam lɛgŋ a ek’Abŋ Lala b’ow us ɔny es nuŋ af a. Ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow eel ɛm ec’adaŋku, dadr ɛm ec’odad Jerusalɛm, Jude e wus a nimum af lele Samari ab, toŋ okr wus e nuŋ."
Eke li dad ów amua uwr ke -n’am lɛr ow a, Jesu am uyu afr, ɛtŋ jru ow ɛdŋn ɛl any.
Eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a ec’any a kɔkŋ afr cɛ ke -n’am lɛr yogŋ a eke Jesu am uyu im a, kpɛkŋ agŋ yony eke sus mob efu anŋ ɛl any af
ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Galile ec’agŋ, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ iymn es aŋa am lɛɛr afr ee? Jesu na eke ŋgboŋ ɔny ec’araŋn aam afr a, b’ow ɛwl mɛny ow elel a cɛ eke ɛkan in n’aam a."
Sica ɛrm ɛsɛl a anŋ lafɛny eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Olivie lafɛny a ogŋ, ɛtŋ ɛwl mɛny ow Jerusalɛm. Lafɛny a, baŋn a e saw cɛ ow anŋ: yogŋ lele baŋn ab ab kilo nyam cɛ.

Eke -l’owr -l’okr Jerusalɛm a, -l’uyu -n’im êl afr a eke -li b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a. Kin ɛrm ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ec’en: Piɛr, Jan, Jak lele Andre ab, Filip lele Toma ab, Bartelemi lele Matie ab, Jak ek’el Alfe jim, Simɔ ɛb dogŋn ɛs lele Jud ek’el Jak jim ab.
Ɛl lele ɔyɔw a lele Jesu lis Mari lele Jesu lisijimɛl ab ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ -li b’as luku usu nyam -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam.
Sɛgŋ ab ɛm e nyam ɛm, ɔmn ɛsɛl ek’ɔtu eke k’ij agŋ ekŋ nɔhɔn as luku. Piɛr igb ɛl ec’araŋn ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ:
"Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it eke yec’a ek’Abŋ Lala dad Nyam e Lɛl ɛm a k’iy nɛny. L’ikŋ anym l’ɛcr David ɛm, l’ɛwar Judas eke nyimn agŋ a ek’ɛdŋn Jesu a e lís e low.
Ke Judas yɛji, ɛy ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam ek’in yɛji ɔny in eci juma.
Ɛtŋ in eci low ŋuŋ e li kok a eci labm eke wɛl sɔg’r ab ɛm, l’ɔl ɔgm nyam, ɛtŋ yogŋ n’anŋ afr l’ɛy wus nuŋ nuŋ l’ɔb lok es ɛtŋ in e sugŋ a fɛŋ ok ɔkm.
Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ iri low na, ow sosiɛm ɛl ec’ɛbr ab ɛm -l’ɛsŋ ɔgm a 'Akɛldama', ek’el nyandrɛ ɛm 'Mebl ec’ɔgm'.
Ɛtŋ Selu e lɛl ab ɛm kin yec’eke wɛl nɔn: Ke in ec’êl a ɛ́ru es ɔfr, ke ɛgŋ kaka k’írm ɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl nɔn: Ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci úsr’r usu in eci juma ab ɛm.

Ow sosiɛm, ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ nyam k’ow akr ɛy af ij Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e luw ɛm anŋ igb a e daŋku. Ke ɛgŋ a él agŋ a eke b’anŋ ɛy ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ, usu a fɛŋ eke s’ɛc Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ab a ec’ɛgŋ nyam, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke Jan ok’r mij nuŋ a toŋ ke igŋ lɛgŋ a eke n’ŋgboŋ ɛy ec’araŋn n’im afr a."
Wɛl ok agŋ yony ɔkm ɛl ec’araŋn: Josɛf eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Barsabas ke wɛl b’ok en es Justus, lele Matias ab.
Ɛtŋ dedeku a nimum ŋɔŋn Nyam dad ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ŋ eke uw agŋ fɛŋ ec’ɛrm ab any a, yɛ̀gm ɛy ɛl yony na ɛm ec’ɛgŋ eke sɔsum oc
eke k’el ɛrm ɛs, ke ídr juma a eke Judas igŋ ɛlu es im usu a ek’el in ec’a."
-Li kok sɔsum oc ɛtŋ ow ɛy Matias af; ɛtŋ l’ɛy ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw nyam a ec’eb ab ɛm.
Eke Pantekɔt ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ow a, ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ as luku usu nyam.
Kpru ɛm, likekr ligbɛl nyam anŋ afr ow. Likekr a anŋ ɛsɛ lɛf ligbɛl eke b’ɛlu ab af, ɛtŋ ow eb akŋ a nimum eke -n’anŋ a.
Kpɛkŋ -l’ɛkn mob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ sanm al af eke ok ɔkm; -li kpakpab es ɛtŋ -n’im -li sisig es ɛgŋ nyam nyam e nuŋ af.
Kpɛkŋ Abŋ Lala iy ɛl fɛŋ ɛm, ɛtŋ -n’am dad odad sɛbr ɛjec’ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala am ɔŋ ɛl eke -li ki dad ab af.
Ke Jwifɛl ek’anŋ susu susu a ow ir Jerusalɛm; -l’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl tasi.
Eke likekr a ikŋ wɛl iri a, -l’uru es -l’ow -l’as luku. Ɛl fɛŋ low am at ɛl sel afŋn es, aŋke ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ am iri ɔmn ɛsɛl a dad odad in ec’ɛbr ab ɛm.
Ɛl fɛŋ low am iti ɛl any ɛtŋ am iŋn ɛl sos ɛm. -N’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Agŋ amua fɛŋ ek’am dad sodad a, kɔ -l’elm Galile ec’agŋ ee?
Ɛtŋ sica ayaf ɛtŋ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ am iri -li dad odad in ec’ɛbr eke wɛl ew’r ow ɛm ab ee?
Ɛy ec’araŋn a, agŋ anŋ Part, Medi lele Elam wus af ab ow: bɛb anŋ Mesopotami, Jude, Kapadɔs, Pɔŋ lele Azi wus af ab ow;
bɛb yɛji anŋ Friji, Panfili, Ejipt lele Sirɛn e wus ikpr ek’anŋ Libi ab ab ow. Ɛtŋ agŋ anŋ Rom yɛji ow,
(Rom ec’agŋ eke mew ɛm ɛtŋ el Jwif, lele agŋ ek’ɛgŋ ɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ a e low eb ab ab), Krɛt ec’agŋ lele Arabi eyŋ ab. Ɛtŋ kin eke s’am iri -n’am dad Nyam ec’ów ɛgbɛl eke kok a ɛy e sɛbr ab ɛm!"
Ɛl fɛŋ -n’anŋ low any iti ligbɛl ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’uwmn low eke -li ki tutr any. -N’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke na, ow e nyandrɛ el bogŋ ec’ee?"
Gbɛkɔ agŋ bɛb am kokr ɔmn ɛsɛl a miyɛr dad ɛsɛ: "-L’ɛgŋ mar am ɔny ɛl!"

Sica Piɛr ek’anŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw nyam ab ab a, igb inym es ɛtŋ lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm am dad dedeku a ɛsɛ: "Ɔny Jwifɛl lele agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ir Jerusalɛm ab ab, ow it eke k’uwr low ek’am ɛy ab any, ke ígŋn lɔru es irir yec’a eke m’ow mi dad a.
Agŋ amua ow elm mar ɔnym ɛl ɛsɛ elel ek’am tutar ab af, aŋke s’anŋ ibribr e wanci libarm ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ sica low a eke kokoba ɔb ɛs Joɛl dad a ɛy tasi ŋ̂.

Kin low eke Nyam dad eke b’ow ɛy sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a: Mi b’ow m’ɔmun ɛm ec’Abŋ ab es agŋ a fɛŋ af; ɔny ec’ey egŋ a lel ey ɔyɔw ab ab b’ow ɔb ɛm e kokoba, ɔny eci ŋgbafrɛ a b’ow ɛkan nuŋ ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔny ec’agŋ esu a b’ow ɛkn ów mɛmn ɛrur ɛm.
Ɛɛ, sɛgŋ amua ɛm, mi b’ow m’ɔmun ɛm ec’Abŋ ab es ɛm eci juma kok ɛsɛl a lele juma kok lisɛl ab ab af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɔb ɛm e kokoba.
Mi b’ow mi kok ów ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ afr, ɛtŋ mi b’ow mi kok mɛny ɛwr owi nɔnɔ wus aŋa. Mebl, al, lele mregbn eke anŋ ɛsɛ jru af b’ow anŋ ɛm,
ligbn b’ow irmn in ec’afŋ a, ɛtŋ awl b’ow ebl es kondoŋ ɛsɛ mebl af, gbuŋ ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lɛgŋ a ów, anygbɛl e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a.
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛsŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin a, b’ow ɛŋn sel.

Israɛl ec’agŋ, ìgŋn lɔru es irir low a eke m’am m’ow mi dad a: Nyam yɛgm ɔny eke n’ɔŋ Nasarɛt e Jesu in eci abusu a. Nawrɛ ɛm a, Nyam ɛcr in ɛm kok sakrowa nɔnɔ ɔny ec’araŋn, li kok ów ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ eke b’iti any, lele mɛny ɛwr owi ab; ɔny uwr any yɛji.
Ɛgŋ ikŋ na, wɛl ɛlu’l es ɔŋ ɔny ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam tutr ke ikŋ anym bɛbm ow e low ɛw es ab af. Ɛtŋ ɔny, ibir ir olikŋ af eke ɔŋn agŋ ek’uwm Nyam any a ɛw’r ab ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm, n’ɔny l’oc ow es luw e gbre ijr ab ɛm, aŋke ow itm eke luw ec’abusu a k’ucu ɔny’n es.
Tasi ɛm a, kin yec’eke David dad in e lís: Sɛgŋ fɛŋ m’am ɛkn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm ec’any af, n’anŋ’m saw yec’ɛtŋ ke mi kí mumum.
Na sosiɛm, ɛm ec’ɛrm sos ɛm am iŋn, ɛtŋ ɛm e nɛny am ɛgŋ ehe ec’ɛj. Ɛtŋ uwɔmu ɛm yɛji, ɛm e sos megl a b’ow ɛru es am ɔmn low.
Nawrɛ tasi, k’ow igŋm ɛlum im es ɔŋnes baŋn, k’ow yɛbm ŋ e libɔwi mamn e sos megl a ugŋm es uwɔmu ɛm.
Ŋ, yɛgm’m sebr a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a, ɛtŋ ŋ e sos eke b’ow ɛlu ɔkm ɛm ec’any af a, b’ow ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, abusu ɛru’m es eke mi ki dad ɔny lala ɛm ɛy lagŋ David e lís e low. L’uw, wɛl oc’r es ɛtŋ in ec’uwɔmu a yɛfɛnyna yɛji anŋ ɛy ogŋ aŋa.
Gbɛkɔ l’el kokoba ɔb ɛs ɛtŋ l’uw any eke Nyam ij nɛny ɛwar ir ek’in ec’alaw ab ɛm ɛgŋ nyam b’ow usr’r usu el ɛb ebu.
David ikŋ anym ɛkn low a eke b’ow ɛy a, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm li dad Mesi ec’uwɔmu ɛm anŋ igb a e low ninɛ: Wɛl igŋm ɛlum’n es ɔŋnes baŋn, ɛtŋ in e sos megl a ugŋm es uwɔmu ɛm.
Jesu na eke m’am dad in e low a, Nyam igbm’n agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’ij ow e daŋku.
Sica, wɛl igbl’l ogŋ Nyam e lidr abu af, ɛtŋ Ɛs ɛm n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala a eke wɛl ɛwar ow e low a, ɛtŋ n’ɔmun es ɛy af. Ow e low anake am ɛkan, ke am irir a.
Tasi ɛm a, David in obi l’uyum afr, gbɛkɔ li dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam dad ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ninɛ: 'Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af,
toŋ bake m’ót ŋ ec’efnu m’ok ŋ ec’akr ew a.'
Sica ow it eke Israɛl ec’agŋ fɛŋ k’uw any tasi eke Jesu a ek’ɛwr olikŋ af a cɛ anake Nyam oc ɛw Kɔtɔkɔ lele Mesi ab a."
Eke agŋ a iri sodad amua a, ow ɛy ɛl sos ɛm nɔnɔ. -L’ibrm Piɛr lele ɛrm ɛsɛl likpr ab ab ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?"
Piɛr ɔdu eb ninɛ: "Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm, ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́gŋ eb wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam óc ɔny e sikpl a ap ɔny, ke ɛ́ŋan Nyam ec’ob ap a ek’el Abŋ Lala a,
aŋke Nyam ec’ob ek’ɛwar a, ɔny lele ɔny eyŋɛl ab eci, ɛtŋ ow el agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji eci, agŋ a fɛŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam b’ow ɛsŋ a."
Ɛmɛny Piɛr dad ɛl sodad nɔnɔ, ɔm ɛl ów, atr ɛl sos es ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋn sel ɛŋn a e low ebr, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɔ́nymn abu ɛyr ɛsɛ agŋ a ek’irm ab af."
Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ ɛgŋ Piɛr e sodad a eb, ɛtŋ wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ. Lɛgŋ a, agŋ ek’ɔtu eke k’ij agŋ fandi nyahan ow obn ɛl a ek’ɔny ɔmn a.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ari at ɛm, -li b’as luku -n’am iri ɛrm ɛsɛl a e low yɛgm a, -l’ir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ lisijimɛl af, -l’ij ob lɔfu nyam ɛm, -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam usu nyam.
Agŋ a fɛŋ am ɔny Nyam ec’ɛlum, aŋke Nyam am ɛcr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm kok mɛny ɛwr nɔnɔ lele sakrowa ab.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn a b’okr af ɛtŋ ɛl ɔfr -li bi cɛc ob eke -n’ɔnyn a.
-Li b’ɔl ɛl ec’ob eke -n’ɔnyn a -l’ij ɛtŋ ow ɛm ec’os eke -li b’ɛŋn a, -li bi cɛc ɛl fɛŋ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’es abur ek’ɔny a e kokr eci.
Lɛgŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ, ow ɔ́pim, -li b’as luku Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm, ɛl ec’akŋ akŋ a -li b’ij ob usu nyam ɛtŋ ob ij a b’el sos ɛm iŋn ɛm lel ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm ab.
-N’am kɔklm Nyam ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ am ɔny ɛl ec’erur. Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ot agŋ eke n’am eb l’ɛlu es a, l’ok wɛl ɛm.
Lɛgŋ nyam, Piɛr lele Jan ab aam Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ncebles e wanci nyahan e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm.

Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ e lisany nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Lisany Sɔbɔ' a e saw, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke in e mew ɛm ɛtŋ bubm es. Lɛgŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ, wɛl b’oc ow’r sigm’n es yogŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɔ́tu li sism agŋ a eke b’ok Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a os.
Eke ɔlu a b’ɛkn Piɛr lele Jan ab ek’am ow ok akŋ a, n’am sism wɛl ob.
Piɛr lele Jan ab ok’r anyamn af, ɛtŋ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Lɛ̀r ɛy!"
Ɛgŋ a am lɛr ɛl gbiy, aŋke n’am tutr eke wɛl b’ow ɔŋ’n ob.
Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "M’ɔnym jɛtɛ, m’ɔnym sika, kɔ m’am ɔŋ’ŋ yec’a e m’ɔny a: Nasarɛt e Jesu e nin ɛm, ìgb ke án es."
Ɛtŋ Piɛr ucu lidr abu ɔny’n, ɛlum’n abu l’igb. Kpɛkŋ ɔlu a ec’akr a lel akr ɛmn ɛm ab ab ok ɛm fɛŋ;
l’igb l’us es, n’inym es ceŋ ɛtŋ n’am an es. L’igŋ Piɛr lele Jan ab l’ɛy Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, n’am an es, n’am igb li sus es ɛtŋ n’am kɔklm Nyam.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ɛkn’n eke n’am an es, ke n’am kɔklm Nyam.
Sica eke -l’uwr any eke ow el ɔlu a eke bi sig es Lisany Sɔbɔ a saw sism ob a, ɛl fɛŋ ow ɛw ɛl erŋn ɛtŋ ow am iti ɛl any yɛji, low a ek’ɛŋn ow a sosiɛm.
Sica ek’ɛgŋ a ɛ́lum Piɛr lele Jan ab es a, agŋ a fɛŋ anŋ low any iti ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’uru es -l’ow -n’ɛŋn wɛl Nyamel gbɛl a eci lɛf eb usu a ek’ij Salomɔ e nin a.

Eke Piɛr b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, li dad agŋ a ninɛ: "Israɛl eyŋ, bla sosiɛm ɛgŋ na ec’ewlm a e low am iti ɔny any ee? Kì lɛɛr ɛy ɛbɛn! Ɛgŋ na, ow elm ɛy obi ec’abusu ɛm, oglog ɛy e Nyam nuŋ igŋ sɛnyn ɛm n’anm es,

kɔ Nyam a ek’el Abraham, Isak lele Jakɔb ab e Nyam, ke el ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam a, ɛlu in e libɔwi Jesu any ɔkm. Ɔny obi a ɔɔl ijr ir es ɛw ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm, ɛtŋ igŋn ɛlul il es Pilat ec’any af, ke l’erur eke li k’ɛlu ow es cɛ.
Ɔny igŋn Ɛgŋ Lala a, Nɛnyɛmbri Nyam Ɛs a ɛlul es ɛtŋ ibrmn eke Pilat k’ɛlu ɛgŋ ibiu ab es ɔŋ ɔny.
Ɛtŋ ibir Sel Ɛŋn ec’Idr Ɛs a. Gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm ɛtŋ s’el ow ec’adaŋku.
Ɛgŋ na ek’am ɛkan a, uwr ir any. Jesu e nin a ec’abusu a eke ow ɛm s’ɔny ɔmn a anake ewlm’n a. Jesu ɛm ec’ɔmn a eke s’ɔny a anake ɔŋ ɛgŋ na ewl nimum ɔny fɛŋ ec’any af a.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, m’uw any eke ɔny lele ɔny ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab, ow el low any uwm ɛm e low eke kokr Jesu e lís.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam kok yec’a eke likŋ anym l’ɛwar lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl fɛŋ e nɛny ɛm a. Li dad eke Mesi a k’ij gbre.
Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm gɔŋ, ke ɛ́wal -lɛɛr Nyam, yec’ɛtŋ ke li tɛ́tŋ ɔny e sikpl ab es,
ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny sel eb mamn e sɛgŋ, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’is ɔny Mesi a eke l’ikŋ anym li sɔsum l’oc ɔny ec’a: ke Jesu ana.
Gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, ow it eke Jesu Krist k’anŋ afr, toŋ ow ok lɛgŋ ek’ów a fɛŋ b’ow ɛwl el owr a. God’ɛtŋ Nyam ɛwar low na in e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lala a e nɛny ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, Mois dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny e Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ɛsɛ ɛm af, eke b’ow el ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam. B’ow irir ów a fɛŋ eke li b’ow li dad ɔny a.
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke k’ow irim kokoba ɔb ɛs na e low a, wɛl b’ow ogŋ’n Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn ke wɛl íbi’r.
Ɛtŋ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ eke Samiɛl e lɛgŋ ɛm ɛtŋ dad ów toŋ ke igŋ yɛfɛnyna a, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ dad ów amua eke am ɛy sɛgŋ amua ɛm a e low.

Low a eke Nyam ɛcr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɛm ɛwar a el ɔny eci, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji anŋn sinm a eke Nyam kok ɔny lagŋɛl ab a ɛm, lɛgŋ a eke li dad Abraham ninɛ: Ŋ ec’alaw ɛm m’ow m’ɛcr m’ɛdŋ eb eb a fɛŋ ek’anŋ wus na a ɔwrɔ.
Ɛtŋ ɔny sosiɛm Nyam sɔsum in e libɔwi oc, ɛtŋ l’ikŋ anym l’oc n’ɔŋ ɔny. L’ɛrm ow ow ow eke ow k’ɛdŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam igŋ in ec’ów eŋuŋ kok a ɛlu es."
Eke Piɛr lele Jan ab odad anŋ nɛnym am dad agŋ a, egb waw ɛsɛl, Nyamel gbɛl a ec’ɔsu ɛsɛl ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a, lele Sadusiɛl ab ow ɛŋn ɛl.
Ɛrm am ebl ɛl nɔnɔ eke ɛrm ɛsɛl yony a am yɛgm agŋ a low, ke am dad ɛl Jesu e luw ɛm ek’igb a e low, ke ow ɛm am ij nɛny eke agŋ eke in b’uw a yɛji in ɔtu eke in k’igb luw ɛm.
-N’ɔny Piɛr lele Jan ab, ɛtŋ -l’ot -n’im -l’ok wɛl sobel ɛm toŋ lɛgŋ ɛny, aŋke lɛgŋ ler im nɔnɔ.
Ɛbɛn yɛji, agŋ a ek’iri ɛrm ɛsɛl a ec’amani a e nɔnɔ gbɛl ub nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ ɔmn ɛsɛl a e nɛny a obn toŋ ɔtu ek’ij agŋ fandi yen.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, Jwifɛl ec’ es ɛw ɛsɛl, agŋ ekpekp lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab as luku Jerusalɛm.
Agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm a el: egb waw ɛs ligbɛl An, Kayif, Jan, Alesandr lel egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ab.
-N’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny Piɛr lele Jan ab ow ɛl ec’any af ɛtŋ -l’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ec’abusu ɛm oglog bwo ec’ɛgŋ e nin ɛm ewlmn ɛgŋ na ee?"
Ɛtŋ Piɛr ek’Abŋ Lala iy ɛm a dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛb ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl lele agŋ ekpekp ab,
yɛfɛnyna wɛl am ibrm ɛy low, low nimamn eke si kok s’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam eke bubm es a sosiɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl am ibrm ɛy elel ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na k’ewl a e low.

Ɛɛ, ɔny fɛŋ ow it eke k’uwr any, ke Israɛl eyŋ fɛŋ yɛji úw any: ek’ɛgŋ na inym ɔny es any af sos tuɔtuɔ ab, ke Jesu Krist, Nasarɛt iy a e nin a ec’abusu ɛm. Ɛwr ir olikŋ af kɔ Nyam igbm’n agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm.
Jesu el ɛgŋ a eke Nyam Lɛl dad in e low ninɛ: Lebn a eke ɔny, êl us ɛsɛl, waal ɛlul es a ɛwl el êl lɔy ɛm e lebn tasi.
In ɛm cɛ anake s’ɔtu eke si k’ɛŋn sel a, aŋke wus na nimum af, Nyam ɔɔm agŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci kaka ek’in ɛm si k’ɛŋn sel."

Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a low am iti any, aŋke -n’am ɛkn elel eke Piɛr lele Jan ab am dad odad ɛrm susu ɛm a, ɛtŋ ow am ok ɛl es sos ɛm eke ow el agŋ nɛnɛ cɛ eke wewrm low yɛj’a. Ɛtŋ -l’uw wɛl any eke wɛl b’anŋ Jesu ab.
Gbɛkɔ, eke -n’am ɛkn ɛgŋ a ek’ewl inym ɛl es saw a, Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ɛknm low eke ki dad.
Ow sosiɛm, -n’ɔŋ wɛl ok ɔkm luku as usu a ɛtŋ ɛl ɔfr -n’am bɛbm ów.
-N’am dadarir -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke sica bla lowi si ki kok agŋ amua ab ee? Tasi ɛm a, Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ uw any tasi ek’ow el ɛl -li kokr akrowa na; si k’ɔtum s’ɛgbrm kaka.
Gbɛkɔ, ke low na ec’amani a kí cɛcrm es dedeku ab ɛm fɛŋ a; s’ók ɛl erŋn lokm s’ɛdŋn ɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke -li ki dadmn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ odad Jesu e nin ɛm."
Eke -li bɛbmn ów a uwr a, -l’ɛsŋ Piɛr lele Jan ab ɛtŋ -l’ijl wɛl nɛny, -l’ɛdŋn wɛl eke wɛl kí dadm Jesu e nin a ec’odad, yɛgam agŋ Jesu e lís e low kaka fɛŋ.
Gbɛkɔ Piɛr lele Jan ab dad ɛl ninɛ: "Jɛ̀jr okr ɔny obi ɛm, eke tasi Nyam ec’any af ow el ɔny si k’ɛlum ɔny oglog Nyam si k’ɛlum.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy, si k’ɔtum s’ablm nɛny low yec’eke s’ɛkn ke s’iri a eci."
Ɛmɛny Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ok ɛl erŋn lokm ɛtŋ wal ok ɛl es. -L’ɛknm elel eke -li ki kokr wɛl low ŋuŋ, aŋke dedeku a nimum am kɔklm Nyam low a ek’ɛy a eci.
Ɛgŋ a eke in ec’ewlm a e low ɛw any iti a, ij akpo ekŋ yony afŋ es.
Kpɛkŋ eke wɛl ɛlu ɛl es a, Piɛr lele Jan ab im ɛŋn ɛl lawlɛl a, ɛtŋ otar ów a fɛŋ ek’ egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab dad a e low akr.
Eke -l’irir odad na a, nɛny af okr ɛm, ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ŋɔŋn Nyam dad ninɛ: "Es Ɛw, ŋ anake kok afr, wus, okij lele ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm ab ab a.
Ŋ anake ɛcr Abŋ Lala ɛm ɔŋ ɛy lagŋ David ek’el ŋ e juma kok ɛs a am dad ɛsɛ: Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ ab ɛm likekr am ɛy ee? Ɛb eyŋ a ut ɛm ec’asre kɔ ow el ɔfr ɔfr!
Wus ec’ɛ́b ebu a bɛbm sos ar ogŋ eci ɛtŋ es ɛw ɛsɛl okr af sifn ɛm im Nyam lel in e Mesi ab ab ar.
Nawrɛ tasi, ɛb na ɛm Erɔd Antipas, Pɔns Pilat, etu agŋ lel Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab okr af ogŋ Jesu ek’el ŋ e libɔwi lala a eke sɔsum oc a ar.
Ow ɔŋ -li kok ów a fɛŋ eke ŋ ec’abusu ɛm lele ŋ ec’erur ɛm ab ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es a iy nɛny.
Sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛ̀kn ɛl e gbre e -n’am ɔl eke -li k’ijr ɛy a, ke ɔ́ŋ ŋ ec’ɔbɔwi a dád ŋ ec’odad a lokm susu ɛm tasi.
Ɛ̀lu ŋ ec’abusu a ɔkm yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl éwlm agŋ, kók sakrowa lele mɛny ɛwr ab ŋ e libɔwi lala Jesu e nin ɛm."
Eke -ni ŋɔŋan Nyam uwr a, yogŋ a eke -l’asr luku a umu. Ɛl fɛŋ Abŋ Lala iy ɛl ɛm ɛtŋ sica -n’am dad Nyam ec’odad a ɛrm susu ɛm.
Ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ okr af tasi, ɛrm ɛm lele ów tutr ɛm ab. Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ɛsmɛ in ec’ob ek’in ɔny a, in sɔny cɛ eci, kɔ ɛl ɔfr ɛm a, ob fɛŋ eke -n’ɔnyn a el dedeku a fɛŋ ec’ob.
Abusu ligbɛl ɛm, ɛrm ɛsɛl a am ij Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’uwɔmu ɛm anŋ igb a e daŋku, ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ Nyam am ɛdŋ ɛl ɔwrɔ nɔnɔ.

Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́nym ob kaka ec’es abur. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny sɔgm oglog mel a b’ɔl ij, ɛtŋ b’eb ow ec’os eke b’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a ow ɔŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ wɛl bi cɛc os a ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’es abur ek’ɔny a eci.
Kin low any ɔkŋn nyam: igŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Josɛf, ke ɛrm ɛsɛl a igŋ’n nin af Barnabas. (Ow e nyandrɛ el 'ɛgŋ eke b’atr ɛgŋ sos es'.) L’el Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ eke wɛl ew Sipr.
N’ɔny ɔgm nyam eke l’ɔl l’ij, ɛtŋ l’oc ow ec’os a l’is ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
Gbɛkɔ igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias, lele ɛy Safira ab, nɛny af okr ɛm, ɔl ɛl ec’ɔgm nyam ij.
-L’iririr ɛy ab ɛtŋ ɔgm a eke l’ɔl l’ij a, l’ubr ow ec’os ab es, ɛtŋ l’oc likpr a n’im n’ɔŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a. Li dad wɛl eke os a fɛŋ cɛ ana.
Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ananias, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ Satan ɔtu ɛy’ŋ ɛrm ɛm, ɔny yadŋ ɔŋ Abŋ Lala ɛtŋ ɛdŋn ɔgm a ek’ɔl ij a ec’os a e likpr ɛw es ee?
Gbuŋ ke ɔ́l ɔgm a ij a, ow el ŋ eci, ɛtŋ ek’ɔl ij a yɛji ow ec’os a el ŋ eci, kɔ yadŋ ee? Ayaf ɛtŋ ɔny tutr kok low akpasu na ee? Ow elm agŋ ɔnym yadŋ ɔɔm, kɔ Nyam."
Eke Ananias iri sodad amua a, l’ɛy wus ɛtŋ l’uw. Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’iri low na a erŋn ligbɛl am ɔny.
Ŋgbafrɛ oto ow oc sos megl a wiwrm gbad ab ɛtŋ im oc es.
Eke wanci nyahan ɛc a, Ananias e yɔw a ek’uwm low a ek’ɛy ab any a ow ɛy akŋ.
Piɛr ibrm’n ninɛ: "Dàd’m ɔ! Ɔny ec’ɔgm a ek’ɔɔl ijr a ec’os a e nɛny a, ow ow el na cɛ ee?" Ɛtŋ l’ɔdu l’eb ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, ow e nɛny a cɛ ana."
Ɛtŋ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ayaf tasi ɔtur okar nɛny af ŋ lel acŋ ab ɛbmn Nyam ec’Abŋ ab ee? Kin, agŋ a ek’oc acŋ es a ow igŋ lisany, ɛtŋ ŋ yɛji -li b’ow -l’oc -n’im’ŋ."
Wanci ab af cɛ l’ɛy wus Piɛr ec’akr esr a ɛtŋ l’uw. Ŋgbafrɛ oto a ok akŋ ɛtŋ ɛkn’n eke l’uw; -l’oc ow -n’im ɛtŋ -l’oc ow es ɛc eci saw yogŋ.
Sica Nyamel nimum lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’iri ów amua a erŋn ligbɛl am ɔny.
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a am kok mɛny ɛwr lele low any iti owi nɔnɔ gbɛl ab bieku a ec’araŋn. Ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ b’as luku Nyamel gbɛl a e lɛf eb usu a ek’ij Salomɔ e nin a.
Ɛgŋ ɛjeci kaka ɛ́gŋm owm ɛym ɛl ɛm; ke agŋ a b’aw ɛl nɔnɔ cɛ.
Kɔ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl, egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab, am ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ ɛtŋ -n’am ɛny,
toŋ wɛl am ot ɔ́lu yɛji ow ɛbɛrŋ ɛm, ɛ́rum ɛl es faja ɛm oglog sogo af yec’ɛtŋ ke ba Piɛr b’ubr ɛc a, ke in e lɔw a ɛ́cr ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ abi ka af.
Agŋ nɔnɔ am anŋ Jerusalɛm eci baŋn saw saw ab ɛm ow; -li b’ism ɔ́lu lel agŋ ek’ɔny abŋ eŋuŋ ab, ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -li b’ewl.
Ow sosiɛm, egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ in ab, ke el Sadusiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ a, ɛrm ɛsɛl a e low ɔny ɛl nyamn ɛyr afŋn es toŋ batŋ -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb eke -li ki kok ow e low.
-N’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok dedeku fɛŋ eci sobel ab ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ ncok ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow fifig sobel a e masany a, ɔny ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok ɔkm ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ:
"Ìmn Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ke ɔ́br sel ɛŋn owr a e kokoba okr bieku a nimum."

Ɛrm ɛsɛl a ɛlum ɛtŋ ibribr fafa, igb im Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a am yɛgm agŋ low. Eke egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ in ab a ow a, -l’as Sanedrɛn ek’el Jwifɛl ec’ów bɛbm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ luku, ɛtŋ -l’ɛrm Nyamel gbɛl a ec’abu af ɛsɛl a eke k’im sobel ab ɛm ɛsŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow.
Kɔ eke -n’imn -l’okr sobel ab ɛm a, -n’ɛŋnm ɛrm ɛsɛl a. -L’ɛwl mɛny -l’ow -n’ɔŋ Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a amani;
-li dad ninɛ: "Eke s’im a, s’ɛkn sobel a ek’abl anŋ tiŋ, ke usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a inym es lisany, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’usu a ek’it a. Kɔ eke si fifig masany a, s’ɛŋnm ɛgŋ kaka lokm yogŋ."
Eke Nyamel gbɛl a eci abu af ɛsɛl a ec’es ɛw ɛs a lel egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab iri amani na a, -l’uwm low yec’eke -li ki tutr ab any, ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm low yec’ek’ɛŋn ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
Kɔ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ow ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìrir ɔ! Agŋ a ek’ɔnyn okr sobel ɛm a anŋ Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ -n’am yɛgm bieku a low yogŋ."
Kpɛkŋ abu af ɛsɛl a ec’es ɛw ɛs a lele in ec’agŋ ab ab im ɛtŋ ot ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛwm lɛc ɛm, aŋke -n’am uru eke bieku a ki wɔwl ɛl mebn.
Sica eke -l’otr wɛl -l’owr a, -l’ot wɛl -n’im Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a am bibrm ɛl ów.
Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛy, s’ɛdŋn ɔny kpoŋ kpoŋ kpoŋ eke kí yɛgamn agŋ low ɛgŋ na e nin ɛm. Kɔ kin, ɔmunin ɔny e low yɛgm ab es Jerusalɛm ec’ɛb a nimum ɛm ɛtŋ am ocr in e luw a e low ɛwr ɛy af."
Kɔ Piɛr lel ɛrm ɛsɛl bɛb ab ab dad ninɛ: "Ow it eke si k’ɛlum Nyam, kɔ ow elm agŋ.
Ɔny, ɛwr Jesu olikŋ af, ibir ir, kɔ ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam a igbm’n luw ɛm.
Nyam ɔny igbl’l ogŋ in e lidr abu af ɛtŋ ɛw’r Es Ɛw Ɛs lele Sɔg Ɛs ab, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ Israɛl eyŋ abusu itŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke ɛ́ŋn ɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap.
Ɛy, s’ij ów amua e daŋku, ɛy lel Abŋ Lala a eke Nyam ɔŋ agŋ a eke b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ab ab."
Eke Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a iri sodad amua a, ɛrm ebl ɛl afŋn es, ɛtŋ -n’am erur eke -li k’ibi ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm a, Farisi nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Gamaliɛl, ol e low yɛgm ɛs ligbɛl eke dedeku a b’ɛlum. L’igb Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn ɛtŋ l’ibrm eke wɛl k’ɔŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok ɔkm tɛl yɛ;
ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Israɛl ec’agŋ, low yec’eke b’ow kokr agŋ amua na a, ɛ̀wr ow e low ɛrm.
Ɔ̀kan eke ow ibnm yɛji, ɛtŋ Tedas ɛy ɔkm am ocr in sosi any ɛs ligbɛl, ɛtŋ agŋ eke k’ij agŋ duw im ɛŋn’n. Kɔ eke wɛl ibi’r a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’us’r jam a ɔmu es, ɛtŋ ɛl e low a yɛji oc es.
In e jam a, agŋ awl e lakpo ab af, Judas Galile iy a ɛy ɔkm, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ us’r jam. Kɔ in yɛji, eke wɛl ibi’r a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’us’r jam a ɔmu es.
Ow sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny, k’ùsr agŋ amua e low jam ij, kɔ ɛ̀lul ɛl es -n’im. Eke ɛl e low a lel ɛl e juma ab ab el agŋ ɛm eci, ow b’ow oc es.
Gbɛkɔ ek’ow el Nyam ɛm eci tasi, k’ɔtumn ɔnymn ŋuŋnmn. Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ke ow k’elm Nyam ogŋmn ar!" Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ɛgŋ Gamaliɛl ec’odad a eb.
-L’ɛwl -l’ɛsŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow, -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr wɛl ɛtŋ -l’ijl wɛl nɛny eke wɛl ki dadm odad Jesu e nin ɛm ij, ɛtŋ -li wal -l’ok wɛl es.
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok ɔkm Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, aŋke Nyam ɛkn eke -l’el agŋ ek’it eke wɛl k’ijr gbre Jesu e nin a sosiɛm.
Ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ, Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a lel akŋ akŋ ab, abu anŋ ɛl ɛm -n’am yɛgm agŋ low ɛtŋ -n’am ɔb Mesi a ek’el Jesu a ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke jam ɛsɛl a e nɛny a am bobn a, ɛl ɛm eci Jwifɛl eke b’ɛbr Grɛk a am ebl ɛrm ok ɛl a eke b’ɛbr Ebre ab af, dad eke wɛ’n ɛ́wm ɛl ec’eŋnyɔw a e low any eke ow’n bi sig ob cɛc e wanci a.
Ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a as jam ɛsɛl a nimum luku ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ow ɛbam eke si k’ɛw Nyam ec’odad a e dad es, ke s’am ɛkn ob ij e cɛc owi.
Ow sosiɛm agŋ lisijimɛl, sɔ̀sumn ɔny ec’araŋn a agŋ amamn lɔbŋ ek’Abŋ Lala lele sɛwr ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ otr, ke s’óc juma ikŋ na e low s’abul ɛl.
Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛy abusu ke s’úcu Nyam ŋɔŋn lele Nyam odad dad ab e low s’ɔny es s’am kok."

Jam ɛsɛl a nimum ɛgŋ low a eb, ɛtŋ kin agŋ a eke -li sɔsumn -l’otr a ec’en: Etiɛn ek’ɔmn lel Abŋ Lala ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ, Filip, Prokɔr, Nikanɔr, Timɔ, Parmenas lele Nikola ek’el Antiɔs ɛb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, ke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm ɛgŋ Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ a e low eb a.
Sica -l’ot -li yɛgm wɛl ɛrm ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ -l’at wɛl abu nuŋ -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam -n’ɔŋ wɛl.
Nyam ec’odad a am eb es, jam ɛsɛl a am bobn nɔnɔ Jerusalɛm ɛb ɛm, ɛtŋ egb waw ɛsɛl nɔnɔ am ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm.
Etiɛn eke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ lele lɛc ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ a, am kok low any iti owi lele mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl ab ɛb eyŋ a ec’araŋn.

Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Madu e wɛl eb ɛlu es' ec’agŋ nyam nyam am atar ów es Etiɛn ab. -L’el Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Sirɛn ɛb ɛm, Alesandri ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af lele Azi wus af ab ec’agŋ ek’ir Jerusalɛm.
-L’ɔtumn -l’akamn ow es ów es atar ab ɛm, aŋke n’am dad ów Abŋ Lala e sɛwr a ek’am ɔŋ’n ab ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm, -l’ub agŋ abu es, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a dád ɛsɛ: "S’iri -li dad ów -l’ɔbr Mois lele Nyam ab any!"
Nɛnɛ ɛm anake -n’am ok dedeku a, agŋ ekpekp a lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab al lokm a. -L’okr Etiɛn es, -n’ɔny ow ɛtŋ -l’oc -n’im ow Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af.
-L’ot agŋ ek’am ij daŋku yadŋ ɛm ok Etiɛn af a yɛji -l’ow, ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na, wanci kpaŋ nɛny b’anŋ’n ɛm n’am dad ów eŋuŋ l’ok ɛy e Nyamel gbɛl lala na lele Mois ec’ ol ab ab af!
S’iri li dad eke Nasarɛt e Jesu in b’ow in bubm ɛy e Nyamel gbɛl na in ok, ke ow’n titŋn ɛb ir a eke Mois in ɔŋ ɛy a."
Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ Sanedrɛn e luku as ab ɛm a am lɛr Etiɛn gbiy ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn eke ow ec’any a anŋ ɛsɛ afr ɛrm ɛs ec’any ab af.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a ibrm Etiɛn ninɛ: "Ów amua eke wɛl am dad ŋ e lís a, kɔ nawrɛ ee?"
Etiɛn ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl lel agŋ ɛsɛl ab, ìgŋn lɔru es irir: eke ɛy lagŋ Abraham anŋ Mesopotami wus af a, gbuŋ eke li k’im l’ir Aran a, anygbɛl e Nyam ɛlu sos ɔkm yɛgm’n.
Li dad ow ninɛ: 'Ŋ̀gboŋ ŋ ec’ɛb na lele ŋ ec’eb na ɛm ab, ke ím ɛb a eke mi b’ow m’ɔkŋ’ŋ abu ab ɛm!'
Ow sosiɛm Abraham ŋgboŋ Kalde eyŋ ec’ɛb ab ɛm ɛtŋ im ir Aran. Sica eke ɛs uw oc es a, Nyam oc ow’r ɛb na ɛm eke iir lɛgŋ na ɛm a.

Ɛb na ɛm, Nyam ɔɔm Abraham usu kaka, l’ubrm usu logli yɛji n’ɔɔm ow; gbɛkɔ Nyam ij nɛny eke b’ow oc wus a nimum ɔŋ’n, ke in ec’alaw a eke b’ow anŋ in ɛm ok ɔkm a, ɛl yɛji idr wus a. Ke lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Abraham ɔnym iy kaka.
Kin yec’eke Nyam dad’r: 'Ŋ ec’alaw b’ow ir etu ɛb, ɛtŋ yogŋ -li b’ow -l’el madu wɛl ijr ɛl gbre toŋ akpo duw.
Gbɛkɔ ɛb a eke ŋ ec’alaw a b’ow el madu ɛl ec’abu ɛm a, mi b’ow mi jɛj ɛl e low m’ok. Ow e jam a, -li b’ow -l’igb yogŋ ke -l’ow -l’igŋ’m nuŋ aŋa na.'

Ɛtŋ Nyam kok sinm na Abraham ab ek’ow e mɛny ɛwr el likr es ubr. Ow ɛm Abraham ubr jim Isak likr es eke l’ew ow ba ow b’ij sɛgŋ niwn a; ɛbɛn nɛny nyam Isak yɛji bubr Jakɔb likr es, ɛtŋ Jakɔb yɛji bubr jimɛl ek’el ɛy lagŋɛl lɛw yony a ekr es.
Sica ɛy lagŋɛl ɔnyn Josɛf nyamn ɛyr, ɛtŋ -l’ɔl -l’ij ow eke ow k’el adu Ejipt. Gbɛkɔ Nyam anŋ in ab;
l’eb l’ɛlu ow es gbre fɛŋ ɛm. N’ɔŋ ow nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛtŋ Faraɔn ek’el Ejipt ec’ɛb ebu a ec’any af, l’akpal ow. Faraɔn ɛw Josɛf Ejipt ɛb a lel in ec’akŋ a ec’ob fɛŋ ab ec’es ɛw ɛs.
Lek ligbɛl ɛy Ejipt ɛb ɛm lele Kana ɛb ɛm ab. Ow ɔŋ gbre am afŋn es, ɛtŋ ɛy lagŋɛl ɛ́ŋnm ob kaka eke k’ij.
Eke Jakɔb iri ek’ob ij anŋ Ejipt a, l’ɛrm jimɛl ek’el ɛy lagŋɛl a im akp nyam.
Sica eke -n’imn sakp yony ɛm a, Josɛf okm sos ɔkm lisijimɛl a uw’r any, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ Faraɔn uw Josɛf ec’agŋ ab any.
Ɛtŋ Josɛf ɔŋ wɛl im oc ɛs Jakɔb lel in ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ij agŋ ekŋ nyahan agŋ lɛw yen a ow.
Jakɔb ow ir Ejipt toŋ uw yogŋ, ɛy lagŋɛl a yɛji.
Wɛl ot ɛl e sos megl a im Sikɛm, ɛtŋ uwɔmu a ek’Abraham ɔl os ɛm Amɔr jimɛl ec’abu ɛm Sikɛm baŋn a wɛl ot ɛl es.
Sica eke lɛgŋ ow titm eke Nyam ki kok ów a fɛŋ eke l’ɛwar Abraham a, ɛy ec’agŋ a am ɛny bobn Ejipt ɛb ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ɛb ebu ɛjeci nyam eke uwm Josɛf any a, ɛy ɔkm am nyimn ɛb a.
Ɛb ebu na ɛju ɛy ec’agŋ a ɛtŋ ɔnyn ɛy lagŋɛl milɔlu, ɔny ɛl lɛc ɛm -li digŋ ɛl ec’ey mɛny nɛnym -l’ok es eke k’uw.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm anake wɛl ew Mois a; l’el iy ek’akpl ke Nyam erur. Wɛl gbagbl’l ɛs ec’akŋ a toŋ awl nyahan.
Sica eke wɛl igŋ ɛlu’l es a, Faraɔn jɔw a oc’r ɛtŋ gbagbl’l ɛsɛ in ec’iy lokm af.
Ow ɔŋ Mois uw Ejipt eyŋ e low fɛŋ any, ɛtŋ l’el ɛgŋ gbawru odad ebl ɛm lel ów kok ɛm ab.
Eke Mois ɔny akpo ekŋ yony a, l’erur eke li k’im l’ɛkn Israɛl eyŋ ek’el in ec’ɛbr ec’agŋ a.
L’ɛkn Ejipt iy nyam ek’am ɔnyn Israɛl iy nyam milɔlu; l’eb ow ec’usu a eke li ki dogŋn ow, ɛtŋ low a eke li ki kok l’ɔbar any ab ɛm l’ibi Ejipt iy a.
Li tutr eke lisijimɛl Israɛl eyŋ a b’ow iri eke Nyam am ow ɛcr in ɛm eb ɛlu ɛl es, kɔ -l’irim ɛbɛn.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Mois uyum Israɛl eyŋ yony ek’am ogŋ mum ab, ɛtŋ l’erur eke li k’ɔny l’okr wɛl ɛm. Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ɛm lawlɛl, ɔny agŋ lisijimɛl ɔfr eel, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ɔnyanin milɔlu ee?'
Kɔ ɛgŋ nyam a ek’am ɔnyn lawl a milɔlu a itr Mois ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: 'Kɔ ŋ, bwo ɛw’ŋ ɛsɛ ɛy ec’es ɛw ɛs af, ɛsɛ ɛy e jɛj ok ɛs af ee?
Am erur eke k’ibi’m ɛsɛ elel eke efi cɛ, ibi Ejipt iy ab af ee?'
Eke Mois iri sodad amua a, l’uru es n’im l’ir Madian ɛtŋ l’ew ey yony yogŋ.
Eke akpo ekŋ yony ɛc’a, loj a e titm Sinayi lafɛny ab ɛm, afr ɛrm ɛs nyam yɛgm Mois sos, duw luku ek’am iri al ab ɛm.
Eke Mois ɛkn ɛbɛn a, ow ɛw’r any iti. Gbɛkɔ eke l’erur e li k’ɛri n’im li titm ke l’ɛ́kn a, l’iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lebl ek’am dad’r ɛsɛ:
'M’el alagŋɛl e Nyam, Abraham, Isak lele Jakɔb ab e Nyam.' Mois erŋn am ɔny ufŋ ɛtŋ ɔ́tum igblm any ogŋ.
Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɔ̀ny ŋ eci cɔkrukpɔ a ot es akr ɛm, aŋke usu a ek’inym es a, usu lala.
M’ɛkn ɛm ec’agŋ a e gbre ek’am ij Ejipt a, m’iri ɛl e sɔmu ikŋ a ɛtŋ m’us es eke mi ki sɔg ɛl. Òw, ke sica m’ɛ́rm’ŋ Ejipt.'

Mois nyam a cɛ eke Israɛl eyŋ ogŋ ke dad’r ninɛ: 'Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɛw’ŋ ɛsɛ ɛy ec’es ɛw ɛs lele ɛy e jɛj ok ɛs af a,' in cɛ Nyam ɛrm’n ɛsɛ es ɛw ɛs lele sɔg ɛs af, afr ɛrm ɛs a eke ɛlu sos ɔkm yɛgm’n duw luku ab ɛm a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
Mois anake ɔny Israɛl eyŋ ok ɔkm Ejipt, low any iti owi lele mɛny ɛwr owi e li kok ɛb ab ɛm, Okij Ebl a ogŋ a lele loj ab ɛm eke -n’anŋn toŋ ij akpo ekŋ yony a.
Ɛmɛny Mois na cɛ anake dad Israɛl eyŋ ninɛ: 'Nyam b’ow awŋ ɔny kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ɛsɛ ɛm af eke b’ow el ɔny ec’agŋ ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam.'
Eke Israɛl eyŋ as luku loj a, Mois anake anŋ ɛy lagŋɛl lele afr ɛrm ɛs a eke am dad’r odad Sinayi lafɛny af a ec’araŋn a; ɛtŋ l’eb sel ɛŋn e sodad Nyam ogŋ l’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy lagŋɛl ɛgŋm ɔnym in ec’ɛlum; -l’igŋ ow ɛtŋ -l’erur eke -li k’ɛwl mɛny -n’im Ejipt.
-Li dad Arɔn ninɛ: 'Kòk sinyam eke b’an es ɛy ec’any af ɔŋ ɛy, kɔ Mois ek’ɔny ok ɛy ɔkm Ejipt a, s’uwm low yec’eke ɛŋn’n ab any.'
-Li kok id ewli ɛsɛ nyàm af ɛtŋ -li waw egb -n’ɔŋ ow, -li gbɛgbl es nyàm na ek’ɛl obi -li kokr a eci.

Nyam ɔny nyamn oc ɛl es af ɛtŋ ɛgb ɛl es -l’igŋ afr e mílɛ́l nuŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e lɛl ɛm ab af: Israɛl eyŋ, tasi, ɛm apr’m mindey lele segb waw ɛjec’ab loj a eke anŋn toŋ ow ij akpo ekŋ yony ab ee?

Njaŋ! Gbɛkɔ abur ɔny e nyàm Molɔk eci nuŋ igŋ êl a lele ɔny e lɛ́l nyàm Refan e mɛny ɛwr ab ab owr, ekŋ ɛm nyàm amua eke kokr eke k’igŋn nuŋ a. Na sosiɛm anake mi b’ow m’ɛwl ɔny madu ɔkr ɛm, usu eke ibn akm Babilɔn.
Gbad ɛm êl a eke sinm a e lɛl anŋ ɛm a, ɛy lagŋɛl ɔnym ab loj a. Wɛl us’r kpɛ kpɛ kpɛ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam yɛgmn Mois ab af.

Gbad ɛm êl ikŋ na wɛl oc’r ɔŋ ey a ek’usr ɛy lagŋɛl usu a; -l’oc ab -n’im lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke Joswe am nyimn ɛl a. Nyam ogŋ ɛb ɛb a ek’anŋ ɛl anym a, ɛtŋ -l’eb sɛb a. Êl a gbɛ anŋ toŋ igŋ David e lɛgŋ ɛm a.
David ɛŋn bibm Nyam ec’any af ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow abusu eke li k’us êl nyam n’ɔŋ Jakɔb e Nyam a.
Gbɛkɔ, Salomɔ anake us êl a.
Ke Afr Kpekpe e Nyam a írm mel ek’agŋ ec’abu b’us ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke kokoba ɔb ɛs a dad ab af:
Nyam dad ninɛ: 'Afr el ɛm ec’ɛb ir usu, ɛtŋ wus el ɛm ec’akr es ok usu. Bogŋ ec’êl tasi ɔtur eke k’usr ɔŋn’m ee? Bogŋ ogŋ tasi m’ɔtu eke mi k’ir ee?
Ɛtŋ kɔ ow elm ɛm obi mi kokm mob amua fɛŋ ee?'
Ɔny agŋ és ɛfuu ek’ɔny ec’ɛrm lel ɔru ab babl Nyam ec’ɛsŋ a e lís; sɛgŋ fɛŋ am atarir Abŋ Lala ab cɛ! Ɔny anŋn ɛsɛ ɔny lagŋɛl ab af!
Bogŋ eci kokoba ɔb ɛs ɔny lagŋɛl ijrm gbre ee? -L’ibi agŋ a ek’ɔb ɛl Nɛny Nyam Ɛs nyam coco a eke k’ow a e kokoba a; ɛtŋ sica in anake ɔny ɛjur ir ke ibir ir a.
Ɔny eke Nyam ɛcr in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm ɔŋ ɔny in ec’ol a, ɔny, ɛluamn ol ikŋ na!"
Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ɛrm ebl afŋn es sodad amua eke -l’irir a sosiɛm, ɛtŋ -n’am sasagr an ɛm -l’ok Etiɛn af.
Kɔ ek’Abŋ Lala iy’r ɛm a, n’am lɛr afr, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn Nyam ec’anygbɛl a lele Jesu ek’inym es Nyam e lidr abu af ab.
Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀kan, m’am ɛkn afr eke fig lele ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ek’inym es Nyam e lidr abu af ab."
Eke -li b’iri ɛbɛn a, -li babl ɔru es ɛtŋ -n’am babarm. Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ok Etiɛn af,
-l’ɔdu -l’ɛlu ow ɔkm baŋn a, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔr ow mebn ɛm eke -li k’ibi ow. Adaŋku a ok ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es ŋgbafrɛ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Sɔl a ec’anym eke k’ɔsu.
Eke wɛl am ɔr’r mebn ɛm a, Etiɛn am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛsɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu, èb ɛm ec’abŋ a!"
Ow e jam a, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ li barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, k’ɔ̀ŋ ɛl -li k’ebr ɛm e luw na e ligbɔw!" Eke li dad sodad amua ba ow b’uwr a, l’ok sel es.
Sɔl ɛgŋ Etiɛn ec’ibi a e low eb. Lɛgŋ a cɛ gbre ijr ligbɛl ɔbr Nyamel ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a. Agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn a fɛŋ uru ɔmu es Jude lele Samari ab e wus ab af; ɛrm ɛsɛl a gbɛ urum es.
Agŋ ek’ɔny Nyam e muru a oc Etiɛn im oc es ɛtŋ ikŋ in e luw a ec’ɔŋn nɔnɔ.
Kɔ Sɔl ek’erur eke ki ŋuŋn Nyamel a, aam akŋ akŋ ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn a, egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab ok sobel ɛm.
Sica agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn ke ɔmu es a, am ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba usu a fɛŋ.
Filip im Samari ec’ɛb ligbɛl ab ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛb eyŋ a Mesi a ec’odad.
Dedeku a nɛny af okr ɛm am ɛw Filip ec’odad a ɛrm af, aŋke -n’am iri ɛtŋ -n’am ɛkn mɛny ɛwr a eke n’am kok a.
Tasi ɛm a, abŋ eŋuŋ am babarm ok ɔkm ɔ́lu nɔnɔ ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ e bubm es lel akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl nɔnɔ ab yɛji am ewl.
Ow ɔŋ sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛy ɛb ab ɛm.
Igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ ikŋ anym anŋ baŋn a. Li bi kok cam owi ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ Samari eyŋ nimum anŋ low any iti ligbɛl ɛm. Li b’ocr in sosi any ɛs,
ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ, igŋ ŋgbafrɛ toŋ agŋ ekpekp a b’ɛw in e low ɛrm af. Wɛl bi dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na 'Nyam ec’abusu', yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Abusu Ligbɛl a.' "
-Li b’ɛw ow e low ɛrm af nɔnɔ, aŋke lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ, li kok ów any iti owi n’ɔŋ wɛl in e cam owi ab ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ sica Filip ɔb ɛl Amani Mamn a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a lele Jesu Krist e nin ab ab e kokoba. Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a, egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab, wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
Simɔ in obi yɛji ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ; li b’anŋ Filip saw ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl a lele sakrowa ab ab eke n’am ɛkn ow am kok a e low am iti’r any.
Eke ɛrm ɛsɛl ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a iri eke Samari eyŋ ɛgŋ Nyam ec’odad a eb a, -l’ɛrm Piɛr lele Jan ab im yogŋ.
Eke -n’imn -l’okr yogŋ a, -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ɛ́ŋn Abŋ Lala.
Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala k’usm es ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka af; kɔ mij nuŋ gbɛ wɛl ok ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm.
Ca Piɛr lele Jan ab at ɛl abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala.
Eke Simɔ ɛkn eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a am at agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a abu nuŋ ke -n’am ɛŋn Abŋ Lala a, n’am ɔl eke li k’ɔŋ Piɛr lele Jan ab os.
N’am dad l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛm yɛji, ɔ̀ŋn’m abusu ikŋ na, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ yec’eke mi b’at abu nuŋ a ɛ́ŋn Abŋ Lala."
Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ke ŋ ec’os a lele ŋ obi ab úgŋn es, aŋke ŋ e tutr ɛm a, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔl Nyam ec’ob ap a os ɛm!
Low na otm’ŋ es ɛtŋ ŋ e low yɛji anm ɛm, aŋke ŋ ec’ɛrm a inyam Nyam ec’any af.
Ìgŋ ŋ ec’ów tutr eŋuŋ a ok es, ke ŋɔ́ŋn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yec’ɛtŋ ke ek’ow it, l’óc tutr na ek’ɔny a l’ap’ŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, m’am ɛkn ek’ów tutr lolo iy’ŋ ɛm gbɔŋ ɛtŋ el sikpl ec’adu."
Simɔ dad Piɛr lele Jan ab ninɛ: "Ɔny obi ŋɔ̀ŋan Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋn’m, yec’ɛtŋ ke ów amua fɛŋ eke dadr a k’ɛ́ŋnm im."
Sica eke ɛrm ɛsɛl yony a ij daŋku ke dad Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a, -l’ɛwl -n’im Jerusalɛm. Ejagb eke -l’usr -n’aam a, -l’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba Samari e sɛb nɔnɔ ɛm.
Sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam dad Filip ninɛ: "B’ow imn esr ɛm ec’a, ebr a ek’am usr mɛny es Jerusalɛm ɛtŋ imn Gaza ec’ab af, yec’a ek’ɛcr loj a."
Kpɛkŋ Filip igb im. Ɛtŋ ebr ab af, n’ɛŋn igŋ nyam; ow el Etiopi iy igŋ agbru nyam, juma ɛs ligbɛl eke b’ɔsu Etiopi ec’ɛb eb yɔw Kandas a ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ. L’ow Jerusalɛm l’igŋ Nyam nuŋ
batŋ n’am ɛwl mɛny n’im in ogŋ a. Li sig es in e lɛtŋ a eke gbaŋkɔ b’ɔdu ab ɛm n’am awl kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi e lɛl a.
Abŋ Lala dad Filip ninɛ: "Ìm toŋ ke títm lɛtŋ a."
Filip uru es im titm lɛtŋ a ɛtŋ iri Etiopi iy a ek’am awl kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi e lɛl a. L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ lɛl a ek’am awl a ow am ok’ŋ es sos ɛm ee?"
Igŋ a ɔdu eb ninɛ: "Ayaf ow ɔtu eke k’ok’m es sos ɛm ek’ɛgŋ otarm akr okm im ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad Filip eke k’ɛy lɛtŋ ab ɛm ke síg’r es saw.
Lɛl a e n’am awl a el na: Ɛsɛ licɛb eke wɛl b’oc im ibi usu af, ɛsɛ licɛbli eke baram agŋ a ek’am iri’r suw es a ec’any af ab af, li dadm low kaka.
N’ɛŋn ɛ́s ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl ɛgŋm in e low ij a ɔɔm’n. Kɔ bwo b’ow dad in ec’ey ec’odad ee? Tasi ɛm a, in e sel uwr wus na af.
Igŋ a ibrm Filip ninɛ: "M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ dad’m, kokoba ɔb ɛs a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ec’odad n’am dad ee? Kɔ in obi e low oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci e low n’am dad ee?"
Filip ɔb nuŋ odad ikpr na af, ɛtŋ am otar Jesu ec’Amani Mamn a ec’ów akr ok’r.
Eke -n’anŋn ejagb ab af -n’aam a, -l’ok usu nyam eke mij anŋ ɛtŋ igŋ a dad ninɛ: "Kin mij, bla lowi am ɛdŋn’m eke mi k’ok mij nuŋ ee?" [
Filip dad’r ninɛ: "Eke ɔny ɔmn ŋ ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ɔtu eke k’ok mij nuŋ." Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a dad’r ninɛ: "M’ɔny ɔmn eke Jesu Krist el Nyam ec’Iy."]
Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ lɛtŋ a inym es. Filip lele igŋ ab ab us es mij ab ɛm ɛtŋ Filip ok’r mij nuŋ.
Eke -n’anŋn mij ab ɛm -l’okr ɔkm a, kpɛkŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’Abŋ ɔny Filip oc es ɛtŋ igŋ a ɛknm’n ij; gbɛkɔ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm Etiopi iy a eb ejagb aam.
Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Filip ɛkn eke ow el Asɔt baŋn anake n’anŋ a, ɛtŋ n’am ɛc l’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba baŋn baŋn a toŋ l’ok Sesare.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Sɔl ec’ɛrmij ebr a el ke n’ám ɔɔr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e jam ɛsɛl a abr wɛl ec’ibi eci. N’im n’ɛŋn egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a

ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow eke ow k’ɔŋ’n silɛl ek’ow ɛm Damas ɛb ɛm e Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a wɛl k’uwr’r any, yec’ɛtŋ eke n’ɛ́ŋn agŋ, egŋ oglog ɔyɔw ek’am us Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a, l’ɔ́tu n’ɔny wɛl ke l’ót wɛl l’ow Jerusalɛm.
Eke Sɔl us ejagb aam Damas ke n’am titm yogŋ a, kpru ɛm, usu ayl anŋ afr ɛjn iwr ɛlul il ɛm.
L’ɛy wus ɛtŋ l’iri lebl nyam eke am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Sɔl, Sɔl, kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ijr’m gbre ee?"
L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bwo el’ŋ ee?" Ɛtŋ lebl a ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm Jesu ek’am ijr gbre a.
Sica ìgb wus, ìm ɛb ab ɛm, yogŋ wɛl b’ow dad’ŋ low yec’ek’it eke ki kok a."
Agŋ a ek’us ejagb Sɔl ab a uk inym es ɛtŋ -l’ɔtumn -li dadmn low kaka; -n’am iri lebl a gɔŋ, kɔ -l’ɛknmn ɛgŋ kaka.
Sɔl anŋ wus igb ɛtŋ pig pig anyamn, kɔ l’ɔtum l’ɛknm low kaka. Wɛl ɔny’n abu oc’r im Damas.
Sɛgŋ emum nyahan eke l’ɔtum l’ɛknm es, l’ijm ob kaka ke l’ɛgŋm mij yɛji.
Damas yogŋ jam ɛs nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛgm’n sos es ɛkn ɛm ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ananias!" L’ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kin ɛm."
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb caca cɛ im ɛbɛrŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Nyim Nyim' ab ɛm, ke Judas ec’akŋ a, íbrm ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Sɔl, Tars iy. N’anŋ Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm wanci na af.
Ɛtŋ es ɛkn ɛm, l’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias ek’am ɛy akŋ at’r abu nuŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny l’ɔ́tu l’ɛkn es."
Ananias ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, agŋ nɔnɔ dad’m ɛgŋ na e low ɛtŋ -li dad’m ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ eke li kok ŋ ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a e lís.
Ɛtŋ l’ow aŋa abusu a ek’egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ɔŋ’n ab ab eke li k’ɔny agŋ a eke b’ɛsŋ ŋ e nin a."
Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìm, aŋke mi sɔsum ɛgŋ na m’oc ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛcr in ɛm m’ɛlu ɛm e nin a ɔkm ɛbr ɛbr ɛjec’a ec’agŋ eci, ɛl eci ɛ́b ebu a lel Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab ec’any af.
Ɛm obi ɛm obi mi b’ow mi yɛgm’n gbre fɛŋ eke li b’ow l’ij ɛm e nin a ec’a."

Sica Ananias im ɛtŋ eke l’ɛy akŋ a, l’at Sɔl abu nuŋ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛm lisijim Sɔl, ejagb a eke ebr am ow a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛlu sos ɔkm yɛgm’ŋ. In anake l’ɛrm’m m’ow a. L’ɛrm’m m’ow yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny ɔ́tu ɛkn es, ke Abŋ Lala íy’ŋ ɛm gbɔŋ."
Kpɛkŋ ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɔcn sel af a anŋ Sɔl ec’anyamn ab ɛm ok wus ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’ɔtu l’ɛkn es. L’igb ɛtŋ wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ;
