ɛtŋ eke l’ij ob a, lɛc ow’r ɛm. Sɔl anŋ jam ɛsɛl a ek’ir Damas ab ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
Kpɛkŋ n’am ɔb kokoba Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu, li dad eke Jesu in el Nyam jim.

Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am iri’r lebl a low am iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ɛgŋ a eke Jerusalɛm am ijr agŋ a eke b’ɛsŋ Jesu e nin a gbre ab ee? Ɛtŋ aŋa eke l’ow a gbɛ, ow elm eke li k’ɔny wɛl ke l’ɛ́wl wɛl egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a ogŋ ee?"
Eke Sɔl am yɛgm Jwifɛl a ek’ir Damas a eke Jesu in el Mesi a, n’am dad low a lɛc ɛm toŋ Jwifɛl a ɛ́knm low eke ki dad.
Eke ow ibn a, Jwifɛl a ut asre eke k’ɔŋ wɛl ibi Sɔl,
kɔ Sɔl iri ɛl ec’asre ut a e low. Ow ɔŋ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, wɛl am ɔsu baŋn a e masany a yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl íbi’r.
Ow sosiɛm, ncok nyam Sɔl e jam ɛsɛl a ɔny ɛlu’l ulu nyam ɛm ɛtŋ ɔny usm’n es baŋn a e lakp jam a.
Eke Sɔl im ɛy Jerusalɛm a, l’ɔl eke li k’ɛy jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm, kɔ ɛl fɛŋ in e low am ɔny ɛl erŋn, aŋke -li k’ubm nawrɛ eke ow k’el jam ɛs tasi.

Barnabas oc’r ab im ɛtŋ ɛwl’l ɛrm ɛsɛl a ogŋ. Ɛtŋ l’otar elel eke Sɔl ɛkan Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ejagb af, lele elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dadr Sɔl odad ab a, e low akr l’ok wɛl. Ɛmɛny l’otar elel eke lokm susu ɛm Sɔl ɔb Jesu e nin a e kokoba Damas a yɛji e low akr l’ok wɛl.
Yogŋ ɛtŋ Sɔl anŋ ɛl ab, ɛtŋ Jerusalɛm ɛb ab ɛm n’am ɛc l’ɔb kokoba ɔmn ɛm tasi Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm.
Li bi dad odad l’ok Jwifɛl eke b’ɛbr Grɛk a yɛji, ɛtŋ wɛl ab li b’atar ów es; kɔ agŋ amua am erur eke k’ɔŋ wɛl ibi’r.
Eke agŋ lisijimɛl a iri ow e low a, -l’oc Sɔl -l’us nuŋ es -n’im Sesare ɛb ɛm ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ ow imn Tars eci.
Sica Nyamel anŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm Jude wus af nimum, Galile lele Samari ab. N’am agb ɔmn ɛm ɛtŋ n’am ir ɛb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ɛlum ɛm. Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm a, nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a am bobn.
Eke Piɛr am ɛc usu a fɛŋ a, lɛgŋ nyam n’im l’ok Lida baŋn ec’agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a ogŋ.
Yogŋ, n’ɛŋn igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ene eke ɛru es ob ɛrur ob af toŋ akpo niwn, aŋke li bubm es.
Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ene, Jesu Krist am ewlm’ŋ! Ìgb ke ár ŋ ec’ob ɛrur ob ab es ŋ obi." Kpɛkŋ Ene anŋ wus igb.
Lida baŋn ec’agŋ a fɛŋ lele Sarɔn wus pɛtɛ ab af ec’agŋ a ek’ɛkn Ene ec’ewlm owi a, itŋn ɛrm ɛm ɛtŋ el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
Jope baŋn, jam us lis nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Tabita. (Nin a Grɛk ɛm a 'Dɔrkas', ɛtŋ ow e nyandrɛ el 'ndeyɛgŋ'.) Sɛgŋ fɛŋ abu b’anŋ’n low nimamn e kok ɛm lele ɔgbɔru ec’abu ɛlum owi ɛm ab.
Lɛgŋ nyam l’ɛy ɔl ɛtŋ luw ibi’r. Eke wɛl ok’r mij bake ow uwr a, wɛl kok’r sos ɛtŋ wɛl oc’r im ɛrum’n es êl afr a ec’oj nyam ɛm.
Eke Lida titm Jope ke jam ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ Jope a iri eke Piɛr in anŋ yogŋ a, -l’ɛrm agŋ yony eke k’im ɔŋ’n amani na: "S’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, ìgbm ab kpɛkŋ ow ɛy ogŋ aŋa."

Eke Piɛr ɛŋn amani a, kpɛkŋ l’igb n’im ɛ́rmu ab ab. Eke l’ow l’ɛy yogŋ a, wɛl oc im’n êl afr a ec’oj ab ɛm. Eŋnyɔw a fɛŋ ow titm’n am ikŋ ɔŋn, ɛtŋ am yɛgm’n sikotu a lele simob af ɛw a eke Tabita kok in ec’owr anŋ ɛm a.
Piɛr ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ok gbeŋ ɛtŋ l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ni ŋɔŋn Nyam. Sica l’ɛwl l’ɔkŋ lɛgŋuw ab any ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Tabita, ìgb wus!" Lɛgŋuw a fig fig anyamn ɛtŋ eke l’ɛkn Piɛr a, l’igb li sig es.
Piɛr ucu abu ɔny’n ɛlum’n abu l’igb n’inym es. Ow e jam a, l’ɛsŋ eŋnyɔw a lele ɔmn ɔny ɛsɛl ab ab ɛtŋ li yɛgm wɛl Tabita ek’anŋ owr.
Low a eb es Jope baŋn a nimum ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ɔny ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm.
Piɛr anŋ Jope kok sɛgŋ nɔnɔ, ndey lɛl juma kok ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ a ec’akŋ.
Sesare ɛb ɛm, igŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kɔrnɛy. Rom eci srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’eb nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Itali eb a', l’el ow ec’anym ɛs.
L’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs tasi; in lel in ec’akŋ a fɛŋ ab -l’ɔpimn Nyam nuŋ igŋ. Sakp nɔnɔ li b’ɛlum Jwifɛl ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru abu ɛtŋ li bi ŋɔŋn Nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Ncebles nyam eci wanci nyahan ɛm, l’ɛkn es, kpata Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’ɛy in ec’akŋ a ke ɛsŋ’n: "Kɔrnɛy!"
Li lɛr afr ɛrm ɛs a erŋn ab ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bla lowi ee?" Afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: "Nyam ɛgŋ ŋ e ŋɔŋn a lele ɔgbɔru ec’abu eke b’ɛlum ab ab e low eb, ɛtŋ l’ijlm ŋ es.
Sica, ɔ̀ŋ agŋ ím Jope ɛsŋ ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ Piɛr a ow.
N’anŋ ndey lɛl juma kok ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ, ek’in ec’êl a anŋ okij nɛny a ogŋ."
Ek’afr ɛrm ɛs a e dad’r odad a im a, Kɔrnɛy ɛsŋ in ec’akŋ juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e yony lel in e srɔda eyŋ ab ɛm e nyam eke b’anŋ’n saw, ke el Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs tasi ab ab ow.
L’otar low a fɛŋ ek’ɛy a akr l’ok wɛl ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl Jope.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af, ke ɛ́rmu nyahan a ek’us ejagb a am titm Jope a, Piɛr uyu êl luw af pɛtɛ ab af Nyam ŋɔŋn eci. Ke lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ŋ̂,
ɛtŋ namn ow’r sos; eke wɛl am kok in ec’ob ij owi a, n’am ɛkan nuŋ ɛm.
L’ɛkn afr ek’agbr ɛm ɛtŋ ob nyam anŋ ɛm am us es: ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ gbad ligbɛl af eke wɛl ucu ow ec’ɛnyɛmbri yar a ɔny es ke am is es wus.
Gbad ab af mindey ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɛli akr yar, lel ɛl eke b’ɛrir es wus wus, lele ɔr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ ab anŋ ɛm.
Lebl nyam dad ninɛ: "Piɛr, ìgb, ìbi ke íj!"
Gbɛkɔ Piɛr ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, mi k’ɔtum, aŋke lɛgŋ kaka m’ijm ob eke wɛl ɛdŋn oglog ob ek’ aylm ŋ eci any af a."
Ɛmɛny lebl a ikŋn ɛm ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Kì lɛr ob yec’eke Nyam ayal a ɛsɛ ob ek’aylm af."
Low a ɛy ɔkm kpa kpa kpa sakp nyahan ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ob a ɛwl mɛny im afr.
Piɛr am tutr low na eke l’ɛkn es ɛkn ɛm a e nyandrɛ. Kɔ wanci ab af, agŋ a eke Kɔrnɛy ɛrm a bi bibrm uw yogŋ eke Simɔ ec’êl a k’anŋ ab any, ɛtŋ sica -l’ow -l’ok lisany a.
-N’am ibrm -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ aŋa anake Simɔ Piɛr anŋ ab ee?"
Piɛr anŋ am tutr es ɛkn a e nyandrɛ, ɛtŋ Abŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Kin agŋ nyahan anŋ aŋa am ɔl’ŋ.
Ìgb, ùs es, ke ím ɛl ab; kì bɛbar aŋke ɛm m’ɛrm ɛl -l’ow."
Piɛr us es im ɛŋn agŋ a ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm, ɛgŋ a ek’am ɔɔl ab ana. Kɔ bla sosiɛm owr ee?"

-Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛy, ɛy ec’anym ɛs Kɔrnɛy e nin ɛm s’ow. L’el nɛny nyam ɛs eke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ ɛtŋ Jwifɛl a fɛŋ b’aw’r. Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛs nyam ow dad’r eke li k’ɛsŋ’ŋ ow in ogŋ a, ke l’íri yec’a eke b’ow ɔny dad’r a."
Ɛtŋ sica Piɛr eb ok ɛl akŋ ncok a eci. Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, l’us ejagb wɛl ab, ɛtŋ Jope ec’agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ɛwl’l.
Eke ɛmɛny lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, l’ɛy Sesare. Kɔrnɛy lel in ec’akŋ ec’agŋ a lele lawlɛl tasi eke l’ɛw abu ow a, anŋ ɛl ec’eku ɛm.
Wanci ab af eke Piɛr am ow ɛy akŋ a, Kɔrnɛy igb ow ɔbr’r ɛtŋ ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af, ɛsŋn in ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm.
Kɔ Piɛr ɔny igbm’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb, aŋke ɛm yɛji ɛgŋ cɛ m’el."
Ɛtŋ eke n’am ot nɛnym Kɔrnɛy ab a, l’ɛy akŋ a; yogŋ, l’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ eke as luku.

Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Uwr any eke Jwif eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr a ɔɔm abusu eke li k’im l’ɛkn utu ɛgŋ oglog l’ɛy ow ec’akŋ a. Kɔ ɛm, Nyam yɛgm’m eke mi k’ócm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke aylm oglog ɛgŋ ek’itm eke wɛl k’im ɛkn af.
Na sosiɛm, eke ɛsŋn’m a, m’ɔnym nɛny m’ocm es ɛtŋ m’ow. Sica m’am erur eke mi k’uw low a nuŋ af eke ɛsŋ’m ab any."
Kɔrnɛy ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ow ij sɛgŋ nyahan eke wanci nɛnɛ af ek’el ncebles e wanci nyahan ɛm a eke m’anŋ ɛm ogŋ a Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm a, kpru ɛm ɛgŋ nyam eke sus mob ek’am jɛjn a inym’m es anym.
Li dad’m ninɛ: 'Kɔrnɛy, Nyam iri ŋ e ŋɔŋn e lebl a ɛtŋ l’ijlm abu ɛlum ek’ɔŋ ɔgbɔru ab es.
Ɛ̀rm agŋ ím Jope ɛsŋ Simɔ Piɛr ow. N’anŋ ndey lɛl juma kok ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ a ec’êl ek’anŋ okij nɛny ab ɛm.'
Kpɛkŋ m’ɛrm agŋ ow ɛsŋ’ŋ ɛtŋ erur ow. Sica ɛy fɛŋ s’anŋ aŋa Nyam ec’any af eke si k’iri ów a fɛŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ abul’ŋ eke ki dad ɛy a."
Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Sica ow am ok’m es sos ɛm tasi eke njɛ Nyam am jɛjm agŋ es,
kɔ ɛb kaka fɛŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ke bi kok low nyim nyim a, li b’eb ow.
N’awŋ Israɛl ec’agŋ in ec’amani a: Amani Mamn a el ɛrm es ɛy a ek’anŋ Jesu Krist a ek’el agŋ fɛŋ ec’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɛm.
Eke Jan ɔb kokoba ke ok agŋ mij nuŋ bake ow uwr a, low yec’a eke ikŋ anym ɛy Galile toŋ ke eb Israɛl nimum ɛm a, uwr any.
Uwr elel eke Nyam ɔŋn Nasarɛt e Jesu in ec’Abŋ Lala a lele abusu ab ab any. Uwr elel yɛj’eke Jesu ɛcr wus nimum af kok ów amamn, ke ewlm agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ agn ec’es ɛw ab ɛm a, aŋke Nyam anŋ in ab.
Ɛtŋ ɛy s’ij ów a fɛŋ eke li kok Jerusalɛm lele Israɛl wus af ab a e daŋku. Wɛl ɛw’r olikŋ af ɛtŋ l’uw,
gbɛkɔ eke ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, Nyam ɔŋ’n n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ’n abusu eke li k’ɛlu sos ɔkm.
Ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af l’ɛlum sos ɔkm, kɔ ɛy a cɛ eke Nyam ikŋ anym sɔsum ot ɛsɛ adaŋku af a ec’any af. Eke Nyam igbm’n agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, s’ij ɛtŋ s’ɛgŋ in ab.
N’ɔŋ ɛy abusu eke si k’ɔb kokoba s’ok agŋ a, ke si dad eke in anake Nyam ɛw’r eke li ki jɛj agŋ ek’uw lel agŋ ek’anŋ owr ab ab e low l’ok a.
Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ dad in e low ek’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’in ub ow nawrɛ a, ɛgŋ a e sikpl a in b’ow in ɔny oc ap ow e nin a ec’abusu ab ɛm."
Eke Piɛr odad anŋ nɛnym k’uwrm a, Abŋ Lala us es agŋ a fɛŋ eke am iri in ec’odad ab af.
Ɔmn ɛsɛl a ek’el Jwifɛl ke igŋ Piɛr ab ow a, low am iti any eke Nyam ec’Abŋ Lala a eke b’ɔŋ agŋ a, k’im ɛŋn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a.
Tasi ɛm a, -n’am iri wɛl am dad sodad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl am kɔklm Nyam e sagb a. Ow sosiɛm Piɛr dad ninɛ:
"Kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛdŋn agŋ amua mij ok nuŋ, sica eke -n’ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ɛsɛ ɛy af ab ee?"
Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ok wɛl mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm. Ow e jam a, -l’ibrm eke Piɛr k’anŋ ɛl ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lel agŋ lisijimɛl a ek’anŋ Jude ab ab iri ek’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji ɛgŋ Nyam ec’odad a eb.
Eke Piɛr ɛwl mɛny uyu ow Jerusalɛm a, Jwifɛl ek’ɔny ɔmn a am ok’r ów af
dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀ɛ́! Im ɛy agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ogŋ ɛtŋ ij ob ɛl ab!"
Ow sosiɛm, Piɛr otar low a ek’ɛy a akr mɛwl ɛm ok ɛl. Li dad ninɛ:

"M’anŋ Jope ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ eke m’am ŋɔŋn Nyam a, m’am ɛkn es. M’ɛkn ob nyam ek’am us es ow ɛŋn’m, ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ gbad ligbɛl af ke wɛl cucu ow ec’ɛnyɛmbri yar a ɔny es, ke anŋ afr am us es toŋ ow titm’m.
M’ok any es mi lɛr lokm a ɛtŋ m’ɛkn mindey eke b’ɛli akr yar, akp ɛm ndey, mindey eke b’ɛrir es lele ɔr ab.
Ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’am dad’m ɛsɛ: 'Piɛr, ìgb, ìbi ke íj!'
Gbɛkɔ mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Njaŋ o, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Aŋke lɛgŋ kaka ob e wɛl ɛdŋn oglog ob ek’ aylm ŋ ec’any af a ɛym’m nɛnym.'
Ɛmɛny lebl a anŋ afr ikŋ dad ninɛ: 'Ob eke Nyam dad eke ow ayl a, ŋ, kì dad k’ɛsɛ ow aylm.'
Low a ɛy ɛbɛn ɛbɛn sakp nyahan ɛtŋ ob a ɛwl im afr.
Wanci ab af cɛ, agŋ nyahan ow ok êl a eke s’anŋ ɛm a ogŋ; Sesare ɛb ɛm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛrm ɛl -l’ow ɛm eci.
Abŋ Lala dad’m eke mi k’im ɛl ab, ke bɛbar k’ánm ɛm ɛm. Agŋ lisijimɛl nɔhɔn na eke m’ot ab m’ow aŋa a, ɛwl’m Sesare, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’ok Kɔrnɛy ec’akŋ a.
L’otar elel eke l’ɛkan afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’inym es in ec’akŋ a, ke am dad’r eke li k’ɛrm agŋ im Jope ɛsŋ’m m’ów,
mi dád’r sodad eke b’ow el in lele in ec’akŋ a nimum ab e sɔg eci.
M’ɔb nuŋ m’am dad ɛl odad, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Abŋ Lala us ɛl es af ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji l’us ɛy es af nuŋ ɔb ɛm ab af.
Kpɛkŋ m’ɔkn low yec’a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad a: 'Jan ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm, kɔ ɔny, wɛl b’ow ok ɔny mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm.'
Ɛl yɛji Nyam ɔŋ ɛl ob ap nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke n’ɔŋ ɛy lɛgŋ a eke s’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist nawrɛ a: sica bwo el’m eke mi k’ɛdŋn Nyam, low yec’eke l’erur eke li ki kok ab ee?"
Eke sica -l’irir sodad amua bake ow uwr a, -n’ɔny ɛrm es ɛy ɛtŋ -li kɔklm Nyam -li dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, Nyam ɔŋ agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji abusu eke k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm ke ɛ́ŋn owr anŋ tasi a."
Etiɛn ek’uw oc es e gbre ijr ek’ɛy a, ɔŋ ɔmn ɛsɛl a ɔmu es; ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb im toŋ ok Fenisi, Sipr lele Antiɔs ɛb ɛm ab, gbɛkɔ agŋ ek’el Jwifɛl a sɔny cɛ -n’am dad Nyam ec’odad a -l’ok.
Kɔ ɔmn ɛsɛl bɛb ek’el Sipr lele Sirɛn ɛb ɛm ec’a, ow ok Antiɔs, ɛtŋ dad agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e lís ec’Amani Mamn a ec’odad.
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’abusu a anŋ ɛl ab, ow ɔŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ itŋn ɛrm ɛm el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ec’agŋ a iri low na ɛtŋ -l’ɛrm Barnabas im Antiɔs.
Eke n’im l’ɛy yogŋ ke l’ɛkn elel eke Nyam eci bibm a kokr ɔmn ɛsɛl a, sos ɛm iŋn’n ɛtŋ l’atr wɛl sos es eke wɛl k’ɔny ɛrm susu, úcu Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny es.
Tasi ɛm a, Barnabas el ɛgŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn eke Abŋ Lala lele ɔmn ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ. Agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ɛgŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ owi eb.
Ow ɔŋ Barnabas im Tars eke k’ɛsŋ Sɔl.
Eke n’ɛŋn ow a, l’oc ow ab l’ɛwl l’ow Antiɔs. -N’anŋ yogŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm ɛl yony mum toŋ lakpo mum, ɛtŋ -li yɛgm agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl low. Antiɔs ɛb ɛm anake wɛl ɔg es ɛsŋ jam ɛsɛl a 'kretiɛnɛl a'.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl anŋ Jerusalɛm ow Antiɔs.
Abŋ Lala nyimn ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Agabus ɛtŋ am ɔb amani dad eke ow’n k’ow in ibnm ɛtŋ lek ligbɛl in b’ow in ɛy wus na nimum af. (Lek a ɛy tasi, lakpo ab af eke Klod el Sesar a.)
Ow ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ɛgŋ eb eke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔŋ yec’a eke n’ɔny ow ec’abusu a, yec’a ek’ɔtu eke k’ɛlum lisijimɛl ek’anŋ Jude a abu a.
-Li kok ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ -l’oc abu ɛlum a -n’ɔŋ Barnabas lele Sɔl ab oc im ɔŋ Jude wus af e Nyamel a ec’ agŋ ekpekp a.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ɛb ebu Erɔd Agripa am ijr Nyamel ec’agŋ nyam nyam gbre.
N’ɔŋ wɛl ibi Jak ek’el Jan lisijim a lab ler ɛm ɛm.

Sica eke l’ɛkn ek’ow akpl Jwifɛl a sos ɛm a, Futufutu eke ejru ánm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab ɛm, n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny Piɛr ɛlu sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ srɔda eyŋ eb yar yar sakp yar am ɔsu ow. N’ɔny tutr eke li ki jɛj ow e low l’ok dedeku a ec’any af eke Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a b’oc es.
Kɔ eke Piɛr anŋ sobel ɛm a, Nyamel ec’agŋ a am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔŋ’n ɔmn ɛm tasi.
Ncok a eke lɛgŋ k’ɛny ke Erɔd jɛj in e low ok dedeku a ec’any af a, Piɛr am ɛru mɛmn srɔda eyŋ yony ec’araŋn. Wɛl ok’r ŋgbraka yony ɛtŋ usu ɔsu ɛsɛl inym es, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ anŋ in ec’usu sobel lisany a.
Kpru ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ilm any ɛtŋ usuayl ɛjn ok sobel akŋ a. Afr ɛrm ɛs a iyr Piɛr abu mɛnɛgb ɛm, uwr’r ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb fafa!" Ŋgbraka a ek’anŋ’n sabu a ɛr ok wus.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: "Sùs ŋ e mob a, ke ók ŋ e cɔkrukpɔ a." Piɛr ɛlum’n ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Sùs ŋ e mob af ɛw a ke ús’m jam."
Piɛr igŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a ugŋ ɛy ɔkm sobel ab ɛm. Li k’ɔnym ɔmn eke low a eke afr ɛrm ɛs a am kok a k’el nawrɛ tasi: n’am tutr eke ow el es ɛkn ɛm.

-L’afŋ krɛkrɛ ec’usu ɔsu usu ab es, yony ɛm ec’a yɛji ɛtŋ -n’im -l’ok lowi lisany a ek’ɔkŋ baŋn ab any a ogŋ. Ɛl ec’any af lisany a fig in obi ɛtŋ -l’ok ɔkm. -N’im -l’ok ɛbɛrŋ nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ kpru ɛm afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛlu’l es.

Sica low a ek’ɛy a ok Piɛr es sos ɛm ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ca gbɛ, m’am ɛkn ek’ow el nawrɛ tasi: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake ɔŋ in ec’afr ɛrm ɛs ow eb ɛlu’m es Erɔd ec’abusu ab ɛm eke m’anŋ lele Jwifɛl e low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ek’am tutr eke ki kok ɛm e lís ab ab a."
Sica eke ow ok’r es sos ɛm a, n’im Mari ek’el Jan Mark lis ec’akŋ a. Yogŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl as luku anŋ Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm.
Piɛr cicm lisany abu, ɛtŋ akŋ juma kok lis nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Rod igb ow eke ki fig’r lisany a.
Eke l’iri lebl a ke l’uw any ek’ow el Piɛr a, sos ɛm iŋn’n toŋ l’ijl es eke li ki fig ow lisany a, kɔ l’uru es n’im li dad agŋ a eke Piɛr in anŋ lisany.
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Nuŋ ɛm am uŋ’ŋ!" Kɔ nɛny am at’r es eke ow el low nawrɛ tasi. Ɛtŋ -li dad -l’usr af ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn ke in ec’afr ɛrm ɛs ana."
Ɛbɛn yɛji Piɛr abu anŋ ɛm am cicm lisany a abu. Eke sica -li figr lisany a, -l’ɛkn ow ɛtŋ ow ɛw ɛl any iti.

Li tat wɛl abu eke wɛl ki yewal ɛtŋ l’otar elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny ɛlu’l ɔkm sobel ab ɛm a e low akr l’ok wɛl. Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Dàdr low a okr Jak lel agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab ab." Ɛtŋ l’ɛy ɔkm l’eb ejagb n’im usu ɛjeci.
Sica eke usu ot es a, bɔbar ligbɛl ɛy srɔda eyŋ a ec’araŋn ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm ɛl sosi low yec’ek’ɛŋn Piɛr a.
Erɔd ɔŋ wɛl ɔl Piɛr es, kɔ wɛl ɛŋnm’n. Li bibrm usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a low ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ibi ɛl. Ow e jam a, n’anŋ Jude n’im Sesare ɛtŋ yogŋ n’anŋ sɛgŋ bɛb.

Sica lɛgŋ nyam Erɔd ɔny ɛrm bebl ligbɛl Tir baŋn eyŋ lele Sidɔn baŋn eyŋ ab e lís. Baŋn a yony mum nɛny okr af eke k’im ɛkn’n. In e saw ec’ɛgŋ ek’el Blastus ɛm -l’ɛcr -n’im -l’ibrm Erɔd eke ɛrm es ɛy k’anŋ, aŋke ɛl e baŋn a yony mum b’ɔl ob ij ɛb ebu ec’ɛb ab ɛm.
Eke lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ɛw a ow a, Erɔd sus in ec’ɛb es ɛw ɛs e mob sus ɛm a, li sig es ɛb ebu e lɛkpn af ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl ów dedeku ɛm.
Dedeku a ɔg dad ninɛ: "Na nyàm anake am dad odad a, kɔ ow elm ɛgŋ."
Kɔ, kpru ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam kok Erɔd low, aŋke anygbɛl a ek’el Nyam ec’a l’ɛgŋm n’ɔɔm ow, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a sisŋ ij’r l’uw.
Nyam ec’odad a gbɛ am eb es obn.
Eke Barnabas lele Sɔl ab uwar ɛl e juma Jerusalɛm a, -l’oc Jan Mark -l’ɛwl mɛny ab -n’im Antiɔs.

Antiɔs e Nyamel ab ɛm, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lele low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ek’anŋ a ec’en el: Barnabas, Simeɔn (eke wɛl igŋ nin af Nijɛr), Lusius (Sirɛn baŋn iy), Manayɛn (ek’el Galile ec’es ɛw ɛs Erɔd Antipas e mew ɛm e lawl), lele Sɔl ab.
Lɛgŋ nyam, eke -n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam ke -n’am ɛnŋ nɛny a, Abŋ Lala dad ɛl ninɛ: "Òcr Barnabas lele Sɔl ab ɛwr saw yec’ɛtŋ ke -li kok juma a eke m’ɛsŋ ɛl ow ec’a."
Ow sosiɛm, eke -n’ɛnŋn nɛny, -ni ŋɔŋan Nyam toŋ ke ow uwr a, -l’at Barnabas lele Sɔl ab abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu wɛl im.
Ek’Abŋ Lala ɛrm Barnabas lele Sɔl ab a, -n’im -l’ok Selesi baŋn ɛtŋ yogŋ, -l’eb mijɛtŋ -n’im Sipr lekr ɛm.
Eke -n’imn -l’okr Salamin baŋn a, -n’am dad Nyam odad Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a. Jan Mark yɛji anŋ ɛl ab ɛl eci abu ɛlum eci.
-L’ubr lekr a kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ -l’ok Pafɔs ek’anŋ nuŋ a. Yogŋ, -n’ɛŋn cam ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Bar Jesu; l’el Jwif nyam eke b’ocr in sosi kokoba ɔb ɛs.
L’ir Sɛrgius Polus, lekr a ec’es ɛw ɛs ek’el nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs a ogŋ. N’ɔŋ wɛl ɛsŋ Barnabas lele Sɔl ab aŋke l’erur eke li k’iri Nyam odad.
Gbɛkɔ cam ɛs eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Grɛk ɛm Elimas a b’atar Barnabas lele Sɔl ab ów es ɛtŋ am ɔl eke k’irmn es ɛw ɛs a ec’ɔmn a eke k’ɔny a.
Sɔl eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Pɔl yɛji, ke Abŋ Lala iy ɛm a, ɔkŋ cam ɛs ab any
ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Yadŋ gbɛl ɛs eke low ŋuŋ kok eb sos! Agn e liy! Low mamn fɛŋ ec’ifnu! Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ów amamn a eke bɛbm ok es a, b’ɔl eke k’ɔny wuwal. Kɔ k’ow walm ow e low ɛlum es ee?
Sica ìri gɔŋ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow efal’ŋ any ɛtŋ k’ow ɛknm ligbn ec’usuayl a sɛgŋ bɛb." Kpɛkŋ Elimas any efl ɛtŋ anŋ ncebn ɛm; n’am bɔbrm l’ɔl ɛgŋ eke k’ɔny’n abu.
Eke es ɛw ɛs ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a, l’ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lís e low yɛgm a ok’r es sos ɛm nɔnɔ.
Sica Pɔl lele agŋ a ek’am us’r jam ab ab eb mijɛtŋ Pafɔs nanu ɛtŋ im ok Pɛrj, Panfili wus af. Ɛtŋ Jan Mark ɛlu ɛl es yogŋ ɛwl im Jerusalɛm.
Ɛl gbɛ, -l’igŋ Pɛrj -l’us ejagb kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ -n’im -l’ok Pisidi wus af ec’Antiɔs a. Eke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ow a, -l’ok Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a -l’ok es.

Eke wɛl awl lɛl ol e silɛl ab ɛm lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’ab ɛm uwr a, Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a ɔŋ ɛgŋ im dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, ek’ɔnyn ów ɔm ec’odad eke ki dadr atar dedeku a sos es, ke ɔtur eke ki dadr gɔŋ."
Pɔl igb tat ɛl abu ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Israɛl ec’agŋ lele ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl ke anŋn aŋa Nyam nuŋ igŋ ec’a, ìgŋn lɔru es irir!
Nyam ek’el Israɛl ec’agŋ a e Nyam a sɔsum ɛy lagŋɛl ot. N’ɛnyn agŋ amua lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke -l’iir etuɛb Ejipt wus af a. Ɛtŋ in e lɛc ab ɛm n’ɔny l’ot wɛl es Ejipt.
Loj yogŋ, n’ɔnym wɛl ab ow ij akpo ekŋ yony.
Kana wus af a, ni ŋuŋn ɛb lɔbŋ ɛtŋ l’oc wɛl eci wus a n’ɔŋ in ec’agŋ a ɛsɛ ɛl ec’aja ob cɛ af.
Ów amua fɛŋ ɔtu eke k’ij akpo duw akpo ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab. Low na b’ɛc a, n’ɔŋ ɛy lagŋɛl jɛj ok ɛsɛl toŋ ow ok kokoba ɔb ɛs Samiɛl e lɛgŋ ɛm a.
Sica -l’ibrm ɛb ebu nyam ɛtŋ Nyam ɔŋ ɛl Saul, Kis jim, Bɛnjamɛ ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ek’ɛw ɛb ab es ow ij akpo ekŋ yony.
Eke sica Nyam igŋ Saul ɛlu es a, n’ɔŋ wɛl David ɛsɛ ɛb ebu af. N’am dad David e lís e low l’ɛsɛ: M’ɛŋn Jese jim David: l’el ɛm ec’ɛrm ec’erur, li b’ow li kok low fɛŋ e m’erur eke li ki kok a.
David ec’alaw ab ɛm e nyam el Jesu eke Nyam oc ɛw Israɛl eci Es Eb Ɛlu Ɛs, ɛsɛ elel eke l’ɛwar l’ɛw es ab af.
Gbuŋ ke Jesu ów a, Jan dad Nyam odad ibrm ek’Israɛl ec’agŋ a nimum k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm ke ók mij nuŋ.

Eke sica Jan am uwar in e juma a, n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Kɔ ɔny, bwo ec’ɛgŋ am ocr’m eke m’el ee? M’elm ɛgŋ a ek’am ekur a. Gbɛkɔ ìrir, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ’m jam am ow, ɛtŋ m’itm bɔbɔ yɛji eke mi k’ɔny in e cɔkrukpɔ meb a mi mɔmu’n es akr ɛm.'
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny ek’eel Abraham ec’alaw lele ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl ke anŋn aŋa Nyam nuŋ igŋ ec’a, ɛy fɛŋ anake wɛl is ɛy es eb ɛlu ec’odad na a.

Tasi ɛm a, Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ a lele ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab uwm ɛgŋ a ek’el Jesu ab any, ɛtŋ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci silɛl eke wɛl b’awl nɛnɛgŋ fɛŋ a, -l’irim ow okm ɛl es sos ɛm. Gbɛkɔ eke -l’ɔbr Jesu low a, -n’ɔŋ sodad a fɛŋ iy nɛny.
-N’ɛŋnm low kaka ek’ow ɛm -li k’ibi ow, kɔ -li dad Pilat eke k’ibi’r.
Eke -li kokr fɛŋ a eke Nyam Lɛl ɛwar Jesu eci lís a, -l’usm ow es olikŋ af ɛtŋ -l’ɛlu ow uwɔmu ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm.
Sɛgŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl, agŋ a ek’us Jesu jam Galile ɛtŋ toŋ im ok Jerusalɛm a ec’any af, l’okm sos ɔkm ɛtŋ sica agŋ a el in ec’adaŋku Israɛl ec’agŋ ec’any af.

Ɛy obi yɛji, s’am is ɔny Amani Mamn na. Sica eke Nyam igbm Jesu luw ɛm a, low yec’a eke l’ɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl a, li kok ow iy nɛny ɛy eke s’el ɛl ec’ey a eci, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Selu yony ɛm ab af: 'Ŋ ɛm ec’iy, yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, m’el asŋ'.
Nyam ikŋ anym ɛwar eke in b’ow in igbm Jesu luw ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke ow’n k’ɛ́wlm in ugŋm es ij. Li dad ninɛ: 'M’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny ów amamn a eke ɛm obi m’ɛwar eke mi k’ɔŋ David a, ɛtŋ ɔtur eke k’ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm.'
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl ɛjec’ɛm n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: K’ow yɛbm ŋ e libɔwi mamn ugŋm es uwɔmu ɛm.
David e lɛgŋ ɛm a, li kok Nyam e juma e bɛbm ɛw es a toŋ batŋ l’uw, wɛl oc’r es lagŋɛl e saw ɛtŋ l’ugŋ es;
kɔ in a eke Nyam igbm luw ɛm a, l’ugŋm es.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it eke k’uwr any eke Jesu ɛm anake ɔtur ɔnyn sikpl eci oc ap a. Mois ec’ol a ɔtum ebm ɛlum ɔny es ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm, kɔ agŋ fɛŋ eke ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm a, Nyam ot ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Sica ɛ̀wr ɛrm yec’ɛtŋ ke low na eke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad a k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny:
'Ɛ̀kan, ɔny, Nyam e miyɛr kokr ɛsɛl, low a íti ɔny any, ke írmn ocr es! Aŋke ɔny ec’owr anŋ ɛm, m’ow mi kok low nyam eke k’ow ubmn nawrɛ, eke ɛgŋ am dad ɔny ow ec’odad bɔbɔ yɛji.' "
Eke Pɔl lele Barnabas ab ok ɔkm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, wɛl ibrm eke nɛnɛgŋ ek’am ow a, -li k’ɛwl mɛny -l’ow -li dad odad nyam na cɛ.
Eke luku as a uwr a, Jwifɛl nɔnɔ lele agŋ a ek’ɛgŋ ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ e low eb a, am us Pɔl lele Barnabas ab jam. -N’am dad wɛl eke -li k’inym es kikri Nyam eci lɛc a eke b’ɔŋ ɛl ab ɛm.
Eke nɛnɛgŋ ow a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛb ab ɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ cɛ in im in am iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad af.
Eke Jwifɛl ɛkn dedeku na a, ow ɔny ɛl nyamnɛyr; -n’am wɛwr Pɔl ɛtŋ -n’am ɔny odad -l’oc ow es nɛnym.

Pɔl lele Barnabas ab am dad ɛl odad tasi ɛsɛ: "Ɔny, ow it eke wɛl k’ikŋ anym dad ɔny Nyam ec’odad a yɛ; gbɛkɔ eke ebmn odad a, ke am ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ agŋ eke k’ɔtum ɛŋnm sel ek’ɔnym uwr a, sica si b’ow s’im agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ogŋ!
Kin low yec’eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ ɛy ow ec’abusu a: M’oc’ŋ ɛsɛ ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ec’usuayl af, yec’ɛtŋ ke yɛ́gm wus na nimum ec’agŋ a, elel eke -li k’ɛŋan sel a."
Eke agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a iri ów amua a, sos ɛm iŋn ɛl ɛtŋ -n’am ɛlu Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ bia odad na eci; ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke Nyam ikŋ anym ɛw sel ek’ɔnym uwr ec’a, ub nawrɛ.
Nyam ec’odad a eb es wus a nimum af.
Kɔ Jwifɛl a ok bosu amamn ɛm ec’ɔyɔw a eke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ a lele ɛb a eci nyimn ɛsɛl ab ab al lokm; -l’ijr Pɔl lele Barnabas ab gbre ɛtŋ -l’ogŋ wɛl ɛl eci wus ab af.
Pɔl lele Barnabas ab cic akr sɛc ok ɛl es ɛtŋ im Ikoniɔm.
Jam ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ Antiɔs a ec’a, sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl lele Abŋ Lala eke -n’ɛŋan ab a afŋn ɛl es.

Ɛsɛ Antiɔs ec’ab af, eke Pɔl lele Barnabas ab im ok Ikoniɔm ɛb ɛm yogŋ a, -n’im -l’ok Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ -n’am dad Nyam odad toŋ batŋ Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab e nɔnɔ ub nawrɛ.
Gbɛkɔ Jwifɛl a ek’erurm eke k’ub nawrɛ a, itr agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a toŋ -n’ɔny agŋ lisijimɛl a e tutr ŋuŋ.

Kɔ Pɔl lele Barnabas ab ubrm ɛl e lɛgŋ ab es. Eke -n’ɔnyn ɔmn nɔnɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm a, -n’am dad Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ec’odad ɛrm susu ɛm. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ am ɔŋ ɛl abusu -li kok simɛny ɛwr lele ów any iti owi ab, ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, n’am yɛgm eke wɛl ec’odad a el nawrɛ.
Ɛb ab ɛm ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm yony: agŋ likpr inym es Jwifɛl a eci, ɛtŋ bɛb inym es ɛrm ɛsɛl a eci.
Jwifɛl lele ɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl a lele ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab, am bɛbm eke k’ijr Pɔl lele Barnabas ab gbre ke íbi ɛl mebn ɛm.
Eke -li b’uw any a, -l’uru es -n’imn Likaoni wus af e sɛb ab a ek’el Lisr, Dɛrb, lele ow e saw saw ab ab eci.
Yogŋ yɛji, -n’am ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba.
Lisr yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke bi sig es cɛ aŋke li bubm es. In e mew ɛm ɛtŋ sos ɛyr’r ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka l’ɔtum n’anm es.
Lɛgŋ nyam Pɔl am dad odad ɛtŋ n’am iri. Pɔl ok’r anyamn af am lɛr’r ɛtŋ l’ɛkn eke ɛgŋ a ɔny ɔmn eke k’ewl.
Li dad ow lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Ìgb, ìnym es ceŋ!" Ɛgŋ a igb us es ɛtŋ am an es.
Eke dedeku a ɛkn low a eke Pɔl kok a, -l’ɔg -li dad ɛl ec’ɛbr ek’el Likaoni ab ɛm ninɛ: "Sinyam itŋn sos el agŋ ow ɛŋn ɛy!"
-N’am ɛsŋ Barnabas 'Zes' ɛtŋ -n’am ɛsŋ Pɔl 'Ɛrmɛs', aŋke Pɔl anake b’ɔb amani a.
Zes eci nyam ŋɔŋn usu a anŋ ɛb a ec’ɛm ɛy usu a. In ec’egb waw ɛs a ot sed lele suw amamn ab ow lisany a ec’any af; l’erur eke dedeku ab ab -li ki waw egb -n’ɔŋ Barnabas lele Pɔl ab.
Gbɛkɔ eke Barnabas lele Pɔl ab iri low na a, -n’ɔny ɛl eci mob sus ɛm a -li gbagbrm ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’uru es -l’ok dedeku ab ɛm -n’am ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ:

"Agŋ lisijimɛl, kɔ bla ɛtŋ am kokr ɛbɛn ee? Agŋ cɛ s’el ɛsɛ ɔny af. S’am is ɔny Amani Mamn a eke k’igŋn ɔny e sinyam ekekey na ek’el ob ɔfr ɔfr a okr es, ke ɛ́wal lɛɛr Nyam ek’anŋ owr ke kok afr, wus, okij lele ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ab ab a.
Godo godo a, li yɛb ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ eb ɛl obi ec’ejagb eke -l’erurir.

Gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ li b’okm sos ɔkm in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny ab ɛm: li b’ɔŋ mij anŋ afr ɛtŋ an ok ɔny wus ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ ɔny egb eke k’ubr ek’ow e lɛgŋ b’ow a; li b’ɔŋ ɔny ob ij ɛtŋ li bi yibr ɔny ec’ɛrm a sos ɛm iŋn."
Sodad amua e dad ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji, ɛrm ɛsɛl a ij gbre eke k’ɛdŋn dedeku a eke ki waw egb ɔŋ ɛl.
Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Pisidi eci Antiɔs a lele Ikoniɔm ab a ow ɛtŋ eb dedeku a. -L’ɔr Pɔl mebn ɛm ibi eci, ɛtŋ -l’ɔdu -l’ɛlu ow ɔkm baŋn a aŋke -li tutr ek’ow uw ŋ̂.
Sica eke jam ɛsɛl a ow ar ɛlul il ɛm a, l’igb wus l’ɛwl l’ɛy baŋn a. Eke lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, Barnabas ab -n’im Dɛrb.
Pɔl lele Barnabas ab im ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba Dɛrb ɛb ɛm; yogŋ, -li kok agŋ nɔnɔ el jam ɛsɛl. Sica -l’ɛwl mɛny -n’im Lisr, Ikoniɔm, lele Pisidi eci Antiɔs ab ab.
-L’usur jam ɛsɛl a ɛrm, -l’atr wɛl sos es eke wɛl k’inym es tuɔtuɔ wɛl ec’ɔmn ab ɛm ɛtŋ -n’am dad wɛl -l’ɛsɛ: "Ow it eke si k’ijr gbre nɔnɔ gbuŋ ke s’ók Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a."
Nyamel fɛŋ ɛm, -li b’ɛnm agŋ ekpekp -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛtŋ eke -li b’ ɛnŋ nɛny -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam a, -li b’afl wɛl es -n’ɔŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke agŋ amua ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a.
Ɛmɛny -l’ubr Pisidi wus a ɛtŋ -n’im -l’ok Panfili eci wus ab af.
Pɛrj ɛb ɛm yogŋ, -l’ɔb Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba ɛtŋ sica -n’im -l’ok Atali ɛb ɛm.
-L’igb yogŋ mijɛtŋ ɛm -n’aam Siri ec’Antiɔs a. Ɛb na ɛm anake wɛl ot ok ɛl Nyam eci nyimn mamn ab ɛm juma na eke sica -li kokr -l’uwarir a ec’a.
Eke -n’imn -l’okr yogŋ a, -l’as Nyamel ec’agŋ a luku -li dad wɛl ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok a, lele elel eke Nyam figr agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji ɔmn e lakp a.
-N’anŋ yogŋ jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ibn nɔnɔ.
Agŋ bɛb anŋ Jude ow Siri eci Antiɔs a ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ lisijimɛl a low dad ɛsɛ: "Eke ubrmn likr es ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ ol a am ibrm ab af a, k’ow ɔtumn ɛŋnmn es eb ɛlu."
Pɔl lele Barnabas ab ɛgŋm low na ebm ɛtŋ -l’atar ów es ligbɛl agŋ ab ab. Wɛl ɛgŋ eb eke Pɔl, Barnabas lele Antiɔs ec’agŋ bɛb ab k’im Jerusalɛm ke ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab -li dad odad na.
Ɛtŋ Nyamel a ɛkn ɛl ec’usu im a e low. -L’ɛcr Fenisi lele Samari ab eci, ɛtŋ -n’am awl elel ek’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ocr any ɔkŋn Nyam a e low; amani na ɔŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl.
Eke -l’okr Jerusalɛm a, Nyamel a, ɛrm ɛsɛl a, lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab eb ɛl, ɛtŋ ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok a, -n’am awl -l’ok wɛl.
Gbɛkɔ Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ bɛb ek’ɔny ɔmn a, igb ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ke wɛl búbr agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn k’elm Jwifɛl a ekr es ke wɛl ɔ́ŋ ɛl -l’ɛlum Mois ec’ol a."
Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab as luku ɛtŋ am ɔny odad na igbl ogŋ ɛkn.

Eke -l’atarir ów es kpekpe a, Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, uwr any eke lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ Nyam sɔsum oc’m ɔny ec’araŋn eke mi k’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba m’ók agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’iri ke -l’ub nawrɛ.
Ɛtŋ Nyam eke uw agŋ eci mɛrm ab any a, ɛlu ɔkm yɛgm eke l’eb wɛl; n’ɔŋ wɛl Abŋ Lala ɛsɛ ɛy af.
Ɛl lele ɛy ab ec’araŋn a, l’okm ereb kaka: l’ayal wɛl ec’ɛrm a aŋke -n’ɔny ɔmn.
Ɛtŋ sica bla sosiɛm am sismn Nyam odad agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn a ec’ɛrɛkp leg leg ec’uyul ɛm, ɛrɛkp ek’ɛy lagŋɛl lele ɛy obi ɛy obi ab, s’ɔtum s’uyum ab ee?
Ke tasi ɛm a, s’ub nawrɛ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm wɛl sɔg ɛy ɛsɛ ɛl af."
Sica dedeku a fɛŋ yewal tiŋ, ɛtŋ wɛl am iri Pɔl lele Barnabas ab dad mɛny ɛwr lele low any iti owi ab eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok ɔŋ agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a.
Eke Pɔl lele Barnabas ab dad odad a ok es a, Jak ɔdu eb ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, ìrir ɛm ec’odad na!
Simɔ dad elel eke kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ Nyam ɛw ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a e low any, ke ɛl ɛm a ot agŋ eb mum nyam el in eci.
Ɛtŋ low na lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad ab ab okr af, aŋke Nyam Lɛl am dad ɛsɛ:
Ow e jam a, m’ow m’ɛwl m’ow, ke David ec’êl a ek’ɛy wus a m’úsr ɛm, in e êl ek’uŋ a, mi kókr ɛm, ke m’ínymn in es.
Ɛtŋ agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ b’ow ɔl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ es; ɛɛ, ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ eke m’ɛsŋ eke k’el ɛm ec’a, b’ow ɔl’m es. Na el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad eke dad;
lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ l’ɛlu in ec’ów amua ɔkm li yɛgm."
Jak igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Na sosiɛm, m’erurm eke wɛl k’ijr agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl ke oc any ɔkŋ Nyam a gbre.
Gbɛkɔ s’áwŋ ɛl lɛl si dad ɛl eke -li k’ijmn ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ɔŋ sɛkp, -l’ijmn nfaci, -l’ijmn ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, -l’ɛgŋmn mebl;
aŋke godo godo ɛtŋ, ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ɛm, wɛl am dad Mois eci sol amua ec’odad ɛtŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu yɛji sɛgŋ fɛŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ wɛl b’awl."

Ow sosiɛm ɛrm ɛsɛl a, agŋ ekpekp a, lele Nyamel a fɛŋ ab ɛgŋ eb eke k’ot ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ igŋ Pɔl lele Barnabas ab af im Siri ec’Antiɔs a. -Li sɔsum Jud eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Barsabas lele Silas ab -l’ot; -l’el agŋ lisijimɛl ab ɛm ec’any ɛsɛl yony.
Kin lɛl eke wɛl ɔŋ ɛl a: "Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab, ek’el ɔny lisijimɛl a, am ɔŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ek’elm Jwif k’ir Antiɔs, Siri lele Silisi ab a lebl.
S’iri ek’agŋ anŋ ɛy ogŋ aŋa ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛwr jeŋjeŋ, ebr ɛrmij ɛl eci sodad ebl ab ɛm. Ow elm ɛy s’ɔɔm ɛl abusu low na e kok eci.
Na sosiɛm, ɛy a fɛŋ eci nɛny af okr ɛm, si sɔsum agŋ s’ot eke si k’ɛrm ɛl ɔny ogŋ a, -l’ɛwl ɛy lawlɛl Barnabas lele Pɔl ab,
eke blel irmn ɛl ec’owr anŋ a ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛm.
S’am ɛrm Jud lele Silas ab ɔny ogŋ a eke ki dad ɔny ɛl obi ɛm, lɛl na eke s’am nɔn aŋa a e low.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy lele Abŋ Lala ab, s’ɛgŋ s’eb eke si k’ɔɔm ɔny ɛrɛkp ɛjeci ek’ow elm sol amua ek’it a cɛ:
k’ìjr ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ɔŋ sɛkp, k’ɛ̀gŋn mebl, k’ìjr ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, k’ìjmn nfaci. Eke ɔsur ów amua, ow b’ow akpl. Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am ɛsŋn ɔny!"
Wɛl ɛlu agŋ a eke wɛl ɛrm ab es, ɛtŋ -n’im -l’ok Antiɔs. Yogŋ -l’as agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn a luku ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ wɛl lɛl a.
Wɛl awl lɛl a ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ sos ɛm am iŋn, sos es atr ec’odad ek’anŋ ɛm a eci.
Jud lele Silas ab ek’ɛl obi yɛji el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a, dad ɔmn ɛsɛl a odad kpekpe sos es atr eci; -n’ɔŋ wɛl ec’ɔmn a ij lɛc obn.
-N’anŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ bɛb, ɛtŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɔmn ɛsɛl a ɔŋ ɛl ejagb -l’ɛwl -n’im agŋ a ek’ɛrm ɛl a ogŋ. [
Silas gbɛ ɛgŋ eb eke k’anŋ yogŋ.]
Gbɛkɔ Pɔl lele Barnabas ab gbɛ anŋ Antiɔs. Agŋ ɛjeci nɔnɔ ab -n’am yɛgm agŋ low, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a ec’amani.

Eke -n’anŋn Antiɔs yogŋ toŋ ow ibn a, Pɔl dad Barnabas ninɛ: "S’ɛ́wl mɛny s’im ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm eke s’ɔb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a ec’amani a, s’ɛ́kn agŋ lisijimɛl a ek’ɔny ɔmn a, s’ɛ́kn elel eke -n’am aan es a."
Barnabas erur eke Jan Mark k’igŋ ɛl ab im,
kɔ Pɔl gbɛ erurm aŋke Jan Mark igŋ ɛlu ɛl es Panfili, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’ɛwlm wɛl juma ab ɛm ij.
-L’atar ów es sɛnyn sɛnyn toŋ -l’ɛlulil es. Barnabas oc Mark ɛtŋ eb mijɛtŋ im Sipr;
Pɔl gbɛ oc Silas, ɛtŋ eke ɔmn ɛsɛl a ot ok ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci nyimn mamn ab ɛm a, n’im.
L’ɛcr Siri lele Silisi wus af ab eci n’am atr Nyamel a fɛŋ sos es ɔmn ɛm.
Pɔl im ɛy Dɛrb ɛtŋ ɛmɛny im ɛy Lisr. Yogŋ, jam ɛs nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Timote; lis a Jwif ek’in yɛji ɔny ɔmn; ɛs a gbɛ Grɛk.
Agŋ lisijimɛl a e k’ir Lisr lele Ikoniɔm baŋn ab a, bi dad Timote e lís ec’ów amamn nɔnɔ.
Pɔl erur eke k’ɔny ɛcm’n ab; l’oc ow ab n’im ɛtŋ l’ ubr ow likr es, Jwifɛl a ek’anŋ yogŋ a eke -li b’ow -l’ɛc a sosiɛm, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke ɛs a Grɛk.
Ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm eke -n’am ɛc a, -n’am dad agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn a ów a fɛŋ eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele Jerusalɛm ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab dad ucu es a, ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm eke wɛl k’ɛlum ów amua.
Sinyamel a am ɛy lɛc ɔmn ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ liy nyam nyam fɛŋ agŋ am bobn.
Abŋ Lala ɛ́gbm Pɔl lele Silas ab es eke -li ki dad Nyam ec’odad a Azi ogog a; ow ɔŋ -l’ubr Friji lele Galasi ab eci wus ab af.
Eke -li titmn Misi wus af a, -n’am bɛbm eke -li k’im Bitini wus af, gbɛkɔ Jesu ec’Abŋ a yɛbm ɛl.
Ow sosiɛm -l’ubr Misi ɛtŋ -n’im Troas baŋn eci nanu a.
Ncok ɛm a, Pɔl ɛrur mɛmn: l’ɛkn Maseduan iy nyam ek’inym es ke am ŋɔŋn’n dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀c Maseduan ke ów ɛlum ɛy abu!"
Kpɛkŋ eke mɛmn ɛrur na b’oc es a, si bɛbm sos s’us ejagb Maseduan im eci, aŋke s’ub nawrɛ eke Nyam ɛsŋ ɛy eke si k’ɛwl yogŋ ec’agŋ a Amani Mamn a.
S’eb mijɛtŋ Troas, s’igb yogŋ kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ s’im s’ok Samotras lekr ɛm, ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, s’im s’ok Neapolis baŋn.
S’igb yogŋ s’im Filip, Maseduan eci wus a eci ɛb gbɛl ek’anŋ Rom ec’es ɛw ɛm a. S’anŋ ɛb ab ɛm si kok sɛgŋ wa cɛ.
Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, s’ok ɔkm baŋn a s’im mij nɛny a; yogŋ si tutr eke si b’ow s’ɛŋn Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm usu nyam. S’ok es yogŋ ɛtŋ ɔyɔw a ek’as luku anŋ yogŋ a, si dad ɛl odad.
Ɔyɔw ab ɛm e nyam e nin el Lidi, Tiatir baŋn yɔwi eke b’ɔl sigbad ebl amamn ij ke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ. N’am iri ɛy ec’odad a, ɛtŋ Nyam ɔŋ’n abŋ eke li k’ɛw Pɔl e sodad a ɛrm af.
Ow ɔŋ wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ, in lele in ec’akŋ ab ab. L’ɛw ɛy abu li dad ninɛ: "Eke am ɛkan eke m’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ tasi, ke òwr anŋn ɛm ogŋ a." Ɛtŋ l’atrm ɛy s’ɛgŋ s’eb.
Lɛgŋ nyam s’aam Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, ɛtŋ adyɔwli nyam am ɔbr ɛy. In ɛm a, abŋ ŋuŋ nyam anŋ eke b’ɔŋ’n l’ɛkn efi e low ek’am ow a li dad. Ów amua eke li b’ɛkn li dad a b’ɔŋ in ec’es ɛwɛl a os nɔnɔ.
Ɛy lele Pɔl ab, n’am us ɛy jam l’ɛlu lebl li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Agŋ amua, Afr Kpekpe e Nyam a e juma kok ɛsɛl! -N’am dad ɔny ejagb a eke b’ɛwl ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a ec’odad!"
Yɔwli a am kok ɛbɛn sɛgŋ nɔnɔ. Ow b’afŋn es a, Pɔl ɛrm ebl toŋ batŋ ɛwl mɛny dad abŋ ŋuŋ a ninɛ: "Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, ɛ̀y ɔkm in ɛm!" Ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ abŋ a ɛy ɔkm yɔwli ab ɛm.
Eke adyɔwli a ec’es ɛwɛl a am ɛkn eke -li k’ow -n’ɛŋnmn os ow ɛm ij a, -n’ɔny Pɔl lele Silas ab -l’ow ɛbɛrŋ ɛm es ɛwɛl ec’any af.
-L’ot wɛl -n’im Rom e jɛj ok ɛsɛl ek’anŋ yogŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ amua am is odad ɛy ec’ɛb na ɛm;
ɛl Jwifɛl, ɛtŋ -n’am yɛgm agŋ ɛb ir owr. Ɛy Rom eyŋ; ɛy ec’ol a ɔɔm abusu eke si k’ɛgŋ s’eb oglog si kok ow e low."
Dedeku a yɛji ebl ɛrm ok Pɔl lele Silas ab af. Jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ɔŋ wɛl eb Pɔl lele Silas ab mob sos ɛtŋ ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɔr ɛl likŋni ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke wɛl ɔr ɛl sɛnyn sɛnyn bake ow uwr a, wɛl ok ɛl sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ usu ɔsu ɛs eke k’ɛw ɛl nyamn af sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Eke n’ɛŋn abusu ikŋ na a, l’ot l’ok wɛl sobel ab ɛm ec’akŋni nyam ek’anŋ sobel a e nuŋ kɔkɔ a, ɛtŋ n’awŋm wɛl akr ekŋ ekpr ab.
Ncok eci lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm a, Pɔl lele Silas ab am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛgŋ ɛj kɔklm’n ɛtŋ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a am iri.
Kpru ɛm, wus umu tuɔtuɔ, ɔny sobel a mumu. Kpɛkŋ masany a fɛŋ fifig ok es ɛtŋ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a eci ŋgbraka a fɛŋ mɔmu es.
Usu ɔsu ɛs a ufŋm es, eke li b’ɛkn eke sobel a eci masany a fifig a, l’ɔdu in e lab ler ɛm a l’ɛlu ɔkm eke li k’ibir in sosi, aŋke n’am tutr eke sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a uru es im.
Kɔ Pɔl barm in e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm ninɛ: "Kì kokr ŋ sosi low ŋuŋ! Ɛy fɛŋ s’anŋ aŋa!"
Usu ɔsu ɛs a ibrm eke wɛl k’igŋ al; l’uru es l’ɛy akŋ a, sos ufŋ ɛm, erŋn ab, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Pɔl lele Silas ab ec’any af.
N’ɔŋ wɛl ok ɔkm ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ ɛgbɛl, kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ke m’ɛ́ŋn sel ee?"
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ùb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu nawrɛ ke ŋ lele ŋ ec’akŋ ab ɛ́ŋan sel."
Ɛtŋ -n’am dad ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad, in lele agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ’n akŋ ab ab.
Ncok a eci wanci ab af cɛ, usu ɔsu ɛs a ot ɛl ab im ɛtŋ yɔyɔg ɛl abi ɛnyɛmbri ab es. Kpɛkŋ in ec’agŋ ab ab wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
L’oc Pɔl lele Silas ab n’im in ec’akŋ a ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl ob ij. Ɛgŋ na lele in ec’akŋ ab ab sos ɛm am iŋn aŋke -l’ub Nyam nawrɛ.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Rom e jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ɛrm agŋ ow dad usu ɔsu ɛs a ninɛ: "Ɛ̀lu agŋ a es."
Usu ɔsu ɛs a ow dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɛlu ɔny es. Ɔtur eke sica k’okr ɔkm imn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm."

Kɔ Pɔl dad agŋ a ninɛ: "Wɛl jɛjm ɛy e low okm, ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr ɛy dedeku ec’any af, ke ɛy Rom ec’agŋ cɛ! Ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ok ɛy sobel ɛm. Sica -n’am erur eke -li k’ok ɛy ɔkm es lɔl ɛm ee? S’ɛgŋm! -L’ow ɛl obi -l’ok ɛy es!"
Agŋ a im ɛwl jɛj ok ɛsɛl a sodad a eke Pɔl dad a. Eke -l’irir eke Pɔl lele Silas ab el Rom eyŋ tasi a, ɛrmni ɛdŋ ɛl es.
-L’ow -l’ɛgŋ low ij -n’ɔŋ wɛl, ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ok wɛl ɔkm sobel ab ɛm ɛtŋ -ni ŋɔŋn wɛl eke wɛl k’ok ɔkm baŋn a.
Eke Pɔl lele Silas ab ok ɔkm sobel ab ɛm a, -n’im Lidi ogŋ a. Eke -l’ɛkan agŋ lisijimɛl a, ke -l’atar wɛl sos es a, -n’im.
Sica Pɔl lele Silas ab ɛcr Anfipolis baŋn lele Apoloni baŋn ab eci im ok Tesaloni; yogŋ, Jwifɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu anŋ.
Ɛsɛ elel eke sakp sakp fɛŋ li bi kok ab af a, Pɔl im ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. Nɛnɛgŋ kpa kpa kpa sakp nyahan, l’atar ów es Nyam odad nuŋ af agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ ab ab.
N’am ayal l’ok wɛl ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm wɛl eke Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, ow akpl eke Mesi a k’ij gbre ke ánŋ luw ɛm igb. N’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu na eke m’am dad ɔny in ec’odad a, in anake l’el Mesi a."
Jwifɛl ab ɛm e bɛb odad a ok es sos ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ow -n’ɛŋn Pɔl lele Silas ab. Grɛkɛl nɔnɔ ek’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ a lele bosu amamn ɛm ec’ɔyɔw nɔnɔ ab yɛji kok ɛbɛn.

Gbɛkɔ Jwifɛl a nyamnɛyr am ɔny. -L’as ów marɛm marɛm ɛsɛl eke -n’ɛŋan ɛbɛrŋ ɛm a luku, -n’am is odad agŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -n’am bubr agŋ ɛm baŋn a. Ca -l’igb -l’ok Jasɔn ec’akŋ a, -n’am ɔl Pɔl lele Silas ab eke -li k’ɔny -l’ot -n’im dedeku a ec’any af.
Eke -n’ɛŋnm wɛl a, -l’ɔdu Jasɔn lele agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab es -l’ow baŋn a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Agŋ amua inymn wus na nimum es afr; sica ɛy ogŋ a -l’ok a!
Ɛtŋ Jasɔn eb ok ɛl akŋ! Agŋ amua fɛŋ am kok ów ek’elm Sesar ec’ol a eci, aŋke -n’am dad eke es ɛw ɛs ɛjeci nyam in anŋ eke wɛ’n b’ɛsŋ Jesu."
Sodad amua ɔŋ dedeku a lele ɛb a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab sos inym es afr.
-N’ɔŋ Jasɔn lele agŋ lisijimɛl ab ab ɛw os es gbuŋ ɛtŋ -l’ɛlu wɛl es.
Kpɛkŋ eke lɛgŋ uk a, agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔŋ Pɔl lele Silas ab im Bere. Eke -l’okr yogŋ a, -n’im Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a.
Bere e Jwifɛl a b’ɛgŋ low eb akm Tesaloni ec’a; -l’eb Nyam odad a ɛl e sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ -li bi wewr Nyam Lɛl a, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɛkn eke Pɔl ec’odad eke bi dad ɛl a el nawrɛ.
Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ ub nawrɛ; ɛtŋ Grɛkɛl ab ɛm, bosu amamn ɛm ec’ɔyɔw nɔnɔ lele egŋ nɔnɔ ab yɛji ub nawrɛ.
Kɔ eke Tesaloni e Jwifɛl a iri eke Pɔl am dad Nyam odad Bere baŋn ɛm yɛj’a, -l’ow -n’am ŋuŋn dedeku a mɛrm ɛm -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛw jeŋ jeŋ.
Ow sosiɛm, kpɛkŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔŋ Pɔl imn okij any a eci; gbɛkɔ Silas lele Timote ab gbɛ anŋ Bere.
Agŋ a ek’aam nyimn Pɔl a im ɛwl’l toŋ ok Atɛn baŋn, ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl -n’im Bere Silas lele Timote ab ec’amani a eke Pɔl ɔŋ ab ab. Amani ab ɛm, n’am ibrm eke wɛl k’ow fafa ɛŋn’n.
Eke Pɔl am eku Silas lele Timote ab Atɛn yogŋ a, low am ɛy’r sos ɛm eke ɛb na k’el sɛkp eci nuŋ igŋ ɔfr.
Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ, li b’atar ów es Jwifɛl lele agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl ke am igŋ Nyam nuŋ ab ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛrŋ ɛm yɛji sɛgŋ fɛŋ li b’atar ów es agŋ ɛjeci eke li b’ɛŋn ab ab.

Epikurɛl lele Sitoyikɛl eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab yɛji am atar ów es Pɔl ab. Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb am ibrm ɛsɛ: "Nɛnym gbɛl ɛs na, bla odad iy n’am dad gbɛ ee?" Eke agŋ bɛb am iri Pɔl dad Jesu ec’odad lele luw ɛm anŋ igb owi ab a, -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na, ɛsɛ etu e sinyam a cɛ ec’odad ow’n am dad af."
Ow sosiɛm -l’oc Pɔl ab -n’im baŋn a ec’ów bɛbm ɛsɛl a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Kɔ s’ɔtu eke si k’uw low yɛgm owr na eke am dad ow ec’odad ab any ee?
Eke am dad ɛy ów eke am iti ɛy any a sosiɛm, s’am erur eke si k’uw ow e nyandrɛ ab any."
Tasi ɛm a, Atɛn eyŋ a fɛŋ lele etu agŋ a ek’ir ɛl ab a, b’eb sɛgŋ nɔnɔ am iri oglog am dad ów owr ec’odad cɛ.
Pɔl inym es ów bɛbm ɛsɛl a ec’any af ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Atɛn eyŋ, m’am ɛbmn nyamn eke low low fɛŋ ɛm eel Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl tasi.

Tasi ɛm a, eke m’am ɛc ɔny eci baŋn ɛm a ke m’am ɛkn ɔny e sinyam nuŋ igŋ e mob a, m’ɛkn egb waw usu nyam eke wɛl nɔn: 'Nyàm eke wɛl uwm any eci'. Ɛɛ! Yec’a eke am igŋn nuŋ ke uwmn any a anake m’am ow mi dad ɔny in ec’odad a.
Nyam a eke kok wus na nimum lele mob fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ab a, anake el afr lele wus ab eci Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a, ɛtŋ l’írm Sinyamel ek’agŋ us ab ɛm.
L’ibram eke agŋ k’ɔŋ’n ob kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ow’n ɔnym ob af; tasi ɛm a, in anake li b’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ owr anŋ, sel lele mob mob fɛŋ ab a.
Ɛgŋ nyam coco ɛm, li kok ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’ok wɛl wus na nimum af. L’ok akpo n’ɔŋ wɛl, ɛtŋ susu susu a eke -li k’ir a yɛji, l’ɛdŋ ow e sereb a.
Li kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ɔ́l’l es. Ɛtŋ eke es ɔl a am ɛw bɔbrm ɛm yɛji, k’aw ke -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛŋn ow, aŋke Nyam anm kpekpe ɛgŋ kaka eci.
Tasi ɛm a, ɔny e lɛl nɔn ɛsɛl a yɛji dad ninɛ: 'In ɛm s’anŋ owr, s’ɔtu eke si k’an es s’ɛc, ɛtŋ s’anŋ.' Ɛtŋ lɛl nɔn ɛs ɛjeci nyam yɛji dad ninɛ: 'S’el in ec’ey.'
Eke s’el in ec’ey a, si k’ɔ́nyn tutr eke Nyam anŋ ɛsɛ sika ɛm nyàm, os ɛm nyàm oglog lebn ɛm nyàm ek’agŋ ij mɛwl kok ɛl ec’ów tutr ɛm af.
Agŋ ec’any uwm ɛm ec’ów eke kok lɛgŋ a ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, Nyam ɛwm ɛrm af ij, kɔ n’am ibrm susu a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a eke k’itŋn ɛl ec’es an a.
L’oc lɛgŋ nyam l’ɛw es, eke ɛgŋ a eke li sɔsum l’oc ab ɛm, li b’ow li jɛj wus e low l’ok nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm. L’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af ɛgŋ na eke l’igbm luw ɛm ab ɛm!"
Eke -l’irir Pɔl dad luw ɛm anŋ igb ec’odad a, agŋ bɛb am kokr’r miyɛr, ɛtŋ oglog am dad ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ ɛjeci ke s’íri ŋ ec’odad na."
Af aŋa anake Pɔl ɛlu ɛl es a.
Kɔ agŋ bɛb gbɛ ɛgŋ in e low a eb ɛtŋ ub nawrɛ. Ɛl ɛm a, Denis ek’el ów bɛbm ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a, yɔw nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Damaris a lele agŋ ɛjec’ab anŋ ɛm.
Eke ów amua b’ɛc a, Pɔl igb Atɛn im ɛy Korɛnt.
Yogŋ n’ɛŋn Jwif nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Akilas; wɛl ew’r Pɔŋ eci wus ab af. N’anŋ Rom, Itali wus af l’ow ɛy Prisil ab ow k’ibnm, aŋke yogŋ Sesar Klod ɔŋ abusu wɛl ogŋ Jwifɛl a fɛŋ. Pɔl im ɛŋn ɛl,
ɛtŋ eke -n’ɔnyn juma nyam ek’el ndey lɛl ɛm lɛ́f e kok a, l’ir wɛl ab ɛtŋ -li b’okr af -li kok juma.
Nɛnɛgŋ fɛŋ, Pɔl b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ eke li b’eb odad a, li b’ɔl eke li k’eb Grɛkɛl lele Jwifɛl ab.
Sica eke Silas lele Timote ab anŋ Maseduan ow a, Pɔl b’oc in e lɛgŋ a fɛŋ am dad Jwifɛl a Nyam odad am ij nɛny dad eke Mesi a Jesu.

Kɔ Jwifɛl a ɛ́gŋm in e low a ebm ɛtŋ bi wɛwr’r; ow sosiɛm l’ufŋ in e mob sus ɛm a e siflefl ab es l’ok wɛl es, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke batŋ irmn, ke ɔny obi ɛm ana; ow elm ɛm e low ij. Sicaca ɛm a, m’ow m’oc any m’ɔkŋ agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a."
Pɔl igb yogŋ im ir Titius Justus ogŋ, ek’in ec’êl a titm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. L’elm Jwif kɔ l’el ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛgŋ ɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi a eb.
Krispus ek’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw a, lele in ec’akŋ ab ab ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ. Korɛnt baŋn eyŋ nɔnɔ ek’iri Pɔl ec’odad a yɛji ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ ok mij nuŋ.
Sica ncok nyam, Pɔl am ɛrur mɛmn ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "K’ùru erŋn! Nɛny ánŋ’ŋ ɛm am dad! K’àbl nɛny,
aŋke m’anŋ ŋ ab. Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum kokm’ŋ low ŋuŋ aŋke ɛb na ɛm, agŋ nɔnɔ el ɛm eci."
Pɔl anŋ Korɛnt kok lakpo nyam awl nɔhɔn ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ Nyam odad.
Lakpo ab af eke Galiɔn eb Rom ec’es ɛw Akayi ogog ec’a, Jwifɛl okr af irŋn Pɔl. -L’oc ow -n’im jɛj ok ec’any af
ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na am ɔl eke k’eb agŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ ek’otm ol a ec’ab es."
Eke Pɔl ɔl eke ki dad odad a, Galiɔn dad Jwifɛl a ninɛ: "Ɔny Jwifɛl, tasi ɛm a, blel ow el low ŋuŋ li kok, oglog low ligbɛl marɛm anake li kok a, ke blel m’ók sos es m’iri ɔny ec’odad a.
Kɔ ek’ow el ów es atar odad ebl owi af, en owi af lele ɔny obi e sol owi af ab a, na ɔny obi e low eke k’ɛkan ana. Sodad nɛnɛ a, m’érurm eke mi k’el ow e jɛj ok ɛs!"
Ɛtŋ l’ogŋ wɛl jɛj ok usu a.
Ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɔny Sɔstɛn ek’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔr ow jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ec’any af; gbɛkɔ Galiɔn cicm sar okm ɛl es.
Pɔl anŋ Korɛnt ibn. Sica l’ɛlu agŋ lisijimɛl a es, ɛtŋ l’eb mijɛtŋ l’ot Prisil lele Akilas ab n’im Siri. Gbuŋ ke -l’eb mijɛtŋ a, Saŋkre ɛb ɛm yogŋ, Pɔl ɔŋ wɛl ɛr’r sin aŋke l’ij nɛny.
-N’im -l’ok Efɛs ɛtŋ Pɔl ɛlu ɛl es yogŋ. N’im l’ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ɛtŋ Jwifɛl ab ab -n’am atar ów es.
-L’ibrm ow ek’ow k’anŋ ɛl ab ibn, kɔ l’ɛgŋm.
Ke l’ɛ́lu wɛl es a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke Nyam ɛgŋ, lɛgŋ ɛjeci m’ow m’ɛwl mɛny m’ow ɔny ogŋ aŋa." Ɛtŋ l’igb Efɛs n’imn mijɛtŋ ɛm eci.
Eke l’itr es Sesare a, l’uyu n’im Jerusalɛm l’ɛsŋn Nyamel ec’agŋ a, gbuŋ ɛtŋ n’im Antiɔs.
Li kok sɛgŋ bɛb yogŋ ɛtŋ n’im. In ec’im ɛm a, l’ɛcr Galasi lele Friji e wus ab af eci ɛtŋ n’am atr jam ɛsɛl a sos es.
Jwif nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Apolɔs ke wɛl ew Alesandri a, ow ɛy Efɛs. L’el odad ebl mamn ɛs eke uw Nyam Lɛl any sɛnyn sɛnyn yɛji.
Wɛl yɛgm’n Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a e low, ɛtŋ ari at ɛm, n’am ɔb kokoba li yɛgm agŋ Jesu e lís e low fɛŋ cɛcɛ ɛm; gbɛkɔ Jan eci mij ok nuŋ a cɛ e low l’uw any.
N’am dad ów ɔmn ɛm tasi Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ. Eke Prisil lele Akilas ab iri’r lebl a, -l’oc ow ɛtŋ -l’otar Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a e low akr tasi -l’ok ow.

Sica eke Apolɔs am erur eke k’im Akayi wus af a, agŋ lisijimɛl a atr’r sos es, ɛtŋ -li kok lɛl -n’awŋ ɛb ab ɛm eci jam ɛsɛl a yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl éb’r sɛnyn sɛnyn. Eke n’im l’ɛy yogŋ a, agŋ a eke Nyam e bibm ɛm ɔny ɔmn a, l’ɛlum wɛl abu nɔnɔ.
Tasi ɛm a, dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af n’am ot ów tasi li yɛgm eke Jwifɛl a ɔnym low ij: Nyam Lɛl ɛm, n’am ɛlu ɔkm eke Mesi a Jesu.
Ek’Apolɔs anŋ Korɛnt a, Pɔl ebr mafɛny ɛm eci im ɛy Efɛs. N’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl bɛb yogŋ
ɛtŋ l’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ eke ubr nawrɛ a, ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ek’Abŋ Lala nyam anŋ yɛji, s’irim; wɛl dadm ɛy ow e low."
Ow ɔŋ Pɔl ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Ke sica bogŋ e mij ok nuŋ ɛŋan ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Jan eci mij ok nuŋ a eke yɛgm agŋ a."
Pɔl dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Jan am ok agŋ a ek’ɛgŋ eb eke k’itŋn ɛrm a mij nuŋ ɛtŋ n’am dad Israɛl ec’agŋ a eke k’ub ɛgŋ a eke b’ow anŋ’n jam ow a nawrɛ, ɛgŋ a el Jesu."
Eke -l’irir ów amua a, -n’ɔŋ wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm.
Pɔl at ɛl abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala. -N’am ɛbr sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛtŋ -n’am iri Nyam ogŋ ec’odad -li dad.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ɔtu ek’ij agŋ lɛw yony.
Pɔl b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ yogŋ awl emum nyahan, li bi dad ów ɔmn ɛm tasi. N’am dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad ɛtŋ n’am ɔl elel eke li k’eb agŋ a ek’am iri in ec’odad a.

Gbɛkɔ agŋ nɔnɔ am ɔny lɔru aru, ɛ́gŋm ek’ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ dedeku a ec’any af, am cak Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a e low. Ow sosiɛm Pɔl ɛlu ɛl es, ot jam ɛsɛl ab ab im, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ am dad Nyam odad Tiranus e lɛl êl ɛm a.
Low na ibn toŋ ij akpo yony; ow ɔŋ agŋ a ek’ir Azi ogog a, Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a.
Pɔl ɛm, Nyam am kok sakrowa ɛgbɛl toŋ batŋ agŋ b’ot sigbad, oglog nuŋ es awŋ eke Pɔl ɛw sos a ís ɔ́lu a: ɔl a b’oc ɛl es lís ɛtŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a b’ok ɔkm ɛl ɛm.

Jwifɛl bɛb eke b’ɛc susu susu ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ eke b’anŋ ɔ́lu ɛm a, ɛl yɛji am ɛbm oc Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin a ogŋn abŋ eŋuŋ ok ɔkm. -Li bi dad abŋ eŋuŋ a -l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu a eke Pɔl am dad in e low a e nin ɛm, m’am dad ɔny eke k’okr ɔkm!"
Ɛbɛn eke egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam, Jwif eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Seva a, ec’ey lɔbŋ a yɛji bi kok ana.
Kɔ lɛgŋ nyam, abŋ ŋuŋ nyam dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’uw Jesu any ɛtŋ m’uw ɛgŋ ek’el Pɔl ab any, ɛtŋ kɔ ɔny, bwo el ɔny ee?"
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke abŋ ŋuŋ ir ɛm a ɛy ɛl af, ɛtŋ l’ɛy lɛc l’akm wɛl fɛŋ; l’ɔr wɛl lɛc ɛm toŋ batŋ mob kok kok ɛl; -l’uru es -l’ok ɔkm akŋ a -n’im sos ɔfr.
Efɛs ec’agŋ a, Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab, iri low na; ɛl fɛŋ erŋn am ɔny ɛl ɛtŋ agŋ am ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin a ec’ɛlum ligbɛl.
Agŋ nɔnɔ a eke ub nawrɛ a ow dedeku a fɛŋ ec’any af ɛgŋ ów eŋuŋ a eke -li kokr a e low eb.
Agŋ nɔnɔ a eke kok cam owi a ot ɛl e silɛl a ow, ɛtŋ dedeku a fɛŋ ec’any af -l’ofŋ. Wɛl ub silɛl a ec’os abi ek’ɔtu eke k’ij a, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’os ab ɛm, ow ij jɛtɛ efu fandi ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab.
Elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’abusu ɛm, Nyam ec’odad a am eb es ke am ɛlu in e lɛc a ɔkm ana.
Eke ów amua ɛc ok es a, Abŋ Lala nyimn Pɔl eke k’ɛcr Maseduan lele Akayi ab eci, ke im Jerusalɛm. N’am dad eke ek’in im yogŋ, ow’n it ke in ím Rom yɛji.
Ow sosiɛm n’ɔŋ in ec’abu ɛlum ɛsɛl yony, Timote lele Eras ab ikŋ anym im Maseduan, kɔ in obi a gbɛ ɛmɛny n’anŋ Azi sɛgŋ bɛb.
Lɛgŋ na af, ɛrm bebl ligbɛl ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a sosiɛm.
Sika iny ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Demetrius b’oc jɛtɛ ufu kokr nyàm yɔw Artemis eci nyamel ekekey, ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ juma kok ɛsɛl a b’ɛŋn os nɔnɔ.
L’as in e juma kok ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ɛjec’a eke ɛl e juma a ot in ec’a es a luku ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ o, uwr any eke ow el juma na anake b’ɔŋ ɛy s’ir ɛb sɛnyn sɛnyn a.
Am ɛkan ɛtŋ am irir low eke Pɔl ikŋ na am kok a: tasi ɛm a, n’am dad eke sinyam a eke agŋ in kok a, in elm nyàm, ɛtŋ l’eb agŋ nɔnɔ, ow elm Efɛs aŋa sɔny cɛ, kɔ Azi wus nimum af yɛji.
Low na ɔtu eke ki ŋuŋn ɛy e juma a, ke ɛmɛny ow ɔ́ŋ nyàm yɔw Artemis e nyamel gbɛl a irmn in ec’any a; nyàm yɔw na eke Azi lele wus na nimum ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ab b’igŋ nuŋ a e sagb a b’ow oc es!"
Eke -l’irir sodad amua a, agŋ a ɛrm ebl afŋn es ɛtŋ am ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Efɛs eci Artemis a el ligbɛl!"
Ɛrm bebl a eb es ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm. Agŋ a ɔny Gayus lele Aritak ab, Maseduan wus af eyŋ yony eke b’ɛwl Pɔl usu, ɛtŋ dedeku ɛm -l’ub -l’ok dedeku a e luku as usu a.
Pɔl am erur eke k’okm sos ɔkm dedeku a ec’any af, kɔ jam ɛsɛl a ɛdŋn in.
Azi wus ab af eci idr ɛsɛl bɛb a ek’el lawlɛl a, ɔŋ’n bɔwl ŋɔŋn’n eke li k’iim dedeku a e luku as usu a.
Wanci ab af a, luku as a wuwal: agŋ bɛb b’ɔny na ke dad, amua b’ɔny na ke dad, ɛtŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ec’a, -l’uwm low a sosiɛm eke -n’anŋn luku as ab ɛm ab any.
Jwifɛl a akŋ ów a ok Alesandr nɛnym ɛtŋ -l’ikŋm ow anym eke li ki dad. Alesandr igbl abu ogŋ: l’erur eke dedeku a ec’any af li k’eb odad li dad l’otar akr.
Gbɛkɔ sica eke ow ok ɛl es sos ɛm eke ow el Jwif a, ɛl fɛŋ -l’ɔg lebl nyam toŋ ow kok wanci ɔmu yony: "Efɛs eci Artemis a el ligbɛl!"

Sɔg a anŋ ɛm toŋ ɛtŋ sica ɛb a eci es ɛw ɛs a ɔtu ɛdŋn dedeku a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Efɛs ec’agŋ, yewalil ɔ! Agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke Efɛs ec’ɛb a b’ɔsu Artemis gbɛl a e nuŋ igŋ usu a lele in e lebn ɛm nyàm ek’anŋ afr ɛy wus ab ab.
Ow itim ɛgŋ kaka any. Ow sosiɛm ɔtur eke ki yewalil tiŋ, kì kokr nyamb owi.
Kin, otr agŋ amua owr aŋa, -l’iym nyamel gbɛl a e mil ɛtŋ -li wɛwrm ɛy e nyàm yɔw a yɛji.
Eke Demetrius lele in e juma kok ɛsɛl ab ab ɔny low ɛgŋ ab a, ow ɔny sɛgŋ eke wɛl bi jɛj ów ok ɛtŋ es ɛw ɛsɛl yɛji anŋ: yogŋ anake -li k’im -li jɛj -l’ok a.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke ɔnyn low eke k’ibrmn a, wɛl b’ow dad ow ec’odad luku as gbɛl a eke b’an es ol af a ec’any af.

Tasi ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna e low na ek’ɛy a, af yogŋ a, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ot ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ low ɛgŋm ebm ɛsɛl af, aŋke low kaka anm ek’am ayal ɛy ec’ɛŋanin na, ɛtŋ si k’ow s’ɔnym odad ebl ek’ow af si k’otar ɛŋanin na e low akr sɛnyn sɛnyn."
Eke li dad ów amua uwr a, l’igbl luku as a ec’agŋ a sos ogŋ.
Eke ów wuwal a fɛŋ ok sel a, Pɔl as jam ɛsɛl a luku ɛtŋ am atr ɛl sos es. Ow b’uwr a, l’ɛlu wɛl es n’im Maseduan.
L’ɛcr wus ab af eci, l’atr ɔmn ɛsɛl a sos es, sodad nɔnɔ a eke li dad wɛl ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ n’im Grɛs,
n’anŋ yogŋ l’ij awl nyahan. Sica eke n’am bɛbm sos eke li k’eb mijɛtŋ n’im Siri a, l’iri eke Jwifɛl a am ut in ec’asre. Ow sosiɛm l’ɛwl mɛny l’ebr Maseduan eci.
Agŋ a ek’im am ɛwl’l a el: Sopatɛr Pirus jim, Bere iy, Aritak lele Sekundus ab ek’el Tesaloni eyŋ, Gayus, Dɛrb iy, Timote, Tisik lele Trofim ab, Azi wus af ec’agŋ.
Agŋ amua ikŋ anym im Troas am eku ɛy.
Ɛy gbɛ, eke Futufutu eke ejru anm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl a uwr a, s’eb mijɛtŋ Filip ɛb ɛm Maseduan wus af; ɛtŋ eke sɛgŋ yen ɛc a, s’im s’ɛŋn ɛl Troas, s’anŋ yogŋ si kok sɛgŋ lɔbŋ.
Ma ɛy ncebles a, s’ɛŋanin eke si k’ubr futufutu ɛm, ɛtŋ Pɔl am dad dedeku a odad. Eke lɛgŋ b’ow ɛny ke li b’ow n’im a sosiɛm, li dad odad toŋ lɛgŋ usu ubr ɛm.
Oj ab ɛm a eke s’as luku êl afr yogŋ a, kɛniɛ nɔnɔ anŋ.
Ŋgbafrɛ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Etikus sig es finɛtr nɛny af a. Pɔl ec’odad a ek’am ɔfu nɛnym a, ɔŋ mɛmn ɛwl’l. Mɛmn a afŋn in es toŋ n’anŋ êl afr nyahan ɛm a l’ɛy wus. Wɛl ɔny igbl’l ogŋ, kɔ l’uw.
Pɔl us es, im ubu’r af, oc’r ɛtŋ dad agŋ a ninɛ: "Ɛrmij k’ók ɔny: n’anŋ owr!"
Ɛmɛny Pɔl ɛwl uyu êl afr a, l’ubr futufutu ab ɛm li cɛc, ɛtŋ in yɛji l’ij. Ɛmɛny li dad odad ibn kpekpe toŋ ligbn ɛjn ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ n’im.
Iy a gbɛ anŋ owr, wɛl oc’r im ɛtŋ ow el agŋ a fɛŋ ec’ɛrm es ɛy.
S’ikŋ anym s’im eke si k’eb mijɛtŋ ot im ɛy Asos; yogŋ anake si k’oc Pɔl a, aŋke tasi ɛm a, li dad eke li k’ɛcr wus wus eci.
Eke l’ow n’ɛŋn ɛy Asos a, s’oc’r mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ s’im Mitilɛn.
S’igb yogŋ s’im ɛtŋ lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’ow s’ok lekr a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kio a ec’any af. Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’ow s’ok Samɔs, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lɛgŋ b’ɛny akr af a, s’ow s’ok Mile.
Tasi ɛm a, Pɔl ɛgŋ eb eke k’inyam es Efɛs irmnm lɛgŋ Azi wus af. N’am ogŋ es yec’ɛtŋ ek’ow it ke n’ánŋ Jerusalɛm Pantekɔt e lɛgŋ a.
Pɔl anŋ Mile awŋ bɔwl Efɛs eke Nyamel ec’ agŋ ekpekp a k’ow.
Eke -l’owr -n’ɛŋan ow a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ eke m’anŋ ɔny ab a, uwr elel eke m’aan es ab any, lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ a ɛtŋ eke m’ow Azi wus na af a.
Es is ɛm, mi kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm, Jwifɛl eci asre eke b’ut ɛm e gbre ijr ec’a sosiɛm.
Uwr any ɛkan eke low fɛŋ ek’ɔtu eke k’akpl ɔny ec’a, m’ocm mi lɔlm es. Dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af, ɔny ec’akŋ akŋ, mi dad ɔny ɛtŋ mi yɛgm ɔny yɛji.
M’ɛsŋ Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab eke k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm, oc any ɔkŋ Nyam ke ɔ́ny ɔmn ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛm.
Sica m’aam Jerusalɛm ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala am at’m eke mi ki kok ab af. Low yec’a eke b’ow ɛŋn’m yogŋ a, m’uwm any.
Low a cɛ eke m’uw any a el: ɛb fɛŋ ɛm eke mi b’ɛc a, Abŋ Lala b’ɛwar’m ɛm e gbre ij nɔnɔ lele sobel ɛm eke m’ow m’ɛy ab ab a e low.

Gbɛkɔ m’am ɛkn eke ɛm ec’a, ɛm ec’owr anŋ a ɔnym any; low a cɛ ek’ɔny any a el ke m’ím toŋ m’igŋ ɛm eci es uru a e nuŋ, ke mi kók juma a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu abul’m a, toŋ ke m’úwar; juma a el ke m’ɔ́b Amani Mamn a ek’el Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a e kokoba.
M’ɛc ɔny fɛŋ ec’araŋn mi dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad; gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, m’uw any ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɛknm im ij.
Na sosiɛm anake yɛfɛnyna m’am igbl lebl ogŋ mi dad m’ɛsɛ: ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam am irm, ke ow elm ɛm e low ij,
aŋke mi dad ɔny Nyam e low a fɛŋ eke bɛbm ɛw es a; m’ocm kaka mi lɔlm es.
Ɔ̀surir ɔny obi lele Abŋ Lala eci mɛbob a ek’ɔŋ ɔny eke k’ɔsur ab ab. Ɛsɛ elel eke mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs b’ɛw in e mɛcɛb a nyamn af ab af a, ɛ̀wr Nyamel a eke Nyam ɔl jim lokm e mebl ab ɛm a e low ɛrm.
M’uw any tasi eke ɛm eci im ɛm a, agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mindey eŋuŋ af b’ow ok ɔny ec’araŋn ɛtŋ k’ow yɛbm mɛbob a kaka.
Ɛtŋ ɔny ɛm a yɛji, agŋ b’ow ok ɔkm am ɔny yadŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔmn ɛsɛl a ús ɛl jam.
Ɔ̀sur sos! Ke ɔ́kan ek’akpo emum nyahan, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm, m’ɔpim ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam ec’ów ɔm.
Sica m’am oc m’ɛlul ɔny Nyam lele in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ eci odad ab ab abu ɛm. N’ɔny abusu eke li k’agbr ɔny ɔmn ɛm ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny aja a fɛŋ eke l’oc l’ɛw es agŋ a ek’el in ec’a ec’a.
M’ocm nyamn m’ɛwm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ec’os, sika, lele simob sus ɛm ab af.
Ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke ow el ɛm e sabu ab ɛm mi kok juma m’ɛŋn yec’ek’it a agŋ a ek’am ɛwl’m a, lele ɛm obi ab ec’a.
Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ mi yɛgm ɔny eke ki kokr juma ɛbɛn ke ɛ́lumn ɔgbɔru abu. Ɔ̀kan Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu eci sodad amua eke dad a: 'Eke wɛl b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ob a, wɛl b’ɛŋn sos ɛm iŋn nɔnɔ akm yec’eke wɛl b’ɛŋn ɛgŋ ɛm a.' "
Eke odad a uwr a, Pɔl ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛl fɛŋ ab ŋɔŋn Nyam.
Agŋ a fɛŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn ɛtŋ am ɛy Pɔl af es ɛlulil eci.
Sos ɔw ɛl es nɔnɔ aŋke Pɔl dad ɛl eke wɛ’n k’ow in ɛknm’n ij. Ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl ow toŋ -l’ok mijɛtŋ a e lís.
Eke sica s’ɛlu ɛl es a, s’imn mijɛtŋ ɛm eci, kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ s’ok Kɔs lekr ɛm; lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’im s’ok Rod lekr ɛm, ɛtŋ s’igb yogŋ s’im s’ok Patara baŋn.
Yogŋ, s’ɛŋn mijɛtŋ nyam ek’am ow im Fenisi ɛtŋ s’ok ɛm s’im.
S’ɛkn Sipr lekr a kpekpe ɛm, s’ɛcr ow ec’esr ɛm a, ɛtŋ s’imn Siri eci. S’itr es Tir eci nanu gbɛl a, yogŋ a eke mijɛtŋ a k’usm in ec’ɛrɛkp ab es a.
Yogŋ s’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl ɛtŋ s’anŋ ɛl ab ow ij nɛnɛgŋ mum nyam. Eke Abŋ Lala ɛwar ɛl a, -li dad Pɔl eke k’úyum iim Jerusalɛm.
Gbɛkɔ eke nɛnɛgŋ gber mum a oc es a, s’ɛwl s’ebr ɛy ec’usu im ab ɛm. Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ow -l’ɛwl ɛy, ɛl ec’ɔyɔw lele ɛl ec’ey ab toŋ s’ok ɔkm baŋn a. Okij nɛny yogŋ, s’ok ɔwrɔkp wus si ŋɔŋn Nyam.
Eke sica s’ɛlulil es a, s’ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɛl gbɛ -l’ɛwl -n’im gbugŋ gbugŋ.
Sica eke s’igb Tir a, s’im s’ok Pitolemais, ɛtŋ s’uwar ɛy ec’usu im mij af ec’a. Yogŋ s’ɛkanin ɛb ab ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl ab ab, ɛtŋ s’anŋ ɛl ab lɛgŋ nyam cɛ.
Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’im s’ok Sesare. Yogŋ, s’ok Amani Mamn a ec’es ɔmun ɛs Filip ec’akŋ a ɛtŋ s’anŋ in ogŋ a. L’el agŋ lɔbŋ a eke wɛl sɔsum ot Jerusalɛm a e nyam.
N’ɔny ey ɔyɔw yar eke ɛbim egŋ, ke b’ɔb kokoba dad odad eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛl a.
S’anŋ yogŋ ow kok sɛgŋ nɔnɔ toŋ ɛtŋ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Agabus anŋ Jude ow.

L’ow ɛy ogŋ a, l’oc Pɔl eci meb er ɛm a, n’awŋ in ec’akr a lele sabu ab ab, ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Kin Abŋ Lala ec’odad eke am dad: ɛgŋ a eke meb er ɛm na el in ec’a, Jerusalɛm yogŋ, Jwifɛl b’ow awŋ’n ɛbɛn, ke -l’oc -l’ɛlu ow agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a abu ɛm."
Eke s’iri ów amua a, ɛy obi ɛy obi lele Sesare ec’ɛy lisijimɛl ab ab, si ŋɔŋn Pɔl eke k’úyum iim Jerusalɛm.
Gbɛkɔ li dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ikŋn ɔŋn ɔwar’m sos es ee? Ɛm, mi bɛbm sos, ow elm ɛm ec’awŋ a cɛ eci, kɔ ke m’úw Jerusalɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu sosiɛm."
Eke s’ɔtum s’ebm’n odad ebl ɛm a, s’atram’n ij ɛtŋ si dad s’ɛsɛ: "Ke ow él yec’a ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ am erur a!"
Eke sica s’anŋ yogŋ si kok sɛgŋ bɛb a, si bɛbm sos s’am uyu s’imn Jerusalɛm eci.
Sesare eci jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛwl ɛy Jerusalɛm; -l’oc ɛy -n’im ɛgŋ nyam eke k’eb ok ɛy akŋ a ogŋ; wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Minasɔn, Sipr lekr ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ek’el jam ɛs lɛgŋ kpekpe, ke ir Jerusalɛm.
Yogŋ eke s’ok a, ɛy lisijimɛl a eb ɛy sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Pɔl ot ɛy ab im Jak ogŋ a; yogŋ, Nyamel ec’ agŋ ekpekp a fɛŋ as luku.
Pɔl ɛsŋn ɛl, ɛtŋ mɛwl ɛm am dad ɛl in e juma ab ɛm ec’ów fɛŋ eke Nyam kok agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’araŋn a.
Eke -l’irir ow ec’odad a uwr a, -li kɔklm Nyam; ɛtŋ -li dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Ɛy lisijim, am ɛkn eke Jwifɛl fandi fandi ub Jesu nawrɛ, ke ɛl fɛŋ -li b’ucu ol a -n’ɔny es sɛnyn sɛnyn a.
Wɛl dad ɛl eke ŋ bi yɛgm Jwifɛl a fɛŋ ek’in ir lutu a low eke wɛ’n k’igŋ Mois ec’ ol a in ɛlu es, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ŋ bi dad wɛl eke wɛ’n k’úbrm wɛl ec’ey a ekr es, wɛ’n kí kokm Jwifɛl ec’ów a.
-Li b’ow -l’iri tasi eke ŋ ow aŋa. Ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?
Ow akpl ke kók ow a eke si b’ow si dad’ŋ a. Aŋa, s’ɔny agŋ yar ek’ij nɛny Nyam ec’any af.

Òc ɛl ab im, ànŋ ɛl ab sos ayal eci low kok ab ɛm, ke sɔ́g ɛl e low kok a e labm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -l’ɛr sin. Ow ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow uw any eke ów a fɛŋ e wɛl dad ŋ e lís a elm nawrɛ; ow b’ow yɛgm eke ŋ yɛji anŋ Mois ec’ol a ec’ɛlum ɛm.

Agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl ke ub nawrɛ a ec’a, si kok lɛl s’awŋ ɛl si dad ɛl ów yec’a eke si bɛbm a. Kin ów a: -li k’ijmn ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ɔŋ sɛkp, -l’ɛgŋmn mebl, -l’ijmn ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, -l’ijmn nfaci."

Af yogŋ, Pɔl oc agŋ yar amua ab im, ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, -n’im wɛl ab sos ayal eci low kok ab ɛm. Ɛmɛny n’im Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl dedeku ɛm lɛgŋ yec’af eke sos ayal eci low kok a b’ow uwr ke wɛl b’ow waw ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam ec’egb a.
Eke sos ayal eci sɛgŋ lɔbŋ a am ow uwr a, kpɛkŋ Azi ogog eci Jwifɛl a ɛkn Pɔl Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a. -L’ij abra -n’ɔŋ dedeku a fɛŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɔny ow;

-n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Israɛl ec’agŋ, ɛ̀lumn ɛy abu! Kin ɛgŋ a eke usu fɛŋ, agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af bi dad ów eŋuŋ ok Israɛl ec’agŋ af, Mois ec’ ol ab af lele Nyamel gbɛl na af ab a. Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, l’ot agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl l’ok Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm; ow ɛm a, -ni ŋuŋn usu lala a Nyam ec’any af."
Tasi ɛm a, -n’am dad ɛbɛn aŋke -l’ɛkn Efɛs iy Trofim Pɔl ab ɛb ab ɛm. -N’am tutr eke Pɔl oc ɛlu’l Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ lokm a.
Likekr a eb es ɛb ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɔy ɔy a fɛŋ ɛm agŋ am anŋ ow. -N’ɔny Pɔl -l’ɔdu -l’ɛlu ow ɔkm Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -li babl masany a.
-N’am ɔl eke -li k’ibi Pɔl, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl im dad Rom e kumada a ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a likekr a eke eb es ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm a e low.
Kpɛkŋ l’ot srɔda eyŋ lele ɛl ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ab ɛtŋ l’uru es n’im dedeku a ogŋ a. Eke -li b’ɛkn kumada a lele srɔda eyŋ ab ab a, -l’ɔrm Pɔl ij.
Kumada a ɛri im titm Pɔl, ɔŋ wɛl ɔny’n ɛtŋ ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc ŋgbraka yony awŋn’n; ɛtŋ l’ibrm ɛgŋ yec’a eke l’el a lele low yec’a eke n’am kok ab ab.
Gbɛkɔ dedeku ab ɛm, agŋ amua ám dad odad na, ke bɛb ám dad ɛjeci. Kumada a ɔ́tum irim low a tasi likekr na ɛm; n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc Pɔl im in eci frutu lakp ab ɛm.
Eke Pɔl anŋ êl a ec’af uyu usu a, srɔda eyŋ a oc’r abu ɛm abu ɛm, dedeku a e lɛc ek’am ɛlu ɔkm a sosiɛm,
aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ am us’r jam ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Wɛl íbi’r! Wɛl íbi’r!"
Wanci ab af eke srɔda eyŋ a am ɔl eke k’ɔny Pɔl ɛlu frutu lakp ab ɛm a, li dad kumada a ninɛ: "Kɔ m’ɔny abusu eke mi ki dad’ŋ odad tɛl ee?" Kumada a ninɛ: "Kɔ b’ɛbr Grɛk ee?
Njɛ elm Ejipt iy a eke efnɛny a cɛ is ar ke ot áru fandi yar ab im loj ab ee?"
Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Jwif, wɛl ew’m Tars ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af, ɛb ek’ɔny any ec’ɛgŋ. M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, ɔ̀ŋ’m abusu mi dád dedeku a odad."
Kumada a ɔŋ’n abusu. Pɔl inym es êl a ec’af uyu usu a ɛtŋ l’ɔwl wɛl abu eke -li ki yewal. Eke -li yewalil a, Pɔl am dad ɛl odad Ebre ɛm:
"Agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ ɛsɛl ab, ìgŋn lɔru es ke írir low yec’a eke sica m’am ow mi dad ɛm e dogŋn ec’a."
Eke sica -l’irir ek’ow am dad ɛl odad Ebre ɛm a, usu a irm es tiŋ ɛtŋ Pɔl dad ninɛ:

"Ɛm Jwif, wɛl ew’m Tars ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af, gbɛkɔ Jerusalɛm aŋa wɛl gbagbl’m, ɛtŋ Gamaliɛl el ɛm e low yɛgm ɛs. Li yɛgm’m m’uw ɛy lagŋɛl ec’ol ab any sɛnyn sɛnyn. Nyam eci juma kok a eci lɛc a iy’m ɛm nɔnɔ ɛsɛ elel eke yɛfɛnyna ɔny fɛŋ ow iy ɔny ɛm ab af.
M’ijr agŋ a ek’am us Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb na a gbre luw eci. M’ɔny egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab m’ok sobel ɛm.

Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a lele Sanedrɛn a nimum ab ɔtu ek’ij daŋku ek’ow el odad nawrɛ eke m’am dad. Ɛl ec’abu ɛm, m’ɛŋn silɛl ɛy lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Damas a eci eke ow ɛm -li k’uwr’m any; ɛtŋ m’im eke mi k’ɔny ɔmn ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ a, m’ók ɛl ŋgbraka ke m’ót ɛl ab m’ow Jerusalɛm ke mi kók ɛl low ŋuŋ."
"M’us ejagb m’aam ɛtŋ eke m’am titm Damas a, lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm, kpɛkŋ usuayl ligbɛl nyam eci jɛjn a anŋ afr ow ubur’m es.
M’ɛy wus ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’am dad’m ɛsɛ: 'Sɔl, Sɔl, kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ijr’m gbre ee?'
M’ibrm m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ŋ bwo el’ŋ ee?' Lebl a dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm Nasarɛt e Jesu ek’am ijr gbre a.'
Agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛm ab a ɛkn usuayl a, kɔ -l’irim ɛgŋ a ek’am dad’m odad a e lebl a.
M’ibrm m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee?' Ɛtŋ li dad’m ninɛ: 'Ìgb wus, ìm Damas, yogŋ wɛl b’ow dad’ŋ low yec’eke Nyam am dad’ŋ eke ki kok a.'
Eke usuayl na ek’am jɛjn a efal’m any a, agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛm ab a ɔny’m abu ɛtŋ ɛwl’m Damas.
Yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias, Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs sɛnyn eke b’ɛlum ɛy ec’ol a, ke Damas e Jwifɛl a fɛŋ b’erur in e low.
L’ow n’ɛŋn’m, li titm’m ɛtŋ li dad’m ninɛ: 'Ɛm lisijim Sɔl, ɛ̀kn es!' Wanci ab af cɛ, any efl a oc es ɛtŋ m’am ɛkn’n.
L’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: 'Ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam a ikŋ anym sɔsum oc’ŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke úw low yec’a eke l’erur ab any, ɛ́kn Nɛnyɛmbri Nyam Ɛs a, ke íri in obi e nɛny ɛm ec’odad.
Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke k’ij in e daŋku yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af, dád low yec’a ek’ɛkn ke iri a.
Ɛtŋ sica bla sosiɛm k’eku ee? Ìgb, òk mij nuŋ, ke ŋ eci sikpl a fɛŋ tɛ́tŋ es in e nin a ec’ɛsŋ ɛm.'
M’ɛwl m’im Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ eke m’am ŋɔŋn Nyam Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, m’ɛkan nuŋ ɛm.
M’ɛkn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛtŋ li dad’m ninɛ: 'Ògŋ es ɛy ɔkm Jerusalɛm fafa, aŋke ɛm e lís e low a eke am dad a, ɛb eyŋ a k’ow ɛgŋm ow e low ebm.'
Mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, -l’uw any tasi eke mi b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu m’ɔny agŋ m’ok sobel ɛm ɛtŋ mi b’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr agŋ eke b’ub’ŋ nawrɛ a.
Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ibi ŋ e daŋku ij ɛs Etiɛn a, ɛm yɛji m’anŋ yogŋ. Agŋ a ek’am ibi Etiɛn a, m’ɛgŋ ɛl e low a m’eb ɛtŋ m’ɔsu ɛl e mob sus ɛm a.'
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’m ninɛ: 'Ìm, aŋke m’ow m’ɛrm’ŋ usu kpekpe, agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a ogŋ.' "
Dedeku a iri Pɔl ec’odad a toŋ batŋ igŋ yogŋ a eke li dad ów amua na a; kɔ sica -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ìrmnin ɛgŋ na! Ìbir ir! L’itm eke li k’anŋ owr!"
-N’am ɔg, -n’am ufŋ ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es, ɛtŋ -n’am wɔwl sɛc afr.
Kumada a ibrm eke wɛl k’ɔny Pɔl ɛlu in eci frutu lakp ab ɛm, ke wɛl ɔ́r’r ŋgbre ɛm, ow ɔŋ’n li dád odad, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’úw low a sosiɛm eke dedeku a am ɔgr’r ab any.
Gbɛkɔ eke wɛl awŋ’n eke k’ɔr’r a, li dad srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny abusu eke k’ɔr Rom iy tasi eke wɛl jɛjm in e low okm ee?"
Eke l’iri ów amua a, n’im n’am ɔŋ in eci kumada a amani li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ e low anake blel kok ab ee? Ɛgŋ na Rom iy tasi!"
Kumada a ow ɛŋn Pɔl ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Dàd’m ɔ, kɔ ŋ Rom iy tasi ee?" Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, ɛm Rom iy."
Ɛtŋ kumada a dad ninɛ: "Ɛm labm ligbɛl mi sɔg gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’el Rom iy tasi." Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Ɛm ec’a gbɛ, mew ɛm ɛtŋ."
Kpɛkŋ agŋ a ek’am ow ɔr’r yec’ɛtŋ ke li dád odad a, ɛwl sos mɛny; kumada a in obi yɛji erŋn ɔny eke Pɔl k’el Rom iy tasi ke n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny awŋ ow ŋgbraka ɛm a.

Kumada a am erur eke k’uw low a tasi ek’ow sosiɛm Jwifɛl a am ok Pɔl ów af ab any; na sosiɛm, eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, n’ɔŋ wɛl mɔmu Pɔl es ŋgbraka ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ibrm egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a lele Sanedrɛn a fɛŋ ab eke k’as luku. L’oc Pɔl l’ow ɛtŋ n’inymn ow es ɛl ec’any af.
Pɔl ok Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a anyamn af ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ab ec’ɛb eke m’ir toŋ ke k’it yɛfɛnyna a, ɛm tutr ɛm a, m’ɔnym low kaka eke mi kokr ɛm sosi ów af."
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Ananias ɔŋ abusu ek’agŋ a ek’anŋ Pɔl saw a, ki bɔbm’n nɛny es.
Ow ɔŋ Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ anake Nyam b’ow ɔr’ŋ a; ŋ, êl eke wɛl ufur! Anŋ aŋa eke ki jɛj ɛm e low ok ol ɛm, kɔ ol ibrm eke k’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr’m ee?"
Agŋ a ek’anŋ Pɔl saw a am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Nyam ec’egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a am wɛwr ee?"
Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Lisijimɛl, m’uwm any ek’ow el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ab ab ɔ! Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl am dad ɛsɛ: Kí dadm ŋ ec’ɛb ec’es ɛw a e nin ŋuŋ."

Pɔl uw any eke Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a e bɛb a el Sadusiɛl ɛtŋ likpr a Farisiɛl; na sosiɛm anake ɛl ec’any af l’agbr lebl es li dad eke: "Lisijimɛl, ɛm Farisi, Farisi ec’iy. Eke m’ub luw ɛm anŋ igb owi nawrɛ a sosiɛm anake wɛl am jɛj ɛm e low ok a."
Kpɛkŋ eke Pɔl dad ów amua a, Farisiɛl a lele Sadusiɛl ab ab ów es atar ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ luku as a ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm sakp yony.
(Tasi ɛm a, Sadusiɛl bi dad eke luw ɛm anŋ igb in anm ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lele abŋ ab yɛji in anm; gbɛkɔ Farisiɛl ɔny ɔmn ów amua fɛŋ ɛm.)
Likekr a am at es, ɛtŋ ol eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb ek’el Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ a igb ɛrm bebl ɛm am dad ɛsɛ: "S’ɛŋnm low ɔbr kaka ɛgŋ na ɛm. Ow k’ɔdm abŋ nyam oglog afr ɛrm ɛs nyam dad’r odad!"
Ów es atar a am uyu afr toŋ kumada a erŋn am ɔny bake wɛl píplm Pɔl ɛm. Na sosiɛm anake n’ɔŋ in eci srɔda eyŋ a eke k’im dedeku ab ɛm ɔny Pɔl oc es ɛl ec’araŋn, ke -l’oc -n’im ow frutu lakp ab ɛm a.
Lɛgŋ b’uk a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛlu sos ɔkm Pɔl ec’any af ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Sos át’ŋ es! Ij ɛm e daŋku Jerusalɛm aŋa, ɛtŋ ow it eke Rom yɛji ow k’el ɛbɛn."
Lɛgŋ b’ɛny eci ibribr a, Jwifɛl bɛb ut asre; -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb -l’ij nɛny eke -li k’ijmn ob, -l’ɛgŋmn mij eke -li k’ibim Pɔl.
Agŋ a ek’ut asre ikŋ na a, ij agŋ ekŋ yony afŋ es.
-N’im -n’ɛŋn egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a lel agŋ ekpekp ab ab ɛtŋ -li dad wɛl ninɛ: "S’ɛgŋ s’eb s’ij nɛny eke si k’íjm ob kaka eke si k’ibim Pɔl.
Sica ɔny lele Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ ab ab, ìbrmn kumada a eke k’oc Pɔl is ɔny; dàdr eke am erurir eke k’ɛkanin in e low ab ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ɛy obi ɛm a, si bɛbm sos eke si k’ibi’r gbuŋ ke l’ów l’ok aŋa."
Gbɛkɔ Pɔl lisijɔw iyŋ nyam iri asre ut a ec’odad a. N’im l’ɛy frutu lakp ab ɛm l’ɛwar ɛyu.
Ow ɔŋ Pɔl ɛsŋ srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wl ŋgbafrɛli na ŋ e kumada a ogŋ; n’ɔny low eke li ki dad ow."
Srɔda eyŋ ec’anym ɛs a oc’r ab im kumada a ogŋ ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Pɔl, sobel ɛm ɛs a ɛsŋ’m ɛtŋ dad’m eke mi k’is’ŋ ŋgbafrɛli na, n’ɔny low eke li dad’ŋ."
Kumada a ɔny ŋgbafrɛli a abu ab im saw ɛm, ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Bla odad iy ki dad’m ee?"
Li dad ninɛ: "Jwifɛl nɛny okr af eke efi k’ibrm’ŋ oc Pɔl ow Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ ec’any af; -n’am iwr -li dad eke Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a in am ɔl eke in k’ɛkan low ab ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn.

Gbɛkɔ k’ùb ɛl nawrɛ! Aŋke ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ ekŋ yony ek’afŋ es b’ow lɔl es ɔny’n. -L’ɛgŋ -l’eb -l’ij nɛny eke -li k’ijmn ob, -l’ɛgŋmn mij toŋ ke -l’ibi ow. Caca ɛm a, -li bɛbm sos, -n’am eku ŋ ec’odad ebl cɛ."
Li dad ŋgbafrɛli a ninɛ: "Kì dad odad na eke dad’m a k’ok ɛgŋ kaka." Ɛtŋ kumada a ɛlu’l es n’im.

Ow e jam a, kumada a ɛsŋ in e srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ɛm e yony ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Àsr srɔda eyŋ agŋ ekŋ lɛw, gbaŋkɔ af uyu ɛsɛl agŋ ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw, lele mpioro ɔwl ɛsɛl agŋ ekŋ lɛw ab luku ke ɔny fɛŋ bɛ́bmn sos imn Sesare ncebles e wanci libarm ɛm.
Sigbaŋkɔ a yɛji eke k’oc Pɔl im sɛnyn sɛnyn es ɛw ɛs Felis ogŋ a, bɛ̀bmn ɛl sos."
Ɛtŋ kumada a nɔn lɛl na:
"Klod Lisias am ɛsŋn in ec’es ɛw ɛs mamn Felis.
Jwifɛl ɔny ɛgŋ na aam ibi; eke m’iri eke l’el Rom iy tasi a, m’im ɛm e srɔda eyŋ ab ab m’ɛdŋn in abu any ɛtŋ m’eb m’ɛlu’l es.
Eke m’erur eke mi k’uw low a sosiɛm eke Jwifɛl am ok’r ów af ab any a, m’oc’r m’im ɛl e Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af.
M’ɛkn eke ów a eke -n’am dad -l’ok ow af a, el ɛl obi ɛm ec’ol a ec’ów, gbɛkɔ wɛl ɔtum ɛŋnm low ɔbr ek’ow ɛm li k’ɛŋn luw oglog ke wɛl ɛlu’l sobel ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke wɛl ɛwar’m eke Jwifɛl am ut in ec’asre a, m’erur eke mi k’oc’r m’is ŋ ɛtŋ m’ibrm agŋ a ek’am ok’r ów af a eke k’ɔŋ’n dedeku ŋ ec’any af."
Srɔda eyŋ a ɛlum ol a eke wɛl ɔŋ ɛl a: -l’oc Pɔl ɛtŋ ncok ɛm -l’ɛwl ow toŋ -l’ok Antipatris.
Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, srɔda eyŋ a ek’im lakr ɛm a, ɛwl ow frutu lakp ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɛlu gbaŋkɔ af uyu ɛsɛl ab es aam usu a Pɔl ab.
Eke -n’imn -l’okr Sesare a, gbaŋkɔ af uyu ɛsɛl a oc lɛl a ɔŋ es ɛw ɛs a ɛtŋ -l’oc Pɔl -l’ɛlu ow abu ɛm.
Es ɛw ɛs a awl lɛl a ɛtŋ ibrm Pɔl wus yec’af ec’ɛgŋ eke li k’el a. Eke l’iri ek’ow el Silisi wus af ec’ɛgŋ a,
li dad ow ninɛ: "Ŋ ec’agŋ a ek’am ok’ŋ ów af a b’ow ow a, m’ow m’ibrm’ŋ low." Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɛw Pɔl es Erɔd ec’êl gbɛl ab ɛm.
Sɛgŋ yen b’ɛc a, egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Ananias ow Sesare agŋ ekpekp bɛb ab lele awoka nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Tɛrtulus ab. -L’ow es ɛw ɛs Felis ec’any af eke -li k’ɔŋ Pɔl dedeku.
Wɛl ɛsŋ Pɔl, ɛtŋ Tɛrtulus am ok’r ów af sodad amua ɛm: "Es ɛw mamn, ŋ e nin ɛm, s’am ir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ ŋ e nyimn sɛnyn ɛm anake ów amua tititŋn akpl ɛy ec’ɛb na ec’a.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, usu fɛŋ ec’ów eke si b’ɛŋn a, s’am ɛlu’ŋ ow e bia ɛrm nyam ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ m’erurm eke mi k’irmn’ŋ lɛgŋ nɔnɔ, na sosiɛm anake m’am ŋɔŋn ŋ ek’ɛrm k’ɛy ŋ es, ke íri ɛy ec’odad a; ow k’ow ibnm.
S’ɛkn ek’ɛgŋ na el ɛgŋ ɛm e nuŋuŋ: li b’is odad wus na nimum eci Jwifɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’el Nasariɛl ec’ogog a ec’es ɛw ɛs.
L’ɛw eke li ki ŋuŋn Nyamel gbɛl a sos; ow sosiɛm s’ɛw’r abu af. [S’erur eke si ki jɛj in e low s’ok ɛy ec’ol ab ɛm,
kɔ kumada Lisias ɛdŋn abu any ɛtŋ lɛc ɛm l’eb ow ɛy ec’abu ɛm.
N’ɔŋ abusu eke agŋ a ek’am ok’r ów af a k’ow ŋ ec’any af.] Eke ibrm’n low, ɔtu eke ŋ obi yɛji k’uw low a tasi ek’ow sosiɛm s’am ok’r ów af ab any."
Jwifɛl a akr lebl af, dad ek’ow el low nawrɛ.
Es ɛw ɛs Felis ɔwl Pɔl abu eke ki dad odad ɛtŋ Pɔl eb odad dad ninɛ: "M’uw any eke akpo nɔnɔ ɛm el ɛb na eci jɛj ok ɛs, ow anake m’ɔny ɔmn ke m’am ow ŋ ec’any af eke mi k’ayal sos a.
Ɛsɛ elel eke ɔtu eke ŋ obi k’otar akr ab af a, ow kokm sɛgŋ lɛw yony afŋm es eke m’ow Jerusalɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ eci.
Wɛl ɛŋnm im m’atarm ów es Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, ɛtŋ m’okm dedeku a al ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu oglog ɛb ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, agŋ amua k’ɔtum ayalm ów a eke -n’am ok’m af a e low.

Gbɛkɔ low na gbɛ, ŋ ec’any af, m’am m’ɛgŋ m’eb: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a ec’us ɛm a, ke ɛm lagŋɛl e Nyam a anake m’am igŋ nuŋ a. Jwifɛl bi dad ek’ow el ejagb yadŋ, kɔ ɛm m’ub ol e silɛl a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ab nawrɛ.
M’ɔny ɔmn ikŋ na Nyam ɛm, ɔmn a eke ɛl obi yɛji -n’ɔnyn, eke Nyam b’ow igbm agŋ amamn lele eŋuŋ ab luw ɛm a.
Na sosiɛm anake m’am atr sos es eke mi kokrm ɛm sosi ów af Nyam ec’any af lele agŋ ec’any af ab a.
Eke m’ɔpi Jerusalɛm akpo nɔnɔ a, m’ɛwl mɛny m’im eke mi k’ɛlum ɛm ec’ɛb a abu os ɛm, ke m’áp Nyam ob.
Eke -n’ɛŋan’m Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ke m’uwar sos ayal ec’es gbɛgbl a ŋ̂; agŋ nɔnɔ anm ɛm ab, ɛtŋ sɔ́g yɛji anm.
Gbɛkɔ Azi eci Jwifɛl nyam nyam anŋ yogŋ, ɛtŋ blel -n’ɔnyn low ɛm ab, ɛl anake blel -n’inym es ŋ ec’any af aŋa ke -l’ok’m ów af a.
Oglog ek’agŋ amua ek’anŋ aŋa a ɛkn low ŋuŋ eke mi kok lɛgŋ a eke m’anŋ Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af a, -l’ɔtu eke -li ki dad.
M’inym es ɛl ec’any af m’igbl lebl ogŋ mi dad eke m’ub luw ɛm anŋ igb e low nawrɛ; kɔ low na cɛ eci anake yɛfɛnyna wɛl inymn’m es ɔny ec’any af jɛj ok ec’ab ee?"
Felis ek’iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu eci ejagb owi a ok es sos ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn a, oc jɛj ok a ɛw lɛgŋ ɛjeci ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ eke kumada Lisias b’ow ow a, m’ow mi dad ɔny ec’odad a."
N’ɔŋ srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs a abusu eke k’ɛw Pɔl es sobel ɛm, gbɛkɔ l’ɛw ow abusu es eke ow lawlɛl a ki kok ow e lís e low.
Sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a, Felis lele ɛy Drusiy Jwif yɔwi ab ab ow. N’ɔŋ wɛl ɛsŋ Pɔl ow ɛtŋ n’am iri ɔmn eke ow ɔny Jesu Krist ɛm a ec’odad.

Gbɛkɔ eke Pɔl ɔb nuŋ am dad es an mamn ec’odad, sos es ɔnyn e low lele jɛj ok e lɛgŋ e low ab a, ow am ɔr Felis ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Sica ɔtu eke k’im gɔŋ. Lɛgŋ eke m’ow m’ɛŋn abusu a, m’ow m’ɛwl m’ɛsŋ’ŋ."
In ec’ɔmn ɛm a ke Pɔl b’ow ɔŋ’n os; na sosiɛm anake sakp nɔnɔ li b’ɛsŋ Pɔl ow ot nɛnym in ab a.
Ɛbɛn ɛbɛn a cɛ toŋ akpo yony ɛc, ɛtŋ Pɔrsius Fɛstus usr Felis usu ɛsɛ es ɛw ɛs af. Eke Felis erur eke k’eb sɔdŋ Jwifɛl ogŋ a, l’ɛw Pɔl es sobel ɛm.
Sica Fɛstus ow ɛy in eci wus ab af eb juma; kpɛkŋ ek’ow ij sɛgŋ nyahan a, l’igb Sesare l’uyu n’im Jerusalɛm.
Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ec’any ɛsɛl tasi ab ab ow in ogŋ a am ok Pɔl dedeku es. -N’am at -l’ibrm ow
eke ow k’ɛgŋ ɛl nɛnym ɔŋ Pɔl ow Jerusalɛm; tasi ɛm a, -l’ut Pɔl ec’asre ɛtŋ -l’erur eke -li k’ibi ow ejagb us ab ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ Fɛstus dad ninɛ: "Pɔl anŋ sobel ɛm Sesare ɛtŋ; ɛm obi yɛji ow k’ow ibnm m’ow m’ɛwl m’im yogŋ.
Ow akpl ke ɔny e any ɛsɛl a ów ɛwl’m Sesare ke ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na kok low ŋuŋ a, ókar ir dedeku es."
Fɛstus kok sɛgŋ niwn oglog sɛgŋ lɛw cɛ ɛl ab, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’im Sesare. Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, n’im jɛj ok ɛm ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc Pɔl ow.
Eke Pɔl ow a, Jwifɛl a ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm ow a, ɛlul il ɛm ɛtŋ am ɔny yadŋ ɛgbɛl ok’r af ek’ɛl obi yɛji -l’ɔtumn eke -li k’ayal.
Gbɛkɔ Pɔl am dogŋn sos dad ɛsɛ: "Mi kokm low ɔbr kaka Jwifɛl ec’ol a e lís, Nyamel gbɛl a e lís lele Sesar e lís ab."
Fɛstus ek’erur eke k’eb sɔdŋ Jwifɛl ec’any af a, ibrm Pɔl ninɛ: "Erur eke k’im Jerusalɛm wɛl jɛj low na ok ɛm ec’any af ee?"
Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Aŋa eke m’inym es a, el Sesar eci jɛj ok usu nyam, ɛtŋ aŋa anake wɛl ki jɛj ɛm e low ok a. Ɛsɛ elel eke ŋ obi ŋ obi uw any ab af a, mi kokm Jwifɛl low ŋuŋ kaka.
Eke mi kok low ek’ow ɛm mi k’uw, ke m’ɛgbrm eke mi k’uw. Gbɛkɔ eke ów a eke -n’am dad -l’ok’m af a elm nawrɛ a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ocm im ɔɔm ɛl. M’am ibrm eke mi k’ɛkn Sesar!"
Sica eke Fɛstus dad ów in ec’ów ɔm ɛsɛl ab ab bake ow uwr a, li dad ninɛ: "Ibrm eke k’ɛkn Sesar, b’ow im in ec’any af."
Sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a, ɛb ebu Erɔd Agripa lele lisijɔw Berenis ab ow Sesare eke k’ɛsŋn Fɛstus.
Eke -n’anŋn yogŋ -li kokr sɛgŋ nɔnɔ a, Fɛstus dad Pɔl ec’odad ok Agripa. Kin odad a: "Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ aŋa eke Felis ɛw es sobel ɛm.
Eke m’im Jerusalɛm a, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab ok’r dedeku es ɛtŋ ibrm eke mi k’ɔb’r low.
Mi dad ɛl eke ow ɛcam Rom eyŋ ab eke k’ɛlu ɛgŋ eke wɛl am cicr ab es ɔŋ agŋ eke ok’r dedeku es a, eke l’ɔbarm any wɛl ab; ow it eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n abusu li dad in e cicr a ec’odad yɛ.
Ow sosiɛm -l’ow aŋa ɛm ab ɛtŋ m’irmnm lɛgŋ; eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, m’im jɛj ok usu a ɛtŋ m’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc ɛgŋ a ow.
In eci cicr ɛsɛl a ow, gbɛkɔ -li cicrm ow ów eŋuŋ a ek’ow ɛm m’ɔny tutr a e kaka af.
-L’atar ów es ow ab ɛl obi eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi ɛm lele ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jesu eke uw ke Pɔl am at dad eke ow’n n’anŋ owr a e low af.
M’uwm elel eke mi ki kokr low nɛnɛ ɛm ab any; na sosiɛm anake m’ibrm Pɔl eke k’im Jerusalɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke yogŋ wɛl jɛ́j low na ok a.
Gbɛkɔ Pɔl ɛgŋm; l’ibrm eke li k’el sobel ɛm ɛs toŋ ke Sesar ɔny low dad’r. M’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɛw’r es toŋ ke m’ɔ́ŋ’n n’im Sesar ogŋ a."
Agripa dad Fɛstus ninɛ: "M’erur tasi ek’ɛm obi yɛji mi k’iri ɛgŋ na nɛnym." Fɛstus dad ninɛ: "Efi b’ow iri’r nɛnym."
Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, Agripa lele Berenis ab ow agŋ ek’us any ab ɛtŋ ok luku as usu a ec’arabu ab ɛm kumadaɛl lele ɛb ab ɛm ec’any ɛsɛl ab. Fɛstus ibrm eke wɛl k’oc Pɔl ow.
Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛb ebu Agripa lele ɔny fɛŋ eke anŋn aŋa ɛy ab a, am ɛkan ɛgŋ na: in sosiɛm Jwifɛl nɔnɔ ow ɛkn’m Jerusalɛm lele aŋa ab, ɛtŋ am dad ek’ow’n k’ánm owr ij.
Ɛm gbɛ, m’ɛkn eke li kokm low kaka ek’ow ɛm li k’uw. Gbɛkɔ eke in obi l’ibrm eke li k’ɛkn Sesar a, m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke mi k’ɔŋ’n n’im yogŋ.
M’ɔnym low tasi eke mi ki nɔn in e nuŋ af m’ɔŋ Sesar; na sosiɛm anake m’oc’r m’ow ɔny ec’any af, ŋ ɛb ebu Agripa ec’any af tasi, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl b’ibrm’n low, ke m’ɔ́ny low nyam mi nɔn.
Ow am ɛw’m es adŋ sos ɛm eke tasi ɛm a, wɛl k’oc sobel ɛm ɛs im Rom, ke wɛl k’ayalm ów a sosiɛm eke ow af wɛl am cicr’r a!"
Erɔd Agripa dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Abusu ɛru’ŋ es eke ki dad odad dogŋn sos." Ɛtŋ Pɔl igbl abu ogŋ am dogŋn sos sodad amua ɛm:
"Ɛb ebu Agripa, sos ɛm am iŋn’m eke yɛfɛnyna mi k’ow ŋ ec’any af mi dad odad mi dogŋn sos ów a fɛŋ eke ow af Jwifɛl am cicr’m a eci.
Tasi ɛm a, uw Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ir owi lele ɛl eci ów es atar ab ab any. Ow sosiɛm, m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ eke k’iri ɛm ec’odad a ɛrm es ok ɛm.
Ɛm eci ŋgbafrɛ ɛm ɛtŋ ec’es eke m’an a, Jwifɛl fɛŋ uw any; -l’uw elel eke nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ m’iir ɛm ec’ɛbr a ec’araŋn lele Jerusalɛm ab ab any.
-L’uw’m any lɛgŋ kpekpe; eke -l’erur, -l’ɔtu eke -li ki dad low nawrɛ: m’el Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’ɛgŋ ek’ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi ɛw tuɔtuɔ akm ɛl lawlɛl a fɛŋ ec’a.
Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm m’anŋ jɛj ok ec’any af aŋke m’ɔny ɔmn Nyam e low a ek’ɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl ɛw es ab ɛm.
Ɛy ec’eb lɛw yony a ec’agŋ a yɛji am ɔmn ɛwar na eke k’ɛy ɔkm; ow sosiɛm -n’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ ari at ɛm, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab. Ɛb ebu Agripa, ɔmn ikŋ na sosiɛm ec’anake Jwifɛl am ok’m ów af a!
Ɔny Jwifɛl, ke Nyam ígbm agŋ luw ɛm a, bla ɛtŋ am ubr ek’ow el low ek’ɔtu ee?
Ɛm obi yɛji, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, m’ɔny tutr eke akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm ow akpl eke mi k’ogŋ Nasarɛt e Jesu e nin a ar.
Low na anake mi kok Jerusalɛm a. Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ɔŋ’m abusu akpasu mum nyam eke mi k’ok ɔmn ɛsɛl nɔnɔ sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ mi b’ɛlu abusu es lɛgŋ eke wɛl b’ɔb ɛl low luw ec’a.
Sakp nɔnɔ mi b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu m’ɔŋ wɛl ijr ɛl gbre yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔwr sar ɛl ec’ɔmn ɔny ab ɛm. Ɛl ec’ɛrm bebl eke m’ɔny a agb nɔnɔ, toŋ ow b’ɔŋ m’im sɛb ɛjec’ɛm m’ijr ɛl gbre."
"Ɛbɛn lɛgŋ nyam egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’im Damas mi kok juma.
Ɛb ebu Agripa, m’us ejagb ɛtŋ lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm a, m’ɛkn usuayl ek’anŋ afr am ɛjn ow; jɛjn a afŋn ligbn ec’ab es, ɛtŋ am ok ɛm lele agŋ a eke ɛl ab m’us ejagb ab ab af.
Ɛy fɛŋ s’ok wus ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’am ikŋ dad’m Ebre ɛm ɛsɛ: 'Sɔl, Sɔl, bla ɛtŋ am ijr’m gbre ee? Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɛlu lɛc ɔkm ɛsɛ id eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs b’iyr likŋ af ee? Lɛc ɔfr ɔfr cɛ am ij.'
M’ibrm m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bwo el ŋ ee?' Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm Jesu a eke am ij gbre a.
Sica ìgb inym es. M’ɛlu sos ɔkm mi yɛgm’ŋ eke mi k’oc’ŋ el ɛm e juma kok ɛs; b’ow ij ɛm e daŋku dád ok agŋ elel eke ɛkan’m yɛfɛnyna, ke dád yec’a eke ɛmɛny m’ow mi yɛgm’ŋ a yɛji.
M’ow m’ɔsu’ŋ Jwifɛl ec’any af lele agŋ ɛjec’a eke m’ow m’ɛrm’ŋ ɛl ogŋ ab ab ec’any af.

M’am ɛrm’ŋ eke k’im fig fig ɛl anyamn, ɔny ot ɛl es ncebn ɛm ot ok ɛl usuayl ɛm, Satan ec’abusu ab ɛm eke -n’anŋn a ot ɔŋ ɛl Nyam. Eke -li b’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn ɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap lele es sig usu nyam agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’ab ab.' "
"Ɛb ebu Agripa, ɛbɛn a, es ɛkn owi a ek’anŋ afr ow ke m’ɛkn a, m’ɛgbrm ow e low ij.

Kɔ m’ikŋ anym mi dad Nyam odad m’ok Damas ec’agŋ a lele Jerusalɛm ec’ab ab, Jude ec’agŋ a lele ɛb ɛjec’ɛm ec’agŋ ab; ɛl fɛŋ, m’ibrm ɛl eke -li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm, -l’ɛwl -li lɛr Nyam, ke -li kok ów eke bi yɛgm ɛl ec’itŋn ikŋ na tasi a.
Na sosiɛm anake Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a eke m’anŋ a, Jwifɛl ɔny’m ke ɔl eke k’ibi’m a.

Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔsu’m toŋ it yɛfɛnyna ɛtŋ m’anŋ eke mi k’ij daŋku agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af, k’ow el agŋ ek’ɔny any, k’ow el agŋ ek’ɔnym any. Mi dadm odad ɛjeci ek’ow elm kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lele Mois ab ec’a eke dad eke b’ow ɛy a cɛ:
Mesi a b’ow ij gbre, b’ow el ɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ek’igb luw ɛm, b’ow ɔb usuayl a e kokoba ok ɛy ec’ɛb a lele ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a."
Eke Pɔl am dad ów in e sos dogŋn ec’a, Fɛstus barm’n es lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Pɔl, nuŋ ɛm am uŋ’ŋ! Wewr lɛl nɔnɔ toŋ ow am ɛw’ŋ nuŋ ɛm uŋ!"
Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, nuŋ ɛm uŋm’m. Sodad a eke m’am dad a el nuŋ ɛm es ok e sodad lele low nawrɛ tasi ab.
Ɛb ebu Agripa otar ów amua akr uw any, ow sosiɛm in ec’any af m’ɔtu eke mi ki dad ɔmn ɛm. M’uw any tasi eke l’uw ów a fɛŋ any, aŋke ow elm es lɔl ɛm e low.
Ɛb ebu Agripa, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad a eke dad a ub nawrɛ ee? M’uw any ek’ub nawrɛ!"
Agripa dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Am tutr eke lɛgŋ tɛl na ɛm cɛ ɔtu eke k’itŋn’m m’el kretiɛn ee?"

Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "K’ow él lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm oglog sɛgŋ nɔnɔ ɛm, m’am ŋɔŋn Nyam ek’ow k’élm ŋ sɔny cɛ, kɔ ɔny fɛŋ ek’am irir ɛm ec’odad yɛfɛnyna a anake k’anŋn ɛsɛ elel eke m’anŋn ab af a, kɔ ŋgbraka amua gbɛ k’ánm ɛm!"
Ɛb ebu a, es ɛw ɛs a, Berenis lele agŋ a eke -n’anŋn yogŋ ab ab igb,
ɛtŋ eke -n’imn saw ɛm a, -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na kokm low ɔbr owi ek’ow ɛm li k’uw, oglog k’ow ɛm wɛl ɛlu’l sobel ɛm."
