Ɛtŋ Agripa dad Fɛstus ninɛ: "Blel ɛgŋ na ibram eke k’ɛkn Sesar ana, ke blel wɛl ɛ́lu’l es."

Sica wɛl ɛgŋ eb eke si b’ow s’im Itali mijɛtŋ ɛm eci. Wɛl oc Pɔl lele sobel ɛm ɛsɛl ɛjeci bɛb ab abul srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Julius. L’el Rom eci srɔda eyŋ a ec’eb a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Sesar Ogust eci eb' a ec’anym ɛs.
S’ok Adramit eci mijɛtŋ nyam eke k’imn Azi e manu a ec’a, ɛtŋ s’im. Aritak yɛji anŋ ɛy ab; l’el Tesaloni, Maseduan wus af a ec’ɛgŋ.
Eke lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’ow s’ok Sidɔn. Julius eke am ɔny Pɔl sɛnyn sɛnyn a, ɔŋ’n abusu eke li k’im l’ɛkn lawlɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl kók in e lís e low.
Eke ɛmɛny s’anŋ yogŋ s’igb s’aam a, s’aru Sipr lekr a eke b’ɛdŋn lɛf any a, aŋke lɛf am ɛlu ɔbr ɛy.
S’ubr okij a eke titm Silisi wus lele Panfili wus ab a, ɛtŋ s’im s’ok Mira, Lisi wus af.
Yogŋ, Julius ɛŋn Alesandri eci mijɛtŋ nyam ek’aam Itali ɛtŋ l’ot l’ok ɛy ɛm.

S’us mij pɛtɛ pɛtɛ sɛgŋ nɔnɔ ɛtŋ gbre ɛm kpa, s’im s’ok Nid baŋn any af. Eke lɛf a yɛbm ɛy eke si k’ɔkŋ any s’im kpekpe a, s’ɛcr wus a ek’usm owr Salamone ɛb a ec’a s’ok Krɛt lekr a ec’esr ɛm a eke b’ɛdŋn lɛf any a.
Gbre ɛm ɛbɛn, s’aru ligigl a s’im s’ok usu nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Manu Amamn, ek’anŋ Lase baŋn saw.
S’irmn lɛgŋ nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ mij us a yɛji am ɛw tuɔtuɔ aŋke lakpo am uwr. Ow sosiɛm Pɔl am ɛwar ɛl dad ɛsɛ:
"Agŋ lawlɛl, m’am ɛkn eke usu im a b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ: mijɛtŋ a lele sɛrɛkp ab ab b’ow uŋ, ɛtŋ ɛy obi yɛji s’ɔtu eke si k’uw."
Gbɛkɔ srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs a ɔny ɔmn mijɛtŋ nyimn ɛs a lele mijɛtŋ ɛs ab ab ɛm akm Pɔl e sodad a.

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny nanu a akplm eke lɛtŋ k’anŋ yogŋ lɛfr lɛgŋ iy na ɛm. Na sosiɛm agŋ nɔnɔ a ek’anŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a erur eke k’igb yogŋ: -l’erur eke -l’ɔtu, ke -n’im -l’ok Fenis, Krɛt eci nanu nyam eke ɔkŋ esr ɛm eci nɛmn ogog a lele afr ɛm eci nɛmn ogog ab ab. Yogŋ anake -li k’anŋ -l’uwar lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a.
Esr ɛm eci lɛf a am ɛlu pɛtɛ pɛtɛ, ɛtŋ -n’am tutr eke ɛl eci tutr a b’ow ɛy af. -N’ɔŋ mijɛtŋ a aam ɛtŋ am aru Krɛt eci ligigl a saw saw.
Gbɛkɔ wanci ab af cɛ lɛf ligbɛl nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'afr ɛm e lidr ogog e lɛf' anŋ lekr a e mafɛny ab ɛm am ɛlu ow.
Lɛf a oc mijɛtŋ ab ab aam: ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ eke wɛl k’ɔny mijɛtŋ ab es, ɛtŋ si yɛb ow oc ɛy ab im.
S’ɛcr esr ogog eci lekr liy nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Koda a, ɛtŋ ow ɛdŋn ɛy abu any. Gbre ij kpa ɛm, s’ɔtu s’ɔny es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ likekli a ek’ucur mijɛtŋ gbɛl a.

Mij ɛsɛl a ɛwl oc ɛlu’l mijɛtŋ ab ɛm. Sica -l’oc meb -li cucu mijɛtŋ gbɛl a -l’ɛlul ɛm. Eke -n’am uru eke li k’im -l’itr es mrici af Libi ogog a, -l’ɛlu dondo nuŋ a erŋ ɛtŋ -li yɛb lɛf a am oc ɛl ab im.
Lidgbegb a abu anŋ ɛm am ɛlul ɛy tuɔtuɔ toŋ lɛgŋ ɛnyn ɛy ɛtŋ -n’am ot sɛrɛkp a -l’ok erŋ.
Lɛgŋ b’ɛny akr af a, ɛl obi ec’abu ɛm -l’ot mijɛtŋ a e mob a -li wɔwl erŋ.
Sɛgŋ nɔnɔ eke wɛl ɛknm ligbn, ɛknm mílɛ́l ɛtŋ lidgbegb a abu anŋ ɛm am ɛlu lɛc ɛm cɛ. S’ɔnym ɔmn kaka eke si b’ow s’ɔtu s’anŋ owr.

Lɛgŋ kpekpe ek’agŋ a ek’us mij a ijm ob kaka. Pɔl igb ɛl ec’any af ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Agŋ lawlɛl, blel irir ɛm ec’odad a eke m’am dad eke si k’ókmn ɔkm Krɛt a, ke blel s’ɔbrmn es abur na, s’irmnmn mob.
Gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, m’am ibrm eke k’ɔnyn ɛrm susu, aŋke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow irmnm in e sel a, kɔ mijɛtŋ a sɔny coco cɛ b’ow uŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, ncok a ɛm e Nyam a eke mi bi kok in e juma a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow’m saw
ɛtŋ dad’m ninɛ: 'Pɔl, erŋn k’ɔ́ny’ŋ! Ow it eke k’im Sesar ec’any af, ke Nyam ec’erur a eke ɔny ŋ ec’a sosiɛm, li sɔ́g agŋ a ek’us mij ŋ ab a.'
Na sosiɛm, agŋ lawlɛl, ɔ̀nyn ɛrm susu aŋke m’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm: ow b’ow el ɛsɛ elel eke li dadr’m ab af.
Gbɛkɔ si b’ow s’uŋ s’inym es lekr nyam af."
Ncok lɛw yar ɛm eke s’anŋ mij af ke lidgbegb a am oc ɛy ab im Mediterane eci okij ab af ana. Ncok eci lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm, mij ɛsɛl a am ɛkn ɛsɛ wus cɛ wɛ’n am titm af.

-L’ɛlu meb eke wɛl ucu ob leg leg erŋ eke -li ki bɛbmn ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn eke mij a eci sibn a ij abu likŋ lele lɛw lɔbŋ ab; -li b’im kpekpe tɛl a, ɛmɛny -l’ɛlu meb a erŋ ɛtŋ yogŋ ow ij abu likŋ lele niwn ab.
-N’am uru eke mijɛtŋ a k’ɔb lob, ow sosiɛm, lɛtŋ jam a -l’ɛlu magbis yar ɛrŋ eke -li k’ɔny lɛtŋ ab es, ɛtŋ -n’am eku es ogŋ ɛm eke lɛgŋ k’ɛny.
Mij ɛsɛl a am ɔl eke k’ok ɔkm lɛtŋ ab ɛm; -l’usm es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ ab es erŋ ɛtŋ -n’am ub nyandrɛ -l’ɛsɛ: "S’aam lɛtŋ a ec’anym a s’ucur lɛtŋ es ɔnyn ob ab es."
Gbɛkɔ Pɔl dad Julius lele srɔda eyŋ a ab ab ninɛ: "Eke agŋ amua anm mijɛtŋ ab ɛm, k’ow ɔtumn anmn owr."
Ow sosiɛm, srɔda eyŋ a bubr simeb a ek’ɔnyn es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ ab es a ɛtŋ -li yɛb ow im.
Gbuŋ ke usu ót es a, Pɔl ibrm ek’agŋ a fɛŋ k’ij ob ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kin, yɛfɛnyna ab a, sɛgŋ lɛw yar eke am ekur ɛrm mij ab ke k’ijmn ob kaka.
M’am ibrm eke k’ijr ob aŋke ow el ɔny e sel ɛŋn eci. Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow irmnm in e sin nuŋ a e nyam."
Eke li dad ów amua uwr a, l’oc futufutu, l’ɛlu Nyam bia wɛl ec’any af, l’ubr ɛm ɛtŋ n’am ij.
Agŋ a fɛŋ sos at es ɛtŋ ɛl yɛji -l’ij ob a.
Ɛy fɛŋ eke s’anŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a, s’ij agŋ ekŋ yen yen sakp yony agŋ ekŋ nyahan agŋ lɛw nɔhɔn.
Eke -l’ijr ob molok iy ɛl a, -l’ot egb a eke -l’otr ab -n’aam a -l’ok erŋ eke mijɛtŋ a k’ɛw fuɛfuɛ.
Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, mij ɛsɛl a uwm wus a eke -li titmn ab any, gbɛkɔ -n’am ɛkn wus ek’usm ɛw lɔy k’ɛlu mrici ɛtŋ -l’erur ek’abusu ɛru es, -l’itr mijɛtŋ ab es yogŋ.
-Ni mɔmu magbis ab es -l’ok erŋ, ɛtŋ -ni mɔmu mɛtŋbar eke wɛl bi nyiman lɛtŋ a e simeb a yɛj’es. Ɛbɛn a, -l’ɛw gbad lɛtŋ nɛny a eke lɛf k’itr lɛtŋ a, ɛtŋ -n’imn mrici a ogŋ.
Kɔ -n’im -l’ɔbr sɛc ek’anŋ mij any yony ec’araŋn ɛtŋ mijɛtŋ a abal inym es yogŋ. Lɛtŋ anym a ɛmn mrici ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɔtum iim ij, ɛtŋ mra am bɔbm lɛtŋ jam ab es lɛc ɛm.
Srɔda eyŋ a am erur eke k’ibi sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ábŋm mij ɛym ɔkm.
Gbɛkɔ Julius a am erur eke k’eb Pɔl ɛlu es, ɛtŋ l’ɛdŋn wɛl eke -li ki kokmn low a eke -n’ɔnyn ow e tutr a. N’ɔŋ agŋ a eke b’abŋ mij a abusu eke k’ikŋ anym ok erŋ im ákpaf;
agŋ likpr a ot ɔgɔg og oglog mijɛtŋ a eci mob ekpr a us ɛl jam. Ɛbɛn ek’agŋ a fɛŋ im itr es ke sos irm es ana.
Eke sica s’ok ɔkm es abur na ɛm a, s’iri eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ lekr a Malt.
In ec’ɛb eyŋ a eb ɛy sɛnyn sɛnyn, ɛtŋ eke mij am an ok wus ke lɛfr yɛji am ow a, -li fuf al ligbɛl nyam ek’ɛy fɛŋ s’iwr s’ɛlul ɛm.
Pɔl oc milɛl eke wɛl abal eke k’ok al, kɔ al a ɔŋ lorŋn ɛy ɔkm arum’n abu ab.
Eke lekr a ec’agŋ a ɛkn lorŋn ek’arum Pɔl abu ab a, -n’am dad ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na ɛgŋ ibiu tasi; l’ɛy ɔkm okij ab ɛm, kɔ Nyam ɛm e jɛj ok a ɔɔm abusu eke li k’anŋ owr."
Gbɛkɔ Pɔl ufŋ abu es ɔwl lorŋn a alm, ɛtŋ ob kaka kokm’n.
Agŋ a am eku eke k’ɛkn’n l’ew oglog l’ɛy luw kpru ɛm. Gbɛkɔ eke -l’ekur ow ibn ke -l’ɛkan eke ob kaka kokm Pɔl a, -l’itŋn tutr ɛtŋ -n’am dad ek’ow el nyàm mum nyam.
Saw yogŋ, lekr a ec’es ɛw ɛs gbɛl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Publius a ec’usu anŋ. Ɛgŋ ikŋ na eb ɛy erur ɛm ɛtŋ ɔŋ ɛy es ɛru usu toŋ sɛgŋ nyahan.
Publius ɛs a ɛru es aŋke lɛfr ɔl am ɔny’n ɛtŋ n’am ɔs sob yɛji. Pɔl im ɛkn’n, at’r abu nuŋ, ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔŋ’n ɛtŋ ewlm’n.
Na b’ɛc a, lekr a ec’ɔ́lu ɛjec’a yɛji ow ɛtŋ -l’ewl.
Agŋ a ɛlu ɛl ec’ɛlum fɛŋ ɔkm ɛy e lís, ɛtŋ wanci a eke s’am ow s’igb s’im a, -n’ɔŋ ɛy ob fɛŋ ek’it usu imn ec’a.
Eke ow kok awl nyahan a, s’eb Alesandri eci mijɛtŋ nyam eke anŋ lekr ab ɛm lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a nimum a s’im. Wɛl b’ɛsŋ mijɛtŋ a 'Sinyam Oli'.
S’ow s’ok Sirakus ec’ɛb ab ɛm, s’anŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ nyahan.
Yogŋ s’ɛcr ligigl a eci s’im s’ok Rejio ɛb ɛm. Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, esr ɛm eci lɛf a ɔb nuŋ am ɛlu ɛtŋ s’eb sɛgŋ yony s’im s’ok Pusɔl.
Ɛb ab ɛm, s’ɛŋn agŋ lisijimɛl ek’ibrm eke si k’anŋ ɛl ab sɛgŋ lɔbŋ, ɛtŋ sica s’igb s’aam Rom.

Rom ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a iri ɛy ec’amani ɛtŋ ow toŋ ok usu eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Apius ec’An Ɔl Usu a ɛy ec’ɔbr eci. Agŋ ɛjeci ɛŋn ɛy usu eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ɛŋanin Usu Nyahan a. Eke Pɔl ɛkn ɛl a, l’ɛlu Nyam bia ɛtŋ sos at’r es.
Eke s’ow s’ok Rom a, wɛl ɔŋ Pɔl abusu eke k’ir in ogŋ a ke srɔda iy nyam am ɔsu’r.

Ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, Pɔl ɛw Rom eci Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a abu in ogŋ a. Eke -l’asr luku a, Pɔl dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, mi kokm low ŋuŋ ɛy ec’agŋ a e lís, ɛy lagŋɛl a ec’ɛb ir owi e lís ɛtŋ wɛl ɛw’m abu af Jerusalɛm, oc’m ɔŋ Rom eyŋ.
-L’ibrm im ów ɛtŋ -l’erur eke -li k’ɛlu’m es aŋke ɛm ɛm a, -n’ɛŋnm low ek’ow af -li k’ɔb’m low luw eci.
Gbɛkɔ Jwifɛl a erurm ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ m’ibrm eke mi k’ɛkn Sesar ke wɛl ebr ɛm ec’odad ab ɛm, kɔ ow elm ɛm ec’ɛb a eke mi k’ɔŋ dedeku eci.
Kin low a sosiɛm eke m’erur eke mi k’ɛkn ɔny ke mi dad ɔny odad a. Tasi ɛm a, m’anŋ ŋgbraka na ɛm ɛgŋ a eke Israɛl ec’agŋ a b’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a sosiɛm."
-Li dad ow ninɛ: "S’ɛŋnm ŋ e lís e lɛl kaka eke k’anŋ Jude ow ɛtŋ ɛy lisijimɛl kaka anm yogŋ owm tɔkŋm ów okm ɛy oglog dadm ɛy ŋ ec’odad ŋuŋ.
Kɔ s’am erur eke ki dad low yec’a ek’am tutr a s’iri, aŋke s’uw any ek’usu a fɛŋ agŋ erurm Nyam eb na ek’anŋ ɛm a e low."

-L’ɛw lɛgŋ nyam Pɔl ab ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a b’ow a, -l’ow nɔnɔ -n’ɛŋn ow yogŋ a eke l’ir a. Ibribr toŋ ncebles, Pɔl am otar ów a akr ok ɛl: n’am dad wɛl Nyam ec’ es ɛw a ec’odad ɛtŋ Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl a eke n’am dad ow ec’odad ab ɛm, n’am ɔl eke li k’eb wɛl Jesu eci.
Agŋ bɛb ów a ok es sos ɛm, kɔ likpr a ɛgŋm eke k’ub nawrɛ.
Ɛl ɔfr ɛm a nɛny okrm ɛl af, ɛtŋ -l’igb -n’aam. Pɔl dad ɛl odad na ninɛ: "Abŋ Lala ɔny low ij tasi lɛgŋ a eke n’am dad ɔny lagŋɛl odad kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi e nɛny ɛm l’ɛsɛ:
Ìm dad agŋ amua a: Ow b’ow ok ɔny ɔru ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow irimn; b’ow lɛɛr sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow ɛknmn.

Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua itŋn ɛw tuɔtuɔ; -li babl ɔru es, -li bubur anyamn, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl eci anyamn a k’ɛ́knm es, ɛl ec’ɔru a k’írim ów, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a k’ánm es, -l’ɛwlmn -l’owmn ɛm ogŋ bake m’éwlm ɛl."
Pɔl igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Sica úwr any eke Nyam eci sel ɛŋn ec’odad a ow agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci: ɛl gbɛ, -li b’ow -l’iri!" [
Eke Pɔl dad ów amua a, Jwifɛl a ɛl ɔfr am atar ów es im lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm.]
Pɔl anŋ êl a eke l’eb ab ɛm akpo yony. Li b’eb agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛkn’n a.
Li bi dad Nyam eci es ɛw a ec’odad ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm agŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist owi ɔmn ɛm tasi, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛdŋnm’n.
Ɛm Pɔl Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs, ɛm m’am awŋ ɔny lɛl na. Nyam ɛsŋ’m eke mi k’el ɛrm ɛs ɛtŋ l’oc l’ɛw’m saw eke mi k’ɔb in ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba.
Amani Mamn na, Nyam ɛcr in e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɛm ɛwar ow e low god’ɛtŋ in eci Silɛl lala ab ɛm.
Amani Mamn a am dad Jim Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad. Yec’ek’el in e mew ɛm ec’a, wɛl ew’r ɛb ebu David, lagŋ ec’eb ab ɛm.
Eke Abŋ Lala igbm’n luw ɛm a, Nyam yɛgm eke l’el Nyam ec’Iy ek’ɔny abusu fɛŋ.
Jesu Krist kok’m bibm m’el ɛrm ɛs, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e nin a e sos usr sosiɛm a, m’ɔ́ŋ ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ec’agŋ eke uwm Nyam any a, úb’r nawrɛ ke ɔ́ny in ec’ɛlum.
Ɔny yɛji, anŋn agŋ amua ɛm, eke Jesu Krist ɛsŋ ɔny a sosiɛm.
Ɔny fɛŋ eke anŋn Rom a, ɔny eel Nyam ec’ɛrm erur ɛtŋ l’ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’ow anŋn in ec’agŋ ab ɛm, ke íir ɛb in eci. Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy!
M’am ikŋ anym m’ɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm m’ɛlu Nyam bia, ɔny fɛŋ eci, aŋke wɛl am dad ɔny ec’ɔmn a ec’odad wus nimum af.
Tasi ɛm a, eke mi b’ɔb Nyam Jim ec’Amani Mamn a, ke Nyam eci juma anake m’am kok ɛm ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm a. Ɛtŋ in, l’ij ɛm e daŋku eke m’ɔ́pim ɔny ec’ɔkn ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn fɛŋ ɛm.
Mi b’ibrm’n sɛgŋ fɛŋ eke li k’ɔŋ’m abusu m’ow ɔny ogŋ a, eke ow el in ec’erur tasi,
aŋke ɔny ec’ɛkn am aw’m tasi yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ísm ɔny Abŋ Lala eci ob ap ab, ke ínymn es kikri.
Nawrɛ tasi ɛm a, k’aw ke mi b’ow m’ɛŋn ɔny a, ɔmn a eke ɔny lele ɛm ab s’ɔny a, ɔ́ŋ ke s’átarir sos es.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’erur eke k’uwr any eke sakp nɔnɔ mi tutr eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, kɔ toŋ sicaca ɛm a, m’ɔtum m’ɛŋnm ow ec’abusu. M’am ɔmn eke ɛm e juma a, ɔny ogŋ yogŋ yɛji b’ow ɔsu ey amamn ɛsɛ ɛbr ɛjec’ɛm ec’ab af.
Ow it eke mi ki kok agŋ fɛŋ e juma, Grɛkɛl lele Barbarɛl ab, agŋ ek’uw low any lele agŋ eke uwm low any ab ab.
Ow sosiɛm anake, ow am aw’m tasi eke mi k’ɔb ɔny Amani Mamn e kokoba, ɔny yɛji eke iir Rom a.
Tasi ɛm a, Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb a ɔ́nym im ɛ́s, aŋke l’el Nyam e lɛc ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a e sɔg eci: krɛkrɛ ɛm a Jwifɛl, ke sica agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji.

Amani Mamn a bi yɛgm elel eke Nyam b’ocr agŋ nyim nyim in ec’any af a: ow b’ɔb nuŋ ɔmn a eke -li b’oc -l’ɛlu ow ɛm ab ɛm ɛtŋ ow b’uwr ɔmn ab ɛm cɛ. Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl ɛm a wɛl b’awl: Ɛgŋ yec’ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a b’ow anŋ owr in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu ow ɛm a sosiɛm.
Afr kpekpe ɛtŋ Nyam am ɛlu in ɛc’ɛrm bebl a ɔkm aŋke agŋ el sikpl ɛsɛl ɛtŋ -li bi kok low ŋuŋ. Ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ kok ab ɛm, -li b’ɛdŋn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke ki kok low.
Ɛɛ, low eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’uw any Nyam e lís a, ayl ɛl eci, aŋke Nyam in obi ayal ɔŋ ɛl.

Nyam ec’abusu a ek’ɔnym nuŋ a lele fɛŋ a eke in obi in obi a l’el ab ab a, el ów nawrɛ eke wɛl ɛ́knm. Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke wɛl kok wus a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔtu eke k’ɛkn ɛl eke li bi lɛr ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a. Ow sosiɛm a, agŋ ɔnym sos dogŋn eb kaka ij.

Tasi ɛm a, -l’uw Nyam any, kɔ -l’usrm ow sos ɛtŋ -n’ɔɔm ow bia. Ke ow tasi ek’ow it eke wɛl ki kok Nyam ec’ana. Kɔ ɛl e sow tutr a itŋn el nyamb e sow tutr, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’ɛrm a eke low any uw anm ɛm a, irmn usuayl a.
-Li b’ocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛwru, kɔ -l’el eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl.
Ow a eke -li k’igŋ anygbɛl e Nyam a ek’úwm a nuŋ a, -l’igŋ ekŋ ekpr nuŋ. Ekŋ ekpr amua wɛl aku ɛl n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke b’uw, oglog ɔr, oglog mindey ek’ɛli akr yar lele morŋn ab af.
Ow sosiɛm a, Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -li kok ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm ec’ów eke b’aw ɛl a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ɛl obi ɛm, -li b’ibar ɛl eci sos megl a ɛ́s ɛm.
-N’ɔny Nyam e lís e low nawrɛ a -l’itŋn ów yadŋ ɛm, yec’a eke Nyam kok a -l’igŋ ow nuŋ ɛtŋ -li kok ow e lís owi Kok Ɛs a ec’usu a. Anygbɛl él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -l’usr ów aw a eke b’ɔŋ ɛl ɛ́s a jam a. Ɛl ec’ɔyɔw a ɛ́ruam egŋ ab ij, kɔ ɔyɔw ɛjec’ab -li b’ɛru, ɛtŋ ow el low eke wɛl am kokm agŋ ɛm.
Egŋ yɛji bi kok low nyam a cɛ. -L’ɛruamn ɔyɔw ab ij, kɔ ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ec’erur b’aw ɛl. -Li b’ɛru ɛl egŋ ɔfr ɛtŋ ow el ɛ́s! Ow ɔŋ -li b’ɛŋn ɛl obi ɛm a es abur eke ɛl eci es an ŋuŋ a ism ab.
Eke -l’erurm eke -li k’uw Nyam any a, Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -l’us ɛl eci sow tutr yadŋ a jam, ɛtŋ -n’am kok yec’ek’itm eke wɛl ki kok a.

Ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony iy ɛl ɛm gbɔŋ. -Li bi kok low ŋuŋ, -li b’erur ob ek’el ɛl lawlɛl ec’a, -l’el agŋ eŋuŋ ɛtŋ nyamnɛyr iy ɛl ɛm gbɔŋ. -Li b’ibi agŋ, -li b’atar ów es, -li b’ɛju ɛl lawlɛl ɛtŋ -li bi kok low mɛju ec’abŋ ab. -Li bi dad ów eŋuŋ -l’ok agŋ af,
ɛtŋ -li bi cacak wɛl. -L’el Nyam ec’efnu, -li bi wɛwr ɛl lawlɛl, es ɛfu iy ɛl ɛm, -li b’ij nɛny, ɛtŋ -li b’ɛcr akunda fɛŋ ɛm -li kok low ŋuŋ. -L’ɛluamn agŋ a eke ew ɛl a.
-L’el anyambu, -l’ɛluamn ɛl eci nɛny eke -li b’ij a, ɛtŋ -l’el agŋ eke ɔnym ɛrm lele sɔrŋ ikŋ ab.
Ke -l’uw Nyam eci jɛj ok ab any tasi cɛ. Agŋ a eke bi kok nɛnɛ a it eke k’uw. Sica -li bi kok ów amua, kɔ ɛmɛny, -li b’erur agŋ a eke bi kok a yɛji.

Ow sosiɛm anake, ŋ eke bi jɛj awlŋɛl ec’ów ok a, ke él Jwif, ke k’élm Jwif, ŋ ec’a ɔnym sos dogŋn eb kaka, aŋke ŋ bi jɛj awlŋɛl ec’ów ok, kɔ bi kok ɛsɛ ɛl af! Na sosiɛm, eke bi jɛj ɛl ec’ów ok a, ow el ŋ sosi eke am ɔbr low.
Ɛɛ, ɛy s’uw any eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a el tasi agŋ eke bi kok nɛnɛ a e lís.
Ŋ bi jɛj agŋ a eke bi kok ów amua a ok, gbɛkɔ bi kok ɛsɛ ɛl af! Ŋ am ɔny ɔmn tasi eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a k’ow ɔbm’ŋ low ee?
Nyam ɔny ɛrm mamn, li b’ɛgŋ low l’eb, ɛtŋ li b’eku low. Kɔ na anake erurm ab ee? Kɔ ŋ, uwm any eke Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn na am ɔŋ abusu eke k’itŋn ŋ ec’es an ab ee?
Gbɛkɔ k’erurm eke k’iri, k’erurm eke k’itŋn. Na sosiɛm anake am eb ɛrm bebl ligbɛl ɛw es ŋ e lís ɛrm bebl e lɛgŋ a ec’a. Lɛgŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɛlu ɔkm eke nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm li bi jɛj agŋ ec’ów l’ok.
Ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ów eke kok a e yec’a ek’it a.

Agŋ bɛb b’ucu ɔny es kok low mamn, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’anŋ Nyam ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm. -Li b’ɔl yɛj’eke Nyam ki susm ɛl es, ɛtŋ -li b’ɔl owr anŋ a eke úwrm ab es. Agŋ amua, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɛl -n’anŋ owr in ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Agŋ bɛb b’ɔbr’r any, -l’ɛluamn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam kɔ -li bi yɛb low ŋuŋ am nyimn ɛl. Agŋ amua ec’a, Nyam b’ow yɛgm ɛl in ec’ɛrm bebl ligbɛl a.
Gbre lele erŋn ab b’ow ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ eke bi kok low ŋuŋ a, ow b’ow ɔb nuŋ Jwifɛl ɛm, ke ow ɛ́ŋn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
Sica Nyam ec’anygbɛl a, es susm a lele ɛrm es ɛy ab ab, li b’ow n’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke bi kok low mamn a, ow b’ow ɔb nuŋ Jwifɛl ɛm, ke ow ɛ́ŋn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam okm ereb agŋ ɛm.
Agŋ a fɛŋ eke am kok sikpl ke úwm Mois e sol ab any a, b’ow uw eke -l’uwm ol ab any yɛji. Gbɛkɔ agŋ a fɛŋ eke uw Mois ec’ol ab any ke ɛbɛn yɛji am kok sikpl a, ol a b’ow jɛj ɛl e low ok.
Bwo ec’ɛgŋ Nyam b’oc ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af ee? Ow elm agŋ a eke b’iri Mois ec’ol a nɛnɛ cɛ a. Njaŋ, kɔ agŋ eke b’ɛlum ol a.
Agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl a uwm Mois ec’ol ab any. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb bi kok ɛsɛ elel eke ol a bi dad ab af. Agŋ amua -l’uwm ol any, gbɛkɔ ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ol a cɛ wɛl yɛji wɛ’n uw any af.

Aŋa ɛm a, -li bi yɛgm low nyam: ów a eke ol bi dad a nɔn ɛl ec’ɛrm ab ɛm, sow tutr eke -li b’ɔny ɛl obi ɛm a b’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm. Sakp oglog ɛl e sow tutr a bi dad eke -l’uwm kok, ke sakp bɛb ec’a wɛl dad eke -l’uw kok.
Ów amua fɛŋ eke mi dad a b’ow ok ɔkm kpata jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, ɛsɛ elel eke Amani Mamn na eke m’am ɔb a am dad ab af. Lɛgŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm jɛj fɛŋ a eke lɔl es agŋ ec’ɛb ir ɛm a e low ok.
Ŋ eke b’ij en ɛsɛ in Jwif a, ol af anake b’eb lɛc a ɛtŋ ntotŋ b’ok’ŋ ŋ e Nyam a eci.
Ŋ uw yec’a eke li b’erur ab any, ɛtŋ ol b’ɛlum’ŋ abu sɔsum yec’a eke akpl a oc.
Ŋ bi tutr eke ɔtu eke ki nyimn ány eflu, ke él agŋ ek’anŋ ncebn ɛm a ec’usuayl,
agŋ ek’uwm low any a lel ɛl ek’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm ab ab eci low yɛgm ɛs. Ɛɛ, ŋ bi tutr eke ol eke ɔny a ɔŋ’ŋ ɔny low any uw lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam tasi ab.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ŋ eke bi yɛgm awlŋɛl low a, ám yɛgmnm’ŋ sosi low! Ŋ bi dad eke ɛgŋ k’iy mil, ke ŋ ám iy!
Ŋ b’ɛdŋn nfaci ij, ke ŋ ám ij. Ŋ b’ɔny sinyam yadŋ eci sifn, kɔ b’iy ɛl e Sinyamel ab ɛm e simob a!
Ŋ ntotŋ b’ok’ŋ ol ek’ɔny a eci, gbɛkɔ ɛ́luam ol, ow b’ɔŋ ɔny Nyam ec’any a oc es.
Tasi ɛm, kin yec’eke wɛl b’awl Nyam Lɛl ɛm: ɔny sosiɛm, agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl a bi yayr Nyam e nin a.
Eke bi kok low yec’a eke ol bi dad a, ke nawrɛ tasi likr es ubr el low akplu. Kɔ eke ɛ́luam ol, ɛtŋ ubr likr es bɔbɔ yɛji, anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke ubrm es ab af.
Kin low nyam: ɛgŋ nyam ubrm likr es, gbɛkɔ li b’ɛlum Nyam ec’ol a. Kɔ Nyam k’ow ɛgŋm ebm’n ɛsɛ likr cɛ ow’n ubr es af ee?
Ɛgŋ ikŋ na ubrm sos megl af e likr es, gbɛkɔ li b’ɛlum ol. Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, in anake li b’ow li jɛj ŋ owi l’ok, ŋ eke ɛluam ol a. Ke ŋ nana ɔny ol a eke wɛl nɔn a lele likr es ubr ab!
Tasi ɛm a, Jwif tasi a, elm ɛgŋ a eke b’an es sos megl af ɛsɛ Jwif af a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr tasi a yɛji, elm sos lɛl a eke wɛl b’ubr es a.

Kɔ Jwif tasi a, in l’el ɛgŋ a eke el Jwif ɛrm ɛm a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr tasi a, el ɛrm ɛm ec’a. Likr es ubr na, Nyam ec’Abŋ ab ɛm li b’anŋ l’ow, kɔ ow elm ol eke wɛl nɔn ab ɛm. Jwif tasi a ɛ́ŋnm in ec’aw a agŋ ɛm, kɔ Nyam ɛm li b’ɛŋn.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke bla lowi Jwifɛl ɔny eke agŋ likpr a ɔnym ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ ob nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛŋn likr es ubr ab ɛm ee?
Ɛɛ, wɛl bi lɛr ɛkn a, ob ligbɛl anŋ ɛm! Aŋke Jwifɛl anake Nyam ikŋ anym abul in e sodad ebl a.
Kɔ sica, eke Jwifɛl bɛb ijm nɛny nyam, ke ow b’ow ɛdŋn Nyam eke k’ij nɛny nyam ee?

Njaŋ ow k’ow elm ɛbɛn! Kin yec’ek’it eke si k’uw any: Nyam el nɛny nyam ɛs, kɔ agŋ a fɛŋ anake el ayadŋu a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad Nyam e lís ninɛ: Ow it eke wɛl k’uw’ŋ any nyim nyim ŋ e sodad ebl ɛm. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl bi jɛj ŋ owi ok, ke ɔ́ny low ij jɛj ok ab ɛm.

Kɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam bi tutr eke low ŋuŋ eke s’am kok a am ɛlum abu wɛl ɛkn eke Nyam el nɛny nyam ɛs, wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad ɛsɛ Nyam ijm nɛny nyam eke li b’ɔr ɛy in ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm ab ee? (Aŋa m’am dad odad ɛsɛ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ af.)
Njaŋ ow k’ow elm ɛbɛn! Tasi ɛm a, blel Nyam ijm nɛny nyam, ke ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki jɛj wus e low l’ok ee?
Ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu eke ki dadr in sosi ɛsɛ: eke ɛm eci yadŋ ab ɛm Nyam e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a b’ɛy ɔkm kpata in ec’anygbɛl a eci, ke sica bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ, ɛm, ɛmɛny m’ɔny es abur ɛsɛ sikpl ɛs af ee?
Ow otarir es eke wɛl ki dad ɛsɛ: "Si kók low ŋuŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke low nimamn ánŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm!" Agŋ bɛb b’ok ɛy ów af ɛtŋ bi dad ɛsɛ low na anake ɛs bi yɛgm a. Ow it eke agŋ amua na k’ɛŋn gbre.
Sica ayaf s’ɔtu eke si ki dadr a? Kɔ ɛy Jwifɛl, s’agb s’akm agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ee? Njaŋ ow elm ɛbɛn! M’ikŋ anym m’ɛlu low nyam ɔkm: Jwifɛl lele agŋ a fɛŋ eke elm Jwifɛl ab ab anŋ sikpl ec’abu ɛm.
Ɛtŋ kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Ɛgŋ kaka anm eke el nyim nyim, ɛgŋ nyamni bɔbɔ yɛji anm!
Ɛgŋ kaka ɔnym nuŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́lm Nyam es!
Ɛl fɛŋ -n’ŋgboŋ ejagb mamn ab af, ɛtŋ -n’uŋ ɛl fɛŋ. Ɛgŋ kaka am kokm low mamn, ɛgŋ nyamni bɔbɔ yɛji!
Ɛl eci ɛmn geg a el uwɔmu eke anŋ foŋ; ɛl eci anm ab ɛm li b’ewl mɛju, ɛtŋ ɛl eci nɛnym lokm a, labŋ eci sar a anŋ.
Ɛl e nɛny ab ɛm ofn e sodad lele sodad eke bi bubm ɛgŋ ew es ab iy gbɔŋ.
Ɛgŋ ibi ec’a, -li b’uru es fafa -n’im -l’ibi.
-Li bi ŋuŋn ob fɛŋ ɛl eci ejagb ab af ɛtŋ -li b’ewl gbre usu a fɛŋ.
Ɛl, -l’uwm ɛrm es ɛy eci ejagb ab any,
ɛtŋ -l’el agŋ eke ɔnym Nyam ec’ɛlum kaka.
Gbɛkɔ s’uw any eke low fɛŋ eke ol am dad a, ow el agŋ a eke k’ɛlum ol a n’am dad. Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum dogŋnm sos, kɔ wus nimum ɛy udu Nyam ec’any af.

Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ yec’eke k’ɛlum Nyam ec’ol a e low fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm a, ke ow sosiɛm Nyam óc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af a, ɛgŋ kaka k’anm eke k’ɔtu kok ɛbɛn a. Tasi ɛm a, ol, low nyam cɛ li bi kok: li b’ɔŋ agŋ abusu uw any eke -n’ɔny sikpl.
Sica gbɛ, Nyam ɛlu elel eke li b’ɔŋ ɛy s’el nyim nyim in ec’any af ke ow élm ol eci ɛlum ɛm a ɔkm. Ɛtŋ Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab yɛji dad ow e low.
Nyam b’ɔŋ agŋ él nyim nyim in ec’any af ɛl ec’ɔmn a eke -li b’oc -l’ɛlu Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm. Li bi kok low na n’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɔny ɔmn Krist ɛm a, aŋke ɛl fɛŋ -l’el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ:
ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɔny sikpl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́tum kokm low sɔbɔ a eke Nyam am ibrm a iym nɛny.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, b’ɛcr Jesu Krist eke bi sɔg ɛl sikpl ec’abu ɛm a, ɔŋ ɛl -l’el nyim nyim ɔfr ɛm.

Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es eke Jesu k’ok in e mebl ab es egb waw ɛm. Ɛtŋ in ec’egb waw ab ɛm, Jesu ɛŋn agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a e sikpl a ec’oc ap. Nɛnɛ a, Nyam erur eke ki yɛgm elel eke l’el nyim nyim sɛgŋ fɛŋ a: lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, l’eku low ɛtŋ l’ɛwm low n’ɔɔm agŋ ɛl e sikpl a eci. Kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, Nyam am yɛgm elel eke li b’ɔŋ agŋ el nyim nyim in ec’any af a. Tasi ɛm a, n’am erur eke li k’el nyim nyim ke n’ɔ́ŋ agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm a yɛji él nyim nyim.
Sica, kɔ s’ɔny ów ɛjeci eke ow ɛm si k’ɛw sos ee? Njaŋ, ow anm ij! Bla sosiɛm ec’ee? Aŋke yec’eke el ow tasi a, ow elm ol ec’ɛlum a, kɔ ke ɔ́ny ɔmn.
Ɛɛ, kin ow eke s’am tutr a: agŋ b’el nyim nyim aŋke -li b’ɔny ɔmn, kɔ ow elm eke -li bi kok ol ec’ów a fɛŋ ek’am ibrm a sosiɛm.
Sica Nyam na, kɔ Jwifɛl sɔny cɛ eci Nyam l’el ee? Kɔ l’elm agŋ ɛjec’a gbɛ e Nyam ee? Kaka! L’el ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ a yɛji e Nyam,

aŋke Nyam nyam coco cɛ anŋ. In anake li b’ow n’ɔŋ Jwifɛl eke wɛl bubr ekr es a, él nyim nyim ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny in cɛ anake li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ a eke wɛl bubrm ekr es a yɛji él nyim nyim ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a.
Nɛnɛ a, eke si b’ɔny ɔmn, ke ol ob ɔfr ɔfr s’am ɔŋ’n l’el ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Kɔ ol ec’any a nana anake s’am ɛlu ɔkm tasi a.
Sica bla lowi s’ɔtu eke si ki dad Abraham ɛy lagŋ eci lís ab ee? In obi e lɛc ɛm, bla obi l’ɔtu n’ɛŋn ee?
Blel ow el in ec’ów eke li kok a sosiɛm Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ana, l’ɔtu eke li k’ij nɛny, kɔ ow elm Nyam ec’any af gbɛ.
Tasi ɛm a, bla Nyam Lɛl dad ee? Abraham ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
Eke ɛgŋ bi kok juma a, wɛl bi sɔg’r labm. Labm sɔg na elm ob ap, kɔ ob ek’it eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n.
Sica, ɛgŋ nyam kí kokm juma kaka, ke n’ɔ́ny ɔmn Nyam eke b’ɔŋ sikpl ɛs él nyim nyim ab ɛm, ɛgŋ ikŋ na, Nyam b’oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, in ec’ɔmn a eke n’ɔny a sosiɛm.
Na sosiɛm anake David am dad ɛgŋ a eke Nyam b’oc ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, ke ow élm in ec’ów kok sosiɛm a e low ɛsɛ:
Ehe ɛsɛl a el agŋ a eke Nyam ɔny ɛl ec’ów ɔbr oc es, ke tɛtŋ ɛl eci sikpl ab es a.
Ehe el ɛgŋ a eke Nyam úsm in e low ɔbr e low jam a eci.

Kɔ ehe na, Jwifɛl eke bi bubr ekr es a sɔny cɛ ec’ee? Agŋ ɛjec’a eke am bubrm ekr es a ɛl gbɛ ow elm ɛl ec’ee? M’ikŋ anym mi dad m’ɛsɛ: Abraham ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.

Ɛtŋ kɔ bogŋ e lɛgŋ ɛm Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ee? Kɔ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke l’ubr likr es a, oglog ow a eke li k’ubrm es ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke l’ubr likr es a, kɔ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke li k’ubrm es a.

Gbuŋ ke l’úbr likr es a, ke Abraham el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af ŋ̂, in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu ow ɛm a sosiɛm, ɛtŋ sica ow e jam a, n’ɛŋn likr a eke l’ubr es a eci mɛny ɛwr. Ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr na bi yɛgm eke in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm a sosiɛm ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af. Nɛnɛ a ow ɔŋ Abraham el agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm a ec’ɛl ɛs, eke -l’ubrm likr es yɛji. Ɛtŋ agŋ amua ek’ubrm likr es a, Nyam b’oc ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.

Ɛtŋ Abraham cɛ, el Jwifɛl eke bubr ekr es a ec’ɛl ɛs. Aŋa m’erur eke mi ki dad agŋ eke ɛl eci likr es ubr a elm sos af eci cɛ, kɔ ke ɛmɛny b’ucu ɛy ɛs Abraham eci sɛwl a ɔny es a e low: in, l’ikŋ anym l’oc ɔmn l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm gbuŋ ɛtŋ l’ow l’ubr likr es.

Nyam ɛwar Abraham lel in ec’alaw a eke b’ow ok ɔkm in ɛm a, eke -li b’ow -l’ij wus aja. Gbɛkɔ low ɛwar na, ow elm eke Abraham ɛlum ol a sosiɛm Nyam dadm ɛwm es. Li dad aŋke l’oc Abraham ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ow ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
Sica eke aja a eci ij a el ke kók ol ec’ów a eke am ibrm a, ke ɔmn elm low kaka, ɛtŋ Nyam eci low a eke ɛwar a yɛji elm low ij.
Tasi ɛm a, ol ec’ɛluam a b’ɛsŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl, kɔ eke ol anm a, wɛl k’ɔtum ɔbm ol es.

Ow sosiɛm a, ɔmn eke wɛl b’oc ɛlu Nyam ɛm a anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ij aja a, ɛtŋ ow el bibm eke wɛl b’ɛŋn ɔfr ɛm tasi. Na sosiɛm ob a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es a el agŋ a fɛŋ eke el Abraham ec’alaw a eci. Ɛtŋ ow elm agŋ a eke b’ɛlum ol a sɔny, kɔ agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ Abraham eke el ɛy fɛŋ eci ɛy ɛs af a yɛji.

Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Mi kok’ŋ el bieku nɔnɔ ec’ɛl lagŋ. Abraham el ɛy ɛs Nyam ec’any af. Ow ɛm anake n’ɔny ɔmn a, Nyam a eke b’ɔŋ agŋ eke uw a igb anŋ owr, ke ɔny abusu eke ob ek’anm wɛl ɛ́knm a, kok ow anŋ wɛl am ɛkn a.

Low ɔmn kaka anm low a eke Nyam ɛwar a eci lís ij, gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji Abraham ɔmn cɛ. L’oc in ec’ɔmn a l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm, l’el bieku nɔnɔ ec’ɛl ɛs. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Agŋ eke b’ow anŋ ŋ ɛm ok ɔkm a b’ow ɛny nɔnɔ.
Ɛtŋ eke ow anŋ akpo tɛl cɛ ke n’ɔny akpo ekŋ yen a yɛji, in ec’ɔmn a digrm kaka. Ɛtŋ l’uw any yɛj’eke in e sos megl a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke uw af, ɛtŋ ɛy Sara yɛji k’ɔtum ewm iy ij.
Ɛbɛn yɛji, Abraham irmnm in ec’ɔmn a ɛtŋ bɛbarm kaka, Nyam e low ɛwar a e lís. Catŋ nana anake in ec’ɔmn a obn ke li kɔklm Nyam a.
L’uw low nyam gbɛ any tasi: yec’a eke Nyam ɛwar a, n’ɔny abusu nɔnɔ eke li ki kok.
Na sosiɛm Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af.
Ba Nyam Lɛl bi dad ɛsɛ: Nyam oc Abraham ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, ke sodad amua elm Abraham cɛ eci.
Kɔ ɛy yɛji ow ot ɛy es, ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow lɛr ɛy ec’ɔmn a. Tasi ɛm a, in eke l’igbm ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu luw ɛm a, in ɛm s’ɔny ɔmn.
Ɛy e sikpl a sosiɛm Nyam ɔŋ wɛl ibi Jesu, gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke s’él agŋ nyim nyim.
Nɛnɛ anake Nyam oc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a; ɛtŋ sica s’anŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm in ab, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
Jesu anake kok ke s’ɔtu s’ucu ɔmn ɛm, bibm eke s’ɛŋn a s’ɔny es a. Ɛtŋ s’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm aŋke s’am ɔmn eke si b’ow s’anŋ Nyam ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm.
Ow eke akpl tasi a el, si b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm eke ow el gbre s’am ij yɛji. Ɛtŋ s’uw any tasi eke gbre ij b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɔny ɛrm susu,
ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ɔny ɛrm susu a, li b’ij lɛc eke ses babur b’anŋ yɛji. Ɛgŋ eke b’ij lɛc es abur ɛm a, li b’ɔny low ɔmn,
ɛtŋ low ɔmn na ɛ́jum ɛgŋ. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala ɛm Nyam ɛcr yibr ɛy e mɛrm a in ec’erur a.
Tasi, eke s’anŋ ke s’ɔnym lɛc kaka sikpl ec’any af a, yogŋ anake Krist ɛgŋ eb uw ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl eci, lɛgŋ ab af eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw es a.
S’uw any eke ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ eke ɛgŋ k’ɛgŋ eb uw ɛgŋ nyim nyim eci. Sica ów amamn kok ɛs ec’a, k’aw ke ɛgŋ átr sos es ɛgŋ eb uw.
Gbɛkɔ kin elel eke Nyam yɛgm ɛy in ec’erur eke n’ɔny ɛy ec’a: n’ɔŋ Krist ow uw ɛy eci, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke s’el sikpl ɛsɛl a.
Sica, eke in ec’egb waw a ɔŋ ɛy s’el agŋ nyim nyim, ow ayl tasi yɛj’eke li b’ow li sɔg ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a e lís.
Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke s’el Nyam ec’efnu a, n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm in ab Jim eci luw ab ɛm. Sica eke n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm a, ow ayl tasi yɛji eke li b’ow li sɔg ɛy Jim eci sel ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ! Ɛy si b’oc ɛy eci sos ɛm iŋn a s’ɛlu Nyam ɛm ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm, in eke sica n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm Nyam ab a.
Ɛgŋ nyam sosiɛm anake sikpl ow wus af aŋa a. Ɛgŋ a el Adam. Ɛtŋ sikpl ism luw ab. Ɛtŋ luw ɛbmn agŋ fɛŋ es, aŋke agŋ fɛŋ ɔny sikpl.
Gbuŋ ke Nyam ɔ́ŋ Mois ol a, ke sikpl ikŋ anym anŋ wus na ŋ̂. Gbɛkɔ eke ol anm a, Nyam usm sikpl e low jam tasi.

Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, igŋ Adam e lɛgŋ ab ɛm toŋ Mois a, luw eb wus nimum ɔnym ab. Ɛtŋ agŋ eke kokm sikpl eke otarir es Adam ec’a eke ɛgŋm ɛluam Nyam ec’odad a yɛji, luw b’ibi ɛl. Adam anake el ɛgŋ a eke k’ow a eci any ɔkŋnin a.

Gbɛkɔ ereb ligbɛl anŋ Nyam ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a lele Adam eci sikpl ab ab ec’araŋn. Ɛɛ, Adam, ɛgŋni nyam a eci sikpl a sosiɛm cɛ anake agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl uw a. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a leg nɔnɔ ligbɛl. Ob ap na, Nyam ɛcr ɛgŋ nyam ɛm ɛlu’l ɔkm. Ɛgŋ a in l’el Jesu Krist. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, n’ɔmun in eci ów amamn ab es ɔfr ɛm agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl af.

Nyam ec’ob ap a bi kok low eke otarm es ɛgŋ nyam a eci sikpl a ec’ab ab. Tasi ɛm a, Adam ɛgŋni nyam a eci sikpl a e jam a, Nyam eci jɛj ok a el ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ úw. Gbɛkɔ, kin eke ɛl e sikpl nɔnɔ gbɛl a e jam a, Nyam ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a ɔŋ ɛl -l’eel agŋ nyim nyim.

Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ nyam cɛ kok sikpl ɛtŋ luw ibi agŋ fɛŋ ɛgŋ nyam a cɛ e sikpl a sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ, Jesu Krist ɛgŋ nyam sosiɛm cɛ agŋ fɛŋ ɛl yɛji b’ɛŋn ów nɔnɔ Nyam e lís: -li b’ɛŋn Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ligbɛl a, ɛtŋ ow eci ob ap ɔfr ɛm a b’ɔŋ ɛl -l’el agŋ nyim nyim ow ec’any af. Krist sosiɛm, -li b’ow -n’anŋ owr ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɛw es ow ab.

Ow eke si ki dad s’uwar a el, s’am ɛkn eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ eci sikpl a eke kok a anake is agŋ fɛŋ e luw a. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛgŋ nyam eci low nyim nyim e kok a, ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam oc agŋ fɛŋ ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af, ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ wɛl sel.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ɛgŋm eke k’ɛlum Nyam, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl el sikpl ɛsɛl. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛlum Nyam a sosiɛm, agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af.
Sica ol ow, ɛtŋ sikpl ɛny eb es nɔnɔ ligbɛl. Gbɛkɔ yogŋ a eke sikpl ɛny eb es a, Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a b’ɛny bubu af.

Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, sikpl ɔny abusu fɛŋ eke k’ɔŋ agŋ uw. Ɛbɛn lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ɔny abusu fɛŋ eke k’ɔŋ agŋ el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, s’ɔtu eke si k’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr Nyam ab, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kɔ sikpl ow it eke abu k’anŋ ɛy ɛm s’am kok yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a ám ɛny bobn ee?
Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Ɛy s’ɛcr luw eke ɔny kpab ɛy es sikpl e lís ab ɛm. Ayaf ɛmɛny s’ɔtu eke si k’ir sikpl ec’ɛb ee?
Ɔny uwr any tasi eke: eke wɛl ok ɛy mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm a, yogŋ ɛtŋ s’okr af in e luw ab ab.
Ow sosiɛm, eke wɛl ok ɛy mij nuŋ a, s’uw ɛtŋ wɛl oc ɛy es in ab. Gbɛkɔ, Nyam ec’anygbɛl ec’abusu ligbɛl a igbm Krist agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy yɛji, s’ɔ́ny ɛb ir owr.
Tasi ɛm a, s’okr af nimum in ab lɛgŋ a eke s’uw in ab a. Ɛbɛn cɛ, si b’ow s’okr af in ab lɛgŋ a eke ɛy yɛji si b’ow s’igb luw ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke l’igb ab af a.
S’írir low na sɛnyn sɛnyn: ɛy ec’elel eke s’anŋn anym ɛm a, wɛl oc lele Krist ab ɔbm olikŋ. Ow ɔŋ, sikpl a eke anŋ ɛy ɛm a uŋ, ɛtŋ s’elm in eci madu ij.
Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ eke uw a anm sikpl e low ɛm ij.
Eke sica s’uw Krist ab a, s’ub nawrɛ eke ow el in ab si b’ow s’anŋ owr.
S’uw any tasi eke lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke Krist igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, li k’ow l’uwm ij, ɛtŋ luw ɔnym abusu kaka in af.
Krist uw, ɛtŋ in e luw a ɔny kpab’r es sikpl e lís nimum nimum, akp nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Sica n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ in ec’owr anŋ a nimum el Nyam eci.
Ɔny yɛji, ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ agŋ eke sikpl ec’abusu a ɛwm es ij, ke Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm am ir ɛb Nyam ec’af.
Ɔny, sikpl ɔtum eke k’ɔny abusu ɔny af ij. Ɔny eci sos megl a b’ow uw lɛgŋ nyam. Ow sosiɛm, ow itm eke k’ɛlumn in ec’ów eŋuŋ a eke b’aw’r a ij.

K’òcr ɔny eci sos a eci susu susu a k’ɛwr es sikpl eci, ɛsɛ ejagb eke ɛru es low ŋuŋ kok ec’af. Kɔ nana, òcr ɔny nimum kokr Nyam e low, ɛsɛ agŋ ek’anŋ luw ɛm igb anŋ owr af. Òcr ɔny eci sos a eci susu susu a ɛwr es ɛsɛ ejagb eke ɛru es low nyim nyim e kok ec’af.
Sica eke ow elm ol ɛwm ɔny es ij, ke ow el Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab anake ɛw ɔny es a, sikpl k’ɔtum ɔnym abusu ɔny af ij.
Nawrɛ, ɛy ow elm ol ɛwm ɛy es ij, kɔ Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ɛw ɛy es. Ow sosiɛm a, kɔ abusu ɛ́ru ɛy es eke si ki kok sikpl ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!

Ɔny uwr any tasi eke, eke b’ɛgŋn ebr am kokr ɛgŋ eci juma ɛsɛ madu af a, ɔny eel ɛgŋ a eke am ɛlumn a eci madu. Ow sosiɛm a, oglog ɔny eel sikpl e madu, ke sikpl óc im ɛlu ɔny luw ɛm, oglog ɔny eel Nyam e madu, ke ɔ́nyn ɛb ir nyim nyim in ec’any af, aŋke b’ɔnyn in ec’ɛlum.
S’ɔ́ŋ Nyam bia! Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɔny eel sikpl eci madu. Jam aŋa ɛm a, ɔny ɛgŋn ebr eke k’ɛlumn ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, Amani Mamn a eke wɛl babul agŋ fɛŋ a.
Ɔny dogŋnin sos ebr sikpl ec’abu ɛm ɛtŋ am kokr low nyim nyim eci juma.

M’am oc agŋ ɛm e low mi bɛbmn aŋke ɔny eci low iri a b’ɔtu nɔnɔ. Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛsɛ madu af, ɔny ocr ɔny eci sos megl a ɛwr es ɛb ir eke el sikpl lele suksuk ab eci, ɛtŋ ow eci low ek’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, el Nyam eci any ɔbr. Ɛbɛn, yɛfɛnyna yɛji ɛsɛ madu af, òcr ɔny eci sos megl a ɛwr es ɛb ir eke el low nyim nyim eci, ɛtŋ ow eci low eke b’ow anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, b’ow el ɛb ir lala eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm.
Ow a eke eel sikpl eci madu a, low nyim nyim eci kok a áwm ɔny.
Ow e lɛgŋ ab af a, bogŋ ec’ey ɔsur ee? Yɛfɛnyna, ow am ɔny ɔny ɛ́s, aŋke ow eci ey eke ow ɔsu a el luw.
Sica jam aŋa, wɛl sɔg ɔny sikpl e lís ɛtŋ ɛwal eel Nyam eci madu. Na sosiɛm am ir ɛb eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ ow eci low ek’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, el Nyam ab ec’ɛb ir sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
Nawrɛ, aŋke sikpl eci labm sɔg ek’anŋ ɛm a el luw; kɔ Nyam eci ob ap a el sel a ek’ɔnym uwr, ke li b’ɔŋ ɛy, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm m’uw any eke ow el agŋ eke uw Nyam ec’ ol ab any a, m’am dad odad. Ol ɔny abusu ɛy af eke s’anŋ owr a cɛ. Ɛtŋ ow el low eke uwr any tasi.
Kin low ɛbmn nyam: ol ɛm a, yɔw eke ɛbi igŋ a okr af in ec’igŋ ab ab eke igŋ a anŋ owr a. Kɔ eke igŋ a b’uw a, yɔw a sos b’ok es ol a ek’ɔny okr’r af ɛc ab a e lís.
Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke ɛc anŋ owr a, eke n’im l’ɛbi igŋ ɛjeci, ke nfaci l’ij a. Kɔ eke ɛc uw a, ol ɛm a abusu ɛru’r es; l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛbi igŋ ɛjeci gɔŋ, li k’ow l’elm facyɔw.

Ɛm lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ. Ɔny okar af Krist eke uw ɛy sosiɛm olikŋ af ab ab; ow sosiɛm, ɔny kpabr es nimum Mois ec’ol a e lís. Sica eel ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam eci; ɛgŋ ɛjec’a, in l’el ɛgŋ a ek’igb luw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn ɛm a s’ɔtu eke ɛy fɛŋ si k’ɔsu ey Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm.
Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke s’am kok ów eke b’akpl ɛy sos ɛm a, Mois ec’ol a ec’ów a tasi eke bi dɛdŋn a b’itr ów aw eŋuŋ a eke ki kok low ɛy e sos ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ow e low ek’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, el luw.

Gbɛkɔ sica, si kpab es nimum nimum Mois ec’ol a eke ɔny awŋ ɛy es a e lís; s’ɔtu eke sica si ki kok Nyam e low a sɛwl owr ɛm, s’ám ɛlum Abŋ Lala, ke si kí kokm Nyam e low a ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’a eke s’anŋ ol a eke wɛl nɔn a eci es ɛw ɛm ab af.

Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kɔ Mois ec’ ol na, sikpl eci juma n’am kok ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Gbɛkɔ ol anake ɔŋ m’uw sikpl any a. Tasi ɛm a, blel ol dadm ɛsmɛ: K’ow ocm nyamnɛyr ɛm erurm awlŋ ec’ob, blel mi k’uwm any eke ow el low ŋuŋ.
Gbɛkɔ sikpl ɛcr ol na ɛm ɛtŋ ɔsu ɛm ɛm ów aw eŋuŋ ɔrŋ ɔrŋ a fɛŋ, aŋke blel ol anm ana, sikpl blel ɔnym abusu kaka.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke m’uwm ol any a, m’el ɛgŋ ek’anŋ owr. Kɔ sica eke m’uw ol any a, sikpl anake ɛwl mɛny anŋ owr a,
ɛtŋ ɛm, m’el ɛgŋ eke uw. Ɛtŋ ol a eke ki nyimn’m m’anŋ owr a, nyimn’m luw ɛm.
Ɛɛ, sikpl ɛcr ol ɛm ɛlu’m wus ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, n’ɔŋ’m m’uw.
Gbɛkɔ ol, in obi a l’el lala, ɛtŋ ów ey nyam nyam eke anŋ’n ɛm a yɛji el lala, nyim nyim lele nimamn ab.
Sica eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke ob mamn ɔtu eke k’ism’m luw ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Gbɛkɔ sikpl ɛcr ob mamn ɛm ɔŋ’m luw. Nɛnɛ anake ol ɔŋ wɛl ɛkn elel eke sikpl e lɛc a el ob ŋuŋ kɔ kɔ kɔ a.
Ɛɛ, ɛy s’uw any eke ol, Nyam ogŋ ow anŋ ow, gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’el ɛgŋ fuɛfuɛ eke wɛl ɔl ij ɛsɛ adu af sikpl ogŋ.
Nawrɛ tasi, yec’a eke m’am kok a mi k’irim, aŋke yec’a eke m’am erur a, mi kókm, ɛtŋ mi bi kok yec’a eke m’érurm a.
Eke mi bi kok yec’a eke m’érurm a, mi b’ɛgŋ m’eb eke ol el ob mamn.
Sica m’uw any eke ow elm ɛm mi kókm ɛbɛn, kɔ sikpl a eke ir ɛm ɛm a anake b’itr’m mi kok ɛbɛn a.
Ɛɛ, m’uw any eke low mamn irm ɛm ɛm, ɛm e sos ɔnym ab ɛm. Ɛm ec’a, mi b’erur eke mi ki kok ów eke akpl a, kɔ m’ɔ́tum mi kokm.
Tasi ɛm a, low nimamn eke mi b’erur a, m’ɔ́tum mi kokm, ɛtŋ low ŋuŋ eke m’érurm a, mi bi kok.
Sica, eke mi bi kok low eke m’érurm a, ke ow elm ɛm mi kokm ɛbɛn, kɔ sikpl a eke ir ɛm ɛm a anake b’itr’m mi kok ɛbɛn a.
Ɛtŋ kin ol ɛjeci nyam eke m’uyum ab: eke mi b’erur eke mi ki kok low mamn a, ke low ŋuŋ kpɛkŋ inym’m es any af.
Ɛm ec’ɛrm ab ɛm, mi b’erur Nyam ec’ol a.

Gbɛkɔ ɛm obi ɛm a, mi b’uyum ol ɛjeci nyam ab, eke b’atarir Nyam ec’ol a eke in ab nɛny okr ɛy af ab ab. Ɛtŋ ol na, in l’el sikpl ec’ol a eke bi kok juma ɛm ɛm, ke b’ɔny’m ɛsɛ in eci sobel ɛm ɛs af a.
Kin eke m’el gbre ec’ɛgŋ! Bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow sɔg’m sos megl na eke b’oc im ɛlu’m luw ɛm a e lís ee?
S’ɛ́lu Nyam bia, aŋke Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sɔg’m! Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɛm eci tutr ab ɛm, mi b’ɛgŋ Nyam ec’ol a m’eb, gbɛkɔ ɛm eci sos ɔnym ɛm a, mi b’ɛlum sikpl ec’ol a.
Sica low ɔb kaka anm agŋ a eke okr af Jesu Krist ab a eci ij.
Nawrɛ tasi, eke wɛl okr af Jesu Krist ab a, ke Abŋ Lala ec’ol a anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a, ɛtŋ ol na sɔg’m sikpl ec’ol a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ luw a ec’abu ɛm.

Mois ec’ol a ɔtum eke ki kok ɛbɛn, aŋke agŋ eci sos ɔnym a ɔɔm’n ow e kok ec’abusu. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔtu kok: l’ɛrm Jim ɛli sos eke otarir es sikpl ɛsɛl ec’ab ab ow sɔg ɛl sikpl ec’abu ɛm. Ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, Nyam ɔŋ sikpl a eke am kok juma agŋ e sos ɛm a abur es.
Li kok nɛnɛ, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́ny abusu s’ir ɛb nyim nyim a eke ol am ibrm a. Sica, ow elm elel eke agŋ b’ir ɛb a s’irm ij, kɔ ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala b’erur ab af.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a eke b’ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke -n’am ɛkan ab af a, b’ɛlum ɛl ec’ów eke b’akpl ɛl sos ɛm a, gbɛkɔ agŋ eke b’ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala b’erur ab af a, b’ɛlum yec’a eke Abŋ Lala b’erur a.
Ɛgŋ eke b’us ów eke li b’erur a jam a, li b’im luw ɛm, kɔ eke li b’us Abŋ Lala jam a, li b’im sel eke ɔnym uwr lele ɛrm es ɛy ab ogŋ.
Tasi, ɛgŋ ec’ów eke b’erur a ókrm af Nyam ec’ab ab, -l’ɛluamn Nyam ec’ol a. Ɛl ec’a, ow el low eke -li k’ɔtumn -li kokmn.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke b’us ów aw amua jam a, e low k’ɔtum akplm Nyam sos ɛm ij.
Gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’a, írmn ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke b’erurir ab af, kɔ ɛsɛ Abŋ Lala ec’elel eke b’erur ab af, aŋke Nyam ec’Abŋ a anŋ ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm. Eke Krist ec’Abŋ a anm ɛgŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ ikŋ a, l’elm Krist eci.
Nawrɛ eke ɔny e sos megl a b’ow uw sikpl sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ eke Krist anŋ ɔny ɛm a, Abŋ Lala b’ow ɔŋ ɔny sel, aŋke Nyam oc ɔny ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Nyam igbm Jesu luw ɛm. Eke in ec’Abŋ a anŋ ɔny ɛm, in a cɛ eke l’igbm Jesu agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, li b’ow l’ɛcr Abŋ Lala ɛm n’ɔŋ ɔny e sos megl a eke b’ow uw a bɔbɔ yɛji sel.
Na sosiɛm agŋ lisijimɛl, s’ɔny labm. Gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛy ec’ów a eke b’aw ɛy a e labm s’ɔnym. Ow sosiɛm, ow itm eke si k’ir ɛb eke ɛy ec’ów aw a b’erur a.
Eke am iir ɛb ów a eke b’aw ɔny ke b’erurir a e kok eci, b’ow uwr; kɔ eke Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm waal ɔny e sos megl ec’ów a e b’erur e ki kok a ɛlul es a, b’ow anŋn owr.
Nawrɛ ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a bi nyimn a, el Nyam ec’ey.
Ɛtŋ Abŋ a eke ɛŋan a, ɔ́ɔm ɔny elmn madu eke ɛmɛny am uru Nyam, kɔ li b’ɔŋ ɔny eel Nyam ec’ey. Ɛtŋ Abŋ na eci abu ɛlum ɛm, si b’ɛlu Nyam lebl si dad s’ɛsɛ: "Aba! Ɛs!"
Abŋ Lala in obi b’ij daŋku dad ɛy ec’abŋ a eke s’el Nyam ec’ey.

Ow sosiɛm, eke s’el Nyam ec’ey a, si b’ow s’ij aja a eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw in ec’agŋ es a, ɛtŋ aja na, Krist ab si b’ow s’ij. Ɛɛ, eke s’anŋ in e gbre ij a e low ɛm, si b’ow s’anŋ in ec’anygbɛl a yɛji e low ɛm.
Ayaf s’ɔtu eke si k’oc yɛfɛnyna e gbre a si bɛbmn lɛgŋ ek’am ow ab ɛm eci anygbɛl a eke Nyam b’ow yɛgm ɛy kpata ab ab ee? Ɛm e sos ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna e gbre a elm low kaka.
Am ɛkan eke wus nimum a eke Nyam kok a am eku lɛgŋ a eke Nyam b’ow ɛlu in ec’ey ec’anygbɛl ɔkm a.
Mob amua fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a, itŋn el mob ɔfr ɔfr. Ow elm mob a eke Nyam kok a erurm ɛbɛn, kɔ Nyam anake ɔŋ ɛl -n’anŋn nɛnɛ a. Gbɛkɔ wus nimum a eke Nyam kok a ɔtu eke ɛmɛny k’ɔmn low.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke adu b’ŋgboŋ adu el ɛm a, mob mob a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a b’ow ŋgboŋ ɛl e mob ek’am ugŋn ɛl es ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’anŋ Nyam ec’ey a e lewi ij a lele anygbɛl ab ab e low ɛm.
S’uw any tasi eke mob mob a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a am ikŋ sɔmu ɛtŋ ɛmɛny am ij gbre caca ɛm a, ɛsɛ yɔw eke b’ew iy ab af,

gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛl sɔny cɛ. Ɛy obi yɛji, s’am ikŋ sɔmu ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm, ɛtŋ s’am eku eke Nyam k’eb ɛy ɛsɛ in ec’ey tasi af, ke s’él ewi kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ. Gbɛkɔ s’ikŋ anym s’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala, ɛsɛ ob ap a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es ab ɛm eci krɛkrɛ af.
Tasi ɛm a, s’ɛŋn sel, kɔ ow el low ɔmn ɛm cɛ. Eke wɛl b’ɛkn ob eke wɛl am ɔmn a, ke wɛl úbm’n ɛsɛ low ɔmn ob af ij. Ob eke wɛl am ɛkn a, kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke ɛmɛny wɛl k’ɔmn’n ee?
Gbɛkɔ eke s’am ɔmn ob eke s’ɛknm a, si b’anŋ ow eci eku ɛm ɛrm susu ɛm.

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ɛy eke s’ɔnym sos a, Abŋ Lala b’ɛlum ɛy abu. S’úwm any si ŋɔŋnm Nyam ɛsɛ elel eke ow it ab af. Ow b’ɔŋ Abŋ Lala in obi bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛy usu iy, íbrm ów sɔmu ikŋ ebl ɛm eke ɛgŋ e nɛny k’ɔtum dadm.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam eke b’ɛkn mɛrm lokm a, b’uw yec’eke Abŋ Lala erur eke k’ibrm ab any. Ɛɛ, Abŋ Lala bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam b’erur ab af ɔŋ agŋ a eke el Nyam ec’a.

Ɛmɛny s’uw any eke agŋ a ek’ɔny Nyam ec’erur ec’a, low fɛŋ eke b’ɛŋn ɛy a, Nyam anake bi kok a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɛ́lum ɛy abu s’ɛŋn low nimamn. Ow el agŋ a eke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm wɛl ec’ɛsŋ e low l’ɛw es a.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua eke Nyam ikŋ anym sɔsum ot ec’a, l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm yɛji eke li ki kok wɛl, wɛl ot in ec’ Iy ab es, ke ow ɔ́ŋ in ec’Iy a el bosu ligbɛl a e liy likpekp.
Sica agŋ a eke Nyam ikŋ anym sɔsum ot a, l’ɛsŋ wɛl yɛji. Agŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ a, l’ot wɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke l’ot ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af a, l’ot l’ok wɛl in ec’anygbɛl a yɛji ɛm.
Bla odad iy si ki dad s’igŋ af ee? Eke Nyam anŋ ɛy ec’ogog, ke bwo ɔtu eke ki kok ɛy low ŋuŋ ee?
In eke l’ɛdŋnm in ec’Iy lokm a abu any, ke n’ɔŋ ow uw ɛy fɛŋ e sel ɛŋn sosiɛm ec’a, ayaf eke s’okr af ow ab, li k’ow n’ɔɔm ɛy ɔfr ɛm, ów amamn fɛŋ ee?
Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ok agŋ a eke Nyam sɔsum ot a ów af ee? Ɛgŋ kaka anm! Aŋke Nyam in obi ot ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ɔb agŋ low luw ec’ee? Ɛgŋ kaka anm! Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist uw, gbɛkɔ n’anŋ luw ɛm l’igb, n’anŋ Nyam e lidr abu af a ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛy eci.

Bla obi ɔtu eke k’ɔny kpab ɛy es Krist ec’erur ek’ɔny ɛy ec’a e lís ee? Kɔ es abur oglog ɛrmij ebr ee? Kɔ agŋ eci milɔlu e b’ɔnyn ɛy ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm ab ee? Kɔ namn oglog gbɔr ee? Kɔ low ɛyr eke b’okr ɛy es a oglog luw ee?
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: ŋ sosiɛm anake sɛgŋ fɛŋ s’am uw, ke wɛl am kok ɛy ɛsɛ mɛcɛb eke wɛl b’ɔny im ibi usu af a.
Gbɛkɔ fɛŋ ɛm a, si b’ok ɔkm agbawru, ɛgŋ a eke erur ɛy a eci abu ɛlum ɛm.

Ɛɛ, m’ɔny ɔmn tasi, eke ob kaka k’ɔtum ɔnym kpabm ɛy es erur a eke Nyam ɛlu ɔkm, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm a e lís. Ke ow él luw oglog owr anŋ, ke ow él afr ɛrm ɛsɛl oglog es ɛw ɛsɛl oglog lɛc ek’anŋ lɛf ɛm, ke ow él lɛgŋ na ɛm, lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ɛm, ke ow él afr e lɛc oglog wus aŋa e lɛc, ke ow él mob mob fɛŋ eke wɛl kok, ob kaka k’ɔtum ɔnym kpabm ɛy es Nyam ec’erur ek’ɔny ɛy ec’a e lís!
Ɛm m’el Krist eci, ow sosiɛm, low a eke m’am m’ow mi dad a el low nawrɛ, mi k’ɔtum m’ɔnym yadŋ. Ɛm e tutr a eke Abŋ Lala am nyimn a yɛji am dad’m eke ow el low nawrɛ.
Ɛm ec’ɛrm a sos ɔw es nɔnɔ ligbɛl ɛtŋ m’am ij gbre eke úwrm.
Mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke Nyam k’igŋ ɔwl’m ke mi kpáb es Krist e lís, eke ow ɔtu cɛ eke k’eb ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ɛlu es.

Bla ec’ee? -L’el Israɛl eyŋ, Nyam ot ɛl -l’el ow ec’ey. Wɛl ec’araŋn n’anŋ in ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm, l’ɛgŋ sinm wɛl ab, n’ɔŋ wɛl in ec’ol a, li yɛgm wɛl sɛwl yec’ɛm eke wɛl k’igŋ’n nuŋ a, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ów eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es wɛl ec’a.
Ɛl -l’el ɛl lagŋɛl ekpekp a eci alaw. Ɛl ec’araŋn anake wɛl ew Krist ɛsɛ ɛgŋ owr af, in eke l’el Nyam ek’anŋ ob fɛŋ e nuŋ af a! Kɔklm él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
Ow elm ke wɛl dad ɛsɛ Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ɛw es a ɛlu ok es. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a eke wɛl ew ɛy lagŋ Israɛl ɛm a, ɛl fɛŋ -l’elm Israɛl eyŋ tasi.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a bɔbɔ eke wɛl ew ɛy lagŋ Abraham ec’eb ab ɛm a yɛji, ow elm ɛl fɛŋ -l’elm ow ec’ey tasi, aŋke Nyam dad Abraham ninɛ: Isak ɛm anake b’ow ɛŋn alaw eke b’ow ɛlu ŋ e nin a ɔkm a.
Kin sodad na ec’iri tasi a: ow elm ey a eke wɛl ew igŋ nyam lele yɔw nyam ab ec’erur ɛm a elm Nyam ec’ey. Kɔ ey tasi a, ɛl -l’el Nyam ec’ɛwar ec’ey a.
Kin ɛwar a e sodad a: m’ow m’ɛwl mɛny m’ow ŋ ogŋ a lakpo yec’a, lɛgŋ nɛnɛ af, ɛtŋ ayŋ Sara b’ow ew iy igŋ nyam.
Ɛtŋ ow elm na sɔny cɛ: kɔ Rebeka ec’a yɛji. L’ew ey yony ɛy lagŋ Isak ab.

Ey yony a, wɛl k’ewm kokm ɛl wus, -li ki kokm low ŋuŋ oglog low nimamn. Gbɛkɔ Nyam dad Isak ɛw es eke: likpekp a b’ow anŋ jam ɛs a eci es ɛw ɛm. Ɛtŋ usu ɛjec’ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: m’erur Jakɔb m’oc ɛtŋ mi wal Esayu m’ɛlu es. Low na ɛcr nɛnɛ, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es a ɛ́li any. Nyam bi sɔsum agŋ ot ɛsɛ elel eke li b’erur ab af, ɛtŋ sɔsum oc a elm agŋ a ec’ów e bi kok a sosiɛm, kɔ Nyam cɛ eke b’ɛsŋ ɛgŋ ab ɛm ow b’anŋ ow.
Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kɔ Nyam ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs l’el ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!
Tasi ɛm a, li dad Mois ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ikŋ ɛgŋ e m’erur eke mi k’ikŋ sɔrŋ a sɔrŋ, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɔnyn ɛgŋ eke m’erur eke mi k’ɔnyn ɛrm mamn a ɛrm mamn.
Ow sosiɛm a, Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a ánm agŋ e low e b’erur ab ɛm, oglog sos eke b’atr es ab ɛm, kɔ Nyam cɛ eke ɔny sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm ow b’anŋ ow.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm, Nyam dad Ejipt ec’ɛb ebu a ninɛ: M’ɛw’ŋ ɛb ebu, yec’ɛtŋ ke ŋ ɛm m’ɛ́lu ɛm ec’abusu a ɔkm, ke mi kók ɛm e nin a eb es wus na nimum af.
Wɛl b’ɛkn eke Nyam b’ikŋ ɛgŋ eke l’erur eke li k’ikŋ sɔrŋ a sɔrŋ, ɛtŋ li b’ɔtur ɛgŋ eke l’erur eke li k’ɔtur ɛrm a ɛrm.
Gbɛkɔ, k’aw ke ɛgŋ íbrm im ɛsɛ: sica, eke ow el nɛnɛ, bla sosiɛm ɛmɛny Nyam k’ɛnym ɛy abr ee? Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke ki dogŋn low eke li b’erur ab ee?
Kɔ ŋ gbɛ, bwo el’ŋ eke k’atar Nyam ab ee? Kɔ mijel b’ibrm ɛgŋ a eke kok’r a ɛsɛ: bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ kok’m mijel ee?
Kɔ mijel kok ɛs ɔtum eke ki kok low e l’erur kpeŋ ab ab ee? Kɔ l’ɔtum eke kpeŋ nyam a cɛ, li k’itl li kok lɛ́w sɔbɔ nyam oglog lɛ́w kprakasa nyam ee?
Nyam erur eke k’ɛlu in ec’ɛrm bebl ɔkm ke yɛ́gm in ec’abusu a. Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke n’ɔny ɛrm bebl wɛl ab, ke it eke k’irm ɔgbu es a, l’ɛgŋ wɛl e low l’eb low eku ligbɛl ɛm.
L’ɛgŋ low nɛnɛ l’eb, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́lu in eci anygbɛl a e sagb a ɔkm agŋ eke l’erur eke li ki yɛgm in e sɔrŋ ikŋ a e lís. Ow el agŋ a eke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm l’ɛw es eke k’ɛŋn anygbɛl na a.
Ɛtŋ ɛy s’el agŋ amua eke l’ɛsŋ a. Ow elm Jwifɛl ec’araŋn cɛ l’ɛsŋm ɛy, kɔ agŋ eke elm Jwifɛl ec’araŋn ec’agŋ a yɛji.
Nyam dad low na kokoba ɔb ɛs Ose e lɛl ab ɛm: Agŋ a eke elm ɛm ec’agŋ a, mi b’ow m’ɛsŋ ɛl 'ɛm ec’agŋ'. Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke m’érurm a, mi b’ow m’ɛsŋ ɛl 'agŋ e m’erur'.
Ɛtŋ yogŋ a eke wɛl dad agŋ eke: "Ɔny elmn ɛm ec’agŋ a," wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ ɛl Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’ey.
Esayi, in am ɛlu lebl Israɛl ec’agŋ e lís ɛsɛ: Eke batŋ Israɛl eyŋ ɛny nɔnɔ ɛsɛ okij any e mirici af yɛji, agŋ tɛl a eke wal es a cɛ b’ow ɛŋn sel.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Admaga b’ow kok low a eke li dad a wus af aŋa, li b’ow li kok fafa toŋ l’igŋ nuŋ.
Ɛtŋ low na anake Esayi yɛji ikŋ anym dad a: blel Nyam Abusu Ɛs okm ɛy alaw bɛb es, ke blel s’ánŋ ɛsɛ Sodɔm eyŋ af, ke s’ótarir es Gomɔr eyŋ ab.
Ke ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Nawrɛ, agŋ eke elm Jwifɛl a, ɔ́lm eke k’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛkn eke Nyam ɛgŋ eb ɛl, ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
Ke Israɛl ec’agŋ a am ɔl eke k’el nyim nyim eke -li b’ɛlum Nyam ec’ol a sosiɛm. Kɔ ɛl -l’ɔwl -l’ok es.
Bla sosiɛm ee? -l’ɔwl -l’ok es, aŋke -l’ɔlm nyim nyim el na es ɔmn ɛm, -li tutr eke ɛl ec’ów kok ɛm -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn. Ɛbɛn a, -l’uyum lebn a eke b’ɛlu ɛgŋ wus ab ab.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Siɔn ɛb ɛm, m’am ɛw lebn nyam eke b’eb agŋ akr, lob eke b’ɛlu ɛgŋ wus es. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’oc ɔmn ɛlu’l ɛm a, sos k’ow ɔwm es lɛgŋ kaka.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am erur ɛm ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm eke Jwifɛl k’ɛŋn sel, ɛtŋ m’am ibrm Nyam low na ɛl eci.
Nawrɛ, m’ɔtu eke mi k’ij ɛl e lís e daŋku m’ɛsɛ: Nyam e kok owi anŋ ɛl ɛrm ɛm tasi, kɔ -l’uwm ow ec’ejagb ab any tasi.
-L’irim elel eke Nyam b’ocr agŋ nyim nyim a, ɛtŋ -l’ɔl ɛl ec’elel eke agŋ b’eel nyim nyim ab es. Ow ɔŋ -l’ɛgŋm -l’ebm elel a eke Nyam b’ocr agŋ ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af a.
Tasi ɛm a, Krist kok Mois ec’ol a e low iy nɛny, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam óc agŋ fɛŋ eke b’ub Krist nawrɛ a agŋ nyim nyim.
Mois in obi nɔn elel eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’eel nyim nyim ol ec’ɛlum sosiɛm a ninɛ: ɛgŋ yec’eke bi kok ol ec’ów a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm a, b’ow anŋ owr in ɛm.

Gbɛkɔ kin yec’eke li dad agŋ a eke Nyam b’oc ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a e lís: kì dad ŋ ec’ɛrm ab ɛm k’ɛsɛ: bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow uyu afr ee? Ɛsɛ ɛbɛn eke wɛl am ibrm, kɔ bwo b’ow uyu afr ɔny Krist usm es ee?
Ɛmɛny kì dad k’ɛsɛ: bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow us es wus lokm ee? Ɛsɛ ɛbɛn eke wɛl am ibrm, kɔ bwo b’ow us es yogŋ ɔny Krist ɛlu ɔkm agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm ee?
Ow elm ɛbɛn, aŋke wɛl nɔn: odad a anŋ’ŋ saw, ŋ e nɛny ab ɛm lele ŋ ec’ɛrm ɛm ab ab. Ɛtŋ odad na, in anake l’el ɔmn ec’amani a eke s’am ɔb a.
Eke ŋ e nɛny bi dad agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af ɛsɛ Jesu el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛtŋ ub nawrɛ ŋ ec’ɛrm ab ɛm eke Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm a, ow b’ow ɔŋ’ŋ ɛŋn sel.
Tasi ɛm a, eke si b’ub nawrɛ ɛy ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm a, Nyam b’oc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛtŋ eke si b’ɛlu ɛy ec’ɔmn a ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af a, li bi sɔg ɛy.
Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’oc ɔmn ɛlu’l ɛm a, sos k’ow ɔwm es lɛgŋ kaka.
Ow sosiɛm a, ereb anm Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab ec’araŋn ij. Ɛl fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyam cɛ -n’ɔny, ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛlu’l lebl a in ec’ów amamn a.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow sɔg agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛlu’l lebl a.

Sica ayaf -li b’ow -l’ɛlul Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lebl, eke -l’ubm ow nawrɛ ee? Ɛtŋ ayaf -li b’ow -l’ub ow nawrɛ, eke -l’irim ow e lís owi ee? Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ayaf -li b’ow -l’iri ow e lís owi, eke ɛgŋ ɔbm ɛl ow ec’amani ee?
Ɛtŋ ayaf ɛgŋ k’ɔbr ow ec’amani, eke wɛl ɛram ɛgŋ ow ec’ee? Ow sosiɛm wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm: Ɛbɛn tasi eke ow akpl eke wɛl ki lɛr agŋ a eke b’ɔb samani amamn a eci mowrer ana!
Gbɛkɔ, ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ɛluam Amani Mamn a. Tasi ɛm a, Esayi dad ow e low ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ ub ɛy e Nyam odad a nawrɛ ee?
Njɛ, eke ɛgŋ b’iri amani a, ow anake li b’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ a, ɛtŋ amani na, ow ow el Krist e lís ec’odad a.
Ow sosiɛm m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: kɔ Jwifɛl amua, -l’irim odad na e low ee? Yadŋ, -l’iri! Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Wɛl iri ɛl e lebl wus nimum af ɛtŋ ɛl e sodad ebl im toŋ ok wus e nuŋ.

Ow sosiɛm ɛmɛny m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: Kɔ Israɛl ec’agŋ na, -li k’irim low a k’okm ɛl es sos ɛm ee? Ke Mois ikŋ anym dad ɛl Nyam ec’odad a ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ nyamn ɛyr ɔny ɔny agŋ na ek’el agŋ ek’ɔnym any a e lís. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛrm ebl ɔny agŋ ek’ɔnym low any uw kaka a e lís.
Ɛtŋ Esayi oc lokm susu ɛm dad ninɛ: kin low eke Nyam dad: Agŋ a eke ɔlm’m es a, ɛl -n’ɛŋn’m. Ɛtŋ m’ɛlu sos ɔkm mi yɛgm agŋ a eke ibram im low kaka a.
Gbɛkɔ Israɛl ec’agŋ a e lís a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Lɛgŋ nimum a, m’ɛgŋm abu es bieku nyam eke ɛ́luam low, ke ɛ́gŋm ɛm e low ebm a e lís.
Sica m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: kɔ Nyam in ec’agŋ na es l’igŋ l’ok wɛl ee? Njaŋ! Aŋke ɛm m’el Israɛl iy, Abraham e lilaw lele Bɛnjamɛ ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ab.
Nyam igŋm in ec’agŋ a eke in obi l’ikŋ anym li sɔsum l’ot a, l’ɛlum es. Eke m’ɔnym yadŋ, ke uwr Eli e sodad eke anŋ Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab any, yogŋ a eke n’am ok Israɛl eyŋ dedeku es Nyam ogŋ a.
Ɛtŋ kin odad a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, -l’ibi ŋ eci kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a, -ni ŋuŋn ŋ e segb waw usu a. Ɛm sɔny cɛ anake m’anŋ a, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji -n’am erur eke -li k’ibi’m.
Ɛtŋ Nyam ec’eke dad ɔŋ’n a el bogŋ ec’ee? Anm ŋ sɔny! M’ɛdŋn agŋ fandi lɔbŋ m’ɛw es ɛm eci, agŋ a eke ókm ɔwrɔkp wus igŋm Baal nuŋ a.
Yɛfɛnyna yɛji low nyam a cɛ. Agŋ tɛl anŋ eke Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ɛdŋn ɛw es.
Eke Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm sɔsum ot ɛl, ke ow elm ɛl ec’ów eke -li kokr a sosiɛm. Blel ow el ɛbɛn, ke Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ɛm ec’ob ap a elm bibm ɔfr ɛm ij.
Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Israɛl eyŋ ɛŋnm ob a eke -n’am ɔl es a, kɔ agŋ a cɛ eke Nyam sɔsum ot a ɛŋn ob a; agŋ likpr a ɔny ɛrm tuɔtuɔ,
ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: toŋ ke igŋ yɛfɛnyna a, Nyam ɔŋ ɛl eci low iri a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke uw af, n’ɔɔm abusu eke ɛl ec’anyamn a k’ɛkn es, ke ɛl ec’ɔru a íri ów.
Ɛb ebu David yɛji dad ninɛ: Ke ɛl eci ob ij ɛgbɛl a ítŋn el meb eke wɛl uk ɛl, nɔmu e wɛl ɛdŋ, ɛl e wus ok eci, ke Nyam kók ɛl ow e low.
Ke -l’el ány eflu, -li k’ɛknmn low kaka fɛŋ! Ke Nyam úyul ɛl ɛrɛkp leg leg ɔny ibn ɛl es sɛgŋ fɛŋ!
Sica m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: kɔ Jwifɛl na wus -l’ok kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ ab ee? Njaŋ! Gbɛkɔ ɛl eci low any ɔbr a ɔŋ ɛtŋ bieku ɛjeci ec’agŋ a ɔtu ɛŋn sel. Ɛbɛn a, ow ɔŋ Israɛl eyŋ am ogŋ ɛl ŋkre.

Israɛl eci low any ɔbr a ism wus ów amamn ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl ab, ɛtŋ in eci wus ɛy a ism agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ów amamn ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl ab. Sica, lɛgŋ a eke Jwifɛl a fɛŋ b’ow ɛwl ɛgŋ Nyam e low eb a, ow ayl tasi eke Nyam ec’ów amamn ɛgbɛl a ɛmɛny b’ow agb bobn.
Sica, ɔny eke elmn Jwifɛl a, ɔny anake m’am dad ɔny odad a. Ɛm m’el Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci, ɛtŋ m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ɛm e juma na ɛm.
Juma na eci kok ɛm a, m’am ɔny tutr eke mi b’ow m’obn ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl eci ŋkre ogŋ a, ke ow ɔ́ŋ m’eb agŋ nyam nyam ɛl ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, eke Nyam ɛw ɛl saw a, l’okr ɛm wus ab. Sica, lɛgŋ a eke li b’ow l’ɛwl l’eb wɛl a, bla lowi b’ow ɛy ab ee? Agŋ eke uw a b’ow ɛwl anŋ owr.
Eke futufutu ec’ogog nyam el Nyam eci, ke futufutu a nimum yɛji in ec’ana. Ɛtŋ eke likŋ nyam eci min a fɛŋ el Nyam eci, ke ál a yɛji in ec’ana.

Israɛl eyŋ anŋ ɛsɛ olivie ikŋ eke wɛl ewl ɔgm, ke Nyam bubr in ec’ál bɛb es af. Ɛtŋ ŋ, eke elm Jwif ke anŋ ɛsɛ akp ɔfr ɛm ec’olivie ikŋ af a, l’oc l’ujr’ŋ likŋ lis ab ɛm, wuwlm ekŋ ál tasi a eke cucu likŋ lis a eke wɛl ewl ab ab. Ɛtŋ sica, ɔtu eke in ec’ekŋ ál ab ab k’ɛ́ŋn mij a eke b’anŋ in e min ab ɛm ow a.
Ow sosiɛm, k’ìm ekŋ ál a ec’any af k’íj en! Eke erur eke k’ij en, ɔ̀kn eke ow elm ŋ ec’abu ɛm likŋ a e min a anm, kɔ ŋ likŋ a e min a ec’abu ɛm anŋ.
Ŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: wɛl bubr ekŋ ál es ɛtŋ ɛm, wɛl oc ujr’m likŋ lis ab ɛm.
Na low nawrɛ! Wɛl bubr ɛl es aŋke -n’ɔnym ɔmn, ɛtŋ ŋ akŋm likŋ lis ab ab, aŋke ɔny ɔmn. Ŋ k’ɛ̀w sos, kɔ erŋn anake k’ɔny’ŋ a.
Ɛɛ, aŋke eke Nyam ɛgbm Jwifɛl eke el likŋ caŋ a ec’ál ab es, ŋ yɛji li k’ow l’ɛgbm’ŋ es.

Ɛ̀bmn nyamn ɛkn elel eke Nyam b’ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny lel in e tuɔtuɔ el ab ab ɔkm a: l’ɛlu in e tuɔtuɔ el a ɔkm agŋ eke ok wus a e lís, ɛtŋ l’ɛlu ɛrm mamn ɔkm ŋ e lís. Gbɛkɔ ow it eke k’anŋ in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny ab ɛm, ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, ŋ yɛji li b’ow l’ubr’ŋ es ɛsɛ likŋ lal af.
Eke batŋ Jwifɛl igŋ ɛl eci ɛrm tuɔtuɔ a ɛlu es, Nyam b’ow ɛwl oc ujr ɛl yogŋ a eke anym ɛm a -n’anŋn a, aŋke n’ɔny abusu eke li k’ujr wɛl ɛm.

Tasi ɛm a, ŋ, akp ɔfr ɛm e likŋ lal el. Nyam ubr’ŋ es ɛtŋ oc ujr’ŋ likŋ eke wɛl ewl ɛm, ŋ ec’a ow elm elel eke wɛl ki kokr a. Jwifɛl ec’a, ɛl -l’el likŋ a eke wɛl ewl a ec’ál. Ow sosiɛm, ow b’ow ɛw fuɛfuɛ eke Nyam k’ujr ɛl likŋ na eke ow el ow ɛm -l’ɛlil -l’okr ɔkm a.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin Nyam e lís e low e lɔl es ke m’erur eke mi ki yɛgm ɔny uwr any, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny eke elmn Jwifɛl a, k’ócrmn ɔny sosi eke eel ɛsɛwru. Israɛl eyŋ ec’ogog nyam k’ow ɛgŋm eke k’iri low, ɛtŋ ow b’ow anŋ ibn toŋ bake ɛb ɛb ɛjec’a e nɛny a nimum ɛwl ow Nyam ogŋ.
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a Israɛl eyŋ tasi a fɛŋ b’ow ɛŋn sel, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: Es Eb Ɛlu Ɛs a b’ow anŋ Jerusalɛm ow. Li b’ow n’ɔny Jakɔb ec’eb a eci low any ɔbr a l’oc es.
Ɛtŋ Admaga igŋ af dad ninɛ: kin sinm a eke mi b’ow mi kok ɛl ab lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ɔny ɛl e sikpl a m’oc es a.
-L’ɛgŋm Amani Mamn a -l’ebm, ow ɔŋ -l’ɛwl -l’el Nyam ec’efnu ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɔny, ow akpl ɔny eci. Ke Nyam eke sɔsum ot ɛl a, in ec’agŋ eke wɛl k’el eci. Li b’erur wɛl ɛl lagŋɛl sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka Nyam ɛwlm ébm ob eke li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ a, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke li bi sɔsum l’ot a, l’ígŋm l’ɛlum wɛl es lɛgŋ kaka.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɔny ɔbar Nyam any, kɔ caca ɛm a, Jwifɛl anake ɔbr Nyam any, ke ow ɔŋ, ɔny ɛŋan Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a.
Ɛtŋ ɛl ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ ow b’ow el: sica ɛl yɛji, -li b’ow -l’ɔtu -n’ɛŋn Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a, ɔny eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a eke Nyam ɔny a sosiɛm eci.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ ɔnym ɛlum, ow sosiɛm Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -li kok ów eke -l’erurir a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm wɛl fɛŋ in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a.

Nyam ec’ob ɔny a agb nawrɛ tasi! In e sɛwr a lel in e low any uw ab ab ɔtu nɔnɔ, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum uwm in ec’ów eke li bi dad l’ucu es ab any, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum irim in ec’ów eke li bɛbm l’ok es a. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
Bwo uw Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci tutr ab any ee? Bwo ɔtu eke k’ɔm’n ów ee?
Bwo ikŋ anym ɔŋ Nyam ob, eke sica Nyam yɛji k’ɔwr ɔŋ’n ee?
Ɛgŋ kaka, aŋke in ɛm fɛŋ b’anŋ ow, in ɛm fɛŋ ɛcr anŋ ɛtŋ el in eci. Anygbɛl él Nyam eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!

Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ɔny ɛy eci sɔrŋ ikŋ. Ow sosiɛm, m’am ɔm ɔny ów eke k’ocr ɔny ec’ɛgŋ el a nimum lele ɔny ec’owr anŋ ab ab ápr ir, ɛsɛ egb waw ek’ayl ke akpl af. Na anake el nuŋ igŋ tasi a ek’it eke k’ɔŋn in a.
K’ùsr wus eke s’ir af a ec’agŋ ɛm ec’ów a jam, kɔ yɛ̀br Nyam itŋn ɔny e tutr a nimum. Ɛbɛn ke ɔ́tur uwr yec’eke l’erur ab any: yec’eke akpl, yec’eke akpl’l sos ɛm lele yec’eke iy nɛny bɛbmn ab ab.
Bibm ɛm ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m a sosiɛm, m’am dad ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ eke k’ocrm in sosi ɛgŋ ligbɛl. Kɔ òkr nuŋ ɛm es, ke jɛ́jr ɔny sosi okr ɔmn a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛy ab ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy e sos megl ab ɛm susu ogog nɔnɔ anŋ, kɔ ɛl fɛŋ -li kokmn juma nɛnyɛmbri nyam a.
Nɛnɛ anake s’anŋ Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm a. S’ɛny nɔnɔ, kɔ ɛy fɛŋ a s’el sos megl nyam. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’okr af ɛy ɔfr ɛm, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’usu ek’anŋ a, ɛsɛ sos megl nyam ec’ogog ogog ec’ab af.
Bibm ɛm, Nyam ɔŋ ɛy sob ap ɔfr ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛŋn in eci. Ow sosiɛm, ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ek’el odad dad eci ɛsɛ kokoba ɔb ɛs af a, ke li dád yec’a eke okr af ɛy ec’ɔmn ab ab a.
Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ek’el juma ec’abu ɛlum eci, ke n’ám kok abu ɛlum ɛs e juma, ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ek’el low yɛgm eci, ke n’ám yɛgm agŋ low,

ke ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn bibm ɛgŋ e sos es atr ec’a, ám atr agŋ sos es. Ɛgŋ ek’am ɔŋ agŋ ob a, ɔ́ŋ ɛrm nyam ɛm, ɛgŋ ek’am nyimn agŋ a, nyímn ɛl gbragbra kok ɛm. Ɛgŋ ek’am ɛlum ɔgbɔru abu a, ɛ́lum ɛl abu sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Ke ɔny ec’erur a él nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm; ìfan low ŋuŋ kok, ke úcur low mamn e kok ɔnyn es.
Èrurir ɔny ɔfr ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm, ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl af. Èel agŋ eke b’ogŋ es ɛlum ɛl lawlɛl.
Kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma gbragbra kok ɛm, ke sos am kaka k’ánm ɛm, ke ow él ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm.
Ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ɔny e low ɔmn a sosiɛm. Ɔ̀nyn ɛrm susu gbre ij ɛm, ùcur Nyam ŋɔŋn ɔnyn es.
Ɛ̀lumn Nyam ec’agŋ ek’ɔny es abur a abu, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ bɛ́bmn sos ebr agŋ a eke b’ow ɔny ogŋ a sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Ìbrmn Nyam e low mamn ɔŋn agŋ eke b’ijr ɔny gbre a, ìbrmn low mamn, kɔ ow k’él low ŋuŋ.
Ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm agŋ a eke b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab ab, ke íkŋn ɔŋn, agŋ a eke am ikŋ ɔŋn ab ab.
Nɛny ókr ɔny af ɔny ɔfr ɛm. K’èel es ɛfuu, kɔ ɛ̀gŋn es is ɛm e juma kok ebr. K’ɔ̀nyn tutr eke ɔny eel agŋ eke uw low fɛŋ any.
Low ŋuŋ eke ɛgŋ kok ɔny a, kì kokr k’ɔbar ir any, kɔ ɔ̀ɔl low mamn kok es agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af.
Eke ow el ɔny obi ɛm, ɛtŋ ow ɔtu eke ow k’el ɛbɛn, ìir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm agŋ fɛŋ ab.

Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl, low eke ɛgŋ kok ɔny a, ɔny obi kì kokr ir, kɔ ɛ̀gbr Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab es kok ow e low. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛm mi b’usr ɛgŋ usu mi kok low eke wɛl kok’r a! Ɛm mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ek’it eke k’ɛbm a!
Gbɛkɔ li dad yɛj’eke: Eke ŋ ec’ifnu namn am ɔny, ɔ̀ŋ’n ob l’íj, eke mij amn am ɔny’n, ɔ̀ŋ’n mij l’ɛ́gŋ. Eke batŋ bi kok ɛbɛn a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ almali ek’am ot ok’r nuŋ af.
Kì yɛb low ŋuŋ k’akm’ŋ es, kɔ òc low mamn akmn low ŋuŋ es.
Ow it ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ɛlum agŋ ek’ɔnym es ɛw ab a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɛm es ɛw fɛŋ b’anŋ ow, ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’ɔnym es ɛw ab a, b’ɛw agŋ es aŋke Nyam ɔŋ abusu.
Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋ nyam am ɔny low es ɛw ɛsɛl ab a, ke Nyam e low a eke ɛgŋ eb ab ab anake n’ɔny low a, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke ɛ́gŋm ɛluam ɛl a, ɛl obi ɛl obi am eb jɛj ok ɛw sos.
Eke wɛl am kok low mamn, wɛl ɔtum eke k’uru agŋ ek’ɛw ɛy es a, kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke k’uru ɛl eke wɛl am kok low ŋuŋ. Erurm eke k’uru es ɛw ɛsɛl ee? Ek’ow el ɛbɛn a, kòk low mamn, -li b’ow -l’aw’ŋ.

Tasi ɛm a, es ɛw ɛsɛl am kok Nyam eci juma yec’ɛtŋ ke -ni nyimn’ŋ ɛy low mamn ɛm. Gbɛkɔ eke am kok low ŋuŋ, ow it eke erŋn k’ɔny’ŋ. Tasi ɛm a, es ɛw ɛsɛl ɔny abusu eke k’ɛw low ɔŋ’ŋ, ɛtŋ ow elm ɔfr ɔfr nɛnɛ cɛ! Eke es ɛw ɛsɛl b’ɛw low ɔŋ ɛgŋ, ke -n’am kok Nyam e juma, -n’am ɛlu Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ɔkm ɛgŋ eke bi kok low ŋuŋ a e lís.
Na sosiɛm ow it eke si k’ɛlum es ɛw ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ow elm Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a eke si k’aru s’ɛgb es a cɛ eci, kɔ eke ɛy e tutr ɛm a, s’uw any eke ow el low mamn a sosiɛm.
Ɛtŋ low na sosiɛm yɛji anake b’ɛnmn nɛmpo a. Tasi ɛm a, juma kok ɛsɛl a eke b’ibr ow eci labm a, Nyam in obi abul ɛl ow e juma.

Ɔ̀ŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ yec’a ek’it eke ki kokr ɔŋn in a: nɛmpo fɛŋ ek’it eke ki sɔgr ɔŋn in a, sɔ̀gr ɔŋn in; ke kɔprɛ ek’it eke ki sɔgr ɔŋn in a, sɔ̀gr ɔŋn in. Eke ow el ɛlum k’ɛlumn ɛgŋ, ɛ̀lumn in. Ɛtŋ ek’ow el sos k’usar ɛgŋ, ùsar ir sos.
K’ɔ̀nymn ɛgŋ kaka ec’ob ab, ek’ow elm erur eke k’ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm a cɛ e labm. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur agŋ ɛjec’a, kok ol a e low fɛŋ iy nɛny.

Tasi ɛm a, sol a fɛŋ eke uwr any ɛsɛ: K’ɛ́jum ŋ e yɔw oglog ŋ ec’igŋ. K’íbim ɛgŋ. K’íym mil. K’ócm nyamn ɛyr ɛm erurm ob ek’elm ŋ ec’a, lele ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab, ɔb okr af anŋ ol nyam na ɛm: B’ow erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af.
Eke ɛgŋ ɔny erur, li k’ɔtum li kokm ɛgŋ ɛjeci low ŋuŋ, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ow b’ɔŋ wɛl kok ol a e low fɛŋ iy nɛny.
Ɔny uwr lɛgŋ eke s’anŋ ɛm ab any: ow el wanci eke k’ufŋmn es ɔny e mɛmn ɛru ab ɛm! Tasi ɛm a, sel ɛŋn a titm ɛy akm lɛgŋ a eke s’ub Krist nawrɛ a.
Ow k’ow ibnm, lɛgŋ uk b’ow uwr ɛtŋ lɛgŋ owr b’ow ɛy ɔkm. Ow sosiɛm, s’íil ɛy ec’ów eŋuŋ a fɛŋ eke si bi kok ncok ɛm ab es. Ke si bɛ́bm sos usuayl ɛm ec’ɛb ir eci.

S’íir ɛb low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ɛsɛ lɛgŋ owr fitaŋ af: s’áru ob ij nɔnɔ lele mar ɛgŋ nɔnɔ ab s’ɛgb es. Si k’ágbr lɔsŋn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, si k’ír ɛb suksuk kok owi ɛm, ke si k’ánm ów es atar lele uwerŋ ogŋ ab e low ɛm.
Ànŋn ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist anŋ ab af. Eke ów aw eŋuŋ a ek’anŋ ɔny ɛm a b’erur eke k’ɔdu im ok ɔny low ŋuŋ ɛm, k’ɔ̀ŋan in abusu.
Ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a ebr, ke kí dadmn low ŋuŋ in e tutr eke li b’ɔny ab af.
Oglog ke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny tutr eke l’ɔtu e li k’ij ob fɛŋ, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a, k’íjm ndey ke n’am ij suw obi.
Ɛgŋ a eke b’ij ob fɛŋ a itm eke k’ifn ɛgŋ a eke íjm ob bɛb a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke íjm ob bɛb a itm eke ki jɛj ɛgŋ a eke b’ij ob fɛŋ a e low ok, aŋke Nyam in obi ɛgŋ eb’r.
Ŋ, bwo el’ŋ eke ki jɛj Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma kok ɛs e low ok ee? Ke n’ínym es afr oglog ke l’ɛ́y wus, na in ec’Es Ɛw Ɛs a e low. Ɛtŋ li b’ow n’inym es afr, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny abusu eke k’ucu ɔny’n es.
Ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu ek’am tutr eke sɛgŋ bɛb ɔny any akm sɛgŋ ɛjec’a, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam in am tutr eke -li bɛbmn ɛl fɛŋ. Ow akpl cɛ ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔny ɔmn tasi ow eke n’am tutr ab ɛm.

Ɛgŋ a ek’am ok ereb sɛgŋ ec’araŋn a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci. Ɛgŋ a ek’am ij ob fɛŋ a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci, aŋke li b’ɔŋ Nyam bia in ec’ob ij a eci. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’íjm ob fɛŋ a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci, aŋke in yɛji li b’ɔŋ Nyam bia.
Ɛy ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka ánm owr in obi eci, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka úwm in obi eci.
Eke s’anŋ owr, ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci s’anŋ owr, eke s’am uw, ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci s’am uw. Fɛŋ ɛm a, s’el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
Ɛɛ, Krist uw ɛtŋ n’anŋ luw ɛm l’igb, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́w agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub’r nawrɛ ab es, ɛl a eke uw lele ɛl a eke anŋ owr ab ab.
Kɔ ŋ, bla sosiɛm am jɛj esŋ jim e low ok ee? Ɛtŋ ŋ gbɛ, bla sosiɛm am ifn esŋ jim ee? Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ si b’ow s’im Nyam ec’any af, ke li jɛ́j ɛy e low l’ok.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl nɔn: Ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’anŋ owr, m’am ij nɛny m’ɛsɛ: ob ob pupukpaŋ b’ow ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛm ec’any af ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -li b’ow -li kɔklm ɛm ec’anygbɛl a.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ b’ow jɛj in e lís e low ok Nyam ec’any af.
Sica s’ɛ̀wr ɛy ɔfr eci jɛj ok owi ab es. Ke ow tasi eke k’ɛgŋn ebr a el: k’ócmn ob kaka ɛwmn es ɔny lisijim anym in eci wus ɛlu eci oglog in e low ŋuŋ ɛm ɛy eci.
M’uw any ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛm ow ayl’m sos ɛm eke ob kaka in obi ɛm a elm ob ek’ aylm. Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam am tutr ek’ob nyam el ob ek’aylm, ke ow el ob ek’aylm in eci.
Eke am ɔŋ esŋ jim ij gbre ob ek’am ij a sosiɛm, ke irm ɛb erur ɛm ij. Ob ij owi nuŋ af, kì ŋuŋn esŋ jim nyam eke in sosiɛm Krist uw a!
Ob yec’eke am ɛkan ɛsɛ ɔny ec’ob mamn af a, ɔtum eke k’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a abusu cak ɔny.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a elm ob ij lele mar ɛgŋ ab e low. Kɔ Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, nyim nyim el, ɛrm es ɛy lele sos ɛm iŋn a eke wɛl b’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala ɛm a e low.
Ɛgŋ a eke b’igŋ Krist nuŋ ɛbɛn a e low b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ yɛji b’aw’r.
Ow sosiɛm, s’ɔ́ɔl low yec’a eke b’is ɛrm es ɛy, ke b’ɛlum ɛy abu s’okr af s’imn anym eci ɔmn ɛm ab es.
Kì ŋuŋn Nyam eci juma a ob ij owi nuŋ af! Tasi, ob a fɛŋ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ij, gbɛkɔ ow akplm eke wɛl k’ij ob, eke ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ɛy low eke n’am ɛkn ɛsɛ sikpl af ab ɛm.
Ow akpl eke k’íjm ndey, k’ɛ́gŋm mar, s’úbr es s’ɛsɛ: kí kokm low kaka fɛŋ ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ esŋ jim ɛy wus a.
Yec’eke am tutr low na af a, ow ánŋ’ŋ ɛrm ɛm Nyam ec’any af. Ehe él ɛgŋ a eke low ɛ́ym sos ɛm wanci ab af eke li b’ucu low n’ɔny eke li ki kok a eci.
Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ nyam ek’am ij ob ke am bɛbar in ɛm eke ow akplm a, ɛgŋ ikŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɔb’r low. Tasi ɛm a, l’el ɛgŋ eke nɛny okrm af in ec’ɔmn ab ab, ɛtŋ low fɛŋ eke wɛl am kok ke elm ɔmn ɛm a, el sikpl.
Sica, ɛy a eke s’ij lɛc ɔmn ɛm a, ow it eke si k’ɛgŋ ɛl a ek’ɔnym lɛc na a ec’elel eke b’ɛkan ów a s’éb, ke si k’ɔ́lmn ɛy e low eke si b’erur a cɛ es.
Ow it eke ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ ki kok low eke b’akpl lawl sos ɛm in e low nimamn eci, ke ow ɛ́lum ɛy abu s’okr af s’imn anym eci ɔmn ɛm.
Krist ɔlm low eke l’erur ab es. Kɔ ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm a: Wɛwr a eke wɛl wɛwr’ŋ a ɛwl mɛny ok’m af.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ sig ɛm e Nyam e Silɛl a fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔn a, el ɛy e low yɛgm eci. -L’it eke -li k’ɔŋ ɛy ɛrm susu lele sos es atr ab, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́ny low ɔmn.
Ke Nyam ek’in ɛm ɛrm susu lele sos es atr ab anŋ a, ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɔtur ɔny ɔfr ɛm a iir ɛb nɛny af okr ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Jesu Krist yɛgm ɔny sɛwl ab af.
Ɛtŋ ɛrm nyam ɛm lele lebl nyam ɛm ab, b’ow ɔtur kɔklmn Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs ec’anygbɛl a.
Ow sosiɛm a, ɛ̀gŋn ebarir ɔny ɔfr, ɛsɛ elel eke Krist eb ɔny Nyam ec’anygbɛl a ec’ab af.
M’am dad ɔny, Nyam ij nɛny nyam. Ow sosiɛm Krist ow el Jwifɛl e juma kok ɛs, yec’ɛtŋ ke ów a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl a, li kók ow iy nɛny.

Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a am kɔklm Nyam ec’anygbɛl a, in e sɔrŋ ikŋ a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e Silɛl ab ɛm wɛl nɔn: Na sosiɛm, mi b’ow mi kɔklm’ŋ ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ec’araŋn ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ ŋ e nin a ec’ɛj.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Nyam e Silɛl a dad ninɛ: Ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ, kòkr sos ɛm iŋn Nyam ec’agŋ ab ab.
Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ, kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Ke agŋ a fɛŋ kɔ́klm’n!
Ɛtŋ Esayi yɛji dad ninɛ: Jese eci bosu ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam b’ow ow. Li b’ow l’igb l’ɛw ɛbr ɛbr ab es, ɛtŋ ɛbr ɛbr a b’ow oc ɛl eci low ɔmn a ɛw’r af.
Ke Nyam eke b’ɔŋ agŋ low ɔmn a yíbr ɔny ɛrm es ɛy lele sos ɛm iŋn ab, ɔny ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm. Ɛbɛn ke ow ɔ́ŋ low ɔmn iy ɔny ɛm Abŋ Lala e lɛc ab ɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm obi ɛm a, m’uw any tasi eke ɔny, ɔnyn low erur tasi ɔny obi ɛm, uwr ów nɔnɔ any ɛtŋ ɔtur eke k’ɔmnin ów ɔny ɔfr ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ lɛl na e susu bɛb ɛm a, m’ɔtu mi dad ɛrm susu ɛm ów bɛb ek’it eke mi ki kɔkn ɔny a. Mi kok ɛbɛn, aŋke Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm

ɛw’m Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs, agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci. L’oc l’ɛw’m saw eke mi k’ɔb Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a él egb waw ek’apkl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ Abŋ Lala anake bi kok ke ob ap na b’el Nyam ec’a.
Na sosiɛm, eke m’okr af Jesu Krist ab a, ntotŋ ɔtu eke k’ok’m, juma a eke mi kok m’ɔŋ Nyam a eci.

Tasi ɛm a, eke ɛrm susu ɛm m’ɔtu mi dad low nyam, ke ow el yec’a cɛ eke Krist ɛcr ɛm ɛm kok a. L’ɛcr ɛm ɛm, n’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ɔny Nyam ec’ɛlum. Li kok low na sodad ebl ɛm lele ów kok ɛm ab,
li yɛgm in e lɛc a simɛny ɛwr ɛm lele ów any iti owi ɛm ab, Nyam ec’Abŋ a e lɛc ab ab. Ɛtŋ ow igŋ Jerusalɛm im toŋ ok Iliri e wus ab af, mi cɛcr Krist ec’Amani Mamn ab es nimum.
Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke mi ki cɛcr Amani Mamn ab es susu a cɛ eke agŋ k’uwm Krist any a. Mi kok ɛbɛn eke mi k’úsm êl ɛgŋ ɛjeci ec’êl lebn eke ɛlu nɔmu ɛm ab af.
Mi kok ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: Agŋ a eke wɛl ɔbm in ec’amani a okm a b’ow ɛkn’n, ɛtŋ agŋ ek’irim in e lís owi kaka a b’ow iri.
Sica susu nɔnɔ eke m’im m’ɔb Nyam e kokoba a, el low a eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ́ɔm im abusu eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ a.
Caca ɛm a, m’uwar ɛm e juma ogog aŋa. Ɛtŋ eke akpo nɔnɔ ɛm m’erur eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ a,

ɛm eci Ɛspany wus af eci ɛc im ɛm a, mi b’ow m’ow yogŋ. Ɛɛ, m’ɔny ɔmn eke mi k’ɛkn ɔny, ɛm e yogŋ eci ɛc im ɛm a, ɛtŋ m’am ɔmn ɔny ec’abu eke k’ɛlumn’m ke m’im a. Kaka fɛŋ yɛji, m’erur eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
Gbɛkɔ caca ɛm a, m’aam Jerusalɛm, Nyam ec’agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ec’abu ɛlum eci.
Tasi ɛm a, Maseduan lel Akayi ab eci ɔmn ɛsɛl a bɛbm eke k’ɔkl os ɔ́ŋ Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ab ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru ek’anŋ a.

-Li bɛbm eke -li k’ɛlum wɛl abu, gbɛkɔ nawrɛ ɛm a, ow el labm ek’anŋ ɛl af. Maseduan lel Akayi ab eci ɔmn ɛsɛl a elm Jwifɛl, gbɛkɔ, -n’ɛŋn Jerusalɛm e Jwifɛl eke b’us Krist jam a ec’abu ɛm, ob ɔny a ek’el Nyam ec’a. Sica ɛl yɛji, ow akpl eke ɛl e wus af aŋa ec’ob eke -n’ɔnyn a, -li ki cɛc wɛl ab.
Mi b’oc os a eke -l’ɔkal a m’ɛlu Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ec’agŋ a abu ɛm a, sica ow e jam a, mi b’ow m’im Ɛspany a, mi b’ow m’ɛcr ɔny ogŋ a.
Ɛtŋ m’uw any eke lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ a, mi b’ow m’ow lele Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a nimum ab.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yec’eke m’am ibrm ɔny a, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm lele Abŋ Lala ec’erur a eke b’ɔŋ ɛy ab ab sosiɛm: dògŋnin ɛm ab Nyam eke b’ow ŋɔŋan ɔŋn’m ab ɛm.
Ŋɔ̀ŋan, yec’ɛtŋ ke mi k’ɛ́ym Jude wus ab af ec’agŋ a eke úbm Krist nawrɛ a ec’abu ɛm. Ŋɔ̀ŋan, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ec’agŋ a ɛ́gŋ abu ɛlum a eke m’am oc m’im Jerusalɛm a eb,
ow ɔ́ŋ ke m’ɔ́tu m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, ɛtŋ eke Nyam erur, ke m’ɔ́tu m’eb sel bɛb ɔny ab.
Ke ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab! Amɛn!
Ɛm obi m’am ɛrm ɛy lisijɔw sɛnyn Febe, eke el abu ɛlum lis Saŋkre e Nyamel ab ɛm a.
Èbr ir Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it Nyam ec’agŋ ec’araŋn ab af. Ɛ̀lumn in abu sakp sakp fɛŋ eke li b’ɔny ɔny ec’es abur a, aŋke l’ɛlum agŋ nɔnɔ abu ɛtŋ ɛm obi yɛji l’ɛlum im abu.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Prisil lele ɛc Akilas ab, eke s’am kok juma nyam Jesu Krist ec’a.
-L’ow eke -li k’irmn ɛl e sel a ɛm ec’a e sɔg sosiɛm eci, ɛtŋ ow elm ɛm sɔny cɛ ow itm eke mi k’ɛlu ɛl bia. Sinyamel a fɛŋ ec’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji it eke k’ɔŋ ɛl bia.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Nyamel a yɛj’eke b’as luku ɛl ec’akŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ a. Ɛ̀sŋnin ɛm lawl Epenɛt yɛji. In l’el ɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ek’itŋn ɛrm ɛm el Krist eci Azi wus ab af.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Mari eke kok juma nɔnɔ ɔny ec’a.
Ɛ̀sŋnin Andronikus lele Junias ab. -L’el ɛm ec’agŋ ɛtŋ ɛl ɛrŋ ɛm anake lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm s’anŋ sobel ɛm a. -L’el ɛrm ɛsɛl eke leg nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ -l’ikŋ anym -l’ub Krist nawrɛ gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’anŋ jam.
Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ amua fɛŋ yɛji: Ampliatus ek’el ɛm lawl sɛnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm.
Urbɛn ek’am kok Krist eci juma ɛy ab a lele ɛm lawl Sakis ab.
Apelɛs ek’ɛlu in e cɛcɛ kok ɔkm Krist e nawrɛ ub ɛm, lele Aristobul ec’akŋ ec’agŋ ab ab.
Erodiɔn ek’el ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a, lele Narsis ec’akŋ ec’agŋ ek’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ ab ab.
Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ lisijɔwɛl a ek’el Trifɛn lele Trifɔs ab a. -N’am kok juma nɔnɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci. Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ ɛsɛ: ɛm lisijɔw sɛnyn Pɛrsida eke in yɛji kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma nɔnɔ a.
Rufus ek’el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ɛgŋ sɛnyn eke sɔsum oc, lele lis ek’ɛm yɛji anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm lis af a.
Asɛnkrit, Flegɔn, Ɛrmɛs, Patrobas, Ɛrmas lele agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijɔwɛl ek’anŋ ɛl ab a.
Filolɔg lel ɛy Juli ab, Nere lele lisijɔw ab, Olɛmpas lele Nyam ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛl ab a.
Ɛ̀sŋnin ɔny ɔfr ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijɔwɛl ab af. Krist e Sinyamel a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ɔny.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin low yec’eke m’am dad ɔny: ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm agŋ a eke bi bubr Nyamel ec’agŋ ɛm a e lís. -L’ɔtu eke -li k’ɔny ɔmn ɛsɛl a -l’ok wus, sodad a eke -li b’ow -li dad -l’ok low yɛgm a eke ɛŋan ab af a. Kpàbr es ɛl e lís,

aŋke agŋ amua am kokm Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma ij. Ɛl obi e lok a e juma nana -li bi kok. Ɛl e sodad ebl eke -li b’ok mij ab ɛm lele ɛl e nɛnym ɔb e sodad eke b’iŋn sos ɛm ab ab, -li b’ɛju agŋ a ek’uwm low ŋuŋ any a.
Nawrɛ, ɔny ec’ɛlum a, agŋ a fɛŋ uw any; ow ɔŋ, ɔny sosiɛm, m’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Gbɛkɔ m’am erur eke sɛwr k’iy ɔny ɛm gbɔŋ low mamn kok eci, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́wr ɛrm arur low ŋuŋ ɛgbr es.
Ow k’ow ibnm, ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam a b’ow kikn Satan es ɔny ec’akr ew.
Timote ek’am kok juma ɛm ab a, am ɛsŋn ɔny. Lusius, Jasɔn, lele Sosipatɛr ab ek’el ɛm ec’agŋ a, ɛl yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny.
Ɛm, Tɛrsius eke mi nɔn lɛl na a, m’am ɛsŋn ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’ɔny okr ɛy af ab ɛm.
Gayus am ɛsŋn ɔny, m’ij utu in ogŋ yogŋ ɛtŋ Nyamel nimum b’as luku in ec’akŋ a. Eras ek’el ɛb ec’os es ɛw ɛs a lele ɛy lisijim Kartus ab am ɛsŋn ɔny. [
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab. Amɛn.]
Anygbɛl él Nyam eci! N’ɔny abusu eke li k’ɔŋ ɔny ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke m’am dad Amani Mamn ab ɛm Jesu Krist e lís ab af. Amani Mamn na ɛm, Nyam ɛlu low a eke lɔl es god’ɛtŋ a ɔkm,
ɛtŋ sica, ow ɛru es usuayl ɛm. Sica agŋ a fɛŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ɔtu eke k’uw’r any kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ɛm. Nyam a ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a ɛlu abusu na es, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ úb’r nawrɛ ke ɛ́lum’n.
Anygbɛl él Nyam ek’in sɔny coco ɔny sɛwr a eci! Anygbɛl él in eci Jesu Krist ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci! Amɛn!
Ɛm Pɔl, Nyam ɛsŋ’m aŋke l’erur eke mi k’el Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs. Ɛy lisijim Sɔstɛn ab e nin ɛm,

m’am awŋ Nyamel ek’anŋ Korɛnt, agŋ a eke el Nyam eci ɛl ec’ɔmn a eke okr af Krist ɛm a, lɛl na. Nyam am ɛsŋ ɛl eke -li k’ir ɛb ow eci, ɛsɛ agŋ a eke usu fɛŋ bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm ab af. L’el wɛl eci Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛs’elel eke ɛy yɛji l’el ɛy ec’ab af.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy!
M’ɔ́pim eke mi k’ɛlu Nyam bia ɔny eci, ów amamn a eke Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm n’ɔŋ ɔny a eci.
Ɛɛ, Nyam ɛcr Krist ɛm ɔŋ ɔny ów amamn fɛŋ in e juma a eci, ke ow el in ec’ejagb a ec’any uw, ke ow el lɛc eke wɛl k’ɔny ɔb mɛwl ɛm in ec’odad a e kokoba.
Low nawrɛ, aŋke wɛl ɔb Krist ec’amani ok ɔny ɛtŋ ucur ow e low ɔnyn es kikri.
Ow ɔŋ caca ɛm a, Nyam ec’ob ap kaka anm ek’akm ɔny, lɛgŋ na eke am ekur eke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu k’ɛlu sos ɔkm a.
In anake li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny ínymn es kikri toŋ ókr nuŋ a. Ɛbɛn a k’ow ɔnymn low ɔbr kaka, lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist b’ow ow a.
Nyam el cɛcɛ, in anake l’ɛsŋ ɔny eke ki cɛcr sel ɛŋn Jim ek’el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny eke nɛny k’okr ɔny af, ke ɛm bubr owi k’ánm ɔny ec’araŋn a. Òkar af tasi abŋ ɛm lele tutr ɛm ab.
Ɛɛ, agŋ lisijimɛl, Klowe ec’akŋ ec’agŋ a dad’m eke irirm in anŋ ɔny ɛm.

Kin low a eke m’erur eke mi ki dad a: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ am dad in ec’ek’erur. Ɛgŋ na b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Pɔl eci." Ɛjeci na b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Apolɔs eci." Ɛjeci na b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Piɛr eci." Ɛjeci nyam yɛji b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Krist eci."
Kɔ Krist e li cɛc ee? Kɔ Pɔl wɛl ɛw olikŋ af ɔny ec’ee? Kɔ Pɔl e nin ɛm wɛl ok ɔny mij nuŋ ee?
M’am ɔŋ Nyam bia, aŋke m’okm ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka mij nuŋ, ek’ow elm Krispus lele Gayus ab cɛ.
Nɛnɛ a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum dadm eke ɛm e nin ɛm wɛl ok ɔny mij nuŋ.
Ɛɛ! Nawrɛ, m’am ɔkn eke m’ok Stefanas ec’akŋ a yɛji mij nuŋ. Ow e jam a, mi k’ɔnym ɔmn eke mi k’ok ɛgŋ ɛjeci mij nuŋ.

Krist ɛram im mij ok nuŋ owi ɛm, kɔ Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb eci l’ɛrm’m, ɛtŋ ow elm agŋ e 'sɛwr' e sodad a n’ɔɔm im abusu eke mi k’oc mi kokr juma, yec’ɛtŋ ke Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a k’írmnm in ec’abusu a.
Tasi ɛm a, Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a ec’odad a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi, agŋ a ek’am irm kpab es Nyam e lís a eci. Gbɛkɔ ɛy a eke s’anŋ sel ɛŋn ec’ejagb af a ec’a, si b’ɛkn Nyam ec’abusu ɔny a.
Kin yec’eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm: M’ow m’ɔŋ ɛsɛwru e sɛwr a sel at ɛtŋ m’ow m’ɔny nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl eci nuŋ ɛm ɔny a m’oc es.

Sica bla lowi ɛsɛwru ɔtu eke ɛmɛny ki dad ee? Bla low any uw ɛsɛl ɔtu eke ki dad ee? Ɛtŋ bla ów ɛm apl ɛsɛl ɔtu eke ki dad ee? Bla lowi tasi -l’ɔtu eke ɛmɛny -li ki dad ee? Nyam yɛgm eke wus na eci sɛwr a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ.

Tasi ɛm a, Nyam in e sɛwr ab ɛm kok eke wus na ec’agŋ a ɔtum uwm’n any ɛl obi e sɛwr ab ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, Nyam ɛgŋ eb sɔg agŋ a eke b’ub amani a eke s’am ɔb a nawrɛ a, eke agŋ am tutr eke amani a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi bɔbɔ yɛji.
Jwifɛl am ibrm simɛny ɛwr eke b’iti any, ɛtŋ Grɛkɛl am ɔl yec’a eke -li b’ɛsŋ 'sɛwr' ab es.
Ɛy ec’a gbɛ, Mesi a eke wɛl ɛw olikŋ af ec’amani s’am ɔb. Na, low eke Jwifɛl k’ɔtum ɛgŋm ebm, ke Grɛkɛl b’ɛkn ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi af.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ a, Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ec’a, -l’uw any eke Krist el Nyam ec’abusu ɔny a lele sɛwr ab ab.
Ɛɛ, yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛkn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ 'nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ' af a, ɔny sɛwr akm agŋ eci sɛwr a; ɛtŋ yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛkn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ 'sos ɔnym' af a, ɔny lɛc akm agŋ e lɛc a.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny eke ɛgŋn Nyam ec’ɛsŋ a ebr a, ɛ̀kan ɔny ec’ob eke eel. Ɔny ɛm a, 'ɛsɛwru' ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ b’ɛkan ab af a, nɔnɔ anm, lɛc ɛsɛl nɔnɔ yɛji anm, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ eke wɛl ew bosu amamn ɛm a yɛji anm.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam sɔsum yec’a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ af wus aŋa a, kokr ɛsɛwru ɛ́s. Nyam sɔsum yec’a ek’ɔnym sos wus na a, kokr agŋ a ek’ɔny lɛc a ɛ́s.
Ɛtŋ Nyam sɔsum yec’a eke ɔnym any a oc, yec’a eke ɔny sifn, elm ob kaka a, ŋuŋn yec’a eke agŋ b’ɛkn ɛsɛ ob ek’ɔny any af a.
Nyam kok ɛbɛn, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́lum mɛgŋel ɔkm in ec’any af.

In anake l’okr ɔny af Jesu Krist ab a, ɛtŋ ɛy ec’a, Krist el sɛwr a eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a. Nyam b’ɛcr in ɛm, óc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af. Krist ɛm, li b’ayal ɛy s’ir ɛb in eci, ɛtŋ li bi sɔg ɛy sikpl ec’abu ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af: Eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’ɛw sos, ke l’ɛ́w sos Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sosiɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, lɛgŋ a eke ɛm obi m’ow ɔny ogŋ a eke mi k’ɔb ɔny Nyam e low a eke lɔl es ec’amani a, ow elm sodad ebl amamn m’otm oglog agŋ e 'sɛwr' a m’ocm.
Tasi ɛm a, ɔny ec’araŋn eke m’anŋ a, low nyam cɛ m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke mi k’ɔb ow ec’amani: Jesu Krist lel in ec’olikŋ af e luw ab ab.
Ɛtŋ eke m’ow yogŋ a, m’ɔnym sos, erŋn am ɔny’m ɛtŋ ɛrm mij am ok’m.
Ɛm ec’odad a lele low yɛgm ab ab ɔnym low kaka agŋ e 'sɛwr' a e sodad ebl amamn ab ab. Gbɛkɔ Abŋ Lala ec’abusu ɛm anake irir yec’a eke mi dad a ayl ɔny sos ɛm a.
Nɛnɛ a, ɔny ec’ɔmn a k’ɔtum anm agŋ e 'sɛwr' ab af, kɔ tasi a, Nyam ec’abusu ɔny ab af.
Sica ɛy, sɛwr tasi nyam s’am yɛgm agŋ a eke iy nɛny ɔmn ɛm a, gbɛkɔ sɛwr na elm wus na ec’a; ow elm wus na ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl e 'sɛwr' a eke wɛl b’ow ŋuŋn a.
Ɛy, s’am yɛgm agŋ sɛwr a eke am dad Nyam e low a e lɔl es agŋ ec’any af a e low. Gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke wus ánŋ a, ke Nyam kok sɛwr na ŋ̂, yec’ɛtŋ ke si cɛ́c in ec’anygbɛl a in ab.
Wus na ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ɛm e kaka uwm sɛwr ikŋ na any, aŋke blel -l’uwr ow any ana, blel -n’ɔɔm wɛl ɛwm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a eke anygbɛl fɛŋ el in ec’a olikŋ af.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ów anŋ ek’ɛgŋ ɛknm ke irim lɛgŋ kaka, ów eke n’ɔnym ow e tutr kaka; ów amua tasi anake Nyam bɛbm ok agŋ a ek’ɔny in ec’erur ab es a.
Ɛtŋ ɛy anake Nyam ɛcr in ec’Abŋ Lala ab ɛm yɛgm ɛy ów amua a. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala uw fɛŋ any, toŋ yec’eke lɔl es Nyam e tutr ɛm a yɛji, l’uw any.
Kɔ ɛgŋ e lokm e tutr e lɔl es a, bwo b’uw any ek’ow elm ɛgŋ a in obi ec’abŋ a cɛ ee? Ɛbɛn nyam coco, Nyam e tutr e b’ɔny a yɛji, ow b’el Abŋ Lala cɛ b’uw any.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy, Nyam ɔŋ ɛy in ec’Abŋ a. Na sosiɛm anake s’am tutrm ów ɛsɛ wus ec’agŋ ec’ab af a. Ɛtŋ na sosiɛm yɛji anake s’ɔtu eke si k’uw sob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛy ab any a.

Ɛtŋ s’am dadm sob ap amua e low agŋ e 'sɛwr' e sodad ebl eke s’uw any ab ɛm; si bi dad ɛl e low sodad ebl eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a bi yɛgm ɛy ab ɛm. Nɛnɛ a, si b’otar Nyam ec’Abŋ a ec’ów akr sodad ebl eke b’anŋ Abŋ ikŋ na ɛm cɛ ow a.

Ɛgŋ eke b’us in ec’ów eke b’aw’r a cɛ jam a, ɛ́gŋm yec’a eke b’anŋ Nyam ec’Abŋ a ogŋ ow a ebm. In ec’a, na nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi, ɛtŋ li k’ɔtum l’irim kaka. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala cɛ b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ uw ów amua e jɛj ok owi any.
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yec’eke Abŋ Lala anŋ ɛm a, ɔtu eke ki jɛj ów fɛŋ ok, kɔ in, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum jɛjm in e low okm.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Bwo uw Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci tutr ab any ee? Bwo ɔtu eke k’ɔm’n ów ee? Gbɛkɔ ɛy, s’ɔny Krist e tutr a anŋ ɛy ɛm.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm ec’a, m’ɔtum mi dadm ɔny odad ɛsɛ agŋ eke Nyam ec’Abŋ Lala a am nyimn af. Kɔ mi dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ agŋ eke erur eke k’ir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ ek’ɔnym Abŋ Lala af. Ɔny anŋn ɛsɛ ey abu ɛm af yec’ek’el ɔny ec’ɔmn Krist ɛm a.
M’ɔŋ ɔny mɛny mij ɛgŋn, ow eke ow k’el ob ij leg leg a, aŋke k’ɔtumn ijmn ob leg leg. Ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, k’ɔtumn cɛ,
