aŋke am erurir eke k’iir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ ek’ɔnym Abŋ Lala af. Tasi ɛm a, ek’ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, nyamnɛyr lele ów ɛsu ab b’anŋ, ke anmn ɛsɛ agŋ ɛjec’ab af ee? Ke ɔny ec’ɛb ir a anm sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛsɛ agŋ a ek’ɔnym Abŋ Lala ec’ab af ee?
Eke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Pɔl eci m’el," ɛtŋ ɛjeci nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm gbɛ Apolɔs eci m’el a," ke ki dadmn odad ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ ɛjec’a bi dad ab af ee?
Apolɔs, ke bwo ee? Ɛtŋ Pɔl, ke bwo ee? Ɛy Nyam e juma kok ɛsɛl cɛ. Ɛy ɛm Nyam ɛcr ɔŋ ɔny eel ɔmn ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam kok juma in ec’ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ’n ab ɛm.
Ɛm, m’ewl egb a, ɛtŋ Apolɔs ok’r mij, kɔ Nyam anake ɔŋ’n l’agb a.
Ow anake ɛgŋ a ek’ewl egb a lele ɛgŋ a eke ok’r mij ab ab elm low kaka a. Kɔ ɛgŋ a ek’ɔŋ’n l’agb a anake kok low a fɛŋ a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a, in l’el Nyam.
Ɛgŋ a eke b’ewl a lele ɛgŋ a eke b’ok mij ab ab el kpɛŋ. Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e juma a eke kok a e labm sɔg.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ Nyam ab s’am kok juma, ɛtŋ ɔny eel Nyam eci ɔgm a. Ɔny cɛ ɛmɛny eel in ec’êl a eke l’us a.
Ɛm ec’ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m ab ɛm, mi sigm lebn nɔmu ɛm ab es ɛsɛ êl us ɛs mamn af, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci fɛŋ am us af yogŋ. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́w ɛrm, af yogŋ ec’us ab ɛm.
Lebn nɔmu ɛm a anŋ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ: ow ow el Jesu Krist. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛlum lebn ɛjeci nɔmu ɛm.
Ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’oc sika, jɛtɛ, mebn ey amamn, oglog likŋ, bɛny oglog papo, us lebn nɔmu ɛm na af.
Gbɛkɔ, ɛgŋ fɛŋ e juma a b’ow ɛru es kpata wɛl ɛkn jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, aŋke lɛgŋ a, al ligbɛl nyam b’ow anŋ eke b’ow ɛlu ɛgŋ fɛŋ e juma e kok a e sakpl a ɔkm.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam us êl ek’ij lɛc al a ec’any af, li b’ow n’ɛŋn ob ap.
Eke ow ɛcrm ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ in e juma a ɛtu al ab ɛm a, li b’ow l’irmn fɛŋ. In, li b’ow n’ɛŋn sel, gbɛkɔ ow b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uru es ubr al ɛm af.
Ɔny uwmn any eke eel Nyam ec’êl a, ke Nyam ec’Abŋ a ir ɔny ɛm ee?
Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ŋuŋn Nyam ec’êl a, Nyam b’ow ŋuŋn’n, aŋke in ec’êl a el lala ɛtŋ êl a, ow ow el ɔny.
Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́jur in sosi. Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny ec’araŋn a am ocr in sosi sɛwru, ɛsɛ wus ec’agŋ ec’elel eke bi tutar ab af, ow akpl eke 'nuŋ ɛm k’uŋ’n' ke l’él sɛwru tasi.
Tasi ɛm a, wus ec’agŋ e sɛwr a, Nyam ec’a nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ. Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Nyam b’ɔny ɛsɛwru, ɛl obi eci kprakpr ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ Nyam Lɛl cɛ ɛmɛny dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ uw ɛsɛwru e tutr ab any, l’uw any eke ow elm low kaka.
Ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum eke k’ɛw sos eke n’am us any ɛs kaka fɛŋ jam a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, fɛŋ el ɔny eci:
Pɔl, Apolɔs oglog Piɛr, wus na, sel, luw, caca ɛm lele lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ab.
Fɛŋ el ɔny eci, gbɛkɔ ɔny, eel Krist eci ɛtŋ Krist el Nyam eci.
Ow akpl cɛ eke ki lɛɛr ɛy ɛsɛ Krist e juma kok ɛsɛl lele ob nyamn af ɛw ɛsɛl eke l’abul Nyam ec’ów nawrɛ eke lɔl es ab af.
Low cɛ eke wɛl b’ibrm ob nyamn af ɛw ɛsɛl a el: ke -l’el cɛcɛ.
Ɛm ec’a, ɔtur eke ki jɛjr ɛm e low okr, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɔtu eke ki jɛj ɛm e juma a ok, ow ɔnym any kaka; tasi a, mi jɛjm ɛm obi e juma m’okm.
Tasi ɛm a, m’am ɛkn eke ɛm e tutr ɛm a, m’ɔnym low kaka eke mi k’okr ɛm sosi ów af, gbɛkɔ ow elm ke ɛbɛn a mi k’ɔ́nym low ɔbr eci. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake bi jɛj ɛm e low ok a.

Ow sosiɛm a, gbuŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lɛgŋ a k’ow a, kì jɛjr k’okr. In anake li b’ow l’ɛlu yec’a eke lɔl es ncebn ɛm a ɔkm a, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔny sow tutr ek’anŋ mɛrm ɛm a l’ok ɔkm usu ayl ɛm. Ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow aw ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, low a eke mi dad a ec’a, ɔny sosiɛm m’oc Apolɔs lele ɛm obi ɛm obi ab m’ɔkŋn any. M’erur eke mi ki yɛgm ɔny nyandrɛ na e liy a: "K’àfŋ ow a eke wɛl nɔn ab es k’im." Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́w sos ki dad k’ɛsɛ low yɛgm ɛs na ɔny any akm lawl nyam a.
Tasi ɛm a, bwo am ɔŋ agb akm awlŋɛl ɛjec’a jɛj ɛl owi ok ee? Kɔ fɛŋ a ek’ɔny a, ow elm Nyam ɔɔm’ŋ ee? Ɛtŋ ek’ow el Nyam ɔŋ’ŋ, bla sosiɛm k’ɛw sos, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ow’n elm ob eke ŋ ɛŋn ɔfr ɛm af ee?
Am kokr ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ów a fɛŋ cɛ ɔny uwr any af. Am ocar ɔny sosi ób ɔnyu! Ɔbr nuŋ kpɛkŋ am eel ɛ́b ebu ek’ɛy s’anm ɛm yɛji! Ow akpal ɔny gbɛ! Blel ɔny eel ɛ́b ebu ana, ɛy yɛji, blel s’el ɔny ab!
Ɛm e tutr ɛm a, ɛy ɛrm ɛsɛl a, Nyam ot ok ɛy agŋ a ek’ɔsŋ es a e jam, ɛsɛ agŋ eke wɛl ɔb low luw ec’af. Ɛtŋ wɛl ɛw ɛy an wus nimum ec’any af lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af ab.

Ɛy, wɛl am ot ɛy ɛsɛ 'eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ' ɛsɛl af Krist sosiɛm, kɔ ɔny, am otar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ 'ɛsɛwru' af ɔny lel Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm. Ɛy, wɛl am ot ɛy agŋ fuɛfuɛ, kɔ ɔny, am otar ɔny sosi lɛc ɛsɛl. Ɔny, wɛl b’ɛlum ɔny nɔnɔ, kɔ ɛy, wɛl úbm ɛy.
Toŋ sicaca ɛm, ɛmɛny namn am ɔny ɛy, mij amn am ɔny ɛy, s’ɔnym mob sus ɛm. Wɛl am ijr ɛy gbre ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ s’am adŋ es s’ɛc.
S’am ij gbre si kok juma ɛy obi ec’abu ɛm. Wɛl bi wɛwr ɛy, ke s’ám ibrm Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ s’ɔŋ agŋ a. Wɛl b’ijr ɛy gbre, ke s’ám ɛgŋ s’eb.
Wɛl bi cak ɛy, kɔ si b’atr agŋ ɛjec’a sos es. Toŋ yɛfɛnyna, agŋ ec’a, s’anŋ ɛsɛ lirŋ af suw egŋun eke agŋ papl es ɔwl ab af.
Mi nɔnm ów amua m’awm ɔny ɛ́s eke mi k’ɔŋ ɔny eci. Kɔ eke eel ɛm ec’ey amamn eke mi b’erur a, ow sosiɛm anake m’am ɛwar ɔny a.

Tasi ɛm a, eke agŋ fandi lɛw am ow yɛgm ɔny Krist ab ec’ɛb ir owi yɛji, ɔnymn ey ɛsɛl nɔnɔ. Kɔ ow elm ɛm anake ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ɛs af, m’ɔŋ ɔny sel ɛŋn a ek’anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke m’is ɔny Amani Mamn ab ee?
Ow sosiɛm a, m’am ibrm ɔny eke k’ebr ɛm e sɛwl a.

Ɛtŋ ow nuŋ af, m’ɛrm Timote ɛm ec’iy e m’erur tasi ke el cɛcɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm a ɔny ec’araŋn. Li b’ow li kɔkn ɔny sebr a eke bi nyimn’m ɛm lele Krist ab ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm a, yec’a eke mi bi yɛgm susu fɛŋ lele Sinyamel fɛŋ ɛm ab a.
Ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb tutr eke mi k’ow m’ɛwlm m’owm ɔny ogŋ a ij, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm am ɛw sos.
Gbɛkɔ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur, waa na ɛm cɛ, mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛkn tasi sós ɛwu amua e sodad ebl a, ke m’ɛkn tasi ɛl ec’abusu a yɛj’eke -n’ɔnyn eke -li ki kokr Nyam e juma a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a elm sodad ebl e low, kɔ abusu ɔny e low.
Lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ a, bla lowi am erurir ee? Kɔ m’ábu likŋni ab m’ow oglog kɔ m’ów ɛrm ek’erur iy ɛm gbɔŋ lele ɛrm frɔrɔ ab ee?
Wɛl am iri usu a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ec’araŋn a, nfaci ij owi nyam in anŋ, ɛtŋ low ikŋ a, in el low ŋuŋ kɔ kɔ kɔ eke Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ec’araŋn bɔbɔ yɛji in anm. Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam in am ɛrum ow ɛs ɛy ab.
Ɔny, low nɛnɛ na am ok ɔny ntotŋ! Sos nana ow it eke ow k’ɔwr ɔny es; ɛgŋ nɛnɛ na, ow it eke ki kokr elel eke ɔtur eke ki kokr bake ógŋn in ɔny ec’araŋn a!
Ɛm ec’a, eke m’anŋ kpekpe yɛji, abŋ ɛm a m’anŋ ɔny ab. Ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ a eke kok low nɛnɛ a, mi jɛj in owi m’ok god’ɛtŋ, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ɔny ec’araŋn cɛ ɛm anŋ af.
Àsr luku Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm, m’ow m’anŋ ɔny ab abŋ ɛm. Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’abusu ab ab,
ócr ɛgŋ ikŋ na ɛlul Satan abu ɛm eke li k’ij gbre in e sos megl ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e liy a ɛ́ŋn sel, lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ow a.
Sica ɔny, eke am ɛwr sos ke ɔnyn low ɔbr! Ɔny, uwr elel eke lijru tɛl cɛ b’ɔŋ farin a nimum inŋ ab any;

ɔ̀nyn sikpl e lijru sig a ocr es, ke éel agŋ ek’ ayl. Ɛbɛn a b’ow anŋn ɛsɛ futufutu owr eke wɛl kok ke lijru anm ɛm ab af, aŋke Nyam yɔyɔg ɔny es ɛtŋ Krist ec’egb waw e luw a anŋ ɛsɛ ɛy e Pak e licɛbli ab af.
Ow sosiɛm, si kókr Pak a futufutu eke lijru anm ɛm lele ɛrm ek’ayl ke ij nawrɛ ab. Si k’íjr futufutu eke wɛl kok lijru sig ab a ij, lijru ek’el ów eŋuŋ lele ɛrm suŋ ab ec’a.
Ɛm e lɛl a eke m’ikŋ anym m’awŋ ɔny ab ɛm, mi nɔn eke k’ɔ́nymn mɛcrer agŋ a eke b’ij nfaci ab ab.

Gbɛkɔ lɛl ab ɛm a, mi dadm ɔny eke ki kpabr es wus ec’agŋ a fɛŋ e lís! Nawrɛ, agŋ anŋ eke b’ij nfaci, b’erur os owi nɔnɔ, b’ɛju agŋ eb ob ij, ke b’igŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ. Blel ow el agŋ amua ana, ke wus na af k’ŋgbroŋn nimum nimum a!

Njaŋ, m’erur cɛ e mi ki dad ɔny eke k’ɔnymn mɛcrer agŋ a eke b’ij nin ek’el Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ke b’ij nfaci, b’iy mil, b’igŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ oglog bi cak ɛl lawlɛl a. Agŋ a eke b’ɛgŋ mar afŋn es oglog b’ɛju agŋ eb ob ij a, k’ùsr abu agŋ nɛnɛ ab, k’ìjr ob bɔbɔ yɛji!

Tasi ɛm a, kɔ ɛm ow it eke mi ki jɛj agŋ a ek’ubm Nyam nawrɛ a e low m’ok ee? Ɛl ec’a, Nyam anake b’ow jɛj ɛl owi ok a. Ɔny, agŋ a ek’el ɔny ec’araŋn ec’agŋ a e low ki jɛjr okr. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ògŋn ɛgŋ ŋuŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a.
Eke odad b’anŋ ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ b’ocr low a im ɔŋn jɛj ok ɛsɛl eke uwm Nyam any a jɛj ok, ow a eke k’oc imn agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a ogŋ ab ee?
Ɔny, uwmn any eke agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a b’ow jɛj wus e low ok ee? Ɛtŋ eke b’ow jɛjr wus e low okr, ke ów ekekey nɛnɛ anake k’ɔtumn jɛjmn okmn ab ee?
Ɔny, uwmn any eke si b’ow si jɛj afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ów s’ok ee? Sica ayaf si k’ɔtum si jɛjm wus aŋa ec’ów s’okm ee?
Gbɛkɔ, eke b’ɔnyn jɛj ok owi ów amua ec’a, b’imn otr jɛj ok ɛsɛl eke ɔnym low kaka Nyamel ab a!
Ɛtŋ na eke m’am dad a, ɔny ec’ɛ́s. Ɔny ec’araŋn aŋa, ɛgŋ nyamni yɛji anm elm sɛwru eke k’ɔtu jɛj low eke b’anŋ agŋ lisijimɛl ɔfr ec’araŋn a ok ee?
Kɔ ow akpl tasi eke Krist ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim nyam k’ɔŋ lawl nyam dedeku jɛj ok ɛsɛl ek’uwm Nyam any a ogŋ ee?

Ɔny ec’a, ow akpl ek’uwr any eke ɔny ɔfr e dedeku ɔŋanin a el low ek’ɛlu ɔny wus! Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ k’ɛ́gŋmn ɛnyɛmbri yony e jɛj ok a nana ebmn ee? Bla sosiɛm k’ɛ́gŋmn eke ɔny lawlɛl ɛjec’a k’iy ob ek’el ɔny ec’a nana ee?
Ɔny nana anake eel ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl a, ɔny anake am iyr agŋ ɛjec’a mil a! Ke agŋ ɛjec’a, Krist ɛm ec’ɔny lisijimɛl cɛ.

Ɔny uwmn any eke ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl k’ow ijm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’aja ab ee? Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́ju ɔny! Agŋ a eke b’ij nfaci, b’igŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ, igŋ oglog yɔw eke b’ɛju lawl mɛbi owi ɛm, egŋ a eke b’ɛrum ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ab ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ɔyɔw af a lele egŋ a eke b’agbr lɔsŋn ŋgbafrɛ oto ab a, k’ow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.
Ɛbɛn nyam coco elu, agŋ a eke b’erur os owi nɔnɔ, már ɛgŋu, agŋ a eke bi cak ɛl lawlɛl lele agŋ a eke b’ɛju agŋ eb ob ij ab ab yɛji, k’ow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a!

Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, nɛnɛ anake ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb anŋ a. Gbɛkɔ ɛy e Nyam a yɔyɔg ɔny e sikpl ab es, l’ayal ɔny eke k’ir ɛb in ab, n’ɔŋ ɔny eel nyim nyim in ec’any af. Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm lele Abŋ Lala ab ec’abusu ɛm li kok.
Ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: "Fɛŋ e kok ec’abusu ɛru’m es." Nawrɛ, gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’am dad eke ow elm fɛŋ akplm ɛy eci. Mi k’ow mi yɛbm ob kaka fɛŋ ɔɔm im m’elm in ec’adu.

Bi dadr yɛji ɛsrɛ: "Ob ij, lok eci n’anŋ, ɛtŋ lok yɛji anŋ ob ij eci." Nawrɛ, gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ nyam, Nyam b’ow ŋuŋn ɛl a yony mum. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake kok ɛy e sos megl a, ɛtŋ ɛy e sos megl a el in eci. Li kokm ow nfaci ijr eci.
Nyam eke igbm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ luw ɛm a, b’ow oc in ec’abusu ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji igbm ɛy luw ɛm.
Ɔny uwmn any eke ɔny e sos a el Krist e sos ogog ogog ab ee? Kɔ m’ɔtu eke mi k’oc Krist e sos ogog nyam m’okr af facyɔw ab ee? Njaŋ, mi k’ɔtum!
Uwmn any eke ɛgŋ nyam eke okr af facyɔw ab a el sos megl nyam in ab ee? Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ke -l’okr af -l’el sos megl nyam.
Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’okr af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a, b’el nyam coco in ab abŋ ɛm.

K’òcr ɔny e sos megl a k’ijmn nfaci ab. Sikpl ɛjeci fɛŋ eke agŋ ɔtu eke ki kok a, elm sikpl eke wɛl bi kokm sos megl ab. Kɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam oc in e sos megl a am ijm nfaci ab, ow el low ŋuŋ eke n’am kok l’ɔbr in e sos megl a.
Uwmn any eke ɔny e sos megl a el usu lala a ek’el Abŋ Lala ec’ɛb ir usu ab ee? Abŋ Lala na anŋ ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ l’el Nyam ec’ob ek’ɔŋ ɔny. Ow sosiɛm a, ɔny, elmn ɔny obi ɔny obi ec’ij.
Nyam ɔl ɔny an ligbɛl ɛm eke k’eel ewi. Ow sosiɛm, òcr ɔny e sos megl a ɛlul in ec’anygbɛl a ɔkm.
Sica, m’am m’ow mi dad ɔny ów a eke bibrmn’m ɔny e lɛl ab ɛm a e low. Ɔny bi dadr eke ow’n akpl eke ɛgŋ igŋ in k’ɔ́nym yɔw.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ eke b’ij nfaci a sosiɛm, ke igŋ fɛŋ ɔ́ny in e yɔw, ke yɔw fɛŋ ɔ́ny in ec’igŋ.
Ke igŋ fɛŋ kók low yec’ek’el igŋ ec’eke ki kók in e yɔw e lís a, ke yɔw fɛŋ yɛji kók in ec’igŋ e lís ec’ek’it a,
aŋke yɔw k’ɔtum ocm in e sos a kokrm low yec’eke l’erur a: in e sos a, in ec’igŋ a eci. Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, igŋ yɛji k’ɔtum ocm in e sos a, kokrm low yec’eke l’erur a: in e sos a in e yɔw a eci.

Ɛgŋ lawl k’ɔ́nyn sos es lawl e lís, ek’ow elm Nyam eke k’ɔnyn abusu ŋɔŋan eci cɛ. Eke b’ow kokr ɛbɛn lɛgŋ tɛl eci yɛji, ke ow él nɛny af okr ɛm ki kokr. Kɔ ow e jam a, ɛ̀wal am ɛrur usu nyam; ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, k’ɔtumn ɔnynmn sos es ij, ɛtŋ Satan ɔtu eke k’ebr ow ɛm ɛju ɔny.
Low na eke m’am dad a, elm ol eke m’am ɔŋ ɔny, kɔ low cɛ eke m’am ɛw es m’ɔŋ ɔny.
M’am erur tasi eke agŋ a fɛŋ k’anŋ ɛl sɔny ɛsɛ ɛm af, gbɛkɔ Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ bibm nyam eke k’el in sɔny cɛ eci.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛl sɔny a lele eŋnyɔw ab ab, m’am dad ɔny m’ɛsɛ: eke b’anŋn ɛsɛ ɛm af, ow el low nimamn ɔny eci.
Gbɛkɔ eke k’ɔtumn ɔnynmn sos es a, ɛ̀birir! Ow akpl eke k’ɛbirir, ow a eke k’anŋn low ám aw ɔny ijr ɔny gbre a.

Agŋ a eke ɛbirir a, m’am dad eke k’anŋn usu nyam, ɛs’elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in obi dad ab af. Igŋ itm eke k’ogŋ in e yɔw a, ɛtŋ yɔw itm eke k’ɛlu in ec’igŋ ab es. Eke l’ɛlu in ec’igŋ ab es a, ke n’ánŋ in sɔny oglog ke l’ɛ́gŋ l’eb l’okr ɛm ow ab.

Agŋ a eke ɛbirir ke ɛl e yɔw a oglog igŋ a ubm Nyam nawrɛ a, m’ɔny ów eke ɛl yɛji mi k’ɔm ɛl, ɛtŋ na ec’a, ow elm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dadm, kɔ ɛm m’am dad. Eke Krist ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ɔny yɔw eke ubm Nyam nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow erur eke ow k’ir ɛb in ab a, ow itm eke li k’ogŋ ow, ek’ow elm nawrɛ ub lis a sosiɛm.
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, eke nawrɛ ub lis nyam ɔny igŋ ek’ubm Nyam nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow erur eke ow k’ir ɛb in ab a, ow itm eke li k’ŋgboŋ ow ab, ek’ow elm nawrɛ ub ɛs a sosiɛm.

Tasi ɛm a, yɔw ɛc na ek’elm nawrɛ ub ɛs a titm Nyam nɔnɔ, in e yɔw a eke l’ɛbi a sosiɛm. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, igŋ ɛy a ek’elm nawrɛ ub lis a yɛji titm Nyam nɔnɔ, in ec’igŋ a eke l’ɛbi a sosiɛm. Blel ow elm nɛnɛ ana, ɔny ec’ey a blel anŋ ɛsɛ ey ek’itm eke Nyam k’ɛgŋ eb af, kɔ nawrɛ ɛm a, -l’ɛbm eke Nyam k’ɛgŋ eb ɛl.

Gbɛkɔ, ek’ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’ubm Nyam nawrɛ a am erur eke k’im a, l’ɔtu eke li k’im. Eke ow ɛcr nɛnɛ a, ɛgŋ lisijim a oglog ɛgŋ lisijɔw a ɔnym low kaka ɛgŋ yec’ab ab ij. Ùwr any cɛ eke Nyam, in ec’a ɛrm es ɛy ec’ɛb ir ɛm l’ɛsŋ ɔny.
Kɔ igŋ ɛy, ɔtu eke k’uw any eke b’ow sɔg ŋ ec’igŋ ab ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ yɔw ɛc, ɔtu eke k’uw any eke ŋ yɛji b’ow sɔg ŋ e yɔw ab ee?

Lɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny a, ɔny ec’elel a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛwr ɔny anŋn ab ɛm, am iir ɛb. Sica, eke ow elm mɛbi e low na eke mi dad a, ow it ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ir ɛb elel eke n’anŋn ab ɛm. Ol na anake m’am ɛw es Sinyamel a fɛŋ ɛm a.
Lɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ a, ke ubr likr es ŋ̂ ee? Ek’ow el ɛbɛn, ànŋ elel a ek’anŋn a! Eke l’ɛsŋ’ŋ a, ke k’ubrm likr es ee? Ek’ow el ɛbɛn, k’ìm catŋ k’ubr es!
Ke wɛl úbr likr es oglog ke wɛl k’úbrm es, elm low a eke el low tasi a. Low tasi a eke wɛl ki kok a el Nyam e low a eke dad a ec’ɛlum a.
Ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ánŋ in ec’elel a eke n’anŋn ke Nyam ɛsŋ’n a.
Eke Nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ a, kɔ adu el ee? Eke ow el adu el ke k’èbr ow e low ɛrm mij! Kɔ ek’ɔtu ek’el lewi, ke él kpɛkŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ek’el adu ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛsŋ a, el lewi ɛtŋ el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, ɛgŋ nyam ek’el lewi ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛsŋ a, el Krist ec’adu.
An ligbɛl Nyam ɛnm ɔŋ ɔny eel ewi. Ow sosiɛm, k’èel ɛgŋ ɛjeci e madu.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ánŋ in ec’elel a eke n’anŋn ke Nyam ɛsŋ’n a.

Ibrmn ɛm ec’elel eke m’am ɛkan ededyɔw oto eke ɛbim egŋ a e lís owi. M’ɛŋnm ol kaka anm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ owm low na eci. Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny ɛm ec’elel eke m’am ɛkan low a. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ek’ɔny ɛm e lís a sosiɛm, ɔtur eke k’ɔnyn ɔmn ɛm ɛm.
Kin yec’eke m’am tutr a: lɛgŋ na ɛm e ses babur a sosiɛm, ek’agŋ ɛbirm, ow akpl ɛbɛn. Ɛɛ, ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke n’anŋn ab af.
Kɔ ɛbi yɔw ee? Ek’ɛbi yɔw ke k’ɔ̀l in ec’es ɛlu ij. Ɛbim yɔw ee? Ek’ɛbim yɔw ke k’ɔ̀l e k’ɛbi ij.

Gbɛkɔ, eke am ɛbi yɔw, ow elm sikpl kokm. Ɛtŋ eke dedyɔwli nyam ɛbi igŋ, in yɛji ow elm sikpl li kokm. Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke ɛbirir a b’ow ij gbre nɔnɔ ɛl e sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛm, m’erur eke low nɛnɛ k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am dad ɔny eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mowrer e sɛgŋ a ɔfum ij. Caca ɛm ec’agŋ ek’ɛbi ɔyɔw a, kók ɛsɛ wɛ’n ɛbim af.
Ɛl a ek’am ikŋ ɔŋn a, kók ɛsɛ wɛ’n ikŋm ij af. Ɛl a ek’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a, kók ɛsɛ ow’n iŋnm wɛl af. Ke ɛl a ek’am ɔl mob a, kók ɛs’ɛbɛn mob a eke wɛ’n ɔl a in elm wɛl ec’af.
Ɛl a eke am ɛŋn ob ij wus ec’ɛb ir na ɛm a, kók ɛs’ɛbɛn wɛ’n ɛŋnm in ijm af. Ɛɛ, wus na ec’ów a ec’elel eke anŋn yɛfɛnyna a, k’ow anm ɛbɛn sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
M’am erur eke k’ɔnymn ɛrm mij kaka. Ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛbim yɔw a, b’ebr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ów ɛrm mij nɔnɔ, kok elel eke in owi k’awr ow.
Kɔ ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛbi yɔw a, b’ebr wus ec’ów ec’ɛrm mij nɔnɔ, kók elel eke in owi k’awr in e yɔw a,

ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ów yony a ec’araŋn li bi cɛc. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, yɔw nyam oglog dedyɔwli nyam eke ɛbim igŋ a, b’ebr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ów ɛrm mij nɔnɔ. -Li b’erur eke -li k’el ow eci nimum nimum, -l’oc ɛl ec’ɛgŋ el a pupukpaŋ -n’ɔŋ ow. Kɔ yɔw nyam ek’ɛbi igŋ a, b’ebr wus ec’ów ɛrm mij nɔnɔ, kók elel eke in owi k’awr in ec’igŋ a.
M’am dad low na ɔny e nimamn eci, kɔ ow elm gbre eke mi k’ɔŋ ɔny ijr eci. M’am erur eke ki sɔsumn yec’eke akpl a ocr, ow ɔ́ŋ ke úcur Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔnyn es, éel in sɔny coco eci.

Sica, eke igŋ nyam ek’ɛsu yɔw a, ow ec’erur a am afŋn in es, ɛtŋ n’am uru eke li ki kok low ɔbr ow e lís eke -li k’anm ow yony a, ow akpl eke igŋ a ki kok low e n’am ɛkn ek’el low tasi a. -L’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛbirir -l’ok es. Eke -l’ɛbirir a, ke na elm sikpl eke -li kokr.

Gbɛkɔ l’ɔtu eke li dad n’ɔŋ in ec’ɛrm a eke li k’ow l’ɛbim in e dedyɔw a, l’ɛruam ow ab yɛji. Eke li dad tasi n’ɔŋ in ec’ɛrm a, ek’ow elm atrm ɛm ɛtŋ l’ɔtu eke li k’ɔnyn sos es ow ec’erur a eke b’aw’r afŋn es a e lís, eke l’ɛbim ow ke ow akpl ɛbɛn.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ a ek’ɛbi in e dedyɔw a kok low mamn, gbɛkɔ in a ek’ɛgŋm eke k’ɛbi in e dedyɔw a kok ow akpl nɔnɔ.
Igŋ ɛy fɛŋ b’anŋ in ec’igŋ ab sɛgŋ a nimum eke n’anŋ owr a. Eke in ec’igŋ a b’uw a, n’ɔny abusu eke li k’ɛbi igŋ eke l’erur a, gbɛ ke l’él igŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm cɛ.
Gbɛkɔ ɛm ɛm ec’a, m’am ɛkn eke li b’ow n’anŋ ehe ɛm eke n’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke n’anŋn ab af. Ɛtŋ m’ɔny tutr eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a anŋ’m ɛm.

Sica ɔny e lɛl ek’awŋn’m ab ɛm, ibrmn’m eke wɛl ɔtu ek’ij mindey eke wɛl bi kokr egb waw ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ a. Ow a eke am dadr a, low nawrɛ: "Ɛy fɛŋ s’ɔny low na ec’any uw tasi." Gbɛkɔ low any uw na b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛw sos. Kɔ erur b’ɔŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a agb ɔmn ɛm.
Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am ɔny tutr eke in uw low nyam any, ke li k’uwm elel eke wɛl b’uwr low any a.
Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam b’erur Nyam, ɛgŋ a, in yɛji Nyam b’uw’r any.
Low a ek’ibrmn’m a el: "Kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ij ndey eke wɛl wawr egb ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ ab ee?" Ɛy s’uw any tasi eke Nyam nyam cɛ anŋ, ɛtŋ sinyam yadŋ a elm low kaka.
Nawrɛ, agŋ bɛb bi dad eke sinyam in anŋ afr lele wus aŋa ab. Ɛl ec’a, sinyam a nɔnɔ gbɛl ɛtŋ -li b’oc wɛl ɛsɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ af.

Gbɛkɔ ɛy ec’a, s’uw any eke Nyam nyam coco cɛ anŋ, ek’el ɛy Ɛs. In anake li kok ob ob fɛŋ a, ɛtŋ in eci anake s’anŋ owr a. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛji, nyam cɛ anŋ, in l’el Jesu Krist. In e sabu ɛm li kok ob ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ ɛy yɛji, in ec’abu ab ɛm s’anŋ owr.

Gbɛkɔ ow elm ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ uwm low nawrɛ na any! Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, agŋ bɛb sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ a ɛcm ab. Ow ɔŋ caca ɛm a, eke -li b’ij ndey eke wɛl kokr egb waw a, ke -n’am ɔny tutr eke ndey a, sinyam nawrɛ tasi wɛl oc kokr egb waw ɔŋ. Ɛtŋ eke -l’eel fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a, -li bi tutr eke ndey a b’ɔŋ -l’el agŋ ek’aylm Nyam ec’any af.
Ke ow elm ob ij k’ow ɔɔm ɛy si titam Nyam. Eke s’ijm yɛji, s’irmnm ob kaka, ɛtŋ eke s’ij yɛji, si k’ow s’ɛŋnm ob kaka.
Abusu ɛru ɔny es low fɛŋ ek’erurir e kok eci. Gbɛkɔ ɛ̀wr ɛrm, abusu na ek’ɛru ɔny es a itm eke k’ɔny agŋ a ek’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a ok wus!

Tasi ɛm a, ŋ ek’ɔny 'low any uw' a, eke ɛgŋ nyam ek’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a ɛkn’ŋ ek’anŋ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ usu am ij ob, kɔ ow k’ow atrm’n sos es eke li k’ij ndey eke wɛl kokr egb waw ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ ab ee?
Ŋ e low any uw a sosiɛm, esŋ jim a eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a, b’ow ɛy wus, in eke Krist uw in sosiɛm a!
Eke bi kokr sikpl ɛrŋ na ɔbar ɔny lisijimɛl, ɔ́ŋn ɛl ec’ɔmn fuɛfuɛ a abur es, ke Krist anake am kokr sikpl ɔbar a.
Na sosiɛm anake ob nyam eke mi b’ow mij, ke b’ow ɔny ɛm lisijim nyam ɛlu sikpl ɛm a sosiɛm, mi k’ow m’ijm ndey ij, yec’ɛtŋ ke mi k’ɛ́lum’n wus a.
Ɛm yɛji, abusu ɛru’m es eke mi ki kok low eke m’erur. Kɔ m’elm ɛrm ɛs ee? Kɔ m’ɛknm ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ee? Kɔ elmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma eke m’am kok a ec’ey ek’ɔsu ee?
Eke agŋ bɛb ec’a m’elm ɛrm ɛs yɛji, ɔny ec’a gbɛ, m’el. Tasi ɛm a, ɔny anake eel ɛm e juma eke m’uw kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a, ec’ey eke ɔsu a.
Kin odad eke m’am dad agŋ a eke am ok’m ów af a:
Kɔ ɛy s’ɔnym abusu eke si k’ɛŋn ob ij lele mar ab ɛy e juma a ec’ee?
Kɔ ɛy s’ɔnym abusu eke si k’ɛbirir nawrɛ ub lís nyam ab ee? Ɛrm ɛsɛl bɛb a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lisijimɛl a lele Piɛr ab kok ɛbɛn!
Kɔ ɛm lele Barnabas ab cɛ anake ow it eke si ki kok juma ɛjeci gbuŋ ke s’ɛ́ŋn ob s’ij ab ee?
Eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ ɛgŋ aŋgase a, ɛgŋ a am sɔgm labm kokm aŋgase e juma. Eke wɛl b’ewl likŋni a, wɛl b’ij in ec’ey a. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl b’ɔsu mɛbob a, wɛl b’ɛgŋ ɛl e mɛny mij a.
Kɔ ów amua eke m’am dad a, agŋ ec’ɛb ir ɛm cɛ ow anŋ ee? Kɔ Mois ec’ ol a am dadm low nyam coco ab ee?
Tasi ɛm a, Mois ec’ol ab ɛm wɛl nɔn: K’ow ocmn meb ɔnynmn id eke wɛl ucu meb am kikn may es a nɛny es. Am tutar eke Nyam, sed ec’ɛrmij n’am ebr ee?

Oglog ɛy e low n’am tutr sodad na ɛm ee? Nawrɛ ɛm a, ɛy sosiɛm wɛl nɔn sodad amua. Ɛgŋ eke b’ewl egb a, b’ɔmn egb ey eke li k’ɛŋn l’ub. Ɛtŋ in a eke egb ub e lɛgŋ a, bi kok juma a yɛji b’ɔmn egb ey a eke k’ɛbm’n a.
Ɛsɛ agŋ eke b’ewl egb af, s’ewl Abŋ Lala ec’ów amamn a ek’anŋ afr ow a ɔny ɛm. Eke s’am ub ɔny e wus af aŋa e mob a ek’ɔnyn a e tɛl, ke ow ɛny nɔnɔ gbɛl ee?

Eke agŋ bɛb ɔny abusu kok ɛbɛn ɔny af, ke ɛy tasi anake s’ɔny abusu na s’akm ɛl a! Gbɛkɔ ɛy s’ɛgŋm s’ɛlum abusu na e s’ɔny a e low ɔkm. Kɔ s’ɛgŋ nana low fɛŋ s’eb, Krist ec’Amani Mamn a e wus eke k’ɛym eci.

Ɔny, uwr any ek’agŋ a e bi kok juma Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a, b’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ij, mob a eke wɛl b’is Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a. Ke ɛl a eke bi kok segb waw a, b’ɛŋn ow eke k’ɛbm ɛl a segb waw a eke -li bi kok ow e low ab ɛm.
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ abusu eke agŋ ek’am ɔb Amani Mamn a, k’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ij juma na eke -n’am kok ab ɛm.

Gbɛkɔ ɛm, abusu na eke m’ɔny a, m’ibram ow e low kaka, ɛtŋ eke mi nɔn ow e low aŋa, ke ow elm ow ec’ibrm eci. Njaŋ, m’átm m’ibram ɛm ec’abusu na e m’ɔny a, ɛtŋ ow b’ok’m ntotŋ. Mi b’ow m’erur e mi k’uw, ow a eke mi ki yɛb ɛgŋ ɔny ɛm eci ntotŋ na oc es a.
Ow elm ów m’erurm eke mi k’ɔpr Amani Mamn a eke m’am ɔb a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, ow el low ek’it eke mi ki kok. Gbre él ɛm eci eke m’ɔbm Amani Mamn a e kokoba!
Blel ow el ɛm obi mi sɔsum juma na m’oc m’am kok, m’ɔ́ny ow e labm sɔg. Kɔ ek’ow el juma ek’it eke mi ki kok a, m’am kok yec’a cɛ ek’it a.
Ɛtŋ ɛm e labm sɔg el bogŋ ec’ee? Ɛm e labm sɔg a el ke m’ɔ́b Amani Mamn a ɔfr ɛm, ke mi k’úsm ɛm ec’abusu ec’ów ek’anŋ ɛm a e low jam.
Ɛm, m’elm ɛgŋ kaka ec’adu; gbɛkɔ m’erur eke mi k’el agŋ fɛŋ ec’adu, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’éb agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl m’ɔŋ Krist.
Eke m’anŋ Jwifɛl ab, m’ám ir ɛb ɛsɛ Jwif af, ɛl ec’eb sosiɛm eci. Ow elm ke m’anŋ ɛl ec’ol a ec’es ɛw ɛm, kɔ eke m’anŋ ɛl ab, mi b’ɛlum ol a yec’ɛtŋ ke m’éb agŋ a eke b’ɛlum ol a.

Gbɛkɔ eke mi b’anŋ ɛl a eke uwm Mois ec’ol ab any ab ab a, m’ám ir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛm anm ol ec’es ɛw ɛm af, agŋ a ek’uwm ol ab any a ec’eb eci. Gbɛkɔ ow elm ke mi k’ɛ́luam Nyam ec’ol a, aŋke mi b’ɛlum Krist ec’ol a.
Eke m’anŋ ɔmn fuɛfuɛ ɛsɛl ab, m’ám ir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛm yɛji ɔmn fuɛfuɛ ɛm ɔny af, ɛl ec’eb sosiɛm eci. Mi bi kok fɛŋ a eke m’ɔtu eke mi ki kok a, yec’ɛtŋ ke saaŋ agŋ nyam nyam ɛ́ŋn sel.
Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ, Amani Mamn a sosiɛm cɛ mi bi kok, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm yɛji m’ánŋ in e bibm a e low ɛm.
Uwr any eke es uru usu, ow el es uru ɛsɛl a fɛŋ b’uru es, gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ nyam cɛ b’ɛŋn ow e nin awr ob a. Ow sosiɛm, ùrur es nin awr ob a ec’ɛŋn eci!

Es uru ɛsɛl fɛŋ, sos bɛbm ɛm a, bi dɛdŋn ɛl sosi ów nɔnɔ e kok. -Li b’ɔnyn ɛl sosi milɔlu nin awr ob nyam eke íbnm sosiɛm eci. Kɔ ɛy, s’am atr sos es eke si k’ɛŋn nin awr ob nyam eke b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Na sosiɛm, ɛm, m’am uru es, kɔ ow elm marɛm marɛm. M’anŋ ɛsɛ mum ogŋ ɛs af, kɔ mi wɔ́wlm kukuta marɛm marɛm.
Ɛm, m’am ɔnyn ɛm e sos a milɔlu, m’akm’n es nɔnɔ, yec’ɛtŋ ke mi k’ɔ́bm Amani Mamn eci kokoba m’okm agŋ, ke ɛm wɛl k’ébm im.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’erur eke mi k’ɔkn ɔny low yec’a eke ɛŋn ɛy lagŋɛl Mois e lɛgŋ ɛm a. Jru a ek’anŋ afr ow a nyimn ɛl, ɛtŋ -l’ubr okij ebl a,
ɛtŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ mij nuŋ eke wɛl ok ɛl af, Mois e jam us eci.
Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ij ob nyam a ɛtŋ -l’ɛgŋ mar nyam a ek’anŋ Nyam ɛm ow a. Tasi ɛm a, lob a ek’anŋ Nyam ɛm ow am us ɛl jam ab ɛm -l’ɛgŋ mij ɛl fɛŋ, ɛtŋ lob a, in anake l’el Krist a.
Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ kokm Nyam ec’erur, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm -l’uw loj ab ɛm.
Ów amua fɛŋ ɛy eke k’el sɛwl ɛy eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke si kí kokm ów eŋuŋ eke b’aw ɛy a ɛsɛ ɛy lagŋɛl ec’ab af.
K’ìgŋn sinyam yadŋ nuŋ, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok ab af. Kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Dedeku a nimum sig es ob ij lele mar ɛgŋ ab eci. Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, -l’igb ɛl fɛŋ -n’am gbɛgbl es.
Si k’ócr ɛy e sos a si kí kokr nfaci ij owi, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok, ke agŋ fandi likŋ lele nyahan ab uw lɛgŋ nyam coco ab af.
Si k’ɛ́bmn Krist, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok, ke morŋn gúgŋ ɛl -l’uwr ab af.
Ow ec’uwr ɛm a, m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: si k’ɛ́nyn abr, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok, ke afr ɛrm ɛs a ek’ism luw ab a, ibi ɛl ab af.
Ów amua ɛŋn ɛy lagŋɛl, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow él sɛwl ɛy eci. Wɛl nɔn ɛw es ɛy ec’ɛwar eci, ɛy eke s’anŋ sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ yeci ek’am tutr eke n’inym es kikri a, ɛ́w ɛrm ke li k’ɛ́ym wus.

Ɛbm ɛkn a fɛŋ eke ɔbar a el ow a eke b’ɛŋn agŋ fɛŋ a. Nyam el cɛcɛ ɛtŋ li k’ow li yɛbm eke wɛl k’ɛbm ɔny toŋ ow afŋ ɔny e lɛc ab es. Eke ɛbm ɛkn b’ow owr ɔny a, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny lɛc inymn es kikri ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny sos dogŋn ec’abusu.
Ow sosiɛm a, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl, àrur sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ owi ɛgbr es!
M’am dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm es ok ɛsɛl af. Ɔny obi yɛji ɔ̀nyn odad eke m’am dad a igbal ogŋ ɛkan.

Ob ij lala ab ɛm, eke si b’ɔŋ Nyam bia mij kpɔk a e si b’ɛgŋ a ec’a, ke ow elm af s’okrm Krist eci mebl ab ab a ee? Kɔ futufutu a eke si bi cɛc s’ɔŋanin ob ij ɛm a, ɔ́nym okrm ɛy af Krist e sos megl ab ab ee?
Futufutu a, nyam coco. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’okr af s’el sos megl nyam coco, aŋke futufutu nyam coco a ɛy fɛŋ si b’ij.
Lɛ̀ɛr Israɛl eyŋ: ɛl a eke b’ij mindey eke wɛl bi wawr egb anŋ egb waw usu a, okr af Nyam ab.
Nɛnɛ a, bla lowi m’am erur eke mi ki dad ee? Kɔ mindey eke wɛl bi wawr egb ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ a lele sinyam yadŋ a ɛl obi ab a el low tasi ee?
Njaŋ! M’erur cɛ eke mi ki dad eke segb waw amua, abŋ eŋuŋ a wɛl bi kok ɔŋ, kɔ ow elm ɛy e Nyam a. Ɛtŋ m’erurm eke k’okar af abŋ eŋuŋ ab ab.
K’ɔtumn am ɛgŋn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mij kpɔk a, ke ám ɛgŋn abŋ eŋuŋ e mij kpɔk a yɛji. K’ɔtumn am ijr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ob ij lala a, ke ám ijr abŋ eŋuŋ ec’ob a yɛji.
Kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ s’am erur eke si k’ɔŋ nyamnɛyr ɔny ee? Kɔ s’ɔny lɛc s’akm’n ee?
Ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ: "Fɛŋ e kok ec’abusu ɛru es." Nawrɛ, gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’am dad eke ow elm fɛŋ akplm ɛy eci. "Fɛŋ e kok ec’abusu ɛru es." Nawrɛ, kɔ ow elm fɛŋ ɔɔm Nyamel agbm ɔmn ɛm.
Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔ́l in obi cɛ e low mamn es, kɔ ke l’ɔ́l agŋ ɛjec’a nana ec’es.
Ndey fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ɔl ij an ɛjɛm a, ìjr ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke ów awl kaka k’ánm ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ob a fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci: wus lele ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ’n ɛm ab ab.
Kin low ɛbmn nyam: eke Nyam any uwm ɛs nyam ɛsŋ ɔny ob ij ɛm ɛtŋ ɛgŋn ebr imn a, ow akpl eke k’ijr ob a eke wɛl ɔŋ ɔny a ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke ów awl k’ánm ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam dad ɔny ninɛ: "Ndey a ek’am ijr a sinyam yadŋ ec’egb waw," ow akpl eke k’íjmn ɛgŋ a e dad ɔny odad a e sos keskes eke ow k’ɛwm lele in ec’elel eke li b’ɛkan ów ab ab sosiɛm.
Eke batŋ fɛŋ akpl ɔny eci yɛji, ow ɔtu eke k’ákplm ɛgŋ a eci. Sica bla sosiɛm ɛgŋ ki yɛb ɛgŋ ɛjeci, in ec’elel eke li b’ɛkan ów ab ɛm, jɛj in ec’abusu a ek’ɛru’r es a e low ok ee?
Eke l’ɔtu eke li k’ɔŋ Nyam bia ob a eke n’am ij a eci, bla sosiɛm wɛl ki cacak’r ob ij a sosiɛm ee?
Ow cɛ eke mi ki dad a: eke am ijr ob, am ɛgŋn mar ɛtŋ am kokr low fɛŋ yɛji, kòkr fɛŋ Nyam ec’anygbɛl a eci.
K’ɛ̀lul ɛgŋ kaka wus ɔny ec’elel eke bi kokr ab ɛm: ke ow el Jwifɛl, ke ow el agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl, ke ow el Nyamel; k’ɛ̀lul ɛgŋ kaka wus.
Kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af! Mi bi kok eke ɛm e low kok fɛŋ ɛm, ɛm e low k’akpl agŋ a fɛŋ sos ɛm. M’ɔ́lm ɛm obi e low mamn es, kɔ agŋ fɛŋ e low mamn mi b’ɔl es yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɛŋn sel.
Wèwrmn’m ów, ɛsɛ elel eke m’am wewrm Krist ów ab af.
M’am aw ɔny eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ b’ɔkan ɛm e low, ke b’ɔsur ɛm e low yɛgm a ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɔŋn ɔny ab af.
Gbɛkɔ kin low e m’am erur eke k’irir sɛnyn sɛnyn: igŋ fɛŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs el Krist, yɔw fɛŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs el igŋ, ɛtŋ Krist ec’es ɛw ɛs a el Nyam.
Eke igŋ nyam bubur nuŋ es am ŋɔŋn Nyam oglog am dad odad eke Nyam ɔŋ’n a, l’ɛluam Krist ek’el in ec’es ɛw a.
Sica eke yɔw nyam buburm nuŋ es in e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm oglog odad eke Nyam ɔŋ’n a e dad ɛm a, l’ɛluam in ec’es ɛw ɛs a ek’el in ec’igŋ a. Ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn nuŋ kprokpro cɛ ow’n ɛr af.
Eke yɔw nyam erurm eke ki bubur nuŋ es, l’ɛ́gŋ l’eb l’ɛr nuŋ kprokpro cɛ gɔŋ! Gbɛkɔ ow el ɛ́s owi yɔw nyam eke bubr sin es oglog ɛr nuŋ kprokpro a eci; ow sosiɛm li búbur nuŋ es cɛ gɔŋ!
Igŋ ec’a ow ibram eke li ki bubur nuŋ es eke l’el Nyam ec’es otarir lel ow ec’anygbɛl ab a sosiɛm. Kɔ yɔw, in igŋ ec’anygbɛl l’el.
Tasi ɛm a, ow elm yɔw ɛm Nyam kokm igŋ, kɔ igŋ ɛm li kok yɔw.
Ɛtŋ Nyam kokm igŋ yɔw sosiɛm eci, kɔ yɔw li kok igŋ sosiɛm eci.
Low na sosiɛm lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eke bi lɛr ɔny e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ab ab sosiɛm, ow it eke yɔw k’ɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam nuŋ af yɛgm eke n’ɔny abusu Nyam ŋɔŋn eci.
Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af a, yɔw anŋ igŋ eci ɛtŋ igŋ yɛji anŋ yɔw eci,
aŋke ek’ow el igŋ ɛm Nyam ɛcr kok yɔw, ke yɔw ɛm anake igŋ b’ɛcr wɛl ew’r a; ów a fɛŋ Nyam ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow.
Ɔny obi ɛm yɛji, ɔ̀nyn igbal ogŋ ɛkan: eke yɔw nyam am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛtŋ li buburm nuŋ es ke ow akpl gbɛ ee?
Eke igŋ nyam ɔfur sin nuŋ, ow el ɛ́s owi! Wus ec’ów a bɔbɔ yɛji am yɛgm eke ow el ɛ́s owi.
Gbɛkɔ yɔw ec’a eke sin ɔfu’r nuŋ, ke anygbeŋ ana! Tasi ɛm a, yɔw sin b’ɔfu nuŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ow él in e nuŋ es bubur ob.
Ɛtŋ ek’ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’atar ów es low na af a, l’úw any eke ɛy e Sinyamel a fɛŋ ɛm ow ɛcam ɛy ab eke yɔw nyam kí buburm nuŋ es ke ŋɔ́ŋn Nyam.
Eke ow el ɔny e siluku as a ec’ów m’am dad a, low nyam anŋ eke ow sosiɛm mi k’ɔtum m’awm ɔny. Tasi ɛm a, ɔny e siluku as a bi kok ɔny low ŋuŋ akm low mamn.
Eke b’asr luku usu nyam a, b’inymn es eb eb a eke bubar ɛm a. M’iri ow e low wɛl ɛsɛ ɛm, ɛtŋ m’ɔny ɔmn eke low nawrɛ tɛl anŋ ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛm bubr ɔtu eke k’anŋ ɔny ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ɔ́tu ɛkn kpata agŋ a eke el cɛcɛ tasi ɔny ec’araŋn a.
Eke b’asr luku usu nyam a, ow elm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ob ij lala a íjmn.
Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ b’ogŋ es eke k’ij in obi eci ob a, ɛtŋ eke agŋ bɛb, ɛl namn b’ɔny a, likpr ɛl b’ɛgŋ mar am ɔny.

Ɔny na, ɔnymn mel eke k’anŋn yogŋ ijr ke ɛgŋn ee? Kɔ Nyamel am erurir eke ki kokar miyɛr ee? Kɔ agŋ a ek’el ɔkɔpm agŋ a erurir eke ki kokr ɛ́s ee? Bla am ekur eke mi ki dad ɔny ee? Kɔ aw mi k’aw ɔny ee? Njaŋ, low na af gbɛ mi k’áwm ɔny!
Tasi ɛm a, kin low yɛgm a eke m’eb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ ke m’ɔŋ ɔny a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ncok a eke wɛl ɔl ij’r a, l’oc futufutu,
l’ɛlu Nyam bia, ɛtŋ ow e jam a, l’ubr futufutu ab ɛm li dad ninɛ: "Futufutu na el ɛm e sos megl. L’el ɔny eci. Ìjr ke ám ɔkan ɛm owi."
Ɛbɛn nyam coco, eke -l’ijr ob uwr a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ oc vɛn kpɔk a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Vɛn kpɔk na el ɛm e mebl a, ɛtŋ Nyam oc’r am kok in e sinm owr a ɔny ab. Sakp sakp fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛgŋn a, ɔ́kan ɛm owi."
Tasi ɛm a, sakp sakp fɛŋ eke b’ijr futufutu na ke b’ɛgŋn vɛn kpɔk na a, ow el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e luw a ec’amani ek’am ɔbr toŋ ke l’ɛ́wl l’ow.
Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ ek’am ij Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci futufutu na, oglog am ɛgŋ in e kpɔk na ke ow elm elel ek’ow it a, el ɛgŋ ek’am eb sikpl ok sos Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci sos megl a lel in e mebl ab ab ec’any af.
Ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’otar in sosi akr gbuŋ ke l’íj futufutu na, ke l’ɛ́gŋ kpɔk na.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ yec’ek’am ij futufutu na ke am ɛgŋ kpɔk na, ke uwm low ek’anŋ ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci sos ab ab ec’araŋn a, el ɛgŋ ek’am eb jɛj ok ɛw es in e lís.
Low na sosiɛm anake ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɔ́lu nɔnɔ lele sos ɛ́yru ab anŋ, ke agŋ nɔnɔ uw a.
Eke si b’ɛkan ɛy ec’es an ab ɛm, Nyam k’ow jɛjm okm ɛy.
Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ bi jɛj ok ɛy ɛtŋ bi nyimn ɛy e low, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl k’ɔ́bm ɛy low wus nimum ab.
Ow sosiɛm erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, lɛgŋ eke b’asr luku usu nyam ob ij ec’a, èkurir ɔny ɔfr.

Eke ɛgŋ nyam namn am ɔny nɔnɔ, ow akpl eke li k’ij ob in ogŋ a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny e luku as usu nyam a k’ɛ́sŋm Nyam e jɛj ok a ism ɔny. Ów likpr a eke bibrmn’m a ec’a, lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ a, mi b’ow m’ɛkn ow e low.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, yec’ek’el Abŋ Lala e sob ap ec’a, m’erurm eke k’úwmn ow e lís e low kaka any.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke k’uwmn Nyam any a, wɛl b’ɔdum ɔny ab imn sinyam yadŋ ek’am dadm odad ogŋ, ɛtŋ am dogŋnmn sos kaka.

Ow sosiɛm m’erur eke mi ki dad ɔny low nyam: eke ɛgŋ nyam dad: "Ke abu ɛyr ɛ́ŋn Jesu!", ow k’ɔtum elm Abŋ Lala ɔɔm’n eke li ki dad ɛbɛn. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ k’ɔtum dadm: "Jesu el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ!", eke ow elm Abŋ Lala nyimnm’n.
Sica yec’ek’el Abŋ Lala e sob ap ec’a, Nyam ɔŋ agŋ in e bibm ab ɛm sob ap ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, gbɛkɔ Abŋ nyam a cɛ b’ɔŋ agŋ sob ap a.
Ow ɔny juma ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke wɛl bi kok, gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyam a cɛ e juma.
Ów ɛrŋ ɛrŋ anŋ eke wɛl bi kok, gbɛkɔ Nyam nyam a cɛ bi kok juma ɛy fɛŋ ɛm, ɛtŋ b’ɛlum ɛy abu fɛŋ a eke si bi kok ab ɛm.
Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ bibm nyam in sɔny cɛ eci, agŋ likpr a e nimamn eci.
Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam odad sɛwr ɛm eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e bibm, ke Abŋ nyam a cɛ, n’ɔ́ŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam low any uw a eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e bibm.
Abŋ nyam a cɛ b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɔmn leg leg e bibm, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam agŋ ewlm ec’a.

Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam akrowa kok e bibm, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e dad ec’a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam yɛji eke k’uw ów yec’ek’el Nyam ec’Abŋ ec’ów ab any lele ɛl ek’elm ab ab e bibm. Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam am ɔtu ɛbr sɛbr e wɛl uwm any e bibm, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam ow ec’itŋn e bibm.
Gbɛkɔ amua fɛŋ a, Abŋ Lala nyam coco a cɛ bi kok ow e low. Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ in e sob ap a ɛsɛ elel eke li b’erur ab af.
Aŋa s’óc low nyam s’ɛbmn. Ɛgŋ e sos megl a el ob nyam coco, gbɛkɔ n’ɛnyn susu nɔnɔ cɛ. Ɛtŋ eke n’ɛnyn susu yɛji, susu susu a fɛŋ okr af el sos megl nyam; Krist ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ.
Ɛy fɛŋ, Jwifɛl, agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl, madu lele ewi ab, Abŋ Lala nyam ab ɛm cɛ s’ɛŋn mij ok nuŋ, sos megl nyam coco eke si k’okr af s’el Krist ɛm a eci. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ, s’ɛŋn Abŋ nyam coco na anŋ ɛy ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, sos megl nimum a ɔ́nym sos ogog nyam cɛ, kɔ sos ogog nɔnɔ li b’ɛli.
Lakr ɔtu e ki dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, eke m’elm abu a, m’elm sos megl ec’ogog nyam." Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, l’el sos ogog nyam cɛ.
Lɔru ɔtu e ki dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, eke m’elm nyamn a, m’elm sos megl ec’ogog nyam." Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, l’el sos ogog nyam cɛ.
Blel sos megl a nimum el anyamn, ayaf s’ɔtu e si k’irir low ee? Ɛtŋ blel ow el ɔru ɔfr cɛ, ke ayaf s’ɔtu eke si k’ɔdur ob sɔsŋ s’eb ee?
Gbɛkɔ, Nyam sisigm sos ogog ogog fɛŋ es sos megl a nimum ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke l’erur ab af.
Eke sos megl a nimum el sos ogog nyam cɛ, ke l’elm sos megl ij.
Sos ogog ogog a anake b’okr af el sos megl nimum nyam a.
Nyamn k’ɔtum dadm abu ɛsmɛ: "Ɛm, m’ɔnym ŋ ec’es abur!" Ɛtŋ nuŋ k’ɔtum dadm akr ɛsmɛ: "Ɛm, m’ɔnym ɔny ec’es abur!"
Nawrɛ ɛm a, sos ogog ogog a ek’ɔnym any nɔnɔ a bɔbɔ yɛji, ɔny low e bi kok sos a nimum ɛm.
Susu a eke si b’ɛkn ɛsɛ ɛl ek’elm low kaka af a, si bi tat ɛl abu af nɔnɔ. Ɛtŋ ɛl a eke wɛl ɔtum eke k’ɛkn a, si b’ɔny mɛwl si sus ɛl mob.
Ɛy e sos a e susu susu a e wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛkn a, ibram mob sus na fɛŋ. Gbɛkɔ Nyam eke kok sos megl a, n’ɔŋ susu a eke wɛl b’ɛkn ɛsɛ susu eke elm low kaka af a ɛlum nɔnɔ.
Ɛbɛn a, sos megl a ow elm ɛm ow bubrm. Kɔ nana, sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ b’ebr ɛl ɔfr ec’ɛrm mij.
Eke sos ogog nyam am ij gbre, sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ am ij gbre in ab. Eke wɛl kok sos ogog nyam anygbeŋ, sos ogog likpr a fɛŋ am kok sos ɛm iŋn in ab.
Ɔny ec’a, eel Krist e sos megl a, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam el sos megl a ec’ogog nyam.

Ow sosiɛm anake Nyamel ɛm, Nyam ikŋ anym krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛw: ɛrm ɛsɛl, yony ɛm: kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, nyahan ɛm: low yɛgm ɛsɛl. Ke sica ow e jam a, wɛl b’ɛŋn sakrowa kok ɛsɛl lel ɛl a ek’ɛŋn ɛgŋ ewlm e bibm ab a. Sica ow ɔny abu ɛlum ɛsɛl lele agŋ nyimn ɛsɛl ab, ɛtŋ ɛl a eke ɛŋn sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ec’ɛbr e bibm a yɛji anŋ.
Kɔ ɛl fɛŋ -l’el ɛrm ɛsɛl ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -l’el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -li bi yɛgm agŋ low ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -li bi kok sakrowa ee?
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ow elm ɛl fɛŋ yɛji -l’ewlamn ɔ́lu, -li dadmn odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, -l’itŋnmn sodad a.
Ow sosiɛm a ɔ̀ɔl sob ap ek’ɔny any a ec’ɛŋn es! Gbɛkɔ sica, m’am ow mi yɛgm ɔny ejagb nyam ek’el sɔbɔ akm bɛb a fɛŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, blel m’ɔtu eke mi k’ɛbr agŋ e sɛbr a fɛŋ lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ab ab yɛji, eke m’ɔnym erur agŋ ɛjec’a eci, ke m’anŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo ɔbr cɛ eke wɛl am ar ke am ikŋ, baŋ kpakpaca ek’am bɔbar af.

Blel m’ɔtu eke mi k’eb odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a m’ɔŋ agŋ, m’ɛ́ŋn low any uw a fɛŋ eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, m’íri ów a eke lɔl es Nyam ɛm a ok’m es sos ɛm, ke m’ɔ́ny ɔmn a ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔny mafɛny fafŋn susu a yɛji, eke m’ɔnym erur agŋ ɛjec’a eci, m’elm low kaka!
Ɛtŋ blel m’ɔtu eke mi ki cɛc ɛm ec’ob fɛŋ eke m’ɔny a m’ɔ́ŋ agŋ a eke namn am ɔny a, ke m’óc ɛm e sos a m’ɛw awoba ke ow íŋn’m sos ɛm yɛji, eke m’ɔnym erur agŋ ɛjec’a eci, ow elm im low kaka!
Erur b’eku low, ɛrm mamn iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ, l’ógŋm uwerŋ, l’ɛ́wm sos, l’ɛ́lum mɛgŋel ɔkm.
Erur am kokm ɛ́s owi. L’ɔ́lm in e low mamn cɛ es, l’éblm ɛrm ɛtŋ l’ébm low ŋuŋ l’ɛwm es lokm.
Erur sos ɛm íŋnm ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony eci, kɔ sos ɛm gbɛ b’iŋn’n low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eci.
Erur b’ɛgŋ low fɛŋ eb, b’ub low fɛŋ nawrɛ, b’ɔmn low fɛŋ ɛtŋ b’usur ɛrm low fɛŋ ɛm.
Lɛgŋ nyam sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ke si b’eb s’ɔŋ agŋ a b’ow ɛc. Sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ke wɛl b’ɛbr e bibm a b’ow irm, ɛtŋ Nyam e lís e low fɛŋ eke wɛl uw any a yɛji b’ow uwr. Gbɛkɔ erur ɔnym uwr.
Tasi ɛm a, s’uwm ów a fɛŋ any, ɛtŋ sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow si dad a yɛji iym nɛny igŋm nuŋ.
Gbɛkɔ, lɛgŋ a eke fɛŋ b’ow iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ a, yec’a fɛŋ ek’iym nɛny igŋm nuŋ a, b’ow oc es.
Sica, kin low a eke m’am ow mi dad a: ow a eke m’el iy likekli a, mi bi tutr ów ɛtŋ mi bi dad ów ɛsɛ iy likekli af. Sica eke m’el any es ɛdŋu a, mi kókm ɛsɛ iy likekli af ij.

Lɛgŋ na ɛm, si k’ɛknm Nyam ec’ów a lala ɛm tasi, s’am ɛkn ɛl ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ flaŋ ɛm af, gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, si b’ow s’ɛkn any af any af. Sicaca ɛm a, m’uwm fɛŋ any, kɔ lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, mi b’ow m’uw Nyam any m’igŋ nuŋ ɛsɛ elel eke l’uwr’m any ab af.
Lɛgŋ na ɛm a, ów nyahan anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ: ɔmn, low ɔmn lele erur ab. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm e ligbɛl tasi a el erur.
Ow sosiɛm a, ìkŋn anym ɔɔl erur es. Ɔ̀ɔl ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm Abŋ Lala e sob ap ab es, ab brobro sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ke si b’eb s’ɔŋ agŋ a, ec’ob ap a.
Eke batŋ ɔny ɛm a ɛgŋ nyam am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ow elm agŋ li dadm odad, kɔ Nyam n’am dad, aŋke ɛgŋ kaka irim. Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm, li bi dad ów ek’ɔtu nɔnɔ ke lɔl es.
Gbɛkɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam am dad odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, ke agŋ n’am dad l’ok, l’ɛ́lum abu agb ɔmn ɛm, l’átr sos es ke l’ɛ́yr ɛrm es.
Ɛgŋ a eke am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, am ɔtur in sosi cɛ sos. Kɔ ɛgŋ a ek’in am dad odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ok agŋ a, am ɔtur Nyamel a nimum sos.

M’erur eke ɔny fɛŋ k’ɛbar sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any a, gbɛkɔ yec’eke m’erur tasi a el ke ám dadr sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a. Dád sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, akpl nɔnɔ akm sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ec’ɛbr a. Sica ek’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke k’itŋn ɛbr a eke wɛl uwm any ec’odad a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ Nyamel a nimum agb ɔmn ɛm a, ke ow akpl.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’ócr low nyam s’ɔbar any: eke m’ow m’am ɛkn ɔny ɛtŋ m’am dad ɔny odad ɛbr nyam eke írimn ɛm, ke mi kok low nyam m’ɔŋ ɔny ee? Gbɛkɔ eke m’otar ów a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m a akr sɛnyn sɛnyn irir, oglog eke mi dad ɔny Nyam e lís ec’any uw e low ayl, oglog mi dad ɔny odad eke b’anŋ in ogŋ ow a, oglog eke mi yɛgm ɔny low, ow ɔtu eke k’ɛlum ɔny abu.
Simob eke wɛl b’ot ɛgŋn ɛj a yɛji, am ɔŋ ɛy low any ɔbar nyam: ɛsɛ kete af oglog saŋgo af, eke ɛl ec’ikŋ a kpakpabm es aylm, ayaf wɛl k’uwr ɛj yec’eke -n’am afl ab any ee?
Ɛtŋ eke kɔkr a ec’ikŋ a aylm okm es, bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow bɛbm ar ogŋ e sos ee?
Ɔny ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn! Eke am dadr ów sodad ebl eke wɛl írim ab, ayaf wɛl k’uwr yec’a ek’am dadr ab any ee? Ow anŋ ɛsɛ odad ek’am dadr okr wus af.
Sɛbr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ anŋ wus af aŋa, ɛtŋ -li bi dad ów eke b’ok agŋ a e b’iri a es sos ɛm.
Eke m’uwm ɛgŋ a ek’am dad’m odad a ec’ɛbr ab any, m’el utu ɛgŋ in ec’any af ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji l’el utu ɛgŋ ɛm ec’any af.
Ɔny yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ! Sica eke am erurir Abŋ Lala eci sob ap a, ìbrmn Nyam atrm ɛm ɛl a ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ Nyamel agb a.
Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ a eke am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, ki ŋɔŋn Nyam, ow ɔ́ŋ’n odad itŋn e bibm a.
Eke mi bi ŋɔŋn Nyam sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, ɛm ec’abŋ a bi ŋɔŋn Nyam a, kɔ ɛm e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a am kokm low kaka.
Ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee? Mi b’ow mi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛm ec’abŋ ab ab, gbɛkɔ mi b’ow mi ŋɔŋn sodad ebl eke b’ok es ɛm. Mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ ɛj ɛm ec’abŋ ab ab, gbɛkɔ mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ ɛj a sodad ebl e b’ok es ɛm.
Sica ek’ow el abŋ ɛm b’ɔŋ Nyam bia, ɛgŋ a eke irim low a ɛwm es, ke uwm yec’eke am dad ab any a, ayaf li k’ɔtu li dad "amɛn", ŋ e Nyam bia ɛlu e ŋɔŋn a ec’ee?
Eke ŋ e Nyam bia ɛlu e ŋɔŋn a akpl nɔnɔ yɛji, ow ɛ́luam agŋ ɛjec’a abu agbm ɔmn ɛm.
M’am ɔŋ Nyam bia eke mi b’ɛbr sɛbr nɔnɔ eke wɛl uwm any m’akm ɔny fɛŋ.
Gbɛkɔ Nyamel b’as luku a, m’erur eke mi ki dad sodad ebl yen eke ayl wɛl b’iri mi yɛgmn agŋ low, ow a eke mi ki dad sodad fandi lɛw eke wɛl írim kaka a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, kì tutar ów ɛsɛ etuey af, kɔ tùtar ów ɛsɛ agŋ any es ɛdŋu af. Sica low ŋuŋ ec’a gbɛ, ànŋn ɛsɛ etuey eke ɛknm low ɛm af.
Nyam ec’ol ab ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ɛcr agŋ eke b’ɛbr etu ec’ɛbr ɛm, mi dad Israɛl eyŋ odad, mi b’ow m’oc etu agŋ e nɛny mi dadr ɛl odad. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, -li k’ow -l’irimn ɛm owi.

Ow am yɛgm eke sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ec’ɛbr a, el mɛny ɛwr agŋ a ek’ubm nawrɛ a eci, gbɛkɔ ow elm low kaka nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a eci. Ɛbɛn nɛny nyam, sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, el mɛny ɛwr agŋ a ek’el nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a eci, gbɛkɔ ow elm low kaka agŋ ek’ubm nawrɛ a eci.
K’aw ke Nyamel nimum ás luku, ke agŋ a pupukpaŋ ám dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm. Eke agŋ ek’irim ɛy e low a oglog agŋ eke ubm nawrɛ ow ok ɔny ɛm, -li b’ow -li tutr eke nuŋ ɛm uŋ ɔny!
Gbɛkɔ eke agŋ a fɛŋ am dad sodad ek’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam ek’ubm nawrɛ oglog irim ɛy e low a kaka ow ɛy ɔny ɛm, li b’ow l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm sodad eke n’am iri a sosiɛm.
Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ ów a eke lɔl es in ec’ɛrm ab ɛm a b’ow ayl, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus, l’ubu any es. Li b’ow l’igŋ Nyam nuŋ ke li dád l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛɛ, Nyam anŋ ɔny araŋn tasi!"

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Eke b’asr luku Nyam nuŋ igŋ ec’a, ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu eke k’ɛgŋ ɛj nyam, ɛjeci nyam ɛ́ŋn low e ki yɛgm agŋ, ɛjeci nyam ɛ́lu Nyam e lís e low nyam ɔkm, ɛjeci nyam dád odad ɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ke ɛjeci nyam, in ítŋn odad a eke wɛl dad a. Gbɛkɔ ke fɛŋ ɛ́lum Nyamel a abu agb ɔmn ɛm.
Eke wɛl am dad ów sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, agŋ yony oglog nyahan ɔtu eke ki kok, kɔ ke ow él ɛgŋ nyam nyam, ke ɛgŋ ánŋ am itŋn yec’a eke -n’am dad a.
Sica ek’ɛgŋ anm yogŋ eke k’itŋn ɛl e sodad a, ow akpl eke -li ki yewal tiŋ agŋ a ec’araŋn, ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ dad odad a lokm ɛm in obi in obi lele Nyam ab eci.
Agŋ a eke ɛl, bi dad sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a ec’a, agŋ yony oglog nyahan ɔtu eke ki dad ów a eke -n’ɛŋan a, ke agŋ likpr a ɔ́ny ɛl e dad ebl a igbl ogŋ ɛkn.
Eke agŋ ab ɛm, Nyam ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam odad eke ki dad, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam odad anŋ nɛnym am dad a, l’ók odad ab es ke yec’a yɛji dád.
Nawrɛ, ɔtur eke ɔny fɛŋ k’ɛŋan sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, gbɛkɔ ke ow él ɛgŋ nyam nyam ki dad, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ íri low yɛgm ek’anŋ ɛm a, ke ɔ́ny sos es atr.
Agŋ a eke b’ɛŋn sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, ɔtu eke k’ɔnyn sos es bibm a eke -n’ɛŋan a e low kok ɛm.
Nyam elm ów wuwal ɛs, kɔ ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam. Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke ow b’ɛcr Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl fɛŋ ec’araŋn ab af,
ow it eke ɔyɔw ki yewal tiŋ agŋ araŋn. -N’ɔnym abusu eke -li k’igb -l’eb odad -l’ibrm low, kɔ -l’ok es tiŋ ke -l’iri low, ɛsɛ elel eke Jwifɛl ec’ ol a am dad ab af.
Eke -n’ɔny low eke -li k’ibrm -l’iri a, -l’ibrm ɛl ɛcɛl akŋ ɛm. Ow akplm eke yɔw k’igb agŋ araŋn eb odad.
Ɔny bi tutar a ke Nyam odad a, ɔny ogŋ yogŋ ow anŋ ow ee? Ɔny sɔny cɛ eel agŋ ek’ɛŋn’n ee?
Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am ocr in sosi Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs, oglog ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala ec’ob ap ab ɛm e nyam, ke l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛkn odad na eke m’am nɔn m’awŋ ɔny a ɛsɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ol af.
Gbɛkɔ eke l’uwm any ɛbɛn a, in yɛji Nyam k’ow uwm’n any.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow ec’uwrm ɛm a, m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: ow akpl eke k’erurir ɛŋan sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a; ke k’ɛ́dŋnmn agŋ a eke b’ɛbr sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any a.
Gbɛkɔ, ke ɔny ec’araŋn a, ów a fɛŋ él sɛjɛm sɛjɛm lele sisigm ɛm ab.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am ɔkn ɔny Amani Mamn a eke m’ɔb ɔny in e kokoba a. Ɛgŋn ebr ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, ucur ɔnyn in es.
Amani Mamn na b’eb ɛlu ɔny es, eke b’ɛgŋn ucur ɔnyn in es ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɔŋn ɔny ab af cɛ. Ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, nawrɛ ɔfr ɔfr cɛ am ubr.
M’ikŋ anym m’ɔŋ ɔny low yɛgm a eke ɛm obi yɛji m’ɛŋn a: ɛy e sikpl a sosiɛm Krist uw, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad ab af.
Wɛl ɛlu’l uwɔmu ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm sɛgŋ nyahan ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad ab af.
L’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm Piɛr ɛtŋ ow e jam a ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a yɛji ɛkn’n.
Ɛmɛny, l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm in e jam ɛsɛl ekŋ yen yen sakp yen ek’anŋ usu nyam a ɛkn’n wanci nyam af. Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam uw, gbɛkɔ nɔnɔ gbɛl anŋ owr cɛ.
Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm Jak lele ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ab ɛkn’n.
Sica eke l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm agŋ likpr a fɛŋ toŋ bake ow uwr a, ɛm yɛji l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm’m, ɛm eke m’itm tasi a.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛm, ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ɛm e likekli tasi. M’itm yɛj’eke wɛl k’ɛsŋ’m ɛrm ɛs, aŋke m’ijr Nyamel gbre nɔnɔ.

Gbɛkɔ Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a anake ɔŋ ke m’el ɛgŋ na eke m’el a, ɛtŋ in e bibm na eke m’ɛŋn a ɔsu ey amamn ɛm ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, mi kok juma m’akm ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ. Gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛm obi tasi mi kokm juma a, Nyam e bibm a ek’anŋ ɛm ab a kok.
Amua fɛŋ a, ek’ow el ɛm m’ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba oglog ɛm lawlɛl likpr a ɔb yɛji, ow elm na elm low a. Nɛnɛ anake si b’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba a, ɛtŋ nɛnɛ anake ubr nawrɛ a.
Ɛy s’am ɔb amani si dad s’ɛsɛ: Krist igb luw ɛm. Gbɛkɔ ɔny ɛm a, agŋ bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: agŋ ek’in uw a, in ɔnym igb ij. Ayaf -l’ɔtu eke -li ki dad low nɛnɛ ee?
Eke agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, ke Krist in obi yɛji igbm luw ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke tasi Krist igbm luw ɛm, ke ɛy e Nyam odad eke s’am dad a ɔnym liy kaka, ɛtŋ low a ek’ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm a yɛji, ɔnym liy kaka.
Ɛmɛny eke agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, ow am yɛgm yɛj’eke s’el Nyam ec’adaŋku ayadŋu. S’el adaŋku ayadŋu, aŋke l’igbam Krist luw ɛm ɛtŋ si dad eke l’igbm ow.
Ɛɛ, ek’agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, ke Krist in obi yɛji igbm luw ɛm.
Ɛtŋ eke Krist igbm luw ɛm ke ɔmn ɔfr ɔfr cɛ ɔnyn, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny anŋn ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm cɛ.
Ow am yɛgm yɛj’eke agŋ a ek’oc ɛl ec’ɔmn a nimum ɛlu Krist ɛm gbuŋ ke ca uw a irm.
Ɛtŋ ek’ow el owr anŋ na cɛ eci s’oc ɛy e low ɔmn a s’ɛlu Krist ɛm, ke s’el agŋ fɛŋ ɛm e gbre ɛsɛl tasi!
Gbɛkɔ nawrɛ ɛm a, Krist igb luw ɛm. Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, Krist anake ikŋ anym igb a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ow yɛgm eke agŋ likpr a ek’ɔny ɔmn ke uw a yɛji b’ow igb.
Low na wɛl am ɛkn ɛbɛn, aŋke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ, ek’el Adam ab ɛm anake luw anŋ ow a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam cɛ, ek’el Krist ab ɛm anake agŋ b’ow igb luw ɛm a.
Agŋ fɛŋ b’uw, aŋke -l’okr af Adam ab. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, agŋ fɛŋ b’ow ɛŋn sel, aŋke -l’okr af Krist ab,
gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’elel eke ow ɔsŋ es anŋ ab ɛm: Krist anake ikŋ anym igb luw ɛm a. Ow e jam a, lɛgŋ a eke li b’ow l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow a, agŋ a ek’el in ec’a, ɛl yɛji b’ow igb gɔŋ.
Sica nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a, Krist b’ow ŋuŋn es ɛw eŋuŋ fɛŋ, abusu eŋuŋ fɛŋ lele lɛc eŋuŋ fɛŋ ab ɛy af. Ɛtŋ li b’ow l’oc in ec’es ɛw a n’ɔŋ Ɛs Nyam.
Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke Krist k’ɔnym es ɛw ab ab toŋ ke Nyam ót in ec’efnu a fɛŋ ok’r akr ew.
Es abal el ɛm ec’ifnu eke wɛl b’ow ŋuŋn a el luw.

Nyam Lɛl ɛm, kin ow eke wɛl b’awl: Nyam ot fɛŋ ok’r es akr ew. Gbɛkɔ eke Lɛl a bi dad eke Nyam in ot 'fɛŋ' in ok ow es akr ew, ow ayl tasi eke Nyam anm 'fɛŋ' ab ɛm, aŋke Nyam, in anake li b’ɔŋ Krist abusu ów a fɛŋ af a.
Ɛtŋ eke Iy a b’ow ɔny abusu ów a fɛŋ af a, in obi in obi a, li b’ow l’is es Nyam ek’ɔŋ’n abusu na a ec’any af. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, Nyam b’ow ɛw fɛŋ es nimum nimum.
Sica eke ow elm nɛnɛ, bla sosiɛm agŋ bɛb b’ɛgŋ eb wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ agŋ ek’uw a ec’ee? Bla ow b’ow eel ɛl eke agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm ee?
Ɛtŋ ɛy obi gbɛ, bla sosiɛm sɛgŋ a fɛŋ s’am ir ɛb ek’ɔtu eke k’ibi ɛy ee?
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, luw anŋ’m saw. Agŋ lisijimɛl na low nawrɛ. Ɛtŋ ow el low nawrɛ yɛj’eke ntotŋ b’ok’m ɔny eci, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm.
Efɛs ɛb ɛm, m’ogŋ mum agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mindey eŋuŋ af ab. Eke ow el agŋ ɛm ec’ów cɛ eci, ke bla m’ɛŋn ɛm tasi ee? Eke agŋ e b’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, si dád s’ɛsɛ: s’íjr ke s’ɛ́gŋn, aŋke efi si b’ow s’uwr.
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ɔny ec’ów e dad ɛm! Mɛcrer ŋuŋ bi ŋuŋn ɛgŋ ek’am ir ɛb sɛnyn a.
Ɛ̀wal ebar ɔny e nuŋ ɛm es ok ab ɛm ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af, ke kí kokmn sikpl ij! Ɛɛ, ɔny ɛm a agŋ anŋ ek’uwm Nyam any. Ɛtŋ na eke m’am dad a, ɔny ec’ɛ́s.
Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu eke k’ibrm ɛsɛ: ayaf agŋ ek’uw a b’igbr luw ɛm ee? Bogŋ e sos megl -li b’ow -l’ɛli ee?
Kì tutr ów ɛs’ɛgŋ ek’ɔnym nuŋ ɛm af! Eke b’ewl egb liy a, ow elm eke li b’uw yɛ, gbuŋ ɛtŋ li b’ɛli l’el likŋ ek’anŋ owr ee?
Ɛtŋ bla b’ewl ee? Ow elm likŋ a eke b’ow agb a éwlm, kɔ egb liy nyam cɛ b’oc ɛlu wus ɛm, ow ɔtu eke k’el ble liy oglog egb liy kaka fɛŋ.
Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, Nyam b’ɔŋ egb liy a sos yec’eke l’erur e li k’ɔŋ ow a, ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ egb liy fɛŋ sos eke k’el ow ec’a.
Mob fɛŋ ek’anŋ owr a ɛ́lim sos nɛny nyam. Agŋ e sos a lele mindey ec’ab ab elm nɛny nyam; ɛtŋ ɔr lele sɔcn ab ec’a yɛji bɛbmnm.
Eke wɛl ɔtu e ki dad ɛsɛ mob ek’anŋ afr a ɛli 'sos' ɛsɛ wus aŋa ec’a ek’anŋ ab af yɛji, ɛl e jɛjn a elm nɛny nyam.
Ligbn e jɛjn a elm kpɛŋ awl ec’ab ab, ɛtŋ ɛl yony mum e jɛjn elm kpɛŋ mílɛ́l ec’ab ab. Ɛtŋ lɛ́l nyam nyam e jɛjn a bɔbɔ yɛji elm kpɛŋ mílɛ́l ɛjec’a ec’ab ab.
Lɛgŋ a ek’agŋ b’ow igb luw ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke ow b’ow ɛcr ana. Yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm ɛsɛ likŋ liy af a, el sos megl ek’it eke k’ugŋ es. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, li k’ɔtum l’ugŋm es ij.

Yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm a, el sos megl ek’elm low kaka. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, anygbɛl b’iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ. Yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm a, el sos megl ek’ɔnym sos kaka. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, lɛc b’iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ.

Sos megl eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm ɛsɛ likŋ liy af a, el sos megl nɛnɛ cɛ. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ’n n’anŋ owr. Ow ɔny sos megl nyam ek’el sos megl nɛnɛ cɛ. Gbɛkɔ ow ɔny sos megl nyam yɛji eke b’ɛŋn owr anŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl dad ninɛ: Adam ek’el krɛkrɛ ec’ɛgŋ a, el ɛgŋ nɛnɛ cɛ ek’ɛŋn owr anŋ. Gbɛkɔ Adam es abal el a, in ɛŋn owr anŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a owr anŋ.
Gbɛkɔ ów a ec’es ɔsŋm ɛm a, Adam a eke b’ikŋ anym ow a elm in a eke Abŋ Lala ɔŋ anŋ owr a, kɔ Adam a ek’el ɛgŋ nɛnɛ cɛ a. In e jam a gbuŋ ɛtŋ Adam es abal el a eke Abŋ Lala ɔŋ anŋ owr a b’ow.
Nyam kok krɛkrɛ ec’ɛgŋ a wus e siflefl ab, gbɛkɔ yony ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a afr n’anŋ l’ow.
Wus ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ɛli sos megl ek’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm ec’ab ab. Afr ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ a ɛli sos megl ek’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ afr ow ec’ab ab.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke si b’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab ab a, lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, si b’ow s’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ afr ow ab ab yɛji.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin low tasi eke m’am dad: ob yec’eke wɛl kok sos megl lele mebl ab ɛm a, k’ɔtum ɛym Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a. Ɛtŋ yec’a eke b’ugŋ es a, k’ɔtum ɛŋnm owr anŋ ek’ɔnym uwr a.
Sica m’am ow mi dad ɔny low nyam eke lɔl es: si k’ow s’uwm ɛy fɛŋ, gbɛkɔ Nyam b’ow itŋn ɛy fɛŋ e sos megl a.
Low na b’ow ɛc fafa, ow b’ow ɛc fafa marɛm, wanci ab af eke kɔkr es abal el a b’ow ikŋ a. Ɛɛ, kɔkr a b’ow ikŋ ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’uw a b’ow igb owr anŋ ek’ɔnym uwr a eci, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ si b’ow s’itŋn.
Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke ɛy e sos megl a eke b’uw ke b’ugŋ es a, k’itŋn el sos megl eke k’ow uwm lɛgŋ kaka ke k’ow ugŋm es ij.

Sica ɛy e sos megl a ɔtu eke k’uw ke ugŋ es, gbɛkɔ, -li b’ow -l’itŋn -l’el sos megl eke b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Eke low na b’ow ɛy a, ow b’ow ɔŋ ów a fɛŋ ɛy ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af: any eb ɔny luw ɛmn nimum nimum.
Luw, bogŋ ŋ ec’any eb ab a ee? Luw, bogŋ ŋ eci mbe ab a ee?
Luw eci mbe a, sikpl ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow, ɛtŋ sikpl b’ɛŋn in ec’abusu a ol ogŋ.
Gbɛkɔ s’ɔ́ŋ Nyam eke b’ɛcr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm ɔŋ ɛy any eb a bia.
Ow sosiɛm, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛ̀lul lɛc ɔkm, ìnymn es kikri! Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma a mɛwl ɛm. Ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke in e juma eke am kokr a, elm gbre ɔfr ɔfr ek’am ijr.
Sica si dádr os a eke wɛl am ɔkl eke k’ɛlum Jerusalɛm e Nyamel a ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a abu a e low. Kòkr low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ eke mi dad m’ɔŋ Sinyamel ek’anŋ Galasi wus af a:
dimas fɛŋ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ akŋ ɛtŋ, b’ow oc os am ɛw es saw; ow ɔ́ŋ ke wɛl k’ékum eke mi k’anŋ m’ow gbuŋ ke wɛl ás os a luku.
Lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow a, agŋ a eke sɔsumn otr a, mi b’ow m’ɛrm ɛl Jerusalɛm. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl abusu e lɛl, ke -l’oc ɔny ec’ob ap a -n’im.
Sica ek’ow it ek’ɛm obi yɛji mi k’im a, ke -n’im lel ɛm ab.
Mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ eke mi b’ɛc Maseduan a, aŋke mi b’ow m’ɛcr yogŋ eci.
K’aw ke m’ánŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ bɛb, oglog ke ow él lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a nimum. Ow ɔ́ŋ ke ɛ́lumn’m abu m’ɔkŋ any m’im ɛm ec’usu a.
Tasi ɛm a, m’erurm eke ow k’el ɛkn cɛ mi k’ɛkn ɔny ke m’áfŋ es m’aam. M’am ɔny tutr eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ bɛb eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛgŋ cɛ.
Gbɛkɔ mi b’ow m’anŋ Efɛs toŋ ke Pantekɔt ec’es gbɛgbl a ów,
aŋke ɛm e juma kok ec’abusu nɔnɔ ɛru’m es aŋa, eke agŋ nɔnɔ am atar ɛm ab yɛji.
Eke Timote ow a, ɛ̀wr in e lís e low ɛrm, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́kn eke ebr ir sɛnyn sɛnyn ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, aŋke in yɛji Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma n’am kok ɛsɛ ɛm af.
Ɛgŋ kaka ɔny ɛm a k’íir ir es. Kɔ ɔ̀ŋan in ob eke k’ɛlum’n abu, l’ɛ́wl l’ow n’ɛŋn’m ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, aŋke m’am eku’r in lele agŋ lisijimɛl a eke b’ow ɛwl’l ab ab.
Sica ɛy lisijim Apolɔs e lís ec’a, m’atr’r sos es sakp nɔnɔ eke li k’ow l’ɛkn ɔny agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab ab, gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, li k’erurm eke li k’im usu. Eke abusu b’ow ɛru’r es a, li b’ow l’ow.
Ànŋn any owr, ìnymn es kikri ɔmn ɛm! Àtar sos es, ɔ̀nyn lɛc!
Kòkr fɛŋ erur ɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛmɛny kin low ɔm nyam: ɔny uwr any eke Stefanas lel in ec’akŋ ab ab el Akayi wus ogog ec’agŋ krɛkrɛ eke itŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke ɛgŋ ɔmn ɛsɛl ɛjec’a e juma eke -li ki kok -n’ɔŋ a e low -l’ebr.
Ow sosiɛm, ɛ̀lumn agŋ nɛnɛ a lele agŋ a fɛŋ eke am atr sos es kok juma ɛl ab a.
Sos ɛm am iŋn’m Stefanas, Fɔrtunatus lele Akayikus ab ec’ow na eke ow am ɛkn’m a eci. Ɛl eci saw eke -n’anŋn’m a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɔny yɛji saw cɛ ɔny anŋn’m af.
Ɛɛ, -n’ɔŋ’m ɛrm es ɛy ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji -n’ɔŋ ɔny. Ow akpl eke k’uwr agŋ nɛnɛ a e leg ab any.
Azi wus af e Sinyamel a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ɔny. Akilas, Prisil lele agŋ a eke b’as luku ɛl ec’akŋ a, am ɛsŋn ɔny sɛnyn sɛnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm.
Ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ek’anŋ aŋa a am ɛsŋn ɔny. Ɛ̀sŋninin ɔny ɔfr ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl lele lisijɔwɛl ab af.
Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm mi nɔn ɛsŋn na.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam érurm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ke Nyam ígŋ ɔwl’l! Marana ta! Ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ òw.
Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ!
M’erur ɔny fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm.
Ɛm Pɔl, m’el Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur. Ɛy lisijim Timote ab e nin ɛm, m’am awŋ Nyamel ek’anŋ Korɛnt a lele Nyam ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ Akayi nimum ab a lɛl na.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy!
Si kɔ́klm Nyam ek’el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs a! L’el ɛgŋ Ɛs ek’ij gbreŋgbi sɔrŋ ikŋ ɛm ɛtŋ l’el Nyam eke b’atr ɛy sos es low low fɛŋ ɛm.
Li b’atr ɛy sos es ɛy e ses babur fɛŋ ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy yɛji s’átr agŋ ek’am ij gbre a sos es. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, si b’ɔŋ ɛl yec’a eke ɛy obi yɛji si b’eb Nyam ogŋ a.
Tasi ɛm a, elel a eke si b’ij gbre nɔnɔ Krist e nin a ec’a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam si b’ɛŋn sos es atr nɔnɔ in ɛm.
Eke s’anŋ es abur ɛm, ke ɔny e sos es atr lele ɔny e sɔg ab eci. Eke s’am ɛŋn sos es atr, ke ɔny e sos eke si k’atr ɔny es ɛ́gŋn gbre nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke s’am ij ɛsɛ ɔny af a ebr eci.
S’ɔny ɔmn tasi ɛy ɛm eke si bi tutr ɔny e lís owi a, aŋke s’uw low nyam any: ek’am ijr gbre ɛy ab a, ɔny yɛji sos es atr eke s’ɛŋn a el ɔny eci.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it e k’uwr any eke Azi wus af a, s’ɛgŋ gbre ijr ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ s’eb, gbre ijr ek’ɛl e leg a agb afŋn ɛy e lɛc ab es, toŋ ke s’irmn owr anŋ ec’ɔmn fɛŋ.
Ɛtŋ ɛy obi yɛji s’uw any tasi eke si b’ow s’uw. Ɛbɛn a, si k’ɔtum s’ocm ɛy ec’ɔmn s’ɛlum ɛy obi ɛm ij, kɔ Nyam eke b’igbm agŋ luw ɛm a sɔny coco ɛm si k’oc s’ɛlu.
Nyam anake ɔny oc ɛy es luw na ɛm a ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li b’ow n’ɔny l’oc ɛy es. Ɛɛ, s’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm eke ɛmɛny li b’ow n’ɔny l’oc ɛy es.
Ɔny yɛji, eke bi ŋɔŋan Nyam ɔŋn ɛy, ke abu ɛlumn ɛy a. Ɛtŋ si b’ow s’ɛŋn bibm Nyam ɛm, agŋ nɔnɔ eci ŋɔŋn a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ na sosiɛm agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ɔtu ɔŋ Nyam bia ɛy eci.

Eke low nyam anŋ eke k’ɔŋ ntotŋ ok ɛy, ke ɛy ec’ów tutr a ec’ów eke ókm ɛy af a. N’am dad ɛy tasi eke si kok low ɛlum ɛm lele nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ab agŋ fɛŋ ab, ab brobro ɔny e lís. Na low ek’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow, Nyam eci ɛrm mamn a anake nyimn ɛy a, kɔ ow elm agŋ e sɛwr a gbɛ.

Tasi ɛm a, awal yec’a eke si nɔn ɛy e silɛl ab ɛm a, irir ɛtŋ si lɔlam ɔny low kaka es ɛm yogŋ. Low nyam gbɛ anŋ eke irimn okm ɔny es sos ɛm, kɔ m’am ɔny ɔmn eke ow b’ow ok ɔny es sos ɛm tasi: lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu b’ow ow a, ntotŋ b’ow ok ɔny ɛy eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji ow b’ow ok ɛy ɔny ec’ab af.

Eke m’uw ɔny eci ntotŋ ab any tasi a, mi bɛbm eke mi k’ikŋ anym m’ɛc ɔny ogŋ a, ke m’anŋ yogŋ m’im Maseduan, ba ɛm e mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm a, ke mi gbár es ɔny ogŋ yogŋ. Ɛbɛn a, ow b’ow ɔŋ ɔny abusu kokr sos ɛm iŋn sakp yony ɛtŋ b’ow ɛlumn’m abu m’im Jude.
Eke mi bɛbm low na a, kɔ mi tutrm ów ee? Oglog eke mi bi bɛbm ów a, kɔ ɛm obi ec’erur a eke mi ki kok a sosiɛm mi b’ɛgŋ 'ɛɛ', ke ɛmɛny m’ítŋn m’ɛsɛ 'njaŋ' ee?
M’am eb Nyam daŋku, odad eke s’am dad ɔny a, elm 'ɛɛ' lele 'njaŋ' ab.
Silas, Timote lele ɛm ab, s’ɔb ɔny Nyam Jim Jesu Krist ec’amani a. Ow akpl ke úwr any eke Jesu elm 'ɛɛ' lele 'njaŋ' ab, kɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ 'ɛɛ' cɛ li b’el.
Tasi ɛm a, Jesu el ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛwar ɛy ɛw es a eci 'ɛɛ'. Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛm anake si bi dad ɛy eci 'amɛn' a, ke si bi kɔklm Nyam ec’anygbɛl a.
Nyam in obi anake b’ɔŋ ke ɔny lele ɛy ab, si b’ɔny lɛc Krist ɛm a. In anake li sɔsum l’ot ɛy,
ke l’ɛw ɛy in e mɛny ɛwr a ek’am yɛgm eke s’el in ec’a af a. L’oc Abŋ Lala l’ɛlu ɛy ɛrm ɛm, eke k’el aja a eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a eci asmanu.
Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ mi k’ɛwlm mi k’owm Korɛnt ee? M’am eb Nyam daŋku, l’uw’m any ɛtŋ l’uw any eke m’ɔnym yadŋ. Mi k’owm, aŋke m’erurm eke mi k’ijr ɔny gbre.
S’ɔlm eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny low lɛc ɛm ubr nawrɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm, gbɛkɔ s’am erur eke si k’okr af si kok juma ɔny e sos ɛm iŋn a eci.
Kin low yec’eke mi bɛbm a: m’erurm eke mi k’ɛwl m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, eke ɛmɛny ow b’ow ɔwr ɔny sos es.
Eke ɛm m’ɔwr ɔny sos es, ke bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn, eke ow elm ɔny a cɛ eke m’ɔwr ɔny sos es ab ee?

M’erurm eke mi k’ow m’ɛkn ɔny, ke m’ɔwr ɔny sos es. Ow akplm ek’agŋ a ek’it eke k’ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn a, k’el agŋ a eke b’ɔwr’m sos es a. Na ec’anake m’awŋ ɔny lɛl es abal el a. M’uw any tasi eke low yec’eke b’ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn a, ɔny yɛji b’ɔŋ ɔny sos ɛm iŋn.
Ɛɛ, mikŋ ab mi nɔn lɛl a m’awŋ ɔny, sos es ɔw lel ɛrm mij ab iy’m ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ. Gbɛkɔ m’awŋm ɔny lɛl a eke mi k’ɔwr ɔny sos es, m’awŋ ɔny yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛ́kan erur ligbɛl a eke m’ɔny ɔny ec’a.
Nawrɛ, ɛgŋ na eke is sos es ɔw owi na a, ow elm ów a m’erurm eke mi k’agbr gbɛ, kɔ m’am dad m’ɛsɛ li kok Nyamel low ŋuŋ l’akm ɛm obi a. Ɛtŋ ek’ow elm ɔny fɛŋ yɛji, ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb gbɛ low a ɔn es.
Ɛgŋ ikŋ a ec’a, abr a cɛ eke ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ ɛnym’n a ɔdŋ cɛ ŋ̂.
Ow sosiɛm, caca ɛm a, ow akpl eke k’ocr apr ir ke atar ir sos es; ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, sos es ɔw ligbɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔwr’r sos es nimum nimum.
Sica m’am ibrm eke k’ɛlul erur ɔkm in e lís.
Tasi ɛm a, kin low a nuŋ af eke m’awŋ ɔny lɛl a: m’erur eke mi k’ɛkn eke b’ow ɔnyn ɛlumn low low fɛŋ ɛm.
Eke b’apr ɛgŋ low, ɛm yɛji mi b’ap’r. Eke low anŋ eke mi k’ap yɛji, mi b’oc m’ap ɔny sosiɛm, Krist ec’any af.
Ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, Satan ɔ́tum ɛjum ɛy. Ɛɛ, s’uw in e sow tutr ab any tasi.
Eke m’im m’ɛy Troas ɛb ɛm, Krist ec’Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb ec’a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ’m m’ɛŋn juma na e kok ec’abusu mamn.
Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny ɛrmij nɔnɔ, aŋke m’ɔtum m’ɛŋnm ɛy lisijim Tit. Na sosiɛm m’ibrm Troas ec’agŋ a abusu ɛtŋ m’eb ejagb m’im Maseduan wus af.

S’ɔ́ŋn Nyam bia! Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, li b’ɛcr Krist ɛm l’ot l’ok ɛy in ec’agŋ a ek’eb any ke am ij facue ab ɛm, ɛtŋ li b’ɛcr ɛy ɛm n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl uw Krist any usu a fɛŋ. Ow anŋ ɛsɛ sɔsŋ mamn eke b’eb es usu a fɛŋ af.
Ɛɛ, ɛy s’anŋ ɛsɛ mijey sŋɔsŋɔ eke Krist am ɔŋ Nyam af. Ɛtŋ ow eci sɔsŋ a ok sakp yony: agŋ a ek’anŋ sel ɛŋn ec’ejagb ab af a lele ɛl a ek’am irmn ɛl e sel ab ab eci.
Agŋ a ek’am irm ec’a, ow el luw e sɔsŋ eke b’ism luw ab. Kɔ agŋ likpr a ec’a, ow el owr anŋ e sɔsŋ eke b’ism owr anŋ ab. Ɛtŋ kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔny abusu eke ki kok juma nɛnɛ ee?

Ɛy s’anm ɛsɛ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl eke b’oc Nyam odad am ɔɔl an, os eke -li k’ɛŋn sosiɛm ec’ab af. Ɛy, Nyam am ɛkn eke s’am dad odad eke b’anŋ in ogŋ ow a nɛny nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ s’am dad lele Krist ec’abusu ab ab.
Nɛnɛ eke s’am dad a, kɔ ɛy obi ɛy obi s’am aw abusu s’eb ab ee? Agŋ bɛb ec’a ow it eke -li ki yɛgm ɔny ɛl ec’abusu ɔny e silɛl oglog -l’ibrm ɔny e lís. Kɔ ɛy yɛji ɛbɛn si ki kok ab ee?
Ɛy e lɛl a, ow ow el ɔny. Ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm wɛl nɔn, agŋ a fɛŋ uw any ɛtŋ b’awl.
Ɛɛ, ow ayl, Krist in obi nɔn lɛl na, ɛtŋ ɛy anake s’oc s’ow a. N’anm ɛsɛ lɛl eke wɛl oc lɛl mij nɔn ab af, kɔ Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’Abŋ a l’oc ni nɔn. Ow elm lebn af ni nɔnm, kɔ agŋ e mɛrm ab ɛm ni nɔn.
Nyam ec’any af a, s’ɔny ɔmn low na ɛm, aŋke Krist ɔŋ ɛy ɔmn ɔny ligbɛl.
Si kí tutrm eke si k’ɔny abusu si kok low ɛy sɔny coco, kɔ Nyam anake ɔŋ ɛy s’ɔny abusu si kok low a eke s’am kok a.
In anake n’ɔŋ ɛy s’ɔny abusu s’am kok sinm owr na e juma a. Sinm na anm ol eke wɛl nɔn a e low ɛm, kɔ Abŋ Lala e low ɛm n’anŋ. Ol eke wɛl nɔn a b’ism luw ab, kɔ Abŋ Lala, in, b’ism sel ab.

Ol a eci sodad a lebn af wɛl nɔn, ɛtŋ luw cɛ l’ism ab. Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam ec’anygbɛl a jɛjn Mois ec’any ab af. In ec’any a am jɛjn afŋn es toŋ Israɛl ec’ey a ɔ́tum eke ki lɛr’r, eke jɛjn a ɔb nuŋ am is es a bɔbɔ yɛji.
Gbɛkɔ Abŋ Lala e juma a eke am kok a b’ow ɛŋn anygbɛl agb akm na.
Eke ol eke b’ism agŋ luw ab a e juma a ɛŋn anygbɛl ligbɛl, ow ayl tasi eke Abŋ Lala eke b’ɔŋ agŋ el nyim nyim a eci juma a, b’ow ɛŋn anygbɛl eke b’ow agb nɔnɔ ligbɛl.
Ow ɔŋ a, anygbɛl a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a jɛjn a, elm low kaka ij anygbɛl liplemu na ec’any af.
Eke ów a eke íbnm a anygbɛl iy ɛm gbɔŋ, ɛbɛn ke ɛl a eke bibn a, b’ow ɛŋn anygbɛl ek’agb nɔnɔ ligbɛl.
Low ɔmn na ab, s’ɔny ɔmn iy ɛy ɛm gbɔŋ.
Ɛy si kókm ɛsɛ Mois eke oc gbad bubur any es, yec’ɛtŋ ke Israɛl ec’ey a k’ɔ́nym abusu ɛknm anygbɛl a e jɛjn a eke ibnm, ke am uwr a.
Gbɛkɔ ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a ɔ́tum irim low kaka. Ɛtŋ toŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, eke -li b’awl sinm sig e silɛl a, gbad nyam a cɛ ɛmɛny bi bubur ów a es, aŋke gbad a, Krist ab ec’af okr a cɛ b’ɔny oc’r es.
Tasi ɛm a, toŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, sakp sakp fɛŋ eke Israɛl eyŋ b’awl Mois e silɛl a, gbad nyam bi bubur ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny ab es.
Gbɛkɔ sakp sakp fɛŋ eke ɛgŋ nyam b’ɛwl ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ a, gbad a b’oc es.
Odad na eke el 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ' a, ke Abŋ Lala ana. Ɛtŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’Abŋ a anŋ usu nyam, in anake li b’ɔŋ ɛy s’ŋgboŋ ɛy e madu el ab ɛm a.

Ɛy fɛŋ ec’any a gbɛ gbad anm buburm es, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’anygbɛl a am ɔŋ’n li jɛjn ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ ɛm ɛs am lɛr af. Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’el Abŋ a b’itŋn ɛy. Li b’ɔŋ s’anŋ ɛsɛ in af, anygbɛl ligbɛl nyam eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ anŋ ɛsɛ in ec’ab af ab ɛm.
Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, abul ɛy juma na; ow sosiɛm anake sos ɔwm ɛy es a.

Ɛy si wal yadŋ owi fɛŋ eke wɛl b’oc kokr ɛ́s owi es lɔl ɛm a s’ɛlu es. S’am kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ɛtŋ s’ɔ́nym Nyam ec’odad ebl a s’itŋnm. Kɔ nana, si b’ɛlu low nawrɛ ɔkm kpata, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ow b’ɔŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛl e tutr ab ɛm, b’uw agŋ yec’eke s’el ab any.
Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, ɛy ec’Amani Mamn a b’el ob eke lɔl es agŋ bɛb a eke am irmn ɛl e sel a eci.

-N’ɔnymn ɔmn aŋke Satan, wus na e nyàm ŋuŋ a efal ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a any, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ -l’ɛknmn Amani Mamn ab ɛm ec’usuayl a eke am jɛjn ow a. Amani Mamn a am dad Krist ek’in obi a el Nyam ec’es otarir kpɛŋ ec’anygbɛl a ec’odad.
Tasi ɛm a, amani a eke s’am ɔb a, ow elm ɛy obi, kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist s’am ɔb. Ɛtŋ ɛy, s’el ɔny e juma kok ɛsɛl Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
Nyam dad ninɛ: ke usuayl áfŋ ncebn ec’araŋn! Ɛtŋ ow el in obi eke l’afŋ ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm ɛy ec’es ɛkan eci, ke n’ɔŋ ɛy s’ɛkn in ec’anygbɛl a ek’am jɛjn Krist ec’any a.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy eke s’am abu ob ɔny na a, s’anŋ ɛsɛ kpeŋ ɛm mɛw af. Ow b’ɔŋ wɛl b’uw any sɛnyn sɛnyn eke abusu gbɛl na ow elm ɛy ɛm ow ánm ɛym ɔkm, kɔ Nyam ogŋ a ow b’anŋ ow.
Ses babur b’eb ɛy susu fɛŋ, gbɛkɔ -li kiknmn ɛy es. Ɛtŋ eke si b’anŋ sel at ɛm a bɔbɔ yɛji, s’ígŋm low a s’ɛlum es.
Wɛl b’ijr ɛy gbre ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ Nyam ígŋm ɛlum ɛy es. Wɛl b’ɔny ok ɛy wus, kɔ s’úwm gbɛ.
Gbre ij na ɛm, si b’uw Jesu e luw a ek’anŋ ɛy sos megl ɛm ab any, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́tu s’uw in ec’owr anŋ a ek’anŋ ɛy sos megl ɛm a yɛji any.
Tasi ɛm a, s’anŋ owr, gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ si b’ɔny low luw ab eke s’am us Jesu jam a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a yɛji, ow b’ɔŋ wɛl b’ɛkn eke Jesu anŋ owr ɛy e sos megl a eke b’uw ab ɛm.
Low eke wɛl b’ɛkn ɛm a el: luw eke am kok low ɛy ɛm, ke owr anŋ in am kok low ɔny ɛm a.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: M’ɔny ɔmn, ow sosiɛm mi dad. Ɔmn nyam a cɛ b’ɔŋ ɛy si kok low. Ɛy yɛji s’ɔny ɔmn, ow sosiɛm s’am dad.
Ɛɛ, s’uw any eke Nyam ek’igbm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu luw ɛm a, ɛy yɛji b’ow igbm ɛy luw ɛm in ab, ɛtŋ ɔny lel ɛy ab, li b’ow l’ot l’ok ɛy es ow e saw.
Gbre fɛŋ eke s’am ij a ɔny sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ec’ów amamn a eke am agb eb es a, ɔ́ŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ am ɛnyn nɔnɔ ɔŋn in bia, ke ókar af ɔny fɛŋ kɔklmn in.
Na sosiɛm anake sos ɔ́wm ɛy es a. Ɛtŋ eke ɛy e sos megl a am uŋ tɛl tɛl yɛji, yec’a ek’el ɛy ec’abŋ ɛm ec’a, lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ b’el owr.
Ɛɛ, ɛy e yɛfɛnyna ɛm e gbre ij nɔnɔ a ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɛtŋ bibn sɛgŋ tɛl cɛ, gbɛkɔ ow bi bɛbm anygbɛl liplemu nyam ɛy eci. Anygbɛl ikŋ a b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’agb nɔnɔ l’akm ɛy e yɛfɛnyna e gbre ij a fɛŋ.
Ɛy, s’ɔ́lm yec’a eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛkn ab es, kɔ yec’a eke wɛl ɛ́knm a s’am ɔl es. Tasi ɛm a, yec’a eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛkn a íbnm nɔnɔ, kɔ yec’a eke wɛl ɛ́knm a b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.

Wus af aŋa, s’ir sos megl nyam ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ndey lɛl ɛm êl eke lɛgŋ nyam b’ow ufŋ es ab ɛm. Gbɛkɔ s’uw any eke afr Nyam ɛw ɛy êl nyam eke b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab es. Êl eke Nyam us in obi, ke ow elm agŋ ec’abu usm.
Sicaca ɛm a, s’am ikŋn sɔmu, ɛtŋ s’am ɔɔl ɛy e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm eke si k’oc mob sus ɛm ɛjec’a s’ɛw sos af, mob sus ɛm a ek’el ɛy ec’afr ec’êl a.
Ɛɛ, low na anake s’am ɔɔl es a, yec’ɛtŋ ke si k’élmn abŋ eke ɔnym sos megl.

Lɛgŋ na ɛm eke s’iir ɛy e wus aŋa ec’êl ab ɛm a, s’am ikŋn sɔmu ɛsɛ ɛrɛkp leg leg ec’ew ɛs anŋ af. Ow elm ke s’am erur eke si k’uw ke si k’ɔnymn sos megl eci. Njaŋ, s’am erur eke si ki sus ɛy ec’afr e sos megl a ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af, yec’ɛtŋ ke sel ek’ɔnym uwr a ɔ́ny ɛy e sos megl a eke b’uw a ɛmn.
Nyam in obi anake bɛbm ɛy ɛb ir na eci sos a. Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɛy Abŋ Lala eke el aja a eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a eci asmanu.
Ow sosiɛm a, sɛgŋ fɛŋ sos es atr iy ɛy ɛm gbɔŋ. Gbɛkɔ ɛy s’uw any, lɛgŋ na ɛm eke s’iir ɛy e sos megl na ɛm a, si kpab es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lís.
Tasi ɛm a, ɔmn ɛm s’am ir ɛb, kɔ ow elm es eke s’am ɛkn ab ɛm.
Ɛɛ, sos es atr iy ɛy ɛm gbɔŋ ɛtŋ s’am erur tasi eke si k’ŋgboŋ sos megl na ɛm, s’im s’ir ɛb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci saw.
Gbɛkɔ low krɛkrɛ eke s’am erur a el ke ɛy owi aw’r, eke s’anŋ sos megl na ɛm ɛtŋ s’anm ɛm yɛji.
Ɛy fɛŋ ow ibrm eke si b’ow s’imn Krist e jɛj ok a ec’any af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛ́ŋn yec’a ek’it eke k’ɛbmn, in ec’ów amamn lel eŋuŋ eke li kok in e wus aŋa ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm a.

Ɛ́lum Nyam ɔmn ɛm a, s’uw low yec’eke ow am dad ab any. Na sosiɛm anake s’am ɔl elel eke si ki dadr ow e low ok agŋ es sos ɛm a. Nyam uw ɛy any igŋ nuŋ ɛtŋ l’uw any eke s’ɔny nɛny nyam, ɔny yɛji m’am ɔmn eke ɔny e mɛrm ab ɛm, uwr any ɛbɛn.

Ɛy, ɛmɛny si k’ow s’ɔlm eke si k’aw abusu s’eb, kɔ s’am erur eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny abusu ntotŋ ok ɔny ɛy eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́nyn low dadr ɔŋn agŋ a eke b’ɛw sos ów eke wɛl b’ɛkn nyamn ɛm a eci, ke ow elm ów a eke b’anŋ ɛgŋ ɛrm ɛm ec’a.
Eke agŋ am dad eke eŋ ɛm in uŋ ɛy, ke Nyam sosiɛm eci. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl am ot ɛy ány es oku, ke ɔny e low nimamn eci.
Erur eke Krist ɔny ɛy ec’a am ucu ɔny ɛy es, aŋke s’uw any tasi eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ uw agŋ fɛŋ eci; ɛgŋ a el Krist, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ in e luw a el ɛy eci.
L’uw ɛy fɛŋ eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ek’anŋ owr a k’írm ɛb ɛl obi ɛl obi ec’ij, kɔ ke -l’ir ɛb Krist ek’uw ke igb luw ɛm ɛl ec’a eci.
Low na sosiɛm anake jam aŋa, si k’ow si lɛrm ɛgŋ ɛsɛ elel ek’agŋ bi lɛɛr ɛgŋ ab af a. Ɛtŋ ek’ow el ɛbɛn anake si lɛr Krist a, ke jam aŋa, ow elm ɛbɛn s’am lɛrm’n ij.
Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋ nyam okr af Krist ab, n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke Nyam kokr ɛm af. Low yec’eke el lisig a uwr, ɛtŋ yec’a ek’el owr a eb usu.
Amua fɛŋ Nyam ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow. L’ɛcr Krist ɛm n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm in obi in obi ab, ɛtŋ l’abul ɛy agŋ ɛjec’a lele in ab ec’ɛm okr a e juma.
Nawrɛ, Nyam ɛrm Krist ow in lele agŋ ab ec’ɛm okr a eci, ɛtŋ l’úsm wɛl ec’ów ɔbr in e lís a e low jam ij. Ɛtŋ l’abul ɛy in ec’ɛm okr ec’amani ɔb a.
Ɛy s’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛ́rmu eke Krist am ɛrm af. Ɛtŋ Nyam b’ɛcr ɛy ɛm dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ: "Krist e nin ɛm, s’am ok ɔny mɛrm sabu af, yɛ̀br Nyam ɔny ɔkr ɔny ɛm in ab!"
Krist ɔnym sikpl kaka, gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔb’r low luw eci ɛsɛ sikpl ɛs af ɛy usu iy, yec’ɛtŋ ke si b’okr af Krist ab a, Nyam ót ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
Sica ɛy eke s’am kok juma Nyam ab a, s’am dad ɔny eke k’ocr bibm a ek’ɛŋan in ec’abu ɛm a kokar low sɛnyn.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Lɛgŋ mamn ɛm a, m’ɛgŋ’ŋ nɛnym, ɛtŋ sel ɛŋn e lɛgŋ a yɛji, m’eb m’ɛlu’ŋ es. Sica yɛfɛnyna tasi anake el lɛgŋ mamn a, yɛfɛnyna anake el sel ɛŋn e lɛgŋ a.
Eke s’erurm ek’agŋ ki cak ɛy e juma a, ow ɔŋ ɛy e low fɛŋ ɛm, si kok elel eke si k’elm lirikp ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eci.
Kɔ nana, si bi yɛgm low fɛŋ ɛm eke s’el Nyam e juma kok ɛsɛl. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, si b’ɛgŋ ɛrm susu ɛm sos es ɔw, ses babur, ɛrm mij ebr,
ɔr eke wɛl b’ɔr ɛy, sobel ɛm eke wɛl b’ok ɛy lele dedeku ec’af eke b’ok ɛy ab ab e low s’eb. Si b’ɛgŋ sos es kikn ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, mɛmn ɛrum lele namn ab s’eb.
Si b’ir ɛb lala ɛm si yɛgm eke s’uw Nyam e lís ec’ów any; s’ɔny low eku, s’el ɛrm mamnu, Abŋ Lala anŋ ɛy ab, s’ɔny erur tasi,
ɛtŋ si b’ɔb low nawrɛ e kokoba, Nyam ec’abusu ab ɛm. Si b’oc yec’a ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a, ɛsɛ ar ogŋn ob af, s’im agŋ ar oglog si dogŋn sos.
Wɛl b’usr ɛy sos oglog wɛl bi kok ɛy ɛ́s. Wɛl bi dad ɛy e low ŋuŋ lel ɛy e low mamn ab. Wɛl b’ot ɛy ayadŋu, ke low nawrɛ cɛ si bi dad.
Wɛl bi kok ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ eke wɛl uwm any af, ke wɛl uw ɛy any sɛnyn sɛnyn cɛ. Wɛl bi lɛr ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ ek’am uw af, gbɛkɔ si b’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Wɛl b’ɔr ɛy ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ wɛl íbim ɛy.
Wɛl b’ɛkn ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ eke sos ɔw es af, gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ si b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Wɛl b’ot ɛy ɔgbɔru, gbɛkɔ si b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a ɔny ob. Wɛl bi tutr eke s’ɔnym ob kaka, ke ɛy nana anake s’ɔny ob fɛŋ a.
Korɛnt ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm si fig ɛy ec’ɛrm a si dad ɔny odad.
S’ablm ɛy ec’ɛrm a ɔny e lís, kɔ ɔny anake b’abal ɔny ec’a ɛy e lís a.
Sica m’am dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ iy ɛs lel in ec’ey ab af m’ɛsɛ: kòkr ɛsɛ ɛy af, ɔny yɛji fìgr ɛy ɔny e mɛrm a foŋ.
K’ɛ̀wr mɛcrer agŋ a ek’ɔnym ɔmn Nyam ɛm ab ab, k’ɔtumn okrmn ɛb ir af ɛl ab. Kɔ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɔtu eke k’okr af ɛnyɛmbri yony owi eke Nyam érurm ab ab ee? Kɔ usuayl lele ncebn ab b’ɔtu okr af ee?
Kɔ Krist nɛny ɔtu eke k’okr af Satan ab ee? Kɔ nawrɛ ub ɛs nyam lele nawrɛ ubm ɛs nyam ab ec’araŋn a low ɔtu eke k’anŋ ee?

Bogŋ ec’iririr k’anŋ Nyam ec’êl a lele sinyam yadŋ ec’ab ab ec’araŋn ee? Ɛy anake s’el Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’êl a, ɛsɛ elel eke in obi li dad ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’anŋ ɛl araŋn ke m’ír ɛb ɛl ab. Mi b’ow m’el ɛl e Nyam ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el ɛm ec’agŋ.
Ow sosiɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: Ŋ̀gbroŋn agŋ amua ec’araŋn ke kpábr ɛl es lís! K’ìtŋnin ob yec’eke aylm a abu, ɛtŋ ɛm, mi b’ow m’eb ɔny.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Nyam Abusu Ɛs dad ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’el ɔny Ɛs, ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow el ɛm ec’ey egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab.
Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ów ɛwar amua fɛŋ el ɛy eci. Ow sosiɛm a, si yɔ́yɔg ob fɛŋ eke b’ibar ɛy e sos a lel ɛrm ab ab a es, ke s’éel Nyam eci nimum nimum ɛlum ɛm.
Kòkr ɛy usu ɔny e mɛrm ab ɛm! Si kokm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi ɛgŋ kaka e lís, si ŋuŋnm ɛgŋ kaka ec’ɔmn, ɛtŋ s’ebm ɛgŋ kaka ec’ob s’ijm.
Mi dadm odad nɛnɛ low e mi k’ɔb ɔny eci. Ɛsɛ elel eke m’ikŋ anym mi dad ab af: ɔny owi anŋ ɛy ɛrm ɛm, ɛtŋ s’okr af owr anŋ ɛm toŋ luw ɛm.
M’ɔny ɔmn ligbɛl ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ ntotŋ b’ok’m ɔny eci. Eke s’ɔny ses babur nɔnɔ yɛji, m’ɔny sos es atr nɔnɔ ɛtŋ sos ɛm iŋn iy’m ɛm gbɔŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, eke s’im s’ok Maseduan a, s’ɛŋnm sel es ok kaka. Kɔ nana, gbre ɛrŋ ɛrŋ s’ɛŋn ɛsɛ: agŋ eke ok ɛy af lele ɛrm ɛm ec’erŋn ab.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam eke b’atr agŋ eke sos b’ɔw es a sos es a, atr ɛy sos es Tit ec’ow a ek’anŋ ow ab ɛm.

Ɛtŋ ow elm Tit ec’ow a sɔny cɛ atrm ɛy sos es, kɔ ɔny e sos a eke atar ir es ec’amani a eke n’ɔŋ ɛy a yɛji. Li dad eke ɔny ɔnyn ɛm ec’ɛkn ec’erur nɔnɔ. Ɛtŋ li dad ɛy ɔny e sos ɛm ɛy owi low a ek’ɛy a eci lele ɛm e dogŋn eke dogŋnin’m gbragbra kok ɛm ab ab. Ów amua anake ɔŋ ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn a agb nɔnɔ a.
Tasi ɛm a, eke ɛm e lɛl es abal el a ɔwr ɔny sos es, ke ɛm, ow e low ɛym im sos ɛm ij. Ɛɛ, m’uw any tasi eke lɛl a ɔwr ɔny sos es lɛgŋ tɛl eci, ɛtŋ nawrɛ ow e low ɛy’m sos ɛm,

gbɛkɔ caca ɛm a, m’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ow elm ɔny e sos es ɔw a sosiɛm, kɔ eke ɔny e sos es ɔw a ɔŋ ɔny itŋnin es an a sosiɛm. Sos es ɔw a eke Nyam b’erur in ec’agŋ ec’ab ana, ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, ow am yɛgm eke si kokm ɔny low ŋuŋ.

Tasi ɛm a, sos es ɔw a eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm a, b’ɔŋ ɛy s’itŋn es an ɛtŋ bi nyimn ɛy sel ɛŋn ɛm. Sos es ɔw nɛnɛ a ɔtum eke k’ɛy ɛy sos ɛm. Gbɛkɔ wus ec’ów ec’ɛrm mij ebr a eci sos es ɔw a, ek’ítŋnm ɛgŋ ec’es an a, bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm.

Ɔny eci sos es ɔw a akpl Nyam sos ɛm. Sica lɛ̀ɛr ow ec’ey eke ow ɔsu: ow ɔŋ ɔny low es ogŋ kok lele low oc ap ec’ibrm ab! Ow ɔŋ ɔny low sos ɛm ɛy lele low uru low kok ɛm ab! Ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛkn ec’aw lele ɛm e dogŋn gbragbra kok ɛm ab! Ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ ɔny low ŋuŋ kok ɛs a eci low ɛw ɔŋ! Low na ɛm a, yɛgmn eke ɔnymn low af ok kaka.
Sica m’awŋm ɔny lɛl ɛgŋ a eke kok low ŋuŋ a sosiɛm oglog ɛgŋ a eke wɛl kok low ɔbr a sosiɛm. Kɔ m’erur eke mi ki yɛgm ɔny Nyam ec’any af, ɛkan eke b’erurir ɛy owi tasi.
Na anake el low ek’atr ɛy sos es a. Ɛtŋ sos es atr na e low ek’igŋ af, ke obn ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn a el Tit eci sos ɛm iŋn a ek’ɛŋn a. Ɛɛ, ɔny fɛŋ ɛyar ir ɛrm es.

Nawrɛ, in ec’any af mi dad ɔny ec’odad nɛny ij ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔɔmn’m ɛ́s. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ si bi dad ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ kin ow e low ek’ow ism ab: m’ɔny low ij eke mi dad ɔny e lís owi nɛny ij ɛm Tit ec’any af.
N’am ɔkn elel a eke ɔny fɛŋ ɛlumn low lele ɔny ec’elel a eke ebr ir ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm lele sos ufŋ ɛm ab a. Ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm in ec’erur a e n’ɔny ɔny ec’a ɛmɛny agb obn.
Sos ɛm am iŋn’m eke m’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔmn ɔny low fɛŋ ɛm a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yec’eke s’am erur eke k’uwr any: Nyam ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn a ɔkm bibm eke n’ɔŋ Maseduan e Sinyamel ab ɛm.
-L’ɔbr ses babur nɔnɔ ɛsɛ ɛbm ɛkn af, gbɛkɔ ɔmn ɛsɛl a sos ɛm iŋn iy ɛm gbɔŋ. -L’ij gbɔr nɔnɔ, gbɛkɔ -l’ɛlu ɛrm mamn ɔny nɔnɔ ɔkm ɛl ec’ob eke -l’apr ab ɛm.
-N’ɔŋ yec’a eke -l’ɔtur a, ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ ow afŋ es yɛji, m’ij ow e daŋku. Ow elm lɛc ɛm wɛl ɔnym ɛl -n’ɔɔm; kɔ ɛl obi tasi ec’erur ɛm -li kok.
Tasi ɛm a, -l’ibrm ɛy atrm ɛm eke ɛl yɛji, ɛl ec’abu k’anŋ Jerusalɛm ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a ec’abu ɛlum owi ab ɛm.
-L’ikŋ anym -l’ocr ɛl sosi -n’ɔŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛtŋ ow e jam a, -l’ocr ɛl sosi -n’ɔŋ ɛy yɛji, ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af. Ɛtŋ na el low eke s’ɔmnm kaka.
Na sosiɛm anake s’atr Tit sos es eke li k’ɛwl l’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, ke l’úwar ɔny ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny e juma mamn a eke l’ɔb nuŋ a.

Ɔny ijr lɛc ów ów a fɛŋ ɛm: ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm, Nyam odad dad ɛm, uwr Nyam ec’ów ab any, sɛgŋ fɛŋ bɛbmn sos low kok eci, ɛtŋ ɔnyn ɛy ec’erur yɛji. Na sosiɛm, ow it eke ki yɛgmn ɔny e lɛc ij a, ɔny ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny ab ɛm yɛji.
Ow elm ol m’ɛwm m’ɔɔm ɔny, kɔ Nyamel bɛb a ec’elel eke gbragbra kok ɛm kokr low a cɛ m’am dad ɔny. Nɛnɛ ke m’ɔ́ŋ ɔny abusu yɛgmn eke ɔny ec’erur a el nawrɛ tasi.
Tasi ɛm a, ɔny uwr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e bibm a lele ɛrm mamn ab ab any. L’el gbreŋgbi, gbɛkɔ ɔny sosiɛm l’ɛgŋ gbɔr l’eb, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e gbɔr a ɔ́ŋ ɔny eel egbreŋgbi.
Ɛm ec’elel eke m’am ɛkan low a el, ke kókr low a ek’ɔbr nuŋ lakpo jam a yibar, aŋke ɔny eel agŋ krɛkrɛ eke is ob ap na e tutr a, ɛtŋ ɔny cɛ eel ɛmɛny agŋ krɛkrɛ ek’ɔb nuŋ kok ow e low.
Eke isr ow e low a, yɛgmn ɔny ec’erur ek’ɔnyn a. Ow sosiɛm erur nyam ab ɛm cɛ, ùcur low a ɔnyn es toŋ ke ígŋn nuŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ob ek’ɔny ab ɛm.
Eke wɛl b’ɔŋ ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm a, Nyam b’ɛkn ow e s’ɔny a ɛtŋ li b’eb ow eke si b’ap a. L’íbram eke si k’ap ow eke s’ɔnym a.
Ow elm ke wɛl ɔ́ŋ ɔny ijr gbɔr agŋ ɛjec’a ec’abu ɛlum a sosiɛm. Njaŋ, kpɛŋ kpɛŋ eke k’eel a wɛl am ɔl.
Lɛgŋ na ɛm a, ow a ek’ɔnyn bubu af a ɔtu eke k’ɛlum agŋ ɛjec’a ek’ɔnym a abu, yec’ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ nyam ɔnyn es abur ɛtŋ ɛl -n’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a, ke ɛl yɛji -l’ɛlum ɔny abu. Nɛnɛ ke ɔny fɛŋ éel kpɛŋ kpɛŋ.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ɛgŋ a eke ot nɔnɔ a, ɔnym ob ij afŋnm es. Ɛgŋ a eke ot tɛl a, ɔpim ob ij lɛgŋ kaka.
M’am ɔŋ Nyam bia, aŋke n’ɔŋ Tit gbragbra kok nyam a cɛ eke li k’oc l’ɛlum ɔny abu, l’akm ɛm obi ec’a e m’ɔny a.
Tit ɛgŋ ɛy ec’ɛrm a ek’el ɔny ec’ow ɛkn a ɛmɛny eb, ɛtŋ n’am ogŋ es eke kpɛkŋ li k’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ.
S’am ɔŋ’n l’ow ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ab. Ɛgŋ lisijim a, Sinyamel a fɛŋ b’aw’r, in ec’Amani Mamn ec’ɔb e juma kok a sosiɛm.
Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ! Sinyamel a sɔsum oc’r, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ígŋ ɛy ab s’oc bibm na s’im. Ow el juma eke si ki kok, ke ám ɛlu Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in obi ec’anygbɛl ɔkm, ke ám yɛgm ɛy ec’abu ɛlum ec’erur e s’ɔny a.
Wɛl abul ɛy os nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ s’am erur eke wɛl kí cakm ɛy ec’elel eke s’am kokr ow e juma a.
S’am ɔl low yec’eke akpl ab es, ɛtŋ ow elm Nyam ec’any af cɛ, kɔ agŋ ec’any af yɛji.

S’ɔŋ ɛy lisijim nyam yɛji igŋ Tit lele ɛgŋ lisijim nyam a eke k’ɛwl’l ab ab af. Ɛgŋ lisijim na yɛgm ɛy sakp nɔnɔ in ec’elel eke li b’erur tasi l’ɛlum agŋ ɛjeci abu a. Caca ɛm a, li b’erur es ogŋ ɛm tasi l’ɛlum agŋ abu, aŋke n’ɔny ɔmn nɔnɔ ɔny ɛm.
M’am ɔŋ Tit ek’el ɛm lawl ke bi kok juma ɛm ab ɔny sosiɛm ec’a, lele agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjeci amua ek’el Sinyamel ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow ɛkn ɔny. Ɛl fɛŋ Krist ec’anygbɛl a e juma -n’am kok.
Ow sosiɛm yɛ̀gmn ɛl eke b’erurir ɛl, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ Sinyamel a úw any nawrɛ, ke -l’ɛkn yɛj’eke ntotŋ ɔtu eke k’ok ɛy ɔny eci.
Jerusalɛm ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a ec’abu ɛlum eke wɛl k’oc im ɔŋ ec’a, ow ɛbam eke mi k’awŋ ɔny ow e lɛl.

M’uw ɔny e sow tutr amamn ab any. Maseduan ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a ec’any af, m’ij nɛny mi dad ɛl eke Akayi ogog ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a, lakpo jam ɛtŋ bɛbm sos abu ɛlum na ec’os a eci. Ɛtŋ ɔny e low na eke ogŋn es ɛgŋn ebr a, atr agŋ nɔnɔ sos es.
Ow sosiɛm m’ɛrm agŋ lisijimɛl amua, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɛkn tasi eke bɛbmn sos. Ow ɔ́ŋ ke wɛl ɛ́kn eke ɛy e nɛny a e s’ij ɔny ec’a elm ɔfr ɔfr.
Sica eke Maseduan ec’agŋ igŋ’m ab ow ɛtŋ ɛkn eke bɛbamn sos, ow b’ow ɔny ɛy ɛ́s nɔnɔ eke s’oc ɔmn s’ɛlu ɔny ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji ow b’ow el ɔny ec’ɛ́s.

Na sosiɛm m’ɔny tutr eke ow akpl ke m’íkŋ anym m’ɔŋ agŋ lisijimɛl amua ów ɔny ec’araŋn bɛ́bm ob ap mamn a eke dadr ow e low ɛwr es a, ba mi b’anŋ m’ow a, ke fɛŋ iy nɛny ŋ̂, ke wɛl ɛ́kn eke ow el ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm ɔŋn, kɔ ow elm atrm ɛm.
Kin yec’ek’it eke k’uwr any: ɛgŋ eke b’ewl tɛl a, b’ub tɛl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ewl nɔnɔ a, b’ub nɔnɔ.
Ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔŋ ɛsɛ elel eke li tutr in ec’ɛrm ɛm ab af, ow k’elm sos es ɔw ɛm lele atrm ɛm ab. Tasi ɛm, Nyam b’erur ɛgŋ eke b’ɔŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a.
Nyam ɔny abusu eke k’ɔŋ ɔny ów amamn fɛŋ ow afŋn ɔny es. Ow ɔ́ŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔnyn ow ek’it a, ke ɔ́nyn ow bubu af, ócr kokr ów amamn.
Nyam Lɛl dad Nyam ec’ɛgŋ e lís ninɛ: Li b’ɔŋ ɔgbɔru ɛrm mamn ɔny ɛm, ɛtŋ li bi kok sɛgŋ fɛŋ yec’ek’el nyim nyim a.

Nyam anake b’ɔŋ egb ewl ɛs egb ey lele futufutu eke li k’ij ab ab a. Ɔny yɛji in cɛ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny egb ey, li kok ow ɛny ke n’ɔ́ŋ ow agb. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɔny ec’ów nyim nyim e kok a b’ow ɔsu ey amamn nɔnɔ.
Kaka fɛŋ, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ɔnyn ob, ɛtŋ b’ow ɛlul ɔny ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny a ɔkm. Ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ɔŋ Nyam bia sob ap amua eke si b’ow s’ɔŋ ɛl ɔny e nin ɛm a eci.
Ob ap na ɛm, am ɛlumn Nyam ec’agŋ lala a abu. Ɛtŋ ow elm ke ɔ́ŋn ɛl fɛŋ a eke -n’ɔnym a cɛ, kɔ ɛmɛny b’atar ɛl sos es eke -li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam nɔnɔ -l’ɛlu ow bia.

Ów amua fɛŋ sosiɛm, -li b’ow -l’ɛkn juma na e leg a ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li kɔklm Nyam, aŋke bi cɛcr ɛrm mamn ɔny ɛm yec’a eke ɔnyn a, Jerusalɛm ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a lele ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab, ɛtŋ am yɛgmn eke b’ɛlumn Krist ec’Amani Mamn a.
Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ɔŋ ɔny in e bibm a ow bubu af. Ow sosiɛm, -li b’ow -li yɛgm ɔny ɛl ec’erur a, Nyam eke -li bi ŋɔŋn -n’ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm.
S’ɔ́ŋn Nyam bia in ec’ob ap mamn a eke wɛl k’ɔtum ocm bɛbmnm ab a eci.
Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm anake m’am ibrm ɔny low Krist ec’ɛrm frɔrɔ lel ɛrm mamn ab ab ɛm a. Wɛl am dad eke ɛm b’anŋ tiŋ eke ɛm b’anŋ ɔny ec’any af a, kɔ ɛm b’anŋ akpoj a, nɛny in b’ɔtu’m nɔnɔ.

M’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, k’ɔ̀ŋn mi k’ɛw gbagba lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ec’araŋn a! Agŋ bɛb bi tutr eke s’am kok low ɛsɛ wus ec’agŋ ɛs el af. Ɛɛ, agŋ nɛnɛ e lís a, m’am tutr eke mi b’ow m’ɛlu ɛm ec’ɛrm susu a ɔkm ɛtŋ ek’ow it yɛji mi b’ow m’ɛw gbagba.
Nawrɛ eke s’el agŋ gɔŋ, kɔ mum a eke s’am ogŋ a elm agŋ ɛm eci.
