Mum a e mob a eke s’am ot s’ogŋn a elm agŋ ec’a. Ɛl e lɛc a, Nyam ogŋ a ow b’anŋ ow ŋuŋn ob fɛŋ eke b’atar in ab a. Si bi ŋuŋn sow tutr yadŋ ɛm a fɛŋ.
Si b’ɔny tutr fɛŋ e b’ɔl eke k’ɛdŋn agŋ Nyam ec’any uw a s’oc es. Tutr fɛŋ eke b’atar Nyam ab a, si b’ɔny’n lɛc ɛm eke li k’ɛlum Krist.
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, s’inym es eke low ɛluam fɛŋ ec’a, si k’ɛw low s’ɔŋ ɛgŋ, gbɛkɔ ow akpl eke k’ɔnyn abusu ɛ́lul ɔny ec’ɛlum a nimum ɔkm yɛ.
Lɛ̀ɛr ów a ec’elel ek’anŋn a sɛnyn sɛnyn! Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny tutr eke in sɔny cɛ l’el Krist eci, ow it ke ɛmɛny li tútr sɛnyn sɛnyn: ɛy yɛji s’el Krist eci ɛsɛ in af.
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ ɛy abusu eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny e Nyamel a agb ɔmn ɛm, kɔ ow elm in e ŋuŋn eci. Nawrɛ eke low na ɔŋ ntotŋ ok’m nɔnɔ, gbɛkɔ mi k’ow m’ururm ɛ́s na sosiɛm.
M’erurm eke k’ɛkan’m ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke b’ok agŋ erŋn lokm, in e silɛl e li b’awŋ ab ɛm af.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ: "Pɔl e silɛl a b’ɛw kpaŋ kpaŋ lele lɛc ɛm ab. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’anŋ ɛy ec’araŋn a, li b’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɛtŋ sodad eke li bi dad a élm low kaka."
Ke ɛgŋ a ek’am dad odad nɛnɛ a, úw low na gbɛ any: eke si b’anŋ kpekpe a, si b’awŋ silɛl kpaŋ kpaŋ. Lɛgŋ eke si b’ow s’anŋ ɔny ec’any af a, si b’ow si kok ɛbɛn kpɛŋ.
Agŋ bɛb b’awr ɛl sosi nɔnɔ, si k’ɔtum si bɛbmnm ɛl ab oglog s’otm ɛl es. -Li b’ocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛ ob bɛbmn ob af -li bɛbmn ɛl sosi, ke -n’ɔnyn ɛl sosi -l’igbl ogŋ -l’ɛkn. Na nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ!
Ɛy ec’a, si k’ow si yɛbm ɛy eci ntotŋ ok a iim nɔnɔ nɛnɛ. Eke Nyam nyimn ɛy s’ow s’ɛŋn ɔny a, li yɛgm ɛy yogŋ ek’ɛy e juma e l’abul ɛy a k’im ok a, ɛtŋ si b’ow s’oc ereb a ɛsɛ ɛy ec’ob bɛbmn ob af.
Blel s’owm toŋ s’okm ɔny ogŋ aŋa ana, wɛl ɔtu e k’ɔny tutr dad eke s’am afŋ ɛy ec’abusu a ec’ereb ab es. Kɔ ɛy tasi anake s’ikŋ anym s’oc Krist ec’Amani Mamn a s’ism ɔny ab a.

Ɛbɛn a, ɛy s’ɛwm sos ɛsɛ ɛbɛn agŋ ɛjeci e juma e kok a e low cɛ ɛs am ibrm af. Kɔ ɛy s’am ɔmn eke ɔny ec’ɔmn a b’ow obn ɛtŋ ɛmɛny s’ɔtu eke si ki kok juma nɔnɔ ɔny ogŋ yogŋ. Gbɛkɔ s’erurm eke si k’afŋ ereb a eke Nyam ɛw ɔŋ ɛy ab es.
Ow e jam a, si b’ow s’im s’ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba susu eke ibn akm ɔny ogŋ aŋa. S’erurm eke si ki kok juma agŋ ɛjeci e juma kok usu a, ke s’ɛw sos ów a eke -l’ikŋn anym -li kokr a eci.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’ɛw sos, ke l’ɛ́w sos Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ow elm ɛgŋ a eke b’awr in sosi a wɛl áwm, kɔ ɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’aw a.
Oy! Blel k’ɛ́gŋn ebr ke ɛm yɛji mi dád ów ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af! Ɛɛ, na ec’a ɛ̀gŋn ebr’m ɛbɛn!

Erur eke m’ɔny ɔny ec’a b’ogŋ uwerŋ, ɛtŋ el uwerŋ eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow. Tasi ɛm a, igŋ ɛbiu nyam cɛ m’ɛwar ɔny in e low m’ɛw es: in l’el Krist. Ɛɛ, mi b’ow m’oc ɔny mi yɛgm’n ɛsɛ dedyɔwli ek’itam ɛm kaka af.
Gbɛkɔ ɔ̀kan low na: lorŋn oc yadŋ ɛm ɛju Ɛv. Ow ɔŋ erŋn am ɔny’m ek’ɔny yɛji, wɛl ki dad ɔny sow tutr yadŋ, ke ow ɔ́ny kpab ɔny es ów cɛcɛ a lele lala ab ab eke ɛŋan Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm a e lís.

S’ɔb ɔny Jesu ec’amani, ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ɛtŋ ubr Amani Mamn a nawrɛ. Kɔ sica b’ow ɛgŋn ebr fafa nɛnɛ eke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam k’ow dad ɔny Jesu ɛjeci nyam ec’odad, abŋ ɛjeci nyam ec’odad, ke ɔb ɔny amani ɛjeci nyam eke irimn ow e low lɛgŋ kaka ab ee?
Kɔ ɛm e tutr ɛm a gbɛ, mi k’ɛknm eke ɔny eci ' ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl' a k’ɔny any akm im.
Nawrɛ eke nɛnym okm im es odad dad ɛm ɛsɛ ɛl af, gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’any uw ec’a, in yɛji low ɛjeci! Ɛtŋ na, lɛgŋ fɛŋ si yɛgm ɔny kpata low fɛŋ eke si kok ab ɛm.
Eke m’ɔb ɔny Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a, ɛm m’is es aŋke m’ibram ɔny os kaka. Gbɛkɔ ow el sos eke mi k’usr ɔny eci. Kɔ na low ɛyr e mi kok ana ee?
Eke m’am kok juma ɔny ogŋ a, Sinyamel ɛjeci anake ɔŋ’m os a, ɛtŋ m’oc ɛl ec’os a m’ɛlum ɔny abu.

Ke ɔny ec’araŋn eke m’anŋ a, m’ɔny os ec’es abur cɛ, gbɛkɔ m’ibram ɔny low kaka. Maseduan ec’agŋ lisijimɛl ek’anŋ ow a ism’m fɛŋ a eke m’ɔny ow ec’es abur ab ab. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ mi kok elel eke mi ki legm ɔny ɛtŋ m’erur eke lɛgŋ kaka mi ki legm ɔny.
Ntotŋ am ok’m ow eci ɛtŋ Akayi wus ogog a ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɔbm im yadŋ ɔnym ɛm eci ntotŋ na ocm es. Low nawrɛ tasi m’am dad aŋke m’ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ek’anŋ Krist ɛm a.
Bla sosiɛm m’am dad odad nɛnɛ ee? Eke m’erurm ɔny a sosiɛm ec’ee? Njaŋ, Nyam uw any eke mi b’erur ɔny.
Ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ucu m’ɔny es m’am kok ɛbɛn, ow ɔ́ŋ agŋ ek’am ɔl abusu eke k’ɛru es ke ij nɛny eke ɛl ɛrŋ ɛm si bɛbmn a, k’ɛ́ŋnm abusu na kaka!
Agŋ amua el ɛrm ɛsɛl ayadŋu lele juma kok ɛsɛl ek’ɔny ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ab. -Li bi kok nyandrɛ ɛsɛ Krist ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl cɛ wɛ’n el af.
Nawrɛ, low kaka ɔnym any iti aŋa, aŋke Satan in obi yɛji bi kok nyandrɛ ɛsɛ usuayl ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs cɛ ow’n el af.

Ɛtŋ in e juma kok ɛsɛl ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ. Ow ɛwm any iti eke -n’am kok nyandrɛ -l’el juma kok ɛsɛl ek’am kok yec’ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ec’owr anŋ a b’ow uwr ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it eke k’ɛbm ɛl ab af, ɛl ec’elel eke -li kokr ab ɛm.
M’am ebr ɛm m’ɛsɛ: kì tutar eke nuŋ ɛm uŋ’m! Oglog ɛ̀gŋn ebr eke nuŋ ɛm uŋ’m, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm yɛji m’ɔ́tu m’ij nɛny tɛl.
Sica odad na eke m’am ow mi dad a, mi dadm ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af, kɔ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af. Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny ów tasi e m’ɔtu eke mi k’eb ow af m’am ij nɛny.
Agŋ nɔnɔ b’ij nɛny agŋ ɛm ec’ów sosiɛm, ow sosiɛm ɛm yɛji mi b’ow m’ij nɛny.
Ɔny eke b’ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛwru a, ɔny obi ɛm b’ɛgŋn eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl ebr!
B’ɛgŋn ebr wɛl kok ɔny ɛsɛ madu af, wɛl eb ɔny ob fɛŋ ek’ɔnyn a, wɛl iy ɔny mil! B’ɛgŋn ebr wɛl itar ɔny any, wɛl dɛdŋ ɔny any af!
Ɛ́s am ɔny’m eke mi ki dad, eke s’ɔnym sos si kokm ɛbɛn a! Eke ɛgŋ nyam am ɛgŋ eb ij nɛny low nyam eci, aŋa m’am dad odad ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af, ɛm yɛji mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ m’eb mi kok ɛbɛn.
-L’el Ebre eyŋ, ɛm yɛji m’el! -L’el Israɛl eyŋ, ɛm yɛji m’el! -L’el Abraham ec’alaw, ɛm yɛji m’el!

-L’el Krist e juma kok ɛsɛl, ɛm m’el m’akm ɛl fɛŋ! Ɛtŋ low na eke aŋa m’am m’ow mi dad m’usr af a yɛji, anŋ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi af: mi kok juma m’akm ɛl fɛŋ, m’ɛy sobel ɛm sakp nɔnɔ m’akm ɛl. Ɔr yɛji, ɛm wɛl ɔr’m sakp nɔnɔ akm ɛl, ɛtŋ sakp nɔnɔ ar okr’m es akm ɛl.
Sakp yen eke Jwifɛl iyr’m ŋgbre likŋ lele lɛw libarm ab.
Sakp nyahan eke Rom eyŋ ɔr’m lɛc ɛm lɛc ɛm, akp nyam eke wɛl wɔwl’m mebn ɛm ec’ibi eci. Sakp nyahan eke mij blel oc’m, ɛtŋ akp nyam ec’a, m’anŋ lɛgŋ owr nyam lele ncok nyam ab mij ɛm.

Ɛm eci usu im nɔnɔ ab ɛm, ar okr’m es sakp nɔnɔ: simij ec’any af, agŋ ibiu ec’any af, ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ɛm oglog ɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl ɛm. M’ɔbr ar ɛb ɛb ɛm, loj ɛm, okij af lele agŋ lisijimɛl ayadŋu ab e lís.
Mi kok juma eke kikn’m sos es ɛtŋ sakp oglog m’ɔtum m’ɛrum mɛmn. Namn lele mij amn ab ɔny’m ɛtŋ sakp oglog m’ɔtum m’ɛŋnm ob m’ijm. Lɛfr ɔny’m ɛtŋ m’ɔnym mob mi susm.
Ɛtŋ mi dadm low a tasi ek’ɔny any a ec’odad: sɛgŋ fɛŋ mi b’ebr ɛm e Sinyamel a fɛŋ e low ec’ɛrm mij.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ ɛw fuɛfuɛ, ɛm yɛji kpɛkŋ m’ɛ́w fuɛfuɛ. Eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm, ow e low ám ɛy’m sos ɛm nɔnɔ.
Ek’ow it nɛny ij, mi b’ow m’ij nɛny eke m’el fuɛfuɛ.
M’ɔ́nym yadŋ, Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’Ɛs uw any. Si kɔ́klm’n akpo akpo fɛŋ!
Eke m’anŋ Damas ɛb ɛm a, ɛb ɔsu ɛs ek’am kok es ɛw ɛs Aretas e juma a, ɔŋ wɛl am ɔsu ɛb a e masany a fɛŋ ɛm ec’ɛdŋn eci.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔŋ wɛl ɔny ɛlu’m ulu ligbɛl nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ usm’m es finɛtr ɛm, ɛb a e lakp ogog kpakp a e jam a, ɛtŋ m’ɔtu m’akm’n.
Kɔ ow it eke mi k’ij nɛny ee? Ow k’ow elm im low kaka. Gbɛkɔ m’am m’ow mi dad ów eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛgm’m m’ɛkn lele ow eke n’ɔny l’ok ɔkm ab ab e low.
M’uw Krist e jam us ɛs nyam any, ɛtŋ ow ij akpo lɛw yar ŋ̂, Nyam ɔny ɛgŋ na uyum afr kpekpe. Kɔ in e sos megl ab ab ee? M’uwm any. Kɔ ow elm in e sos megl ab ab ee? M’uwm any, kɔ Nyam gbɛ uw any.

M’uw any gbɛ eke Nyam oc ɛgŋ a im afr ec’usu mamn a. Kɔ in e sos megl ab ab oglog ow elm ow ab ee? M’uwm any, kɔ Nyam gbɛ uw any. Yogŋ, l’iri sodad eke ɛgŋ e nɛny k’ɔtum dadm. Ow el sodad eke ɛgŋ kaka ɔnym abusu eke ki dad.
Ɛgŋ nɛnɛ na eci gbɛ mi b’ow m’ij nɛny. Gbɛkɔ ɛm ec’a, elel eke m’anŋn a sosiɛm mi b’ow m’ij nɛny ɛm e fuɛfuɛ el a eci.

Eke batŋ m’erur nɛny eke mi k’ij a, mi k’ow m’ijm nyamb, low eke el nawrɛ a cɛ mi b’ow mi dad. Gbɛkɔ m’ijm nɛny, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl dád ɛm e lís owi, ow a cɛ eke wɛl am ɛkn’m mi kok lele ow a cɛ eke wɛl am iri mi dad ab ab af, ke low ɛjeci kaka k’ígŋm af.

Ów a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛgm’m m’ɛkn a agb nɔnɔ. Gbɛkɔ l’erurm eke mi k’ij nɛny na eci. Ow sosiɛm l’oc ɛbm ɛkn nyam l’ɛlu’m sos ɛm, b’ijr’m gbre ɛsɛ mirŋ eke b’ub es anŋ ɛgŋ sos ɛm ab af. Ɛtŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ Satan ec’ɛrm ɛs nyam eke wɛl ɔŋ eke k’ɔr’m ke ɛ́dŋn’m nɛny ij af.
Sakp nyahan eke mi ŋɔŋn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke k’ɔny oc’m es gbre ij na ɛm,

kɔ li dad’m ninɛ: "Ɛm ec’ɛrm mamn a cɛ ɔdŋ’ŋ. Eke b’anŋ fuɛfuɛ a, yogŋ ɛm tasi anake ɛm e lɛc a b’ɛy ɔkm a." Ow sosiɛm, ɛm e nɛny ij a tasi b’ow el ɛm e fuɛfuɛ el a, yec’ɛtŋ ke Krist e lɛc a ánŋ’m af.

Na sosiɛm m’am ɛgŋ fɛŋ m’eb sos ɛm iŋn ɛm: lɛc ɔnym, wɛwr, ses babur, ɛm ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm e gbre ijr lele ɛrm mij ebr fɛŋ ab. M’am ɛgŋ fɛŋ m’eb Krist sosiɛm eci, aŋke eke mi b’anŋ fuɛfuɛ a, yogŋ ɛm anake mi b’ij lɛc a.

Sica am ɛkan eke m’am kok nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi a! Ɔny anake ɔŋn ke m’am kok ɛbɛn a. Ɔny anake blel dadr ɛm ec’ów amamn ek’anŋ’m ɛm a, aŋke eke m’elm low kaka yɛji, low kaka anm eke ɔny eci ' ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl' a ɔny akm’m!
Ɔny ogŋ yogŋ ɛkan ɛm ec’ɛrm susu ligbɛl a, simɛny ɛwr a, ów any iti owi a lele sakrowa ab ab. Ów amua fɛŋ am yɛgm eke m’el ɛrm ɛs wɛwɛ tasi.
Bla obi Sinyamel ɛjec’a ɔny eke ɔny ɔnymn ee? Ɛɛ, nawrɛ gbɛ, m’ɔɔm ɔny labm kaka! Kɔ na anake el low ŋuŋ ab ee? Ɛbɛn ke òc apr’m ɔ!

Mi bɛbm ɔny ogŋ yogŋ e sakp nyahan ɛm ec’ow e sos ɛtŋ mi k’ow m’ɔɔm ɔny labm kaka. Ɛm, ow elm ɔny ec’os a m’ɔlm es, kɔ ɔny obi ɔny obi. Nawrɛ ɛm a, ow elm etuey am kokm os ɔɔm ɛl ɛsɛl, kɔ ey ɛsɛl anake it eke ki kok os ɔŋ ɛl ec’ey a.
Ɛm gbɛ, sos ɛm b’ow iŋn’m eke mi kí ŋuŋn os ɔny eci, ke m’óc ɛm obi e sel a nimum yɛji m’igŋ af. Kɔ eke m’erur ɔny nɔnɔ nɛnɛ a sosiɛm anake ɔny k’ow erurmn’m nɔnɔ ab ee?
Nawrɛ eke m’ɔɔm ɔny labm kaka, gbɛkɔ agŋ bɛb dad eke yadŋ ɛm am ɔny ɛtŋ ɛm e kprakpr ab ɛm, ɛm ɛju ɔny.
Kɔ eke b’ɛwr nyamn ɛkan agŋ a fɛŋ eke m’ɔŋ ow ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke m’ɛcr in ɛm m’ij ɔny os ee?
Mi dad toŋ Tit ɛgŋ eb eke k’ow ɛkn ɔny, ɛtŋ m’ɔŋ ɛgŋ lisijim nyam igŋ’n ab ow. Kɔ Tit ij ɔny os ee? Kɔ in lel ɛm ab, s’ɔnym tutr nyam coco ejagb nyam a eke s’ɔkŋ any ab ɛm ee?
Ow ibn ek’am tutar eke s’am dogŋn sos ɔny ec’any af. Njaŋ! Nyam ec’any af s’am dogŋn sos ɛsɛ Krist e jam us ɛsɛl af. Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am kok ɛbɛn eke si k’ɛlum ɔny abu agbr ɔmn ɛm.

Lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ a, ow am ɔny’m erŋn eke mi k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny ɛsɛ elel eke m’am erur eke k’anŋn ab af. Ke oglog ɛm yɛji, k’érurmn ɛm eci elel eke mi b’ow mi kokr a. Erŋn am ɔny’m eke yogŋ mi k’uyum ów ɛsu, nyamnɛyr, ɛrm bebl, agŋ ec’ów ɔnyanin, agŋ wɛwr owi, agŋ cacak owi, mɛgŋel lele suksuk owi ab.

Ɛmɛny low nyam ec’erŋn yɛji am ɔnym: ɛm ec’ow ab ɛm, oglog ke Nyam kók’m ɛ́s ɔny ec’any af. M’am uru eke mi k’ikŋ ɔŋn ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ eke abu anŋ ɛm am kok lɛgŋ sig ɛm e sikpl a eci. Tasi ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna yɛji -li k’ɛwlm -li ki lɛrm Nyam. -N’am ir ɛb eke ɔ́ɔm ɛl -l’ aylmn, -n’am ij nfaci ɛtŋ -n’am ɛbirir marɛm marɛm.
M’am bɛbm sos eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ sakp nyahan ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af: Gbuŋ ke wɛl jɛ́j odad fɛŋ ok a, ow it eke wɛl k’iri adaŋku yony oglog nyahan nɛnym.

Sica lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’agŋ a eke kok sikpl a lele agŋ ɛjec’ab ab anake m’am dad odad a. Yɛfɛnyna m’anm ɔny araŋn, gbɛkɔ ɛmɛny m’am ebr low a eke mi dad eke m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ sakp yony ɛm a m’ɛsɛ: lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ɛwl m’ow a, mi b’ow mi kok lɛc owi ɔny fɛŋ ab,
aŋke am erurir eke k’ɛkan low ek’am yɛgm eke Krist b’ɛcr ɛm ɛm dad odad a. Eke li bi kok low n’ɔŋ ɔny a, l’elm sos ɔnymu, kɔ nana, li b’ɛlu in ec’abusu ɔny a ɔkm ɔny ec’araŋn.

Nawrɛ, wɛl ɛw Krist olikŋ af, eke n’ɔnym sos a sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ n’anŋ owr Nyam ec’abusu ab ɛm. Ɛy yɛji, in ab eke s’okr af a anake s’ɔnym sos a; gbɛkɔ si b’ow si yɛgm ɔny eke s’anŋ owr in ab Nyam ec’abusu ab ɛm.
Sica ìbrmn ɔny sosi low eke am iir ɛb ɛsɛ ɔmn ɛsɛl af, ìgbal ɔny sosi ogŋ ɛkan. Kɔ k’ɛknmn eke Krist anŋ ɔny ab ee? Eke ow ɛcrm ɛbɛn, ke es ɔwal okr a.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy ec’a, m’am ɔny ɔmn eke b’ow ɛgŋn uwr any eke ɛy s’ɔwlm s’okm es.
Ɛy s’am ŋɔŋn Nyam eke kí kokmn low ŋuŋ kaka. Ɛtŋ ow elm ke si yɛ́gm ɔny eke s’ɔny low ij. Njaŋ, low mamn cɛ s’erur eke ki kokr. Ɛtŋ ɔfr ɔfr eke low a am yɛgm eke s’ɔny lɔbr.
Tasi ɛm a, si k’ɔtum si kokm low kaka low nawrɛ ec’any af, in e juma cɛ s’ɔtu eke si ki kok.
Ɛɛ, sos ɛm b’iŋn ɛy sakp sakp fɛŋ eke si b’anŋ sos ɔnym ɛm ke ɔny b’ɔnyn lɛc a. Ow sosiɛm yec’eke s’am ibrm ɛy e ŋɔŋn ɛm a el: ke ɛmɛny ɛ́wal ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm.

Low na sosiɛm anake m’am awŋ ɔny lɛl eke m’anŋ kpekpe a. M’erurm eke mi k’ɛlu lɛc ɔkm lɛgŋ eke mi b’ow m’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a. Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’ɛlum Nyamel a abu agb ɔmn ɛm, kɔ ow elm in e ŋuŋn eci.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɔ̀ɔl ɔmn ɛm e lɛc eke k’ɔnyn es, àtarir sos es ke nɛny ókr ɔny af ɔny ɔfr ɛm. Ìir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ erur lele ɛrm es ɛy ab e Nyam a b’ow anŋ ɔny ab.
Ɛ̀sŋninin ɔny ɔfr, ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijɔwɛl ab af. Agŋ lala a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ɔny.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ, Nyam ec’erur lel Abŋ Lala ec’af okr a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.

Ɛm Pɔl, lel ɛm lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ek’anŋ aŋa ab ab e nin ɛm, m’am awŋ Galat e Sinyamel a lɛl na. M’el ɛrm ɛs, gbɛkɔ ow elm agŋ mum oglog ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛwm’m ɛrm ɛs. Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist in obi lel Ɛs Nyam ek’igbm’n luw ɛm ab ab, ɛw’m ɛrm ɛs.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lel Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɛ́ŋan ɛrm es ɛy.
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛwr in sosi awoba, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’éb l’ɛlu ɛy es ɛy e sikpl ab ɛm. Li sɔg ɛy wus na e suŋ ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛy Ɛs erur ab af.
Anygbɛl él Nyam eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny bibm a ek’ɛŋan Krist sosiɛm a eci; sica ow am ɛw’m any iti eke k’upŋn in ij fafa nɛnɛ, ke ɛ́wal am lɛɛr 'Amani Mamn' ɛjeci nyam.
Nawrɛ ɛm a, Amani Mamn tasi ɛjeci anm; agŋ gbɛ anŋ ek’am wuwal ɔny nuŋ ɛm, ke am erur ek’itŋn Amani Mamn a eke bi dad Krist ec’odad a.
Na sosiɛm, ek’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am dad ɔny Amani Mamn ɛjeci ek’elm ow a eke si dad ɔny a ec’odad, ke Nyam ógŋ ɔwl’l, ek’ow el ɛy oglog ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’anŋ afr ow bɔbɔ yɛji.
M’ikŋ anym mi dad ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’am dadr ɛm: ek’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am dad ɔny Amani Mamn ɛjeci ec’odad ek’ótarm es yec’a eke s’ɔŋ ɔny ab ab, ke Nyam ógŋ ɔwl’l.
Sica kɔ agŋ ec’aw eke k’aw’m a m’am ɔl es, kɔ Nyam ec’ab ee? Kɔ agŋ m’am ɔl eke k’erur’m ee? Njaŋ! Blel m’am ɔl ek’agŋ k’ɔny ɛm ec’erur ana, mi k’ɔtum m’elm Krist e libɔwi.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am dad ɔny eke k’uwr any ek’Amani Mamn a eke m’ɔb m’ok ɔny a, elm ɛgŋ e low eke ɔkn.
Ow elm ɛgŋ ogŋ m’ebm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ yɛji yɛgam im ow e low, kɔ Jesu Krist in obi ɛlu ow e low ɔkm yɛgm’m.
Ɛtŋ irir wɛl dad ɔny elel eke mi kokr lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke m’anŋ Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr ab ɛm a e low. Uwr elel eke m’ijr agŋ a fɛŋ ek’el Nyamel ec’agŋ a gbre, ke m’ɛw lɛc ɛm eke mi ki ŋuŋn ɛl ab any.

Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, wɛl b’ɛkn tasi, eke m’afŋ ɛm lawlɛl a fɛŋ ek’el ɛm ec’ɔwɔrŋ ab es, Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr a ec’ów fɛŋ e kok ɛm. M’ɔny lɛc m’akm ɛl fɛŋ ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr ab ɛm e sol esig e dogŋn owi ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ, gbuŋ ke wɛl éw’m a ɛtŋ Nyam sɔsum oc’m in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛsŋ’m eke mi ki kok in e juma.
Ɛtŋ eke l’ɛgŋ l’eb eke li k’ɛlu Jim ɔkm li yɛgm’m, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɔ́tu m’im m’ɔb in ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba m’ok agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a, m’iim m’ibram ɛgŋ kaka eke ki yɛgm’m low.
Ɛtŋ m’ɛwlm m’iim Jerusalɛm m’ɛknm agŋ a ek’ikŋ anym el ɛrm ɛsɛl gbuŋ ke ɛm yɛji m’el a; kɔ kpɛkŋ m’ɔkŋ any m’im Arabi wus af, yogŋ anake m’anŋ m’ɛwl m’ow Damas ɛb ɛm a.
Akpo nyahan ɛc gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’im m’ɛy Jerusalɛm; yogŋ anake m’uw Piɛr any, ke m’anŋ in ab toŋ sɛgŋ lɛw yen a.
M’ɛknm ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci kaka, ek’ow elm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lisijim Jak cɛ.
Low na eke m’am awŋ ɔny ow e lɛl a, el low nawrɛ tasi; m’am eb Nyam daŋku ek’ow elm yadŋ m’ɔnym.
Ow e jam a, m’im Siri lele Silisi ab eci wus ab af.
Gbɛkɔ Jude ec’agŋ a ek’ub Krist nawrɛ a, k’ɛknm im any af lɛgŋ kaka.
Low cɛ eke -l’irir wɛl dad ɛm e lís a el: "Ɛgŋ a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, b’ijr ɛy gbre a, lɛgŋ na ɛm am dad Amani Mamn a eke s’ub nawrɛ ke l’erur eke li ki ŋuŋn a e low."
Ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Nyam ɛm sosiɛm.
Sica ek’akpo lɛw yar ɛc a, m’ɛwl mɛny m’im Jerusalɛm Barnabas ab; m’oc Tit yɛj’ab m’im.

M’ɛwl mɛny m’im aŋke Nyam ɛlu ow e low ɔkm yɛgm’m eke mi ki kok ɛbɛn. Jerusalɛm yogŋ, luku eke m’as saw ɛm Nyamel ec’idr ɛsɛl ab a, m’otar Amani Mamn a eke m’am ɔb m’ok agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a e low akr m’ok ɛl. Tasi ɛm a, m’erurm ek’ɛm e juma eke m’am kok lel ow eke mi kok lɛgŋ sig ɛm ab ab a, e low k’él ɔfr ɔfr.
Ɛtŋ Tit ek’anŋ ɛm ab, ke el Grɛk iy, ke wɛl ubrm likr es a, wɛl ɔnym’n lɛc ɛm eke li k’ubr likr es.

Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl ayadŋu ek’anŋ ɛy ec’araŋn a erur eke wɛl k’ubr’r likr es. Agŋ amua ow anŋ ɛy ɛm es lɔl ɛm, eke k’otar ɛy akr úw ɛy ec’ewi e s’el Jesu Krist ɛm a e low any. -N’am erur eke si k’el ol e madu.
Ɛtŋ s’ɛlum ɛl abusu es wanci kaka, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’úcu Amani Mamn a e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a s’ɔny es ɔny eci.
Gbɛkɔ, Nyamel ec’idr ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ɔɔm im low owr kaka eke mi ki kok. Ɛtŋ ɛm ec’a, ow elm ɛl ec’idr ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl eke -l’eel a elm low tasi ɛm ec’any af, aŋke Nyam ec’any af a, agŋ a fɛŋ el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ.
Kɔ tasi ɛm a, -l’ɛkn nana eke Nyam abul’m agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba eke mi k’ɔb, ɛsɛ elel eke l’abul Piɛr eke k’ɔb ok Jwifɛl ab af.
Ɛtŋ -l’iri yɛj’eke Nyam ɛw’m agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’ɛrm ɛs, ɛsɛ elel eke l’ɛw Piɛr Jwifɛl ec’ɛrm ɛs ab af.

Jak, Piɛr lel Jan ab, eke wɛl b’oc ɛsɛ Nyamel ec’es ɛwɛl af a, uw any ɛkn eke Nyam anake bibm ɛm abul’m juma na a; -l’eb ɛy abu, ɛm lele Barnabas ab, -li yɛgm eke -l’erur. Sica si dad s’okarir ɛy fɛŋ eke, ɛy si b’ow s’im si kok juma agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’araŋn, ke ɛl -n’imn Jwifɛl ɛm eci.
Low cɛ eke -l’ibrmn ɛy a el, ke s’ɔ́kn Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ab ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru a e low. Ɛtŋ ɛm obi mi kok ow e low ɛrm nyam ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ eke Piɛr ow Antiɔs ek’anŋ Siri wus af a, m’atar in ab agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af, aŋke n’ɔny low ɔbr.

Tasi ɛm a, gbuŋ ke agŋ nyam nyam eke Jak ɛrm a ow a, Piɛr am us abu agŋ lisijimɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab. Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ ek’agŋ a eke bi dogŋn likr es ubr owi es a ow a, Piɛr ocr sos es ɛtŋ ɛgŋm eke k’ij ob agŋ lisijimɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab ij, aŋke n’ɔny agŋ a eke bi dogŋn likr es ubr owi es a e muru.
Jwifɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb yɛji am kok ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi na ɛsɛ Piɛr af, ɛtŋ Barnabas in obi yɛji igb ɛy ɛl ec’ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi na ɛm.

Ɛtŋ eke m’ɛkn eke ɛl ec’es an a k’elm nyim nyim ke k’otarm es Amani Mamn e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab ab a, agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af mi dad Piɛr m’ɛsɛ: "Ŋ ek’el Jwif a, ir ɛb aŋa ɛsɛ agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab af ɛtŋ kokm yec’a eke Jwifɛl ec’ol a dad a. Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am erur eke k’ɔny agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a lɛc ɛm ir ɛb ɛsɛ Jwifɛl af ee?"
Ɛy s’el Jwifɛl ɛy e mew ɛm, kɔ s’elm bieku ɛjeci ec’agŋ ek’uwm Nyam ec’ol ab any a.

Gbɛkɔ s’uw any ek’ɛgŋ ec’elel eke Nyam b’oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af a, anŋ ɛgŋ a ec’ɔmn eke b’ɔny Jesu Krist ɛm a, kɔ ow elm Mois ec’ol a eke li b’ɛlum a sosiɛm. Na sosiɛm anake ɛy yɛj’eke s’el Jwifɛl a, s’ub Jesu Krist nawrɛ, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’úw ɛy any ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛy ec’ɔmn eke s’ɔny Krist ɛm a eci, ke ow k’élm eke si kok ol a ec’ów a fɛŋ iy nɛny a eci. Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ow elm nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af eke li kok ol a ec’ów fɛŋ ek’am dad a iy nɛny yɛji.
Ɛy, s’am ɔl eke Nyam k’oc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af Krist sosiɛm. Sica, eke wɛl b’ɛkn ɛy ɛsɛ sikpl ɛsɛl af a, ke ayaf wɛl ki dadr ab ee? Ke Krist sikpl e juma n’am kok ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!
Tasi ɛm a, eke m’ɛwl mɛny m’im ol a eke m’igŋ m’ɛlu es ab ɛm, ke ɛm sosi m’am ɔbr low a.
Ɛm, ol sosiɛm anake m’erurm eke mi k’ir ɛb ol ec’ij a. Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ ɛcr ɛbɛn, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ír ɛb Nyam eci. Ɛm m’uw olikŋ af Krist ab,

ɛtŋ m’anŋ owr, gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛm m’anm owr ij, kɔ Krist anake anŋ owr ɛm ɛm a. Jam aŋa, ɛm ec’owr anŋ a, mi bi kok ow e low Nyam Jim e nawrɛ e m’ub ab ɛm, in eke l’erur’m toŋ ke l’oc in e sel a l’irmn ɛm sosiɛm a.
Mi k’ɔtum m’ocm Nyam e bibm na m’ɔwlm. Tasi ɛm a, ek’ow el ol ɛm ɛgŋ b’ɛcr el nyim nyim ɛs Nyam ec’any af, ke Krist e luw a, ɔfr ɔfr ana!
Ɔny Galat eyŋ, kɔ nuŋ ɛm am uŋ ɔny! Ɔny bwo ec’ɛgŋ kokr ɔny agn ee? Ke, ɔny ec’any af kpata wɛl otar Jesu Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a e low akr.
M’am erur eke ki kpabr low ibrm na es: kɔ ɔny ec’Abŋ Lala a ek’ɛŋan a, ol ec’ów a fɛŋ eke kokr iy nɛny a sosiɛm oglog Amani Mamn a ek’irir ke ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm a sosiɛm ee?
Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ k’ɔtumn ɔnymn nuŋ ɛm ee? Ɔny, ɔbr nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm, sica ɔny obi e lɛc ɛm am erurir eke k’uwarir ab ee?
Ów amua fɛŋ ek’ɛŋn ɔny a, ɔfr ɔfr cɛ ow k’el ee? Ow itm ek’ow k’el ɔfr ɔfr.
Nyam b’ɔŋ ɔny in ec’Abŋ a, ɛtŋ li bi kok sakrowa ɔny ec’araŋn. Kɔ ol ec’ów a fɛŋ eke bi kokr iy nɛny a sosiɛm li bi kok ów amua n’ɔŋ ɔny oglog Amani Mamn a ek’irir ke ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm a sosiɛm ec’ee?
Kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad Abraham e lís: n’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
Sica ow it eke k’uwr any ek’agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ir ɛb ɔmn ɛm a, el Abraham ec’alaw tasi.

Nyam Lɛl ɛwar eke Nyam b’ow oc agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a, ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af, ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm. Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym ɔb Amani Mamn na ok Abraham eke: Nyam b’ow ɛcr ŋ ɛm, ɛdŋ wus na nimum ec’agŋ a ɔwrɔ.
Eke Abraham ub nawrɛ a, wɛl ɛdŋ’n ɔwrɔ; ɛbɛn nɛny nyam, wɛl b’ɛdŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a ɔwrɔ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl ɛdŋn Abraham ab af.

Sica agŋ eke bi tutr eke, eke b’ɛlum ol ke Nyam óc’ŋ ɛsɛ nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs af a, musue el ɛl eci. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Gbre él ɛgŋ yec’eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ow ɛluam ów a fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔn anŋ ol e lɛl ab ɛm a eci.

Ɛtŋ ow ayl yɛj’eke, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum elm nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af ol ec’ɛlum a sosiɛm, aŋke Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: ɛgŋ yeci ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a, b’ow anŋ owr in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu ow ɛm a sosiɛm.
Gbɛkɔ ol ɔnym low kaka ɔmn ab. Ow eke Nyam Lɛl nana dad a el: ɛgŋ yec’eke bi kok ol ec’ów a fɛŋ ek’anŋ’n ɛm a, b’ow anŋ owr in ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ Krist sɔg ɛy an ligbɛl ɛm ol e musue a e lís. In anake ɛy e musue a eke k’ɛŋn ɛy a, ɛy’r af a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl dad: Gbre él ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’uw ke wɛl pag es likŋ af a eci.
Na sosiɛm anake ɔwrɔ a eke Nyam ɛwar eke k’ɛdŋ Abraham a, b’ow ɛbm agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji Krist sosiɛm, ke ɛy fɛŋ si b’ɛŋn ɔmn ɛm Abŋ Lala a eke Nyam ɛwar a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’ocr ɛy ec’ɛb ir ɛm e low nyam s’ɔbar any: ek’ɛgŋ nyam kok aja e lɛl ɛw es ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɔnym aja e lɛl na tɛtŋm es oglog nɔnm low ɛjeci ɛlum ɛm.

Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ɛwar Abraham lele iy a eke k’anŋ in ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab ab e low ana. Wɛl dadm ɛsmɛ: lele alaw a eke k’anŋ in ɛm ok ɔkm a, ɛsɛ agŋ nɔnɔ owi af. Njaŋ, ɛgŋ nyam cɛ e low. Tasi ɛm a, ow eke wɛl b’awl a el: lele iy a eke b’ow anŋ ŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a, in l’el Krist.

Kin low a e m’erur eke mi ki dad a: Nyam kok aja e lɛl nyam ɛw es, ɛtŋ ɛwar eke b’ow ucu ow e low ɔny es. Ol a eke akpo duw akpo likŋ lele lɛw ab ɛc, gbuŋ ke ɛy ɔkm a, k’ɔtum ɔnym abusu tɛtŋm low a eke Nyam ɛwar ow e low ɛw es ab es.
Sica, ek’ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛsɛ aja af a, el ol sosiɛm, ke ow elm ɛwar a sosiɛm ij. Ke, tasi ɛm a, ɛwar a sosiɛm Nyam ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔkm Abraham e lís.

Ɛtŋ ek’ow el ɛbɛn, ke bla sosiɛm Nyam ɔŋ agŋ ol ee? Ol el ob eke Nyam igŋ af, yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɔ́ŋ agŋ uw ɛl ec’ów ek’akplm in ec’any af ab any, ɛtŋ ow it eke li k’anŋ toŋ ke ɛgŋ a eke k’anŋ Abraham ɛm ɛy ɔkm a ów; aŋke in sosiɛm wɛl ɛwar low a ɛw es. Ol a, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛlu ow e low ɔkm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ow ec’araŋn a.
Gbɛkɔ ow ibram ek’ɛgŋ nyam k’anŋ ow ec’araŋn ij, eke ow el ɛgŋ nyam cɛ eke low a ot es a, ɛtŋ Nyam cɛ anake low a ot es a.

Sica low na e nyandrɛ el bogŋ ec’ee? Ol lele Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ɛw es ab ab okrm af ee? Ow elm ɛbɛn! Blel ol nyam ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel, ɛtŋ blel agŋ ɛŋn ol ikŋ na ana, ke blel nimamn ana, blel ol a ɔ́ŋ ɛl -l’el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl Nyam ec’any af.

Gbɛkɔ, Nyam Lɛl dad eke wus nimum in anŋ sikpl ec’abusu a ec’ew. Na sosiɛm anake ow it eke Nyam e low a ek’ɛwar ɛw es a, k’el tasi agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a eci, ɛl ec’ɔmn eke -n’ɔnyn Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm.
Gbuŋ ke ɔmn e lɛgŋ a ów a, ol ɔnym ɛy ab ɛsɛ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl af, ɛtŋ s’am eku lɛgŋ a ek’ɔmn k’ɛlu sos ɔkm a.
Ow ɔŋ, ol el ɛy e nyimn ɛs toŋ Krist ow; yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam óc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
Sica eke ɔmn e lɛgŋ ow a, si k’ɔtum s’anm nyimn ɛs na ec’abu ɛm ij.
Ɔny fɛŋ, eel Nyam ec’ey ɔmn a ek’ɔny okr ɔny af Jesu Krist ab a sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, ɔny fɛŋ okar af Krist ab mij nuŋ a eke wɛl ok ɔny ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛwal anŋn ɛsɛ Krist in obi af.
Sica ereb anm agŋ ek’el Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm ab ec’araŋn, madu lel ewi ab ec’araŋn, ɔyɔw lel egŋ ab ec’araŋn; ɔny fɛŋ, eel nyam coco Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ek’eel Krist eci, ke ɔny eel Abraham ec’ey ɛtŋ eel aja ij ɛsɛl ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es ab af.
Kin ɛm e tutr e m’ɔny a: ek’iy a ek’el aja ij ɛs a anŋ gɔŋni a, li b’ɛw ɛsɛ adu af. Ke tasi ɛm a, ob a fɛŋ in eci cɛ.
Gbɛkɔ, ow it ke n’ám ɛlum agŋ a ek’am ɛkn in e lís e low, ke am ɔsu in ec’ob a fɛŋ a, toŋ ke lɛgŋ a ek’ɛs ɛw a ów.
Ɛy yɛji ɛbɛn nɛny nyam. Eke s’anŋ ɛsɛ etuey af a, s’el wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc a e madu.
Gbɛkɔ, eke lɛgŋ a e Nyam b’ɛbm ɛw es a ow a, l’ɛrm Jim ow. Wɛl ew’r yɔw ɛm ɛtŋ l’ir ɛb ol ɛm,
yec’ɛtŋ ke li sɔ́g agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ol ec’abusu ab ɛm a, ke s’ɔ́tu s’el Nyam ec’ey.
Gbɛkɔ, ke wɛl úw any eke eel in ec’ey a, Nyam ɔŋ Jim ec’Abŋ a ow ɛy ɛy ec’ɛrm ab ɛm; ɛtŋ Abŋ na anake b’ɔŋ ɛy si dad "Aba!" ow e nyandrɛ el, "ɛm Ɛs!"
Ow sosiɛm a, ŋ elm adu ij, kɔ iy; ɛtŋ ek’el iy a sosiɛm, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ aja eke li bɛbm l’ɛw in ec’ey ab es a.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, uwmn Nyam any ɛtŋ eel sabusu ek’elm sinyam tasi yɛj’a e madu.
Sica yɛfɛnyna ɛm ek’uwr Nyam any, oglog yɛfɛnyna ɛm eke Nyam uw ɔny any a, ayaf ow it eke k’ɛwal ɛlumn wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc ek’elm low kaka ab ee? Ayaf ɛmɛny ɔtur eke k’ɛwal eel ɛl e madu ee?
B’ucur sɛgŋ bɛb, awl bɛb, akpo e sɛgŋ bɛb lel akpo bɛb ab e low ɔnyn es.
M’am ɔny ɛrmij ɔny eci: eke juma e mi kok ɔny ec’araŋn a k’élm ɔfr ɔfr sosiɛm.
Agŋ lisijimɛl m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af, aŋke ɛm yɛji mi kok ɛsɛ ɔny af. Kokmn’m low ŋuŋ kaka.
Ɔny, am ɔkan low ɛm eke m’ɔg es m’ɔb ɔny Amani Mamn e kokoba a, ow el ɛm ec’ɔl ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ɛm e sos megl a eke ɛm ec’ɔl ab ɛm itm eke wɛl ki lɛr a, ɔnym ɔny nɛnŋn walmn ɛlumn’m es. Kɔ ɔny kɔtɔkɔ, ebr’m ɛsɛ Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛs nyam af, oglog ɛsɛ Jesu Krist af.
Lɛgŋ a, anŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɛtŋ sica bla lowi ɛŋn ɔny ee? M’ɔtu eke mi dad m’ɛsɛ: lɛgŋ a, blel ɔnyn abusu eke ki sɔsmn ɔny ec’anyamn ab es ɔŋn’m, blel kokr.
Kɔ sica ɔny ec’ifnu m’ɛwl m’el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e m’am dad ɔny a sosiɛm ee?
Agŋ amua ek’am kok ɛsɛ ɔny e lís e low cɛ wɛ’n am ɛw any af a, ɛl e sow tutr a akplm ɔny eci. Ɛl e low eke -n’am ɔl a cɛ el: ke -n’ɔny -li kpab ɔny es ɛm e lís, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur lɛɛr ɛl.
Tasi, ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ k’ɔny ɔny e lís ec’erur, gbɛkɔ ke ow el low nimamn eci, ow it ek’ow k’el sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kɔ ke ow k’élm lɛgŋ eke mi b’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a cɛ.
Ɛm ec’ey, ɛmɛny m’am ij ɔny e gbre, gbre ek’otarir es ɛsɛ yɔw ek’am ew iy ec’ab af, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’anŋ ɛm ɛbɛn toŋ ow áyl’m sos ɛm ek’ɔny fɛŋ Krist ir ɔny ɛm.
M’erur eke blel m’anŋ ɔny saw wanci na af, ke m’ɔ́tu mi dad ɔny odad akunda ɛjec’ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, mi k’uwm elel eke mi ki kokr ɔny e lís ab any.
Dàdr’m, ɔny ek’am erurir ek’ol k’ɛw ɔny es a: irimn yec’a ek’ol a am dad ab ee?
Nyam Lɛl dad eke Abraham in ew ey yony, Agar ek’el adyɔw ab ab ow’n ew nyam ɛtŋ Sara ek’el yɔw lewi ab ab yɛji ow’n ew nyam.
Adyɔw iyŋ a, wɛl ew’r igŋ nyam lele yɔw nyam ab ec’erur ɛm, kɔ yɔw lewi a ec’iy a, wɛl ew’r Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ab ɛm.
Odad na ɔny akr otar ɛjeci. Ɔyɔw yony a anŋ ɛsɛ sinm yony af. Krɛkrɛ e sinm a, el Sinayi lafɛny af ec’a, ɛtŋ li b’ew ey eke b’el madu: ke Agar ana,
ɛtŋ Agar anake el Sinayi lafɛny a ek’anŋ Arabi wus af a. Ɛtŋ in cɛ anake yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, n’anŋ ɛsɛ Jerusalɛm ec’ɛb a ek’in ec’ey ab ab el madu a.
Kɔ Jerusalɛm ek’anŋ afr a el lewi, ɛtŋ in anake l’el ɛy lis a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Sos ɛm íŋn’ŋ itr yɔw! Ɛ̀lu sos ɛm iŋn e lebl, ŋ ek’uwm iy ew e dudu any a; aŋke yɔw a eke wɛl igŋ ɛlu es a, b’ow ew ey akm yɔw a ek’ɔny igŋ a.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl ɔny ec’a, ɛsɛ Isak af, eel ey eke wɛl ew ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛwar ab af.
Gbɛkɔ ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’a eke Abraham ec’iy a eke wɛl ew igŋ lele yɔw ab ec’erur ɛm a, ijr iy a eke wɛl ew Nyam ec’Abŋ ec’erur ɛm a gbre a, yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, ɛbɛn cɛ ow anŋ.
Kɔ Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, ayaf wɛl dadr ee? Wɛl dad ninɛ: ògŋ adyɔw a lel in ec’iy ab ab, aŋke adyɔw iyŋ a k’ɔtum ijm aja yɔw lewi a ec’iy ab ab.
Na sosiɛm a, agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy s’elm adyɔw a ec’ey, kɔ ɛy yɔw lewi a ec’ey.
Krist sɔg ɛy, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’él ewi tasi. Na sosiɛm ìnymn es kikri lewi el na ɛm, ke ɔ́nyn sos ɔsu, ke k’ɛ́wlmn elmn madu ij.
Ɛm Pɔl, m’am dad ɔny: eke yɛbr wɛl ubr ɔny likr es, ke Krist elm low kaka ɔny ec’ij.
Ɛmɛny m’am usr lebl af mi dad ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɛgŋ likr es ubr owi eb a, ow it eke li k’ɛlum ol a nimum.
Ɔny ek’am ɔɔl eke k’eel nɛny nyam ɛsɛl Nyam ec’any af ol ec’ɛlum ɛm a, ɔny obi ɛm anake kpabr es Krist e lís a; ɛtŋ ɔny irmnin Nyam e bibm a ek’ɛŋan a.
Sica ɛy ec’a, s’oc ɛy e nawrɛ ub a s’ɛlu Nyam ɛm. In li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy s’el nɛny nyam ɛsɛl in ec’any af; low na anake s’am eku Abŋ Lala ec’abusu a eke b’ɛcr ɛy ec’ɔmn ab ɛm kok juma a.
M’am dad tasi ɛm m’ɛsɛ, eke s’okr af Jesu Krist ab a, ke wɛl úbr ɛy likr es oglog ke wɛl k’úbrm ɛy likr es, ow elm low kaka. Kɔ low tasi a cɛ el: úb nawrɛ, ke yɛ́gm ŋ ec’ɔmn a erur owi ɛm.
Ɔny ɔbr nuŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn! Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɛdŋn ɔny eke k’ɛ́luamn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ee?
Low yec’a eke wɛl dad ɔny ke ok ɔny es sos ɛm a, anm Nyam ek’ɛsŋ ɔny a ogŋ owm.
Ow anŋ ɛsɛ: "Lijru tɛɛli cɛ eke b’anŋ ma ɛm, ke b’ɔŋ ma a nimum inŋ ab af."
Gbɛkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ obn’m ɔmn ɔny e lís: k’ow ɔnymn tutr ɛjeci eke k’ow otarm es ɛm ec’ab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’am mumu ɔny a, ke ow el in ec’elel eke n’anŋn a, Nyam b’ow ɔb’r low gbre ij eci.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, kɔ ɛm, likr eke wɛl k’ubr ɔny es e kokoba ɛmɛny m’am ɔb ɔny ee? Ek’ow el nawrɛ, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl am ijr’m gbre ee? Tasi ɛm a, eke m’am ɔb likr es ubr owi e kokoba ke Krist ec’olikŋ a elm ɛgŋ kaka e wus ɛlu owi ij.
M’am erur ek’agŋ amua ek’am mumu ɔny likr es ubr sosiɛm a, blel -li kok ow afŋ na es; -li kok -l’el egŋ agbru.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny in e lewi ij ab ɛm, gbɛkɔ lewi ij ikŋ na itm eke k’ɔŋ ɔny abusu kokr ɔny e sos af ec’ów eke b’aw ɔny a. Ow tasi eke ki kokr a el, ke erur ɛm, kókr ów ɔŋanin ɔny ɔfr.
Ol na nimum anŋ ol nyam na ɛm: Ow it eke k’erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af.
Sica eke bi kokr ɛsɛ akp ɛm ndey af, ám gugŋnin ke ám ɔnyn ijarir ɔny ɔfr, ke ɛ̀wr ɛrm, b’ow ŋuŋanin ɔny ɔfr.
Na sosiɛm mi dad m’ɛsɛ: yɛ̀br Abŋ Lala nyimn ɔny ec’ɛb ir a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ki kókmn ɔny e sos af ec’ów eke b’aw ɔny a.

Sos af ec’ów amua eke b’aw ɔny a, ɛ́gŋm Abŋ Lala e low ebm ɛtŋ Abŋ Lala yɛji ɛ́gŋm sos af ec’ów amua eke b’aw ɔny a e low ebm. Ɛl yony mum ec’araŋn a atarir, ɛtŋ ow e liy eke b’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a el, ke k’ɔtumn kokmn yec’a ek’am erurir a.
Gbɛkɔ eke Abŋ Lala bi nyimn ɔny, ke ɔny anmn ol ec’es ɛw ɛm ij.
Ów a eke ɛy e sos af ec’ów aw b’ɔsu, ke wɛl b’ɛkn a el: agŋ e lɔsŋn e b’agbr ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, ɛb eke -li b’ir sikpl ɛm, ów ɔbr ɔbr eke -li bi kok ɛl ec’erur ɛm;
sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ, agn kok owi; agŋ ec’ifn owi, ów ɛsu, nyamnɛyr ɔnyanin; ɛrm bebl, agŋ fɛŋ ec’es ɛw owi, ɛm bubr owi lel ɛl ɔfr ɛm ec’ijarm owi ab.

-N’am erur eke ɛl lawlɛl ec’ob ek’ɔny a ɛl yɛji -n’ɔny, -l’el mar ɛgŋu, ob iju, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -li bi kok ów ɛjeci nɔnɔ ek’otarir es amua eke wɛl dad ab ab. M’am ɛwar ɔny ɛtŋ m’ikŋ anym mi dad yɛji: agŋ a eke bi kok ów amua a, k’ow ɛŋnm usu Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.
Sica kin ey yec’eke Abŋ Lala b’ɔsu ɛy ɛm: erur, sos ɛm iŋn, ɛrm es ɛy, low eku, ɛrm mamn, low kok ɔŋ ɛgŋ, cɛcɛ el,
ɛrm frɔrɔ, sos es ɔnyn. Mi k’ɔnym ɔmn eke ol k’ifn ów amua.
Agŋ a ek’el Jesu Krist ec’a, oc ɛl e sos af ec’ów aw a eke b’irmn ɛl a ɛw olikŋ af.
Sica, ek’ow el Abŋ Lala ɛm s’am ir ɛb a, ke si yɛ́b Abŋ ikŋ na nyimn ɛy.
Si k’éel és ɛfuu, ów ɛsu k’ánŋ ɛy ec’araŋn, nyamnɛyr ɔnyanin yɛji k’ánŋ ɛy ec’araŋn.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, eke b’ɛkan ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’am kok low ek’akplm a, ɔny eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a am nyimn ɔny a, ɛ̀lumn in abu l’ɛ́wl l’eb ejagb mamn a; gbɛkɔ ke ow él ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm. Ɛtŋ m’am dad eke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ɛ́w sos ɛrm, ke kí yɛbmn mɛju owrm ɔny.
Òkmnin sel es ɔny e sɛrɛkp leg leg ec’uyu ɛm: ow ɛm anake b’ow ɛlumn Krist ec’ol a.
Ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi tutr ɛsɛ in el any ɛs ɛtŋ l’elm ob kaka a, ke in sosi n’am ɛjur.
Ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔny in ec’es an a igbl ogŋ ɛkn; ek’ow akpl’l sos ɛm, ke ow él in sɔny eci, kɔ ke li k’ócm l’ɔbarm lawlɛl ec’ab ab,
aŋke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ b’ow uyu in obi ec’ɛrɛkp.
Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ɛŋn Nyam ec’odad a e low yɛgm a, it eke ki cɛc in ec’ob e n’ɔny a, ɛgŋ a eke bi yɛgm’n low ab ab.
K’ɛ̀jurir ɔny sosi: ow itm eke wɛl ki kokr Nyam miyɛr. Ɛgŋ, ow a cɛ eke li b’ewl a, li b’ub.
Eke ɛgŋ ewl ów eŋuŋ eke b’aw’r a in ec’ɔgm a, li b’ow l’ub luw; kɔ eke l’ewl yec’a ek’Abŋ Lala b’erur a, li b’ow l’ub sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
Sos k’ám ɛy low nimamn e kok ɛm, aŋke e s’amnm sos, ow e wanci b’ow a, si b’ow s’ub.
Na sosiɛm, eke s’ɔny abusu a, si kók ɛgŋ fɛŋ low nimamn, ab brobro ɔmn ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a.
Sica ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm anake m’am nɔn lɛl a, ɛsɛ elel eke lɛl mɔni a e sagb a am yɛgm ab af.
Agŋ a ek’am erur ek’ɔny ɔny lɛc ɛm ubar likr es a, el agŋ ek’am erur eke k’ij any agŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ -n’am kok ɛbɛn, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl k’íjrm ɛl gbre Krist ec’olikŋ a sosiɛm.
Agŋ amua ek’ɛgŋ likr es ubr owi eb a, ɛl obi a -l’ɛluamn ol a; -l’erur eke k’ubar likr es, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɔny abusu -l’ɔpr ów, eke lɛc ɛm ɛgŋn mɛny ɛwr ikŋ na e low ebr.

Ɛm ec’a, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a ec’ów cɛ m’erur eke mi k’ɔpr, aŋke Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a, ɛm ec’a, ow ɛw ɛsɛ wus ec’ob a fɛŋ eke wɛ’n uw af, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji m’ɛw ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uw wus ec’ob a fɛŋ ec’any af af.
Na sosiɛm, eke wɛl ubr’ŋ likr es oglog wɛl ubrm’ŋ es yɛji, low kaka anm ɛm, kɔ yeci tasi ek’el low a el: ke él ɛgŋ owr.
Sica agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛlum ɛm e low yɛgm a ɛl ec’ɛb ir ɛm a, m’am dad eke: Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a lel ɛrm mamn ab ab k’ánŋ ɛl af, ɛl, lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’el Nyam ec’ Israɛl ab ab.
Yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, ɛmɛny ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ k’ow k’ijr’m gbre ij, aŋke ɛm e sos af e mɛny ɛwr amua, el Jesu e gbre e m’ij a e mɛny ɛwr.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a, ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab. Amɛn.
Ɛm Pɔl, Jesu Krist ec’ɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur, m’am awŋ Nyam ec’agŋ lala ek’anŋ Efɛs baŋn, ke b’us Jesu Krist jam nɛny nyam ɛm a, lɛl na.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lel ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
Si kɔ́klmn Nyam eke el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs a! N’ɔŋ ɛy Abŋ Lala ec’ɔwrɔ fɛŋ eke anŋ afr a, ɛy lele Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
Gbuŋ ke wɛl kok wus a, Nyam ɛcr Krist ɛm sɔsum ot ɛy s’el in eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’él lala ke si k’ítam ɛm kaka in ec’any af. Nyam erur ɛy ɛtŋ l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm
eke li b’ow l’ɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm l’eb ɛy ɛsɛ in ec’ey af. In ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm l’erur low na,
yec’ɛtŋ ke si kɔ́klm Nyam, in ec’anygbɛl ec’ów amamn e sagb a eci. Ów amamn fɛŋ, in ec’Iy e l’erur ab ɛm li b’ɛcr n’ɔŋ ɛy.
S’anŋ Krist ɛm ɛtŋ in e mebl ab ɛm li sɔg ɛy, l’oc ɛy e sikpl a l’ap ɛy; ɛtŋ ow ɛlu Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ligbɛl a eke ɔny a e low ɔkm.
Ɛɛ, Nyam ɔnyn ɛy ɛrm mamn afŋn es. N’ɔŋ ɛy sɛwr fɛŋ lele low any uw ab.
N’ɔŋ ɛy s’uw in e low a eke lɔl es ab any, low a eke in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm l’ɛw es eke li k’ɛcr Krist ɛm li kok a.
Low ikŋ a eke Nyam ki kok uwar lɛgŋ a eke li sɔsum l’ɛw es ab ɛm a, el ke l’ás ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr lele wus ab a luku es ɛw nyam coco eke el Krist ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ɛy eci Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, Nyam ɔŋ ɛy aja a eke k’ɛbm ɛy, ke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm ow e low l’ɛw es a. Li kok low na fɛŋ aŋke l’ɛgŋ l’eb ɛtŋ l’erur,
yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e s’el agŋ krɛkrɛ ek’oc ɛl ec’ɔmn ɛlu Krist ɛm a, si kɔ́klm Nyam, in ec’anygbɛl a eci!

Ɔny yɛji, anŋn Krist ɛm aŋke irir odad tasi a ek’el Amani Mamn a eke bi sɔg ɔny a. Eke ocr ɔny ec’ɛrm a ɔŋn Krist a sosiɛm, Nyam ɛw ɔny mɛny ɛwr nyam af. Mɛny ɛwr a, ow ow el Abŋ Lala a eke l’ɛwar eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a.

Abŋ Lala na, el aja a eke si b’ow s’ɛŋn Nyam ec’abu ɛm a eci krɛkrɛ. Ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm ɛy tasi eke si b’ow s’ɛŋn aja na lɛgŋ a eke Nyam b’ow sɔg ɛy low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ɛm a. Ow sosiɛm si kɔ́klmn Nyam, in ec’anygbɛl a eci!
Ow sosiɛm, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke m’iri wɛl dad eke ɔny ɔnyn ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛm ɛtŋ ɔny b’erurir agŋ a ek’in el Nyam ec’agŋ lala a,
m’ɔ́pim eke mi k’ɛlu Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔny eci ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn fɛŋ ɛm.
M’am ibrm ek’ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e Nyam a, anygbɛl ec’Ɛs a k’ɔŋ ɔny sɛwr, ke l’ɛ́lu sos ɔkm li yɛgm ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr ir any tasi.
M’am ibrm’n eke li k’ɛkan ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm e tutr ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr low ɔmn a eke n’ɔŋ ɔny lɛgŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ ɔny a, ke úwr in ec’aja ec’ob ɔny ligbɛl sɔbɔ a eke l’ɛw es agŋ lala a ec’ab any.
Ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow uwr lɛc liplemu a eke Nyam ɛlu ɔkm ɛy eke si b’ub’r nawrɛ ec’a. In ec’abusu a lel in e lɛc ab ab,
l’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm Krist ɛm, lɛgŋ eke l’igbm ow luw ɛm, ke n’ɔŋ ow ow sig’r es lidr abu af afr a.

Yogŋ, Krist anŋ es ɛw fɛŋ, abusu fɛŋ, lɛc fɛŋ, es akm fɛŋ lele nin ɛjeci fɛŋ eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛsŋ a e nuŋ af. Tasi, n’anŋ ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ a e nuŋ af, ɛtŋ ow elm yɛfɛnyna e lɛgŋ na ɛm cɛ, kɔ lɛgŋ eke b’ow ow ab ɛm yɛji.
Ɛɛ, Nyam oc mob mob a pupukpaŋ ɛw es Krist ec’akr ew a, ɛtŋ l’ɛw ow ɛsɛ Nyamel nimum eci nuŋ af,
ɛtŋ Nyamel el Krist eci sos megl a. In ɛm wɛl b’ɛkn Krist nimum, ɛtŋ Krist, in iy afr lele wus ab nimum.
Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, uwr ɔny ec’ów ɔbr lel ɔny e sikpl ab ab sosiɛm.

Ɔny iir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke wus ec’agŋ b’ir ɛb ab af; ɛlumn sabusu eŋuŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a ek’in ec’es ɛw anŋ lɛf ɛm a. Es ɛw ɛs a, in l’el low ŋuŋ ec’abŋ a eke caca ɛm a am kok juma agŋ a ek’ɛ́luam Nyam ab ɛm a.

Lɛgŋ ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji s’anŋ ɛsɛ agŋ amua af, ow a eke s’am ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛy ec’ów aw eŋuŋ b’ɔŋn ɛy ab af a. S’ɛlum ɛy ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a lel ɛy e sow tutr eŋuŋ ab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛy ec’elel tasi a eke s’anŋn a sosiɛm, s’it eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a k’ɔŋ ɛy s’abur es ɛsɛ agŋ likpr ab af.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a agb nɔnɔ ɛtŋ in ec’erur eke n’ɔny ɛy ec’a ɔnym any ɔkŋnin;
na sosiɛm anake ɛy eke s’anŋ ɛsɛ agŋ ek’uw abŋ ɛm ɛy ec’ów eŋuŋ a sosiɛm a, n’ɔŋ ɛy s’anŋ owr Krist ab a. Ɛɛ, Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a anake sɔg ɛy a.
Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm Nyam igbm ɛy luw ɛm, ɛtŋ Krist ab cɛ n’ɔŋ ɛy si sig es afr.
Nyam ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn eke n’ɔnyn ɛy a ɔkm Jesu Krist ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm ɛy sɛgŋ fɛŋ in e sɔrŋ ikŋ ligbɛl ab ɛm eci gbreŋgbi eke l’ij a.
Tasi ɛm a, in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm anake li sɔg ɔny a, aŋke ɔny ubr nawrɛ. Ow elm ɔny ɛm ow anm owm, kɔ Nyam in obi eci bibm eke ɔŋ ɔny.
Sel ɛŋn na, ɛŋnmn in ɔny ec’ów kok ɛm; ow sosiɛm a ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́w sos.
Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm anake Nyam kok ɛy a. Li kok ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ír ɛb ów amamn kok ɛm. Ɛtŋ ów amamn amua, Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es eke si ki kok.

Ɔny uwr any eke Jwifɛl el agŋ eke wɛl ubr likr es, ke b’erur ɛsŋn ɛl sosi 'agŋ ek’ubr likr es'. Ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl mew ɛm ɛtŋ a, wɛl ubrm ɔny likr es ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ -li b’ɛsŋ ɔny 'agŋ ek’ubrm likr es.' Ow sosiɛm, ɔny ɔ̀kan lɛgŋ ab ɛm ec’ob eke eel a:
ɔny eel agŋ ek’uwm Krist any, agŋ eke wɛl awlm Nyam ec’agŋ ab ɛm, ke anm sinm a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛwar a e low ɛm, ɔnym low ɔmn kaka, ke uwm Nyam any ɛl ec’ɛb ir ɛm wus af aŋa.
Gbɛkɔ sica, Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm, ɔny eke lɛgŋ ab ɛm kpabr es a, lɛgŋ na ɛm a, Krist eci mebl a ɔŋ ɔny okar af.
Ɛɛ, in l’el ɛy ec’ɛrm es ɛy. Li kok Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab el agŋ nyam coco. Li bubm sifn e lakp a eke cɛc ɛl ab es, in eci sos megl a eke li wawr egb olikŋ af ab ɛm.
N’ɔny Mois ec’ol a ec’es ɛw a lel ow ec’ów kpɛti kpɛti ab ab l’ɔwr es. Ɛtŋ Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab, li kok wɛl el agŋ nyam coco ek’okr af in ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ow el ɛrm es ɛy.
In ec’olikŋ af e luw ab ɛm, n’ɔny Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab l’okr af el sos megl nyam coco ɛtŋ n’ɔny l’okr wɛl ɛm Nyam ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a l’ibi ifanin.
Ow am yɛgm eke Krist, ɛrm es ɛy ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba l’ow l’ɔb l’ok ɔny ek’elm Jwifɛl ke kpabr es Nyam e lís a, lele Jwifɛl eke titm Nyam ab ab.
Tasi ɛm a, Krist ɛm anake si k’ɛcr ɛy fɛŋ, Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab, ke s’ɔ́tu si titm Nyam ɛy Ɛs, Abŋ Lala nyam a cɛ ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm a, ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl a, elmn etu agŋ ij oglog gbeŋ ec’agŋ. Kɔ ɔny anŋn Nyam ec’agŋ lala ab ɛm, ɔnyn ów a fɛŋ ec’abusu ɛtŋ eel Nyam e bosu ab ɛm ec’agŋ.
Sica ɔny eel êl a ek’in eci misigrer a el Krist ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ab a. Ɛtŋ lɔy ɛm eci lebn tasi a, el Jesu Krist in obi.
Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm anake êl a eci mebn a fɛŋ b’okr af inym es kikri a. Ɛtŋ in cɛ li b’ɔŋ êl a agb el Nyamel lala eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ oc ɛw saw.
Eke okar af Krist ab a sosiɛm anake ɔny yɛji anŋn êl a eke wɛl us ab ɛm a. Ɛtŋ agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ab, okar af eel êl eke Nyam ɛcr in ec’Abŋ ab ɛm ir ɛm.
Ɛm Pɔl, m’el Jesu Krist e sobel ɛm ɛs, ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl a sosiɛm eci.
Ɔny, m’ɔny ɔmn eke irir juma eke Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm abul’m eke mi ki kok ɔny ec’a e low.
L’ɛlu low a eke lɔl es a ɔkm m’ɛkn, low a eke mi nɔn ow e low tɛl cɛ afr ɛm a.
Ɛm e lɛl a ec’awl ɛm, b’ow ɛkan elel eke m’uw Krist e lís e low eke lɔl es ab any a.

Low ikŋ a, lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, Nyam ɛlum’n ɔkm yɛgam ɛy lagŋɛl. Kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, l’ɛcr in ec’Abŋ ab ɛm l’ɛlu ow ɔkm, li yɛgm in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lala ab ab eke li sɔsum l’ot l’ok saw a.

Kin low a eke lɔl es a: agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl ke okr af Jesu Krist ab Amani Mamn ab ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn aja nyam a cɛ ɛsɛ Jwifɛl ab af. -Li b’ow -l’el sos megl nyam ec’agŋ, ɛtŋ low a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es a -li b’ow -n’anŋ ɛm.
Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’el Amani Mamn na e juma kok ɛs, in e lɛc a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
Ɛm, m’el nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ saka sakali. Gbɛkɔ m’ɛŋn bibm na eke mi k’ɔb Krist ec’ob ɔny a ek’ɔnym nuŋ a ec’amani, m’ok agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a.
Tasi ɛm a, god’ɛtŋ, Nyam eke el mob mob fɛŋ eci kok ɛs a, lɔl low a eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es ab es in ɛm. Ɛtŋ elel eke Nyam b’ow kokr low na eke lɔl es a e low iy nɛny a, m’ɛŋn bibm eke mi ki yɛgm kpata.
Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɛcr Nyamel a eke l’ɛsŋ ab ɛm, n’ɔ́ŋ mob a fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr ke ɔny es ɛw lel abusu ɔny ab a úw in e sɛwr ab any. Nuŋ ɛm ɔny na Nyam b’ɛlu’l ɔkm sakunda ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm,
low a eke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm l’ɛw es god’ɛtŋ a sosiɛm eci. Low ikŋ na, l’ɛcr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm, li kok ow iy nɛny.
Ɛy eke s’okr af Krist ab ke s’ub’r nawrɛ a, sica abusu ɛru ɛy es eke si k’ɔwl abu s’im Nyam ec’any af ɔmn ɛm.
Na sosiɛm anake m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny ek’ɛm e gbre e m’am ɛgŋ m’eb ɔny sosiɛm a, k’ɔ́wrm ɔny sos es a. Tasi ɛm a, ow b’ow el ɔny ec’anygbeŋ ligbɛl.
Ow sosiɛm m’am ok ɔwrɔkp wus Nyam ɛy Ɛs ec’any af,
in ɛm eke bosu fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr lele wus ab anŋ a.
M’am ŋɔŋn’n ek’in ec’anygbɛl e gbreŋgbi eke l’ij ab ɛm, li k’ɛcr in ec’Abŋ ab ɛm n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny lɛc inymn es kikri ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm.
Ke Krist ír ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm ɔny ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ókr min erur ɛm, ke ɔny nimum a sígr es erur ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ b’ow ɔnyn abusu, ɔny lele Nyam ec’agŋ lala a fɛŋ ab, írir mɛwl ɛm tasi Krist ec’erur a ec’es ar, sɔfu, sigb lel ow e sibn ab ab.
Ɛɛ, m’am erur eke k’uwr Krist ec’erur ab any, eke l’agb l’akm low fɛŋ ek’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’uw any a yɛji, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛ́ŋan Nyam ec’owr anŋ a, ke l’ír ɔny ɛm nimum.
Nyam e lɛc a am kok juma ɛy ɛm ɛtŋ eke si b’ibrm’n low a, l’ɔtu eke li ki kok ow afŋ es! In e lɛc a agb akm yec’a e s’ɔtu eke si ki tutr a.
Anygbɛl él in eci, in e Nyamel ab ɛm lele Jesu Krist ɛm ab akpo akpo fɛŋ lele sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab! Amɛn.
Ɛm eke m’el sobel ɛm ɛs Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sosiɛm a, kin yec’eke m’am ok ɔny mɛrm sabu af mi dad ɔny: ɔny eke Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny a, ɔ̀nyn es an ek’ot ɔny ec’ɛsŋ ab es.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ìsr es, èel frɔrɔ, ɔ̀nyan sos es low ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’elel eke anŋn a ebr erur ɛm.
Àtar sos es ucur af okr a eke Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɔny a ɔnyn es, ɛrm es ɛy a eke b’ɔny okr ɔny af ɔny ɔfr ɛm a;
aŋke Nyam kok sos megl nyam, n’ɔŋ ɔny Abŋ Lala nyam, ɛtŋ low ɔmn nyam ɛm cɛ l’ɛsŋ ɔny.
Ɛtŋ ɔnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyam, ɔmn nyam lele mij ok nuŋ nyam ab,
Nyam nyam cɛ eke el agŋ fɛŋ ec’Ɛs eke ɛw fɛŋ es, bi kok low fɛŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛm, ke ir agŋ fɛŋ ɛm a.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam ɛŋn in ec’ob ap ek’it a, ob ap ab ɛm eci yec’a eke Krist ɔnyn’n ɛrm mamn ɔŋ’n a.
Kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Eke l’uyu afr kpoŋ ɛm a, l’ot sobel ɛm ɛsɛl ab n’im; ɛtŋ li cɛc agŋ sob ap.
Kɔ l’uyu afr a, in ec’iri tasi a el bogŋ ec’ee? Ow am yɛgm eke l’ikŋ anym l’us es n’im esr ɛm a, ek’el wus af aŋa a.
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’us es a, in cɛ l’el ɛgŋ a ek’uyu afr kpoŋ ɛm a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li fáf es l’eb wus na nimum.
In anake li cɛc ob ap ek’it a n’ɔŋ agŋ, ke ow ɔŋ agŋ bɛb el Krist ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl, bɛb el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, bɛb el Amani Mamn a ec’es ɔmun ɛsɛl, bɛb el pastɛrɛl oglog low yɛgm ɛsɛl a.
Li cɛc agŋ amua sob ap amua, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ɔ́ŋ agŋ lala a ek’el Nyam ec’a úw juma e ki kok, ke ɔ́ŋ Krist e sos megl a imn anym ec’ab any.
Nɛnɛ anake ɛy fɛŋ si b’ow s’ɔny ɔmn lele Nyam ec’Iy a ec’any uw nyam coco ab a. Ɛtŋ si b’ow s’el agŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ek’usu ɛtŋ si b’ow s’agb s’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Krist anŋn ab af.

Sica si k’ow s’elm ey abu ɛm ij. Si k’ow s’anm ɛsɛ mijɛtŋ gɔŋni eke okij e mra am ɔny wɔwl usu fɛŋ eke l’erur ab af ij. Ɛtŋ si k’ow si yɛbm sow tutr yadŋ eci lɛf a ɛlulm ɛy, ocm ɛcm ɛy usu fɛŋ ij. Agŋ k’ow ɔtum irmnm ɛy ɛl eci mɛju ab ɛm ij.
Ɛtŋ eke si bi dad low nɛnyɛmbri nyam erur ɛm, si b’ow s’agb fɛŋ ɛm s’imn Krist ek’el nuŋ a ogŋ.

In ɛm anake sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ b’inym es kikri, ke b’okr af a. Sos ŋgigŋnel usu nɔnɔ b’ɔŋ sos megl a nimum ókr af, ɛtŋ eke sos ogog nyam nyam fɛŋ bi kok in e juma ek’it a, sos megl a nimum b’agb ɛtŋ b’ɔny lɛc erur ɛm.
Kin low yec’a eke m’am dad, ke nɛny am at’m es mi dad Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a: ow itm eke k’aan es ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke b’us ɛl e sow tutr eke low kaka anm ɛm a jam a.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a anŋ ncebn ɛm ɛtŋ sel ɛŋn a eke Nyam b’ɔŋ agŋ a, -n’ɔnym ɛl eci kaka anm ɛm, aŋke -l’uwm ow e low kaka any ɛtŋ -n’ɔny ɛrm tuɔtuɔ yɛji.
-L’irmn agŋ ɛm ec’ɛb ir a e mɛwl a fɛŋ, -l’ocr ɛl sosi -l’ɛlu es an keskes ɛm ɛtŋ -n’am kok sikpl owi fɛŋ eke b’aw ɛl a.
Ɔny, ow elm nɛnɛ wewrmn Krist eci any uw a!
Ɔny, nawrɛ tasi ɛm irir in e lís e low fɛŋ ɛtŋ wɛl yɛgm ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ek’anŋ Jesu ɛm a.
Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ìgŋn ɔny ec’ɛb ir sig a ɛlul es. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, eel agŋ eke mɛju ec’ów aw iy ɛm ke am ŋuŋn. Ow sosiɛm, elel a eke anŋnin lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ow it eke k’igŋn ɛlul es ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
ke yɛ́br wɛl itŋn ɔny nimum ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm lel tutr ɛm ab,
ke ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm owr eke wɛl bi sus af, éel agŋ owr. Ɛgŋ owr ikŋ na wɛl kok’r ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af. Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam b’ɔŋ’n l’el nyim nyim lele lala ab.
Na sosiɛm, ìgŋn yadŋ ɔny ɛlul es, ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ dád lawl low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, aŋke ɛy fɛŋ s’el sos megl nyam ec’agŋ.
Eke batŋ ɛrm am ebl ɔny, kì kokr sikpl; kì yɛbr toŋ lɛgŋ es ew k’ɛ́ŋan ɔny ec’ɛrm bebl a.
K’ɛ̀gbr agn usu kaka fɛŋ es ɔny ɛm.
Ke ɛgŋ eke b’iy mil a, ɛ́lu mil iy ab es; ke kók juma nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm in obi e sabu ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɛ́ŋn ob l’ɛlum es abur ɛsɛl abu.
Odad ŋuŋ kaka k’ánŋ ɔny nɛnym k’ɛy ɔkm; kɔ dàdr low akpal e sodad eke b’ɛlum low abu, ke b’atr ɔny lawlɛl sos es ɔ́ŋ ɛl lɛc a, yec’ɛtŋ ke sodad eke b’ow dadr a él low mamn agŋ eke b’ow iri a eci.
K’ɔ̀war Nyam ec’Abŋ Lala a ek’ɔŋ ɔny a sos es, aŋke in anake Nyam oc’r ɔŋ ɔny ɛsɛ mɛny ɛwr af a. Ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr na b’ɔŋ ɔny ɔ́nyn ɔmn eke lɛgŋ nyam, Nyam b’ow sɔg ɔny nimum ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm.
Low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ek’ɛgŋ kok ɔny a, k’èbr k’ɛwr es ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm. K’ùcur lokm es, k’èbal ɛrm; ke likekr owi, wɛwr owi lel ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ ab óc es ɔny ec’araŋn.
Ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ákpl lawl eci, ke sɔrŋ ikŋ íy ɔny ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ. Ke áparir low ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ap ɔny low Jesu Krist sosiɛm ab af.
Sica eke eel ey eke Nyam b’erur a, àtar sos es kokr ɛsɛ in af.
Ke ɔny ec’ɛb ir a él erur ɛm, ót Krist ec’erur ek’ɔny ɛy eci ke oc in e sel irmn ɛy sosiɛm, ɛsɛ ob ap lel egb waw ab ek’ow eci sɔsŋ mamn a akpl Nyam sos ɛm ab af.
Ɔny eel Nyam ec’agŋ lala a, ow sosiɛm ɔny ogŋ a, ów anŋ ek’itm eke k’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn, ɛsɛ: yɔw kaka fɛŋ ab ec’ɛrum ab, low fɛŋ ek’áyalm ɛgŋ eci kok, érur eke ŋ sɔny cɛ k’ɔny ob fɛŋ.
Ow akplm yɛj’eke kí dadr ɛ́s odad, nyamb odad lele sodad eŋuŋ ab. Kɔ ow tasi eke ki kokr a el ke dádr odad ɛlul Nyam bia.

Kin yec’ek’it eke k’uwr any: agŋ a eke b’ɛrum yɔw kaka fɛŋ ab oglog bi kok low fɛŋ ek’ayalm ɛgŋ a, k’ow ɛŋnm aja kakali Nyam lele Krist ab eci gbreŋgbi usu yogŋ. Ɛbɛn nɛny nyam ow b’ow el agŋ a eke b’erur eke k’ɔny ob fɛŋ ɛl sɔny cɛ ec’a, aŋke érur eke k’ɔny ob fɛŋ ŋ sɔny cɛ a, anŋ ɛsɛ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ af.
Ke ɛgŋ kaka k’írmnm ɔny mɛju e sodad ebl ɔfr ɔfr ɛm. Ów amua sosiɛm anake Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a b’ow ok agŋ a ek’ɛ́gŋm eke k’ɛlum’n ab af a.
Kì kokr ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ab af!
Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, anŋn ncebn ɛm, kɔ jam aŋa ek’okar af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a, anŋn usuayl ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, àan es ɛsɛ agŋ ek’el usuayl ec’ey af gɔŋ,
aŋke usuayl b’ɔsu ey ek’el ów amamn kok, ów nyim nyim lel nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ec’ów ab.
Àtar sos es uwr low eke b’akpl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sos ɛm ab any.
Ów a ek’el ncebn ec’a ɔ́sum ey amamn kaka. Ow sosiɛm k’ànŋn ow e low ɛm, kɔ kòkr ɛl ec’ów a ók ɔkm.
Tasi ɛm a, ów a ek’agŋ amua bi kok es lɔl ɛm a eci dad b’ɔny ɛ́s.
Gbɛkɔ low yec’eke wɛl ɛlu ɔkm a, sos b’ɛru es usuayl ɛm tasi;
ɛtŋ sica low yec’a ek’anŋ usuayl ɛm a, b’ɛwl el usuayl. Na sosiɛm anake wɛl dad ninɛ: "Ŋ ek’am ɛru mɛmn a, ùfŋm es. Ànŋ agŋ ek’uw a ec’araŋn igb, ke Krist ɛ́jn in ec’usuayl a ok’ŋ af."
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ɔny ec’es an ab ɛm. K’ìir ɛb nyamb ɛm, kɔ ìir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛsɛwru
eke b’uw any kok low wanci fɛŋ ɛm eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛl ab af, aŋke sɛgŋ a eke s’anŋ ɛm a akplm.
Na sosiɛm k’èel anyambu, kɔ òkr nuŋ ɛm es sɛnyn sɛnyn irir yec’ek’el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’erur a.
K’ɛ̀gŋn mar k’ɔny ɔny: mar ɛgŋ nɔnɔ bi ŋuŋn ɛgŋ; kɔ yɛ̀br Abŋ Lala iy ɔny ɛm gbɔŋ.
Ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, àtarir sos es selu ebl ɛm, Nyam ɛj ɛm lel ɛj ek’Abŋ b’ɔŋ ɔny ab ab ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn kɔklm ec’ɛj ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
Ɔ̀ŋn ɔny Ɛs Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ low fɛŋ eci, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm.
Ɔ̀nyn es is ɔny ɔfr ɛm Krist ec’ɛlum ek’ɔnyn a sosiɛm.
Egŋ ɛyɛl, ɔ̀nyn es is ɔny ɛcɛl eci ɛsɛ elel ek’ɔnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ab af,
aŋke igŋ el in e yɔw a ec’es ɛw, ɛsɛ elel eke Krist el Nyamel ec’es ɛw ab af. Krist in obi el Nyamel ek’el in e sos megl a eci sɔg ɛs.
Na sosiɛm ow it eke egŋ ɛyɛl k’ɔny es is low fɛŋ ɛm ɛl ɛcɛl eci, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyamel b’ɔny es is Krist ec’ab af.
Ɔyɔw ɛcɛl, èrurir ɔny ɛyɛl ɛsɛ elel eke Krist erur Nyamel toŋ ke l’oc in e sel a l’irmn ow ec’ab af.
L’erur eke ɛbɛn a, li k’ɔŋ Nyamel el ob ek’it eke k’el Nyam eci, eke l’ayal ow mij ɛm lel odad ebl ɛm ab a,
aŋke l’erur eke li k’ɛlu Nyamel ɔkm in obi in obi ec’any af, ow e sakpl a fɛŋ ɛm, ow él ob lala ek’ob kaka itam ɛm, ɛwm duɔduɔ ke ɔnym abr ɛnym kaka fɛŋ.
Nɛnɛ anake ow it ek’ɔyɔw ɛcɛl k’erur ɛl ɛyɛl ɛsɛ elel eke -li b’erur ɛl obi e sos megl ab af a. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur in e yɔw a, b’erur in obi in obi.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ífnm in obi e sos megl a, kɔ ob ij li b’ɔŋ ow, li kok ow e lís e low fɛŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ sɛj ɛm, ɛs’elel eke Krist bi kok Nyamel ec’ab af,
aŋke ow el in e sos megl ek’ɛy fɛŋ s’anŋ ɛm.
Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, wɛl b’awl eke: Na sosiɛm anake igŋ b’ow ŋgboŋ ɛs lele lis ab ec’akŋ, ke l’ókr af in e yɔw ab ab -l’el sos megl nyam a.
Low na eke lɔl es a agb nɔnɔ ɛtŋ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny ek’ow el Krist lele Nyamel ab e low.
Gbɛkɔ ow el low ek’ɔny yɛji ɔn ɔny es: ke yɔw ɛc fɛŋ érur in e yɔw ɛsɛ in obi af, ke igŋ ɛy fɛŋ yɛji ɛ́lum in ec’igŋ a.
Ey, ɛ̀lumn ɔny ec’agŋ ek’ew ɔny a ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af; na ɔny e low eke ki kokr.
Ɛ̀lum asŋ lel esŋ ab anake el ol ab ɛm e krɛkrɛ eke Nyam ɔŋ agŋ ke low ɛwar anŋ af a.
Ɛtŋ kin low ɛwar a: yec’ɛtŋ ke ánŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ke íj usu wus af aŋa.
Ey ɛsɛl, k’ɔ̀ŋn ɔny ec’ey a k’ɔny ɛrm bebl. Kɔ gbàgbal ɛl, yɛ̀gmn ɛl low ke ɔ́mn ɛl ów ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af.
Madu, ɛ̀lumn ɔny e wus af aŋa ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a, muru ɛm, ɛlum ɛm lel ɛrm nyam ɛm ab ɛsɛ elel eke b’ɛlumn Krist ab af.
Ow elm eke -li b’ɛw ɔny nyamn af a cɛ, kí kokmn ɛl e lís e low mɛwl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’aw ɔny, kɔ ɛ̀lumn ɛsɛ Krist eci madu eke bi kok ɛrm nyam ɛm juma fɛŋ eke Nyam b’erur ab af.
Ɛɛ! Ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm ki kokr ɔny ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a eci juma, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma ɔny am kokr af, kɔ ke ow k’élm ɛsɛ agŋ ec’af.
Sica yec’eke k’ɔkan a el: ke él adu oglog lewi, low nimamn a eke kok a ec’ob ap a eke k’ɛbm’ŋ a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɔŋ.

Ɔny es ɛw ɛsɛl ek’ɔnymn madu ab a, ɔ̀nyn es an nɛny nyam a ɔny eci madu a e lís; ɔny k’ɔ̀ɔrir ɛl abr. Sica ɔ̀kan ek’ɔny lel ɔny e madu ab ab, Es Ɛw Ɛs nyam cɛ ɔnyn, in eke n’anŋ afr ke l’íjm ŋgoprɛ low eke li bi kok n’ɔŋ in ec’agŋ ab ɛm a.
Sica uwar ɛm ec’eke m’am dad a el, ke ébr lɛc Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ec’af okr ɛm, in ec’abusu ligbɛl ab ɛm.
Ɛ̀wr Nyam ec’ar ogŋn e mob a fɛŋ eke ɔŋ ɔny a sos, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur akmn agn eci mɛju a fɛŋ es,

aŋke ow elm agŋ eke si b’ɛkn any af ab ab si k’ow s’ogŋm ar a, kɔ ow el mob fɛŋ ek’ɔny lɛc eŋuŋ ke ɔny es ɛw lel abusu ab a. Ɛy ec’ar ogŋ a b’ow el lɛc fɛŋ ek’el ncebn ɛm ec’ab ab, lele abŋ eŋuŋ ek’ɔny abusu ke anŋ lɛf ɛm ab ab.
Ow sosiɛm a, ɛ̀wr Nyam ec’ar mob fɛŋ sos, yec’ɛtŋ ke wanci ŋuŋ fɛŋ af, ɔ́tur inymn es kikri ifnu ec’any af, ke b’ogŋn ar a ba ow b’uwr a, ke ɛmɛny ínymn es lɛc ab.
Kin elel eke ki bɛbmn sos ar ogŋ a eci: ke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny eci meb er ɛm eke k’ɛgŋn af, ke es an nyim nyim él ɔny ec’ar mob sus ɛm eke k’ocr ɛwr ɛr af;
ke ɔny eci gbragbra kok ɛrm es ɛy ec’Amani Mamn ɔb ɛm a, él ɔny eci cɔkrukpɔ eke k’anŋ ɔny akr ɛm.
Ke ɔny ec’ɔmn a ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny ec’erkpo af, ɛ́lum ɔny abu irmnin agn low ŋuŋ ɛs eci sibin a, ek’al b’anŋ nɛny af ke b’ɔwl im igŋ ob ab es.
Òcr sel ɛŋn ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny eci kpokpo tufɛ af, ke Nyam odad ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny eci lab any yony ek’Abŋ Lala ɔŋ ɔny af.
Ów amua fɛŋ ìbrmn Nyam, Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm. Ɛɛ, ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam low fɛŋ ɛm Abŋ ec’abu ɛlum ɛm. Ke low na nuŋ af, any ók ɔny es ke ánŋn cɛcɛ kok ɛm. Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam in ec’agŋ lala a fɛŋ yɛj’eci;
ɛm yɛji ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam ɛm eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ɛ́lu’m in ec’odad ebl a nɛnym, ke m’ɔ́ny lokm susu mi dad low a eke lɔl es Amani Mamn ab ɛm a.
Eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm yɛji, m’el Amani Mamn a eci lebl ɛlu ɛs. Ow sosiɛm ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam ke m’ɔ́ny lokm susu mi dad ɛs’elel ek’ow it ab af.
M’erur ek’ɔny yɛji k’uwr ɛm e lís e low any, ke úwr low yec’eke m’am kok a yɛj’any. Tisik ek’el ɛgŋ lisijim lel ɛgŋ lawl mamn ab, ke am kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma cɛcɛ ɛm a, b’ow ɔŋ ɔny amani a fɛŋ.
M’am ɛrm’n l’ow cɛ eke li ki dad ɔny ɛy e lís e low, ke l’átr ɔny sos es.
Ke Nyam lel ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɔ́ŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ɛrm es ɛy, erur lel ɔmn ab!
Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’erur ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ab, erur a ek’ɔnym itŋn ab ɛm.
Pɔl lele Timote ab, ek’el Jesu Krist ec’ɔbɔwi a, e lɛl ek’am awŋ Filip baŋn e Nyam ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Jesu Krist ab, Nyamel ec’idr ɛsɛl lele diakrɛl ab.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
Mi b’ɔŋ Nyam bia sakp sakp fɛŋ eke mi b’ɔkn ɔny e low a.
Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ e Nyam eke mi bi ŋɔŋn m’ɔŋ ɔny a, sos ɛm iŋn ɛm mi bi ŋɔŋn,
Amani Mamn a ec’elel ek’ɛlumn’m abu mi mɔmun es lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛtŋ toŋ igŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a sosiɛm eci.
M’uw any tasi eke Nyam ek’ɔb nuŋ am kok juma mamn na ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm a, b’ow ucu ɔny es toŋ ígŋ nuŋ, toŋ ow ók lɛgŋ eke Jesu Krist b’ow ow a.

M’ɔny low ij, eke m’ɔny tutr nɛnɛ ɔny fɛŋ e lís. M’oc ɔny ɛm ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ke ow el ŋgbraka ɛm eke m’anŋ, ke ow el lɛgŋ a eke m’ɔny abusu eke mi ki dogŋn, ke m’ɔmun Amani Mamn ab es a yɛji, ɔny a fɛŋ ɛŋan Nyam eci bibm a ɛsɛ ɛm af.
Ɛtŋ Nyam ij ɛm e daŋku eke ɔny fɛŋ m’erur ɔny tasi, ɛs’elel eke Jesu Krist ɔny erur ligbɛl ɔny ec’ab af.
Ɛtŋ ow eke m’am ibrm ɛm e ŋɔŋn ɛm a el: ke erur na ek’ɔnyn a ágb afŋn es, ke ow ɔ́ŋ ɔnyn low any uw lele nuŋ ɛm ɔny ab,
yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr ów tasi eke el nawrɛ ab any. Ow b’ow ɔŋ ayal, abr ɛnym k’ánm ɔny lís, lɛgŋ a eke Jesu Krist b’ow ow a,
ɛtŋ ów amamn eci ey eke wɛl b’ɛŋn Jesu Krist ɛm a, b’ow ok ɔkm ɔny ɛm; ke ow él Nyam ec’anygbɛl lele kɔklm ab.
Sica lisijimɛl, m’erur eke k’uwr any eke es abur na ek’ɛŋn’m a, tasi ɛm a, ɔŋ Amani Mamn a imn anym eci,
aŋke sica agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ es ɛw ɛs a e gbugŋ a lele susu ɛjec’ab a uw any eke Krist sosiɛm m’anŋ ŋgbraka ɛm.
Ɛtŋ agŋ lisijimɛl nɔnɔ ec’ɔmn ek’ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm a obn, ŋgbraka na ɛm eke m’anŋ a; ow ɔŋ erŋn ɔnym ɛl ɛtŋ lokm susu ɛm -n’am dad Nyam ec’odad.
Nawrɛ tasi ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam, ɛm sosiɛm, b’ɔb Krist ec’Amani a ŋkre ɛm, ów es atar ɛm, ɛbɛn yɛji, likpr b’ɔb Krist ec’Amani a erur ɛm tasi.
Ɛl akpasu a, -li b’ɔb Krist ec’Amani a erur ɛm, aŋke -l’uw any eke ɛm eci sobel ɛm aŋa eke m’anŋ a, el Amani Mamn a e dogŋn eci.
Ɛtŋ ɛl a eke b’ɔb Krist ec’amani a sow tutr eŋuŋ ɛm, ɛm eci ŋkre ogŋ ɛm a, ɛl e tutr a el, ke -l’obn ɛm e gbre ij a sobel ɛm aŋa eke m’anŋ a.
Yɛji ɔfr ɔfr! Ek’ɛl eci sow tutr a el eŋuŋ oglog amamn yɛji, ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn a el: Krist ec’amani a ec’a, wɛl am ɔb ɛtŋ ow b’ow iŋn’m sos ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ,
aŋke m’uw any eke ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn lele Jesu Krist ec’Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ab ab, b’ow el ɛm eci sɔg.

Sica ɛsɛ elel eke m’am eku ke m’am ɔmn tasi a, mi k’ɛknm low yec’eke k’ɔny’m ɛ́s. Kɔ ke ow el sicaca oglog ke ow el sɛgŋ fɛŋ, m’ɔny ɔmn tasi ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛlu Krist eci sagb a ɔkm ɛm ec’ɛgŋ el fɛŋ ɛm, ɛm ec’owr anŋ ɛm oglog ɛm e luw ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
Ɛm ec’a, tasi ɛm a Krist anake el ɛm e sel a, ɛtŋ luw el ɛm eci ŋgrusiɛ.
Gbɛkɔ ek’ow it eke mi k’anŋ owr ke mi kok juma mamn, ke mi k’úwm low yec’eke mi ki sɔsum m’oc ab any.
M’anŋ sow tutr yony ec’araŋn: m’am erur eke mi k’uw ke m’ím m’anŋ Krist ab, na anake akpl afŋn es a.
Gbɛkɔ ow it ke m’ánŋ owr sos megl ɛm ɔny e nimamn eci.
Ca m’uw any tasi ŋ̂! M’ow m’anŋ owr, mi b’ow m’ir ɔny fɛŋ ab yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɛ́lum ɔny abu iman anym eci, ke ɔ́nyn sos ɛm iŋn ɔmn ɛm.
Ke lɛgŋ eke ɛmɛny mi b’ɛwl m’ow m’ɛŋn ɔny a, ɔny e sos ɛm iŋn a eke ɔnyn Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, ágb nɔnɔ.

Gbɛkɔ ow e tasi a cɛ el: ke áan es nyim nyim Krist ec’Amani Mamn ab af, yec’ɛtŋ ke, eke m’ow m’ɛkn ɔny ɛtŋ m’owm yɛji, m’íri ek’inymn es kikri ɛtŋ okar af ow tutr nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ am dogŋnin low abŋ nyam ɛm, ɔmn ek’Amani Mamn ɔŋ ɔny a eci.
Kì yɛbr ɔny ec’efnu a akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm k’ɔ́ŋ erŋn k’ɔny ɔny; low na b’ow yɛgm ɛl eke -l’irm ŋ̂, ke ɔny ec’a, ow yɛgm ɔny ek’anŋn ɔny e sɔg ec’ebr af; ɛtŋ ow el low ek’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow,
aŋke Nyam ɔŋ ɔny bibm eke k’ubr Krist nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ kɔ ke ɛmɛny íjr in e gbre yɛji.
Sicaca ɛm a, ɔny lel ɛm ab anake s’okr af s’am dogŋn low a. Low dogŋn nyam a cɛ eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm mi dogŋn, ke ɛmɛny m’am dogŋn ɛsɛ elel ek’uwr any ab af a.
Ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn Krist ɛm a b’ɔŋ ɔny lɛc ee? In ec’erur a b’atr ɔny sos es ee? B’okar af in ec’Abŋ Lala ab ab ee? B’ɔnyn sɔrŋ ikŋ lel ɛrm mamn ab ɔny ɔfr ɛm ee?
Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke m’am ibrm eke k’ɔŋn’m sos ɛm iŋn tasi ɔny e nɛny af okr ɛm, ke ɔ́nyn erur nyam, ke ókar af ɛrm ɛm lel ow tutr ɛm ab.
Kì kokr low kaka ɛm bubr ec’abŋ ɛm oglog eke agŋ k’ɛkn ɔny eci, kɔ es is ɛm, òcr ɔny lawlɛl ɛsɛ agŋ eke igbl ogŋ akm ɔny af.
Ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔ́lm in sɔny coco e nimamn es, kɔ ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɔ́l lawlɛl yɛj’ec’a es.
Ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, ɔ̀nyn es an ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ eke b’uw Krist any a bi kok ab af.
In, n’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam anŋn ab af, aŋke god’ɛtŋ l’el Nyam. Gbɛkɔ l’ɛgŋm l’atm bɛbmn ikŋ na e low any.
Kɔ in obi ɛm, li wal low fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ɛlu es, l’ocr in sosi libɔwi, l’el ɛgŋ ɔfr ɔfrli agŋ ec’araŋn, ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ɛkn’n ɛsɛ ɛgŋ cɛ af.
L’ɛgŋ in obi ɛm l’eb eke li k’ir ɛb es is ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛlum Nyam toŋ l’igŋ luw ɛm, olikŋ af e luw ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
Es is na sosiɛm, Nyam ɔny igbl’l ogŋ, ɛw’r low fɛŋ e nuŋ af ɛtŋ ɔŋ’n nin ek’agb akm nin fɛŋ.
Ow b’ow ɔŋ ob ob fɛŋ eke anŋ afr, wus af aŋa lele ɔŋnes ab a, ok ɔwrɔkp wus eke -li b’iri Jesu e nin a.
Ke nɛny nɛny fɛŋ kɔ́klm eke Jesu Krist el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Ɛs Nyam ec’anygbɛl eci.

Na sosiɛm, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl, ɛsɛ elel eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ b’ɛlumn Nyam ab af, ùcur ɔnyn es ɛbɛn ke kókr juma ɔny e sel a eke ɛŋan a eci, muru ɛm lel ɛlum ɛm ab, ke ow k’élm ɛm ec’any af cɛ, kɔ ɛm e jam jam yɛji,
aŋke Nyam in obi li b’ɔŋ ɔny low ɛgŋ eb lele ow e kok ab ec’abusu ɛsɛ elel eke li bɛbm ab af.
Low fɛŋ eke b’ow kokr a, k’élm abr ɛny ɛm lele ów es kpakpab ɛm ab,
yec’ɛtŋ ke éel agŋ eke abr ɛnym anm lís ke ayl, Nyam ec’ey eke ɔnym wɛwr, ke ir agŋ eke ɔny ɛnyɛmbri yony yony lele ów eŋuŋ ab ec’araŋn. Ow it ke ám jɛjan ɛl ec’araŋn ɛsɛ mrabri af,
aŋke ɔnymn sel ɛŋn ec’odad ab ab. Eke bi kokr ɛbɛn, m’b’ow m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ɔny eci, lɛgŋ eke Krist b’ow ow a, aŋke ow b’ow yɛgm’m eke ow elm ɔfr ɔfr m’urum es, m’ijm gbre mi kokm juma.
Ow k’ɔdm ke ɛm e mebl a ók es, él egb waw eke wɛl kok am igŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn eke ɔnyn Nyam ɛm ab af. Eke ow el ɛbɛn ow k’ɛcr a, sos ɛm am iŋn’m ɛtŋ m’am cɛc sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na ɔny fɛŋ ab.
Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ɔny yɛji ow it eke sos ɛm k’iŋn ɔny ke cɛ́cr sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na ɛm ab.
M’am ɔny tutr eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm, lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm mi k’ɔŋ Timote ow ɛkn ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’íri ɔny e lís e low, ke ow átr’m sos es ɛm obi ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, Timote cɛ anake el ɛgŋ eke ɛsɛ ɛm af, ɔny e low b’okr ɛrmij, ke bi tutr ɔny e low tasi a.
Agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ec’a, ɛl obi e lís ec’ów ec’ɛrmij cɛ -li b’ebr, kɔ ow elm Jesu Krist ec’ów a gbɛ.
Timote ec’a, uwr any yɛj’eke l’ɛlu in e nawrɛ ij a ɔkm, elel eke li kokr juma ɛm ab ɛsɛ iy lele ɛs ab af, Amani Mamn sosiɛm ec’a.
In anake m’am tutr eke mi k’ɛrm’n l’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ kpɛkŋ eke ɛm e lís owi a b’ow ayl’m sos ɛm a;
ɛtŋ m’ɔny ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm, eke lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm, mi b’ow m’ow m’ɛkn ɔny ɛm obi yɛji.
Gbɛkɔ mi tutr yɛj’eke ow akpl e mi k’ɔŋ ɛy lisijim Epafrodit eke el ɛm lawl juma kok ɛm lele low dogŋn ɛm ab a, ów ɛkn ɔny, in eke ɛrmn in l’ow l’is’m abu ɛlum a eke m’am eku a.
N’am erur tasi eke ɛmɛny li k’ɛkn ɔny fɛŋ ɛtŋ n’am ɔny ɛrmij yɛji, aŋke irir in ec’ɔl a e low.
Nawrɛ, ɔl ɔny’n tasi toŋ ow anŋ tɛl cɛ ke blel l’úw, kɔ Nyam ikŋ’n sɔrŋ; ɛtŋ ow elm in sosiɛm s’ɔny cɛ, kɔ ɛm sosiɛm yɛj’eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke sos k’ɔ́wm im es ɛmɛny obnm na eke ɔw’m es a.
Ow sosiɛm a, m’am ogŋ es eke mi k’ɔŋ’n l’ow n’ɛŋn ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny b’ɛkan in a, ow ɔ́ŋ ɔny sos ɛm iŋn, ke ɛm eci sos es ɔw a óc es.
Ow akpl eke k’ebr ir sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, ɛsɛ ɛgŋ lisijim af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm. Ow it ke ɔ́nyn agŋ akpasu nɛnɛ a eci sos usr,
aŋke Krist e juma sosiɛm anake blel l’úw a. Ɛtŋ blel l’írmn in ec’owr anŋ a, abu ɛlum a eke ɔtumn eke ɔny obi k’ocr isr’m, ke in l’oc l’is’m ab ɛm.
Sica ɛm lisijimɛl, sos ɛm iŋn ɔny eke okar af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a. Ɛtŋ ow ɛym’m sos ɛm eke m’am ebr low yec’a eke m’ikŋ anym m’awŋ ɔny ow e lɛl ab ɛm; ɔny ec’a ow akpl ɛbɛn.
Ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm juma eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl amua, mɔwr amua, eke am ucu yadŋ ɛm e likr es ubr owi ɔny es a e lís!

Agŋ eke ɛl eci likr es ubr el tasi a, ow ow el ɛy, aŋke ɛy si b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ in ec’Abŋ a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm, si b’ɛlu ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn ɔkm Jesu Krist sosiɛm ɛtŋ s’ocm ɛy ec’ɔmn a s’ɛlum ów amua eke el agŋ ɛm ec’ów ab ɛm.
Ke m’ɔtu cɛ eke ɛm yɛji, m’óc ɛm ec’ɔmn a m’ɛlu ów amua e kok ɛm. Ɛtŋ eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny tutr eke ów amua e kok b’ism ɛgŋ bibm ab, ke ɛm tasi anake m’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔny tutr akpasu na a.

Ɛm, wɛl ubr’m likr es eke wɛl ew’m bake ow ij sɛgŋ niwn a. Ɛm, Israɛl iyli tasi mew ɛm ɛtŋ, Bɛnjamɛ ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, Ebre e liy mebl ɛm ɛtŋ. Yec’eke el Jwifɛl ec’ol ec’ɛlum ec’a, ke ɛm Farisiɛl ec’ogog m’anŋ;
ɛtŋ ɛm ec’ol ec’ɛlum ligbɛl eke m’ɔny a, ɔŋ’m m’ijr agŋ ek’el Krist ec’a gbre. Sica yec’eke el ol e jɛj ok nɛny nyam ɛm a, m’ɔnym abr ɛnym kaka.
Gbɛkɔ, ów amua fɛŋ eke mi lɛr ɛsɛ ob ɔny tasi af a, Krist sosiɛm a, sica m’am lɛr ɛl ɛsɛ ów ɔfr ɔfr ek’ɔnym any af.

Jesu Krist ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any eke mi k’uw a, anake el low tasi eke ɔny any a. Ɛm e tutr ɛm a, low fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ɛŋn a, elm low kaka Krist ec’any uw a ec’any af. Krist sosiɛm, m’igŋ fɛŋ m’ɛlu es. M’ɔ́ny Krist anŋ ɛm ab, ke m’ókr af in ab a sosiɛm, m’am lɛr ów amua fɛŋ ɛsɛ lirŋ af e suw af. Ow elm ol e m’am ɛlum a sosiɛm m’elm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs, kɔ ɔmn eke m’ɔny Krist ɛm a sosiɛm. Nyam anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a, li b’ɔŋ ow ow el nɛny nyam ɛs.
Low a cɛ eke m’am erur a el: ke m’úw Krist any, ke m’úw abusu a yɛji ek’ɔŋ’n l’igb luw ɛm ab any. Ɛtŋ ow eke ɛmɛny m’am erur a el: ke m’íj gbre in ab, ke m’úw ɛsɛ in ec’ab af.
Ɛbɛn eke m’am ɔny ɔmn eke batŋ m’uw, ke ɛm yɛji m’ánŋ agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm m’igb ana.
Mi dadm m’ɛsmɛ m’ɛŋn ow e m’am ɔl ab ŋ̂, oglog ke mi kok ow iy nɛny ŋ̂! Gbɛkɔ m’am uru es m’im cɛ eke mi k’ɛŋn es uru a eci labm sɔg a, aŋke Jesu Krist jɛj ɔny’m lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ.
Njaŋ, agŋ lisijimɛl, mi dadm eke m’ɛŋn labm sɔg a ŋ̂; gbɛkɔ low nyam cɛ m’am kok: m’íjl low sig fɛŋ es, ke m’átr sos es m’im m’ɛŋn ow a ek’anŋ’m anym a.
M’am uru es m’im eke mi k’igŋ ow e nuŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɛ́ŋn labm sɔg a eke Nyam, Jesu Krist ɛm, am ɛsŋ ɛy eke si k’ɛŋn afr a.
Ɛy fɛŋ eke s’ɔny ɔmn eke usu a, s’ɔ́nyn tutr nyam coco na. Ow e jam a, ek’ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam am ɔny tutr ɛjeci, Nyam b’ow ayal ow e low ɔŋ ɔny.
Kɔ ca, aŋa eke s’ow bake s’igŋ a, s’ébr ebr nyam a cɛ eke s’eb toŋ ke s’igŋ aŋa a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny fɛŋ kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af. Si yɛgm ɔny sɛwl; ow sosiɛm lɛ̀ɛr agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’an es sɛwl ikŋ na af a.
Mi dad ɔny sakp nɔnɔ yɛji ɛtŋ m’am ebr ɛm mi dad ɔny ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm yɛfɛnyna yɛj’eke: agŋ nɔnɔ anŋ eke ɛl ec’es an a bi yɛgm eke -l’el Krist ec’olikŋ a ec’efnu.
Ɛl akpasu na, irm cɛ -li b’ow -l’irm, aŋke ɛl e Nyam el ɛl eci lok a, ɛtŋ low eke k’el ɛ́s ɔny ɛl a, b’iŋn ɛl sos ɛm. Ɛl, wus ec’ów cɛ b’anŋ ɛl nuŋ ɛm.
Ɛy ec’a gbɛ, ɛy ec’ɛb ir usu anŋ afr, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke s’am eku ɛsɛ ɛy e sɔg ɛs af, eke el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist a, b’ow anŋ afr yogŋ ow.
Ɛtŋ li b’ow l’itŋn ɛy e sos megl a eke b’ugŋ es a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ in ec’anygbɛl e sos megl ab af, in ec’abusu a eke ow ɛm li b’ɔŋ mob fɛŋ is es in ec’es ɛw a ec’any af a.
Na sosiɛm, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am erur tasi eke ɛmɛny mi k’ɛkn ɔny, ɔny eke eel ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn lel ɛm ec’any eb tufɛ ab a; kin elel eke k’inymn es kikri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɔny ec’ɛb ir ɛm.
Evodi lele Sɛntis ab, m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, m’ok ɔny m’ɛrm sabu af, òkar af ɔny ec’ɛb ir ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm.

Ɛtŋ ŋ, ɛm lawl tasi juma kok ɛm, m’am dad’ŋ eke k’ɛlum ɔyɔw yony na abu, aŋke ɛm ab -li dogŋn Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb e low, Klema yɛji, lele ɛm e juma kok ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl ɛjec’a fɛŋ eke ɛl ec’en anŋ sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a.
Sos ɛm íŋn ɔny sɛgŋ fɛŋ eke okar af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a. M’am dadr ɛm, sos ɛm íŋn ɔny!
Ɛ̀lul ɔny ec’ɛrm frɔrɔ ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ e lís, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ow a ibnm ij.
K’èbar low kaka ec’ɛrmij, kɔ low low fɛŋ ɛm, ìbrmn Nyam ɔny e ŋɔŋn ɛm, low yec’a eke ɔnyn ow ec’es abur a, ìbrmn in ɛrm eke b’ɔkn in e low ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a eke agb akm nuŋ ɛm ɔny fɛŋ a, b’ow ɔsu ɔny e mɛrm a lele ɔny e sow tutr ab ab Jesu Krist ɛm.

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yec’ek’it eke k’ɛwr ɛrm af: low fɛŋ eke el nawrɛ ke it eke wɛl k’ɛlum, low fɛŋ eke el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam lele lala ab, low fɛŋ eke wɛl ɔtu eke wɛl k’erur ke wɛl ɛ́gŋ eb, low nimamn fɛŋ lele low fɛŋ ek’it eke wɛl k’aw ab.
Kòkr yec’a eke wewar ke ebr lele ow eke irir mi dad, ke ɛkan’m mi kok ab ab. Ɛtŋ Nyam a eke b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛrm es ɛy a, b’ow anŋ ɔny ab.
M’ɛŋn sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm lel Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm, aŋke ɛwal mɛny ɔnyn ɛm ec’abu ɛlum ec’erur. Abu ɛlum ec’erur ikŋ na ɔnyn, kɔ abusu anake ɔtumn ɔnymn eke k’ɛlul il ɔkm a.
Ow elm es abur ɛm eke m’anŋ a sosiɛm mi dadm nɛnɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ɛm m’uw any eke ow a cɛ eke m’ɔny a ɔdŋ’m ŋ̂.

Ɛm m’uw gbre ɛm ec’ɛb ir any ɛtŋ m’uw ehe ɛm ec’ɛb ir yɛj’any. Mi wewr elel eke low fɛŋ ɛm lele susu fɛŋ ab, mi k’ɛgŋ elel eke m’anŋn a m’eb; ke m’ɔ́ny m’ij oglog ke m’ánŋ namn, ke m’ɔ́ny nɔnɔ oglog ke m’ɔ́ny tɛl.
M’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔbr ses babur amua fɛŋ, Krist e lɛc a eke b’ɔŋ’m ab ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ, uwr kok eke ɛlumn’m abu ɛm e gbre na ɛm a.
Ɔny Filip eyŋ, uwr any tasi eke lɛgŋ a eke m’ŋgboŋ Maseduan a, lakpo ab af eke wɛl ɔb nuŋ am ɔmun Amani Mamn ab es a, ɔny cɛ eel Nyamel eke ɛlum im abu, ɔŋ’m os m’ɔtu mi kok ɛm e lís e low a.
Ow a eke m’anŋ Tesaloni baŋn a ɛtŋ, sakp nɔnɔ isr’m abu ɛlum ek’it a.
Ow elm ke m’ám ɔl ob eke wɛl k’ap’m es; kɔ ow eke m’am ɔl es a el, ke ɛ́ŋan ɔny eci ŋgrusiɛ.

M’ɛŋn mob a fɛŋ ek’it a; ow ɛny afŋn es yɛji. M’ɛŋn mob a fɛŋ eke ɔŋn Epafrodit eke k’oc is’m a, ɛtŋ sica m’ɔny fɛŋ iy’m nɛny. Ɔny ec’abu ɛlum a anŋ ɛsɛ ob ap sŋɔsŋɔ af, ɛsɛ egb waw eke Nyam ɛgŋ eb, ke akpl’l sos ɛm af.
Ɛm e Nyam a b’ow kok ɔny e lís e low fɛŋ, in e gbreŋgbi ij a ek’ɛy ɔkm Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm.
Anygbɛl él Nyam ɛy Ɛs eci, akpo akpo fɛŋ. Amɛn!
Ɛ̀sŋnin Jesu Krist ɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ eke el Nyam ec’a. Agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ eke anŋ ɛm ab a yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny.
Nyam ɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ eke anŋ aŋa a, ab brobro agŋ a eke bi kok Sesar e juma a, am ɛsŋn ɔny.
Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab!
Pɔl, eke Nyam ec’erur ɛm, el Jesu Krist ec’ɛrm ɛs lel ɛy lisijim Timote ab, am awŋ
Nyam ec’agŋ ek’ir Kolɔs baŋn, ke el nɛny nyam ɛm ec’ɛy lisijimɛl eke okr af Krist ɛm a lɛl. Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ si b’ɛlu Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs bia eke si bi ŋɔŋn’n ɔny ec’a,
aŋke wɛl dad ɛy s’iri ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn Jesu Krist ɛm lel ɔny ec’erur ek’ɔnyn agŋ fɛŋ ek’el Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’ab ab e low.
Eke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’amani ek’el Amani Mamn, ɔg es ow ɔny ogŋ a, ɔny, irir low yec’a eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw ɔny es afr a; ɛtŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn lel ɔny ec’erur ab ucu low eku ikŋ na ɔny es.
Amani Mamn a am eb es ɛtŋ am ɔsu ey wus nimum af, ɛs’elel eke n’am kokr ɔny ec’araŋn lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke ɔgr es irir Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a e low, ke uwr ob tasi eke l’el ab any a.
Epafras ek’el ɛy e juma kok ɛm e lawl eke s’erur sɛnyn sɛnyn a anake yɛgm ɔny low ikŋ na a; n’am usr ɛy usu li kok juma ɛsɛ Krist e juma kok ɛs nimamn tasi af;
n’ɔŋ ɛy ɔny ec’Abŋ Lala ec’erur ek’ɔŋ ɔny a ec’amani.

Na sosiɛm anake ɛy yɛji, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke s’iri wɛl dad ɛy ɔny e lís e low a, sɛgŋ fɛŋ s’am ŋɔŋn Nyam s’ɔŋ ɔny a. S’am ibrm Nyam eke li k’ɔŋ ɔny uwr in ec’erur tasi ab any, nuŋ ɛm ɔny fɛŋ lel sɛwr fɛŋ ek’in ec’Abŋ a b’ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm.
Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ b’ow ɔnyn es an eke b’usr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sos ɛtŋ b’ow kokr sɛgŋ fɛŋ yec’eke b’akpl’l sos ɛm a. B’ow kokr ów amamn fɛŋ ɛtŋ b’ow iman anym eci, ɔny eci Nyam ec’any uw ab ɛm.
S’am ibrm Nyam eke k’ucu ɔny ɔny es low low fɛŋ ɛm in ec’anygbɛl ec’abusu ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ k’ɔ́tur inymn es kikri, ke ɔ́nyn ɛrm susu low eku ɛm.
Ɛ̀lul Ɛs Nyam bia sos ɛm iŋn ɛm: in eke n’ɔŋ ɔny abusu eke k’ɛŋan ów a fɛŋ eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es afr ec’usuayl ab ɛm, agŋ a ek’el in ec’a ec’a.
N’ɔny l’oc ɛy es ncebn ec’abusu ab ɛm ɛtŋ l’oc l’ɛlu ɛy in ec’Iy e l’erur a ec’es ɛw ab ɛm.
Jim ɛm anake li sɔg ɛy low ŋuŋ ɛm, ke l’oc ɛy e sikpl a yɛji l’ap ɛy a.
Krist el Nyam eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e mɛny ɛwr. L’el Liy krɛkrɛ ek’anŋ mob mob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a e ŋuŋ af,
aŋke in ɛm Nyam ɛcr kok ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr lele wus af aŋa ab a: mob e wɛl b’ɛkn lele yec’eke wɛl ɛ́knm ab, lɛc fɛŋ, es akm fɛŋ, es ɛw fɛŋ lele abusu fɛŋ ab. Nyam ɛcr in ɛm kok fɛŋ in eci.
Krist ikŋ anym anŋ gbuŋ ɛtŋ ob fɛŋ anŋ, ɛtŋ in ɛm ob fɛŋ ɔtu inym es ɛl e susu a.
Krist eci sos megl el Nyamel ɛtŋ in obi l’el ow e nuŋ. Krist el nuŋ ɔb, l’el Liy krɛkrɛ eke wɛl ew, ɛtŋ l’el krɛkrɛ ec’ɛgŋ ek’igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’él krɛkrɛ n’anŋ mob fɛŋ e nuŋ af,
aŋke Nyam erur eke k’ir Jim ɛm nimum,
ɛtŋ l’erur yɛj’eke li k’ɛcr Jim ɛm l’okr wus nimum ec’agŋ ɛm Jim eci. Jim eci mebl a ek’ok es olikŋ af ab ɛm, Nyam ɛw ɛrm es ɛy es wus af aŋa lel afr ab.
Ɔny Kolɔs eyŋ, ɔny yɛji lɛgŋ eke ɛc ab ɛm a, kpabr es Nyam e lís, eel in ec’efnu ów eŋuŋ a eke b’ɔnyn ow e tutr ke bi kokr a sosiɛm eci.
Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam ɔny okr ɔny ɛm in ab, Jim e sos megl ɛm e luw a ek’uw olikŋ af ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ówr in ec’any af ɛsɛ agŋ lala, agŋ ek’ɔnym low ɔbr, ke abr ɛnym anm lís af.

Gbɛkɔ ow it eke k’inymn es kikri ke íjr lɛc ɔmn ɛm. Ke kí kpabmn es Amani Mamn a e lís, aŋke l’el low eke s’am ɔmn. Ɔny, irir in e low, aŋke wɛl ɔb amani a ok agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ wus af aŋa a, ɛtŋ ɛm Pɔl, m’el ow e juma kok ɛs.
Sica sos ɛm am iŋn’m eke m’am m’ij ɔny e gbre. Tasi ɛm a, ɛm obi ɛm a, ɛbɛn m’anŋ ɛm m’am m’ij Krist e gbre ek’ij in e sos megl a ek’el Nyamel ec’a.
M’el Nyamel e juma kok ɛs, aŋke ow el juma eke Nyam abul’m eke mi ki kok ɔny eci: l’abul’m eke mi k’ɔb in ec’amani a ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af.
Odad a eke el low eke lɔl es god’ɛtŋ sɔwɔrŋ ec’any af, ke lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam ɛlu ɔkm kpata yɛgm agŋ a eke el in ec’a.

Nyam erur eke ki yɛgm ɛl -l’uw low na eke lɔl es ab any, ke el ob ɔny lele low sɔbɔ ab, eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es agŋ fɛŋ ec’a. Ɛtŋ kin low a eke lɔl es a: Krist anŋ ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɔny ɔnyn ɔmn eke ɔny yɛji b’ow ɛŋan Nyam ec’anygbɛl a.
Ow sosiɛm, s’am ɔb Krist ec’amani s’ok ɛgŋ fɛŋ. S’am ɛwar ɛtŋ s’am yɛgm ɛgŋ ɛgŋ low sɛwr fɛŋ ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́y ɔkm Nyam ec’any af ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uw low fɛŋ any Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
Na sosiɛm m’am kok juma, ɛtŋ m’am dogŋn low Krist e lɛc a ec’abusu a ek’anŋ’m ɛm ab ɛm.
M’erur eke k’uwr gbre e m’am ij ab any low na eke m’am dogŋn ɔny ec’ab ɛm, ɔny lele Laodise ec’agŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a lele agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ ek’uwm im any nyamn ɛm ab ab.
Tasi ɛm a, m’am erur eke -li k’ɔny ɛrm susu iy ɛl ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ ke -l’okr af erur ɛm, ke nuŋ ɛm ɔny íy ɛl ɛm gbɔŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -l’uw Nyam e low eke lɔl es ab any. Low a eke lɔl es a el: Krist,
eke in ɛm ob ɔny ɛsɛ sɛwr af lele low any uw ab lɔl es a.
M’am dad ɔny low na yec’ɛtŋ ke kí yɛbmn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛjum ɔny sodad ebl amamn e dad ɛm.
Eke m’anm ɔny ab sos megl ɛm yɛji, m’anŋ ɔny ab ow tutr ɛm, ɛtŋ m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ek’ɔnyn ɛrm susu inymn es kikri usu nyam Krist ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn ab ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋn Jesu Krist ebr ɛsɛ ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ af a, ìir ɛb af okr ɛm in ab.
Òkr min in ɛm, ùsr ɔny ec’owr anŋ a in af. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ìnymn es kikri ɔny ec’ɔmn ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl yɛgmn ɔny ab af, ke ɛ́lul Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum eke k’ɔny ɔgŋm ɔny meb agŋ e sow tutr yadŋ ab ɛm. Ow el yadŋ ɔny eke low kaka anm ɛm, ke b’ɛŋn lɛc agŋ ɛm ec’ow kok ɛm, wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc ogŋ, ke elm Krist ec’a.
Nyam in nimum a, l’ir Krist e sos megl ab ɛm.
Ɛtŋ ɔny nimum a ɛŋan Krist ec’owr anŋ e low fɛŋ, in eke l’el es ɛw eke anŋ es ɛw fɛŋ lel abusu fɛŋ eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e nuŋ af a.
Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm anake wɛl ubr ɔny likr es a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr ikŋ na elm ɛgŋ ec’abu ɛm ec’eke kok. Kɔ likr es ubr ek’anŋ Krist ɛm ow, ke ɔny low a eke b’itr ɛlu ɛy low ŋuŋ ɛm a oc es.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ok ɔny mij nuŋ a, yogŋ ɛtŋ uwr Krist ab ɛtŋ anŋn luw ɛm igbr in ab, aŋke ubr Nyam ec’abusu a ek’igbm Krist luw ɛm a nawrɛ.

Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, ɔny eel agŋ ek’uw abŋ ɛm ɔny e sikpl a nuŋ af lele likr eke wɛl ubrm ɔny es, ke eel Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ab ab sosiɛm. Kɔ lɛgŋ na ɛm a, Nyam ɔŋ ɔny anŋn owr Krist ab ɛtŋ l’ap ɛy, ɛy ec’ów ɔbr a fɛŋ.
Ɛy e labm e s’ɔny e lɛl a ek’am ok ɛy ow af, ke in ɛm e sol ek’anŋ a am ɔb ɛy low a, n’ɔny li tɛtŋ es. Ɛtŋ ni ŋuŋn ow l’ɔb ow ecigbrɔ olikŋ af yogŋ.
Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ɔny es ɛw fɛŋ lele abusu fɛŋ eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e lɛc oc es ana; ɛtŋ li kok wɛl sos keskes dedeku ɛm, l’ot wɛl ɛsɛ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl af, Jim ec’any eb ec’agŋ ek’am us jam ab ɛm.
Ow sosiɛm, kì yɛbr ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ki cak ɔny, ɔny ec’ob eke b’ijr oglog b’ɛgŋn ab ɛm, ses gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ec’ɔsu sosiɛm, awl owr e b’ɛli ɛy ɔkm ec’es gbɛgbl lele nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ec’ɔsu owi ɛm ab.
Ów amua am yɛgm low tasi a eke b’ow ow a, kɔ ɛl -l’elm low tasi a. Low tasi a el Krist.

Ɛgŋ kaka itm eke k’ɛdŋn ɔny any eb. M’am tutr agŋ a eke b’is es ɛw ekekey afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af igŋ ɛl nuŋ a e low, -li b’ucu mɛmn ɛm ec’ów eke -li b’ɛkn a e low -n’ɔny es. -L’el agŋ ek’ɛl e sow tutr a el agŋ ɛm e sow tutr tasi, ow b’ɔŋ ɛl -l’ɛfu es,

ɛtŋ -l’akŋamn Krist ab. Ke Krist anake el sos megl e nuŋ a, in ɛm sos megl nimum b’ɛŋn in ec’ob ij. In ɛm sos ŋgigŋnel a lele mifn ab b’okr af inym es kikri, ɛtŋ sos megl ikŋ na b’agb ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam b’erur ab af.

Sica ɔny uwr Krist ab, ɛtŋ wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc elm low kaka ɔny eci. Ɛtŋ bla sosiɛm ɔny am íir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛmɛny wus ec’agŋ cɛ ɔny eel af ee? Bla sosiɛm am ɛgŋn ebr ek’ɛmɛny wɛl k’ɔŋ ɔny sol akpasu amua ɛsɛ:
k’òc ob na, k’ìj ob na, k’ìtŋn ob na abu ee?
Eke wɛl b’ɔb nuŋ am kok ɛl e low a, ów amua b’irm. Ow el sol lele low yɛgm ab eke agŋ ɛl obi eci nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛm ɔkn.
Tasi ɛm a, ígŋ ob nuŋ, ís es ɛw likekli afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af, íjr ŋ e sos megl gbre, wɛl b’ɛkn ów amua fɛŋ ɛsɛ sɛwr ec’ów af. Gbɛkɔ -l’el ów ɔfr ɔfr, sos megl owi cɛ ow b’ɛlum abu.
Sica Krist ab anake anŋn luw ɛm igbr a. Ow sosiɛm a, ɔ̀ɔl afr ec’ów es, yogŋ a eke Krist anŋ, ke ow el Nyam e lidr abu af a.
Ow akpl eke k’ebar afr ec’ów ec’ɛrmij, ow a eke k’ebar wus af aŋa ec’a ec’ɛrmij a.
Tasi, ɔny ɛcar luw ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔny ec’owr anŋ a lɔl es Krist eke anŋ Nyam ogŋ ab ɛm.
Krist anake el ɔny ec’owr anŋ tasi a, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ɛy ɔkm a, ɔny yɛji b’ow okr ɔkm in ab ɛtŋ in ec’anygbɛl a, ɔny yɛji b’ow ɛŋan.
Na sosiɛm a, ìbir ɔny ɛm low fɛŋ ek’el wus ec’ów ɛsɛ: nfaci ij af, sikpl owi af, ów aw eke ɛw fɛfɛdi lele ów aw eŋuŋ ab lele lokm suŋ ek’in ɛw ɛsɛ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ ab af.
Ɛtŋ ów ɔbr ɔbr amua na sosiɛm anake Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a, [b’ow ok agŋ a ek’ɛgŋm eke k’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ab af a].
Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, ɔny yɛji ow a ek’am iir ɛb sikpl ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke kokr ana.
Kɔ jam aŋa, ìgŋn ów amua fɛŋ ek’el: ɛrm bebl, ɛrm wewe lele ɛrm suŋ ab a okr es. Ke wɛwr lel odad ebl kpɔm kpɔm ab k’ánm ɔny nɛnym ɛym ɔkm.
K’ɔ̀nyn yadŋ k’ɔŋanin ɔny ɔfr ɛm ij, aŋke ɔny ec’elel eke aan es lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, waal ɛlul es ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
ɛtŋ ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm owr af, ɛwal mɛny anŋn ɛsɛ ɛgŋ owr af. Ɔny eci ɛb ir owr ab ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ am otr Nyam ek’el ɔny e kok Ɛs ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur uwr ir any ok ɔny es sos ɛm.

Jam aŋa agŋ a fɛŋ el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ, ow ɔnym Jwif lel ɛgŋ ek’elm Jwif ab, ɛgŋ eke wɛl ubrm likr es lel ɛgŋ eke wɛl ubr likr es ab, ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ lele mɛbɛy ab, madu lel ewi ab. Gbɛkɔ low tasi a: el Krist ek’el low fɛŋ, ke anŋ agŋ fɛŋ ek’ub’r nawrɛ ab ɛm a.
Nyam sɔsum ot ɔny eke k’eel in ec’agŋ ɛtŋ li b’erur ɔny. Ow sosiɛm a, ow akpl eke k’ɔnyn ɛrm ek’erur lele sɔrŋ ikŋ ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ, ɛrm mamn, es is ec’ɛrm, ɛrm frɔrɔ lele low eku ec’ɛrm ab.
Ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’elel eke anŋn a ebr ke áparir low yɛji, sakp sakp fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam b’ow ɔny low lawl ab a. Ow it eke k’aparir low ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ap ɔny ab af.
Ɛtŋ low eke ki kokr tasi a el erur eke k’ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, aŋke erur el low eke b’ɔny agŋ okr af.
Ke Krist ec’ɛrm es ɛy a nyímn ɔny ec’ɛrm a; tasi ɛm a, ɛrm es ɛy ikŋ na ɛm anake Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’okar af éel nyam ɛsɛ sos megl nyam coco af a. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ̀ŋan in bia.

Ke Krist ec’odad ebl a, ɛ́ŋn usu ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm in ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ ab. Yɛ̀gmnin low ke ɔ́manin ów ɔny ɔfr ɛm sɛwr fɛŋ ɛm. Ɛ̀lul Nyam bia ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn selu, ɛ̀gŋn Nyam e sɛj ɛjeci lele sɛj eke Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɔny ab ab.
Low fɛŋ eke bi kokr oglog bi dadr ab ɛm, kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm, ke in ɛm ɛ̀lul Ɛs Nyam bia.
Ɔyɔw, ɔny, ìsr es ɔny ɛcɛl ec’any af, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it eke ki kokr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af ab af.
Ɔyɔw ɛcɛl, èrurir ɔny ɛyɛl ke k’ɔ́nymn ɛl lokm yony ɛm.
Ey, ɔ̀nyn agŋ ek’ew ɔny a ec’ɛlum low low fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ow el low eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’erur.
Ey ɛsɛl, k’ìjar ɔny ec’ey a gbre, yec’ɛtŋ ke sos k’ɔ́wm ɛl es.

Madu, low low fɛŋ ɛm ɛ̀lumn ɔny e wus af aŋa eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a. Ow elm eke -li b’ɛw ɔny nyamn af cɛ ki kokmn ɛl e lís e low mɛwl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’aw ɔny. Kɔ ɛ̀lumn ɛl ɛrm nyam ɛm tasi, ɛlum ek’ɔnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a sosiɛm.
Juma fɛŋ eke bi kokr a, kòkr ɛrm nyam ɛm, ɛsɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma ɔny am kokr af, ke ow k’élm ɛsɛ agŋ ec’af.
Ow sosiɛm a, madu, ɔ̀kan eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ow ec’ob ap, ob ap a eke l’ɛdŋn l’ɛw in ec’agŋ es a. Tasi ɛm a, Es Ɛw Ɛs a ek’am kokr in eci juma a, in l’el Krist.
Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke am kok low ŋuŋ a, b’ow ɛŋn yec’ek’el in ec’a, ɛsɛ elel eke li kokr low ŋuŋ ab af, aŋke Nyam eci low eke b’ow kok ab ɛm, li k’ow li jɛjm agŋ es.
Agŋ eke el madu eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a, kòkr ɔny e madu a e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ke ŋkoprɛ k’ánm ɛm. Ke ɔ̀kan ek’ɔny yɛji ɔnyn Es ɛw ɛs nyam ek’anŋ afr.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ànŋn Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, ke ɔny e Nyam e bia eke b’ɔŋn Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm a él ɛrm ɛw ɛm.

Nyam ŋɔŋn ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji ŋɔ̀ŋan ɛy eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam kók s’ɛŋn abusu s’ɔmun in ec’odad ab es, ke si dád Krist eci lís e low eke lɔl es a. Tasi ɛm a, low na eke lɔl es a sosiɛm anake m’anŋ sobel ɛm a.
Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɔ́tu m’otar odad a akr ayl, ok agŋ es sos ɛm, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it eke mi ki kok ab af.
Àan es nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛm agŋ ek’uwm Krist any a e lís, ke abusu fɛŋ eke b’ɛru ɔny es a k’írmnmn.
Ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔny ec’odad ebl él amamn, ke mok ánŋ ɛm, ke uwr any dádr ɛgŋ fɛŋ odad ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af.
Erur ɛm ec’ɛy lisijim Tisik, abu ɛlum ɛs nimamn ek’el ɛm lawl Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm, b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛm e lís ec’amani fɛŋ.
M’am ɛrm’n tasi eke li k’ow li dad ɔny ɛy e lís ec’amani, ke l’átr ɔny sos es yɛji.
Onesim ek’el ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, ke el erur ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim a anake am ɛwl’l a. -Li b’ow -l’ɔb ɔny ów a fɛŋ ek’am ɛy aŋa a ec’amani.

Aritak ek’anŋ sobel ɛm ɛm ab a, am ɛsŋn ɔny, ɛbɛn nɛny nyam Mark ek’anŋ ɛsɛ Barnabas e lisijim af a, in yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny. (Mark ec’a, ikŋn anym irir in e lís e low. Eke l’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, èbr ir sɛnyn sɛnyn.)
