Igŋ a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jesu ke wɛl b’ok en es Justus a yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny. Jwifɛl ek’ɛgŋ Krist e low eb a, ɛl ɛm a, agŋ nyahan na cɛ anake am kok juma ɛm ab Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’a. Ɛtŋ -l’atr’m sos es nɔnɔ ligbɛl.

Epafras, ek’in yɛji el ɔny ɛm e nyam a, am ɛsŋn ɔny; Krist e libɔwi na sɛgŋ fɛŋ b’atr sos es ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔny eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur inymn es kikri, ánŋn ɛsɛ agŋ ek’agb ɔmn ɛm, ke bɛbm sos eke ki kok low fɛŋ eke Nyam b’erur ab af.
M’ɔtu eke mi k’ij in e nuŋ af e daŋku low na eci: li b’ij gbre nɔnɔ ɔny lele Laodise ec’agŋ lele Iyerapolis ec’agŋ a ec’ab.
Luk ek’el erur ɛm ec’ɛy lawl ke el sɛkp kok ɛs lele Demas ab am ɛsŋn ɔny.
Ɛ̀sŋnin ɛy lisijimɛl ek’anŋ Laodise a, lele ɛy lisijɔw Nɛnfa lele Nyam ec’agŋ eke b’as luku in ec’akŋ ab ab ɔŋn ɛy.
Sica lɛgŋ eke b’awal lɛl na ba ow b’uwr a, kókr elel eke ki kokr ke wɛl ɔ́tu awl Laodise eci Nyamel ab ɛm yɛji. Ke ɔny yɛji áwal yec’a eke b’ow anŋ ɛl ogŋ a ow a.
Ow ec’uwr ɛm a, dàdr Arkip kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma ek’abul il a sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm mi nɔn ɛsŋn na lɛl na ec’uwr ɛm. Sica k’ìjal es eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny af.
Pɔl, Silas lele Timote ab e lɛl ek’am awŋ Nyamel ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Tesaloni baŋn, k’el Nyam Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’agŋ. Ke ɔwrɔ lel ɛrm es ɛy ab ánŋ ɔny ab.
Si b’ɔŋ Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔny fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ si b’ɔkn ɔny sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛy e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm.
Nyam ɛy Ɛs ec’any af si b’ɔkn ɔny e nawrɛ ek’ubr e juma e kokr, ɔny ec’erur ek’ɔnyn e low e kokr, lel ɛrm ek’usurir ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn ab ab e low.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam erur ɔny, ɛtŋ s’uw any eke li sɔsum l’ot ɔny eel in eci.

Tasi ɛm a, Amani Mamn ec’odad eke si dad ɔny a, ow elm odad ebl nɛnym ɛm cɛ, kɔ Abŋ Lala ec’abusu lele in ec’abu ɛlum ɛm ab, ɛtŋ s’uw any tasi ek’ow el low nawrɛ. Ɛtŋ uwr any eke, ɛy ec’es an ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɔny e nimamn eci.
Ɔny obi yɛji wewrmn ɛy lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ów. Gbre ijr nɔnɔ ec’araŋn yɛji, ɛgŋn Nyam ec’odad a ebr, sos ɛm iŋn ek’Abŋ Lala ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm.
Ow ɔŋ ɔny eel Maseduan lele Akayi wus ab ec’agŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a e sɛwl mamn.

Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a anŋ ɔny ogŋ Maseduan wus af a ɛtŋ ɔmun es im toŋ ok Akayi wus af. Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ, kɔ ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn Nyam ɛm a yɛji e low eb es susu a fɛŋ; ɛmɛny ow ɛbam eke si k’ɔb ow ec’amani ij.
Agŋ a fɛŋ am dad elel ek’ebr ɛy ɔny ogŋ a, ɛrm ɛm ek’itŋnin eel Nyam eci, sɛkp e nuŋ igŋ ek’igŋn ɛlul es, ke ɛgŋn Nyam ek’anŋ owr ke el Nyam nawrɛ a eci low kok a e low ebr a.
Ca am ekur in ec’Iy Jesu eke b’ow anŋ afr ow a. In eke Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm n’anŋ owr a, in anake l’eb l’ɛlu ɛy es Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ek’am ow a e lís a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny obi yɛji uwr any ek’ɔny ogŋ a eke s’ow a ɔsu ey.
Uwr any yɛj’eke lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, wɛl ijr ɛy gbre, wɛwr ɛy Filip baŋn a. Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam ec’ɛrm susu ek’ɔŋ ɛy ab ɛm, si dad ɔny in ec’Amani Mamn a ec’odad, gbre ij nɔnɔ ec’araŋn.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛy ec’ów ɔm a elm yadŋ ɛm, ow elm ów tutr eŋuŋ ɛm, ow elm kprakpr ɛm.
Kɔ ɛy, Nyam ɛkn eke s’ɔtu ɛtŋ l’abul ɛy in ec’Amani Mamn a e dad. Sica s’am dad Nyam ec’odad, ɛtŋ s’ɔlm agŋ ɛm ec’erur es, kɔ Nyam eke b’ɛkn ɛy e mɛrm ɛm a ec’erur s’am ɔl es.
Ɔny obi uwr any eke lɛgŋ kaka si dadm mɛju ec’odad; lɛgŋ kaka si kokm os ɛŋn e low. Nyam ij ow e daŋku.
S’ɔlm ek’ɛgŋ k’aw ɛy, ke ow el ɔny oglog ke ow el agŋ ɛjeci.
Ke s’ɔtu cɛ eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny low ebr, eke s’el Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl a sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ s’el agŋ frɔrɔ ɔny ec’araŋn ɛsɛ elel eke ey lis, frɔrɔ ɛm bi kok in ec’ey e lís e low ab af.
Ɔny ec’erur eke s’ɔny a sosiɛm, s’ɔɔm ɔny Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a sɔny cɛ, kɔ ɛy obi ɛy obi e sel a yɛji, aŋke ɔny iil an nɔnɔ ɛy eci.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, am ɔkan elel eke si kokr juma lɛc ɛm a: ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab abu anŋ ɛy juma kok ɛm, nɛnɛ anake si dad ɔny Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a ec’odad a, yec’ɛtŋ ke si k’ócm ɛy e lís e low s’abulm ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka.
Ɔny ek’ubr nawrɛ a, ɛy ec’es an ɔny ec’araŋn a ayl, el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm eci ek’abr ɛnym kaka anm ɛm. Ɔny obi yɛji ijr daŋku, ɛtŋ Nyam yɛji ij daŋku.
Ɛmɛny uwr any eke si kok ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam e lís low ɛsɛ elel ek’ey ɛs bi kok in ec’ey ab af.
S’ɔm ɔny ów, s’atr ɔny sos es, s’ibrm ɔny sakp nɔnɔ eke k’aan es ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af. In anake l’ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’okr in ec’es ɛw ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm a.

Na sosiɛm s’am ɔŋ Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ, eke ebmn odad eke si dad ɔny a ɛsɛ agŋ ɛm ec’odad af, kɔ ke ebr ɛsɛ Nyam ec’odad af a. Ɛɛ, nawrɛ Nyam ec’odad ab ana! Ɛtŋ li bi kok juma ɔny ɛm l’itŋn ɔny ek’ubr nawrɛ a.

Agŋ lisijimɛl, sica ɔny yɛji ɛkan ów a ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Jude e Sinyamel ɛm ke ub Jesu Krist nawrɛ a ɛkn ab af. Ɔny yɛji, ɔny e baŋn eyŋ ijr ɔny gbre ɛsɛ gbre ijr nyam a cɛ eke Jwifɛl ijr Sinyamel amua ec’agŋ ab af.
Jwifɛl amua anake ibi Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ab, ke ɛy yɛji ijr ɛy gbre a. -N’am kokmn Nyam ec’erur, ɛtŋ -l’el agŋ fɛŋ ec’efnu.
-N’am ɛdŋn ɛy eke si ki dad sel ɛŋn ec’odad s’ok agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a bake -n’ɛŋn sel. Ow ɔŋ sikpl a eke god’ɛtŋ -li kokr a obn afŋn es. Na sosiɛm anake ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ɛŋn ɛl a.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, nawrɛ si kpab ɔny es lís sos megl ɛm ow ibn tɛl, kɔ ɛrm ɛm a s’anŋ ɔny ab. S’erur tasi ɛtŋ s’atr sos es eke ɛmɛny si k’ow s’ɛkn ɔny.
S’erur eke si k’ow ɛy fɛŋ s’ɛkn ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛm Pɔl, ɛm sɔny ɛm a, m’atr sos es sakp nɔnɔ eke mi k’ow, kɔ Satan ɔ́ɔm ɛy ow ec’abusu.
Ɔny kɔtɔkɔ eel ɛy e low ɔmn, ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn, ɛy ec’anygbɛl tufɛ, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’any af, in e mowrer e lɛgŋ a.
Ɛɛ! ɔny anake eel ɔny e low kok ɛm, ɛy ec’anygbeŋ lele ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn ab a.

Na sosiɛm, eke si k’ɔtum s’ekum ij a, si bɛbm eke si k’anŋ Atɛn ɛy sɔny, ɛtŋ s’ɛrm ɛy lisijim Timote eke bi kok Nyam juma ɛy ab, ke bi dad Krist ec’Amani Mamn ec’odad a. S’ɛrm’n eke li k’ow l’usur ɔny ɛrm ke l’átr ɔny sos es ɔny ec’ɔmn ab ɛm,
yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́ym wus gbre ijr na ek’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn ab ɛm, aŋke ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke gbre ijr na, el low ek’ɔn ɛy es.
Ow a eke s’anŋ ɔny ogŋ a, s’ikŋ anym si dad ɔny eke wɛl b’ow ijr ɛy gbre. Ca ow anake ow ɛy a, ɔny uwr any.
Na sosiɛm, eke mi k’ɔtum m’ekum a, m’ɛrm Timote eke k’ow otar ɔny ec’ɔmn a e low akr ók’m, aŋke m’am ebr ɛrmij, ek’oglog ɛgŋ ɛju Ɛs a ɛju ɔny okr wus, ke juma eke si kok a el low ɔfr ɔfr ŋ̂.
Sica Timote anŋ ɔny ogŋ a ow ɛtŋ ɔb ɛy ɔny ec’ɔmn lel erur ab ec’amani, eke b’ɔkan ɛy e low sɛgŋ fɛŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn ɛtŋ am erurir eke k’ɛkan ɛy, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji s’am erur eke si k’ɛkn ɔny ab af.
Ow sosiɛm a, lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’ɔmn ec’amani e s’iri ɛy e sos es ɔw na ɛm lel ɛy e gbre ijr na ɛm ab a, ɛyr ɛy ɛrm es, atr ɛy sos es.
Sica sel ow ɛy ŋ̂, aŋke inymn es kikri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
Kɔ ayaf tasi si k’ɔŋn Nyam bia sos ɛm iŋn na eke s’ɔny, ɔny sosiɛm Nyam ec’any af ab ec’ee?
Ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab si b’at lebl es si ŋɔŋn Nyam eke li k’ɔŋ ɛy abusu bake ɛmɛny blel s’ɛ́kanin, ke si yíbr low yec’ek’anm ɔny ec’ɔmn ab ɛm a.
Ke blel ɛy Ɛs Nyam in obi lele ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ab kók ɛy ejagb bake s’ow s’ɛkn ɔny.
Ke blel Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔ́ŋ erur ek’ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm lel agŋ ec’ɛjeci e lís ab a, ágb bubu af ɛsɛ elel ek’ɔny ec’erur eke s’ɔny a agb ab af.
Ke blel l’úsur ɔny e mɛrm a, eel lala ke abr ɛnym kaka k’ánm ɔny ɛm Nyam ɛy Ɛs ec’any af, lɛgŋ ek’ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu b’ow ow lele in eci afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala a fɛŋ ab a.

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ow ek’ɛmɛny mi ki dad a el, ɛsɛ elel eke wewar ɛy e lís es an mamn ek’akpl Nyam sos ɛm, ke am kokr ɛbɛn a, s’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, s’ibrm ɔny atrm ɛm, ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm a, k’úcur ɔnyn es ɛbɛn iman anym eci akm na e kokr a.
Ɔny obi yɛji uwr low yec’eke si yɛgm ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm ab any.
Kin, ow eke Nyam am erur a: ke ɔny ec’es an a él lala in ec’any af; ke ɔ́sur sos nfaci ij e lís.
Ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam úw any ɔnyn sos es nfaci ij e lís, án es lala ɛm lele sos us ɛm ab,
ke kí yɛbm ów eŋuŋ ec’aw akam’n es ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl af.
Low na ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́ju lawl ki kok’r low ɔbr, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow jɛj agŋ e bi kok ów amua a eci low ok, ɛs’elel eke s’ikŋ anym si dad s’ayal s’ok ɔny ab af.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɛsŋm ɛy eke si k’anŋ sikpl owi ɛm, kɔ ów lala kok ɛm.
Na sosiɛm ɛgŋ ek’ɛgŋm low yɛgm na ebm a, ow elm ɛgŋ eci low yɛgm li digŋm l’ɛlum es, kɔ Nyam ek’ɔŋ ɔny in ec’Abŋ Lala a eci low yɛgm li digŋ l’ɛlu es.
Sica yec’ek’el agŋ lisijimɛl ɔfr ec’erur e low a, ow ɛbam eke wɛl ki nɔn lɛl awŋ ɔny, aŋke ɔny obi ɛm wewar Nyam ogŋ elel eke k’erurir ɔny ɔfr a.
Ɛtŋ erur ikŋ na e low anake am kokr Maseduan wus nimum af ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ e lís a. Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛmɛny s’am ibrm eke ki kokr ow akpl obn.
Àtar sos es ke ánŋn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke k’ɛ́ymn ɛgŋ e low ɛm, ke kókr juma ɔny obi ec’abu ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke si dad ɔny ab af,
yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ek’elm Krist e jam us ɛsɛl a, ɔ́ny ɔny ec’ɛlum. Ke ɔny ec’es abur a k’élm agŋ eci.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, s’erur eke k’uwr Krist e jam us ɛsɛl ek’uw a e lís e low any, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ánmn sɔrŋ ɛm ɛs’agŋ likpr a ek’ɔnym ɔmn ec’ab af.
Eke s’ub nawrɛ eke Jesu uw ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’anŋ owr a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam s’ub nawrɛ eke Nyam b’ow ɔŋ agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ ke uw a ɛ́wl ow in ab.
Sica kin yec’eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in e low yɛgm ɛm dad ɛy, ke s’am ɛlu ɔkm: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mowrer e lɛgŋ a, ɛy eke si b’ow s’anŋ owr a, si k’ow s’ikŋm agŋ ek’uw a ec’anym.
Lɛgŋ a, wɛl b’ow iri lebl nyam ikŋ ek’el Nyam ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs a e lebl lele Nyam e kɔkr e lebl ab ab, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow anŋ afr us es. Agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ ke uw a b’ow igb anŋ owr krɛkrɛ.
Ke sica, ow e jam a, ɛy eke lɛgŋ a si b’ow s’anŋ owr a, Nyam ɔ́ŋ ɛy s’igb ɛl ab jru ɛm s’ím s’ɔbr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ afr. Nɛnɛ anake si b’ow s’anŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
Ow sosiɛm, àtarir sos es ɔny ɔfr sodad amua ɛm.
Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, yec’ek’el sɛgŋ lele wanci ab ec’a, ow ibram eke wɛl ki nɔn lɛl awŋ ɔny,
aŋke ɔny obi yɛji uwr any tasi eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mowrer e lɛgŋ a b’ow okr ɛy es ɛsɛ elel eke ulu b’ow ncok ɛm ab af.

Lɛgŋ ab ɛm ek’agŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: "Low kaka anm, fɛŋ el ɛrm es ɛy a!" yogŋ anake lɛgŋ a b’ow okr ɛl es kpru ɛm ŋuŋn ɛl a. Ow b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ iy ɔnyn eke b’okr lok ab lis es ab af; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɛcm saw.
Kɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’a anmn ncebn ɛm eke lɛgŋ na k’okr ɔny es ɛsɛ ulu ec’ab af,
aŋke ɔny fɛŋ eel lɛgŋ owr lele usu ayl ab ec’ey. Ɛy s’elm lɛgŋ uk lele ncebn ab ec’ey.
Na sosiɛm ow itm eke si k’ɛru mɛmn ɛs’agŋ amua na ec’ab af, kɔ s’ánŋ any owr, ke low fɛŋ ɛm any ók ɛy es.
Mɛmn ɛru ɛsɛl a, lɛgŋ uk ɛm -li b’ɛru mɛmn; ɛtŋ mar ɛgŋ ɛsɛl a, lɛgŋ uk ɛm b’ɛgŋ mar am ɔny.
Kɔ ɛy eke s’el usu ayl ec’a, ow akpl eke si k’ók any es, ke s’óc ɛy ec’ɔmn lel erur ab ɛsɛ ar mob eke s’ok sos af, ke ɛy e sel ɛŋn ec’eku ánŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo tufɛ eke s’us af,
aŋke Nyam ɔɔm ɛy eke si k’im s’ɛy in ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm, kɔ ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɔ́ŋ ɛy sel ɛŋn.
In l’uw ɛy sosiɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɔŋ ɛy s’anŋ owr in ab, eke s’anŋ owr ɛtŋ s’uw yɛji.
Na sosiɛm, ɔ̀manin ów ke átarir sos es ɔmn ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke am kokr god’ɛtŋ ab af.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am dad ɔny eke k’ɔ́nyn agŋ ek’am kok juma ɔny ec’araŋn, yɛgm ɔny low, ke nyimn ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ec’ɛlum.
Ɔ̀nyn ɛl e sos usr nɔnɔ lele erur ab, juma eke -n’am kok a sosiɛm. Ànŋn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm ɔny ɔfr.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, ɛ̀nymn ɔkpɔrŋu abr; àtar agŋ eke sos ɔw es a sos es, ɛ̀lumn abŋ ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru a abu, ke ɔ́nyn low eku ɛgŋ fɛŋ e lís.
Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ócm low ŋuŋ ɔbarm low ŋuŋ any. Kɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ̀ɔl low nimamn e kok es ɔny ɔfr ɛm lel agŋ fɛŋ eci lís ab.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
Sakp sakp fɛŋ k’ɔ̀pir Nyam ŋɔŋn.
Ɔ̀ŋn Nyam bia low low fɛŋ ɛm. Na el low eke Nyam am ibrm eke ki kokr, ɔny ek’okar af Jesu Krist ab a.
K’ìrmnin Abŋ Lala ec’al ek’anŋ ɔny ɛm ab es.
K’ìfan odad eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ɔny ec’araŋn e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad ɔny a,
kɔ ìgbal low fɛŋ ogŋ ɛkan, ke úcur yec’ek’akpl a ɔnyn es.
Ke ɔ́nyan sos es low ŋuŋ fɛŋ e kok ɛm.

Ke Nyam ek’el ɛrm es ɛy e nuŋ a in obi áyal ɔny nimum; ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny ec’ɛgŋ el a nimum ek’el abŋ, liy, lele sos megl ab a él lala, ek’abr ɛnym kaka anm ɛm toŋ bake ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e mowrer e lɛgŋ a ów.
In eke n’am ɛsŋ ɔny a, li b’ow li kok ów amua fɛŋ iy nɛny, aŋke l’el cɛcɛ.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy yɛji ŋɔ́ŋan ɔŋn ɛy.
Bìbrmnin ɔny ɔfr ɛs’agŋ lisijimɛl af Krist ɛm.
M’am ŋɔŋn ɔny m’ok ɔny mɛrm sabu af, ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a, k’áwal lɛl na ókr agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab!
Pɔl, Silas lele Timote ab e lɛl ek’am awŋ Nyamel ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Tesaloni baŋn, ke el Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’agŋ:
Ke Nyam Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ, ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow akpl eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ, si k’ɛlu Nyam bia ɔny sosiɛm. Ow it eke si ki kok ɛbɛn, aŋke ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn a am bobn ɛtŋ ɔny ec’erur eke ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, am agb imn anym eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
Na sosiɛm, si bi dad ɔny e lís e low, s’aw ɔny Sinyamel ec’agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’as luku igŋ Nyam nuŋ a ec’any af, aŋke ɔny b’inymn es kikri ɔmn ɛm, gbre ijr lele sos es ɔw fɛŋ eke b’ɔbar ab ab ɛm.
Gbre ijr amua am yɛgm eke Nyam e jɛj ok a el nyim nyim. Tasi ɛm a, gbre ijr amua sosiɛm anake b’ow eel Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ek’am ijr ow e gbre a ec’agŋ tasi a.
Nyam el nɛnyɛmbri nyam Ɛs: ow sosiɛm agŋ ek’am ijr ɔny gbre a, ɛl yɛji li b’ow l’ijr wɛl gbre.
Ɛtŋ ɔny ek’am ijr gbre a, li b’ow l’ɛyr ɔny ɛrm es, ɔny lele ɛy ab, lɛgŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu b’ow anŋ afr ow in lele ɛrm ɛsɛl abusu ɛsɛl ab ab a.
Lɛgŋ a, li b’ow n’anŋ al ek’am iri ec’araŋn l’ɛy ɔkm, yec’ɛtŋ ke li kók agŋ eke uwm Nyam any, ke ɛ́luam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’Amani Mamn a low ŋuŋ.
-Li b’ow -n’ɛŋn gbre eke k’ow ɔnym uwr, ɛtŋ gbre ij akpasu na, b’ow ɔny kpab ɛl es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lís lele in ec’anygbɛl e lɛc ab ab e lís.
Low a b’ow ɛy lɛgŋ a ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ow a. Li b’ow l’ow yec’ɛtŋ k’agŋ a ek’el in eci ke ub’r nawrɛ a, úsr’r sos, kɔ́klm’n. Ɔny yɛji b’ow anŋn ɛl ɛm, aŋke ubr amani a eke s’ɔŋ ɔny a nawrɛ.

Na sosiɛm, sɛgŋ fɛŋ s’am ŋɔŋn Nyam s’ɔŋ ɔny yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e Nyam a ɛ́kn ɔny ɛsɛ agŋ eke it af, in ec’ɛsŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ ɔny ab ɛm. Ke in ec’abusu ab ɛm, l’ɛ́lum ɔny abu kokr low nimamn fɛŋ ek’am erurir a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn a ɛw gbagba!
Na ɛm a wɛl b’ow dad ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin mamn, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji -li b’ow -l’aw ɔny. Ow b’ow el ɛy e Nyam lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’ɔwrɔ ek’ɛŋan.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, yec’ek’el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e mowrer eke b’ow ɔny as ɛy luku in ab a ec’a, s’am ŋɔŋn ɔny,

kì yɛbr agŋ k’irmn ɔny nuŋ ɛm fafa, erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny. Eke batŋ ɛgŋ dad ɔny ow e low ɛsɛ odad eke Nyam ɔŋ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam dad af, oglog ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ɛjeci ec’odad af, oglog ɛsɛ lɛl eke s’awŋ ɔny ec’odad af yɛji, k’ùbr nawrɛ.
Kì yɛbr ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛju ɔny akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ b’ow igŋ Nyam ec’any uw a ɛlu es gbuŋ ke lɛgŋ a ów. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm anake Low ŋuŋ ɛs a, in a ek’it eke k’irm a b’ow ɛy ɔkm a.
Low ŋuŋ ɛs na b’ow ɛdŋn ob fɛŋ ek’el Nyam eci ke agŋ b’igŋ nuŋ a. Li b’ow l’igb ów amua fɛŋ e nuŋ af, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’im toŋ l’ɛy Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm li sig es, ke l’ócr in sosi ɛsɛ Nyam af.
Kɔ k’ɔknmn eke mi dad ɔny ów amua, ow a eke m’anŋ ɔny ab a ee?
Gbɛkɔ, uwr any eke low nyam anŋ eke caca ɛm a, am ɛdŋn Low ŋuŋ ɛs na eke k’ɛy ɔkm, toŋ bake lɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm a ów.
Low ŋuŋ ɛs a ec’abusu a ɔb nuŋ es lɔl ɛm am kok juma, ɛtŋ ek’ɛgŋ a ek’ucu ɔny’n es a k’ow anm ij a, li k’ow li kokm juma es lɔl ɛm ij.
Sica Low ŋuŋ ɛs a b’ow ɛy ɔkm, ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ŋúŋn’n trɛ trɛ trɛ, in e nɛnym e sel fuf ɛm, ke li kíkn ow es in e mowrer ec’usuayl eci jɛjn ab ɛm.
Low ŋuŋ ɛs a b’ow ow Satan e lɛc ab ab ɛtŋ li b’ow li kok mɛny ɛwr owi lele sakrowa yadŋ ɛm ab;
li b’ow l’oc low ŋuŋ fɛŋ l’ɛlu ɔkm l’ɛjur agŋ ek’am irm a, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ok wus. -Li b’ow -l’ok wus aŋke -l’ɛgŋm -l’ebm ɛtŋ -l’erurm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke blel sɔg ɛl a.
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam b’ow awŋ ɛl abusu ek’el irm ec’a yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ub yec’ek’el yadŋ a nawrɛ.
Na sosiɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ eke k’ow ubm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam nawrɛ, ke b’ow erur anŋ low ŋuŋ kok ɛm a, Nyam b’ow ɔb ɛl low luw eci.

Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ɔny a, ow it eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ si k’ɛlu Nyam bia ɔny eci, aŋke li sɔsum l’ot ɔny nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ eke li ki sɔg ɔny Abŋ Lala eke b’ɔŋ ɔny éel Nyam eci lele ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn low nawrɛ ɛm a ec’ab.
Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny in ec’Amani Mamn ec’odad eke si dad ɔny ab ɛm. L’ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’ɛŋan yec’a eke k’ɛbm ɔny ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm a.
Na sosiɛm, agŋ lisijimɛl, ìnymn es kikri ke úcur low yɛgm a eke s’ɔŋ ɔny odad ebl ɛm oglog lɛl ɛm ec’eke s’awŋ ɔny ab a ɔnyn es.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist in obi, lele Nyam ɛy Ɛs ab, ek’ɔny ɛy ec’erur ke ɔŋ ɛy bibm ɛm, sos es atr ek’ɔnym uwr lele low ɔmn tasi ab a,
yíbr ɔny ec’ɛrm a lokm susu, ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny lɛc kokr ów amamn ów kok ɛm lele odad ebl ɛm ab.
Sica lisijimɛl, ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam ɔŋn ɛy, yec’ɛtŋ ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad ebl a ɔ́mun es fafa, ke wɛl úsr’r sos ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɛcr ɔny ogŋ ab af.
Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke l’éb l’ɛlu ɛy es agŋ eŋuŋ lele lokm ŋuŋ ɛsɛl ab ec’abu ɛm, aŋke ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ɛgŋm ubm nawrɛ.
Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ el cɛcɛ, li b’ow l’usur ɔny ɛrm, ke l’ɔ́su ɔny agn e lís.
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ ɛy s’ɔny ɔmn ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ s’uw any tasi ek’am kokr ów a eke si dad ɔny a ɛtŋ ucur ɔnyn es am kokr.
Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyímn ɔny ec’ɛrm a Nyam ec’erur a lele Krist eci low eku ab ab e lís.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm s’am ibrm eke ki kpabr es agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ek’am ir ɛb kpɔrŋ ɛm, ke ɛ́gŋm low yɛgm a eke s’ɔŋ ɛl a ebm a e lís.
Ɔny obi yɛji uwr elel eke ki kokr ke ébr ɛy e lakr ab any, aŋke lɛgŋ eke s’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a, s’elm ɔ́rŋu.
Si yɛbm agŋ ɔɔm ɛy ob s’ijm ɔfr ɛm; kɔ ɛy obi s’ij gbre, s’ok law, si kok juma lɛc ɛm, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e gbagbl e low k’élm ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eci.
Si kok ɛbɛn, ow elm ke si k’ɔ́nym abusu eke si k’ibrm ɔny ec’abu ɛlum a eci, kɔ sɛwl mum eke si yɛgm ɔny eke k’ebr.
Ɛtŋ ow a eke s’anŋ ɔny ab a, si dad ɔny: ek’ɛgŋ erurm eke ki kok juma a, ow itm eke li k’ij ob.
Sica s’am dad ɔny low na, aŋke s’am iri ek’ɔny ɛm a, ɔ́rŋu anŋ ek’erurm eke ki kok low kaka, eke ow elm agŋ e low cɛ eke -li k’igb -l’ok ɛm.
Agŋ amua na, s’am dad ɛtŋ s’am ɔm ɛl ów ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, -li ki kok juma sɛgŋ fɛŋ ke -li gbagbal ɛl sosi.
Agŋ lisijimɛl ɔny ec’a, low mamn e kok k’am ɔny sos.
Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɛluam odad na ek’anŋ lɛl na eke s’ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm, ke ɛ̀bmnin in nyamn, ke k’ɛ́wmn mɛcrer in ab ij, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛ́s ɔ́ny’n.
Gbɛkɔ k’òcr ir ɛsɛ ifnu af, kɔ ɔ̀mn in ów ɛsɛ ɛgŋ lisijim af.
Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’el ɛrm es ɛy e nuŋ a, in obi ɔ́ŋ ɔny in ec’ɛrm es ɛy a sɛgŋ fɛŋ, low low fɛŋ ɛm. Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab!
Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm mi nɔn ɛsŋn na lɛl na ec’uwr ɛm. Ɛbɛn eke mi b’ɛwr ɛm e silɛl fɛŋ eke mi bi nɔn a mɛny ana.
Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
Ɛm Pɔl, Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs, Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy ec’ɔmn ob ab ec’abusu ɛm, m’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl na.
Ŋ Timote eke anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm ec’iy lokm tasi af ɔmn ɛm, ke Nyam Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy e Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɛ́dŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ, ɔ́ny ŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ ke ɔ́ŋ’ŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
Eke m’aam Maseduan a, m’ijl’ŋ nɛny eke k’anŋ Efɛs, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’am yɛgm agŋ ów yadŋ a, ɛ́dŋn ɛl ke -li ki kokmn ij.
Dàd ɛl -li wal ów a ek’agŋ ɛl obi ɔkn dad lel ɛl lagŋɛl e mew ec’es ɔsŋm owi e low a -l’ɛlu es, ow es atar cɛ ow b’is, ow ɛluam Nyam ec’es eb ɛlu e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es, ke wɛl uw any ɔmn ɛm a abu.
Low na eke b’ow dad a, b’ow ɔŋ ɛl ec’erur a agb: erur eke b’anŋ ɛrm lala ɛm ow, tutr mamn ɛm lel ɔmn tasi ɛm ab a.
Agŋ bɛb igŋ ejagb na ɛlu es ɛtŋ irm sodad ek’ɔnym any e dad ɛm.
-Li b’ocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛ Nyam ec’ol a ec’any uw ɛsɛl tasi af, gbɛkɔ -l’irimn ɛl obi e sodad eke -n’am dad a, ɛtŋ ów a ek’ow sosiɛm -li b’atar ów es a yɛji -l’irimn.
S’uw any eke Nyam ec’ol a el ob mamn, eke wɛl uw any kok ow e low ek’it a.

Wɛl ɔ́kn eke wɛl ɛwm ol agŋ eke bi kok ów amamn a eci; kɔ ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl lel agŋ ek’ɛ́luam ol ab ab sosiɛm wɛl b’ɛw ol, ɛsɛ: molokm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl, sikpl ɛsɛl, agŋ ek’ɛ́luam Nyam lel ob ek’el lala ab ab, agŋ eke b’ibi ɛl ɛsɛl oglog ɛl lisɛl lel agŋ ibiu fɛŋ ab.
Ɛmɛny wɛl b’ɛw ol agŋ eke b’ij nfaci a eci, egŋ eke b’ɛrum ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ab, agŋ eke b’ɔl madu ij, ayadŋu, agŋ eke b’ij daŋku yadŋ ɛm lel agŋ fɛŋ eke bi kok ów ek’elm low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ab eci.
Low yɛgm ikŋ na anŋ Amani Mamn a eke b’ɔŋ ɛy s’uw Nyam ec’anygbɛl ab any ab ɛm. Ɛɛ, Nyam eke el ehe fɛŋ eci nuŋ a anake abul’m Amani Mamn na a.
M’am ɛlu Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke ɔŋ’m lɛc, ɛm e juma kok ec’a bia. M’am ɛlu’l bia eke n’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm, ke l’ɛsŋ’m in e juma ab ɛm,
eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, mi dad in e lís ec’ów eŋuŋ, m’ijr’r gbre ɛtŋ mi wɛwr’r yɛji. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔny ɛm e sɔrŋ ikŋ, aŋke m’ɔnym ɔmn in ɛm ɛtŋ m’uwm low eke m’am kok ab any.
Ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛdŋ’m ɔwrɔ nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ’m ɔmn lel erur eke b’anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow ab ab.
Kin odad nawrɛ tasi ek’it ek’agŋ a fɛŋ k’eb: Jesu Krist ow wus na af sikpl ɛsɛl fɛŋ e sɔg eci. M’el ɛl ɛm e ligbɛl tasi,

gbɛkɔ ow sosiɛm anake Nyam ɔny ɛm e sɔrŋ ikŋ a: l’erur eke Jesu Krist k’ɛcr ɛm eke m’el sikpl ɛsɛl ab ɛm e ligbɛl tasi a yɛgm in e low eku eke n’ɔny, ke ow él sɛwl agŋ a eke lɛgŋ anym ɛm b’ow ub’r nawrɛ, ke b’ow ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym nuŋ a eci.
Sos usr lele anygbɛl ab él Ɛb ebu a ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɔnym uw, wɛl ɛ́knm ke el Nyam nyam coco a eci! Amɛn.
Ɛm jim Timote m’am abul’ŋ low yɛgm na, ɛsɛ elel eke ŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ikŋ anym dad ɛw es ŋ e lís ab af. Ke sodad amua átr’ŋ sos es ɔŋ ogŋ mum mamn a,
ŋ ec’ɔmn a lele ŋ e tutr mamn ab ab ɛm. Agŋ nyam nyam ɛgŋm ɔsum ɛl e tutr mamn a, ow ɔŋ -l’irmn ɛl ec’ɔmn a.
Agŋ ab ɛm Imene lele Alesandr ab yɛji anŋ; m’ot m’ok ɛl Satan abu ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ ɛjeci -li k’ɔbrmn Nyam any.
Low krɛkrɛ eke m’am dad eke wɛl ki kok agŋ fɛŋ ec’a el: ke wɛl ŋɔ́ŋn Nyam íbrm’n low, kók sɔrŋ ke ɛ́lu’l bia.
Ow it eke wɛl ki ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔŋ ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ lel agŋ fɛŋ ek’ɔnym es ɛw ab a, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́tu s’ir ɛb ek’ɛrm mij anm ɛm, ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, sos us ɛm, Nyam ec’es ucu ɔny tasi ɛm.
Na anake akpl ke el sɔbɔ Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs,
eke b’erur ek’agŋ fɛŋ k’ɛŋn sel, ke ɔ́tu uw low nɛnyɛmbri nyam any a.
Tasi ɛm a Nyam nyam cɛ anŋ, ɛtŋ in lel agŋ ab ec’araŋn a yɛji ɛgŋ nyam cɛ anŋ, ɛgŋ a in l’el Jesu Krist
ek’ocr in sosi ɛw awoba agŋ a fɛŋ e sɔg eci. Ek’ow e lɛgŋ a ow a, l’ɛlu ɔkm li yɛgm eke Nyam erur ek’agŋ fɛŋ k’ɛŋn sel.
Na sosiɛm anake Nyam ɛw’m lebl ɛlu ɛs lel ɛrm ɛs ab, ke mi yɛ́gm agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl yec’eke el ɔmn lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab a. M’ɔnym yadŋ, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam m’am dad.
M’erur ek’usu fɛŋ, egŋ ki gbigbl sabu ogŋ afr ŋɔŋn Nyam, gbɛkɔ Nyam ŋɔŋn a él ɛrm lala ɛm, ɛrm ek’ɛrm bebl lel ów es atar ab anm ɛm.
M’erur yɛj’eke ɔyɔw ki s’us mob ek’it, mob frafra cɛ, ke ow k’elm low agbr ɛm; ke -li ki kokmn sin ek’agŋ k’ɛkn ɛl, -li k’okmn sika ɛm miyob, miyob ac lele mob sus ɛm eke b’il an nɔnɔ ab,
kɔ ke ɛl e sakpl a él ów amamn e kok, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ek’ɔyɔw eke bi dad ɛsɛ ɛl b’ɛlum Nyam a, ki kok ab af.
Ow it ek’ɔyɔw k’ok es tiŋ iri low yɛgm a, ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm.
M’ɛlum abusu es eke yɔw ki yɛgm igŋ low oglog ɛw igŋ es; ow it eke li ki yewal tiŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, Adam anake Nyam ikŋ anym kok a, ɛtŋ ow e jam a li kok Ɛv.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ow elm Adam yɛbm wɛl ɛjum’n, kɔ yɔw yɛb wɛl ɛju’r ɛtŋ ɛluam Nyam ec’odad ebl a.
Ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam b’ow sɔg’r in ec’ey eke li b’ow l’ew ab ɛm, gbɛkɔ ow it eke li k’ɔny ɔmn, erur, ke l’ír ɛb eke elm low agbr ɛm ke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm.
Kin odad nawrɛ tasi: eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’el Nyamel ec’idr ɛs, ke juma sɛnyn l’erur a.
Ow akpl eke Nyamel ec’idr ɛs k’el ɛgŋ ek’abr ɛnym anm lís; yɔw nyam ec’igŋ, ɛgŋ eke b’ok sos es low ɛm, ke b’ɔny any es ok. Ke n’ɔ́ny es an mamn, l’él ɛgŋ eke b’eb etu, ke ɔtu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low.
Li k’élm mar ɛgŋu, li k’ɔ́nym gaŋgaŋ, kɔ l’él frɔrɔ lel ɛrm es ɛyr ɛs ab. Li k’élm ɛgŋ e b’erur os owi,
kɔ l’él ɛgŋ ek’ɔtu eke ki nyimn in obi ec’akŋ a, ɛgŋ ek’in ec’ey a b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum.
Tasi ɛm a, ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɔ́tum nyimnm in obi ec’akŋ a, ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki nyimn Nyamel ee?
Li k’él ɛgŋ ek’itŋn ɛrm ɛm owr owr; ek’ow el ɛgŋ ɛbɛn, li b’ow l’eb sos ɛw abu ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔny es abur ɛsɛ agn ec’ab af.
Ow it yɛji ek’agŋ ek’ubm Krist nawrɛ a k’ɛlum’n, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ɔ́nym cak, ke li k’ɛ́ym agn e simeb e b’uk ab ɛm.
Diakrɛl yɛji it ek’el agŋ eke k’us sos, ke ɔ́ny nɛnyɛmbri nyam yɛji; ow itm eke -li k’ɛgŋ mar nɔnɔ, -l’ɔl yadŋ ɛm eci os ɔny es;
ke -l’ucu low nawrɛ ek’ɛy ɔkm Krist ec’ɔmn e -n’ɔnyn ab ɛm a -n’ɔny es tutr lala ɛm.
Ow it ke wɛl íkŋ anym ɛbm ɛl ɛkn; ek’ow e jam a wɛl ɛknm low ɔbr ɛl e lís a, ke sica -li kok juma ɛsɛ diakrɛl af gɔŋ.
Ɔyɔw eke el diakrɛl a yɛji it eke k’el agŋ eke k’us sos. Ow itm eke -li ki dad ɛl lawlɛl e lís ec’odad eŋuŋ; ow it ke -n’ɔny any es ok, ke -li kok cɛcɛ low low fɛŋ ɛm.
Ow it eke diakr k’el yɔw nyam ec’igŋ, ke n’ɔ́ny abusu eke li ki nyimn in ec’ey a, lel in ec’akŋ a nimum ab mɛwl ɛm.
Diakrɛl eke bi kok ɛl e juma mɛwl ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow usr ɛl sos ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’ɔny lokm susu ligbɛl ɔmn a ek’ɔny okr ɛy af Krist ab ab ɛm.
M’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl na, kɔ m’am tutr eke mi k’ow m’ɛkn’ŋ lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm.
Gbɛkɔ eke mi k’owm, b’ow ɛkn elel eke k’aan es Nyam e bosu ab ɛm lɛl na e m’am awŋ’ŋ ab ɛm. Nyam e bosu a el Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’agŋ a, ek’ucu low nawrɛ ɔny es a.

Tasi, low a e lɔl es ke ɛy ɔkm ɛy ec’ɔmn ab ɛm a agb nɔnɔ! Low a el: Krist ɛy ɔkm ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af, Abŋ Lala ɛlu’l ɔkm ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛkn’n. Wɛl ɔb in ec’amani ok sɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ a, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ub’r nawrɛ wus af aŋa, ɛtŋ n’im afr anygbɛl ɛm.
Abŋ Lala dad ɛrum mar ninɛ: sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, agŋ bɛb b’ow igŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɛlu es, ke ús sow tutr yadŋ lele low yɛgm eke b’anŋ abŋ eŋuŋ ɛm ow a jam.
Agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl lel ayadŋu ab b’ow irmn ɛl. Agŋ amua, el agŋ eke Nyam owi am dadm low kaka, ke ɛl e sow tutr a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke wɛl oc lowi gbagba ɛwr mɛny af.

Agŋ amua ɛl eci low yɛgm ab ɛm b’ow dad ek’ow itm ek’agŋ k’ɛbirir, -li b’ow -l’ɛdŋn mob bɛb eke wɛl b’ij a. Kɔ Nyam kok ob ij amua yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ, ke uw low nawrɛ any a, ɔ́ŋ’n bia ke íj.
Ob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a akpl; kaka anm ɛm eke wɛl k’igŋ ɛlu es, gbɛkɔ b’eb a k’ɔ́pim eke k’ɛlu Nyam bia,
aŋke Nyam odad lele Nyam ŋɔŋn ab b’ɔŋ ob fɛŋ el nimamn Nyam ec’any af.
Eke b’oc low yɛgm na ɛlu ɔkm agŋ lisijimɛl ɛm, b’ow el Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs mamn, ɛtŋ b’ow yɛgm ek’ɔmn e sodad ebl a lele low yɛgm tasi a ek’ɛŋn Abŋ ɛm a, b’iyr’ŋ lok.
Gbɛkɔ ìgŋ sawl odad eke low kaka anm ɛm ke ókrm af ɔmn ab a ɛ̀lu es, ke ɔ́tur sos akŋm Nyam ab ŋ ec’ɛb ir ɛm.
Sos ɔtur sos megl af ec’a el low akplu, kɔ low tɛl ɛm cɛ. Kɔ Nyam ec’akŋm ab a el low ek’akpl low fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ow b’ɔŋ ɛy s’ir ɛb Nyam ab yɛfɛnyna ɛm ɛtŋ ow b’ɛwar ɛy lɛgŋ anym ɛm ec’ɛb ir a.
Na el odad ebl tasi ek’it eke agŋ fɛŋ k’ɛgŋ eb.
Tasi ɛm a, s’am ij gbre si kok juma ɛtŋ s’am atr sos es, aŋke s’oc ɛy e low ɔmn s’ɛlu Nyam ek’anŋ owr ke el agŋ fɛŋ e Sɔg Ɛs ab ɛm, ab brobro agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a.
Kin ów eke kí dad ke yɛ́gm agŋ.
Kì yɛb ɛgŋ kaka k’iir’ŋ es aŋke el ŋgbafrɛli sosiɛm; kɔ èl agŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a e sɛwl: ŋ e sodad ebl ɛm, es an ɛm, erur ɛm, ɔmn ɛm lele ŋ e lala el tasi ɛm ab.
Gbuŋ ke m’ów a, àt any awl Nyam e Silɛl a dedeku ec’any af, ɔ̀m ɛl ów ke yɛ́gm ɛl low.
K’ìjl Nyam ec’ob ap a ek’ɔny anŋ’ŋ ɛm ab es, yec’a ek’ɛŋn lɛgŋ a eke ŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad ow e low, ke agŋ ekpekp a at’ŋ abu nuŋ a.
Àt any kok ów amua fɛŋ, òcr ŋ sosi nimum ɛlu juma eke wɛl abul’ŋ ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ɛ́kn ŋ ec’anym imn a.
Ɔ̀sur ŋ sosi lele ŋ e low yɛgm ab ab. Ìnym es kikri ow af. Tasi ɛm a, eke bi kok ɛbɛn, b’ow ebr ŋ sosi ɛlu es ɛtŋ b’ow eb agŋ a eke b’iri ŋ e sodad a yɛji.
Eke anŋ ɛgŋ likpekp ab, kì dad’r odad lɛc ɛm, kɔ ɔ̀m’n ów lebl es ok ɛm ɛsɛ asŋ cɛ ow’n el af. Òc ŋgbafrɛ oto ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl af,
ɔyɔw ekpekp ɛsɛ esŋɛl af, ededyɔw oto ɛsɛ esŋ jɔwɛl af ɛrm lala tasi ɛm.
Ɛ̀w eŋnyɔw ek’ɔnym agŋ a e low any.

Gbɛkɔ eke iŋnyɔw nyam ɔny ey oglog alaw ek’ɔtu eke ki kok in e lís e low a, ke -li wewr -l’ɛlu ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɔkm ɛl obi ec’akŋ a e lís, ke ow ɔ́ŋ -l’ɔwr ɛl ec’agŋ a ec’ów eke kok ɔŋ ɛl a, aŋke ow el low eke Nyam erur.
Iŋnyɔw ek’ɔnym ɛgŋ kaka eke ki kok in e lís e low a, oc in ec’ɔmn a ɛw Nyam af, ɛtŋ li bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab l’ibrm ow abu ɛlum.
Gbɛkɔ iŋnyɔw eke b’us in ec’ów aw owi jam a, abŋ ɛm a l’uw ŋ̂, eke n’anŋ owr sos megl ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
Low na anake it eke k’ɔkn ɛl a, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl k’ɛ́ŋnm abr ɛnym owi ɛl e lís.
Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɛ́wm in ec’agŋ e lís e low any, ab brobro in obi ec’akŋ ec’agŋ a, l’ɛgbr in ec’ɔmn a ɛtŋ n’uŋ l’akm ɛgŋ ek’ubm Krist nawrɛ a.
Gbuŋ ke nɔ́n iŋnyɔw nyam e nin eŋnyɔw e lɛl ab ɛm a, ow it eke li k’ɔny akpo ekŋ nyahan. Ke l’él yɔw ek’ɔny igŋ akp nyam cɛ,
ke wɛl úw’r any in ec’ów amamn kok ɛm, ke l’él yɔw eke gbagbl in ec’ey a mɛwl ɛm, ɔny ɛrm mamn etu ec’eb ɛm, ɔŋ agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ a mij yɔyɔg akr es, atm gbre ɛsɛl abu ke kok ów amamn nɔnɔ gbɛl.
Eŋnyɔw ek’anŋ ŋgbafrɛ a, k’ɛ̀lu ɛl nin lɛl ab ɛm, aŋke igŋ ɛbi owi b’ow ɛl nuŋ ɛm a, -li b’igŋ Krist -l’ɛlu es,
ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ ɛl -n’ɔny jɛj ok aŋke -l’irmn ɛl e krɛkrɛ e nɛny ij a ow e lís.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, eke -n’ɔnym low kaka eke -li ki kok a, -li b’eb akŋ akŋ ec’ɛc abu ɛm; ɛtŋ yec’eke akplm tasi a el ke -n’am cacak agŋ, -n’am dad ów ek’otm ɛl es, -n’am bebar nɛnym low fɛŋ ɛm.
Na sosiɛm m’erur ek’eŋnyɔw ŋgbafrɛ a k’ɛwl ɛbi egŋ, ew ey, ke nyímn ɛl ec’akŋ a mɛwl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ɔɔmn ɛy ec’efnu a abusu dadm ɛy ów eŋuŋ.
Tasi ɛm a, eŋnyɔw ab ɛm nyam nyam ŋgboŋ ejagb nyim nyim ab af, am us Satan jam.
Eke nawrɛ ub lis nyam ec’agŋ ab ɛm eŋnyɔw anŋ, ow it eke li k’ɛlum wɛl abu, ke li k’ígŋm l’ɛlum wɛl es eke Nyamel k’ɛkn ɛl e lís owi. Ke ow ɔ́ŋ Nyamel ɔtu ɛlum eŋnyɔw ek’anŋ ɛl sɔny a abu.
Agŋ ekpekp a eke bi nyimn Nyamel mɛwl ɛm a it eke k’ɛŋn labm sɔg yony, ab brobro ɛl a eke b’ij gbre dad Nyam odad, ke bi yɛgm agŋ low a.
Low tasi eke Nyam Lɛl dad a el: K’ow ocmn meb ɔnynmn id eke wɛl ucu meb am kikn may es a nɛny es, ɛtŋ: Juma kok ɛs it eke k’ɛŋn in e labm sɔg.
Eke wɛl oc ɛgŋ likpekp nyam eke wɛl am ok ów af ow ŋ ec’any af, k’ɛ̀gŋ ow e low k’eb, eke irim adaŋku yony oglog nyahan e nɛnym.
Agŋ yec’eke kok sikpl owi a, ɛ̀nym ɛl abr dedeku a nimum ec’any af, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ likpr a úru low.
Kin low yec’eke m’am ibrm’ŋ tasi ɛm Nyam ec’any af, Jesu Krist ec’any af lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eke Nyam sɔsum ot ab ab ec’any af: ɛ̀lum ów amua ke ow k’elm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛm, ke k’ánm ɛgŋ kaka jam.
K’ògŋ es k’at ɛgŋ abu nuŋ k’abul il juma Nyamel ɛm. K’ɛ̀lu abu awlŋɛl e sikpl owi ɛm; ŋ obi a ànŋ lala.
K’ɛ̀gŋ mij sɔny coco cɛ, kɔ ɛ̀gŋ mar tɛl ŋ eci lokm a sosiɛm, aŋke ɔl ɔ́wm’ŋ ɔny.
Agŋ bɛb e sikpl a b’ɛru es kpata wɛl ɛkn gbuŋ eke wɛl ki jɛj ɛl e low ok a, kɔ agŋ likpr ec’a, jɛj ok a b’uwr gbuŋ ɛtŋ wɛl b’ɛkn ɛl e sikpl a.
Ów amamn yɛji wɛl b’ɛkn ɛl kpata, ɛtŋ ɛl a eke wɛl ɛ́knm kpɛkŋ a yɛji ánm es lɔl ɛm ibnm.
Agŋ a fɛŋ eke el madu a it eke k’ɔny ɛlum nɔnɔ ligbɛl ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a e lís, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka kí dadm low ŋuŋ okm Nyam e nin a lel ɛy e low yɛgm ab ab af.

Madu a eke ɔny es ɛw ɛsɛl eke el nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a, wɛl el ɛl lisijimɛl. Ɛɛ nawrɛ! Gbɛkɔ ow elm na sosiɛm -li k’ɔbrmn wɛl any. Tasi ɛm a, wɛl e lís owi anake it eke -li ki kok tasi a, aŋke agŋ a eke -n’am kok juma -n’ɔŋ a, el ɔmn ɛsɛl eke Nyam erur. Kin low ek’it eke ki yɛgm agŋ ke ɔ́ŋ ɛl -li kok a.
Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am yɛgm agŋ low ɛjeci ɛtŋ n’am igŋ ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e sodad tasi a lele low yɛgm a eke el ɛy ec’ɔmn ec’ab ab l’ɛlu es,

ke l’el ɛgŋ eke es ɛfu iy ɛm gbɔŋ ɛtŋ l’uwm low kaka any. L’el ɛgŋ e b’erur ów es atar owi ke b’ogŋ mum odad ebl sosiɛm. Yogŋ ɛm ec’ów eke b’anŋ ow a el: nyamn ɛyr, ów ɛsu, ɛgŋ wɛwr, sow tutr yadŋ ɛgŋ e lís,
lel ów es atar eke úwrm, ke b’anŋ agŋ eke nuŋ ɛm okm es, ke irmn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e dad a ec’araŋn. -Li bi tutr ek’ɔmn eke wɛl b’ɔny Nyam ɛm a el ebr eke wɛl b’eb ɔnyn ob af.
Tasi, ɔmn eke wɛl b’ɔny Nyam ɛm a el ob ɔny ligbɛl, eke wɛl b’ɛgŋ yec’a cɛ eke wɛl ɔny a eb.
Tasi ɛm a, s’isam ob kaka ab wus na af ɛtŋ si k’ow s’ɔtum s’ɛwlam ob kaka ab.
Na sosiɛm eke s’ɔny ob ij lele mob sus ɛm ab cɛ, ke ow ɔdŋ ɛy ŋ̂.
Agŋ eke b’erur eke k’ɔny ob a, b’ɛy mɛju owi ɛm ɛtŋ low aw nɔnɔ lele low ŋuŋ ab b’ɔgŋm ɛl meb ɛtŋ b’ɔny ok ɛl wus ŋuŋn ɛl.
Tasi ɛm a os ec’erur anake el ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ e min a. Agŋ bɛb ec’a, os a ec’ɔny e low aw afŋn ɛl es toŋ ɛtŋ -li kpab es ɔmn e lís ɛtŋ -l’ijr ɛl ec’ɛrm a gbre ow sosiɛm.
Gbɛkɔ ŋ eke el Nyam ec’ɛgŋ a, àru ów amua fɛŋ ɛgb es. Ɔ̀l nɛny nyam ij es, ùcu Nyam ɔny es, ìr ɛb ɔmn ɛm, erur ɛm, low eku ɛm lele frɔrɔ el ɛm ab.
Ògŋ ɔmn ɛm e mum mamn a, ùcu sel ek’ɔnym uwr a ɔny es aŋke Nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ eke k’uw sel ɛŋn ikŋ na any, lɛgŋ a ek’agŋ nɔnɔ ec’any af ij ŋ ec’ɔmn tasi ek’ɔny e daŋku a.
M’am ijl’ŋ nɛny Nyam eke b’ɔŋ ob fɛŋ sel ec’any af lele Jesu Krist ek’ij ɔmn tasi e n’ɔny a e daŋku Pɔns Pilat ec’any af a e nin ɛm.
Ɛ̀lum ów a eke mi dad’ŋ a, ɔ̀su ów a lala ɛm ek’abr ɛnym k’ánm ɛm toŋ bake igŋ lɛgŋ a ek’ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist b’ow ɛwl ow a.
Ɛgŋ a eke b’ow ɔŋ Krist ɛwl ow lɛgŋ a eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es a el Nyam. L’el ehe e nuŋ lel ob fɛŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs ab, ɛ́b ebu ɛm ec’Ɛb ebu lele kɔtɔkɔɛl ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ ab.
In cɛ li k’ɔtum l’uwm. L’ir usuayl usu ek’ɛgŋ k’ɔtum titam. Ɛgŋ kaka ɛknm’n ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛknm’n. Sos usr lele abusu ab él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
Dàd wus na af ec’egbreŋgbi a, -li k’ɛwr sos, -li k’ocr ɛl ec’ɔmn a -li k’ɛwr ob ɔny na eke b’uwr ab af, kɔ -l’oc ɛl ec’ɔmn a -l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm, in eke li b’ɔŋ ɛy ob fɛŋ ɛrm mamn ɛm ɛy e low kok ec’a.
Dàd ɛl -li kok ów amamn, -l’ij gbreŋgbi ów amamn kok ɛm, -l’el ɛ́rm mamnu ke -l’el agŋ eke bi cɛc ob ɛl lawlɛl ab.
Eke -li bi kok ɛbɛn, -li b’ow -l’as ob ɔny mamn ek’ɔnym uwr a luku lɛgŋ anym ɛm eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɛŋn owr anŋ nawrɛ tasi a.
Libɔwi Timote, ɔ̀su mɛwl ɛm yec’a eke Nyam abul’ŋ a. Àru nɛnym ot eke low kaka anm ɛm, ke ókrm af ɔmn ab a lele sodad ek’agŋ b’ub nuŋ ɛm ɔny e sodad a ɛgb es.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bɛb ij nɛny dad eke ɛl ɔny nuŋ ɛm ɔny ikŋ na ɛtŋ -li kpab es ɔmn e lís. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny ab.
Ɛm Pɔl, m’el Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur. Wɛl abul’m eke mi k’ɔb sel ɛŋn a eke wɛl ɛwar ow e low ɛw es, ke anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm a ec’amani.
Timote ɛm ec’iy e m’erur, ŋ anake m’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl na a. Ke Nyam Ɛs lel Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɛ́dŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ, ɔ́ny ŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ ke ɔ́ŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
Nyam a eke mi bi kok in e lís e low tutr tasi ɛm ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛm lagŋɛl kok ab af a, m’am ɛlu’l bia. Ncok lel lɛgŋ owr ab mi b’ɔkn ŋ e low ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm ɛtŋ mi b’ɛlu Nyam bia sakp sakp fɛŋ ŋ eci.
M’am ɔkn ŋ e mikŋ a e low ɛtŋ m’am erur tasi eke mi k’ɛkn’ŋ bake m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn.
Ŋ ec’ɔmn nawrɛ tasi a ek’ɔny Jesu Krist ɛm a e low anŋ’m sos ɛm, ɔmn a ek’alaŋ Lois lel esŋ Enis ab ikŋ anym ɔny gbuŋ ke ɔny a. M’ub nawrɛ tasi eke ŋ yɛji ɔny.
Ow sosiɛm m’am ɔkn’ŋ: ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ’ŋ lɛgŋ a eke m’at’ŋ abu nuŋ a, òkr’r meb ɛm,
aŋke Abŋ a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛy a, ɔɔm ɛy s’ɛwm dra dra. Tasi ɛm a, in ec’Abŋ a b’ɔŋ ɛy lɛc, erur lele low ɛm eci sos es ok ab.
Ɛ́s k’ɔ́ny’ŋ ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci daŋku ij ɛm; ɛ́s k’ɔ́ny’ŋ ɛm e lís eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm in sosiɛm a eci. Kɔ ìj gbre ɛm ab Amani Mamn a sosiɛm, lɛc a eke Nyam b’ɔŋ’ŋ ab ɛm.

Nyam anake eb ɛlu ɛy es ke ɛsŋ ɛy eke si k’el in ec’a; ow elm ɛy ec’ów amamn eke si kok a sosiɛm, kɔ ow el in obi e low eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es, ɛtŋ ow el bibm ɔfr ɛm eke n’ɔŋ ɛy Jesu Krist ɛm gbuŋ eke wus k’ɔb nuŋ a.
Gbɛkɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, l’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs Jesu Krist ec’ow na ɛm, aŋke Jesu Krist ɔny luw ec’abusu a oc es ɛtŋ Amani Mamn ab ɛm li yɛgm owr anŋ a eke úwrm a.
Nyam oc’m eke mi k’ɔb Amani Mamn na eci kokoba ɛsɛ ɛrm ɛs lele low yɛgm ɛs ab af,

ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm anake m’am ij gbre amua a. Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny ɛrm susu ligbɛl aŋke m’uw ɛgŋ a eke m’oc ɛm ec’ɔmn a m’ɛlu ɛm ab any ɛtŋ m’ub nawrɛ tasi eke n’ɔny abusu eke Jesu Krist e lís ec’Amani a eke n’ɔŋ’m a, li k’ɔsu toŋ ke ow ít jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a.
Òc ɛsɛ sɛwl af sodad nawrɛ a eke mi dad’ŋ a dadr odad, ke ɔmn a lel erur ab ab a eke s’ɔny Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, íj lɛc ow ɛm.
Ɔ̀su Amani Mamn a eke wɛl abul’ŋ a Abŋ Lala a ek’ir ɛy ɛm a e nin ɛm.
Ɛsɛ elel ek’uw any ab af, Azi ogog ec’ɛm lawlɛl a fɛŋ wal ɛlu’m es. Fijɛl lel Ɛrmojɛn ab anŋ ɛm.
Ow akpl eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ k’ɛ́lu in ec’ɛrm mamn a ɔkm Onesifɔr e bosu a e lís, aŋke sakp nɔnɔ li b’atr’m sos es ɛtŋ sobel ɛm eke m’anŋ a, ɛm owi ec’ɛ́s ɔnym’n;
Ow ɔŋ, eke l’ow Rom a, l’igŋ nuŋ es l’ɔl’m es toŋ n’ɛŋn’m.
Ow akpl eke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ k’ɔŋ abusu n’ɛ́ŋn Nyam ogŋ eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a. Efɛs yogŋ ec’abu ɛlum eke m’ɛŋn in ɛm a, uw any sɛnyn sɛnyn.
Ŋ, ɛm jim, ɛ̀ŋn ŋ e lɛc a bibm eke b’anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow ɛŋn ɛy ab ɛm.
Low yec’a ek’iri mi dad adaŋku nɔnɔ ec’any af a, òc abul agŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛl ɛm eke b’ow ɔtu ɔny lɛc, ɛl yɛji oc im yɛgm agŋ ɛjec’a.
Ŋ yɛji gbre ek’it eke k’ɛbm’ŋ ɛsɛ Jesu Krist ec’ar ogŋ ɛs mamn af a, ɛ̀gŋ eb.
Ar ogŋ ɛs mamn ek’ɛgŋ ar ogŋ e low eb, ke am erur ek’in ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a k’aw’r a, li kókm agŋ ɛm ec’ów a eke agŋ ek’elm ar ogŋ ɛsɛl a bi kok a ij.
Mum ogŋ ɛs ek’am ogŋ mum a, ke n’ɛ́ŋn ow ec’ob ap ek’anŋ ɛm a, ow it eke li k’ɛlum mum ogŋ a e sol a.
Wus juma kok ɛs it eke k’ij gbre kok juma, gbuŋ ke n’ɛ́ŋn ow ec’egb ey a l’ij.
Tùtr ów amua eke m’am dad a sɛnyn sɛnyn, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɛlum’ŋ abu iri fɛŋ ow ok’ŋ es sos ɛm.
Ɔ̀kn Jesu Krist ek’el David e bosu ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ke anŋ luw ɛm igb ɛsɛ elel eke Amani Mamn a eke m’am ɔb ow e kokoba a dad ab af a.
Amani Mamn na sosiɛm anake m’am ij gbre, ke wɛl okm ŋgbraka ɛsɛ low ŋuŋ kok ɛs af a. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’odad a in wɛl okm’n ŋgbraka.
Na sosiɛm m’am ɛgŋ low fɛŋ m’eb agŋ a eke Nyam sɔsum ot a e nimamn eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl yɛji -n’ɛŋn sel ɛŋn a eke b’ow anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow a, lel anygbɛl a ek’ɔnym uwr ab ab.
Kin odad nawrɛ tasi: Eke s’uw Krist ab, si b’ow s’anŋ owr in ab;
eke si b’inym es kikri, si b’ow s’el es ɛw ɛsɛl in ab; eke si b’igŋ s’ɛlu’l es, in yɛji li b’ow l’igŋ l’ɛlu ɛy es;
ek’ɛy s’elm cɛcɛ, ke in gbɛ l’el cɛcɛ, aŋke li k’ɔtum l’ɛgbram in sosi.
Ɔ̀kn agŋ a fɛŋ ów a ek’iri a, ke íbrm tasi Nyam ec’any af eke -li k’ɛsumn ów sodad ebl sosiɛm. Ów ɛsu amua elm low kaka, ow el agŋ a eke b’iri a ec’irmn cɛ.
Ŋ ec’a, àtr sos es ke Nyam ec’any af a él gbawru, ɛsɛ juma kok ɛs ek’itm ek’ɛ́s k’ɔny in e juma e li kok a eci, ke am ɔb nɛny nyam ɛm low nawrɛ ec’amani a.
Ów es atar ɔfr ɔfr a, ek’elm ɔmn ec’a, àru ɛgb es, aŋke agŋ a eke b’anŋ ow ec’ów ɛm a, ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛl -n’am kpab es Nyam e lís.
Ɛl eci sodad ebl a b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ lɛbi ek’ugŋ es ke am ij sos megl a lokm ɛm ab af. Agŋ amua ɛm anake Imene lele Filɛt ab anŋ a.
-Li digŋ low nawrɛ a -l’ɛlu es. -N’am dad eke Nyam in ɔny agŋ in igbm luw ɛm lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ, ow ɔŋ -n’am ŋuŋn agŋ nɔnɔ ec’ɔmn a.

Gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’odad ebl nawrɛ tasi a eke sigm es ɛsɛ êl eci lebn eke wɛl ɛlu nɔmu ɛm af a, itŋnm. Kin sodad eke wɛl nɔn af yogŋ a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ uw agŋ ek’el in ec’ab any. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl igŋ af eke: Ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke bi dad ɛsɛ in el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a, ɔtu eke ki kpab es low ŋuŋ e lís.

Êl ligbɛl nyam ɛm, ow elm sikpokpo eke wɛl kok sika ɛm lele jɛtɛ ufu ɛm ab cɛ ánm, kɔ kpokpo eke wɛl aku ekŋ ɛm lele yec’eke wɛl kok kpeŋ ɛm ab yɛji b’anŋ. Ek’es gbɛgbl b’anŋ a, jɛtɛ ufu ɛm lele sika ɛm e sikpokpo a wɛl b’ot, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ ɔfr ɔfr ɛm ec’a, wɛl b’ot ekŋ ɛm lele kpeŋ ɛm ab ec’a.

Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ocr sos es ów yadŋ na fɛŋ ɛm a, b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo amamn a eke wɛl b’ijr ob es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab af. Wɛl b’ow oc ɛw’r es in ec’Es Ɛw a eci. Li b’ow n’anŋ ow e juma eci ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow oc kokr’r juma nimamn fɛŋ.
Àru ŋgbafrɛ ɛm e low aw fɛŋ ɛgb es; ɔ̀l ɛb ir nyim nyim, ɔmn, erur lele ɛrm es ɛy ab es, agŋ a ek’ɛrm lala ɛm b’ɛsŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ab.
Ów es atar ɔfr ɔfr eke low kaka anm ɛm a, àru ɛgb es, aŋke uw any ek’ow b’ɛdŋ nuŋ ów ɛsu ɛm.
Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma kok ɛs itm eke k’ɛsu ów. Ow it ek’in e low k’akpl agŋ fɛŋ e lís, ɛgŋ ek’ɔtu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low, ke ɛ́gŋ agŋ eci cak eke bi cak’r a e low eb.
Ow it ek’ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm, li ki yɛgm agŋ a eke b’oc’r odad es nɛnym a low, aŋke Nyam ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ ɛl abusu -l’itŋn ɛl ec’es an a, ke -l’uw low nawrɛ any.
-Li b’ow -n’ŋgboŋ agn eci meb a ek’ucu ɔny ɛl es ab ɛm, -li k’ow -li kokmn agn ec’erur ij, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɔg es -n’am ɔny sow tutr amamn.
Kin low ek’it eke k’uw any: sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, sɛgŋ a b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ.

Tasi ɛm a, agŋ b’ow ɔny ɛl obi cɛ ec’erur, el os e lawlɛl, safri ɔwl ɛsɛl lel es ɛfuu ab; -li b’ow -l’el Nyam any ɔbr ɛsɛl ɛtŋ -li k’ow -n’ɔnymn ɛl ɛsɛl ec’ɛlum. -Li k’ow -l’uwmn bia ɔŋ any; -li k’ow -n’ɔnymn Nyam ec’ów a ec’ɛlum.

-Li b’ow -l’el agŋ ek’ɔny ɛrm tuɔtuɔ, ɔnym sɔrŋ ikŋ, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li dad ów yadŋ ɛm ɛl lawlɛl e lís. -Li b’ow -l’el agŋ ek’ɔnynm sos es, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’erur agŋ eci gbre ijr, ke -l’el low nimamn ec’efnu.
-Li b’ow -l’el agŋ ɛju, agŋ ek’am jɛjm ów es, agŋ ek’es ɛfu iy ɛm gbɔŋ. -Li b’ow -l’erur ɛl obi ɛm ec’ów eke b’aw ɛl a, -l’akm Nyam ec’erur eke -li k’ɔny a.
-Li b’ow -li kok nyandrɛ -l’el Nyam ec’éruru; kɔ tasi ɛm a, -li b’ow -l’igŋ ɔmn e lɛc a -l’ɛlu es. Agŋ amua, àru ɛgb ɛl es.
Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam b’ok mel akŋ ɛtŋ ɔyɔw fuɛfuɛ a ek’ɔny sikpl nɔnɔ, ke ɔmn ijm lɛc a, -li b’ɛŋn wɛl meb a eke -li b’uk wɛl ab ɛm; ɔyɔw amua bi kok ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ eke b’aw ɛl a.
Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔyɔw amua b’anŋ low wewr ɛm, kɔ -l’ɔtumn lɛgŋ kaka -l’uwmn low nawrɛ any.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a Janɛs lele Jambrɛs ab atarir Mois ab a, agŋ amua yɛji b’atar low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab. -L’el agŋ ek’ɛl e sow tutr a inyam, ke ɛl ec’ɔmn a yɛji elm low kaka.
Gbɛkɔ -li k’ow -n’iimn kpekpe yɛji, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow ɛkn ɛl eci yadŋ a ɛsɛ elel ek’ow ɛcr Janɛs lele Jambrɛs ab ec’ab af.
Gbɛkɔ ŋ, us’m jam ɛm e low yɛgm ab ɛm, es an ab ɛm, lel ów eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ab ɛm. Us’m jam ɛm ec’ɔmn ab ɛm, ɛm e low eku ab ɛm, ɛm ec’erur ab ɛm, ɛm e low es ucu ɔny kikri ab ɛm,

ɛtŋ gbre eke wɛl ijr’m lele low eke mi dɔgr ab ab yɛji uw any. Low fɛŋ ek’ɛŋn’m sɛb amua ek’el: Pisidi ec’Antiɔs Ikoniɔm lele Lisr ab ɛm a, uw any ɛtŋ uw gbre yec’eke wɛl ijr’m a yɛj’any. Gbɛkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eb ɛlu’m es ów amua fɛŋ ɛm.
Ɛtŋ agŋ fɛŋ ek’erur eke k’ir ɛb cɛcɛ ɛm Nyam eci, Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, wɛl b’ow ijr ɛl gbre.
Gbɛkɔ, molokm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl a lele mɛju ɛsɛl ab ab b’ow im kpekpe ɛl eci low ŋuŋ kok ab ɛm; -li b’ow -l’ɛju agŋ bɛb ke ɛl obi yɛji wɛl ɛju ɛl.
Sica ŋ ec’a, ùcu yec’a eke wɛl yɛgm’ŋ ke ɛgŋ eb ɔmn ɛm tasi a ɔny es. Uw low yɛgm ɛsɛl eke yɛgm’ŋ low ab any.
Tasi ɛm a, ŋ e likekli ɛm ɛtŋ uw Nyam e Silɛl Lala ab any, -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɔŋ’ŋ sɛwr a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm, eke wɛl b’ɔny ɔmn Jesu Krist ɛm a.
Nyam Lɛl fɛŋ el Nyam ec’abu ɛlum ɛm ec’ów eke wɛl nɔn, ɛtŋ ow b’ɛlum agŋ abu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ogŋ low yec’ek’elm ow a, akpal low ŋuŋ, yɛgm agŋ es an nyim nyim ɛm ec’ɛb ir,
yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ec’ɛgŋ ɔ́ny sos bɛbm nawrɛ tasi, ke l’ɔ́tu n’ɔny abusu li kok low nimamn fɛŋ.
Sica m’am dad’ŋ Nyam ec’any af lele Jesu Krist eke b’ow jɛj agŋ ek’anŋ owr lel agŋ ek’uw ab ec’ów ok a ec’any af, m’am dad’ŋ Jesu Krist e mowrer a lel in ec’ es ɛw ab ab sosiɛm m’ɛsɛ:
nɛny át’ŋ es dad Nyam ec’odad a, ek’ow el lɛgŋ mamn ɛm oglog lɛgŋ ŋuŋ ɛm yɛji, dád eb agŋ, ɛ́nym agŋ abr oglog átr agŋ sos es, ke ɔ́ny low eku nɔnɔ agŋ e low yɛgm ɛm.

Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ b’ow ow ek’agŋ k’ow erurm eke k’iri low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi a, ke b’ow erur us ɛl obi ec’ów eke b’aw ɛl a jam, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɛsŋ low yɛgm ɛsɛl nɔnɔ eke b’ow dad ɛl ów a eke -li b’erur eke -li k’iri a.
-Li b’ow -li b’abl ɔru low nawrɛ ec’iri e lís, ke -l’ɛwl -n’am iri agŋ ec’ów eke bi kɔkn dad a.
Ŋ ec’a, òk sos es low low fɛŋ ɛm, ɛ̀gŋ gbre ij eb, kòk ŋ ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba ɔb e juma a, kòk ŋ e Nyam juma a íy nɛny.
Ɛm ec’a, wanci ow eke wɛl k’oc wawr’m egb; wanci eke mi k’ɛlu wus na es a ow.
M’ogŋ mum mamn a, m’im toŋ m’igŋ ɛm ec’es uru a e nuŋ, m’ucu ɛm ec’ɔmn a m’ɔny es.

Sica any eke m’eb eci labm sɔg a, am eku’m. Ow ow el nɛny nyam ij e tufɛ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, jɛj ok ɛs nɛny nyam ɛs a b’ow ɔŋ’m jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a. Ɛtŋ ow elm ɛm cɛ li k’ow n’ɔɔm im, kɔ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am eku erur ɛm wanci a eke li b’ow l’ɛlu sos ɔkm a.
Àtr sos es ow fafa ɛŋn’m,
aŋke Demas igŋ ɛlu’m es wus ec’ów ec’erur eke n’ɔny nɔnɔ a sosiɛm eci; l’eb ejagb n’im Tesaloni. Kresan eb ejagb im Galasi ɛtŋ Tit im Dalmasi.
Luk sɔny cɛ anŋ ɛm ab. Òc Mark ke ów in ab, aŋke l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛlum im abu ɛm e juma ab ɛm.
M’ɛrm Tisik Efɛs.
Lɛgŋ eke b’ow ow a, ìsm’m ɛm e mob af ɛw a eke m’ɛw es Troas Karpɔs ogŋ a, ke ísm’m silɛl a yɛji, ab brobro ɛl a eke wɛl nɔn ndey lɛl af a.
Alesandr lôw ofŋ ɛs a kok low ek’akplm ɛm e lís; Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow sɔg’r low ŋuŋ a e li kok’m a e labm.
Ŋ yɛji ɔ̀su sos in e lís, aŋke ɛy e sodad a e dad ɛm l’atar ɛy ab lɛc ɛm.
Lɛgŋ eke m’ɔg es m’im odad jɛj ok ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka anm ɛm ab, ɛl fɛŋ -l’igŋ -l’ɛlu’m es. Ke blel Nyam k’ɔ́bm ɛl low ow eci.
Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, in anŋ ɛm ab ɛtŋ l’atr’m sos es, ow ɔŋ m’ɔny abusu mi dad in ec’odad a m’ok Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl amua fɛŋ. Ɛtŋ li sɔg’m kukuma amua e nɛnym.
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛmɛny b’ow eb ɛlu’m es low ŋuŋ fɛŋ e lís, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’anŋ kpoŋ kpoŋ m’ɛy in ec’Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a. In ec’él anygbɛl sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
Ɛ̀sŋn Prisil, Akilas lele Onesifɔr e bosu ab ab ɔŋ’m.
Eras anŋ Korɛnt ɛtŋ m’ɛw Trofim es Mile, aŋke ɔl am ɔny’n.
Àtr sos es ow gbuŋ ke lɛfr e lɛgŋ a ów. Ebul, Pudɛs, Linus, Klodia lel agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab am ɛsŋn’ŋ.
Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ánŋ ŋ ab. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny ab.

Ɛm bɔwri Tit, ɛm Pɔl, Nyam e juma kok ɛs lele Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs ab, ɛm m’am awŋ lɛl na. Nyam abul’m eke mi k’ɛsŋ agŋ a eke li sɔsum l’ot a ɔny ɔmn, ke mi yɛ́gm ɛl -l’uw low nawrɛ any, ke -l’ir ɛb ek’okr af ɛy ec’ɔmn eke s’ɔny ab ab,
yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɔny low eku sel ek’ɔnym uwr a eci. Nyam ek’ɔ́nym yadŋ a, ɛwar ɛy ɛb ir ikŋ na gbuŋ eke low fɛŋ k’anŋ a.
Lɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm ɛw es a, Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ɛlu in ec’odad a ɔkm. Odad a anake el amani a eke n’ɔŋ’m, ke n’ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’ɔb a.
Tit, m’am nɔn lɛl na m’awŋ’ŋ, ŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm ec’iy tasi af, ɔmn a ek’okr ɛy af ab ɛm. Ke Nyam Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ab ɛ́dŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ, ke ɔ́ŋ’ŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
M’ɛw’ŋ es Krɛt eke k’uwar ów sisigm ek’anŋ a, ke ɛb ɛb a e Sinyamel ab ɛm sɔ́sum agŋ ekpekp ot ɛsɛ idr ɛsɛl af, ɛs’elel eke m’ɔŋ’ŋ ow ec’abusu ab af.
Ɛgŋ likpekp a it eke k’el ɛgŋ ek’abr ɛnym anm lís; yɔw nyam cɛ ec’igŋ, ke in ec’ey a él Nyam e nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl eke wɛl k’ɔtum okm ów af ɛl ec’es an keskes eci, oglog ɛl ec’ɛgŋ ɛluam eci.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyamel ec’idr ɛs eke b’ɛkn Nyam ec’ów a, it eke k’ir ɛb mɛwl ɛm. Li k’élm es ɛfuu, ɛrm beblu, mar ɛgŋu, l’élm ɛgŋ ek’ɔny gaŋgaŋ, l’élm ɛgŋ e b’ɔl os ɔny es yadŋ ɛm.
Ow it eke li k’eb agŋ eke b’ow in ogŋ a mɛwl ɛm, ke l’él low nimamn e lawl. Ke l’él ɛgŋ e b’iri ɛgŋ owi, ɛgŋ nyim nyim, eke b’eb Nyam ec’ebr a, ke l’él ɛgŋ e b’ɔnyn sos es.

Ow it eke li k’ucu odad tasi a ek’it a n’ɔny es nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, odad a ek’okr af yec’a eke wɛl yɛgm ab ab a. Ɛbɛn ke l’ɔ́tu l’atr agŋ likpr a sos es low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ɛm, ke li yɛ́gm agŋ a ek’ɛgŋm low yɛgm a ebm a ɛl ec’irm a.
Mi dad sodad amua aŋke agŋ nɔnɔ ɔ́nym ɛlum, ab brobro Jwifɛl eke b’us Jesu jam, ke am erur ek’agŋ k’ubr likr es ab ɛm; -li b’irmn agŋ ɛl e nɛnym ɔb e sodad ebl ab ɛm.
Ow it eke k’abl ɛl nɛny es, aŋke -li bi ŋuŋn sibosu nimum ɛtŋ -li bi yɛgm low ek’itm a, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɛŋn os yadŋ ɛm.
Krɛt iy nyam in obi, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs nyam anake dad ninɛ: "God’ɛtŋ Krɛt eyŋ el ayadŋu, mindey eŋuŋ, ɔkpɔrŋu e bi tutr ɛl e lok iy owi cɛ."
Ɛtŋ ow eke li dad a el low nawrɛ tasi. Na sosiɛm anake ki dad ɛl odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm, ke -l’ub nawrɛ tasi,
yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ucumn Jwifɛl e kpɔkpɔ ɛm ec’ów yadŋ a e dad a -n’ɔnymn es; -l’ɛluamn agŋ a eke b’igŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛlu es e sol a.
Fɛŋ el lala agŋ a eke b’ɛlum Nyam e sol a eci; kɔ agŋ a ek’ɛluam, ke ɛ́gŋm ubm nawrɛ ec’a, kaka elm lala, aŋke ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a lel ɛl sow tutr ab ab yɛji ikpi.
-Li b’ij nɛny -l’ɛsɛ ɛl uw Nyam any, kɔ ɛl ec’ów eke -li bi kok a b’anŋ ɛjeci. -L’el agŋ ɔbr tasi, -l’ɛluamn ɛgŋ kaka ɛtŋ -l’ɔtumn -li kokmn low nimamn kaka.
Gbɛkɔ ŋ, yɛ̀gm yec’a ek’otarir es low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ab a.
Dàd agŋ ekpekp a él agŋ eke k’ɔny sos es ok low kok ɛm, ɔ́ny sos us, any es ok, íj lɛc ɔmn ɛm, erur ɛm lele low eku ɛm ab.
Dàd ɔyɔw ekpekp a yɛji ɔ́ny ɛb ir mamn eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm. Ke -li ki dadmn ɛl lawlɛl a e lís ec’ów eŋuŋ, -l’elmn mar eci madyɔw. Ke -li yɛgm low yeci ek’akpl a,
yec’ɛtŋ ke -li yɛgm ɔyɔw oto a ɔ́ny ɛl ɛcɛl lel ɛl ec’ey ab ec’erur.
-L’el any es ok lisɛl ek’ɔnym wiawia, akŋ juma kok lisɛl amamn, ek’ɔny ɛl ɛcɛl ec’ɛlum, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔ́nym low ŋuŋ dadm Nyam ec’odad a e lís.
Ìbrm ŋgbafrɛ oto a yɛji él agŋ ány es oku low fɛŋ ɛm.
Ŋ obi yɛji, ow it eke k’el sɛwl ów amamn kok ɛm. Ŋ e low yɛgm a él nawrɛ tasi, ɔ́ny sos usr.
Ke ŋ e sodad ebl a él nyim nyim eke wɛl k’ɔ́nym low dadm ow e lís, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy ec’efnu a k’ɔ́nym low dadm okm ɛy af, ke ɛ́s ók ɛl any.
Ow it eke madu k’ɔny ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a ec’ɛlum, ke -n’ɔŋ wɛl áw ɛl low fɛŋ ɛm, ke -li k’ɔnymn odad wɛl ab.

Ɛtŋ ow itm eke -li k’iy wɛl ob kaka fɛŋ. Kɔ ow tasi eke -li ki kok a el, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ -l’ɛlu ɛl ec’agŋ amamn eke -l’eel lele ɛl e cɛcɛ el ab ab ɔkm, yec’ɛtŋ ke low fɛŋ ɛm Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs eci low yɛgm a ɛ́ŋn any.
Mi dad ów amua fɛŋ aŋke Nyam ɛlu in e bibm eke bi sɔg agŋ fɛŋ a ɔkm.
Bibm a bi yɛgm ɛy eke si k’igŋ ɛy ec’ɛb ir ŋuŋ lele wus ec’ów aw ab ab s’ɛlu es, ke s’ɔ́tu wus af aŋa s’ir ɛb nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛm, nɛny nyam ɛm lele Nyam ec’es ucu ɔny ɛm ab.
Nɛnɛ anake si b’ow s’eku sos ɛm iŋn e lɛgŋ a eke s’am ɔmn a, lɛgŋ a ek’ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs Jesu Krist ek’el ɛy e Nyam ligbɛl a b’ow ɛy ɔkm in ec’anygbɛl ɛm a.
L’irmn in e sel a ɛy sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke li sɔ́g ɛy low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ɛm. L’erur eke li ki kok ɛy s’el bieku ek’in obi l’ayal, agŋ ek’el in sɔny eci, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ów amamn kok b’anŋ sos ɛm.
Low yɛgm na anake k’ɛlu ɔkm ŋ ec’abusu a ek’ɛŋn ab ɛm, átr agŋ sos es oglog ɛ́nym agŋ abr a. Kì yɛb ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’iir’ŋ es.
Ɔ̀kn nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a fɛŋ, ow it eke -li k’is es es ɛw ɛsɛl lele abusu ɛsɛl ab ec’any af, -n’ɔny wɛl ec’ɛlum, ke -n’ɔny sos bɛbm low mamn fɛŋ e kok eci.
-Li ki dadmn low ŋuŋ ɛl lawl e lís, kɔ -l’el ɛrm es ɛy ec’agŋ, -l’el agŋ amamn, ke -l’ɛlu ɛl e frɔrɔ el ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ e lís.

Gbuŋ ke s’úb Jesu nawrɛ a, s’el agŋ ek’uwm low kaka any, ɔnym ɛlum kaka, irm itm es, el low aw lele low e b’iŋn sos ɛm ab eci madu ɛtŋ s’ir ɛb low ŋuŋ ɛm lele nyamnɛyr ɛm ab. Wɛl b’ɔny ɛy e sifn ɛtŋ ɛy ɔfr ɛm yɛji si b’ifanin.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ɛlu in e sɔrŋ ikŋ lel in ec’erur ab ab ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ eci,

ɛtŋ li sɔg ɛy, ow elm ɛy ec’ów amamn eke si kok a sosiɛm, kɔ eke n’ɔny ɛy e sɔrŋ ikŋ a sosiɛm. Li sɔg ɛy mij a eke b’ayal ɛy s’el agŋ owr ab ɛm; ɛtŋ ow ec’iri tasi a el: ɛb ir owr a ek’Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɛy a.
Abŋ Lala na, Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ɔmun in es ɛy af, Jesu Krist ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ab ec’af okr a sosiɛm.
Ɛbɛn anake in e sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm, li b’ɔŋ ɛy s’el nyim nyim in ec’any af, ke ow b’ɛlu ɛy abusu es s’ɛŋn sel a ek’ɔnym uwr ke s’am ɔmn a.
Odad na el odad nawrɛ tasi, ɛtŋ m’am erur eke nɛny k’at’ŋ es nɔnɔ ow e dad ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’ub Nyam nawrɛ a, át any kok ów amamn mɛwl ɛm. Na el low akplu ɛtŋ el agŋ fɛŋ ec’abu ɛlum.
Gbɛkɔ àru ów ek’ɔnym low yɛgm a ɛgb es ɛsɛ: agŋ lagŋɛl e mew ec’es ɔsŋm, ów ɛsu lele Mois ec’ol a ec’ów es atar owi ab ab. Amua fɛŋ el ów ɔfr ɔfr eke low kaka anm ɛm.
Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’is ɛm bubr owi a, ɛ̀war ir akp nyam, sakp yony gbuŋ ke ɛgŋ ikŋ na, kpáb’r es Nyamel e lís.
Ɔtu eke k’uw any ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na ejagb ŋuŋ n’am eb. Ɛtŋ sikpl a eke n’am kok n’im ab ɛm, ow el in sosi eke n’am ɔbr low.
Ba mi b’ɛrm Artemas oglog Tisik ow a, àtr sos es ow ɛŋn’m Nikopolis, aŋke mi bɛbm eke mi k’anŋ yogŋ lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a.
Ɛ̀gŋ eb ɛlum Zenas eke jɛj ok owi ɛm el ɛgŋ dogŋn ɛs a lel Apolɔs ab abu ɛl ec’ejagb us ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ɔnymn ob kaka ec’es abur.
Ow akpl eke ɛy ec’agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ a yɛji, ki wewr ɛrm mamn ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -li kok es abur fɛŋ eke b’owr ɛl a, ke ɛl ec’ɛb ir a k’élm ɔfr ɔfr.
Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ab a am ɛsŋn’ŋ. Ɛ̀sŋn ɛy lawlɛl a ek’ɔny ɔmn nyam coco ɛy ab a. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
Ɛm Pɔl, eke wɛl ɛlu sobel ɛm Jesu Krist sosiɛm lele ɛy lisijim Timote ab e nin ɛm, m’am awŋ Filemɔ ɛy lawl sɛnyn juma kok ɛm lɛl na.
Lɛl na el ɛy lisijɔw Apia lel ɛy e low dogŋn ɛm e lawl Arkip lele Nyamel eke b’as luku ŋ ec’akŋ ab ab yɛj’eci.
Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ, ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
Sakp sakp fɛŋ, ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, mi b’ɔkn Filemɔ ŋ e low ɛtŋ mi b’ɔŋ ɛm e Nyam a bia;
aŋke m’am iri agŋ am dad ŋ ec’erur ek’ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a eci, lele ŋ ec’ɔmn ek’ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ab ab e low.
M’am ibrm Nyam eke ɔmn a ek’ɔny ɛsɛ ɛy af a, k’ij lɛc ŋ ɛm, ke ow ɔ́ŋ uw ów amamn fɛŋ eke s’ɔny Krist ɛm, ɛy ec’owr anŋ na ɛm ab any.
Lisijim ŋ ec’erur ek’ɔny a, ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn nɔnɔ lele sos es atr ab, aŋke agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a, usur ɛl ɛrm.
Na sosiɛm, ek’abusu ɛru’m es Krist ɛm eke mi ki dad’ŋ low ke kók yɛji,
m’am erur ek’erur ɛm a, m’ɛw ibrm ɛm. Ɛm Pɔl, ɛ̀kn elel eke m’anŋn, ɛgŋ ligbɛlgbɛl ek’ɛmɛny anŋ sobel ɛm Jesu Krist sosiɛm,
m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ eke k’eb Onesim. L’el ɛm ec’iy Jesu Krist ɛm sobel ɛm aŋa.
Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, l’akplm ŋ eci, kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a l’akpl ŋ lel ɛm ab eci.
M’am ɛwlm’n mɛny sica l’ow n’ɛŋn’ŋ, in eke l’ɛw ɛsɛ ɛm obi e sos ogog af a.
M’erur tasi eke blel m’ɔnym’n ab n’anŋ’m saw eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm Amani Mamn sosiɛm a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ŋ usuiy a li kók ɛm e lís e low.
Gbɛkɔ m’erurm eke mi ki kok low ek’ɛlum nɛny es, yec’ɛtŋ ke low mamn a eke ki kok a, k’élm atrm ɛm, kɔ ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm.
Onesim kpab’ŋ e lís, ow k’ɔdm ke ow el lɛgŋ tɛl eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke b’ɛŋn’n ke ow él sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci,
aŋke caca ɛm a, l’elm adu ij, kɔ n’ɔny any l’akm adu: l’el erur ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim. L’il’m an nɔnɔ, kɔ ŋ ec’a ow b’ow afŋn es, ɛgŋ e l’el a lele nawrɛ ub ɛs eke l’el ab ab sosiɛm eci.
Sica eke b’oc’m ɛsɛ awlŋ af, ke èb’r ɛsɛ ɛm obi ɛm obi af.
Eke li kok ŋ low ŋuŋ oglog n’ɔnym’ŋ ob ab, ùb ɛw’m af.
Ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm anake m’am nɔn ów amua a: Ɛm Pɔl, mi b’ow m’ɔwr m’ɔŋ’ŋ. (Ow itm eke mi k’ɔkn’ŋ eke ŋ obi yɛji ɔnym’m ob ab, kɔ yadŋ ee? ŋ ec’owr anŋ tasi a.)
Lisijim, m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, kok low na eke m’am ibrm a ɔŋ’m Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’erur a sosiɛm: ɛ̀yr’m ɛrm es Krist ab ec’af okr a sosiɛm.
Wanci na af eke m’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl a, m’ɔny ɔmn tasi eke b’ow kok low a eke m’am ibrm’ŋ a ɛtŋ m’uw any yɛj’eke b’ow kok ow afŋ es.
Kòk’m es ɛru usu yɛji kpɛkŋ, aŋke ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, m’am ɔny ɔmn eke wɛl b’ow ɛlu’m es ɔŋ ɔny.
Epafras ek’anŋ sobel ɛm ɛm ab Jesu Krist sosiɛm a, am ɛsŋn’ŋ,
ɛtŋ Mark, Aritak, Demas lele Luk ab ek’el ɛm lawlɛl juma kok nyam ɛm a yɛji, am ɛsŋn’ŋ.
Ke sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Nyam ɛcr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɛm dad ɛy lagŋɛl odad, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl odad a sakp nɔnɔ lel akunda ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm ab.
Kɔ sica, sɛgŋ na ek’el sɛgŋ es abal el ab ɛm, Nyam ɛcr Jim ɛm dad ɛy odad. Jim na ɛm l’ɛcr li kok afr lele wus ab, ɛtŋ in cɛ anake Nyam sɔsum oc’r eke li k’el ob a fɛŋ ec’aja ij ɛs a.

Iy na b’ɛlu in ec’anygbɛl e jɛjn a ɔkm, ɛtŋ l’el ow ec’es otarir kpɛŋ, ɛtŋ in ec’odad ebl ec’abusu a ucu wus lel ob fɛŋ ab ɔny es. Li yɔyɔg agŋ e sikpl ab es, ɛtŋ n’im li sig es afr Nyam ek’ɔny abusu ob fɛŋ af a e lidr abu af.
Iy na ɔny any nɔnɔ akm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl. Ɛɛ, ow ɛru es kpata, aŋke Nyam ɔŋ’n aja nin ek’ɔny any nɔnɔ akm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’a.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka Nyam dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka ɛsmɛ: Ŋ el ɛm ec’ Iy, yɛfɛnyna, ɛm m’ew’ŋ. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, li dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka yɛji l’ɛsmɛ: Ɛm, mi b’ow m’el Ɛs, ɛtŋ in, li b’ow l’el ɛm ec’Iy.
Gbɛkɔ, lɛgŋ a eke n’ɔŋ in e yɛfl Iy a ow wus na af a, li dad ninɛ: Nyam ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a pupukpaŋ it eke k’igŋ’n nuŋ.
Kin low yec’eke li dad afr ɛrm ɛsɛl e lís: ŋ el ɛgŋ a ek’ɔŋ ke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl itŋn anŋ ɛsɛ lɛf af, ke ŋ e juma kok ɛsɛl bi kok ŋ e low ɛsɛ al e b’iri ab af a.
Kɔ Nyam dad Jim e lís ninɛ: ŋ el Nyam ɛtŋ ŋ ec’ɛb ebu ec’atufu lɛkpn a anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Ŋ e kpama ab ab, am nyimn ŋ ec’agŋ a low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm,
b’erur low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛtŋ b’ifn low ŋuŋ. Na sosiɛm Nyam, ŋ e Nyam sɔsum oc’ŋ awlŋɛl ab ɛm eke k’el in eci, ɛtŋ l’ɛtm sos ɛm iŋn e mun l’ok’ŋ nuŋ.
Ɛmɛny Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, nuŋ ɔb ɛm a, ŋ anake kok wus a, ɛtŋ afr el ob eke ŋ e sabu a ol.
Ów amua fɛŋ b’ow irm, kɔ ŋ, b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛni ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
b’ow ɔny ar ɛl es ɛsɛ gbad af, ɛɛ, -li b’ow -l’itŋn any ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af. Gbɛkɔ ŋ, b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ŋ ec’elel a cɛ, ɛtŋ ŋ ec’owr anŋ a úwrm.
Lɛgŋ kaka Nyam dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka ɛsmɛ: Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af, toŋ bake m’ót ŋ ec’efnu m’ok ŋ ec’akr ew a.
Tasi ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl bla -l’el ee? -L’el abŋ ek’ɔny juma ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, ke Nyam b’ɛrm im ɛlum agŋ a eke k’ij sel ek’ɔnym uwr ec’aja a abu.
Low na sosiɛm a, ow it eke si k’oc ɛrm s’ɛw sodad eke s’iri ab af; eke ow elm ɛbɛn, si b’ow s’itir ejagb any.
Nyam ɛcr afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛm ɔŋ agŋ in ec’odad a, ɛtŋ l’ɛlu odad a e nawrɛ ek’el a ɔkm tasi. Agŋ bɛb ɛgŋm usrm’n sos, ɛgŋm ɛluam’n, ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɛŋn gbre a ek’it eke k’ɛŋn ɛl a.

Sica ɛy, ayaf si b’ow s’aru gbre na s’ɛgb es, eke si b’igŋ sel ɛŋn ligbɛl na s’ɛlu es ee? Sel ɛŋn na, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake ikŋ anym ɔb in ec’amani a. Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke iri wɛl dad sel ɛŋn na e low a, ɛlu in e low nawrɛ e l’el a ɔkm.

Nyam in obi yɛgm eke ɛl e sodad a el nawrɛ, mɛny ɛwr, ów ɛgbɛl, lele sakrowa ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke b’iti any ab ɛm. Ɛmɛny Nyam yɛgm eke ow el nawrɛ Abŋ Lala ec’ob ap ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a eke li cɛc agŋ ɛsɛ elel eke l’erur ab af ab ɛm.
S’am dad wus eke k’ow a e low. Ow elm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl Nyam ɔɔm abusu eke k’ɛw wus na es.
Tasi ɛm a, ow eke wɛl b’ɛŋn Nyam Lɛl ɛm a el: Kɔ agŋ bla -l’el eke k’ɛw ɛl e low ɛrm ee? Bla -l’el eke ki kok ɛl e lís owi ee?
Ɛw ɛl afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ew lɛgŋ tɛl eci, ɔŋ ɛl anygbɛl lele sos usr ab ɛsɛ es ɛw tufɛ af,
ot ów a fɛŋ ɛw es ɛl ec’akr ew, ɛl ec’es ɛw ew. Nyam ɔŋ agŋ abusu ob ob fɛŋ af. L’ɛgbm ob kaka es eke anm wɛl ec’abusu ab ɛm. Gbɛkɔ yɛfɛnyna, s’am ɛkn tasi, agŋ k’ɔnym abusu ob ob fɛŋ af.

Kɔ bla anake ɛy yɛji s’am ɛkn ab ee? Jesu anŋ sɛgŋ bɛb afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ew, kɔ sica, Nyam ɔŋ’n anygbɛl lele sos usr ab ɛsɛ es ɛw e tufɛ af. Bla ec’ee? Aŋke l’ij gbre ɛtŋ l’uw yɛji. Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ɛm, Jesu uw agŋ fɛŋ eci.

Nyam anake kok wus a ɛtŋ wus anŋ in eci. Kɔ l’erur ek’in ec’ey ab ɛm e nɔnɔ ligbɛl k’anŋ in ec’anygbɛl a e low ɛm. Ɛtŋ ek’ow el Jesu ek’am ot im ɛl sel ɛŋn a ogŋ a, ow it eke Nyam k’oc gbre ijr ɛm ɔŋ’n l’iy nɛny l’igŋ nuŋ.
Jesu b’ɔny agŋ fɛŋ e sikpl a oc ɛl es lís. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ eke b’ ayal agŋ a lele agŋ a eke wɛl ayal ab ab ɛl fɛŋ b’ɔny ɛgŋ Ɛs nyam. Na sosiɛm ow ɔnym’n ɛ́s eke li k’ɛsŋ wɛl lisijimɛl.
Tasi ɛm a, Jesu dad Nyam ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ɔb ŋ e nin a ec’amani m’ok ɛm lisijimɛl. Dedeku ec’araŋn, mi b’ow mi kɔklm’ŋ.
Ɛmɛny Jesu cɛ, li dad ninɛ: Ɛm, mi b’ow m’oc ɛm ec’ɔmn a nimum nimum m’ɛlu Nyam ɛm. Ɛmɛny ninɛ: Kin ɛm lele ey a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m ab ab.

Ey amua ɔny low nyam eke okr ɛl af: -l’el agŋ ek’ɔny sos megl lele mebl ab. Agn ɔny abusu eke k’ibi ɛl. Na sosiɛm, Jesu, in yɛji itŋn el ɛgŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɔny agn eci lɛc a l’oc es in obi eci luw ab ɛm.
Agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ madu af ɛl ec’owr anŋ a nimum ɛm, luw eci muru eke -n’ɔnyn a sosiɛm a, Jesu sɔg ɛl in e luw ab ɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, l’owm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eci abu ɛlum eci, kɔ l’ow agŋ ek’el Abraham ec’alaw a ec’abu ɛlum eci.

Na sosiɛm anake ow it eke li k’itŋn nimum nimum l’ot lisijimɛl lele lisijɔwɛl ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’él wɛl ec’ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl, eke ɛrm mamn iy ɛm gbɔŋ ke el cɛcɛ Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm, ke b’ɛŋn agŋ e sikpl oc ap ec’abusu a.
Ɛtŋ eke Jesu in obi ij gbre ɛbm ɛkn ɛm a, l’ɔtu eke li k’atm agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛl yɛji wɛl b’ɛbm ɛkn a abu.
Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ek’anŋ afr a ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’eel in ec’agŋ lala; ow sosiɛm, lɛ̀ɛr Jesu eke s’am ɛgŋ s’eb ɛsɛ ɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛrm lele egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ab a.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke Mois nyimn Nyam ec’agŋ a, l’el cɛcɛ ow ec’any af ow e juma e kok ab ɛm. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛsɛ Mois af, Jesu el cɛcɛ Nyam eke abul il in e juma a ec’any af.
Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɛbm eke k’ɛŋn anygbeŋ akm Mois, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛgŋ eke b’us êl a b’ɔny sos usr akm êl ab af.
Tasi ɛm a, êl nyam nyam fɛŋ ɛgŋ b’us gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ a eke b’us fɛŋ a el Nyam.
Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Mois el cɛcɛ Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn. L’el juma kok ɛs eke wɛl abul Nyam e lɛgŋ anym ɛm ec’ów a eke b’ow dad a e daŋku ij.
Gbɛkɔ Krist el cɛcɛ, l’el Iy tasi a ɛtŋ n’anŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a e nuŋ af. In ec’agŋ a, ow ow el ɛy, gbɛkɔ ow it eke si k’ucu ɛy ec’ɔmn a, lele ntotŋ a ek’ɛy e low ɔmn a b’ɔŋ ɛy ab ab s’ɔny es.
Na sosiɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala am dad ab af: Yɛfɛnyna, eke b’irir Nyam e lebl a,
k’ɔ̀turir ɔny ec’ɛrm a, ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’elel eke ɔny lagŋɛl kokr loj ab ɛm ab af. -L’ɔbr’m any ɛtŋ -l’ɛbm’m -l’ɛkn.
Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ a, ɔny lagŋɛl ijr’m gbre eke k’ɛkn yec’a eke mi b’ow mi kok a. Ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn yec’a eke mi kok a toŋ akpo ekŋ yony.
Na sosiɛm, m’ɔny ɛrm bebl agŋ na e lís ɛtŋ mi dad m’ɛsɛ: ɛl ec’ɛrm a sɛgŋ fɛŋ bi kpab es ɛm e lís, ɛtŋ -l’ɔtum -l’uwm ɛm ec’ejagb ab any.
Ɛm ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm, m’ofn m’ɛsɛ: -li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm!
Agŋ lisijimɛl ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ɔny ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka itm eke k’ɔny ɛrm ŋuŋ, ɛrm ek’úbm nawrɛ, ɛrm eke b’itr’r l’igŋ Nyam ek’anŋ owr a l’ɛlu es.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: 'Yɛfɛnyna'. Ow sosiɛm, eke yɛfɛnyna na k’uwrm a, àtarir sos es ɛgŋ ɛgŋ lɛgŋ fɛŋ. Ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɔnym ɛrm tuɔtuɔ, ɛtŋ sikpl k’ow ɛlum ɛgŋ kaka wus.
Sica, s’el Krist e lawlɛl, gbɛkɔ ow it eke si k’ucu ɛy ec’ɔmn a eke s’ɔny lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke s’ub’r nawrɛ a s’ɔny es.
Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Yɛfɛnyna, eke b’irir Nyam e lebl a, k’ɔ̀turir ɔny ec’ɛrm a ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’elel eke ɔny lagŋɛl ɔbr’m any ab af.
Bwo ec’ɛgŋ iri Nyam e lebl ab ee? Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔbr’r any ee? Ɛl -l’el agŋ a fɛŋ eke Mois ɔny ok ɔkm Ejipt a.
Nyam ebl ɛrm toŋ ow ij akpo ekŋ yony. Bwo ec’ɛgŋ e lís ee? Agŋ a eke kok sikpl a e lís, ɛtŋ ɛl nɛny nyam a cɛ anake -l’uwr loj ab ɛm a.
Nyam ofn dad ninɛ: Li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm. Bwo sosiɛm l’ofn akpasu na ee? Agŋ a ek’ɔnym ɛlum a sosiɛm.
Tasi ɛm a, kin yec’eke s’am ɛkn a: -l’ɔtum -l’okm Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm, aŋke -n’ɔnym ɔmn.
Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɛwar ɛy low ɛw es eke si b’ow s’ok in e sel eb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ low na eke l’ɛwar ɛy l’ɛw es a ɛcm okm es. Ow sosiɛm ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ke ɛgŋ kaka ɔny ɛm a k’ánm jam!
Wɛl ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba ok ɛy ɛsɛ ɛy lagŋɛl ab af, gbɛkɔ odad a eke -l’irir a elm ɛl low kaka. Eke -l’irir ow e low a, -l’ebm ow ɔmn ɛm.

Ɛy, s’ub nawrɛ, s’ɔtu eke si k’ok Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm. Nyam in obi dad ninɛ: Ɛm ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm, m’ofn eke: -Li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm. Ke, Nyam uwar in e juma lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke li kok wus na nimum a.
Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm, kin yec’eke wɛl dad sɛgŋ lɔbŋ ɛm a e lís: Ɛtŋ eke li kok in e juma fɛŋ uwr a, l’eb sel sɛgŋ lɔbŋ ɛm a.
Nyam yɛji dad ow ec’odad eke li bi dad l’ɛsɛ: -Li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm a.
Agŋ a ek’ikŋ anym ɛŋn Amani Mamn a ɛgŋm ɔnym in ec’ɛlum. Ow sosiɛm, -l’ɔtum -l’okm Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm. Agŋ ɛjeci gbɛ ɔtu eke ɛmɛny k’ok ɛm.

Na sosiɛm Nyam ɛw lɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ɛtŋ l’ɛsŋ ow yɛfɛnyna. Eke ow ibn a, Nyam dad David e nɛny ɛm lɛgŋ ikŋ na e low, odad a eke wɛl ikŋ anym dad lɛl na ec’afr ɛm a: Yɛfɛnyna, eke b’irir Nyam e lebl a, k’ɔturir ɔny ec’ɛrm a!
Sica am ɛkan eke, blel Joswe nawrɛ tasi ɔtu ɛŋn sel eb na ɔŋ Nyam ec’agŋ ab ana, Nyam blel dadm ow e jam a, lɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ec’odad.
Ow am yɛgm eke sel eb ɛmɛny anŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a eci. Ɛtŋ sel eb a ot sɛgŋ lɔbŋ ɛm ec’ab es.
Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ a eke b’ɛy Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm a, in yɛji am eb in obi e juma a e sel, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam eb in ec’a e sel ab af.
Na sosiɛm s’ɔ́ɔl ɛy ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm sel eb na ɛm ec’ɛy es, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ébm ɛy lagŋɛl a ek’ɛgŋm ɛluam low a eci sɛwl a, ke ow ɔ́ŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́ym wus.

Ow it e si k’uw any eke Nyam ec’odad ebl a b’ism sel ab, lɛc iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ. Li b’ɛdŋ lakm ler ɛm lab ek’in ec’any a yony mum b’ufu a. Nyam ec’odad ebl a b’ɛy ɛgŋ ɛm im igŋ es. Li b’ɛy ow ɛm n’im toŋ n’ɛŋn ow ec’abŋ a lele liy ab ab, li b’im toŋ n’ɛŋn ow e sos ŋgigŋnel a lele ew ab ab. Li b’uw ɛgŋ e nuŋ ɛm ec’ów tutr lele ɛrm ɛm ec’ab ab any.
Tasi ɛm a, low kaka lɔlm es Nyam ec’any af. Ob fɛŋ eke li kok a ɛru’r es any af kpata. In e nyamn a b’ɛkn fɛŋ, ɛtŋ in anake si k’awl ɛy e lís ec’ów fɛŋ s’ok’r a.
S’ɔny egb waw ɛs abusu ɛs ligbɛl nyam eke ubr afr ɛm im toŋ ok Nyam ogŋ yogŋ. In l’el Jesu, Nyam ec’Iy a. Ow sosiɛm, s’úcur ɔmn a eke s’ɛgŋn s’ebr a s’ɔnyn es.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl na eke s’ɔny a, ɔtu eke k’ɔny ɛy e sos ɔnym a e sɔrŋ ikŋ, aŋke ɛsɛ ɛy af, in yɛji wɛl ɛbm’n low low fɛŋ ɛm, gbɛkɔ in li kokm sikpl.
S’ímn si titmn ɔmn ɛm tasi ɛy e Nyam ɛrm mamnu ec’es ɛw ec’atufu lɛkpn a. In e lís si b’ow s’ɛŋn sɔrŋ ikŋ a eke b’anŋ in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ow a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, li b’ow l’ɛlum ɛy abu wanci ek’it a.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl fɛŋ, agŋ ec’araŋn wɛl bi sɔsum’n oc’r. In e juma el ke l’ɛ́lum agŋ abu ir ɛb Nyam ab, li kok ob ap lele egb waw ab agŋ e sikpl a ec’oc ap eci.
Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a, in obi yɛji l’el ɛgŋ ek’ɔny sikpl. Ow sosiɛm, l’ɔtu eke li k’iri agŋ a ek’uwm low any lel ɛl a ek’am irm ab ab e ses babur a.
In e sikpl e n’ɔny a sosiɛm, ow it eke li ki waw egb dedeku a e sikpl a eci, ɛtŋ ow elm dedeku a e sikpl a cɛ eci, kɔ in obi in obi ec’a yɛj’eci.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ɛgŋ kaka áwm egb waw ɛs ligbɛl e juma a ebm in obi ɛm. Kɔ Nyam anake b’ɛsŋ ɛgŋ ow ec’el ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke l’ɛsŋ Arɔn el ab af a.
Krist ec’a yɛji, ɛbɛn ow ɛcr. Ow elm in obi l’awm egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ec’el a l’ebm. Nyam eke dad’r odad a ogŋ ow anŋ ow. Kin odad a: Ŋ el ɛm ec’ Iy, yɛfɛnyna, ɛm m’ew’ŋ.
Ɛmɛny Nyam dad ninɛ: Ŋ el egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af.
Krist, in e wus af aŋa ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm, ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛtŋ kok sɔrŋ ɔŋ Nyam, babarm ɛm lele ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm ab. Ni ŋɔŋn Nyam ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔny oc’r es luw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ Nyam iri’r lebl, aŋke l’ɛlum ow es is ɛm.
Krist el Nyam ec’Iy, na low nawrɛ! Gbɛkɔ gbre ijr amua fɛŋ ɛm eke l’ɛcr a, li wewr ɛlum nawrɛ tasi.
Ɛtŋ sica eke l’iy nɛny l’igŋ nuŋ a, l’el sel ɛŋn e nuŋ agŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɛlum’n a eci.
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, Nyam ɛw’r egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ɛsɛ Mɛlkisedɛk ec’ab af.
Low na af a, s’ɔny ów nɔnɔ eke si ki dad, kɔ ɛl e dad a ɔtu nɔnɔ, aŋke ɔny e low iri a ɛwl am ɔtu.

Ɔny, ɔtur eke wanci na af a k’eel low yɛgm ɛsɛl tasi gɔŋ! Kɔ kin eke ow am ibrm eke wɛl ki yɛgmn ɔny nuŋ ɔb ɛm e Nyam odad ec’ów ab ɛm. Ɔny, ɔnymn tɛri eke k’ijr ob ij leg leg, mɛny mij ow it eke wɛl k’ɔŋ ɔny.
Ɛgŋ a eke b’anŋ am ɛgŋ mɛny mij a, el iyli ɔmn ɛm. Li k’ɔtum l’uwm yec’a ek’el low nyim nyim ab any.
Gbɛkɔ ob ij leg leg el agŋ ɛgbɛl ɔmn ɛm eci. Ɛl e low es ɛkn ɛw a, ɔŋ ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a, b’uw any ok ereb low mamn lele low ŋuŋ ab ec’araŋn.

Na sosiɛm si k’ow s’ɛwlm s’owm nuŋ ɔb ɛm ec’ów a eke s’uw any Krist e lís ab af ij, kɔ s’íman anym eci low yɛgm ek’ot agŋ ɛgbɛl ɔmn ɛm ec’ab es. Ɛmɛny ow itm yɛj’eke wɛl k’ɛwl ow ów a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm a ec’es igŋ ɛlu owi af lele ɛy ec’ɔmn a eke si k’oc s’ɛlu Nyam ɛm a yɛji e low af ij.
Ow ibram yɛj’eke ɛmɛny wɛl ki yɛgm ɔny low sos es yɔyɔg ɛrŋ ɛrŋ e low af, ɛgŋ abu nuŋ at owi af, luw ɛm anŋ igb owi af, lele jɛj ok kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ ab e low af.
Ow sosiɛm a, eke Nyam ɛlu ɛy abusu es, si b’ow s’imn anym eci ów a ek’el Nyam e lís ec’a ec’any uw tasi ɛm.
Sica, bla wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad agŋ a ek’igŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɛlu es a e lís ee? Nyam ec’usuayl a ɛkan ɛl es, -li tat afr ec’ob ap a anm ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala.
-Li tat Nyam ec’odad ebl mamn a lele sɛgŋ ek’am ow e lɛc ab ab yɛji anm.

Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji -l’igŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a -l’ɛlu es. Agŋ amua, k’ɔtum sakp yony ɛm itŋnm es an ij. Tasi ɛm a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn Nyam ec’Iy a cɛ ɛmɛny wɛ’n am ɛw olikŋ af wɛl obi ɛm af ɛtŋ -li b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a ow eci wɛwr ec’abusu.
S’ócr ɔgm nyam e low s’ɔbar any: in e wus a b’ɔdu mij a fɛŋ eke nyàm b’an ke b’ok’r af a eb. Li b’ɔsu egb iju agŋ a eke kok’r juma af a ec’abu ɛlum eci. Ow b’ɔŋ Nyam b’ɛdŋ wus a ɔwrɔ.
Kɔ eke li b’ɔsu kati lele njoj ab, l’elm ob kaka. Ow k’ow ibnm Nyam b’ow digŋ ɛlu’l es ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow tɛtul il.
Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl s’am dad nɛnɛ, gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, s’uw any tasi eke ɔny anŋn ejagb mamn a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm ab af.

Nyam elm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs. Li k’ɔtum l’ijlm ów amamn a eke kokr ab es, l’ijlm erur a eke ɛlul ɔkm in e lís ab es. Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, ɛlul erur ikŋ na ɔkm agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sicaca ɛm yɛji ɔnyn es am kokr.
S’am erur cɛ ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ k’anŋ gbragbra kok ab ɛm toŋ ok nuŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke fɛŋ a eke am ɔman a ɛ́ŋan.
K’èel ɔ́rŋu, kɔ ìir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn ke ɔny ɛrm susu ab af. Agŋ amua, -li b’ɛŋn aja a eke Nyam ɛwar ow e low ɛw es a.
Eke Nyam ɛwar Abraham ob a, nɛny ij ab l’ɛwar. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ kaka agbm akam’n eke k’el nɛny ij na e daŋku, ow ɔŋ Nyam ofn in obi e nin ɛm.
Li dad Abraham ninɛ: M’ow m’ɛdŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ ke m’ɔ́ŋ ŋ ec’alaw ɛny bobn.
Abraham usur ɛrm toŋ ɛtŋ n’ɛŋn yec’a eke Nyam ɛwar ir ow e low ɛw es a.
Eke agŋ b’ij nɛny a, daŋku nyam eke agb akm ɛl a e nin ɛm li b’ij nɛny. Nɛny ij a b’ɔŋ ɛl e sodad a el tasi, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, wɛl ɔ́tum dadm low ɛjec’ij.
Ɛtŋ Nyam yɛji kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a: l’erur e li k’ɛlu ɔkm kpata eke low a e l’ɛwar in ec’agŋ a, k’ɔtum itŋnm lɛgŋ kaka. Ow sosiɛm anake l’ij nɛny l’igŋ in e low ɛwar ab af a.

Low ɛwar lele nɛny ij ab, el ów yony eke wɛl k’ɔtum ɔnym itŋnm, aŋke Nyam k’ɔtum ɔnym yadŋ. Ów yony na sosiɛm, ɛy eke s’igŋ fɛŋ s’ɛlu es a, si b’ow s’ɛŋn sos es atr ligbɛl, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’úcu low ɔmn a eke wɛl ɛw ɛy es a s’ɔny es.
Low ɔmn na, ɛy ec’a ow anŋ ɛsɛ ob leg leg nyam ek’ɔɔm ɛy e liy a abusu eke ki mumu af. Low ɔmn na el nawrɛ tasi ɛtŋ li b’ɛpir Nyamel a ek’anŋ afr a eci gbad ab ɛm, l’ɛy usu lala tasi a.
Yogŋ anake Jesu ikŋ anym ɛy, ɛy ec’a. Ɛtŋ l’el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ɛsɛ Mɛlkisedɛk ec’ab af.
Mɛlkisedɛk na, Salɛm ec’ɛb ebu lele Nyam Afr Kpekpe ec’ egb waw ɛs ab. Lɛgŋ a eke Abraham anŋ ar ɔkr ɛm am ow yogŋ a eke l’akm sɛb ebu ab es a, Mɛlkisedɛk im ɔbr’r ɛtŋ ɛdŋ’n ɔwrɔ.

Ɛtŋ Abraham ɔŋ’n ob fɛŋ eke l’ot a e lɛw ɛm a. Mɛlkisedɛk e nin a e nyandrɛ el 'ɛb ebu eke bi nyimn agŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm'. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, l’el Salɛm ec’ɛb ebu, ow e nyandrɛ el 'ɛb ebu eke b’ism ɛrm es ɛy ab'.
Wɛl uwm ɛs, lis lele lagŋɛl ab any. Wɛl am dadm in e mew a lele luw ab ab ec’odad. Gbɛkɔ li b’ot Nyam Jim es, aŋke l’el egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Ɛ̀kan elel eke Mɛlkisedɛk ɔny any a! Ɛy lagŋ ligbɛl Abraham bɔbɔ yɛji ɔŋ’n ob a fɛŋ eke n’ɛŋn ar ab ɛm a eci lɛw ɛm a.

Mois ec’ ol a ɔŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ek’el Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’a abusu eke -li k’ibrm Israɛl ec’agŋ a ɛl ec’ob fɛŋ eke -n’ɔnyn a e lɛw ɛm. -Li bibrm Israɛl ec’agŋ a ec’ob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm, ke agŋ amua, ɛl lisijimɛl ek’ɛl yɛji el Abraham ec’eb ɛm ec’agŋ cɛ.
Ke Mɛlkisedɛk, in, l’elm Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, n’ɛŋn Abraham ec’ob fɛŋ ek’ɛŋn a e lɛw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ in, l’ɛdŋ ɛgŋ na eke Nyam ɛwar low ɛw es a ɔwrɔ.
Bɛbar kaka anm ɛm, ɛgŋ ligbɛl a b’ɛdŋ likek a ɔwrɔ.
Egb waw ɛsɛl a eke b’ɛŋn dedeku a e mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a, el agŋ eke b’uw. Mɛlkisedɛk yɛji ɛŋn mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a, kɔ in, n’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl am dad ab af.
Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ey a anake b’ɛŋn dedeku a e mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a. Gbɛkɔ wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad eke Levi, in yɛji, Abraham ɛm a, n’ɛnm ob lɛw ɛm na.
Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke Abraham ɔbr Mɛlkisedɛk a eke wɛl k’ewm Levi yɛji, lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, l’ikŋ anym n’anŋ yogŋ lagŋ ɛm.

Israɛl eyŋ ec’ol ɛm a, Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ey a anake wɛl ki sɔsum ot el egb waw ɛsɛl a. Ɛtŋ -li b’el egb waw ɛsɛl ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Arɔn ɛm ab af. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ec’elel eke -li b’eel egb waw ɛsɛl a okm ɛm iym nɛny, blel ow iy nɛny, ke bla sosiɛm -li k’ɔny egb waw ɛs ɛjeci ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af ee? Ow b’ow el low eke ɔnym any ij.
Sica, eke egb waw ɛs ec’el a itŋn a, ol a yɛji it eke k’itŋn.
Sodad amua, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ af wɛl dad ok. In, eke l’el eb ɛjec’ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, ke eb ab ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka, ɛgŋ anm ɛym ɔkm kokm egb waw ɛs eci juma a.
Agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Juda ec’eb ab ɛm wɛl ew’r. Ɛtŋ Mois dadm eb na e low lɛgŋ a eke li dad egb waw ɛsɛl ec’odad a.
Ca gbɛ ów a fɛŋ am ayl, sica eke wɛl sigm egb waw ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke b’ot Mɛlkisedɛk es a.
L’elm egb waw ɛs agŋ e mew ec’ol ec’elel eke b’ɛkan ab ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, owr anŋ ek’ɔnym uwr a ec’abusu ab anake sigm’n es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs af a.
Nawrɛ tasi, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ŋ el egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af.
Ol sig a iym nɛny ɛtŋ elm low, ow ɔŋ wɛl ɔny fifn’n es.
Mois ec’ol a ɔsum liy sɔbɔ kaka. Gbɛkɔ wɛl ɔŋ ɛy low ɔmn nimamn tasi nyam, ɛtŋ si b’ɛcr in ɛm si titm Nyam.
Eke si b’ɛkn a ke Nyam ij nɛny sigm egb waw ɛs na es. Gbɛkɔ Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’a, -l’el egb waw ɛsɛl, eke nɛny ij anm ɛm.
Kɔ Jesu ec’a, Nyam ij nɛny lɛgŋ a eke li dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ij nɛny ɛtŋ li k’ow l’itŋnm ɛbr: El egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Ow am yɛgm ɛy eke Jesu anake el ɛgŋ a eke am ɔŋ ɛy s’uw any tasi eke sinm a eke Nyam kok ɛy ab a, akpl akm lisig a.
Ɛmɛny low anŋ eke ok ereb: egb waw ɛsɛl ɛjec’a ɛny nɔnɔ, aŋke luw ɔ́ɔm ɛl abusu eke -li k’anŋ egb waw ɛs el ab ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
Kɔ Jesu gbɛ, in, n’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ɛjeci k’ow elm egb waw ɛs in usuiy a.
Na sosiɛm anake l’ɔtu eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ li k’eb agŋ a eke bi titm Nyam a l’ɛlu es in ec’abu ɛlum ɛm a. Eke sica Jesu anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’a, l’ɔtu eke li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ wɛl eci.
Jesu el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl tasi a eke k’el ɛy ec’a. L’el lala, n’ɔnym low ɔbr, ɛtŋ l’itam ɛm kaka, n’anm ɛsɛ ɛy sikpl ɛsɛl af, ɛtŋ afr Nyam usr’r sos ligbɛl.

Jesu anm ɛsɛ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ɛjec’ab af. Ow ibram eke lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ li ki waw egb in obi in obi e sikpl a eci, ke ɛmɛny li waw dedeku a eci. In sosi eke l’ocr li wawr egb a, ow el egb waw a eke li kok akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’a.

Mois ec’ol a bi sigm agŋ eke iym nɛny ab es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl af. Kɔ Nyam e nɛny ij a eke anŋ ol e jam ow a, sigm Iy ab es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl af, in eke l’iy nɛny l’igŋ nuŋ akpo akpo fɛŋ ec’a.
Kin low a eke s’am erur eke si ki dad a e liy a tasi: ɛy s’ɔny egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam ɛsɛ na eke si dad in e low ab af. Li sig es afr, Nyam ek’ɔny abusu a e lidr abu af.
Li bi kok in e juma a usu lala a, afr eci nuŋ igŋ usu tasi a. Ɛɛ, afr eci gbad ɛm êl tasi a, ow elm Israɛl ec’agŋ a usm, kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in obi anake us’r a.
Egb waw ɛs fɛŋ eke wɛl sigm es a e juma eke bi kok a el ob ap lele egb waw ab. Ow it eke ɛy ec’a yɛji k’ɔny ob ap nyam ɔŋ Nyam.
Blel Krist anŋ wus af aŋa yɛji, li k’elm egb waw ɛs, aŋke egb waw ɛsɛl ikŋ anym anŋ eke am kok juma na ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ol a ibrm ab af.

Egb waw ɛsɛl amua am kok juma usu lala ek’el afr ec’usu lala tasi a e sɛwl a lele ow ec’es otarir ab ab eci. Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke Mois am ow us gbad ɛm êl a, Nyam dad’r ninɛ: Lɛ̀r, b’ow kok fɛŋ ɛsɛ sɛwl a eke mi yɛgm’ŋ ɛkn lafɛny af ab af.

Kɔ sica, ɛy ec’egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Jesu, wɛl abul il juma ek’agb nɔnɔ akm egb waw ɛsɛl ɛjec’a ec’a. Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, n’am ism sinm owr nyam ek’el Nyam eci, ke ɔny any nɔnɔ akm sinm sig a. Ɛtŋ Nyam ɛwar ów amamn nɔnɔ eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a, l’ɛw es sinm owr na ɛm.
Blel krɛkrɛ e sinm a itam ɛm ana, blel ow ibram Nyam kokm yony ɛm eci usrm’n usu.
Gbɛkɔ, kin low a eke Nyam am ɛnym in ec’agŋ a, ow ec’abr a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: Sɛgŋ am ow eke mi b’ow mi kok sinm owr Israɛl ec’agŋ a lele Juda ec’agŋ ab ab.
Sinm na k’ow anm ɛsɛ yec’a eke mi kok ɛl lagŋɛl ab, lɛgŋ a eke m’ɔny ɛl abu m’ot m’ok ɛl ɔkm Ejipt a. Ɛtŋ -l’ɛgŋm -l’ijm nɛny nyam ɛm e sinm a e lís; ow ɔŋ, ɛm yɛji, m’igŋ m’ɛlu ɛl es.

Gbɛkɔ kin sɛgŋ na ɛm a, sinm a eke m’am m’ow mi kok Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab a: Ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, mi b’ow m’oc ɛm e sol a m’ɛlu ɛl e tutr ab ɛm, mi b’ow mi nɔn sol a ɛl e mɛrm ab ɛm. Mi b’ow m’el ɛl e Nyam ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el ɛm ec’agŋ.
Ɛtŋ ow k’ow ibram eke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ki yɛgm in ec’ɛb iy oglog lisijim ɛm ec’any uw e low ij, aŋke ɛl pupukpaŋ -li b’ow -l’uw’m any, ɛl kpaŋ, igŋ ey toŋ ok ɛgbɛl.
Low nawrɛ, aŋke mi b’ow m’ap ɛl e sikpl a ɛtŋ mi k’ow m’ɔknm ow e low mru mru mru.
Eke Nyam bi dad sinm owr e low, ke sinm krɛkrɛ a, lisig n’ɔŋ ow el a. Sica ob nyam ek’el lisig ke am usu a, el ob eke in ec’irm ibnm.
Krɛkrɛ eci sinm a ɔny in ec’ów ek’anŋ’n ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ a eci lele Nyam ec’ usu lala eke wɛl kok ab wus af aŋa.
Ow sosiɛm a, wɛl us gbad ɛm êl nyam eke wɛl bubr oj yony ɛm yogŋ. Krɛkrɛ ec’usu a wɛl ɛsŋ’n 'usu lala', yogŋ anake kɛniɛ nyam eke ok ál lɔbŋ lele tabl a eke futufutu a eke wɛl b’ap Nyam ab ab anŋ a.
Sica, gbad yony ɛm a e jam a, el gbad ɛm êl a ec’ogog yony ɛm a. Yogŋ wɛl ɛsŋ’n 'usu lala tasi'.

Yogŋ, ogŋ ofŋ usu sika ɛm anŋ; ɛtŋ sinm araka eke sos af a el sika ɛm yɛji anŋ. Sinm araka ab ɛm, sika ɛm kpokpo nyam anŋ eke afr eci futufutu iy gbɔŋ; ɛtŋ Arɔn e kpama a eke gigŋ suw ɔdɔdɔ a yɛji anŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, mebn a eke af yogŋ wɛl nɔn sinm e sodad a yɛji anŋ ɛm.

Araka a e nuŋ af a, Serubɛnɛl eke wɛl aku am yɛgm eke Nyam ec’anygbɛl a anŋ aŋa. Ɛl ec’ɔw a e lɔw a am bubur araka a e nɛny ab es, yogŋ a eke wɛl b’ok sikpl oc ap e mebl ab es a. Gbɛkɔ aŋa si k’ow si dadm obli nyam nyam e lís ec’odad.
Gbad ɛm êl ab ɛm, nɛnɛ anake wɛl sisigm ów a. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, egb waw ɛsɛl a b’ok krɛkrɛ ec’usu a kok ɛl e juma a.
Kɔ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a sɔny cɛ b’ɛy êl a ec’ogog yony ɛm a, akp nyam cɛ lakpo nimum eci. Yogŋ li b’oc ndey e mebl ab n’im li wawr egb n’ɔŋ Nyam in obi in obi e sikpl a eci lele dedeku a nimum ec’ab.
Kin low yec’eke Abŋ Lala am erur eke ki yɛgm a: eke krɛkrɛ eci gbad ɛm êl na anŋ a, usu lala tasi a ec’ejagb a ki figm.

Ow el low ek’el yɛfɛnyna ɛm eci. Ɛtŋ kin ow e nyandrɛ a: ɛgŋ ek’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ ke am ibi mindey ap’r oglog am waw egb ɔŋ’n a, k’ow ɔtum ów amua e kok ɛm ɔnym ɛrm es ɛy Nyam ɛm in ec’ów tutr ɛm toŋ ow ok nuŋ.
Ow el sol ek’el sos megl af eci cɛ ɛsɛ: ob ij, mar lele sos ayal e mij ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke wɛl b’ok ab ab. Sol amua fɛŋ ɔny any toŋ ow ok lɛgŋ a eke Nyam titŋn ɛl fɛŋ yec’a eke ɔny any nɔnɔ akm ɛl ab ab a.

Gbɛkɔ Krist ow ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl af ɔŋ ɛy ów amamn a eke anŋ a. L’ɛcr gbad ɛm êl nyam ek’agb el sɔbɔ akm wus af aŋa ec’ab ɛm. Êl a, el ob eke ow elm agŋ ec’abu usm, ow e nyandrɛ el; ow elm ɛy e wus na eke wɛl kok a ec’ob.

Krist ɛy usu lala tasi a ek’el Nyam e saw a, akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. L’ocm sican lele sed gɔŋ gɔŋ ey ab e mebl a li kokrm egb waw, kɔ in obi in obi e mebl a l’oc li kokr egb waw ɛtŋ li sɔg ɛy sikpl ec’abu ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.

Tasi ɛm a, wɛl b’oc sican lele sed gɔŋ gɔŋ ey ab e mebl a lele id yɔw eke wɛl ofŋ e milakŋ a, ok agŋ a eke kok sikpl ab af. Ow b’ayal ɛl sos sikpl a e lís, ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ ɛl abusu owr eke -li k’igŋ Nyam nuŋ.

Eke na eke wɛl dad a el low nawrɛ, ke Krist eci mebl a, in ɔtu eke k’ɔny mbas nɔnɔ. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ a ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a ec’abusu ɛm, Krist ocr in sosi ap Nyam, ɛsɛ ndey a eke ítam ɛm ke wɛl b’oc kokr egb waw ab af. Ɛbɛn a, li b’ow l’ayal ɛy e tutr a, eke ów eŋuŋ eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm a ibar a, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́tu si kok Nyam ek’anŋ owr a e low.

Na sosiɛm anake Krist el ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ ɛy lele Nyam ab ec’araŋn, ke oc sinm owr a ism Nyam ec’agŋ a. L’uw, agŋ ec’es eb ɛlu sosiɛm, ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ a eke -li kokr ow a eke -n’anŋn krɛkrɛ e sinm a ec’es ɛw ɛm a. Ɛbɛn ke agŋ eke Nyam ɛsŋ a, ɔ́tu ɛŋn ów a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛl ow e low ɛw es ke anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam nɔn aja ij e lɛl ɛw es a, gbuŋ ke wɛl kók lɛl ab ɛm e low a, ow it ke wɛl yɛ́gm eke lɛl nɔn ɛs a uw.
Tasi ɛm a, aja ij eci lɛl nɛnɛ eke wɛl bi nɔn ɛw es a, ɛgŋ a eke nɔn a b’uw gbuŋ ɛtŋ wɛl bi kok ow e low. Sica ek’ɛgŋ a anŋ owr ke k’uwm a, lɛl a elm low kaka.
Ɛbɛn nyam coco, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke Nyam am bɛbm Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab sinm owi a, wɛl ikŋ anym ibi mindey ɛtŋ wɛl ok ɛl eci mebl ab es.

Sica dedeku a nimum ec’any af, Mois ikŋ anym awl sodad a pupukpaŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl b’ɛŋn ɛl ol ab ɛm ab af. Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, l’ot sed gɔŋ gɔŋ a lele sican ab ab e mebl a li wuwlm mij ab ɛtŋ l’oc isɔp ikŋ eci lal nyam eke wɛl ucu licɛb suw nɛny af a, ɛtŋ n’am usm mebl ab ɛm li fufŋ ol e lɛl ab af lele bieku a nimum ab.
Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: Na el sinm eci mebl a eke Nyam am ibrm ɔny eke k’ɛlumn a.
Ɛbɛn cɛ Mois oc mebl ufŋ gbad ɛm êl a lele mob mob a fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ot kokr Nyam nuŋ igŋ e low ab ab.
Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke ol dadr ab af, mebl anake b’ayal ob fɛŋ a. Eke wɛl okm mebl es, ɛy e sikpl a ec’oc ap anm.
Sica eke ow el nɛnɛ wɛl k’ayal mob a eke el ɛl a ek’anŋ afr a eci any ɔkŋnin, ɛbɛn ke ɛl tasi a ek’anŋ afr a ibrm segb waw sɔbɔ tasi.

Tasi ɛm a, Krist ɛym usu lala nyam eke el agŋ ec’abu ec’eke us ab ɛm; usu lala a el afr ec’usu lala tasi a ek’anŋ a eci any ɔkŋnin cɛ. Kɔ afr nana anake Krist ɛy yogŋ a eke l’uw es inym ɛy e ŋɔŋn ɔŋ eci Nyam ec’any af a.
Lakpo fɛŋ, Jwifɛl ec’ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a b’ɛy usu lala tasi a mebl eke elm in ec’ab ab. Gbɛkɔ Krist, in, l’uyum afr eke li ki wawr in sosi egb sakp nɔnɔ.

Blel ow el ɛbɛn ana, blel l’ij luw e gbre sakp nɔnɔ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke wɛl kok wus nimum a. Nawrɛ ɛm a, ca sɛgŋ na ek’el sɛgŋ es abal el ab ɛm, Nyam ɛlu’l ɔkm akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, in sosi ec’egb a eke li wawr ab ɛm, ni ŋuŋn sikpl.
Ow akpl e k’uwr any eke Nyam bɛbm ɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’akp nyam a eke k’uw a e low ɛw es, ke sica ow e jam a li jɛ́j ow e low l’ok.

Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn nɛny nyam cɛ, Nyam oc Krist kokr egb waw akp nyam coco, agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap eci. Li b’ow l’ɛlu sos ɔkm sakp yony ɛm eci, ow elm sikpl oc ap ec’ij, kɔ agŋ a ek’am eku in e mɛny ɛwl ow a e sel ɛŋn ɔŋ eci.
