In ec’akr a am jɛjn ɛsɛ jawie eke wɛl ɛtŋ ke al ayal af. Ɛtŋ in eci lebl a b’il ɛsɛ okij e mra eke b’ɛlu ab af.
In e lidr abu ab ɛm, l’ucu mílɛ́l lɔbŋ n’ɔny es, ɛtŋ lab ler ɛm ek’any yony a b’ufu a am ɛy’r ɔkm nɛnym. In ec’any a am jɛjn ɛsɛ lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ e ligbn af.
Eke m’ɛkn’n a, m’ɛy wus in ec’akr ew a ɛsɛ ek’ɛm m’uw cɛ af. L’oc in eci lidr abu a l’ɛw’m af ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Erŋn k’ɔ́ny’ŋ! M’el Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab.
M’el ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ owr a. M’uw, gbɛkɔ ca m’anŋ owr godo godo fɛŋ eci; ɛtŋ m’ɔny abusu luw lele ɔŋnes baŋn ab af.
Sica nɔ̀n yec’a ek’ɛkn a, yec’a ek’am ɛy caca ɛm a lele yec’a eke b’ow ɛy ow eci jam ab ab.
Kin mílɛ́l lɔbŋ a ek’ɛkn ɛm e lidr abu ab ɛm a lele sika ɛm mun al ob lɔbŋ ab ab eci nyandrɛ: mílɛ́l lɔbŋ a el Nyamel lɔbŋ a eci afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ kɛniɛ lɔbŋ a el Nyamel lɔbŋ a".
"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Efɛs e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɔnym mílɛ́l lɔbŋ ab in e lidr abu ab ɛm, ke am an es sika ɛm mun al ob lɔbŋ a ec’araŋn a am dad:

M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any, m’uw ŋ eci sos es atr a lele ŋ eci ɛrm susu ab ab any. M’uw any eke k’ɔtum ɛgŋm ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl e low ebm; ɛtŋ agŋ a eke bi dad eke ɛl ɛrm ɛsɛl ke elm a, ɔny igbl ɛl ogŋ ɛkn, ɛtŋ ɛkn eke -l’el ayadŋu.
Ŋ, ɔny ɛrm susu, ij gbre ɛm e nin a sosiɛm ɛtŋ sos ɔwm’ŋ es kaka.
Gbɛkɔ low a eke m’ɔny ŋ ab a cɛ el: ɔnym erur krɛkrɛ a ek’ɔny ɛm ec’a ij.
Sica ɔ̀kn lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm eci elel eke ɔnyn ɛm ec’erur a, ìtŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke kók ɛsɛ nuŋ ɔb ɛm ec’ab af. Eke itŋnm, mi b’ow m’ow m’ɛŋn’ŋ, ke m’ɔ́ny ŋ eci mun al ob a m’oc es yogŋ a eke ow anŋ a.
Gbɛkɔ yec’eke akpl ŋ ec’a el: ɛsɛ ɛm af, ifn Nikolayitɛl eci low kok a.
Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a ek’anŋ Nyam ec’egb ɔgm a e liy a l’ij.' "
"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Simirna e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’el Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab, ɛgŋ a ek’uw ke ɛwl anŋ owr a am dad:
M’uw ŋ e gbre lele gbɔr ab any, gbɛkɔ tasi ɛm a, ŋ gbreŋgbi! M’uw sos keskes ek’agŋ a ek’el Jwifɛl ke b’ocr ɛl sosi Nyam ec’agŋ ke elm a bi kokr’ŋ ab any; -l’el Satan eci nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl.
B’ow ij gbre, gbɛkɔ k’ùru erŋn. Agn b’ow ot ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb ok sobel ɛm ɔny eci ɛbm ɛkn eci, ɛtŋ b’ow ijr gbre toŋ sɛgŋ lɛw. Ìj nɛny nyam toŋ luw ɛm, ke m’ɔ́ŋ’ŋ sel ɛŋn e tufɛ a.
Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a. Ɛgŋ eke b’ow eb any a, k’ow ɛknm luw yony ɛm a e low ij.' "
"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Pɛrgam e Nyamel ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɔnym lab ler ɛm ek’any yony a b’ufu a am dad:

M’uw usu a ek’ir ab any, yogŋ anake Satan ec’atufu lɛkpn a anŋ a. Ucu ɛm e nin a ɔny es, ɛtŋ walm ɔmn ek’ɔny ɛm ɛm a ɛlum es, toŋ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke wɛl ibi Antipas a yɛji, ɛm eci daŋku ij ɛs cɛcɛ ɔny ogŋ a, yogŋ a eke Satan ir a.

Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny abr eke mi k’ɛnym’ŋ: ŋ ogŋ yogŋ, agŋ anŋ eke ucu Balam eci low yɛgm a ɔny es. Balam anake ɔŋ Balak nuŋ ɛm eke k’uk Israɛl ec’ey meb a. L’itr wɛl eke wɛl k’ij mindey eke agŋ ibi kokr egb waw ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ, ke wɛl íj nfaci yɛji.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ŋ ogŋ a cɛ, agŋ anŋ eke ucu Nikolayitɛl eci low yɛgm a ɔny es.
Ow sosiɛm, ìtŋn ɛrm ɛm gɔŋ. Eke itŋnm, ow k’ow ibnm, mi b’ow m’ow ŋ ogŋ yogŋ ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ogŋ agŋ amua ar, ɛm e lab ler ɛm any yony a eke anŋ’m nɛnym am ɛy’m ɔkm ab ɛm.

Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a. Ɛgŋ yec’a eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n afr eci futufutu eke lɔl es a. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n lebn ufu nyam, ɛtŋ lebn ab af nin owr nyam eke wɛl nɔn a b’ow anŋ. Ɛgŋ kaka k’ow uwm nin na any, ek’ow elm ɛgŋ a cɛ ek’ɛŋn lebn a.' "
"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Tiatir e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a. 'Kin odad yec’eke Nyam Jim a ek’anyamn ɛm am jɛjn ɛsɛ al af, ke akr yɛji am jɛjn ɛsɛ jawie eke wɛl ɛtŋ af a, am dad:
M’uw ŋ e sijuma a, ŋ ec’erur a, ŋ ec’ɔmn a, ŋ e juma a eke bi kok ɔŋ agŋ a lele ŋ ec’ɛrm susu ab ab any. Ɛtŋ sica m’uw any eke jam aŋa, ŋ e juma a eke am kok a ɛny akm krɛkrɛ ec’a.

Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny abr nyam eke mi k’ɛnym’ŋ: am yɛb Jesabɛl, yɔw na eke am dad eke Nyam ec’odad in am dad, ke am irmn ɛm e juma kok ɛsɛl, yɛgm ɛl eke -li k’ij nfaci, ke -l’ij mindey eke wɛl wawr egb ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ a.
M’ok’r sɛgŋ es eke li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm, kɔ l’erurm eke li k’igŋ in eci nfaci ij na l’ɛlu es.
Ow sosiɛm a, mi b’ow m’ɛrum’n es gbre ij ec’ob ɛrur ob af, ɛtŋ eke agŋ a ek’ij nfaci in ab a itŋnm ɛrm ɛm a, -li b’ow -l’ij gbre nɔnɔ ɛsɛ ow af.
Mi b’ow m’ibi in ec’agŋ a yɛji, ɛtŋ Sinyamel a fɛŋ b’ow uw any eke m’el ɛgŋ a ek’uw agŋ e tutr lele ɛl ec’erur ab a any a. Ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam yec’a eke li kok a ec’ow ek’it a.

Sica ɔny Tiatir e Nyamel ab ɛm ec’agŋ likpr a, ɔny eke ɛgŋmn ucumn low yɛgm yadŋ na ɔnymn es, ɔlmn eke k’uwr yec’a eke -l’ɛsŋn Satan eci low any uw eke lɔl es ab any a, m’uyulm ɔny low ɛjeci kaka fɛŋ ij.
Gbɛkɔ yec’a ek’ɛŋan a, ùcur ɔnyn es toŋ ke m’ánŋ m’ow.

Agŋ a eke b’ow kok ɛm ec’erur a toŋ ók nuŋ a, ɛl anake -li b’ow -l’eb any a. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl abusu a eke m’eb ɛm Ɛs ogŋ a. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl -n’ɔny abusu ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ af. -Li b’ow -l’ɛw wɛl es lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li bɔbm wɛl es ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl bi bɔbm ereŋ es ab af. Ɛmɛny mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl ibribr eci lɛ́l a yɛji.
Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a ek’Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "

"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Sard e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɔnym Nyam ec’abŋ lɔbŋ a lele mílɛ́l lɔbŋ ab ab a am dad: M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any. Agŋ bi tutr eke anŋ owr, kɔ tasi ɛm a, uw!
Ùfŋm es! Ke yec’a eke anŋ’ŋ ke k’uwm a, ɔ́ŋ’n n’anŋ kikri gbuŋ ke l’úw nimum nimum. M’ɛkn eke ŋ ec’ów a bɛbmnm tasi, ɛm e Nyam a ec’a ek’am erur ab ab.
Ɔ̀kn yec’a eke iri ke eb a, ùcu ɔny es ke ítŋn ɛrm ɛm. Eke ufŋam es, mi b’ow m’ow kpru ɛm ɛsɛ ulu af m’oc’ŋ, ɛtŋ k’ow uwm wanci ab af eke mi b’ow m’ow ab any.
Gbɛkɔ Sard yogŋ, ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam ibarm ɛl eci mob sus ɛm a. Agŋ amua b’ow anŋ mob efu ɛm ɛc ɛm ab, aŋke -l’it.
Ɛbɛn eke agŋ a eke b’ow eb any a b’ow sus mob efu ana. Mi k’ow mi tɛtŋm ɛl ec’en ab es sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs lel in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ec’any af, mi b’ow mi dad eke agŋ amua el ɛm eci.
Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "

"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Filadɛlfi e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’el lala lele low nawrɛ ab a, ɛgŋ a eke ɔnym ɛb ebu David eci safuɛ ab ab, bi fig ke ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́tum ablm, b’abl ke ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́tum figm a am dad:
M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any; mi fig lisany nyam m’ɛw’ŋ es any af eke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ablm. Lɛc tɛl cɛ ɔny, gbɛkɔ ucu ɛm ec’odad a ɔny es ɛtŋ dadm eke uwm im any.

Kin low eke mi b’ow mi kok Jwifɛl ek’el Satan ec’ogog ec’agŋ a eke b’ocr ɛl sosi Nyam ec’agŋ, ke ow b’el yadŋ a: mi b’ow m’ɔny ɛl lɛc ɛm -l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’uw any eke mi b’erur’ŋ.
Eke ɔsu ol a eke m’ɔŋ’ŋ eke k’usur ɛrm a, ɛm yɛji mi b’ow m’ɔsu’ŋ gbre eci lɛgŋ a eke b’ow ow wus nimum af ɛbm wus ec’agŋ a fɛŋ a.
Ow k’ow ibnm eke mi b’ow m’ow. Ow sosiɛm, yec’a ek’ɔny a, ùcu ɔny es kikri yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ébm ŋ ec’any eb e tufɛ a.

Agŋ a eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔsŋm ɛl es ɛm Ɛs eci Nyamel ab ɛm ɛsɛ êl ec’akr ab af, ɛtŋ -li k’ow -l’okmn ɔkm ij. Mi b’ow mi nɔn ɛm e Nyam a eci nin a lele in ec’ɛb a eci nin ab ab agŋ amua eke ɛŋn any ab af. Ɛb a, in l’el Jerusalɛm owr a eke b’ow anŋ afr, ɛm e Nyam a ogŋ us es a. Mi b’ow mi nɔn nin owr a eke m’ɛŋn a yɛji ɛl af.
Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a ek’Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "
"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Laodise ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'M’el ɛgŋ a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Amɛn, ɛgŋ a ek’el daŋku ij ɛs cɛcɛ lele low nyim nyim ab a, ɛgŋ a eke anŋ ów fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a e nuŋ ɔb ɛm a. Kin ɛm eci odad a:
M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any, ɛtŋ m’ɛkn eke ɛwm dra ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛwm gbagba yɛji. Blel ɔtu el ów yony ab ɛm e nyam yɛji, ow ɛ́w afanma.
Kɔ sica ek’el dede, ke elm dra oglog gbagba a, mi b’ow m’ɛgbl m’ɛlu’ŋ es.
Ŋ bi dad ɛsɛ: m’ɔny os nɔnɔ, m’ɔnym low kaka ec’es abur. Kɔ tasi ɛm a, ŋ uwm any eke el gbre ɛs, ɔny sɔrŋ nɔnɔ, el gbɔru, el any eflu lele sos ɔfr ɛs ab.

Ow sosiɛm a, kin ów eke m’am ɔm’ŋ: òw ɛm ogŋ a, ɔ̀l sika eke al ɛlu ow eci sayl a ɔkm a, ke él gbreŋgbi. Òw ɔl mob sus ɛm efu sus, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ánm sos ɔfr ɛ́s ɔnym’ŋ. Òw ɔl sɛkp ok ŋ ec’anyamn ab ɛm, ke ɛ́kn es.
Agŋ a fɛŋ eke mi b’erur a, mi b’ɛnym ɛl abr ɛtŋ mi b’ɛw low m’ɔŋ ɛl. Ɛ̀lu lɛc ij ɔkm ke ítŋn ɛrm ɛm.
Sica m’inym es lisany ɛtŋ m’am icm abu. Eke ɛgŋ nyam iri’m lebl ɛtŋ fig’m lisany a, mi b’ow m’ɛy’r akŋ, mi b’ow m’us abu in ab ɛtŋ in yɛji li b’ow l’us abu ɛm ab.
Agŋ a eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl abusu -li sig es ɛm ab, ɛm eci atufu lɛkpn ab af, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm yɛji eke m’eb any a, ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m abusu mi sig es in ab, in eci atufu lɛkpn af ab af.
Ke ɛgŋ yec’ek’ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a ek’Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "
Ɛmɛny ow e jam a, m’ɛkn low ɛjeci. Afr, m’ɛkn lisany nyam eke fig, ɛtŋ lebl a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ krɔkr eci lebl af ke m’ikŋ anym m’iri a, dad’m ninɛ: "Ùyu af aŋa, ke mi yɛ́gm’ŋ ow e jam ec’ów eke b’ow ow a."
Kpɛkŋ Abŋ oc’m ɛtŋ afr yogŋ, m’ɛkn atufu lɛkpn nyam ek’ɛgŋ nyam sig es af.
Ɛgŋ a eke sig es af a eci jɛjn a am ot mebn sɔbɔ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ es ɛsɛ jasp lele sarduan ab af. Nyamgodi eke am jɛjn ɛsɛ lebn emerod af a iwr ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm.
Atufu lɛkpn likŋ lele yar ab did iwr ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ligbɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab sig es af. -Li sus mob efu ɛtŋ -l’us sika tufɛ.
Afr eci ŋɛŋn lele nyamgbrany ab ab am anŋ atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm ok ɔkm. Mrabri lɔbŋ eke wɛl gigŋ a am iri any af yogŋ. Mrabri lɔbŋ a el Nyam ec’abŋ lɔbŋ a.
Atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af a, okij ek’ayl toŋ am ɛkan es ke ot lebn ufu pum pum es anŋ. Araŋn yogŋ, mindey yar eke ɛl ec’anym lele jam ab a el anyamn ɔfr a, iwr did ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm.
Krɛkrɛ eci ndey a anŋ ɛsɛ kukuma af, yony ɛm ec’a anŋ ɛsɛ id liy af, nyahan ɛm ec’a ɛli any ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ec’ab af, ɛtŋ yar ɛm ec’a anŋ ɛsɛ káká ek’igb nyɛnyn ɔw es af.

Mindey yar amua e nyam nyam ɛli ɔw nɔhɔn, ɛtŋ -l’ɛli anyamn eb ɛl ɔw a nimum, ew lele af ab. Ɛtŋ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab nɛny b’anŋ ɛl ɛm -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Lala, lala, lala el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs eci, in eke n’anŋ god’ɛtŋ, n’anŋ yɛfɛnyna ke n’am ow a eci."

Ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a, mindey yar a bi kɔklm’n, b’usr’r sos ɛtŋ b’ɔŋ’n bia. Ɛtŋ sakp sakp fɛŋ eke -li bi kɔklm ow a, agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab ab a b’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a ec’any af. -Li b’igŋ ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’a nuŋ. -Li b’ot ɛl eci sika tufɛ a -li wɔwl atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af yogŋ ke -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ:
"O, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛy e Nyam, it eke k’ɛŋn anygbɛl, es susm lel abusu ab, aŋke ŋ kok ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ ŋ ec’erur ɛm ob fɛŋ anŋ owr ɛtŋ b’ok sel."
Sica m’ɛkn lɛl nyam eke wɛl ar es ke anŋ ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a e lidr abu ab ɛm. Wɛl nɔn lɛl a any lele jam ab, ɛtŋ wɛl ɔnyn nɛnyɛmbri ab es, es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ ab.
Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm e lɛc ɛs nyam eke am ɔg lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛsɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ it eke ki bɔbm es ɔnyan ob amua es ke fíg lɛl na ee?"
Ke ow el afr, wus af aŋa lele wus ew ab, ɛgŋ kaka anm eke k’ɔtu fig lɛl a bake lɛr ow e lokm a.
Ow ɔŋ m’ikŋ ɔŋn nɔnɔ eke ɛgŋ kaka k’anm itm eke ki fig lɛl a bake ɔtu lɛr ow e lokm a.
Gbɛkɔ agŋ ekpekp ab ɛm e nyam dad’m ninɛ: "K’ìkŋ ɔŋn! Kin Juda ec’eb ab ɛm e kukuma a, ɛb ebu David eci lilaw a eb any, li b’ow li bɔbm es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ ab es ke li fíg lɛl a."

Sica ɛmɛny m’ɛkn atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab, ɛtŋ m’ɛkn licɛbli nyam eke wɛl ibi egb waw eci, ke inym es ɛl eci araŋn. L’ɛli ɔcɔwr lɔbŋ lele anyamn lɔbŋ ab. Anyamn lɔbŋ a el abŋ lɔbŋ a eke Nyam ɛrm ow wus nimum af a.
Licɛbli a ɛri im ɛtŋ oc lɛl a ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a eci lidr abu ab ɛm.

Kpɛkŋ mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab ab ok ɔwrɔkp wus licɛbli a ec’any af. Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔnym saŋgo nyam ab lele sika ɛm kpɔk eke ogŋ iy ɛm gbɔŋ ab, ke el agŋ lala a eci nyam ŋɔŋn a.

-N’am ɛgŋ ɛj owr nyam: "Ŋ cɛ it eke k’oc lɛl a ke bɔ́bm es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ ab es, aŋke wɛl ibi’ŋ oc’ŋ wawr ŋ egb ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, eb eb fɛŋ ɛm, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ɛm, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ɛm ab, ɛwl sɔg agŋ ɔŋ Nyam.
Kok ɛl -l’el gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ, -l’el egb waw ɛsɛl eke ki kok juma ɛy e Nyam a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɛw wus na nimum es."
Sica ɛmɛny mi lɛr ɛtŋ m’am iri afr ɛrm ɛsɛl nɔnɔ gbɛl e lebl. -N’ɛny nɔnɔ ligbɛl, -l’iwr atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp yar ab ab -l’ɛlul ɛm.
-N’am ɛgŋ ɛj lebl gege ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Licɛbli a eke wɛl wawr egb a cɛ it eke k’ɛŋn abusu, ob ɔny, sɛwr lele lɛc ab; es susm, anygbɛl lele kɔklm ab!"

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’iri eke ob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok anŋ afr, wus af aŋa, wus ew lele okij ɛm ab a, ob fɛŋ eke anŋ owr a am ɛgŋ ɛj dad ɛsɛ: "Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kɔklm, anygbɛl lele abusu ab él ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a lele licɛbli ab ab eci!"
Ɛtŋ mindey yar a am ɛlu 'Amɛn!' Ɛtŋ agŋ ekpekp a am ok ɔwrɔkp wus igŋ Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab nuŋ.
Ow e jam a, m’ɛkn licɛbli a ɔny es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ a eci krɛkrɛ a ɔb es, ɛtŋ m’iri mindey yar ab ɛm e nyam barm lebl ek’anŋ ɛsɛ nyamgbrany ec’ikŋ ab af ninɛ: "Òw!"
Mi bi lɛr a, m’ɛkn gbaŋkɔ ufu nyam. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ɔnym bin ab, ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ’n any eb e tufɛ. L’ikŋ anym l’eb any ɛtŋ ɛmɛny n’aam any eb eci.
Eke licɛbli a bɔbm yony ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’iri mindey yar ab ɛm e yony ɛm ec’a eke am dad ɛsɛ: "Òw!"
Ɛtŋ gbaŋkɔ ɛjeci nyam ɛy ɔkm. L’ebl es ɛsɛ al af. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ɛŋn abusu eke k’ɔny ɛrm es ɛy oc es wus na af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ agŋ ibirir ɛl ɔfr. Ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ’n lab ler ɛm ligbɛl nyam.
Eke licɛbli a bɔbm nyahan ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’iri mindey yar a e nyahan ɛm ec’a eke am dad ɛsɛ: "Òw!" Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn gbaŋkɔ ibr nyam. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ɔnym toy ab.

M’iri ob nyam am ikŋ ɛsɛ lebl nyam ek’anŋ mindey yar a ec’araŋn af, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀wŋn ble kilo nyam lɛgŋ nyam e juma kok e labm sɔg eci; ke ɛ́wŋn ɔrj gbɛ kilo nyahan lɛgŋ nyam e juma kok e labm sɔg eci. Gbɛkɔ Lek, k’ìtŋn oliv e mun a lele viny e mar ab ab gbɛ abu."
Eke licɛbli a bɔbm yar ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’iri mindey yar ab ɛm e yar ɛm ec’a eke am dad ɛsɛ: "Òw!"

Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn gbaŋkɔ nyam ek’ɛw mufu mufu. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a, wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Luw, ɛtŋ ɔŋnes baŋn am us’r jam. Wɛl ɔŋ ɛl abusu wus ec’ɔy yar ab ɛm e nyam ɛm ec’agŋ ab af, eke -li k’ibi wɛl ar ogŋ ɛm, lek owi ɛm, ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm lele mindey eŋuŋ ɛm ab.

Eke licɛbli a bɔbm yen ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’ɛkn egb waw usu a ec’ew a, agŋ agŋ eke wɛl ibi a eci liy a. Wɛl ibi ɛl nɛny nyam eke -l’ijr Nyam odad eci lele daŋku eke -l’ijr ow ec’ab ab sosiɛm.
-N’am ɔg lɛc ɛm -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Es Ɛw Ɛs Lala, Es Ɛw Ɛs Nawrɛ, kɔ toŋ ba bogŋ lɛgŋ iy b’ow jɛj wus ec’agŋ a e low ok, íbrm ɛl ɛy e luw a eci low ee?"
Sica wɛl ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam nyam mob sus ɛm ufu, ɛtŋ wɛl dad ɛl eke ɛmɛny -li k’eku sɛgŋ tɛl, toŋ bake wɛl íbi ɛl lisijimɛl a eke am kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma a ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl ibi ɛl ab af a, ów yibr ɛl.
Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn licɛbli a eke am bɔbm nɔhɔn ɛm ec’es ɔnyan ob ab es a, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wus umu lɛc ɛm; ligbn ibr pri pri pri ɛsɛ niŋn mob af, ɛtŋ awl ebl es kondoŋ ɛsɛ mebl af.
Mílɛ́l anŋ afr am ok wus ɛsɛ babm ikŋ ec’ey a eke k’eblm, ke lɛf tuɔtuɔ b’ɛlu ɔny ok wus ab af.
Afr am oc es ɛsɛ ajraŋka eke wɛl b’ɔny ar es ab af; ɛtŋ mafɛny a lele silekr ab ab fɛŋ am ŋgboŋ ɛl e susu susu a.
Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ wus ec’ɛ́b ebu, agŋ any ɛsɛl, ar ogŋ ɛsɛl ɛm ec’agŋ ɛgbɛl, egbreŋgbi, abusu ɔny ɛsɛl, agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ ek’el madu oglog agŋ ewi a, im lɔl es mafɛny ɔmu ɛm lele mób ɛm ab.
-N’am dad mafɛny a lele mób ab ab -l’ɛsɛ: "Òkr ɛy af ke lɔ́ɔl ɛy es ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a ec’any a e lís, ke ɔ́ny kpabr ɛy es licɛbli a ec’ɛrm bebl a e lís,
aŋke ɛl ec’ɛrm bebl a e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a ow ŋ̂. Sica bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow ɔtu anŋ owr ab ee?"
Sica ow e jam a, m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar ek’inym es wus eci ɔy yar ab ɛm. -N’ɔny ɔy yar a e lɛf a eke b’ɛlu wus na af ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛf kaka k’ɛ́lum wus na af, okij af lele ekŋ ɛm ab.

Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ɛy ɔkm yogŋ a eke ligbn b’igb a. N’ɔnym Nyam ek’anŋ owr eci ob a eke b’oc ɛwr ɛgŋ mɛny ab ab. Li barm lebl tuɔtuɔ l’ɛsŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar a eke ɛŋn abusu eke ki ŋuŋn wus lel okij ab a ninɛ:
"Èkur yɛ! Kì kokr wus, okij lele ekŋ ab low ŋuŋ kaka. Ow it eke si k’ikŋ anym s’ɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam ɛy e Nyam a eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ec’anyafr a."
Ɛtŋ m’iri agŋ a eke wɛl ɛwr mɛny anyafr a e nɛny a. -L’ij agŋ fandi ekŋ lɔbŋ, agŋ miy yar. Ow ow el Israɛl ec’eb eb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a:
Juda ec’eb ab ɛm agŋ fandi lɛw yony, Rubɛn ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Gad ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Asɛr ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Nɛftali ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Manase ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Simeɔn ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Levi ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Isakar ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
Zabulɔn ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Josɛf ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Bɛnjamɛ ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony. Ɛl fɛŋ, -n’ɛŋn Nyam e mɛny ɛwr a.

Ow e jam a, mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl eke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum awlm. Ow el ɛb ɛb fɛŋ, eb eb fɛŋ, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ lele ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ab ec’agŋ. -N’inym es atufu lɛkpn a lele licɛbli ab ab ec’any af, -li sus mob efu ɛtŋ arakp anŋ ɛl abu ɛm.
-N’am ɔg lɛc ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛy e sel ɛŋn a, ɛy e Nyam a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn af a lele licɛbli ab ab ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow!"
Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ iwr did ɛlul atufu lɛkpn a, agŋ ekpekp a lele mindey yar ab ab ɛm. -N’am ok ɔwrɔkp wus atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af ɛtŋ -n’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ:
"Nawrɛ! Kɔklm, anygbɛl, sɛwr, bia ɛlu lele sos usr ab, abusu ɔny lele lɛc ab él ɛy e Nyam a eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn."
Agŋ ekpekp ab ɛm e nyam ibrm im ninɛ: "Bwo ɛl el agŋ amua eke sus mob efu a, ɛtŋ bogŋ -n’anŋ l’ow ee?"

M’ɔdu m’eb mi dad’r m’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ŋ anake uw any a." Ɛtŋ l’ɔdu l’eb li dad’m ninɛ: "Amua, agŋ a eke ɛcr gbre ijr ligbɛl ab ɛm ab ana. -Li yɔyɔg ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es licɛbli a e mebl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ mob sus ɛm a ufu pum pum pum.

Na sosiɛm anake -li b’inym es Nyam ec’atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af, ke ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab -li b’igŋ ow nuŋ ow eci nuŋ igŋ usu a. Ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a b’ow ot ok ɛl in eci gbad êl ab ɛm ke ɔ́su ɛl.
Namn lele mij amn ab k’ow ɔnym ɛl ij, ɛtŋ ligbn lele elubu ab yɛji k’ow ɔnynm ɛl ij.
Nawrɛ, aŋke licɛbli a ek’inym es atufu lɛkpn a e saw a, b’ow el ɛl e nyimn ɛs, ot im ɛl mij ewl mij eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a e saw, ke Nyam tɛ́tŋ ɛl e mikŋ ab es."
Eke licɛbli a bɔbm lɔbŋ ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, afr, usu a irm es tiŋ toŋ ow ɔtu ek’ij wanci ikpr mum.
Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a eke b’anŋ Nyam ec’any af a; wɛl ɔŋ ɛl krɔkr lɔbŋ.

M’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’ow inym es egb waw usu a; n’ɔnym ogŋ ofŋn ob sika ɛm ab. Ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ’n ogŋ nɔnɔ eke li k’oc, ke Nyam ec’agŋ lala a e nyam ŋɔŋn ab ab li kokr egb waw sika ɛm egb waw usu a eke anŋ atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af a.
Afr ɛrm ɛs a ec’abu ɛm a, ogŋ a e mregbn a eke wuwlm Nyam ec’agŋ lala a e sinyam ŋɔŋn ab ab a am il Nyam ec’any af.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a oc ogŋ ofŋn ob a, eb egb waw usu a ec’al a ok ɛm ɛtŋ oc ɔwl wus. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ nyamgbrany am babarm, afr am ŋɛŋn ɛtŋ wus am umu.
Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a eke ɔnym krɔkr lɔbŋ ab ab a am bɛbm sos eke k’afl krɔkr a.
Krɛkrɛ ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Nyamok lele al eke wuwlm mebl ab a am ok wus. Wus ec’og nyahan e nyam, ekŋ eke wɛl ok sakp nyahan eci akp nyam lele suw owr fɛŋ ab eb al iri ok es.
Yony ɛm ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ lafɛny ligbɛl nyam ek’am iri al af ɛy okij ɛm; ɛtŋ okij ec’og nyahan a e nyam itŋn el mebl.
Mindey ek’anŋ okij ɛm a eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam uw, ɛtŋ simijɛtŋ eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam uŋ.
Nyahan ɛm ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Lɛ́l ligbɛl nyam ek’am iri al ɛsɛ mrabri af a anŋ afr ɛy wus. L’ɛy simij ewl mij a ec’ogog nyahan e nyam ɛm lele mij eŋ af ab.
Lɛ́l a e nin el 'Lolo'. Simij ogog nyahan e nyam itŋn am lol, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ a eke ɛgŋ mij a am uw, aŋke ow am lol nɔnɔ.

Sica yar ɛm ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Wɛl iyr ligbn ec’ogog nyahan a e nyam a, awl yɛji ec’ogog nyahan a e nyam a lele mílɛ́l eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam ab ab ob; ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ ɛl eci afŋ a e nyahan ɛm irm es. Lɛgŋ owr e nyahan ɛm a lele ncok eci nyahan ɛm ab ab irmn ɛl ec’usuayl a.

Ɛmɛny mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn káká nyam eke igb im afr kpoŋ ɛm a ke am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ dad ɛsɛ: "Musue! Musue! Musue b’ow el wus ec’agŋ eci, lɛgŋ a eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl nyahan a ek’anŋ a b’ow afl ɛl e krɔkr a!"
Sica yen ɛm ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krɔkr a, ɛtŋ m’ɛkn lɛ́l nyam ek’anŋ afr ɛy wus, ke wɛl oc nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a e safuɛ a ɛlu abu ɛm.
Lɛ́l a fig nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a ɛtŋ mregbn eke otarir es al gbɛl e mregbn ab am uyu ok ɔkm. Mregbn a ek’am ok ɔkm a ibar ligbn lele lɛf ab.
Ɛtŋ mregbn ab ɛm, tɛtɛ gbaŋgban anŋ ok ɔkm eb es wus na nimum af; ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn abusu eke anŋ ɛsɛ sibɔban ec’ab af.
Wɛl ɛdŋn ɛl eke -li ki ŋuŋnmn suw, ekŋ lele ob ɛjeci eke ɛli wus af ab. Gbɛkɔ abusu ɛru ɛl es eke -li k’ijr agŋ a eke Nyam e mɛny ɛwr anm anyafr a gbɛ gbre.
Ɛtŋ agŋ amua e gbre ijr a eke -n’ɛŋan ow ec’abusu a yɛji elm wɛl ec’ibi eci, kɔ ke -l’ijr wɛl gbre nɔnɔ toŋ ow íj awl yen. Ke gbre ijr a e dudu a ánŋ ɛsɛ bɔban ec’ɛgŋ eke b’akŋ a e dudu ab af.
Ɛtŋ awl yen ab ɛm, agŋ b’ow ɔl luw es, kɔ -li k’ow -n’ɛŋnmn ow; -li b’ow -l’erur eke -li k’uw, kɔ luw k’ow owrm ɛl.
Tɛtɛ gbaŋgban amua anŋ ɛsɛ sigbaŋkɔ eke wɛl bɛbm sos ar ogŋ ec’af; ɛl e nuŋ ab af, wɛl b’ɛkn mob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ sika tufɛ af, ɛtŋ ɛl e many a anŋ ɛsɛ agŋ e many af.
Ɛl e sin nuŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ ɔyɔw ec’ab af, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’an nɛnym a anŋ ɛsɛ sikukuma ec’ab af.
Ɛl ec’ɛrmni a anŋ ɛsɛ erkpo lowi ɛm af, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’ɔw a ec’ikŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ ar ogŋn eci mɛtŋ a eke wɛl b’ot cucur sigbaŋkɔ nɔnɔ im ar ogŋ ɛm ab af.
Tɛtɛ gbaŋgban amua ɛli ewl eke mbe anŋ ɛm ɛsɛ sibɔban ec’ab af. Ɛtŋ ɛl ec’ewl amua ab anake -li b’ow -li kok agŋ ów eŋuŋ toŋ ke ow íj awl yen a.
Ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs a el nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a. Ebre ɛm a wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n 'Abadɔn', ɛtŋ Grɛk ɛm a wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n 'Apoliɔn' (ek’el nyandrɛ ɛm 'Ŋuŋn Ɛs').
Sica krɛkrɛ ec’abu ɛyr na ɛc ŋ̂. Gbɛkɔ ow e jam a, ɛmɛny abu ɛyr yony anŋ eke b’ow ow.
Ɛtŋ nɔhɔn ɛm ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krɔkr a. Egb waw usu a ek’el sika ɛm ke anŋ Nyam ec’any af a ec’ɔy yar ab ɛm, m’iri lebl nyam ek’am ikŋ ow.
Lebl a dad nɔhɔn ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a eke ɔnym krɔkr ab ab a ninɛ: "Mɔ̀mu afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar a eke anŋ ŋgbraka ɛm, mij gbɛl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Efrat a e saw ab es."
Wɛl mɔmu afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar ab es. Nawrɛ ɛm a, wanci na af, lɛgŋ na af, awl na af lele lakpo na af ab anake wɛl bɛbm ɛl sos wus nimum ec’agŋ sakp nyahan a ec’akp nyam ec’ibi ec’a.
M’iri ɛl ec’ar ɛsɛl eke b’uyu gbaŋkɔ af a eci nɛny a: -l’ij agŋ miliɔn ekŋ lɛw.

Ɛtŋ kin elel eke m’ɛkan sigbaŋkɔ a lele ɛl ec’af uyu ɛsɛl ab ab a: -l’ɛw erkpo lowi ɛm sos. Erkpo a ebl es ɛsɛ al af, ɛw ble eke iir ɛm ɛsɛ safir lebn af, ɛtŋ ow e mij a yɛji anŋ ɛsɛ sika e mij ab af. Sigbaŋkɔ a ec’eŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ sikukuma ec’ab af; ɛl e nɛnym a, al, mregbn lele mebn eke ler ab am ok ɔkm.
Ów eŋuŋ nyahan amua ek’el al, mregbn lele mebn eke ler ab ke anŋ sigbaŋkɔ a e nɛnym am ok ɔkm a anake ibi wus ec’agŋ sakp nyahan a ec’akp nyam a.
Tasi ɛm a, sigbaŋkɔ a e lɛc a anŋ ɛl e nɛny a lel ɛl ec’ewl ab ab ɛm. Ɛl ec’ewl a b’ot morŋn es: -n’ɔny eŋ eke -li b’ot -n’am kokr agŋ low ŋuŋ.

Sica agŋ a eke ów eŋuŋ amua ibim ke anŋ a, itŋnm es an ɛl ec’abu ɛm eci ekŋ ekpr eke -li kokr a e lís; -l’igŋm abŋ eŋuŋ, sika ɛm sinyam, jɛtɛ efu ɛm eci, jawie ɛm eci, mebn ɛm eci lele ekŋ ɛm ec’a e nuŋ igŋ a -l’ɛlum es; mob amua eke ɔ́tum ɛknm es, irim ów, anm es yɛj’a.
-Li walm ɛl ec’agŋ ibi owi, ɛl e cam kok owi, ɛl eci nfaci ij lele ɛl e mil iy ab ab bɔbɔ yɛji -l’ɛlum es.
Ow e jam a, m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs lɛc ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke anŋ afr am us es. Jru wiwrm’n ab ɛtŋ nyamgodi iwr’r nuŋ af; in ec’any a anŋ ɛsɛ ligbn af ɛtŋ in ec’akr a anŋ ɛsɛ al ek’am iri imn afr ec’af.
N’ɔnym lɛl likekli eke fig ab. L’oc in e lidr e lakr a l’ɛw okij af ɛtŋ l’ɛw nɛmn ec’a wus af.
Li barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke kukuma bi barm ab af. Ɛtŋ eke li barm l’ok es a, nyamgbrany lɔbŋ a ɔdu eb babarm.
M’erur eke mi ki nɔn ów a eke nyamgbrany a dad a, kɔ m’iri lebl nyam dad’m ninɛ: "Òc nyamgbrany lɔbŋ a ec’ów a eke dad a ɛw es sos ɛm; kì nɔn."
Sica afr ɛrm ɛs a eke m’ɛkn inym es okij af lele wus af ab a, igbl lidr abu ogŋ,
ɛtŋ ij nɛny Nyam ek’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ke kok afr, wus, okij lele ob fɛŋ ab a e nin ɛm. Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛmɛny Nyam k’ow ekum ij!

Kɔ wanci ab af eke lɔbŋ ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a b’ow ɔb nuŋ am afl in e krɔkr a, yogŋ anake Nyam e low a eke lɔl es a b’ow iy nɛny ɛsɛ elel eke li dad ow e low l’ok in eci juma kok ɛsɛl ek’el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab af a."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lebl a eke anŋ afr ikŋ m’iri a, am dad’m ɛsɛ: "Ìm oc lɛl likekli a eke fig anŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a ek’inym es okij af lele wus af ab a ec’abu ɛm a."
M’im mi titm afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛtŋ m’ibrm’n eke li k’oc lɛl likekli a n’ɔŋ’m. Li dad’m ninɛ: "Òc ij. Li b’ow li ded’ŋ nɛnym ɛsɛ mow mun af, kɔ li b’ow li lol’ŋ lokm."
M’oc lɛl a afr ɛrm ɛs a ec’abu ɛm ɛtŋ m’ij. Nawrɛ, l’ɛw mrɛmrɛ ɛm e nɛnym a ɛsɛ mow mun af, kɔ eke m’akŋ m’ɛmn a, l’ɛw’m lolo lokm.
Ɛtŋ sica wɛl dad’m ninɛ: "Ow it ke ɛmɛny ím ɔb Nyam e kokoba ok agŋ, ɛb ɛb, ɛbr ɛbr, lele ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ab."
Ow e jam a, wɛl ɔŋ’m likŋ sreŋ nyam eke wɛl b’oc bɛbmn ob, ɛtŋ wɛl dad’m ninɛ: "Ìm bɛbmn Nyamel gbɛl a lele egb waw usu ab ab, ke áwl agŋ a eke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ ɛm yogŋ a yɛji.
Gbɛkɔ ɛ̀w Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ ab es, kì bɛbmn, aŋke wɛl oc ɔŋ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke b’ow uyu ob fɛŋ af ŋuŋn ɛb lala ab ɛm toŋ awl ekŋ yony miy yony.
Ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛrm ɛm ec’adaŋku yony a sus niŋn mob ow. -Li b’ow -l’ɔb Nyam ec’amani a toŋ sɛgŋ fandi sɛgŋ ekŋ lɛw nyahan."
Adaŋku yony a el oliv ekŋ yony a lele mun al yony a ek’anŋ wus ec’Es Ɛw a ec’any af a.
Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am erur eke ki kok ɛl low ŋuŋ, al b’anŋ ɛl e nɛnym a am ok ɔkm tɛtul ɛl ec’efnu a trɛ trɛ trɛ. Ɛɛ, ɛbɛn ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ɔl ɛl e low ŋuŋ kok es a b’ow uw ana.

Adaŋku amua ɔny abusu eke k’ɛdŋn nyam eke k’an ɔpar wus es a, sɛgŋ a nimum eke -n’am ɔb agŋ Nyam ec’amani a. -N’ɔny abusu eke -li k’itŋn mij el mebl, ɛtŋ -n’ɔny abusu yɛj’eke -li k’ɔŋ abu ɛyr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ów wus af, sakp abi a eke -li b’erur a.
Gbɛkɔ ba -li b’uwar ɛl ec’amani ɔb a, ndey a eke b’anŋ nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, b’ow ogŋ ɛl ar, akm ɛl es ke ibi ɛl.
Ɛl e sos megl ugŋn a b’ow anŋ ɛb gbɛl a ec’ɛjɛm araŋn a, yogŋ a eke wɛl ɛw ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ olikŋ af a. Nyandrɛ ɛm e nin eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ ɛb a el Sodɔm oglog Ejipt.
Agŋ agŋ a fɛŋ, eb eb a fɛŋ, ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ lele ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ab ec’agŋ a b’ow lɛr ɛl e sos megl ugŋn a toŋ sɛgŋ nyahan lele likpr ab, ɛtŋ k’ow erurm eke wɛl k’im ot ɛl es.
Wus ec’agŋ a sos ɛm b’ow iŋn, ɛl e luw a eci; -li b’ow -li kok sos ɛm iŋn ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’aparir ob, aŋke Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl yony na ɔŋ ɛl -l’ɛkn gbre nɔnɔ.
Gbɛkɔ eke sɛgŋ nyahan lele likpr ab ab ɛc a, Nyam fuf kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl yony a in ec’owr anŋ e sel a, ɛtŋ ow igbm ɛl. Ow ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke am lɛr ɛl a erŋn ligbɛl ɔny.
Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl yony a iri lebl tuɔtuɔ nyam ek’anŋ afr am ikŋ dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ùyur owr aŋa!" Ɛtŋ ɛl ec’efnu a fɛŋ ek’am lɛr ɛl a ec’any af, -l’uyu afr e jru ɛm.
Wanci ab af cɛ, wus umu lɛc ɛm. Ɛb a ec’ogog lɛw ɛm e nyam bubm ok ɛtŋ agŋ fandi lɔbŋ ɛŋn luw wus a ek’umu ab ɛm. Agŋ bɛb a ek’anŋ owr a erŋn afŋn es toŋ ɛtŋ -n’am ɔŋ Nyam ek’anŋ afr a anygbɛl.
Sica yony ɛm ec’abu ɛyr a ɛc ŋ̂. Gbɛkɔ, ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ow k’ow ibnm ɛtŋ nyahan ɛm ec’a yɛji b’ow ow.
Lɔbŋ ɛm ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krɔkr a. Ebl nɔnɔ anŋ afr am ikŋ lɛc ɛm dad ɛsɛ: "Sica wus eci es ɛw a e low anŋ ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lel in e Mesi ab ab ec’abu ɛm, ɛtŋ es ɛw na b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ!"
Agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab a ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ anŋ in e lɛkpn af Nyam ec’any af a, ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ am igŋ’n nuŋ dad ɛsɛ:
"Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ŋ eke anŋ yɛfɛnyna ke anŋ god’ɛtŋ a, s’am ɛlu’ŋ bia eke oc ŋ ec’abusu ligbɛl ab ɛm sigm ŋ ec’es ɛw ab es a.

Ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ebl ɛrm, kɔ sica ŋ ec’ɛrm bebl a anake am ɛy ɔkm a. Wanci a eke ki jɛj agŋ ek’uw a e low ok ab ana. Ŋ eci juma kok ɛsɛl ek’el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci wanci a eke k’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ap a anake ow a. Agŋ a fɛŋ, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab ek’el ŋ eci ke b’ɛlum’ŋ ɔmn ɛm a, yɛji b’ow ɛŋn ɛl eci. Wanci a eke b’ow ŋuŋn agŋ a eke bi ŋuŋn wus ab ana."
Sica Nyamel gbɛl a ek’anŋ afr a fig, ɛtŋ sinm araka a ɛy ɔkm. Afr am ŋɛŋn, nyamgbrany am babarm, wus am umu ɛtŋ nyamok am an ok wus.
Ca ɛmɛny mɛny ɛwr ligbɛl nyam ɛy ɔkm afr: ow el yɔw nyam eke ligbn iwr ɛlul ɛm ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af, ke awl anŋ in ec’akr ew a. L’us es ɛw e tufɛ eke mílɛ́l lɛw yony anŋ af.
Lok usu’r bɛbmn iy ew ab, ɛtŋ iy a eke am ɔnyn’n a am ɔŋ’n li babarm.
Ɛmɛny mɛny ɛwr ɛjeci nyam ɛy ɔkm afr: ow el tamranji nyam eke ebl es kondoŋ ke ɛli eŋ lɔbŋ lele ɔcɔwr lɛw ab. Nuŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ af a, es ɛw e tufɛ anŋ.
In e luwl ab ɛm, li papl afr e mílɛ́l sakp nyahan eci akp nyam ɛm a es l’ok wus. Ɛtŋ l’igb l’ow n’inym es l’ɔbr yɔw a ek’iy am ɔnyn ab any, ba ow b’ew iy a ke kpɛkŋ n’ɔ́ny n’ɛmn.
Yɔw a ew iy igŋ nyam eke b’ow ɛw ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ es abusu ligbɛl ɛm. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl oc iy a im ɛw es Nyam lele in ec’atufu lɛkpn ab ab e saw.
Kɔ yɔw a gbɛ, l’uru es n’im loj, yogŋ a eke Nyam kok usu nyam ɛw’r es, eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n ob l’ij toŋ sɛgŋ fandi sɛgŋ ekŋ lɛw nyahan a.
Ɛtŋ mum ɛy afr yogŋ; Mikaɛl lele in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ogŋ mum tamranji a lele in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab.
Kɔ tamranji a eb ɛ́s; ow ɔŋ in lel in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab -n’ɔnym abusu eke -li k’anŋ afr yogŋ ij.
Wɛl ɔny tamranji a ɔwl gbeŋ. In anake lɛgŋ sig ab ɛm l’el lorŋn a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ agn oglog Satan, ke b’ɛju wus nimum ec’agŋ a. Wɛl ɔny ɔwl’l wus in lel in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab.

Ɛtŋ afr m’iri lebl nyam barm tuɔtuɔ ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Sica es eb ɛlu eci lɛgŋ a ow ŋ̂! Ɛy e Nyam a ɛlu in ec’abusu a lele es ɛw ab ab ɔkm! Sica es ɛw a anŋ in e Mesi a abu ɛm, aŋke wɛl ɔny ɛy lisijimɛl a ec’ɛgŋ a eke b’ok ɛl ów af a ɔwl gbeŋ. Ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab li b’ok wɛl ów af ɛy e Nyam a ec’any af.
Gbɛkɔ ɛy lisijimɛl a akm’n es licɛbli a e mebl ab ɛm lel ow e daŋku a eke -l’ijr ab ɛm, aŋke -l’erurm ɛl ec’owr anŋ a toŋ -l’urum luw bɔbɔ yɛji.
Ow sosiɛm a, afr lele ɔny eke iir ɛm ab ab, kòkr sos ɛm iŋn! Gbɛkɔ wus lel okij ab, gbre él ɔny eci! Agn us es ow ɛŋn ɔny, ɛrm bebl iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ, aŋke l’uw any eke sɛgŋ tɛl cɛ anŋ’n."
Eke tamranji a b’ɛkn eke wɛl ɔny ɔwl’l wus a, l’igb n’am ogŋ yɔw a eke ew iy igŋ ab es.

Gbɛkɔ yɔw a ɛŋn káká ligbɛl nyam ec’ɔw yony eke li k’oc ke l’ígb toŋ l’ók usu a eke wɛl kok ɛw’r es loj a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li kpáb es lorŋn a e lís, ke yogŋ wɛl ɔ́ŋ’n ob l’ij toŋ akpo nyahan lele likpr ab.
Ɛtŋ lorŋn a am ɛgbl mij ok es ɛsɛ mij ewl mij gbɛl af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow éb yɔw a.
Gbɛkɔ wus ow ɛlum yɔw a abu: l’ɔdu mij bubutɛ a eke tamranji a ɛgbl ok es a fɛŋ l’eb.
Sica tamranji a ɛrm am ebl nɔnɔ yɔw a e lís, ɛtŋ n’im n’am ogŋ mum yɔw a ec’ey likpr ab ab, ɛl a eke b’ɛlum Nyam e sol a ke b’ucu low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke Jesu ɛlu ɔkm a ɔny es a.
Ɛtŋ tamranji a ɛc inym es okij nɛny e sɛc ab af.
Ow e jam a, m’ɛkn ndey nyam anŋ okij ɛm ɛy ɔkm. L’ɛli ɔcɔwr lɛw lele eŋ lɔbŋ ab; in e licɔwr fɛŋ af a, es ɛw e tufɛ anŋ; ɛtŋ in e nuŋ fɛŋ af a, nin eke bi wɛwr Nyam anŋ.
Ndey a eke m’ɛkn a ot fabn es, in ec’akr a ɛw ɛgbɛl ɛsɛ urs ec’ab af, ɛtŋ in e nɛny a anŋ ɛsɛ kukuma ec’ab af. Tamranji a afl in e lɛc a, in ec’es ɛw a lele in ec’abusu ɔny ab ab es ɔŋ’n.
Ndey a ec’eŋ a e nyam ob kok ɛsɛ ek’ow’n k’uw af, gbɛkɔ ob a eke kok’r luw ec’a as. Ow ɔŋ wus nimum erur ow e low ɛtŋ am us ndey a jam.
Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ am igŋ tamranji a nuŋ, aŋke ow afl abusu es ɔŋ ndey a. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛl a cɛ, -n’am igŋ ndey a yɛji nuŋ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ot ndey ab es ɛtŋ bwo ɔtu eke k’akm’n es ee?"
Ɛtŋ ndey a ɛŋn abusu eke ki dad es ɛfu lele ɛgŋ wɛwr e sodad ab ok Nyam af; n’ɛŋn abusu eke li ki kok low toŋ awl ekŋ yony miy yony.
Ɛtŋ ndey a am wɛwr Nyam; n’am dad ow e nin, ow ec’ɛb ir usu a lele agŋ a ek’ir afr ab ab ec’odad ŋuŋ.
Abusu ɛru’r es eke li k’ogŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a ar ke l’ákm wɛl es; n’ɛŋn abusu a eb eb fɛŋ af, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ af, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ af lele ɛb ɛb fɛŋ af ab.
Wus nimum ec’agŋ a b’ow igŋ’n nuŋ, agŋ a eke wus e kok ɛm ɛtŋ ɛl ec’en a anm sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a. Sel ɛŋn e lɛl na, licɛbli a eke wɛl wawr egb a eci.
Ke ɛgŋ ek’ɛli ɔru a íri sɛnyn sɛnyn!

Ɛgŋ eke in ec’a ow el eke wɛl k’ɔny ɛlu’l sobel ɛm a, wɛl b’ow ɔny ɛlu’l sobel ɛm; ɛgŋ eke in ec’a ow el lab ler ɛm ɛm, li k’uw a, lab ler ɛm ɛm li b’ow luw. Na sosiɛm anake agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a it eke k’ɔny ɛrm susu lele ɔmn ab a.
Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn ndey ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm. L’ɛli ɔcɔwr yony ɛsɛ licɛb ec’ab af ɛtŋ n’am dad odad ɛsɛ tamranji af.

Ndey na ɔny abusu ɛsɛ krɛkrɛ ec’a ek’anŋ okij ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab af, ɛtŋ n’am kok juma ow e nin ɛm. N’am ɔny wus nimum lel in ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ab lɛc ɛm igŋ krɛkrɛ eci ndey a nuŋ, ndey a eke ob kok nuŋ ɛsɛ ek’ow’n k’uw af ke ow as a.
Ndey na ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, am kok mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl; n’am ɔŋ al bɔbɔ yɛji anŋ afr ok wus agŋ a pupukpaŋ ec’any af.

Ɛtŋ n’am irmn wus ec’agŋ a, mɛny ɛwr a eke n’am ɔtu li kok krɛkrɛ eci ndey a eci nin ɛm a. N’am ɛju agŋ eke k’aku likŋ ɛgŋ nyam, krɛkrɛ eci ndey a e sos usr eci, ndey a eke lab kok ob nuŋ ɛsɛ ek’ow’n k’uw af, ke ɛwl mɛny anŋ owr a.
Ɛtŋ yony ɛm eci ndey a ɛŋn abusu eke k’ɔŋ ndey krɛkrɛ a eci likŋ ɛgŋ a sel, yec’ɛtŋ ke likŋ ɛgŋ a ɔ́tu dad odad ke ɔ́ŋ wɛl ibi agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛ́gŋm igŋm’n nuŋ a.
N’ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, egbreŋgbi lele ɔgbɔru ab, ewi lele madu ab lɛc ɛm eke k’ɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam lidr abu af oglog anyafr.
Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke mɛny ɛwr anm af a ɔtum eke k’ɔl ob oglog ɛw ob an; mɛny ɛwr a el ndey a e nin oglog ob awl e mɔni ek’el nin a ec’a.

Aŋa anake ow am ibrm eke ɛgŋ k’ɔny sɛwr a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yec’eke ɔny nuŋ ɛm ɔny a ɔtu eke k’uw ndey a e mɔni a ec’abi a eke k’ij a e nyandrɛ ab any, aŋke ow el ɛgŋ e nin. Ob awl e mɔni a el ekŋ yen yen sakp nɔhɔn ekŋ nyahan miy nɔhɔn.
Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn licɛbli a eke inym es Siɔn e lafɛny ab af, in lele agŋ fandi ekŋ lɔbŋ miy yar eke wɛl nɔn in e nin a lele Ɛs ec’ab ab ɛw anyafr a.
M’iri lebl nyam ek’anŋ afr am ow, ke am ikŋ ɛsɛ okij e mra af, oglog ɛsɛ nyamgbrany ligbɛl ec’ikŋ ab af. Lebl a eke m’iri a anŋ ɛsɛ saŋgo ɔny ɛsɛl e mob a eke b’ɔny ab af.

Agŋ amua fɛŋ am ɛgŋ ɛj owr nyam atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab ec’any af. Ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum eke ki wewr ɛj a, eke ow elm agŋ fandi ekŋ lɔbŋ miy yar a eke el wus aŋa ec’agŋ a eke wɛl ɔl a cɛ.
Agŋ amua kokm sikpl owi ɔyɔw ab, -l’ayl. -Li b’us licɛbli a jam usu fɛŋ eke ow b’im a. Wɛl ɔl ɛl agŋ ec’araŋn eke -li k’el agŋ krɛkrɛ eke wɛl k’oc ap Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab.
Lɛgŋ kaka -n’ɔnym yadŋ; -li kokm sikpl kaka.
Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’am igb afr kpoŋ ɛm a ɛc. N’ɔnym Amani Mamn a ek’ɔnym uwr ab ab eke li k’ɔb l’ok wus nimum, ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ec’agŋ, eb eb fɛŋ, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ lele agŋ agŋ fɛŋ ab.
N’am dad lebl gege l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀lumn Nyam ke ɔ́ŋn in anygbɛl! Aŋke wanci ow eke li b’ow li jɛj wus nimum e low l’ok. Ìgŋn ɛgŋ a eke kok afr, wus, okij lele mij ewl mij fɛŋ ab a nuŋ!"

Yony ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a anŋ krɛkrɛ ec’a e jam ow, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Babilɔn ɛb gbɛl a ɛy wus! L’el ɛb a eke ɛju ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ɛgŋ in e mar a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ij nfaci, ke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm a."
Nyahan ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a anŋ yony a e jam ow, ɛtŋ am dad lebl gege ɛsɛ: "Eke ɛgŋ nyam am igŋ ndey a lele in e likŋ ɛgŋ ab ab nuŋ, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋn ow eci mɛny ɛwr a anyafr lele abu af ab,

in yɛji, li b’ow l’ɛgŋ mar a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm a. Mar na b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɛtm ok in ec’ɛrm bebl a e kpɔk ab ɛm. Agŋ amua b’ow ij gbre nɔnɔ al ɛm lele mebn eke ler ec’al ab ɛm, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala lele licɛbli ab ab ec’any af.

Al a eci mregbn a eke am ɔŋ ɛl -l’ij gbre nɔnɔ a, am uyu afr akpo akpo fɛŋ eci. Agŋ amua eke am igŋ ndey a lele in e likŋ ɛgŋ ab ab nuŋ, ke ɛŋn in e nin a e mɛny ɛwr a ɔnym sel eb ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab."
Na sosiɛm anake agŋ a ek’el Nyam eci, b’ɛlum in e sol a, ke ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm a k’ɔny ɛrm susu a.

Ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’anŋ afr am dad’m ɛsɛ: "Nɔ̀n odad na: ehe él agŋ a eke caca ɛm am uw Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma kok ɛm a eci! Ɛɛ, Abŋ am dad eke agŋ amua in anŋ ehe ɛm. Sica wɛ’n ɔtu eke wɛ’n k’eb sel juma a fɛŋ eke wɛ’n kok a eci, aŋke wɛl eci juma a e liy a in am us wɛl jam."
Ow e jam a, mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn jru ufu nyam. Jru ab af, ob nyam ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af sig es. In e nuŋ af a sika tufɛ anŋ ɛtŋ egb ubr lab fufu kɔnɔ nyam anŋ’n abu ɛm.

Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm ɛy ɔkm ke barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm am dad in a eke sig es jru ab af a ɛsɛ: "Òc ŋ ec’egb ubr lab a ke úb gɔŋ, aŋke wus eci egb a ek’ebl ub ec’a e wanci ow."
Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke sig es jru ab af a oc in ec’egb ubr lab a ɛtŋ l’ɛw abu l’ub wus nimum ec’egb a.
Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam anŋ afr e Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ɛy ɔkm; in yɛji, n’ɔnym egb ubr lab fufu kɔnɔ nyam ab.

Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke ɛw al es a anŋ egb waw usu a ɛy ɔkm. Li barm lɛc ɛm n’am dad yec’a ek’ɔnym egb ubr lab fufu ab ab a l’ɛsɛ: "Òc ŋ e lab fufu a ke úb wus e viny egbekl a, aŋke in ec’ey a ebl."
Afr ɛrm ɛs a oc in ec’egb ubr lab a ɛtŋ ɛw abu ub wus e viny egbekl a ɛtŋ ot ok ɛl es ifir ob gbɛl ab ɛm eke -li k’ɛkn Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a.
Wɛl ifi viny ey ab es es ifir ob ab ɛm baŋn a e jam a; ɛtŋ es ifir ob ab ɛm mebl nɔnɔ ewl ok ɔkm. Mebl a ewl toŋ im igŋ kilo ekŋ yen yen sakp nyahan, ɛtŋ uyu toŋ ok sigbaŋkɔ a e nɛnɛkp a e nɛny nɛny.
Ɛtŋ afr m’ɛkn mɛny ɛwr ligbɛl ɛjeci nyam eke in e low am iti’m any: afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ eke ɔnym es abal el ɛm ec’abu ɛyr lɔbŋ ab, eke ɛl ɛm Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a b’ow ɛdŋ nuŋ a.

Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn okij eke ayl toŋ am ɛkan es, ke al wuwlm ab. Agŋ a fɛŋ eke eb any ndey a, in e likŋ ɛgŋ a lele in e nin a e mɔni a ec’abi a eke k’ij ab af a, inym es afr okij na eke ayl toŋ am ɛkan es ab af. Ɛtŋ -n’ɔnym sisaŋgo a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛl ab ab.

-N’am ɛgŋ Nyam e juma kok ɛs Mois lele licɛbli ab ab ec’ɛj a: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ɛbɛn eke ŋ e sijuma a agb ke akpl ana! Ɛb ɛb ec’Ɛb Ebu, ɛbɛn eke ŋ ec’ów a eke bɛbm ok es a el nyim nyim ke el nawrɛ ana!
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, bwo ec’ɛgŋ tasi ɔtu eke k’ɛluam’ŋ ee? Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke ki kɔklam’ŋ ee? Ŋ sɔny coco el lala. Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ b’ow igŋ’ŋ nuŋ, aŋke ŋ ec’ów nyim nyim a ok ɔkm kpata -l’ɛkn."
Ow e jam a, afr, m’ɛkn Nyamel gbɛl a fig. Ɛm yogŋ Nyam eci sinm a eci gbad ɛm êl a anŋ.
Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a ek’ɔnym abu ɛyr lɔbŋ ab ab a anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm ok ɔkm. -Li sus mob eke ufu pum pum pum ke am jɛjn, ɛtŋ -l’ucu ɔhɔny eke wɛl kok sika mij ɛm ɛr ɛm.
Mindey yar ab ɛm eci nyam ɔŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a sika ɛm kpɔk lɔbŋ. Ɛm yogŋ, Nyam ek’anŋ god’ɛtŋ a ec’ɛrm bebl a iy ɛm gbɔŋ.
Mregbn iy Nyamel ab ɛm gbɔŋ; ow el Nyam ec’anygbɛl a lele in ec’abusu ab ab. Ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛym Nyamel ab ɛm, eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a eci abu ɛyr owi a eke ot ow a e low k’iym nɛny.
Ow e jam a, m’iri lebl ligbɛl nyam anŋ Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm am ikŋ dad afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a ɛsɛ: "Ìmn wus ke ɛ́wal Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ek’anŋ kpɔk lɔbŋ ab ɛm a es!"
Krɛkrɛ ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok wus af, ɛtŋ abi ɛgbɛl eke bi dudu a ok agŋ a eke ndey a e mɛny ɛwr anŋ af, ke b’igŋ in e likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ a.
Yony ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok okij ɛm. Mij a itŋn anŋ ɛsɛ lɛgŋuw e mebl ab af, ɛtŋ ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ owr okij ɛm a uw.
Nyahan ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok simij ewl mij lele mij eŋ ɛm ab, ɛtŋ simij a titŋn el mebl.
Ɛtŋ m’iri afr ɛrm ɛs a ek’ɛw mij es a am dad ɛsɛ: "Ŋ ek’anŋ yɛfɛnyna ke anŋ god’ɛtŋ, ŋ ek’el lala a, eke ow el nɛnɛ anake jɛj ok a, ke el jɛj ok ɛs nyim nyim.
Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua ibi agŋ lala a ek’el ŋ ec’a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ab ok mebl es, ɛtŋ sica ɛl yɛji ɔŋ ɛl mebl -l’ɛgŋ. Ow ek’it ɛl ec’ab ana!"
Ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam anŋ egb waw usu a am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛɛ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ŋ e jɛj ok fɛŋ el nawrɛ lele nyim nyim ab!"
Yar ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok ligbn af, ɛtŋ ligbn ɛŋn abusu eke ki kakŋ wus ec’agŋ a in ec’al ab ɛm.
Agŋ al am kakŋ sos, ɛtŋ -n’am wɛwr Nyam a ek’ɔny abusu abu ɛyr amua af a e nin a. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛgŋm eke -li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm bake -n’ɔŋ ow any.
Yen ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok ndey a ec’atufu lɛkpn ab af, ɛtŋ in ec’es ɛw a ɛy ncebn ɛm. Agŋ a fɛŋ am akŋn anm gbre eke -n’am ij a eci.
-N’am wɛwr afr e Nyam a ɛl e gbre e -n’am ij lele abi ab ab sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ -l’igŋm ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ a -l’okm es.
Nɔhɔn ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok mij ligbɛl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Efrat ab ɛm. Mij a mam es ɛtŋ ɛw ɛ́b ebu a eke b’anŋ yogŋ a eke ligbn b’igb a ejagb es ow.
Tamranji a, ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu ab ab e nɛnym a, m’ɛkn abŋ eŋuŋ nyahan ek’anŋ ɛsɛ betibɔm af am ok ɔkm.
-L’el abŋ eŋuŋ eke bi kok simɛny ɛwr. -N’aam -n’ɛŋn wus ec’ɛ́b ebu a fɛŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’as wɛl luku Nyam Abusu Ɛs e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a e mum ogŋ a eci.
Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: "Kin, m’am ow ɛsɛ ulu af. Ehe él ɛgŋ yec’a eke anŋ any owr ke sus mob am eku, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’íim sos ɔfr agŋ ɛknm in ec’ɛ́s a eci!"
Abŋ eŋuŋ a as ɛ́b ebu a luku usu nyam eke Ebre ɛm a wɛl b’ɛsŋ Armagedɔn.
Lɔbŋ ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok lɛf ɛm. Lebl nyam anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm barm tuɔtuɔ; ow el lebl ek’anŋ atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am ow. Ɛtŋ lebl a dad ninɛ: "Sica ow uwr ŋ̂!"
Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, afr am ŋɛŋn, nyamgbrany am babarm ɛtŋ wus am umu. Wus ec’umu ikŋ a, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke agŋ anŋ wus a, -l’ɛknm ɛbɛn.
Baŋn gbɛl a ufŋ es ok sakp nyahan ɛtŋ ɛb ɛb a e baŋn baŋn a fɛŋ bubm ok. Nyam ijlm Babilɔn gbɛl ab es; n’ɔŋ eke ow k’ɛgŋ mar kpɔk gbɔŋ a ek’el in ec’ɛrm bebl ligbɛl a.
Lekr a fɛŋ irm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛ́knm mafɛny ij.
Ɛtŋ nyamok eku eku anŋ afr am an ok agŋ af; ɛtŋ agŋ am wɛwr Nyam, nyamok na sosiɛm, aŋke ow el ob eke ɔny lɛc nɔnɔ.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a ek’ɔnym kpɔk lɔbŋ ab a eci nyam ow dad’m ninɛ: "Òw, mi b’ow mi yɛgm’ŋ abu ɛyr a eke Nyam b’ow ɔŋ facyɔw gbɛl a eke inym es simij ewl mij nɔnɔ e nɛny a.
Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a ij nfaci in ab, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke ir wus na af a ɛgŋ in eci nfaci owi a e mar am ɔny."
Abŋ ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛs a oc’m im loj. Yogŋ, m’ɛkn yɔw nyam eke sig es ndey ebl kondoŋ af. Nyam eci wɛwr ec’en eb ndey a e sos a fɛŋ; ɛtŋ l’ɛli eŋ lɔbŋ lele ɔcɔwr lɛw ab.
Yɔw a ok gbad ebl mamn, l’ok sika ɛm miyob nɔnɔ, mebn amamn ɛm e miyob lele ayrɛ ɛm e miyob ab. N’ɔnym sika ɛm kpɔk ab. Ɛm yogŋ, in eci nfaci ij a eci kpɔtɔm owi a fɛŋ iy ɛm gbɔŋ.
In ec’anyafr a, wɛl nɔn nin eke ow eci nyandrɛ a lɔl es: 'Babilɔn gbɛl, afacyɔw lele wus na nimum ab eci musue owi fɛŋ ec’ɛl lis.'
M’ɛkn yɔw a eke Nyam ec’agŋ a lele agŋ a ek’ij Jesu eci daŋku ke wɛl ibi a eci mebl am ɛc any. Mi b’ɛkn’n a, low eb’m sos.
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ow am iti’ŋ any ee? Mi b’ow m’ɛlu yɔw a eke sig es ndey ab af a lele ndey na eke ɛli eŋ lɔbŋ lele ɔcɔwr lɛw ab a e low eke lɔl es ɛm a ɔkm mi yɛgm’ŋ.

Ndey a eke ɛkn a, lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, wɛl ɛkn’n n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna n’anm owr ij. Gbɛkɔ li b’ow n’anŋ nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm l’ɛy ɔkm n’im in eci ŋuŋn eci. Ɛtŋ wus na ec’agŋ a eke wus eci nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ wɛl nɔnm ɛl ec’en sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a, low b’ow iti any ndey a ec’ɛkn ɛm, aŋke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc a, n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna n’anm owr ij, kɔ li b’ow l’ɛwl l’ow.
Sica wɛl ɔ́ny nuŋ ɛm ɔny lele sɛwr ab gɔŋ! Eŋ lɔbŋ a el egigl lɔbŋ eke yɔw a sig es af a; ow el ɛ́b ebu lɔbŋ yɛji:
ɛl ɛm eci yen ok wus, nyam ɛw usu es, lɔbŋ ɛm ec’a k’owm. Lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ow a, ow b’ow el lɛgŋ tɛl cɛ eci.
Ndey ebl kondoŋ a eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm anŋ owr, ke yɛfɛnyna anm owr ij a, in obi ɛm a, l’el niwn ɛm ec’ɛb ebu; ɛtŋ ɛsɛ lɔbŋ ab af, in yɛji n’aam in ec’ibi eci.
Ɔcɔwr lɛw a eke ɛkn a el ɛ́b ebu lɛw eke k’ɔbm nuŋ k’ɛwm usu es; gbɛkɔ ndey ab ab -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn abusu -l’ɛw usu es wanci nyam eci.
Ɛ́b ebu lɛw amua eci tutr a okr af; tutr a el ke -l’ot ɛl e lɛc a lele ɛl ec’abusu ab ab -l’ɛlu ndey a e lís e low kok ɛm.

-Li b’ow -l’ogŋ licɛbli a ar, gbɛkɔ licɛbli a b’ow akm ɛl es, aŋke l’el kɔtɔkɔ ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ lele ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ɛm ec’Ɛb Ebu ab; ɛtŋ in ec’agŋ nɛny nyam ɛsɛl a eke li sɔsum l’ot ke l’ɛsŋ ab ab, -li b’ow -l’akm wɛl es."
Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Simij a eke ɛkn yogŋ a eke facyɔw a sig es a el agŋ agŋ, bieku bieku, ɛb ɛb lele ɛbr ɛbr ab.
Ɔcɔwr lɛw a eke ɛkn a lele ndey ab ab b’ow ɔny facyɔw a eci sifn: -li b’ow -l’eb ow ec’ob fɛŋ eke ow ɔny a, -n’ɔŋ ow anŋ sos ɔfr. -Li b’ow -l’ot ow eci megl a fɛŋ -l’ij ke -l’ofŋ ow eci likpr a,
aŋke Nyam ɔŋ eke ɛl ec’ɛrm ab ɛm, -li ki kok low yec’a eke Nyam am erur a. Nɛny b’ow okr ɛl af -l’oc ɛl ec’es ɛw eci abusu a -li kok ndey a e lís e low toŋ ke Nyam eci sodad a fɛŋ íy nɛny.
Ca yɔw a eke ɛkn a el ɛb gbɛl a eke ɛw wus na nimum eci ɛ́b ebu a fɛŋ es a."
Na b’ɛc a, m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ afr am us es. N’ɔny abusu ligbɛl nyam, ɛtŋ in ec’anygbɛl a ayal wus na nimum.
L’ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ li dad ninɛ: "L’ɛy wus, Babilɔn gbɛl a ɛy wus! Sica ow el abŋ eŋuŋ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a ec’usu ek’ir, ɛl ec’es lɔl usu; aŋa anake ɔr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ lele mindey ek’ aylm ke wɛl b’ifn ab ir a.

Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a ɛgŋ in eci mar a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ij nfaci, ke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm a. Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a igŋ’n af -l’ok nfaci ij owi ab ɛm, ɛtŋ wus na eci án ɔlu a el egbreŋgbi in ec’ob eke n’ɔny afŋn es a sosiɛm."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’iri lebl ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ afr am ikŋ ow dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm ec’agŋ, òkr ɔkm ɛb ab ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ánmn in e sikpl a e low ɛm, in eci abu ɛyr ɛgbɛl a eke b’ow ɛŋn’n a k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny.
Tasi ɛm a, in eci sikpl a tatakŋ toŋ im ok afr, ɛtŋ Nyam ijlm in ec’ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi amua es.

Kòkr ɛb a low ɛsɛ elel eke li kokr agŋ ɛjec’ab af. Low yec’a eke li kok a, in yɛji kòkr ir ow eci sakp yony. Mij kpɔk a eke li bi wuwlm mar tuɔtuɔ ab n’ɔŋ agŋ ɛgŋ a, in yɛji mar eke ɛw tuɔtuɔ a, wùwlmn ow eci ɔtu sakp yony ab ɔŋn in l’ɛ́gŋ.

Anygbɛl owi a eke li kok lele ɛb sɛnyn a eke l’ij ab ab a, ɔ̀war ow eci dudu a lele ow eci gbre ab ab eke bɛbmn ab a ɔŋn in. Li bi dadr in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'M’ir aŋa ɛsɛ ɛb eb yɔw af, m’elm iŋnyɔw ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka mi k’ow m’ɛknm niŋn owi.'

Low na sosiɛm anake gbre owi a fɛŋ eke wɛl bɛbm ɛw’r es a b’ow ɛŋn’n a: ɔl ek’el luw eci, niŋn owi lele lek ab. Lɛgŋ nyam coco af fɛŋ b’ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ɛtul il. Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke jɛj in e low a ok a ij lɛc nɔnɔ."
Eke wus eci ɛ́b ebu a eke in ab kok nfaci owi ke ir ɛb mɛwl ɛm a b’ow ɛkn ɛb a ek’ɛtu a eci mregbn a, -li b’ow -l’ikŋ ɔŋn -li kok sɔrŋ.
Ke in eci gbre owi a k’ɛ́ŋnm ɛl a, -li b’ow -li kpab ow es lís -n’im akpoj ke -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ e gbre ana ee? Oy Babilɔn! Ɛb gbɛl ek’ij lɛc! Wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake wɛl ɔb’ŋ low a."
Wus na ec’án ɔlu a yɛji am ikŋ ɔŋn ɛtŋ am kok in eci sɔrŋ aŋke sica wɛl ɔ́lm ɛl ec’an ob a ij:
sika, jɛtɛ ufu, mebn amamn lele ayrɛ ab; gbad fuɛfuɛ, gbad ebl amamn, gbad frɛfrɛ; ekŋ sŋɔsŋɔ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ, ɛyr nɛn ɛm ec’ob fɛŋ eke wɛl kok, ekŋ ek’il an, jawie, lowi oglog lebn mamn;
ekŋ sel sŋɔsŋɔ lele mob sɔsŋn mob ɛjec’ab, mijey, kpey lele ogŋ ab; mar, mun, ble mpupu lele miy ab; sed, mɛcɛb, sigbaŋkɔ lele ow eci mɛtŋ ab toŋ agŋ eci sos megl lele ow eci liy bɔbɔ yɛj’ab.
Wɛl am dad ɛsɛ: "Mob mob a fɛŋ ek’am erur a anm ŋ ogŋ a ij, ŋ ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ lele ŋ ec’ɛb ij sɛnyn ab ab irm; lɛgŋ kaka wɛl k’ow ɛŋnm ɛl ij!"
Án ɔlu a eke ɔl an ɛb ab ɛm ke ɔny ob a, -li b’ow -n’inym es akpoj, ɛb a eci gbre owi eke k’ɛŋn ɛl a sosiɛm. -Li b’ow -l’ikŋ ɔŋn -li kok sɔrŋ,
-li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ eci gbre anake ɛŋn ɛb gbɛl na ab ee? L’ɛw ob fuɛfuɛ sos, gbad ebl amamn, l’ok sika ɛm miyob, mebn amamn ɛm e miyob lele ayrɛ ɛm e miyob ab.
Ɛtŋ wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake mob amua fɛŋ irm a!" Simijɛtŋ a eci idr ɛsɛl a, agŋ a ek’us mij ɛl ab a, ɛm yogŋ eci juma kok ɛsɛl a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛŋn ob ij mij af yogŋ a b’ow inym es akpoj.
Eke -l’ɛkan ɛb a ek’am ɛtu a eci mregbn a, -li b’ow -l’ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛb kaka anm eke agb ot ɛb na es!"

-N’am ok siflefl nuŋ, -n’am ikŋ ɔŋn -li kok sɔrŋ ɛtŋ -n’am ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ eci gbre anake ɛŋn ɛb gbɛl na ab ee? In ec’ob ɔny ab ɛm anake agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɔny simijɛtŋ okij na af a el egbreŋgbi a. Ɛtŋ wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake amua fɛŋ irm a!"
Afr, sos ɛm íŋn’ŋ Babilɔn eci wus eke ɛr ok a eci! Nyam ec’agŋ, ɛrm ɛsɛl lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab, sos ɛm íŋn ɔny aŋke Nyam jɛj ok’r low ŋuŋ a eke li kok ɔny a eci!
Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’ɔny lɛc a oc ma ɔlul lob legleg nyam ɔwl okij ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛbɛn eke wɛl b’ow oc Babilɔn ɛb gbɛl a ɔwl lɛc ɛm ana, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka wɛl k’ow ɛknm’n ij.
Lɛgŋ kaka ŋ ogŋ a wɛl k’ow irim saŋgo ɔny ɛsɛl ec’ɛj, ɛj ɛgŋ ɛsɛl, kete afl ɛsɛl, krɔkr afl ɛsɛl e lebl ij. Wɛl k’ow ɛŋnm mɛwl ɛs kaka fɛŋ ij; wɛl k’ow irim ob iny usu eci likekr ij.
Mun al a k’ow ayalm ŋ ogŋ a ij; wɛl k’ow irim ɔyɔw ɛcɛl owr owr eci sɔ́g ij. Ŋ eci án ɔlu a ɔny any akm wus na nimum ec’a, ɛtŋ ŋ eci cam owi ab ɛm, irmn ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a."
Babilɔn yogŋ anake kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, Nyam ec’agŋ a lele wus na nimum ec’agŋ a fɛŋ eke wɛl ibi ab ab eci mebl a ok es a.
Low na b’oc es a, afr m’iri lebl tuɔtuɔ nyam ek’ot agŋ nɔnɔ eci likekr es, ke am dad ɛsɛ: "Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Aŋke es eb ɛlu, anygbɛl lele lɛc fɛŋ ab a el ɛy e Nyam a eci!

In eci jɛj ok owi a fɛŋ b’el nawrɛ lele nyim nyim ab! Ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, l’ɔb facyɔw gbɛl a eke b’ɔny wus ec’agŋ a ok in eci nfaci ij owi ɛm a low. Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a eke l’ibi a, Nyam kok li sɔg ow e labm."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Ɛb gbɛl a eke wɛl ɛtul a eci mregbn a am il godo godo fɛŋ eci!"
Agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab a lele mindey yar ab ab ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ am igŋ Nyam eke sig es atufu lɛkpn af a nuŋ, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Amɛn! Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ!"
Lebl nyam anŋ atufu lɛkpn ab af am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɔny a fɛŋ a eke eel Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, ɔny eke b’ɔnyn in ec’ɛlum a, kɔ̀klmn ɛy e Nyam a!"

Ɛmɛny m’iri lebl ek’ot agŋ nɔnɔ eci lebl es; ow am ikŋ ɛsɛ okij eci mra eke b’ɛlu ab af, ɛsɛ nyamgbrany af. Kin lebl a ec’odad eke am dad: "Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Aŋke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs sigm in ec’es ɛw ab es!
S’ɛ́lul sos ɛm iŋn e lili, s’ánŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, si kɔ́klmn in! Aŋke licɛbli a eci mɛbi a ec’es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ ow ŋ̂, in e yɔw a bɛbm sos inym es.
Nyam ɔŋ’n ob sos ɛw ufu fuɛfuɛ ek’am jɛjn eke li k’ɛw sos." (Ob sos ɛw ufu fuɛfuɛ a el Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’ów nyim nyim a.)
Afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Nɔ̀n dad ɛsɛ: Ehe él agŋ a eke wɛl ɛsŋ licɛbli a e mɛbi a ec’es gbɛgbl ab ɛm a eci." Ɛtŋ l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Amua, ow el Nyam ec’odad ebl tasi."

M’ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’akr esr a eke mi k’igŋ’n nuŋ, kɔ li dad’m ninɛ: "Kì kok! Ɛm yɛji, juma kok ɛs ɛsɛ ŋ af, ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl a eke ij Jesu eci low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke ɛlu ɔkm a eci daŋku ab af. Nyam anake it eke k’igŋ nuŋ a! Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke Jesu ij ow eci daŋku a, el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci odad a eke dad a eci liy tasi."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ek’agbr ɛm, ke gbaŋkɔ ufu nyam ɛy ɔkm. Ɛgŋ a ek’uyu gbaŋkɔ ab af a, wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Nɛny Nyam Ij Ɛs lele Low Nawrɛ Ɛs ab; in e jɛj ok a lele ar ogŋ ab ab b’el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm eci.
In ec’anyamn a am iri ɛsɛ al af, ɛtŋ es ɛw eci tufɛ nɔnɔ anŋ’n nuŋ. Wɛl nɔn nin nyam in af ek’ɛgŋ kaka uwm ow e low any, ek’ow elm in sɔny coco cɛ.
In eci mob af ɛw a eke li sus a el mebl ɔfr. Ɛgŋ a wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Nyam Odad.
Afr eci ar ɛsɛl a sus mob efu fuɛfuɛ ek’ayl ɛtŋ uyu sigbaŋkɔ efu af am us’r jam.

Lab ler ɛm fufu nyam ɛy’r ɔkm nɛnym agŋ ec’ɔr eci. Li b’ow ni nyimn wɛl lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ow li yɛgm Nyam Abusu Ɛs ec’ɛrm bebl ligbɛl a. Li b’ow l’ifi wɛl es lɛc ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl b’ifi viny ey es es ifir ob ɛm ab af.
Kin nin a eke wɛl nɔn in e mob af ɛw ab af lele in eci im ab ab af a: 'Ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ɛm ec’Ɛb Ebu lele kɔtɔkɔ ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ ab.'
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’igb inym es ligbn ab ɛm. N’am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ l’ɛsŋ ɔr a fɛŋ eke b’igb im afr kpoŋ ɛm a l’ɛsɛ: "Òwr, àsr luku Nyam eci ob ij gbɛl a eci!

Òwr ijr ɛ́b ebu a eci megl a, ìjr srɔda eyŋ ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a lele ar ɛsɛl ab ab eci megl a, ìjr sigbaŋkɔ a lele ɛl ec’af uyu ɛsɛl ab eci megl a, ìjr agŋ fɛŋ eci megl a, ewi lele madu ab eci megl a, ìjr ey lele ɛgbɛl ab eci megl a."
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn ndey a, m’ɛkn wus eci ɛ́b ebu a lele ɛl eci ar ɛsɛl ab ab eke as luku, eke k’ogŋ ɛgŋ a eke uyu gbaŋkɔ af a lele in eci ar ɛsɛl ab ab ar.

Wɛl ɔny ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu a eke kok mɛny ɛwr owi eke k’irmn agŋ a eke ɔny ndey a eci mɛny ɛwr a, ke am igŋ likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ a. Wɛl ɔny ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu ab ab ow ɔwl mebn eke ler faf es am iri al ab ɛm.
Lab ler ɛm a eke anŋ ɛgŋ a eke uyu gbaŋkɔ ab af a e nɛnym am ɛy ɔkm a, ibi ɛl eci ar ogŋ ɛsɛl a fɛŋ, ɛtŋ ɔr a fɛŋ am ij ɛl e megl a.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’anŋ afr am us es. N’ɔnym nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a eci safuɛ a lele ŋgbraka ligbɛl nyam ab.

N’ɔny tamranji a, lorŋn sig a ek’el agn oglog Satan a, l’ok ow ŋgbraka ɛtŋ l’oc l’ɔwl ow nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm akpo fandi eci. L’abl nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a safuɛ ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke tamranji a k’írmnm ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ a toŋ ke akpo fandi a ɛc ok es. Ow b’ow uwr a, ow it ke wɛl ɛ́lu’l es lɛgŋ tɛl eci.

Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn atufu mɛkpn: agŋ a eke ok es af a ɛŋn abusu eke ki jɛj agŋ e low ok. M’ɛkn agŋ a eke wɛl ibi a yɛji eci abŋ a; wɛl ibi ɛl Jesu eci low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a ek’ɛlu ɔkm a lele Nyam odad ab ab eci daŋku eke -l’ijr a sosiɛm. -L’igŋm ndey a nuŋ, -l’igŋm ow eci likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ, ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋnm ndey a eci mɛny ɛwr a anyafr, -n’ɛŋnm ow anm ɛl abu af yɛji. -L’igb luw ɛm ɛtŋ Krist ab -l’ɛw usu es toŋ akpo fandi.
Na krɛkrɛ eci luw ɛm anŋ igb ab ana. Agŋ ɛjec’a eke uw a k’ow igbm luw ɛm eke akpo fandi a k’ɛcm k’okm es.

Ehe él agŋ a eke anŋ krɛkrɛ eci luw ɛm anŋ igb ab ɛm a! -L’el Nyam eci agŋ lala ɛtŋ yony ɛm eci luw a ɔnym abusu ɛl af; -li b’ow -l’el Nyam lele Krist ab eci egb waw ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ Krist ab -li b’ow -l’ɛw usu es toŋ akpo fandi a.
Lɛgŋ a eke akpo fandi a b’ow ɛc ok es a, wɛl b’ow ɛlu Satan es sobel ɛm,
ɛtŋ li b’ow n’im l’ɛju ɛb ɛb a ek’el Gɔg lele Magɔg ab ek’anŋ wus na eci susu kpekpe a. Li b’ow l’as wɛl luku ar ogŋ eci, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’ɛny ɛsɛ okij any eci mrici af.
-N’anŋ susu a fɛŋ -l’ow -l’iwr Nyam ec’ɛb lala a eke erur ke in ec’agŋ ir a -l’ɛlul ɛm eke -li k’eb. Gbɛkɔ al b’ow anŋ afr ow ŋuŋn ɛl.
Ɛtŋ agn eke b’ɛju ɛl a, wɛl b’ow oc ɔwl’l mebn eke ler faf es a eci al ab ɛm, yogŋ a eke ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu ab ab anŋ a. -Li b’ow -l’ij gbre nɔnɔ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab godo godo fɛŋ eci.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn atufu lɛkpn ufu nyam lele ɛgŋ a eke sig es af ab ab. Wus lele afr ab kpab’r es lís im kpekpe ɛtŋ wɛl ɛwlm ɛknm ɛl ij.

Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn agŋ ek’uw a, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, eke inym es atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af. Silɛl nɔnɔ fifig ok es, ɛtŋ lɛl ɛjeci nyam yɛji fig ɛru es, ke sel ɛŋn eci lɛl ab ana. Agŋ a ek’uw a, wɛl jɛj ɛl e lís e low ok low a eke -li kokr ab ɛm, yec’a eke wɛl nɔn anŋ silɛl ab ɛm a.
Okij ɛlu agŋ a ek’uw ke n’ɔnym ab a es. Luw lele ɔŋnes baŋn ab yɛji ok ɛl ec’agŋ a ek’uw ke -n’ɔnymn ab a es, ɛtŋ wɛl jɛj ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e lís e low ok in e juma a eke li kok ab ɛm.
Wɛl itr luw lele ɔŋnes baŋn ab ok al a eke faf es ab ɛm. Al na eke faf es a el luw sakp yony ɛm a.
Wɛl b’oc ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔnm in e nin sel ɛŋn eci lɛl ab ɛm a ɔwl al a eke faf es ab ɛm.
Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr owr nyam lele wus owr nyam ab; krɛkrɛ ec’afr a lele krɛkrɛ eci wus ab ab irm ɛtŋ okij a yɛji anm ij.
Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn Jerusalɛm owr a, ɛb lala a eke Nyam ɔŋ anŋ in ogŋ a am ow a. Li bɛbm sos ɛsɛ yɔw eke kpɛkp sos eke k’im ɔbr ɛc af.

M’iri lebl tuɔtuɔ nyam ek’anŋ atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am ikŋ ow dad ɛsɛ: "Sica Nyam ec’ɛb ir usu a ow agŋ ec’araŋn! Li b’ow l’ir wɛl ab ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el Nyam ec’agŋ. Nyam in obi b’ow anŋ ɛl ab ɛtŋ li b’ow l’el wɛl e Nyam.
Li b’ow li tɛtŋ wɛl e mikŋ a fɛŋ es; luw owi, niŋn owi, likekr owi lele gbre ij owi ab k’ow anm ij. Lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’ów a fɛŋ ot es ŋ̂."
Ɛtŋ sica ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a dad ninɛ: "Sica m’am ɔŋ ów a fɛŋ itŋn el owr." Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Nɔ̀n low na aŋke ɛm eci sodad a el nawrɛ, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔny ɔmn ow ɛm."
Ɛmɛny l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Sica fɛŋ uwr ŋ̂! M’el Krɛkrɛ lele Es Abal El ab, Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab. Ɛgŋ yec’eke mijamn am ɔny a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n mij ewl mij a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a ɔfr ɛm l’ɛgŋ.
Ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ow eb any a, b’ow ɛŋn aja ikŋ na; m’ow m’el in e Nyam ɛtŋ in li b’ow l’el ɛm ec’iy.

Érŋnu, ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, agŋ eŋuŋ, agŋ ibiu, afacu, cam kok ɛsɛl, agŋ a eke b’igŋ sɛkp nuŋ lele ayadŋu fɛŋ ab ec’a, ɛl ec’usu b’ow anŋ mebn eke ler faf es a eci al ab ɛm. Ke luw sakp yony ɛm ab ana."
Sica m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a, eke ɔnym kpɔk lɔbŋ a eke abu ɛyr es abal el lɔbŋ a anŋ ɛm a eci nyam. L’ow n’am dad’m l’ɛsɛ: "Òw, mi b’ow mi yɛgm’ŋ igŋ ɛya, licɛbli a eci yɔw a."
Abŋ ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛs a oc’m im lafɛny gege ligbɛl nyam eci nuŋ af. Li yɛgm’m Jerusalɛm, ɛb lala a eke Nyam ɔŋ anŋ in ogŋ a am ow a.
Nyam ec’anygbɛl a am ɔŋ li jɛjn ɛsɛ lebn mamn af, ɛsɛ jasp eci lebn eke b’ɛkan es af.
N’ɔny lakp sisil gege nyam eke ɔny masany lɛw yony lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony ek’am ɔsu ab. Masany ab af a, wɛl nɔn Israɛl ec’eb lɛw yony a ec’en a anŋ.
Baŋn ec’ogog nyam nyam fɛŋ b’ɔny masany nyahan: nyahan b’anŋ yogŋ eke ligbn b’igb a, nyahan b’anŋ yogŋ eke ligbn b’ɛru a, nyahan b’anŋ afr ogog a, ɛtŋ nyahan b’anŋ esr ɛm a.
Baŋn a eci lakp a sigr mób lɛw yony eke wɛl ok ɔmu ɛm, ɛtŋ af yogŋ, wɛl nɔn licɛbli a ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ec’en a.
Afr ɛrm ɛs a eke am dad’m odad a ɔnym ob bɛbmn ob ab, sika ɛm eci likŋ soŋni eke ki bɛbmn baŋn a, in eci masany a lele in eci lakp ab ab.
Baŋn a eci ogog yar a bɛbmn; sɔfu a lele es ar ab ab bɛbmn. Afr ɛrm ɛs a oc in eci sika ɛm likŋ soŋni a bɛbmn baŋn a; ow ij sɔfu fandi lɛw yony, es ar a, sigb a lele sɔfu ab ab bɛbmn.
Li bɛbmn lakp a yɛji. Ob bɛbmn ob a eke l’oc li bɛbmn ab ɛm, n’ɛŋn sigb a eci sɔfu a ekŋ lɔbŋ miy yar,
wɛl awŋ lakp a jasp ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛb a in obi a wɛl us’r sika tasi ɛm ɛtŋ ow b’ayl ɛkan es ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ af.
Mób a eke wɛl ok ɔmu ɛm awŋ baŋn a eci lakp a, wɛl ot mebn amamn ek’ɔny mij ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ijr mɛwl: krɛkrɛ eci lob a jasp ɛm, yony ɛm ec’a safir ɛm, nyahan ɛm ec’a agat ɛm, yar ɛm ec’a emerod ɛm,

yen ɛm ec’a onis ɛm, nɔhɔn ɛm ec’a sarduan ɛm, lɔbŋ ɛm ec’a krisolit ɛm, niwn ɛm ec’a beril ɛm, libarm ɛm ec’a topas ɛm, lɛw ɛm ec’a krisopras ɛm, lɛw nyam ɛm ec’a turkuas ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛw yony ɛm ec’a ametis ɛm.
Masany lɛw yony a el ayrɛ lɛw yony; lisany nyam eci kok ɛm a, wɛl b’oc ayrɛ ligbɛl nyam coco. Ɛjɛm a el sika tasi ɔfr eke ayl am ɛkan es ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ af.
M’ɛknm Nyamel ɛb ab ɛm, aŋke ɛb a eci Nyamel a el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs lele licɛbli ab ab.
Ɛb a ɔlm ligbn es, ɔlm awl es eke k’ayal il, aŋke Nyam ec’anygbɛl a am ayal il ɛtŋ licɛbli a el in eci mun al.
Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a b’ow an es in eci usuayl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ wus eci ɛ́b ebu a b’ow ot ɛl eci ob ɔny a ow yogŋ.
Lɛgŋ owr nimum a, baŋn a eci masany a b’ow fifig ok es; lɛgŋ kaka wɛl k’ow bablm, aŋke yogŋ lɛgŋ uk k’ow anm ij.
Wɛl b’ow ot ɛb ɛb a eci sagb a lele ob ɔny ab ab ow yogŋ.
Ob fɛŋ eke aylm Nyam ec’any af lele agŋ eke bi kok musue owi ke b’ɔny yadŋ a k’ow okm baŋn a. Agŋ a sɔny coco a eke b’ow ok ɛm a el, ɛl a eke wɛl nɔn ɛl ec’en licɛbli a eci sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a.

Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a yɛgm’m sel ɛŋn eci mij ewl mij ek’am jɛjn ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ af, ke anŋ Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab ec’atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am jɛjn ok ɔkm ewl im ɛb a ec’usu araŋn a. Mij a ec’ál yony a eke ok a ec’araŋn a, sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a anŋ. Lakpo nyam af a, li b’ɔsu ey sakp lɛw yony, awl nyam akp nyam. In eci suw a b’ewlm ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ a.
Ofn owi kaka k’ow anm ij. Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab eci atufu lɛkpn a b’ow anŋ ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a b’ow igŋ’n nuŋ.
-Li b’ow -l’ɛkn ow ec’any a, ɛtŋ ow eci nin a b’ow nɔn ɛl ec’anyafr a.
Lɛgŋ uk k’ow anm ij, ɛtŋ -li k’ow -l’ibramn mun al ec’usuayl a lele ligbn ec’ab ab, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam in obi li b’ow l’ok wɛl in ec’usuayl ab af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el es ɛw ɛsɛl godo godo fɛŋ eci.

Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Sodad amua el nawrɛ, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔny ɔmn ow ɛm; ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam a eke bi nyimn kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci abŋ a, ɛrm in ec’afr ɛrm ɛs ow yec’ɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm in e juma kok ɛsɛl a low eke b’ow ɛy lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm a."
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ìri, ow k’ow ibnm m’ow m’ow! Ehe él agŋ a eke b’oc kokoba ɔb e sodad ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a sɛnyn sɛnyn a eci!"
Ɛm Jan, m’iri ɛtŋ m’ɛkn ów amua. Ɛtŋ eke m’iri ke m’ɛkn a, m’ok ɔwrɔkp wus afr ɛrm ɛs a eke yɛgm’m ów amua a ec’any af eke mi k’igŋ’n nuŋ.

Gbɛkɔ li dad’m ninɛ: "Kì kok ɛbɛn! Ɛm yɛji juma kok ɛs ɛsɛ ŋ af, ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab af, ɛsɛ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’oc lɛl na ɛm eci sodad a sɛnyn sɛnyn ab af. Nyam anake it eke k’igŋ nuŋ a, kɔ ow elm ɛm!"
Ɛmɛny li dad’m ninɛ: "Kokoba ɔb e sodad ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a, k’òc ki lɔl es, aŋke ów amua fɛŋ eci sɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm ok es a titm.
Ke ɛgŋ eke akplm a, n’ánŋ in ec’akplm ab ɛm; ɛgŋ eke aylm Nyam ec’any af a, n’ánŋ in ec’ aylm ab ɛm; ɛgŋ eke bi kok low mamn a, n’ánŋ low mamn kok ab ɛm; ɛgŋ ek’el lala a, n’ánŋ lala el ab ɛm."
Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kin, ɛm ec’ow ibnm ij! Mi b’ow m’ism ob ap ab, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ, juma a eke li kok a eci.
M’el Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab, m’el Krɛkrɛ lele Es Abal El ab, Kpɔkpɔ lele Uwar ab."
Ehe él agŋ a eke am ɛfn ɛl ec’ob sos ɛw es eke k’ɛŋn abusu ij sel ɛŋn e likŋ a ec’ey a eci. -Li b’ow -n’ɛŋn abusu -l’ɛ́cr masany a eci -l’ok ɛb ab ɛm.
Sica baŋn a eci jam a, agŋ eŋuŋ a, cam kok ɛsɛl, afacu, agŋ ibiu, sɛkp nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl lele ayadŋu ab ec’usu ek’anŋ ana!
"Ɛm Jesu, m’ɛrm ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ow ij ów amua e daŋku Nyamel fɛŋ ec’any af. Ɛm, m’el David ec’eb ab ɛm eci lilaw, ibribr eci lɛ́l ek’am jɛjn.
Abŋ a lele yɔw a eke wɛl ɛbi ab ab am dad ɛsɛ: 'Òw!' Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke in yɛji am iri low na a dád ɛsɛ: 'Òw!' Ke ɛgŋ eke mijamn am ɔny a ów; ke ɛgŋ eke am erur sel ɛŋn eci mij a, éb ɔfr ɛm."

Ɛm, Jan, kin low eke m’am igbl ow eci lebl ogŋ mi dad ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow iri kokoba ɔb owi a ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a: eke batŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am oc low ɛjeci nyam ɛlu ɛm a, ke abu ɛyr owi a fɛŋ eke wɛl dad ow e low lɛl na ɛm a, Nyam b’ow ot ɔŋ’n.

Ɛtŋ eke batŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am ɔny kokoba ɔb e sodad a ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a ec’ob nyam oc es, ke sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a ec’ey a lele ɛb lala a eke wɛl dad ow ec’odad lɛl na ɛm a, Nyam b’ow ɔny oc’r es abu ɛm.
Ɛgŋ a eke ij low nɛnyɛmbri nyam na ec’asmanu a dad ninɛ: "M’am ow caca!" Amɛn! Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu, òw gɔŋ!
Ke sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
